quote: The world will always be filled with injustice. If you have time to give up or hold a grudge against that injustice, then use that time to enjoy battling those injustices instead.
author: Korosensei

quote: If you weren't here, I would have become the world's absolute evil. Unbiased terror scattered throughout the world that can establish real peace. Don't think that all children are waiting for heroes. There are even kids around the world waiting for a great monster to take the stage. Can you save them? Can you follow the ugly kid being picked on in the park? I can. I can save the whole world with terror! While humanity is fearing Garou the Monster, everyone's hearts will unite to survive. Is there any peace other than this? Can you create peace? Can you, unbiased, save the world with that flimsy cape? Do you have the means to stop the unseen tragedies? You're strong... but so what? You may defeat me, but can you handle it? The responsibility. Well? If you're going to defeat me then answer the question! What will you accomplish? Why will you kill me now? Do you have a sense of duty like mine? Why are YOU a hero!?
author: Garou

quote: If that treetop is school, and the ground is this place here... we all found our strength down on the ground. While looking up... and getting looked down on... we learned plenty about how scary heights were before we started climbing. That's why we can go our own way now. Still... Somewhere along the way we forgot our fear of heights, so we do still fall to the ground every now and then. So learn here. You can go on to school once you have a game plan. That's my secret lesson, from me to you.
author: Nagisa Shiota

quote: Thinking it's your fault after the fact is just pointless.
author: Fujinuma Sachiko

quote: The phony peace that heroes create will dye people with evil. That's why I'm doing this. I will be the Count Devil that plunges humanity into terror! In a world with no room for survival, evil will disappear. And so will bullying, and discrimination, even war! What this world needs is not biased Justice but unbiased, absolute Evil! I'm fighting for world peace. No justice will be able to overthrow me. I will be stronger than anyone! I will be an absolute MONSTER!
author: Garou

quote: You may have grown too strong. Drunk on your own power, you forgot to put yourself in the shoes of someone weaker than you. That makes you no different than the student in the main campus.
author: Korosensei

quote: To get what you want, you put up with something, make an effort, learn a skill, and inspire yourself. Is that how it is with Hinazuki too? Right now... I can tell she's enduring something. Just the opposite of me, she is pretending to be indifferent. She pretends to feel nothing, but a 10 year old girl isn't that strong.
author: Satoru Fujinuma

quote: While I'm performing it feels like it'll become real somewhere along the line.
author: Hinazuki Kayo

quote: The popular will win, the hated will lose, it's such a tragedy. Then I won't lose to anyone. I will become the strongest monster ever and change this scenario.
author: Garou

quote: The essence of good deeds and evil is the same. They're both no more than a person's actions to make up for a defect in themselves.
author: Yashiro Gaku

quote: This strength doesn't make any sense. It's not fair. It's like he's made up of the world's unfairness. As if he is the personification of justice... of course. Didn't I already know? This world is unfair. Justice and evil are decided by others. That's how the world is. To oppose the unfair power known as justice, I have to obtain the unfair power known as evil. To defeat the unfair beings known as heroes I have to become an unfair being myself!
author: Garou

quote: All adults are the same in the end. At first they are kind and sympathetic to make you drop your guard, then they try to kill you if you don't do as they say. That how adults always are. They're losers. The damn bastards!
author: Jack

quote: This is your world. As an outsider it may be out of place to say this... But I want to make one thing clear: Mere observers have no right to decide the future!
author: Reiji Akaba

quote: Justice is a weapon. It can be used to cause harm, but it cannot protect or save others.
author: Osamu Dazai

quote: There is a difference in the look of the ordinary vagabond and that of a determined man.
author: Donquixote Doflamingo

quote: Be Yourself because an Original is worth more than a Copy
author: Taiga Kagami

quote: Every time you hurt others, you're the one who end up being hurt.
author: Takashi Morinozuka

quote: Anyone can cheer for you and your dreams, but only the people closest to you can worry about you.
author: Jurai Andou

quote: Why should I apologize for being a monster? Has anyone ever apologized for turning me into one?
author: Juuzou Suzuya

quote: I don't care if no one likes me. I wasn't created in this world to entertain everyone.
author: Oreki Houtarou

quote: Like God, you mean? That might be pleasurable in its own way, but unfortunately I'm not into being an umpire or a referee, as I can't genuinely enjoy the game unless I'm part of it. And I love this game that people call "life" from the bottom of my heart. That's why I'd like to continue to participate in it as a player, forever and ever.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: You don't abuse and use people for your own convenience.
author: Hikaru Hitachiin

quote: The harder you try to see the good in people the easier it is to fake you out.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Victory is everything in this world. The victory is acknowledged, and the vanquished is disavowed. Because I am victorious overall, I am always the just.
author: Akashi Seijuurou

quote: No matter who the enemy may be, those who can't adapt will be the first to die.
author: Ludenberg Celestia

quote: A pig who doesn't fly is just an ordinary pig.
author: Porco Rosso

quote: People fall into darkness because they have lost sight of the true nature of the light within them. Unable to find that light they flounder desperately while suffering in agony, only to give birth to tragedy. And there is no greater cause of tragedy, no greater source of darkness, than warfare.
author: Ei Sei

quote: You've really got to hold on to what's important to you.
author: Kazuya Kujō

quote: Broadly speaking, there are two reasons a person feels the desire to teach something: Either he wants to pass on his successes or he wants to pass on his failures.
author: Korosensei

quote: I just really don't wanna meet a disappointing end, with someone burning my bones without even knowing who they belonged to.
author: Jean Kirstein

quote: I don't understand the feelings of the weak. The law of the world is survival at its fittest. Its how the weak are weeded out. It just means those people that died were too weak. Its only natural for the weak to perish.
author: Esdeath

quote: I understand now. The world is not cut from the same cloth. It is because it is overflowing with inexplicable, unidentifiable things that the world is so beautiful.
author: Satsuki Kiryuuin

quote: A person who can't care about himself can't protect anyone, I think.
author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka

quote: Oppression. Rule by fear. dictatorships. It's a strange thing. Throughout history, for some reason, the lives of such rulers have always ended in the same way: Assassination by someone who isn't even part of a combat unit.
author: Sora

quote: Is being silent and suppressing  your own feelings really being thoughtful of the other person?
author: Tsukushi Makino

quote: The writing end when the writing ends... No... Accurately said, it is not written to an end. If you write a story to a certain point, can you say it is fully written? This has been paining me in all those long years as someone who writes. The journeys of humans make for such interesting stories, yet... But where does the journey start and where does it end... Even I do not know an answer to this...
author: Featherine Augustus Aurora

quote: "Believing in someone." That's a weird phrase, isn't it? After all, if you truly believed in a person, you wouldn't need to say, "I believe you." It's like saying, "I believe in air." I don't mean to say that "believing in something" is like a lie. "Believing" is really a term of hope of wanting to believe.
author: Satoru Fujinuma

quote: The future is always blank. Only your willpower can leave footsteps there.
author: Satoru Fujinuma

quote: All of the connections we encounter in this world serve as teachers who nurture us.
author: Korosensei

quote: If you're ever lost in the darkness, follow the compass in your heart.
author: Kayo Senju

quote: So because you think you got the ending, you're giving up on viewing the whole play? Even though it could still lead to a climax that you weren't able to predict?
author: Ushiromiya Lion

quote: Talent is something you make bloom, instinct is something you polish.
author: Tooru Oikawa

quote: If you want to stand with your own will, you don't have any other choice than to let the illusions you have lost remain in the ideals you were following in the past.
author: Kouen Ren

quote: Doing this and that for your country is surely not your job, but the kings. But taking action for your country and her people - your parentage has no bearing on that. It is a most noble thing.
author: Etoile

quote: And yet, at the end of the day, we are just like tree leaves dancing in a whirlpool. No matter how we dance, we are only swallowed by the whirlpool and disappear...
author: Claire Bernardus

quote: When a human, gives birth to a child, they give it a form. When they give it a name, they recognize it. And when they raise it in the world, they deepen it's existence.
author: Beatrice

quote: Even if you put aside regret, you´ll end up feeling it anyway. Right now, you need to make sure you grasp this good feeling and never forget it.
author: Ryūnosuke Tanaka

quote: At times, I feel as though the whole world is gray, as though time is standing still. But time never stops. It moves forward endlessly, as surely as bodies buried in the ground will one day become white bones. Listen, it's always you who stops time. If you stop in fear of the future - you gain nothing, and nothing begins. You spend your life as though already dead. Whether you wish it to or not - time never stops. That's why there is nothing more interesting than this world. Don't be too negative. You haven't become ashes just yet. You have your flesh and blood, and your bones are supporting you.
author: Sakurako Kujō

quote: Stories aren't always guaranteed a happily ever after.
author: Drosselmeyer

quote: Being unable to trust anything is the same as being unable to sense other people's love.
author: Yoshino Yūsuke

quote: Sympathy only gets people hurt.
author: Tsugumi

quote: To take responsibility is to take pain onto yourself. It means to bear more pain than what others felt because of your mistakes! If you ruined someone's silver tableware, you must repay with gold tableware. The president of a polluting manufacturing plant must live beside the plant's chimney. That's what taking responsibility means. However the people in so-called high positions never see the consequences. When mistakes are made, they will casually bow their heads and apologize. They think that's enough. Are you one of them too?
author: Toua Tokuchi

quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art. It has no survival value. Rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
author: Shana

quote: Accept me for what I am today, don't reject me because of what I was yesterday.
author: Russia

quote: But for me, just having fun wasn't enough. The support of my friends was equally important. They encouraged me through my struggles. They're all so different from me, but they're honest and determined. We fought, but we also worked together. I know my mother had a friend like that too. Someone to have fun with. Someone to share her worries. Mom, I have finished the song we promised to write. Sorry it took so long. I'm glad I could create this song with you and my friends. I'll treasure it always for bringing us together.
author: Wakana Sakai

quote: Nothing can be communicated without words but if you really care about someone, even the smallest details are important to notice.
author: Hikaru Hitachiin

quote: Don't be too negative. You haven't become ashes just yet. You have your flesh and blood, and your bones are supporting you.
author: Sakurako Kujō

quote: Matsu, you said that people and fireworks bloom like beautiful flowers for an instant and then fade away. That may be true, but Matsu, even if it's only for a moment, I want you to bloom by my side and when you fade away... do so at my side. In return, I will... make beautiful flowers bloom by your side again and again.
author: Matsu's Husband

quote: Ah, my most ugly heart. I hate, hate, hate it, so I can’t help but sneer all the time.
author: Kano Shuuya

quote: The skull is one of the most eloquent bones in existence. If you just ask, it will tell you many things.
author: Sakurako Kujō

quote: I don't like practice. I just hate losing even more.
author: Atsushi Murasakibara

quote: Those who lack resolve are incapable of even wiping away their own tears.
author: Satsuki Kiryuuin

quote: Fear is freedom! Subjugation is liberation! Contradiction is truth! These are the truths of this world! Surrender to those truths, you pigs who fawn over clothing!
author: Satsuki Kiryuuin

quote: There are no inherently bad people. Everyone believes that, myself included. I don’t doubt the existence of virtue. And yet people bare their fangs when it seems they can profit. People will rationalize their own behavior whenever they become tainted with evil
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Was I able to live inside someone’s heart? Was I able to live inside your heart? Do you think you’ll remember me at least a little? You’d better not hit "reset!" Don’t forget me, okay? That’s a promise, okay? I'm glad it’s you, after all. Will I reach you? I hope I can reach you.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: Really, what a joke. I just didn’t understand what these nice guys were thinking about. Because they were so in love with everyone getting along, they ended up opening up other problems when they try to fix one. I didn’t even ask to be thrown into that circle either.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: If you still love her, I can't help that, but don't meddle with her half-heartedly. If you can surpress your feelings, then leave it.
author: Shuuko Murao

quote: When a man of the sea falls in love, he dives in head first!
author: Wave

quote: Your own path is for you to find out on your own.
author: Subaru

quote: When I want to do something, I do it, regardless of the rest of the world. When I don't, I don't, and that's that.
author: Femt

quote: I prefer to have my nightmares with open eyes.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: It's odd, isn't it? People die everyday and the world goes on like nothing happened.
author: Kyōko Kirigiri

quote: Adlet, I hated you. I hated the fact that I was starting to believe in you. I still hate you. The more I talk to you, the more I hate you. I believe you, even though I decided to never believe anyone again.
author: Fremy Speedraw

quote: If you want to be strong, smile! He who can smile, even when he's so sad that he wants to die, when it's so painful that he wants to give it all up and run away, is the one who becomes strong.
author: Atro Spiker

quote: I think there are some things that you have to do, even if they're a crime. Someone has to do them, even if it means taking the blame.
author: Yuri Lowell

quote: We do not stop playing games because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing.
author: Sora

quote: Huh? DO whatever you want without DICE? As if someone like you could understand. What's so bad about wanting to reach higher than yourself? After all, you're already up there. The place where I've always longed to be. If anything, isn't this world at fault? There's plenty of proof this world was created unfairly. The Crime rate's higher than ever. Wealth is the determining factor in life, and so when the most prestigious universities held an experiment, "Does appearance affect the outcome in a trail?" When comparing the results of the beautiful and the plain, the beautiful ones were declared innocent more often. Looks decide your worth. LOOKS, SEX, AGE, ETHNICITY, EDUCATION, JOB, once you realize that there will always be a 'High' and 'Low", the goal is clear. Higher... and Higher! I'm sure that looking down from the highest place will be beautiful sight, so I must reach higher!
author: Miju

quote: There is more than one way to win a game. You can win without fighting!
author: Sora

quote: Death by sword. Death by broken bones. Death by crushing. There's not much difference, right? You die at the end.
author: Ainz Ooal Gown

quote: Regretting the past forever won't solve anything.
author: Shiho Fujimiya

quote: I'm not your weapon, demon king, or savior! I'm Rin Okumura! And when I'm done, I'm going to be the best exorcist you ever laid your eyes on!
author: Rin Okumura

quote: Believe you can do it. For sure. Because I... belong to you now.
author: Inori Yuzuriha

quote: Is that really... the limit to your power? Do you honestly think that you won't get any stronger for the rest of your life? Instead of sitting around frustrated, it's better to keep on moving forward.
author: Saitama

quote: I know no one expects much from me! And I know better than anyone how useless a C Class hero is! I know I'm too weak even for B Class! I know more than anyone else that I'll never beat you! But I must fight you anyway! I'm the only one left! It's not about winning or losing! I just have to stand here and face you!
author: Mumen Rider

quote: I'm not a hero because I want your approval. I do it because I want to!
author: Saitama

quote: After all, most human beings are completely selfish. Eventually, they will meet their desires and try to help others. However, that isn't their only desire, they wish to stir people up. It is simplistically easier to do so anyway, they think it is a stupid ideal to show love to anyone but themselves.
author: Fuyumi Utsuromiya

quote: If you can't remember something, it is merely because it was not worth remembering.
author: Riō Satomi

quote: No matter how crazy it may be, or how dangerous it may be, even if it's something personal, it doesn't matter! Anything that you're worried about, I'll worry right along with you and think of a solution! Just like you did for me all those times!
author: Alibaba Saluja

quote: Forget about me, and starting tomorrow live your own life. Don't keep dragging the dead into your life, otherwise your life would get screwed up and you won't be happy in the future, okay?
author: Misa Kurobane

quote: We will never laugh at ourselves. Just as earthworms do not fear darkness and penguins are not ashamed of their inability to fly. That's the meaning of life, is it not?
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: By abandoning offense, even without winning, the result will be effectively victory.
author: Togame

quote: If you can't see something through the end, then don't do anything.
author: Itami Youji

quote: If you bottle up your sadness too much, you'll forget what's really important.
author: Yuki Takeya

quote: Suna, maybe people all have a hot, molten core inside their hearts, but they just live their lives, never showing it to the world, as if nothing is really going on.
author: Takeo Gouda

quote: You idiot. You'd gotten yourself up in a tizzy about romance, right? "Love" you experience in that state is just self-delusion. There's no point in getting depressed over love like that.
author: Kyouya Sata

quote: On this planet you call females who have yet to become adults, girls. It makes sense then that since you'll eventually become withes, you should be called Magical Girls.
author: Kyubee

quote: If you trust in the possibilities within and try with all your might, the path will show itself to you!
author: Cardeas Vist

quote: All things shine at their most brilliant when they're being broken.
author: Urisu

quote: You can't trust people who call themselves your friends after you've just met them. This is a trap. I know it. A friend who gets close to the protagonist like this is actually the boss, bullying them from the shadows, cornering them into utter despair. And then comes this line... "The truth is I've hated you from the moment I met you!"
author: Umetarō Nozaki

quote: Everyone's the same, no exceptions.  All of them, equal before god.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: The human psyche goes out of whack so easily with minor elements, such as wall colors and staircase placement. Those who use them every day would be affected more dramatically.
author: Aozaki Touko

quote: It only took a moment for everything to click. In that instant, I understood. A leader is somebody who can bring a sense of calm and excitement at the same time.
author: Mutta Namba

quote: If you keep trying to reason with yourself instead of listening to your feelings, you'll never be able to feel true happiness.
author: Hiroomi Nase

quote: Sins you've committed cling to your soul and then continue to haunt you forever.The sins that have gone unpunished don't get forgiven until you die.
author: Koichiro Marito

quote: Whatever you lose, you'll find it again, but what you throw away you'll never get it back.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: Destiny. Fate. Dreams. These unstoppable ideas are held deep in the heart of man. As long as there people who seek freedom in this life, These things shall not vanish from the Earth.
author: Gol D. Roger

quote: If nobody cares to accept you and wants you in this world, accept yourself and you will see that you don't need them and their selfish ideas.
author: Alibaba Saluja

quote: The past does not exist to remind us that the future cannot be changed. It exists to remind us what the future can be.
author: Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki

quote: Your emotions have nothing to do with winning or losing,  but they're motivating us more than you might expect.
author: Makishima Yuusuke

quote: Life is all about "selection". There's no such thing as a life of being pushed around by circumstances or a life of doing as one is told.  It is you who selected to be "swept along"
author: Gin Kurobe

quote: Looking at your own memories is recognizing the parts of you that you don't want to face.
author: Rinne Higaki

quote: As long as humans are not virtuous beings, desire will always win over the fear of punishment. What’s necessary is not punishment, but to deal with that desire.
author: William Twining

quote: The important things in life, like feelings, hearts, and souls, are all things you can never see. The more you try to reassure yourself that they exist, the more you feel they don't exist at all. But right now, I know for sure that they do exist. They're so close, you can almost touch them.
author: Takeo Gouda

quote: Human emotions are just black or white sometimes there and consistent and can even be contradictory, but that's all right.
author: Murasaki

quote: The smell of blood, gunpowder and iron. This is what humanity's all about. Well then, the man in charge must always lead from the front. And yet be the last one to die.
author: Sougetsu Ootori

quote: They are two types of people. Those who let go and those who are let go. How many times have I watched people leave up until now? I may have been able to reach them if I'd reached out, but I was afraid of being pushed away, so I simply watched them disappear into the distance.
author: Matsuoka Masamune

quote: No matter how severe the situation is, if you continue to stay there, you'll accept everything as a everyday life.
author: Nobuchika Ginoza

quote: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Even though each step is small, you never know if you'll end up achieving your major goal.
author: Ensei Rou

quote: Even if I found happiness, my weakness can't be discarded. But, even so, I'm sure that we took the right path to move forward.
author: Adolf Reinhardt

quote: These girls are pixels. Data. I know that. So how would you describe the girl you like? Protein? Calcium? A pointless argument. What’s important is that there’s love. Isn’t that what you people always say?
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: The end result is important. But what's truly important... is the journey to get there.
author: Hikari Hanazono

quote: Survival of the fittest' is just a pretty lie that they tell you. A lie to make weak people believe that if they try their best, they can come out on top. Truth is, it isn't the weak that get eaten. It's not about strength, it's about numbers. The ones who stand at the top of the food chain are the brainless dolts. The loudmouths. Because there are so, so many of them. You know it's true. Everybody does. You all just turn a blind eye and pretend not to notice.
author: Riruka Dokugamine

quote: Silence implies consent.
author: Izayoi Sakamaki

quote: Souls of the dead are like a bunch of leftover feelings from those who've died.
author: Yakumo Saitō

quote: One who relies overly on a single skill will be brought low by that very same skill.
author: Aikurō Mikisugi

quote: No matter how much talent you have, if you aren't the best, you're nothing because there can only be one king. If you're in his shadow, then history won't see you.
author: Takamura Mamoru

quote: It is right for me, but not for you. Either way, the concept of "right" means no more than that.
author: Magata Shiki

quote: Whats the probability of drawing the ace of spades from a deck with no jokers? Normaly it would be 1/50. But what if its a brand new deck? The position of cards in a new deck are typically identical, so that means if you take out the jokers and draw the card at the very bottom, it's the ace of spades almost 100% of the time. Oh that's right! I didn't say a word about it being a new deck. Rather, you didn't ask. Being in the "no" gives you the power to turn the probability of winning from 1.92% to 100%. The more knowledge of a party will be the inevitable victor.
author: Sora

quote: I am the God placed here to save the weak and create a perfect world.
author: Light Yagami

quote: The last ones standing are the victors. Only the strongest. If you want to be the last one standing become strong.
author: Tobio Kageyama

quote: A victor must speak not of the current state of the world, but of how it should rightfully be.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Once drowned in the depths of darkness, you lose sight of light. When that light has dispersed there is no return. My light has died out long ago and so there's nothing back for me to go back, or look forward to I shall continue to indulge myself in this darkness until it completely consumes me, then I will be nothing but an empty course left on this cold & cruel world to rot.
author: Alois Trancy

quote: There's no match you can't win, and there's no match that you'll win for sure.
author: Ikkei Ukai

quote: People can't live for the future without accepting reality.
author: Kurokawa Mari

quote: I'll sooner die than become burden.
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: Every individual human affects the surrounding environment. But humans do not exist for the things and people around them. Often, they mistakenly think that they wish to exist for the sake of others, or to help everyone. They can not accept that they don't know why they exist, yes? They always want an answer. That is the nature of the animals called "humans".
author: Magata Shiki

quote: No one fears death. They fear the life that leads up to death. If one could die without suffering, no one would fear death, right? Being alive is, itself, an exception. The natural state of things is death. And life is, itself, a kind of sickness. When the illness is cured, your life vanishes.
author: Magata Shiki

quote: Does math bring out your wrath?
author: Shun Izuki

quote: I've never been victimized for anything. I am just doing what I can for me and my comrades. And right now, you're in my way.
author: Mikazuki Augus

quote: Do you know the phrase “enough specks of dust creates a mountain”? Or maybe “three heads are better than one.” In other words, when people gathered together, they become even stronger and more secure. However, we were a group of failures who had gathered to do pointless things.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: If you realize you made a mistake with the way you've been living your life, you just have to take the next moment and start over.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: God would never put us through all this suffering if he didn't think we could bear it.
author: Konno Yuuki

quote: If you let yourself get depressed, you'd be making light of the people who trust and follow you.
author: Ogami Rei

quote: There's nothing more satisfying than conquering all types of girls.
author: Mikoto Mikoshiba

quote: The sounds you find pretty, and the sounds the other members find pretty... Are they really the same?
author: Len Tsukimori

quote: No, but I can learn. I'll bathe in blood. If that's what it takes to protect my friends, I'll take it. All the hatred, the disease. I'll take it as my own and end it.
author: Shū Ouma

quote: How many people you killed, or how many you let live, it doesn't matter to me. You people incurred my wrath... That's reason enough, for you to meet your demise.
author: Tatsuya Shiba

quote: To put things simply, if your past makes your present... Then your present can and will make your future. When you think about it that way... You absolutely have the potential to be anything you want to be, don't you agree?
author: Yato

quote: Love is when it isn't fun to be with that person. It's when nothing goes the way you want. When you're not having fun... and yet you still want to be with that person.
author: Taichi Mashima

quote: Whether it's disappointing or not depends on the person. Things like uneasiness or indecision are in everyone's lives. What's important is to appreciate and grow from every kind of result. If you can grow from them, you can understand that all events are for the purpose of growing and you can appreciate them.
author: Coco

quote: We're basically developing at this point, and we don't know the limits of our potential. Even if we felt those limits we would still keep aiming higher.
author: Daichi Sawamura

quote: Y-you actually used your head??? You're going to get a fever!
author: Tobio Kageyama

quote: But now we can fight. Even if they read us or catch up to us...
author: Shōyō Hinata

quote: I'm bothered by the very fact that people exist, but you're an exception.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: If I can, I'd like to bring back what she has lost, what she threw away.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: Unnecessary thoughts will only interfere with your plays.
author: Gouenji Shuuya

quote: I'm not highly aware. I'm highly self-aware.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Unfortunately... being a hero is a limited-time thing. When you grow up, it becomes harder to call yourself one. I wish it hadn't taken me so long to realize that.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: I'll keep my promise, I'll save the world.
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: Human beings are strong because we have the ability to change ourselves.
author: Saitama

quote: Death is a privilege of the living. A destiny without reason, continually roving on, evermore. How fleeting a thing it is. One cannot live and forget about death. The despair that is me, forgotten by death, can at least embrace my yearning at twilight, and sleep.
author: William Macbeth

quote: I wouldn't call myself a saint, but I think I do alright. My mind's about as sharp as the average person. When it comes to an iron will or noble spirit, well... I might have to ask you to turn a blind eye there...
author: Amagiri Ayato

quote: I always thought that life was about standing your ground, no matter how strong the current was. But going with the flow isn’t so bad after all. As long as it takes you forward.
author: Nana Osaki

quote: People should be doubted. Many people misunderstand this concept. Doubting people is just a part of getting to know them. What many people call "trust" is really just giving up on trying to understand others, and that very act is far worse than doubting. It is actually "apathy".
author: Akiyama Shinichi

quote: There are things that we don't want to happen, but have to accept. Things that we don't want to know, but have to learn. And people that we can't live without, but have to let go.
author: Mai Taniyama

quote: Do you know the origin of the word "utopia"? The English philosopher, Thomas More, created this word with intense irony in mind. In Greek, it means "A place that does not exist".
author: Shuntarou Chishiya

quote: Having the love of your life break up with you and say "we can still be friends", is like your dog dying and your mom saying "you can still keep it".
author: Mai Taniyama

quote: The throne itself does not half a will of its own. Depending upon who sits in it, it can be the seat of justice or it can be the seat of inhuman cruelty. As long as it is a man and not a god, doing the governing, he can never be perfect. But should he neglect to make efforts to reach for perfection, a king will surely tumble down the slippery slope towards evil with no one around to stop him.
author: Farangis

quote: I don't think it's all that bad to be surrounded by people who don't care much about authority or social status. It's good to know that there are various various ways of thinking.
author: Zen Wistalia

quote: Does this world feel like hell to you? Of course it does, because it is. So take it all in, don't even blink, Miroku. There's no place like hell! We made it so. With our lust, and greed. It always comes down to this. Life is desire. It's what we do. When desire meets desire, the stronger survives. The predator will eat the prey. It's dirty, and cruel. But just look around you, there is so much beauty in this truth. And yet you still look away. And you waste all your time alone in your head. Don't deny your desires. Hell is the real paradise. And we, my friend, are in paradise! Don't look away, Miroku!
author: Kai Sudo

quote: Oh, please. This world is so entertaining because it doesn't do anyone's bidding!
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: If you want to run from your past, fine. But whatever you do, don't run away from your present or worse, your future.
author: Kyohei Kadota

quote: Maybe there’s only a dark road up ahead. But you still have to believe and keep going. Believe that the stars will light your path, even a little bit.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: The same melody repeats itself as the song grows richer and more beautiful. Wouldn't it be wonderful if we could live seemingly constant lives while experiencing changes bit by bit?
author: Sayuri Kurata

quote: There's always something one can't explain even if one has experience with it.
author: Shirogane

quote: Why won't human emotions, not even my own, work out the way we want?
author: Takeo Gouda

quote: I'll leave tomorrow's problems to tomorrow's me.
author: Saitama

quote: A dream? A future? Stop going on about other people's futures when you haven't even decided your own!
author: Haruka Nanase

quote: Ruling over death means ruling over life. Death is the climax of life. To have the best death, you must honor life.
author: Rory Mercury

quote: Pretending to get along is just hypocritical. If you don't like me, that's fine. People are free to like and hate what they want.
author: Rachnera Arachnera

quote: Don't act because something is interesting, but act because you want to find something more interesting! In this world, there are so much interesting things. Do something that you don't want to do, you don't have even a second for it.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: I'm sure that things that are truly fun can't be compared. Back then, now, and from now on, in the time you spend with others, lots of small fun things are born and disappear. If you are able to capture each of them, you'll never run out of fun things. Forever and ever. And here's one point of advice. Thinking that now is fun is what makes it the most fun.
author: Alicia Florence

quote: I'm just a guy who's a hero for fun.
author: Saitama

quote: In this world, there's no such thing as "failure" in the first place. The one who knows the "ways to win" more than anyone is also the one who's experienced the most "mistakes". In other words... You could say "failure" is equal to "success"... Couldn't you?
author: Toriko

quote: Me? A liar? That's almost hurtful. I just don't feel like telling the whole truth.
author: William Macbeth

quote: Everyone dies eventually, whether they have power or not. That's why you need to think about what you'll accomplish while you're alive.
author: Mary Macbeth

quote: Let’s say I posed this question to you: “Can all human souls be bought with money or not?” Now remember, the keyword here is “all”. The answer is “There are times when you can buy them, and other times, not,” right? The human being… sometimes he’ll uphold his pride and conscience even if he’s offered ten billion yen, and other times he’ll murder someone over one yen.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: You never appreciate the irreplaceable things in life until they're gone. Like summer vacation... or brothers.
author: Umaru Doma

quote: People with talent often have the wrong impression that things will go as they think.
author: Karma Akabane

quote: I never thought about winning making me cool, or losing making me uncool. But you're right. If anything... Giving up before you even try is kind of uncool. That's why I want to be someone who'll fight as many times as it takes, and never give up. That's got to be way more cooler.
author: Tachibana Hotaru

quote: I may not be able to beat you, even if we play a hundred more games. But if I have a chance of beating you the 101st time, I'll challenge you again and again.
author: Tachibana Hotaru

quote: It's alright to feel sad. When you're sad, you should experience that sorrow fully. It's not too late to move on after that.
author: Urutori

quote: How do you know that the person you were one second ago, is the same person that you are right now?
author: Eri Ochiai

quote: If people could become friends simply by sharing bread and salt, life would be simpler.
author: Peppo

quote: ...Without love, it cannot be seen? ...Hah. That's backwards... Because of love, you end up seeing things that don't even exist.
author: Furudo Erika

quote: Don't deny your dreams, ok? There is no point at all in taking a first step, if your eyes are closed and you don't gaze at the future.
author: Gaap

quote: Crying is a nosebleed of the heart.
author: Minori Kushieda

quote: It's not a sin to fall in love. You can't even arrest someone over that.
author: Gajeel Redfox

quote: If I ignore a friend I have the ability to help, wouldn't I be betraying him?
author: Killua Zoldyck

quote: Don't just mindlessly judge people as you please.
author: Rin Okumura

quote: There is one thing that makes a human a human... and that is their will.
author: Montana Max

quote: If providing people with what they desire is a sin, then all mothers are sinners, and the world is bereft of love.
author: Moral

quote: Sometimes, I just think... this world has surpassed its capacity. It's overflowing. Our day-to-day lives are replete with both happiness and misfortune. Yet, because we cannot see the excess from the inside, we still feel unfulfilled. Given that we are capable of acknowledging neither excess nor deprivation, we might as well not exist. In other words... you can't withdraw coins from an ATM. That's common sense.
author: Murasaki

quote: Even when the sky's so dark you can't see a thing, there are still stars shining out there. So if she can learn to shine brighter, we'll be able to see her.
author: Minori Kushieda

quote: The weak can never break out of their own mold. They cry piteously within their cells, while they try to kick down anyone who strives to break free.
author: Moral

quote: You chose to go with the flow and you think that doesn't make you guilty?
author: Murasaki

quote: Every dream has an end...No matter how nice the dream might be, or how scary it is. Under your warm blanket, the dream comes to an abrupt end, when mother shakes you awake. Forever and ever, the morning scene remains the same. But now I... I wonder... when the dreams began to never end.
author: Aizawa Yuuichi

quote: It's called a miracle because it doesn't happen.
author: Shiori Misaka

quote: If you're going to selfishly admire someone only to be disillusioned later, then maybe you shouldn't try to get to know them better at all.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: When you love someone, I think it's only natural to worry about what they love.
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: You may be unfortunate, but that doesn't mean you have to suffer. You may not be blessed, but that doesn't mean you have to throw a fit over it. Even if bad things happen to you, just be strong!
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: It is absurd to divide people into good and bad. People are either charming or tedious.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: After all the hiding your true self, even if you eventually become popular, won't you just feel exhausted by it in the end?
author: Mikoto Kujou

quote: I don't want to get so caught up in searching for what I can't see, that I lose sight of what I can.
author: Minori Kushieda

quote: I don't care if you're the son of the president or what. That just shows the success of your father. It doesn't mean you are excellent too.
author: Mikoto Kujou

quote: There was no meaning to things that were only superficial. That was a single belief that both me and her once shared.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Certain individuals can change the entire outlook of the team with their overwhelming abilities.
author: Mark Kluger

quote: Time is something no one can escape. It delivers us all to the same end.
author: Pharos

quote: My happiness can only be... can only be made with my own hands! My happiness doesn't depend on anyone but me!
author: Minori Kushieda

quote: If people scrutinize you, just ignore them and do whatever you want to do.
author: Zen Wistalia

quote: "Loneliness" is no longer part of my vocabulary.
author: Brook

quote: Death is never an apology.
author: Brook

quote: I believe in ghosts, even though I've never seen one before and get this. I don't believe in anyone of the people that have said they seen one before. It's kind of like how I think about the concept of love. Like I believe one day I'll fall in love, get married and live happily ever after, even though I've never actually fallen in love with anyone yet. You see what I'm saying? For some people falling in love is like second nature, but I can't even relate to that. So if I've never fallen in love before is it real? And that makes me wonder if ghost are real. I haven't seen one yet so maybe they're not.
author: Minori Kushieda

quote: Those who can't do what they have to when the time comes for action will find their presence fading in our classroom. An assassin who neglects to sharpen his blade is no assassin at all. He's just a boastful brat swinging around a rusty sword.
author: Korosensei

quote: It's fine. Everyone makes mistakes. You just need to make an effort not to make the same mistake again.
author: Ainz Ooal Gown

quote: The words you've said cannot be taken back. So you must take action to paint over what you have already said.
author: Dyne Woodwonder

quote: The most certain way to succeed is to try one more time. Our greatest weakness lies in giving up.
author: Classroom Crisis

quote: There are only two times when a man can cry in public: when he loses his wallet and when his mother dies. And even if you cry in private, there's a severe restriction. Shed tears for others. The only thing you should be shedding for yourself is sweat. Remember that.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: The ideal tool for controlling people is fear. And nothing overwhelms people more than an unseen fear.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: There are people who don't know you, who are saying a lot of awful things. But just saying stuff is easy, and anyone can do it. However...There's no one out there who could take your place.
author: Mutta Namba

quote: The difference between the novice and the master is that the master has failed more times than the novice has tried.
author: Korosensei

quote: You're not supposed to find yourself, you're supposed to choose yourself!
author: Grizzly-san

quote: If you hurt somebody or if someone hurts you, - the same red blood will be shed.
author: One Piece

quote: There are things you can't see unless you change your standing.
author: Trafalgar Law

quote: If the drive behind one's actions is the thought for another, then it is never meaningless.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: It's dangerous here. If you stare at the stars long enough, you start thinking you could grab one, and you get this feeling like all your dreams will come true.
author: Shinichi Okazaki

quote: You're not a coward. I know that because you haven't given up yet. You're standing here. As long as you face the light and take even one step, the human soul can never truly be defeated.
author: Klaus von Reinherz

quote: When you fight hard and fail, the regret is easier to get past than the regret of not trying.
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: If they find out what you did there, a lot of people will say a lot of things to you. Some will say you did the right thing. And some will say you did the wrong thing. But that's not what matters. No matter what anyone says, you don't have to worry. Because you didn't do the right thing, and you didn't do the wrong thing. It was all part of being young.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: They are more like “people who don’t follow rules…” There are different kinds of people in different worlds! … Between you two and them, what is the difference? It isn’t unusual… to put it to an extreme… A hero during a war would be just another murderer in peaceful times.
author: One Piece

quote: Regardless of what happens our lives are finite. We all know that we will grow old and that someday our lives will end. That's why we try so hard to live each day to the fullest. That's why we keep stumbling on by trial and error. But it isn't just for ourselves, it's so we can leave some signposts for the people following in our foot steps. To cowards who cling to where they are and who have given up on trying to move forward there is no way to see how bright the future is even though it's just around the corner!
author: Meia Gisborn

quote: You can worry about things all you want, but it doesn't mean you'll always get an answer. What's important to remember, is that when it's all said and done and you got through it all somehow, are you the person you wanted to be?
author: Hibiki Tokai

quote: Everyone is a slave to their past. No matter how much you wish to move forward, the events of last year will bear down on you like the light of the stars as soon as you glance up. Unable to laugh or to banish your past, you carry it ceaselessly in a corner of your heart, waiting for it to resurrect at an inopportune moment.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: To stop or to keep going? The one who decides is yourself.
author: Shōkichi Naruko

quote: You shouldn't judge people by how they look.
author: Yato

quote: It is better to be hated for what you are. Than to be loved for what you are not.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: There's a limit to the strength of people who are isolated. If we do the best we can we should be fine. We don't grab a hold of the entire future. Let's just think about grabbing tomorrow. I think that's plenty for us, don't you?
author: Kouji Aiba

quote: The Devil's finest trick is to persuade you that he does not exist.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: The things we can't obtain are the most beautiful ones.
author: Gilgamesh

quote: We have no need for the past. All we need are the present and the future.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I think that sometimes things just won't go the way we want them to. And every day there's bound to be something that makes us mad when there's nothing we can do to change the state of affairs. But that's not entirely true, either. We have to give these kinds of things some real thought as well. If we're sitting back and waiting for the future to arrive - we don't have anything invested in tomorrow. I don't want a tomorrow like that.
author: Kouji Aiba

quote: If you want to grow just look above you, there are plenty of people perfect to serve as fodder for your growth.
author: Kojirō Shinomiya

quote: Wake up princess, I'm tired of your useless ideals. It's gotten pathetic. What good are your happy ideals if you can't do anything to make them a reality? They're nothing but dreams, and your dreams don't stand a chance.
author: Crocodile

quote: I think you and I have different concepts of beauty. I was taught that it's beautiful to survive, unsightly or not.
author: Ganju Shiba

quote: There's nothing more deceiving than an obvious truth.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: The smile of you, who flew through this window and died, I won't ever forget, not even tomorrow.
author: Kisaragi Shintaro

quote: The only one who should decide which path to follow is yourself.
author: Zen Wistalia

quote: The time when you're happy is also the time when you're afraid that the happiness will end.
author: Subarashii Sekai

quote: What is really wicked... is judging people without even trying to get to know them!
author: Ada Vessalius

quote: Today's my birthday. During times like these I always think whether or not it was a good thing that I was born.
author: Eucliwood Hellscythe

quote: It is a sad truth that greater the authority a person possesses, the more he tends to fear change.
author: Jimbei

quote: You're happy enough, so don't take away the happiness of others. You should share it.
author: Simon Brezhnev

quote: Kindness alone can't save people. It can't erase sin or wash away the impurities.
author: Marida Cruz

quote: This world revolves around two views on the same thing. In addition, it's about laughable miseries.
author: Himura Yuu

quote: There are all sorts of goodbyes. There are sad goodbyes, and sometimes goodbyes you're thankful for, that take a load off your mind. It often happens that someone you say goodbye to unexpectedly returns, all self-conscious. Then there are times when, anticipating that, you put on the front of a short goodbye, only to have them not return so soon. And then there are goodbyes that last forever, true goodbyes that only happen once in your life.
author: Yasaburou Shimogamo

quote: Your impression of people is renewed every day. As you spend time with them and grow with them, you come to understand more.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: They say that in hard times, you'll never in your life forget the person who gave you a cup of water.
author: Yumiko Sakaki

quote: There are people who ruin the atmosphere just by existing, you know.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Skilled only at making excuses that justify nothing, he is someone whose life has no value. The same goes for me. I have the right to stop you because I'm just like you.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: When you compare love and hate in this world... There is a lot more hate than love, and it's much stronger. So, if we consider every one of them as hate, we'll be right most of the time. I don't have time to pick out the truth anyway.
author: Nora Floriann Leoria

quote: There're too many people who worry about the things I don't worry about.
author: Takeshi Nanase

quote: To ensure that all I've done won't end up a lie. I don't want to talk big game to people, then run away when it matters the most. This is a wall I must overcome on my own. If there's anything I want to change, I have to change myself. If I must become evil to defeat evil, I will become the devil himself. That's all to it.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: Don't go believing everyone with glasses is smart!
author: Hyuuga Junpei

quote: If we understood how other people felt, then nobody would ever start wars!
author: Taiga Kagami

quote: As they say about the vulgar masses, the more people flock to a group, the more foolish they become. No matter how prominent an individual is, no, it’s because he is prominent that he would be blotted out by the sheer force of numbers when thrown into that lump of people. Individual will, qualifications, and personality, let alone emotions aren’t considered at all.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: we aren’t able to. This is the society that we’re living in right now.
author: but for the things we want to say

quote: Music isn't supposed to be something you do to show off your abilities to your rivals.
author: Noboru Taki

quote: People aren't complicated. We work hard when we know that we'll get something in return, and we try to work even harder if that something is our own improvement.
author: Kumiko Oumae

quote: What do you know of death?!! Have you ever died?!! You think death will preserve your cause forever?!! Ridiculous!! Death leaves nothing behind!! Once a person passes on, nothing remains but dead bones!! If there is one thing I can’t stand, it is a person with no respect for life!!
author: Brook

quote: Fear is what creates order.
author: Medusa Gorgon

quote: It can't be helped, if there's nothing you can do, then there's nothing else you can do.
author: Tsugumi Seishirou

quote: Because of my last moments are such fulfillment.
author: Konno Yuuki

quote: This world that we live in is gentle yet sad, fun yet sorrowful, strong yet ephemeral... ...but as long as you're alive, something good is bound to happen. I'm sure of it.
author: Subarashii Sekai

quote: You yourself have to change first, or nothing will change for you!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Sake sure is nice. You can forget your troubles if only for a moment. You'll have to remember them tomorrow though, and they'll be even more painful than they were the night before. You can't run away from things like this. Especially from things you really want to forget.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Ash to ashes, dust to dust, trash to trash can and useless people to uselessness box.
author: Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi

quote: 'Slacking off' sounds bad. However, enjoying more of your day with the time you saved by doing your job in a clever way is definitely not a bad thing. Times like that are what makes a human's life rich. If you exaggerate, it could be called laziness, surely. However, people only become mature when they are able to balance work with enjoyment. In short, if all you care about is your job, you're not fully mature.
author: Gaap

quote: I've always gone to any lengths to avoid facing danger and risk, hiding myself within  a safe cage, where no one could hurt me. I hated myself for it.. But I couldn't change myself.. Friends and teachers encouraged me, but I never truly listened, considering it the logic of the strong. Yet somehow... A boy with less than half my strength managed to break my cage!
author: Shoot McMahon

quote: Why is it that what I want, and what's expected of me are so similar, yet so different?
author: Yui Yuigahama

quote: Honestly, there isn't much meaning to the splendid names given to you by your parents. What does have meaning, is what the person behind that name does during their actual lifetime. The name doesn't make the person. The name simply remains gently within the footprint left on the path a person walks.
author: Korosensei

quote: Don't ever think there's any perfect society made by humans!! If you think that way you'll overlook the enemy!! Don't be fooled by appearances!!
author: Smoker

quote: "Hero of Justice? A world where no one is hurt?" Don't be absurd. "Humanity" is the name for an animal that cannot find joy in life without sacrifice. The pretty lie that is "equality" is nonsense spouted by weaklings who cannot look upon the darkness. Nothing but an excuse to cover up life's ugliness.
author: Gilgamesh

quote: "True to herself", "True to myself". We all have our own personal image that's dictated by others, one that's always off the mark. We wish to remain true to ourselves, but who gets to decide who we are as people? When our image never goes hand-in-hand with reality, where can we find something genuine? Where can we find our true selves?
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: People usually don't look back to see how far they've come while they're still walking. Of course, when they come to a standstill, the more progress they've made, the more betrayed they feel by their expectations.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: The past makes you wanna die out of regret and future makes you depressed out of anxiety. So by elimination, the present is likely the happiest time.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Don't worry. When people break their old selves they embark a journey to find their new selves.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Hope brings me pain... if I didn't have any hope at all, I might never have known such agony.
author: Minato

quote: There's no use in just creating "Love". Empty hearts filled with "Love" tend to be unstable.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: It's more cruel to give someone false hope, you know.
author: Michiru Kinushima

quote: Everyone thinks at some point if what they are doing has any meaning or not. Will the day come when I get what's coming to me, or not? How much influence does my existence have on the world at all, or doesn't it?
author: William Macbeth

quote: Someone saying that they are happy doesn't necessarily mean that they are happy, right?
author: Tsubasa Hanekawa

quote: If another me was born somewhere else, and had led a different life, how would he feel? If there was another version of myself somewhere on the other side of the ocean, what would happen if I were able to meet him? Would I be able to be his friend? Or would the differences in our upbringing be something that I couldn't overcome? Can I understand him because he is me? Or will he be impossible to understand because he's me?
author: Tooru Kazasumi

quote: Romance can strengthen people, but it can also make them useless.
author: Deishū Kaiki

quote: We fail. We make mistakes. But each time we do, I think we become stronger.
author: Kyouka Katagiri

quote: Humans continue to live in a cycle of death and destruction. Guns can't change anything. It merely creates an infinite chain of hatred and retribution.
author: TimeKeeper

quote: Because nothing makes one happier than being with the one you love.
author: Isla

quote: Pain, suffering, sadness... We all accept it, and that's why we can move forward!
author: Tooru Kazasumi

quote: However, even if it is reckless... I don't think someone who is making their best effort to try and break through the current situation is foolish.
author: Su-won

quote: When you're really in trouble, of course I'd come and help.
author: Takeshi Yamamoto

quote: That, I don't want to do. You may feel that I'm currently an abnormal Nagato Yuki. That judgement is correct. But I myself cannot accept that I am abnormal... because if I do, I'll become alone. I was scared, so I tried to hide it.
author: Yuki Nagato

quote: When people reach the halfway mark of a long ordeal, how do they feel? Does being only halfway there make them despair? Or do they feel relief at making it halfway there? Most people have to feel one way or the other, and both emotions create an opening in their hearts. That's why I pushed myself this far.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: When you pick the only option you have to choose from, can you really call that your own decision?
author: Hayato Hayama

quote: That's human nature. We have regrets, and go on blaming ourselves forever.
author: Kazuki Kuwanomi

quote: What you think of as peace can be painful for others.
author: Vali Lucifer

quote: Love is a bitter sweet taste of life, which many humans many weaknesses and sometimes their strongest weapon.
author: Mato Kuroi

quote: Sovereignty means absolutely nothing in front of me.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: If one feels it is fun now, one will be able to enjoy life the most. Everything will change over time, so we must treasure the happy moments before us.
author: Akari Mizunashi

quote: If training hard can make you number one, then how many number one do you think this world will have!?
author: Kazuma Mikura

quote: It isn't just "others". Not "others". It's my Family. I'll force my ideals on my family. And since they're family, I'll lie to them. I'll deceive them. I'll cause them trouble. I'll make them worry. I'll owe them things, things I'll never be able to repay. However, I think that's okay. If you say that being an impostor is evil, then I will shoulder the burden of that evil. If lying is a bad thing, then I'm fine being the bad person. I don't need them to like me. I'm fine with being the worst kind of person.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: I don't like this, I don't like this, I don't like this. Sure, I know that I have no right to be feeling this way. But I still don't like it! I just don't like it. We were always together. I was always by his side. During time of joy, and grief as well. But...I realize he's far away from me now... I'm not by his side...there's somebody else there... I don't like this! Look at me! Look at me, will you? Not with those eyes... Don't look at someone else!
author: Tsubaki Sawabe

quote: That's probably true. I like talking with people. I wonder if speaking with me is boring though. Since once people talk to me, they'll never do it again. But I don't feel like starting a conversation either, since in the direction I ought to look, there are only people who I cannot talk to. That's why I look at the sky... It's strange how merely observing things can be so handy to kill time. It hurts that I get called a weirdo just for making a habit out of it and in the end it just makes me stare at the sky even more. I've probably always been like this. Thinking about it, there's nothing I can do about my passiveness. Waiting things out is just my nature. I'm sure that... things will get better someday...
author: Kawayanagi Tsurezure

quote: People are born into this world. And people are taken from this world.
author: Takeo Gouda

quote: If you don't believe in yourself, who will!? You're the only one demeaning yourself!
author: Amu Hinamori

quote: You can’t take back the answer you already gave out. There’s no use in crying over spilt milk. The egg you broke won’t come back. All the horses and soldiers of a king will never return to his side again.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Identity? What? The people who yap about identities all the time are usually the ones with no identity. Like something that changes so easily could really be an "identity", anyway.
author: Komachi Hikigaya

quote: I want to beat them. Even though I'm not cool, or strong, or just, or beautiful, or cute, or pretty, I want to beat the cool, strong, just, beautiful, cute, and pretty people. Even though I wasn't blessed with talent, even though I'm stupid and have a bad personality, have bad grades, am misguided and am a good for nothing, I want to beat the talented, smart, likeable, overachieving people. I want to beat those with friends when I can't have friends. I want to beat the people who work hard when I can't work hard. I want to beat the the victorious people when I can't win. I want to beat the happy people when I'm miserable. Even if I'm hated, even if I'm despised, even if I'm useless, I want to prove that I'm better than the main characters!
author: Misogi Kumagawa

quote: Even though I'm bitter over losing, even though I'm depressed, even though my ankle hurts, and my eyes are smeared with tears...even though I've never felt worse...I wonder why the stars are sparkling like this. The scent of the music room in his hair. I can hear his slightly ragged breathing. His shoulder, wet with tears, is so warm. I am by his side. I wish time would just stand still.
author: Tsubaki Sawabe

quote: Whatever. It's okay, isn't it? Being dishonest with your feelings is part of who you are. If that would just suddenly change overnight, you'd be a different person.
author: Kawayanagi Tsurezure

quote: To believe in someone can be a dangerous thing.
author: TimeKeeper

quote: Maybe, just maybe, it's a concept that's similar to a zero in mathematics. In other words, it's a symbol that denies the absence of meaning, the meaning that's necessitated by the delineation of one system from another. In analog, that's God. In digital, that's zero.
author: Tachikoma

quote: But the truth is merely the majority of the living. It only revolves around their choices and actions and nothing more.
author: Karoku Arumerita

quote: Unfortunately, the real world isn't the same as a fairy tale.
author: Blake Belladonna

quote: The past isn't something you can just throw away. It stays with us forever. It's the same for everyone. We must live on, and carry the burdens of the past with us. That's why it's important that you carry the burden of what you do now and how you've decided to live your life today.
author: Train Heartnet

quote: Everyone's birthplace and upbringing is different. It's obviously impossible for them to understand each other.
author: Monokuma

quote: If wishes could be granted, if desires could be fulfilled,  then I wouldn't wish or desire for anything after all. The things you're handed on a silver platter are never genuine, and never everlasting. And that is why I'll always keep searching.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: This is your life right? Then decide for yourself! If you want to protect everything with your hands then do so, if you want to abandon everything then do so. But, what do you yourself want to do right now? Can you really be satisfied giving someone else that you don’t really understand your most important thing?
author: Kamijou Touma

quote: Now, you’ve only got two different options to choose from: Prove that everything I just said was bullshit, or admit your guilt.
author: Akiyama Shinichi

quote: I don't mind losing to someone, but I won't be beaten by myself.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: It is impossible to not hurt someone. Humans unconsciously hurt others by simply existing. Whether you are alive or dead, you keep hurting people. Getting involved will hurt them, but trying not to get involved might hurt them too. But if it's someone you don't care about, you won't notice you've hurt them. What's important is your awareness of it. It's because you care about them, that you feel like you've hurt them. Caring about someone means being resolved to the fact that you'll hurt them. The more people care for each other, the farther out of reach certain things get. But that's not something to be sad about, I think it's probably something to be proud of.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: Thinking you'll understand without being told anything is an illusion.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Losing sight of who you really are... that can be pretty scary.
author: Michiru Kinushima

quote: It has happened many times throughout history. Resources, territory, wealth... Humans fight each other in order to gain something they don't have. It's simple. How can you be concerned with the lives of others when you're about to starve to death? You're too naive. Humans can only live by stealing what they don't have from others. If there's no future, we just take the future from others.
author: Tooru Kazasumi

quote: All I ever gained from abandoning something and running away were regrets I couldn't do anything about, and a version of myself that could only resent others. If I come to hate myself, even living becomes a sin. Remorse alone will become my punishment. That's why I've decided to take action of my own free will, so I'll never have the same regrets again.
author: Amane Suou

quote: They're human beings who are more appealing that real girls with warm blood flowing through their veins! That's what you have to be!
author: Tomoya Aki

quote: Don't put me on their level. I don't care about looking interesting. I'm just self-conscious.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Step one foot outside, and with one pull of a trigger, you can inflict a fatal injury
author: Klaus von Reinherz

quote: You're the idiot. 3D girls are way too much trouble. The first is "the most beautiful girl in school", which is a dating sim trope that doesn't exist in reality. The second is having two of the "most beautiful girl in school" is contradictory. And the third is the wildly mistaken notion that a 2D-only otaku like me could possibly have a 3D girlfriend.
author: Tomoya Aki

quote: Even a dim star is sending light somewhere.
author: Imizu Asuhi

quote: It's arrogant to think just saying things out loud is enough. Self-gratifying on the part of the speaker, and conceited on the part of the listener. You won't always come to an understanding by talking things out.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Expecting others to read your mind is delusional. But... But... I... I..."It's not empty words I'm after. There was something else I desired all along. Not mutual understanding, friendship, companionship, or anything of the sort. I don't care about being understood. I simply wish to understand. Understand, know, and rest easy in that knowledge-- gain some peace of mind. Wanting to know people inside-out because being in the dark terrifies me is an awfully self-indulgement, egoistic, and arrogant wish. It's downright despicable and disgusting. Having a desire like that makes me sick to the stomach! But if it's at all possible to share that desire-- if it's possible to have a relationship where you're free to burden one another with that repulsive self-gratification...I know that it's out of the question! I know that it's out of my reach! Even so!" Even so, I... I want something genuine.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: You know, isn't it said that life has its ups and downs? It's fun because downs come after ups, but if life was full of downs, wouldn't it get boring?
author: Monokuma

quote: All human beings can only perceive the world through the filter of their values. Mediocre values may be harmless, but they are also utterly worthless.
author: Moral

quote: There's no need to rush. Sometimes even pointless conversations can teach you a thing or two.
author: Ryou Haruna

quote: Everyone's reality is freight with some degree of pain. What's wrong with seeing what makes you happy in your dreams?
author: Natsume

quote: Friends are like balloons. Once you let them go, you can't get them back. So I'm going to tie you to my heart, so to never lose you.
author: Alibaba Saluja

quote: It's harder to fool one's self than to fool others.
author: Azuma Yunoki

quote: Even now, she continues to burn away her life in order to bring about a beginning rather than an end... She just looks forward while dreaming of the outside world. But you know what I think? Isn't it a bad thing to just look forward? Sometimes looking to the side, or looking back... There just might be something important there. You may have lost something. There may be the smile of a loved one. Isn't it impotant to try looking around once in a while? That's how it was for me. I could only ever face forward, could only move my legs with reckless abandon. I never had any idea what sort of footprints I might be leaving behind me. No, in truth, I couldn't even look ahead. The fact that I've never seen anything was scary... so I went on a trip to find what I truly desired.
author: Natsume

quote: That's not love... A heroine's love is supposed to be sincere! If you can immediately move on and find someone new, it isn't love!
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Sorry, but I hate people who act innocent but are actually opportunists.
author: Nai

quote: If you come across an event that's too good to be true, it's probably poison.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Also, the "fear" experience is a little different from yours, I imagine. You're afraid of what you might lose, right? But I'm afraid of what I've already lost.
author: Kyōko Kirigiri

quote: So everyone just pretends to understand... and pretends to be understood.
author: Monokuma

quote: People's thoughts don't always mirror how they feel. That's why they sometimes make decisions that seem nonsensical.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: A suicide means you've killed the most important existence of all: yourself.
author: Monokuma

quote: It's truly infuriating... I despise people like you who put their own lives in jeopardy for some glorious, hopeless cause.
author: Ophelia

quote: Listen, even if someone is suffering before you, the kind of person that can take up arms without hesitation to shoot down the villain is no better than a villain himself. The kind that doesn’t care about others, doesn’t give 2nd chances
author: Accelerator

quote: What are people? What is the "self"? So long as you look like someone else, no one can't tell who's really on the inside.
author: Iori Nagase

quote: People's thoughts, wishes, hopes and desires... We live in a time where technology can read everything in your mind, and yet, this place teems with people who hate, lie, steal and try to harm others. If that's not irrational, then what is it?
author: Tomomi Masaoka

quote: Being able to forget things you want to forget, and being able to remember things you want to remember, is such a great thing, you know?
author: Kino

quote: Applying knowledge is of the utmost importance when studying. You wrestle with various things and come up with a solution from there. It's true that asking someone who knows the answer is the quickest. But you can't necessarily say that that's the best way, don't you think?
author: Asakura Ryouko

quote: Overall, I think people tend to reveal their true selves when they step into an avatar. As I said earlier, they probably feel some sense of freedom. But freedom easily gained quickly turns into a false sense of omnipotence.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: I don't like sparklers all that much. It burns so beautifully for just a little while and when it's done, only black cinders remain. It's like a misbegotten life and it makes me feel lonely for no good reason.
author: Matsushima Michiru

quote: Everyone has different faces.
author: Taichi Yaegashi

quote: Anything can be a sword if you polish it enough.
author: Nagisa Shiota

quote: You probably do lose a lot, but that just means you need to fill what you lost with new things.
author: Tsumugu Kihara

quote: I wasn’t scared that I’d be rejected, I was scared that if I said how I felt, all of our relationships would change.
author: Chisaki Hiradaira

quote: Most people don’t mind killing cows and chickens but they’d probably have a hard time doing the same to chimpanzees. Partially, it’s because chimpanzees bear a slight resemblance to humans, but the primary reason is that they can draw pictures. Suppose fish were able to draw pictures. Even if we are unable to understand what they’re thinking, it becomes harder to kill animals that can draw. Instinctively, in our minds we would say to ourselves… “May be they have feelings” That shows how high a value we assign to expression.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: What is there, over there? There is nothing. I was born in a bottom of a pit where no light shone. As if pressed together by the darkness. Untouched by everything at all. Born under those dark, dark sediments. I had a white form. My comrades were all in pure black. In those black forms with their eyes shining and teeth baring they were certainly eating something. And then... There was nothing to me, except my eyes. I felt nothing. No rather... It was possible that what I felt was "void", yet. I could hear nothing, I could bite nothing, I could smell nothing, I could feel nothing as I touch, I could not rest. I had no companion. Just walking, alone. The things reflected in my eyes have no meaning. The things that could not be reflected in my eyes do not exist. Walking walking walking walking walking walking walking walking. When I had arrived at last. I have found something extraordinary. It was somewhat the place of birth for those strange translucent objects that dotted this world. It was the first time... my eyes have been captured. With no colour, with no sound, with no scent. Does not interact with anything, it only exists there. It was the closest existence to "void" that I had ever laid eyes on. I sank my body... into... that great "void". There was nothing there,... Even I had lost my line of vision, and dissolved into the void... And felt as if everything had disappeared. Happiness. If such a thing called happiness exists in this world, it should be something which resembles the limitless nothingness. Nihility is having nothing, and having nothing to lose. If that isn't "happiness", then what is? The things reflected in my eyes have no meaning. The things that could not be reflected in my eyes, do not exist. There is nothing... in you... and... in me.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: Fear is proof that your imagination is functioning. Frankly, I feel bad for anyone who can't feel fear. Without imagination, you can never deduce which action to take next.
author: Kyōko Kirigiri

quote: Just because someone's friends with a nice person doesn't mean they're nice, too.
author: Makoto Sunakawa

quote: There's some skill involved in the creation of anything. That skill is like a map made of the failures people have made in the past and learned from. That map can guide people. If you follow a certain route you'll fail. However, if you follow a different route you'll succeed. You can make something just by following the map. It will take form. It might be very hard task to walk the way others have told you. But if you have the will, it might turn out to be easy. But if you follow the path created by others, you'll eventually have to stop somewhere. Then what will you do? Will you create a new path for yourself? Or will you wait until someone creates one for you? Either one is fine. Stopping or moving forward. Because the path you'll follow is something you have to choose for yourself.
author: Madera

quote: I probably won't be able to look forward to summer for a long time. My chest will hurt. My tears will be overflowing. But this warmth in my hands and these summer memories will live on in my heart.
author: Hotaru Takegawa

quote: Nothing interesting ever happens. It's the same everyday.
author: Kei Takishima

quote: If this is all it takes to tear us apart, then maybe we weren't all that close to begin with.
author: Yukino Yukinoshita

quote: Everything you've been taught is based on theories and logic. Soon you will likely come to realize how pointless they are in the world we live in.
author: Tomomi Masaoka

quote: Even now, twenty centuries after the death of Christ, the world is a long way from peace.
author: Mary Macbeth

quote: People are weak. Because of their weakness, they sometimes behave in ways devoid of self-respect. But then, so what if they do, my old friend? Even if I am struck with a thousand setbacks... it does not serve as a reason to alter the way I live... my life!
author: Klaus von Reinherz
