quote: Don't you think it's futile to live in fear of death? I mean, everyone is going to die sometime, so is there any point in pretending not to see it for the present? Or instead, I wonder if they think it doesn't concern them, since they aren't going to die.
author: Mary Macbeth

quote: Total victory is scoring an easy win by doing what you always do.
author: Karma Akabane

quote: Tests are a good thing. The knowledge gained from a night of cramming will be all but forgotten once you hit adulthood. And that's fine. The experience you gain through competition, having sharpened your skills and broadened your minds all under the same set of rules? That's the real treasure.
author: Korosensei

quote: Suppose someone said "humans are foolish"... Obviously, that person would be talking about themselves as well. If you want to understand human beings, you need to do more than just watch them. You need to pay attention to what they themselves are watching. What are you watching? You are the ones who I'm watching. It may be hard to believe, but I like you guys. You know what they say... The opposite of love is not hatred, but indifference. An indifferent person would lack the drive to kill or hurt. My mind keeps jumping around. Am I nervous...? Did I underestimate my enemy so much that I stepped in too deep...? ...What a silly thought.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: It’s dangerous for them to grow up without experiencing true competition. Because they’ll keep whining, even without taking the matter seriously. For those with a high level of aptitude... The sooner they know the frustration of defeat, the greater their growth will be.
author: Korosensei

quote: People have many things pent up inside of themselves.
author: Tifa Lockhart

quote: Do you know how they say that love is like a dream? With a dream, you eventually wake up from it. It's hard to force yourself to wake up.
author: Kumin Tsuyuri

quote: Have you ever thought about why you're so good and your parents are so bad? If you'd so kindly let me give away the answer
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Become an idol who can laugh through the bitterness. If you do that, you can make everyone happy.
author: Johnny Beppu

quote: Taking responsibility for yourself is the first condition for humanity. One who cannot do even that is less than human. Just a dog, Kariya.
author: Tohsaka Tokiomi

quote: Chains can be torn off. Your sister knew that. Be it an artificially produced human or a wild animal stained by sin... I believe that all living things have the right to be happy.
author: Elica

quote: Please remember that there are times to take someone's hand and lead them along... But also times when you must be stern and let them fend for themselves.
author: Korosensei

quote: We all have our scars from loving someone too deeply, from wanting to protect  someone too much.
author: Mei Tachibana

quote: If one really wants to change the world...they have to do it by their own hands!
author: Lucy Ashley

quote: If you try to acquire something, you'll lose something else along the way. That's the truth of this world. No matter how sad it is.
author: Lilith Bristol

quote: When a person is hard to reach, someone has to extend their hand to that person to get to them, because of that dream, because they dream that freedom really exists, the roses will look up at the sky when they bloom.
author: Ringo Noyamano

quote: There's something you can't see unless you're standing at the top, to experience that for the first time, I'm struggling to a higher place than anyone else, isn't that what freedom is?
author: Itsuki Minami

quote: From this day on, I don't need freedom. As we struggle using our strength to grasp what's above us. We will eventually reach something, that is the meaning of the word freedom.
author: Ringo Noyamano

quote: A long time there... There was a balloon man, right? When I first heard that story, I was so stupid that I actually enjoyed it... But really, the story was horrible. Driven solely by his dreams he used his balloons to disapear into the sky. The people watching made a big fuss about it... But no one really tried to stop it. There's no telling where the wind will take you. And he knew that one day his fuel, his ''freedom'' would run out, and he'd fall into the black ocean. To fly... that feeling is the most important thing. But instead of the dark clouds that drive people from the sky... There must be a chain to keep them grounded. The time will come, for those with the ability to fly away, while everyone else can only watch. Using their own wings, their own power... soaring as far as they can without aid. Because... Because that is what it means to fly.
author: Itsuki Minami

quote: The desire to fly with ''real wings'' is what motivates you.
author: Ringo Noyamano

quote: So I'll search for my real ''wings'', because if I stay in the comfort of my nest, I'll never be able to use my own strength to fly.
author: Itsuki Minami

quote: Plainly speaking war is nothing other than "wanting to impose your beliefs on your opponent." It only happens for that reason. You don't have any exception to that rule.
author: Koumei Ren

quote: Even if they are locked in cage, as long as they have wings, birds can dream of the wide-open sky. But.. If their wings are plucked, they will cease to be birds...
author: Sion

quote: There are people who can't act unless they're faced with a problem. Unless they find their reason. All I was left with was the sinking suspicion that I'd gone horribly wrong.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Having happy and beautiful memories won't always bring you salvation. The more beautiful a memory is, the more painful it can become. It can even become terrifying. Both for the one who's leaving... And for the one left behind.
author: Isla

quote: Not every result can be the one desired. Trust your own judgments and actions. That is enough.
author: Cadis Etrama Di Raizel

quote: Once you get used to the abnormalities, they become mundane.
author: Leonardo Watch

quote: Regret is a powerful poison. The more you harbor those thoughts, the harder it is to move on.
author: Sakurako Amamiya

quote: Let me tell you something. Humans don't even have the patience to wait even ten minutes for something!
author: Yuri Nakamura

quote: There are some things you'll never see if you're always running.
author: Takahiro Mizuno

quote: Sometimes opportunity comes in sacrifice.
author: Akane Ryūzōji

quote: If fate were real, then I would say meeting someone new would constitute such a thing.
author: Takahiro Mizuno

quote: So long as a problem doesn't cause problems, it can't be called a problem.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: There's a thin line between recklessness and courage.
author: Lisa Eostre

quote: Becoming an adult is such a sad thing. If you have something dear to protect, you may end up at odds with yourself.
author: Cthuko

quote: If they're not given a problem, if they're unable to find a reason, some people can't bring themselves to act. Maybe I got something wrong somewhere. Only that bit of doubt stayed with me.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: I don't want to see any more things that've changed! It's exhausting!
author: Hikari Sakishima

quote: Those who seem kindest, are often the most insidiously cruel.
author: Karyuudo Tsukishima

quote: Does becoming adult mean you lose a lot of things?
author: Chisaki Hiradaira

quote: The only thing waiting for you outside is a world of death.
author: Re-L Mayer

quote: The fastest way to happiness is to avoid looking at reality.
author: Ame Ochibana

quote: I have no interest in being a villain, and I don’t think that I can become a good person. I’m at a halfway point where I’m not even sure which path I should walk down… but I guess even there, I can still interfere in someone’s life and help bring things to a positive conclusion…
author: Accelerator

quote: Instead of sighing about the past, I'd rather be happy to face the present.
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: To hate something that you used to love is such a painful feeling.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Everyone loses sight of themselves sometimes. Don't worry about it.
author: Ichinose Hayato

quote: I'm too naive. With thoughts like "If I saved someone maybe I can start all over again."
author: Accelerator

quote: Love means money these days.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: This isn’t a situation where you can stand on principle. If there’s something you want to protect, get your hands dirty.
author: L-elf Karlstein

quote: Running away isn’t the same thing as losing. You only truly lose by dying. So as long you’re alive, you win.
author: Senator Figaro

quote: Whether your words...are lies created to deceive me... or the truth that I have sought all my life... It makes no difference. You will rot.
author: Sephiroth

quote: If people had wings... They'd be monsters.
author: Zack Fair

quote: A memory is something that is consciously recalled, right? That's why sometimes, it can be mistaken or wrong. It's different from a memory locked deep within your heart.
author: Tifa Lockhart

quote: Romance is all about how far you'll go to prove your love. Finding a person who's worth the effort is pure luck. You just gotta wait for the right hurricane to sweep you off your feet.
author: Tomoko Kuroki

quote: What's the problem... to being different? Even if Vincent-sama is a Baskerville, as you say, even if he is completely different from me, it doesn't matter. I don't care if we're different! And if he really is that different, that's just one more reason to try to understand him!
author: Ada Vessalius

quote: No man's life is worth more than another! If you're gonna put your life on the line, you do it as equals! I don't care if you're brothers, or master and apprentice, or whatever! You should only die for a guy who'd die for you! There's nothing honorable about throwing your life away as though it's nothing! That's just showing off like a kid.
author: Madarame Ikkaku

quote: Space extends infinitely. The probability of an encounter may be low, but it isn't nonexistent.
author: Nanako

quote: Willpower alone isn't enough in battle.
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: I may not have anywhere to go... but I can't just selfishly disappear either.
author: Natsume Takeshi

quote: No one could understand the fear of walking alone in this unstable world.
author: Natsume Takeshi

quote: There isn't anyone who doesn't feel regret or sadness.
author: Lavi

quote: For the first time, I felt honoured at being allowed to compete in this game of truth and error, and witches as a human... And ironically, that taught me that the truth is not necessarily only one when I believed that only one truth existed. By just broadening my field of vision a little, I can see a truth that is completely different. And no matter which one of the truths, if you can only see one of them, they will not be the right answer... Ah, in my life until now, I wonder how many truths have I turned away from because I was blinded by some trivial truth...? This is... the truth... of the world...
author: Furudo Erika

quote: What am I to you anyway? You get all teary eyed whenever it suits you but you never stop to think about my feelings and how you might be messing with my heart. You want some nice guy to be a part of your life but only if its on your terms. All this talk of just being friends with a guy... don't make me laugh!
author: Shoji Endo

quote: Who wants to have their life planned out for them.
author: Killua Zoldyck

quote: Life is a succession of committing sin. Life is evil itself. I'm conscious that I'm evil. And so are all of you.
author: Yoshimura

quote: Friends are a good thing, even if they tread a different path.
author: Ukitake Jyuushirou

quote: It takes a mere second for treasure to turn to trash.
author: Hisoka

quote: What if, and this is strictly hypothetical, what if you could reload your save data to change your previous choice, like in a game? Would it change your life? The answer is a resounding no.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: It's too soon to give up. We aren't in Hell yet. This world is still worth surviving for.
author: Kazuki Kazami

quote: A problem is not a problem as long as nobody sees it as one.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Brilliant people shine more brightly than ordinary ones. They never regret or agonize over what they've done.
author: Archer

quote: A little bit of trouble keeps life from being boring.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: How does it feel to not exist?
author: Mei Misaki

quote: If you're here, can you prove you're really here?
author: Mei Misaki

quote: Panicking leads to an early grave.
author: Esdeath

quote: If you use your wish to grant someone else's, you should be careful you know exactly why you are doing it.
author: Mami Tomoe

quote: People respect it when someone they are distant from is boring and harmless. However, they only like that person because he or she doesn't get in their way. No human would want to hang around a boring person.
author: Featherine Augustus Aurora

quote: Resenting the past won't change anything. It just makes me want to kill myself! I have some control over my future, but there's no changing the past! I'll simply do what I can right now.
author: Tomoko Kuroki

quote: Let me tell you the truth. The truth behind fighting. Fighting continues forever. After you've defeated one person, someone stronger appears. If you manage to defeat him, then an even stronger person comes along. If you don't have the resolve to endure that eternal struggle, then eventually your confidence will erode. But it doesn't end there! The battle will continue elsewhere, fought by others. It's an endless cycle! And it doesn't end with a person's death. The cycle will continue! As long as people and their souls exist, there will be disputes and those disputes will lead to fights. And those fights will continue without limit, for all eternity.
author: Kariya Jin

quote: There were a lot of people who were kind to begin with. No, they were probably good people but, I don't want to see the disappointment in their eyes anymore. I don't really want to meet kind of people anymore.
author: Natsume Takeshi

quote: The reader will be me. I have no love, maybe I'll end up interpreting some things in a weird way. However, the reader is free to decide how to read things and with which intonation.
author: Frederica Bernkastel

quote: Unless someone makes the first move, nothing will happen.
author: Misa Amane

quote: When you love someone, you can never be sure that you'll be loved in return.
author: Kyoko Mogami

quote: Run? Is that how you speak to a hero? How little you understand. Allow me to educate you. If a hero were to run from battle... the children could no longer call him a hero.
author: Don Kanonji

quote: It's been so long that I forgot the pain of not having a name. Everyone had a name that friends use to call them, but I didn't. That pain.
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: If there's something you don't understand, learn to understand it.
author: Hange Zoe

quote: You're not a good-for-nothing person. I think that being able to try your hardest to be something is a talent by itself.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: Greed may not be good, but it’s not so bad either. You humans think greed is just for money or power, but everyone wants something they can’t have.
author: Greed

quote: How sad it would be if laughter should disappear.
author: Undertaker

quote: It is so painful when you lose someone you love ...To the point where your hair turns white because of grief.
author: Astharoshe Asran

quote: Nothing can remain the same forever, because if you don't change you can't improve... Facing this inescapable ''reality'' if you don't grow... You'll be crushed... For everyone to ascend and accomplish their dreams. They must grow.
author: Itsuki Minami

quote: I'm always alone. Other people don't factor into what I do. The things that happen in front of me are parts of my life and my life alone.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: You're the one who decides who you are.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: Why does everybody have to fight about everything, argue and steal from each other all the time? I mean, it's a big enough world. Why can't we share it?
author: Toboe

quote: If you don't get accepted by anyone, does that mean there's no significance for you to live on?
author: Alice

quote: I have no fear of death. It just means dreaming in silence. A dream that lasts for eternity
author: Vincent Volaju

quote: [After getting hit by Yammy Llargo's Bala] You mean do I have a defence? Truth is, I’ve never really had any plans against any attacks. I just knew I had to win so I did. That’s my plan. I don’t care if you’re higher ranked than the other Espadas' were, to me it’s all the same. I’ve gotta defeat you so I’ll find a way to do it. Simple.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: If you’ve got time to point fingers, then how about using your head to figure out what you want to do about it?
author: Karma Akabane

quote: Food tastes best when you don't have to work for it.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Merits, demerits, risks, returns
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: then there was still room to understand it. I could explain using logic.
author: repulsive emotions. That's because I had plenty of those ugly feelings inside of me. That's why it was simple to imagine. if they were similar things

quote: When I thought that I would never see you again. I was crippled by the pain of my heart being shattered. For the first time, I came to realize that "Heartbreak" was not just a word in books.
author: Sehara

quote: You know what, I wish I could give everyone a happy ending. But life isn't some romantic anime and I can't fix what's wrong in life stumbling around being oblivious and nice all the time.
author: Kodaka Hasegawa

quote: There are liars who only lie when there's a reason to, and there are liars who also lie without a reason.
author: Biscuit Krueger

quote: Do you dislike that someone you once knew has become someone new without your knowing?
author: Minato

quote: If you keep lying like that, no one, not even yourself, will believe you anymore.
author: Aladdin

quote: What's been troubling me lately are these small farewells that make me feel a bit lonely. Brief meetings and farewells. I want to treasure each and every moment.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: I have not changed at all. There were two of me to begin with. It was merely a swap between us. I have no intent on hiding this. Whether or not you believe it is up to you, Tetsuya. However, if you want to call it a "change", then that was because it was necessary. The team did not change because I had changed. I changed because the team had changed.
author: Akashi Seijuurou

quote: Humans, in general, feel uneasy when there’s dissonance between them and their external environment. And so, to cancel that uneasiness they try to synchronize (or make peace) with that environment.
author: Akiyama Shinichi

quote: If I can get my target to move as I want, I've succeeded as a Hunter.
author: Ging Freecss

quote: Ha-ha these humans are definitely foolish creatures.  Think as hard as those weak brains of yours can manage. Do you humans ever listen to the cries of mercy coming from pigs and cows you slaughter?
author: Meruem

quote: We each have an arrow in our hearts that we cannot remove.
author: Sehara

quote: Where's the fun in it if everything is going just as planned?
author: Takeshi Tatsumi

quote: Our differences are what let us understand each other. We've worked together to come this far, there are no doubts or regret anymore. I'll overcome this fight and prove that even we can come to an understanding.
author: Tsukune Aono

quote: Do your best, no matter how many times you fail!
author: Takeshi Tatsumi

quote: No one can justify life by linking happy moments into a rosary.
author: Shinji Ikari

quote: It is a virtue to devote one's self to something, firmly believing in one's own ideals. But that does not mean it's alright to belittle the ideals or feelings of others. If you lead such a busy life and you don't realize how your parents feel, it's only self-satisfaction. It's alright to stop every now and again, if you want a moment's rest, if you want to feel what other people feel.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: A rose will be born a rose. Different soil and water wouldn't change it into a different flower.
author: Aozaki Touko

quote: If you're not remembered, then you never existed.
author: Lain Iwakura

quote: Oh, I almost forgot. In the event that anyone besides big-headed Near or the deluded murderer is reading these notes, then I should at least perform the basic courtesy of introducing myself, here at the end of the prologue. I am your narrator, your navigator, your storyteller. For anyone else but those two, my identity may be of no interest, but I am the old world's runner-up, the best dresser that died like a dog, Mihael Keehl. I once called myself Mello and was addressed by that name, but that was a long time ago.
author: Mello

quote: There is no heaven or hell. No matter what you do while you're alive, everybody goes to the same place once you die. Death is Equal.
author: L Lawliet

quote: From the past... I always wanted to ask. God, why... Are you so unfair and extremely cruel? Why do you separate those who can fly... And those who cannot and bring them into existence? Why, in this one world... You made the effort to divide them into two and bring them together? In reality everyone was born with wings!.. Why didn't I realize that until now? It's not that those who can fly are able to fly, but that those who think of flying... Those who believe they can fly are the ones who can fly.
author: Rika Noyamano

quote: If you've decided that you can't do it even before you act, you have already made it into something impossible.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: This is exactly why I detest adults! You always have such a parochial approach, always trying to force the rules of your petty world onto others!
author: Hayato Mikogami

quote: It takes more courage to speak the truth than it does to wield a sword.
author: Sehara

quote: Manipulating the pieces according to your strategy... That is what defines a King.
author: Minerva Orland

quote: Sure, it might be warm and comfortable in there... not only safe and sound, but I get all the meals too! But I'd rather be out than be trapped inside this bird cage of yours.
author: Itsuki Minami

quote: No matter what kind of 'strength' you possess. There are places you can never reach no matter how hard you try. The farther it is... The higher it is...
author: Rika Noyamano

quote: If we only focus on making the best moves, we will never get the better of our opponent. When necessary, we must be willing to take big risks, and be prepared to lose everything. Unless we change how we fight, we cannot win.
author: Erwin Smith

quote: Aging is quite similar to death. Some people stand up to aging and death as if it were nothing. They can do it not because they're braver than others, but simply because they lack imagination. Only once people deny that which they love, do they become able to create it anew. Perhaps, the book I write, too, will die one day just like my body will. However, people have to accept that death is unavoidable. They will probably be gone in ten years. Their books will no longer exist in a hundred years. People accept this. Eternity is promised neither to humans nor to books. We live because we were born. If the system possesses the power of life and death over you... you're no longer a human. You're livestock. No matter how hard a rancher tries to pretend otherwise, they never recognize their livestock as friends. It's a mystery to me... How is it that these people, treated as livestock in this boring society, have not tried at all to destroy it? Nothing in this world is eternal. The only thing that truly exists is the splendor of the souls that atone for their sins.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: You cannot understand that which you do not know, and that misunderstanding breeds hatred.
author: Sehara

quote: You hide a tree by putting it in a forest
author: Sarasvati

quote: "To enjoy what one loves to do". Those words come easily from the mouth. But it's another thing to help them grow.
author: Medaka Kurokami

quote: Even if we know each other, understanding each other is another matter.
author: Yukino Yukinoshita

quote: They say you never know when a bullet you fired in battle will find its way back to you.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: That's not exactly right. If you had to sacrifice many things to protect one, you're more likely to give up and throw it away. Including relationships you have in your hand now.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Ah... Everything is such a bother. Even living.
author: Ayumu Aikawa

quote: If you don't want to be taken from, stop taking.
author: Moroha Haimura

quote: I don't give a damn about the real world.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: It's pointless to force people to do their best if they don't want to.
author: Hansode Shiranui

quote: No matter how much we think we want - it's never enough. I just want one thing to go right for me. I just need something to give me the energy so I can keep going.
author: Nana Komatsu

quote: You can't see the whole picture until you look at it from the outside.
author: Trafalgar Law

quote: Life eventually ends. But that doesn't mean that the fact that we met, or the time we spent together will disappear.
author: Mei

quote: Why is it that making our dreams come true, and being truly happy are often two separate things?.. I still haven't figured that one out.
author: Nana Komatsu

quote: Without love, people could exist without knowing truth and falsehood. By knowing it, they cry and grief and get lost. I was the same back then.
author: Furudo Erika

quote: Real magic is the power to repair, to revive. To call back happiness which has disappeared, to call back love which has gotten cold. And it can call back a forgotten smile to a princess' face.
author: Virgilia

quote: They often say that stupid thoughts are no better than sleeping.
author: Ushiromiya Kyrie

quote: When people immerse themselves in their own world and other people around them start doing something, they can’t help but feel very lonely.
author: Enomoto Takane

quote: No matter how small the problem is, how small the thing is, it always affects the people around you.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: Music speaks to people's hearts, all throughout the world. I believe it's a powerful language.
author: Kawashima Sapphire

quote: There are some people who don't want a solution. Some want things to stay the way they are. There's no way to make things convenient for everyone. So the only option is to find a compromise.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Having people acknowledge your existence is a wonderful thing.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: The opposite of boredom is not pleasure... but excitement. People will gladly seek out any kind of excitement, even pain.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: The frog in the well can't communicate with the ocean creatures, as it knows the depth of the sky. It's because the frog lived inside a cramped and small space, so he knows better than anyone, how precious freedom is.
author: Akito Wanijima

quote: There are two things that collectors always want. The first is any item of extreme rarity. The second is colleagues to whom they can brag about their collection.
author: Kurapika

quote: A person's mentality and feelings aren't always equal. There are times the conclusion you arrive at is completely irrational and the reason is because of that.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: In the end, people are all alone, and no matter how close they cling together, they can never be one. It's impossible to make someone belong to you.
author: Yasushi Takagi

quote: A perfect plan doesn't mean having everything go within expectations. A perfect plan is achieved when it has the plasticity needed to flexibly deal with troubles.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: A scar indicates that something is missing. You lost something important, and there's a hole in your heart. Having that empty hole can lead to anger, hate, despair, or... it can make you reach for the sky.
author: Fuuko Kurasaki

quote: A clever retreat? Throw that to the dogs! Once you've dived into the battlefield, you can only devote yourself to the fight, regardless of your opponent!
author: Kuroyukihime

quote: It's impossible to share everything. No one can become someone else. It's natural to envy someone who's more wealthy or who has higher standing. That's how conflicts begin. However, being blissfully unaware of this, relying on whatever someone provided without thinking, and only seeing things as "black" or "white" with such overly simplified thinking... Isn't that a sin as well? People need to think for themselves. For this reason, someone "grey", someone between "black" and "white" is essential. I will not gloss over the flaws in my ideals. It's not possible for all of mankind to share the same kind of thoughts. However, everyone is capable of thought. Everyone can learn, share, and decide with their own strength. A world built upon an understanding of that. If this is a "dream", if I don't realize it, who will?
author: Sinbad

quote: Your happiness is your own business. Its a promise you make to yourself. It is a reward you give yourself for accomplishing what you set out to do, for achieving what you strive for. But if you fail to reward yourself for what you have accomplished, then you are essentially breaking a promise to yourself. Its like a breach of contract, compensation must always be made. You must pay all of the debts that you made, even to yourself.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: I'm prepared for anything! Up until now, I have been running away from every fight, afraid of losing. But running away is even worse than losing. Unless one continues to fight, without succumbing to the pain of defeat, it is impossible to achieve victory. That is what people I love taught me.
author: Hanyuu

quote: I'm sure it's not wrong for people to want to understand each other. And even if it is, I want us to understand each other.
author: Chiyuki

quote: Question: Why can one keep living as a hikikomori?
author: Satou Tatsuhiro

quote: unless you're prepared to die
author: clothing and shelter

quote: All truth is meaningless. In the end, 'meaning' comes from the mind of each individual human. Even when there is a single truth, it can mean different things to different individuals. The truth has no meaning in itself!
author: Furudo Erika

quote: There’s only one difference between heroes and mad men. It’s whether they win or lose.
author: Lambdadelta

quote: No person can become a replacement for another. Not even the past version of themselves.
author: Ushiromiya Ange

quote: Nothing good comes from digging up the past.
author: Uryuu Minene

quote: You'll never be able to move forward if you're afraid of soiling your hands.
author: Fujimoto Shirou

quote: When you love someone, sometimes your head hurts. And it's so agonizing that you want to burst into tears. But even the smallest thing can bring you happiness. It's complicated, but simple. Perhaps all these emotions are irreplaceable and precious.
author: Ageha Shiroi

quote: You can catch a mouse that's shut in a cage. However, catching a mouse in a field is like trying to catch a cloud.
author: Beatrice

quote: Why not just try hard again? Quit mopping around. Stop lying to yourself and try once more.
author: Mikoto Misaka

quote: If I follow my dream and it shatters - I can accept having to regret that. But I don't want to regret not pursuing it in the first place.
author: Akito Takagi

quote: Even if you have two of the exact same person, they could change enormously depending on their upbringing.
author: Ushiromiya Ange

quote: Tell me, what do you think is the ultimate fear? I really thought I'd already reached the darkest of the dark, but then, ahead of me, I beheld a darkness even greater still.
author: Johann Liebert

quote: Most non-NEET people in the world don't realize that human nature isn't scalar, but vectorial.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: If there's no eye to see, there's no difference between the darkness and the light.
author: Subaru

quote: If you could calculate feelings, then we'd be in a digital age by now... The remaining answer that you couldn't calculate is what they call the feelings of people.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: Change can only arise from fluctuations, right? That's why going back and forth between confidence and weakness, if you're shifting then you're changing, I think. Like that, little by little, everyone is changing probably.
author: Touma Kikuchi

quote: If an angelic being fell from the sky and tried to live in this world of ours, I think even they would commit many wrongs.
author: Juuzou Suzuya

quote: Don't be frightened by the waves. If we read the flow of the waves and accept them, we can overcome it. There's no wave that can't be overcome!!
author: Sinbad

quote: To reach the top we must crush their dreams and climb atop their shattered hopes. The will to win at any cost, to obliterate the enemy if necessary, without ambition there is no way to move up.
author: Agito Wanijima

quote: Does the world hate me or something? I've always rejected it in an exceedingly friendly manner.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: In truth everyone gets their wings the day they are born, and if one has the courage to spread those wings, then he'll fly for sure
author: Rika Noyamano

quote: Don't understand? Then think more. If you can only think by calculating, then keep doing so until you can't. Think of all the answers you can and destroy them one by one with the process of elimination. Whatever remains is your answer.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: Keep flying higher so that others are inspired to fly with you.
author: Itsuki Minami

quote: If you begin to regret, you'll dull your future decisions and let others make your choices for you. All that's left for you then is to die. Nobody can foretell the outcome. Each decision you make holds meaning only by affecting your next decision.
author: Erwin Smith

quote: Everyone has something they hold dear, something they never want to lose. That's why they pretend. That's why they hide the truth. And that's why they lie.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Humans all behave the same way, like idiots. They all forget that someday, they're gonna die, so the moment they come face to face with death, they cling to life.
author: Ginti

quote: It's a cruel and random world. And yet the chaos is all so beautiful.
author: Dante

quote: It makes you sad when someone suddenly just up and disappears without a word. If you're just going to end up hurt in the end, you're better off not forming any bonds at all.
author: Yozora Mikazuki

quote: Even shining stars that seem very close are actually far, far apart, separated by many light years. Perhaps we're like the stars we all gaze upon, shining alone in the empty void of space. Having faith that one day, our light might reach someone.
author: Subaru

quote: If you don't hold any regret in your choice, that means you must've made the right decision.
author: Yūzan Yoshida

quote: Those bound by superficial rules who do not use their pawns to the utmost are fools.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I was trying to take the easy way out by running away from everything. No matter the pain, I will keep living. So when I die, I'll feel I did the best I could.
author: Koala

quote: People like you will never understand... Although it is true that many humans are stupid, immature, and high school drop outs... But! Humans possess the power of possibilities!
author: Inferno Cop

quote: The final curtain falls at the very moment a person gives up.
author: Miwa Ichigen

quote: If you're gonna have great happiness, it requires great effort in exchange, that's called compensation. For the good things in life, there are the bad. For the bad things in life, there are always the good. In order for you to be happy, you must be willing to accept a burden of a equal amount of unhappiness in exchange as your payment. The more you achieve, the greater the demands will be placed upon you in return.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: There aren't many things you can believe. That's how human beings work. They only care about themselves, and no one else really matters. They get caught up in their own lackadaisical dialogue, lying their way through life.
author: Death Parade

quote: I wanted to be a cat. I was jealous of them. They're liked by everyone... Even though they don't do anything at all. I just wanted everyone to like me.
author: Shiro

quote: Even innocent foolish children will grow up in the face of pain, until their thoughts and beliefs are the same as their doubts.
author: Pain

quote: Oddities are the world itself. They're linked to the world, unlike living beings. Science alone cannot shed light upon them, as there will always be people who'll be afraid of vampires. Although all forms of darkness could be lit up, darkness will never cease to exist.
author: Bakemonogatari

quote: I'm going to keep getting closer and closer to you. And not just day after day, oh no. It's going to happen much faster than that! See I'm already closer to you than I was a moment ago. And I'll keep getting closer and closer to you, until I swallow you up and then, you'll disappear. Things are not turning out well for you at all, are they? (laughs) See you around.
author: Hollow Ichigo

quote: People are weak. They have no fangs or claws. All they can do is cry. And yet, how was it that this world came into the possession of humans? That's because...  among all living things... they are... the cruelest!
author: Shinnou

quote: In order to measure a person’s worth, you must do more than push them. The real way to test their worth is to give them power. When they gain the freedom to act outside the boundaries of law and ethics, you can sometimes see their souls. When the weak become strong... When good citizens become free to engage in violence... I'm interested to see what is the outcome of that.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: No matter who you are, some things, once lost, can never be regained.
author: Kuro Fukase

quote: School trips are simply a simulation of adult social life. If you ever go on a business trip with your boss, you won't get to choose where to stay or what to eat, but if you compromise, you can still have a modicum of fun. School trips train you to trick yourself into that kinda mindset.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: People in reality spout off all in unison about love and friendship but in fact it's a dirty little world full of lies and desires, isn't it?
author: Satou Tatsuhiro

quote: Getting into trouble is not a bad thing. It's proof that someone is watching you.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: When a girl calls someone a "nice guy", it means she couldn't care less about him.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: People live in order to be satisfied. And they hope to die while still satisfied. So, not knowing how to make yourself become satisfied is very tough.
author: Ushiromiya Ange

quote: There is a history to humans. Humans are shaped by the experience obtained from living as time continued to wind and wind. To be reborn meant being rid of that history
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: You're nothing but a piece. Your absence wouldn't hinder my progress in this game in the slightest. If you can't think of any other theories in particular, please just go back to the piece tray and gather dust or something. It's painful to even remember useless pieces.
author: Frederica Bernkastel

quote: Any event is a personal episode, where only those involved comprehend what's happening.
author: Kuro Fukase

quote: I couldn't confess my feelings for you, so I watched you from afar, being happy with someone else.
author: Sanji

quote: What if that fruit you've worked so hard to nurture gets pulled off the branch the next morning? You'll regret that you didn't choose to harvest it the previous day instead of complaining. That regret really hurts. It'll make you crawl through hell.
author: Ushiromiya Kyrie

quote: Love really is like playing with fire. Anyone can play easily and lightheartedly. But when you mess up and get burned, that scar stays with you your whole life.
author: Ushiromiya Kyrie

quote: When something impossible happens, there are only two possibilities. Either your assumptions are wrong, or you have gone crazy.
author: Kougami Shinya

quote: Whether I kick a kitten... Tear off your ears... Even slaughter innocent people... The world will never cease to forgive my actions! Why, you ask? That's right, it is because I am... Beautiful!!!
author: Boa Hancock

quote: The only times we're fated to lose are in fictional stories. This is our drama! We decide what the plot will be!
author: Taiga Kagami

quote: The truth is, there are no lives that are nothing but pretty.
author: Nona

quote: The present will always be different from the past. That's what makes life good and at the same time sad. That sadness in turn gives our everyday life some flavor. Just like coffee.
author: Tamako Love Story

quote: Youth is fleeting. Young people can't even wait for a spoonful of sugar to dissolve and bitter regret is proof of that. But by bit, you get a taste for it.
author: Tamako Love Story

quote: Yes, my lord. I devote my entire being to you. Until the day... that lies become truth.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: No matter how foolish or incomprehensible, some love cannot be discarded. You may try to stop your heart, unable to forgive yourself, but there will be times when you lose hope and your heart is moved again.
author: Ik-su

quote: Unlike demons, you’re base, you harbor a complicated malice, you lie… You struggle desperately, knocking down others in your way… You steal and are stolen from, you make endless excuses… And still you strive to get over the hill and far away. I suppose that’s why humans are so interesting.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Don't cry
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Words are cheap. There's no guarantee she won't tell anyone. Humans lie without a second thought. Including me, of course.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Somewhere, that’s not here, in a place I can’t remember, I was obsessed with the idea that I was all alone. I thought that nobody would care, or even miss me if I vanished from the face of the Earth. I wanted to disappear. Then I had a dream about falling from the sky. I just remember that the bird was in the dream with me, and that the bird was someone in the form of a bird, trying to call me back. I now know that I was never alone.
author: Rakka

quote: A lump of steel, like a shooting star. Just seeing the same sky as you makes familiar scenery look different. I swing between hope and despair at your slightest gesture, and my heart starts to play a melody. What kind of feeling is this again? What do they call this kind of feeling? I think it's probably... Called Love. I'm sure this is what they call love.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: Those who seek out the truth must not be arrogant. You must not laugh at miracles just because they cannot be explained scientifically. You must not turn away from the beauty of this world.
author: Ichinose Kotomi

quote: Isn't it funny how the most unforgettable scenes can be so trivial ?
author: Kousei Arima

quote: Everyone will always question your ideals. That's simply reality.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Hold on. Don't go! Let's argue again. I'll bribe you with a canelé. I'll call you to kill time. I don't mind being Friend A. Please don't go. Please don't go. Please don't go...please don't leave me behind.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: Giving in to despair is a foolish choice.
author: Inaho Kaizuka

quote: Do you value your life? Do you think that your family and friends are important to you? If they are, then you should never think of changing yourself. Otherwise, you will lose everything that is precious to you.
author: Homura Akemi

quote: I just long for a world in which ordinary things are done in an ordinary way.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: If you keep bad-mouthing someone, you might feel like as if you are on a higher position than that person. But in actual fact, its completely wrong to do that!
author: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: Just because someone is important to you, it doesn't necessarily mean that, that person is good. Even if you knew that person was evil... People cannot win against their loneliness.
author: Gaara

quote: When 'colors' mix, they become muddy and messy. But when they all blend together, the final result is the color that wins against all others... Black.
author: Ittetsu Takeda

quote: In the end, I couldn't see things from the parasites' perspective, never mind from Migi's. Of course not. It wasn't possible from the beginning. As two different species, we may at times take advantage of each other and kill each other, but it's impossible to understand each other. Actually, you shouldn't even think that you've figured out another species based on your standards. I think it's human arrogance to think we understand how other life forms feel. There may be no other life forms that are truly a "friend" to man. Still, even if we can't comprehend them, they are, without a doubt, neighbors deserving of our respect. We protect other species because humans themselves are lonely creatures. We protect the environment because humans themselves don't want to go extinct. What drives us is simply self-gratification. But I think that's fine, and that it's really all there is to it. There's no point in despising humans by human standards. That's right. So in the end, it's hypocritical for us to love Earth without loving ourselves.
author: Shinichi Izumi

quote: Even if it doesn't pay off or you're laughed at, go down the path that you believe is right.
author: Makoto Hijikata

quote: All humans are loved by another and build up emotions with them. That's nature's providence. There's no way around it. And it's pointless to question it. A bug with wings has no idea why, but it can't help but want to fly. When two people can't help but seek one another out, I think, in essence, it's exactly the same scenario.
author: Isshin Saitō

quote: Every human has another personality that they keep hidden from others.
author: Yakumo Saitō

quote: In order to accomplish anything, sacrifices must be made.
author: Tatsumi

quote: No idiot would want to be friends with an unmoving, unspeaking telephone pole. However, unmoving and unspeaking is exactly what you'd want from a telephone pole.
author: Ushiromiya Ange

quote: Those who don't give up no matter how many walls they run into, those are the ones who'll make their dreams come true.
author: Moritaka Mashiro

quote: *To Android 19* Just as I thought... you're nothing. Silly robot, you really think you have a chance against a super saiyan like me? Your brain must be malfunctioning. Fresh out of the factory with no warranty and already broken. What a pity.
author: Vegeta

quote: I led me by the hand, as if to fill the niches in the memories in my oozing brain fluid. Without even a destination, we kept walking. Disgusting clouds were floating in the sky. I already know what will happen to me the next time I wake up.
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: The bird fights it's way out of the egg. The egg is the world. Who would be born, must first destroy a world.
author: Tokyo Ghoul

quote: Manga that's born from people taking responsibility for their own work, banging their head in frustration, feeling cornered, and like they want to escape, and then using that extreme situation, mental ability, stamina, and panic to create... would never lose to some soul-less manga that's just made up of other people's ideas without any kind of resolve!
author: Moritaka Mashiro

quote: Skipping school for one day might not be a problem, but if you skip for three days in a row, it'd be really hard to convince yourself to go back.
author: Ushiromiya Ange

quote: Classification of fantasy and reality is itself a fantasy that humans created... Life begins when you make a distinction between yourself and others. From that moment on, the world becomes a stage for the story in which you are the main character. All humans live in a fantasy in which they are the main character. But the world doesn't recognize you as the main character at all. What nonsense. Everyone lives their entire life tormented by this confusion. There's only one way out of this hell. To place yourself in a position that is neither the main character nor a supporting role. In other words, the author.
author: The Author

quote: Happiness depends on each person. If you think you're happy, then you must be happy.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Even a child that receives one bit of praise has the ability to excel in a single talent, and those who receive regular encouragement can feel confidence, achieve success, and become leading members of society. Because they don’t believe they are worthless, they don’t need to raise a fist and have vengeance against fate or the world at large…
author: Inspector Lunge

quote: Curiosity is like a cockroach. It likes to stumble upon secrets that are supposed to stay hidden.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Let go of me. It'll all be in vain anyway. No matter how gently you hold onto me. No matter what kind of expression you look at me with. In the end, you guys are... only my imagination. I have a slight addiction to fantasy. I sometimes mix the reality that I don't want to face with warm illusions. That's why I can think of "that" as one of those moments.
author: Kuro Fukase

quote: True happiness comes from overcoming suffering. No one can shoulder your burdens for you.
author: Labrador

quote: Is dying that scary to you?
author: Minato Arisato

quote: The first one to panic is the first one to lose. No matter if they're the hunter or the hunted.
author: Zarik Kajiwara

quote: Just because you look a little better, everyone comes running at you screaming and pretending to be friendly... Just because you look a little worse, everyone ignores you and uses you as a plaything or a slave... Isn't life so unfair?
author: Dong Taebin

quote: I... don't know why I'm alive. I have no reason to live. I have no interest in others. Living without concern for others... That's the way to live. Working a job that earns me just enough to eat... A life like that was enough...
author: Yuzuru Otonashi

quote: The world is very boring. Everyone tries to live like a normal person without a second thought.
author: Dongtae

quote: Maybe... just maybe, the light can reach even the bottom of a dark ocean.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: If you simply obey orders without question to protect your master, that isn't your greatest wish, but your greatest tragedy.
author: Jae-ha

quote: My life after losing her... Is it over as well? The days I spent satisfied with the happiness I never noticed... Those times had passed away. For me... There's nothing left at all.
author: Yuzuru Otonashi

quote: You're you. "To be like you..." - it's not so ambiguous as that. No matter what you do, no matter how you change, it doesn't mean a thing. you're just you, no matter what.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: Sure I'm okay. Because that's how I was built, after all.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: When receiving an illogical favor from others, one should do the same to return the illogical favor.
author: Frontier Setter

quote: Embrace your dreams...and whatever happens, protect your honor...AS SOLDIER!
author: Zack Fair

quote: Watching TV or playing games alone is more fun. Playing along with your friends' hobbies... Laughing at their jokes when they're not funny... All that does is tire me out.
author: Yuzuru Otonashi

quote: Whenever people see birds flying through the sky, it's said that they get the urge to go on a journey.
author: Kino

quote: Being the best decoy ever is as cool as being the ace.
author: Tobio Kageyama

quote: The reason we hurt others is because we don't understand their pain.
author: Kino

quote: You can't spell "slaughter" without "laughter."
author: Hollow Ichigo

quote: The year may end, but some things never do. You may not see them with your eyes, but when you look with your heart, you can.
author: Dera Mochimazzi

quote: The truth is unattainable. It will always be shrouded in fog. Though you reach the murk and the gloom to grasp something, you have no means to know it is the truth. In which case, why...? What sense is there in yearning for the truth? Close your eyes. Lie to yourself. Live in blissful ignorance... it is a much smarter way to exist.
author: Teddie

quote: Protecting a man’s pride… is a woman’s duty.
author: Saeko Busujima

quote: I say... that people do not live just so that they can someday die. It is because they are alive that they someday die. There is no point to living. The same goes for judgment. Judgment must be performed hand in hand with both life and death. It is something that must be performed hand in hand with humans.
author: Decim

quote: I know I haven't always made the right decisions up to now... Whether I was right, or whether I was wrong, may not even matter in the first place. However, running up against my sins like this-- all of the choices I've made up to this point-- today, being able to die for someone-- is something I'm glad for...
author: Irimi Kaya

quote: So ephemeral and weak. But its shining with all its might. Thump, Thump, like a heartbeat. This is the light of life.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: After the first note resonated through the hall, You became everything I yearn for.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: Love and hate are two sides of the same coin.
author: Hisoka

quote: Of course I'm insecure. Of course I'm lonely. Of course I wanna see him. And of course being so far apart sucks, but the thing is, nobody else could ever take his place. So it doesn't matter if I don't want a long-distance relationship. I don't have a choice, but I have to do it. I love him.
author: Haruna Nagashima

quote: I'm selfish, I know. But to keep you only mine, I will do everything I needed to do, even if it's illegal.
author: Gasai Yuno

quote: Even the most ignorant, innocent child will eventually grow up as they learn what true pain is. It affects what they say, what they think… and they become real people.
author: Pain

quote: In this world, there are very few people who actually trust each other.
author: Light Yagami

quote: Time might separate us some day. But, even still, until then, let's stay together.
author: Hotaru Takegawa

quote: Forgetting is like a wound. The wound may heal but it has already left a scar.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Life is like a pencil that will surely run out, but will leave the beautiful writing of life.
author: Nami

quote: Kindness can sometime translate to hostility.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: I don't want to die, either. But I'm an aristocrat. It's an honor to die for one's people. You make fun of it, but is it that insignificant to die for everyone else?
author: Louise Françoise Le Blanc de La Vallière

quote: One ought to experience loneliness at least once or twice in life. No, you have to experience it. The idea of being chained to another person without reprieve is far more abnormal and disquieting. One has no choice but to learn about loneliness. I’m sure some things can’t be experienced without it.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: It's only natural for a man to protect the girl he likes.
author: Saito Hiraga

quote: If there are things you learn with friends, there must also be things you learn without friends. They must be of equal worth, two sides of the same coin.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: A faint clap of thunder, clouded skies
author: Yukari Yukino

quote: Despair is contagious. Everyone catches it.
author: Junko Enoshima

quote: Everyone lives with the sins they've committed.
author: Chiyuki

quote: The longer the days go by without them, the worse the sadness from losing someone gets...
author: Ushiromiya Battler

quote: What is education? Isn't education meant to create a person that conforms to society? What kind of education must be administrated to create a human being that meets the society's demands? Education is an experiment.
author: Mikhail Petrov

quote: Is there any purpose to wings that can't fly?
author: Minagi Tohno

quote: There is nothing less amusing than destroying those who have no will to live.
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: We'll never win if we don't believe we can.
author: Daichi Sawamura

quote: Such a cruel boy. Telling me to dream one more time. I thought I was satisfied because my dream had come true... And I'd told myself it was enough... Yet here you are, watering this withered heart again.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: War does not determine who is right - only who is left.
author: Riza Hawkeye

quote: It's impossible for humans to forget their emotions.
author: Wolfgang Grimmer

quote: With such nice weather, I start thinking about useless things much more than usual. Humans are free. Although we can’t fly through the skies all alone, if we can think it, we can do almost anything. We can sleep when we’re sleepy. We are free to start or stop anything whenever we wish. Of course, it is a bit hindered by common sense, moralities, and the rules of society. Walking nude out in the streets, stealing from the elderly, and even killing, we can do all of this as long as we throw out our morals. Which is why they drill these laws in our head when we are children. And yet, people still continue to fight, deceive, and steal from each other. And so, people suffer because they live. Even now, there are events of happiness and unhappiness going on all over the world. …What can we do to make everyone happy? Of course that’s impossible for me to know. If the answer to that could be found in the shallow wisdoms of a kid, wars would have stopped long ago. But I also dislike just leaving that problem up to society or the government. After all, a great person is just one who follows the popular will of the people. In this world, the essence of a frank honest human is just an idealization. I’m sure that there’s nothing that can make everyone happy. Happiness is relative, and that’s how people want it. Evil is also relative. Mothers can become demons when they do anything to protect their child. Yet it’s usually seen as admirable. But when a person does anything for the country he loves, wars break out. Isn't it all the same thing? No matter how much a person pretends to be good and kind, he will still have negative aspects. But nobody really tries to notice that fact. Why is that? They all try to place the blame on others, and never even consider the possibility that they themselves may have played part in the problem. Just what the heck am I thinking? The world isn't going to change no matter what I think. Then what should I be doing? I don’t really want to do anything. I don’t want to order nor trouble anyone. That’s just laziness, I guess. I don’t go to school nor do I work and I've been wasting my time away since noon. Look at me, talking about the freedom of humans when I’m just some suspicious punk in this town. In conclusion, I have nothing.
author: Masumi Seki

quote: All this time, I've lived in hope of telling you how sorry I am, I've fought armies, just to have this chance, but now, there's nothing I can say.. That's good enough.
author: Lucy

quote: Just what is right and what is wrong...? To begin with, just who is the enemy I must defeat?
author: Rentaro Satomi

quote: To ask is a moment's shame. Not to, lifelong.
author: Yotsugi Ononoki

quote: If you lose something, just build it again. And this time, with a greater care.
author: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: The piano is meant to be played like you're embracing it, right?
author: Kousei Arima

quote: But still... Not trying to undo misunderstandings is the same as telling a lie.
author: Yotsugi Ononoki

quote: If my own happiness will lead the misfortune of others then being unhappy is probably the wisest choice.
author: Rea Sanka

quote: We're all connected. Just like the notes are intermittently connected. It's shared by us all. Through music, with the people you know, with the people you don't know, with all the people in this world.
author: Hiroko Seto

quote: Human nature denies the past in order to justify the present. But do you believe there is anything in the present worth justifying?
author: Boogiepop

quote: Sometimes your biggest effort will be ignored, but your smallest mistake will be judged.
author: Kou Mabuchi

quote: There's no such thing as a limit on being the best. You can always go for more. That's what it means to be human. No... That's what it means to be me.
author: Claire Stanfield

quote: It's not just grief. There are as many emotions as there are people. The fragility of someone who lets their anger get the best of them... The strength to overcome fear because of love... You can't comprehend anything about them.
author: Chiyuki

quote: Keep on living your life in such a way that love doesn't fade away. I shall work... so that love may shine brightly, even today.
author: Yoshino Yūsuke

quote: You need three types of power to control the world. One is influence. One is wealth. The third is... force.
author: Ushiromiya George

quote: Things learned as a child stay with you forever.
author: Cosette Sara

quote: Victory isn't something you are given. It is something you take.
author: Ushiromiya Battler

quote: There's no way someone who can't even protect himself can protect anyone else, is there?
author: Touka Kirishima

quote: Do you know what the most primitive emotion people have is? It’s fear.
author: Nona

quote: People aren't as complex as you think they are. They're simple, and they get sad or angry over simple things. That's how they are. They're quickly affected by the littlest things, and live without knowing where they're going to fall down. That's who people are!
author: Chiyuki

quote: Only someone that's prepared to devote oneself to others' happiness, without caring about his own, is allowed to become a king.
author: Oomine Daiya

quote: They say the temperature of tea and a women's heart are difficult in any age.
author: Ronove

quote: Country of birth, time period, parents, location... various factors make people's lives unequal from the very beginning.
author: Death Parade

quote: Fortitude is about staying cool and calmly analyzing your opponent. Do you know why? It's to counter, to give back exactly what you got, to make them not want to take another pass at you, to make them cover their face in tears and snot and forget to wash it off, to make them want to rub their forehead on the ground and apologize over and over, to completely, perfectly, thoroughly beat them until they can't get up!
author: Ushiromiya George

quote: No matter how hard someone's heart is, if you keep on talking to them, little by little, it'll eventually start to crack! I believe it! I believe that useless effort doesn't exist in this world!
author: Ushiromiya Jessica

quote: I was wrong. I wasn't eating ghouls. I'm the one who was being eaten.
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: When people have an overwhelming advantage, they sometimes take on a little risk to try and show off their superiority over the losers.
author: Ushiromiya Kyrie

quote: In the limited time we have between our births and our deaths, we live life with everything we've got.
author: Ushiromiya Battler

quote: Doesn't even think about giving up just because it's useless! The moment you give up is when your life ends.
author: Ushiromiya Jessica

quote: People tend to push the pain they're burdened with onto other people.
author: Ushiromiya Ange

quote: If you don't want to be betrayed anymore, then start by doubting the person you want to doubt the least.
author: Inspector Lunge

quote: I want to break up while I can still say I love you.
author: Chihiro Shindou

quote: Fighting without hope is no way to live. It's just a way to die.
author: Éclair Farron

quote: The moment between life and death is where a true man shows his color.
author: Shio Sakaki

quote: Justice? Truth? More than anything else existing in this world, those things are a burden! The things that are needed are "acting" to deceive people and "power" to control others.
author: Natsu Tanimoto

quote: Human relationships are chemical reactions. If you have a reaction then you can never return back to your previous state of being.
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: I don't intentionally ignore anyone. Their words simply don't resonate with me.
author: Asaba Yuki

quote: Life is never fair. I'm sure you're well aware of that.
author: Decim

quote: Disrupt law and order, and you get punished for it. Isn't that how society works?
author: Monokuma

quote: When you feel your life's on the line, your true nature surfaces.
author: Shinichi Izumi

quote: I have long forgotten how to laugh as if I were having fun.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: No matter what you do, it's all futile in this world.
author: Shuntarou Chishiya

quote: Shadow and light are two sides of the same coin... One cannot exist without another.
author: Princess Zelda

quote: Anyone may claim that he will act in the direst times, yet only a brave man acts in times great and small.
author: Cloud Strife

quote: Those who know despair, once knew hope. Those who know loss, once knew love.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: Well, who you love depends on the person. Isn't everything fine as long as it's someone who's fun to be with? Being with someone doesn't require any permission as long as the two people accept each other. If you worry about your parents or your family, then you lose. Don't forget that. You can't go out with someone with incomplete feelings.
author: Ushiromiya Battler

quote: Criticism of yourself as you're observed by others doesn't matter. If your existence is firmly acknowledged by you yourself, that's enough. If you can live with confidence in yourself, surely you can accept any kind of lifestyle.
author: Ushiromiya Ange

quote: Truth can change its form depending on the observer.
author: Ushiromiya Maria

quote: Those with talent who aren't aware of themselves cause pain for those who have none.
author: Fuyumi Irisu

quote: You have to fool your own people before you try to bluff the enemy.
author: Sakamoto Yuuji

quote: Human beings are cruel. Even though it's heartbreaking, I feel hungry. Even though it's painful, I feel sleepy. And, even though it's painful for me, I still eat and sleep peacefully. I can't forgive myself, and hence it becomes even more painful.
author: Asou Renji

quote: To us, you are more valuable than any jewel. Would you be at ease if you left your most treasured valuable outside the bounds of your own home? A treasure is something you keep with you at all times. It is common sense.
author: Claude

quote: Don't start thinking of killing just when the slightest thing doesn't go your way! How selfish are you!?
author: Hikawa Renko

quote: Now it’s not just your heart, but also your breathing, your brain, your nervous system, and everything else… See, the human body is in some way always moving from the time they were in their mother’s womb until the last moments of their life. Even when someone is asleep, fainted, or unconscious, their body never stops. In other words, the concept of stopping is precisely how humans are able to perceive death.
author: Crow

quote: If you're at a loss for words, you don't have to force yourself. That in itself is a form of comfort.
author: Shouta Kazehaya

quote: Right and wrong are not what separate us and our enemies, it's our perspectives that separate us. Both sides blame one another. There's no good or bad side, just two sides holding different views.
author: Squall Leonhart

quote: Words aren't the only thing that tell people what you're thinking.
author: Tifa Lockhart

quote: How do you prove that you exist...? Maybe we don't exist.
author: Vivi Ornitier

quote: Why do people depend on each other? In the end you're on your own.
author: Squall Leonhart

quote: It's not a question of can or can't. There are some things in life you just do.
author: Éclair Farron

quote: Maybe we'd fall short. Maybe we'd never even come close. But someone, someday would know we've tried.
author: Oerba Dia Vanille

quote: Regret... It's a heavy burden. You can't help wondering if maybe you chose the wrong path. Because once you've chosen, you can't change your mind.
author: Aries M

quote: Fools set the rules in this world. Just take a look around. It's undeniable.
author: Noctis Lucis Caelum

quote: It's troublesome if the villain doesn't show their evil. Villains are necessary to make knights into heroes.
author: Helbram

quote: People become themselves through their encounters. With different things, people, and emotions.
author: Joutarou Kawasumi

quote: Compared to one million proverbs, just one word from your heart can prove victorious!
author: Rabat

quote: Genius is 1% inspiration and 99% perspiration! In other words, believe in your inspiration and fight to the end! Perspiration without inspiration is worthless! No matter what others say ignore them! Trust your talent! Follow your own path!
author: Suiboku Kuroki

quote: In ages past, dragons and men were one. Those who lusted after wealth chose the land and the sea and became men. Those who cherished freedom, became dragons and chose wind and fire.
author: Root

quote: Instead of picking fruit when it's green, you should wait, wait, and wait until it ripens. When they reach their peak, you pick them off! Even though the action itself is the same, they taste totally different.
author: Gasback

quote: Do you think you're the main character of some kind of sob story? You don't want to see people get hurt, so you cover your eyes and ears. Using your grief to hide the suffering is the easiest path to take. But I won't forgive you if you do. You're a Brave aren't you? Do you intend to live as someone who's always protected by others!? Fight! What will you solve by running away? The ability to keep going forward is strength as well! Physical strength is not all there is to it!
author: Anastasia

quote: I hate butterflies. I hate them for being pretty. I hate them for being easy to catch. And having pins stuck through their body and being turned into specimens is what I hate most.
author: Agatsuma Soubi

quote: The only lucky item you'll need is already within - CONFIDENCE.
author: Midorima Shintarou

quote: I believe being an author is a lonely line of work that asks you to pass through a narrow gate alone.
author: Kanako Sakurai

quote: You’ll stumble many times in the future, but when you do, each time you’ll have more strength to bounce back.
author: Nobita Nobi

quote: Destiny is what you create with your own will.
author: Shinguji Sakura

quote: Those who stand above others, must have noble ideals along with the most noble intentions. Anyone that cannot manage the will of the masses is not fit to serve as the leader. You say you're punishing someone for standing up to you? That kind of justice is a lie.
author: Silver Knight

quote: Saying that people's personalities are products of their pasts isn't totally wrong. The way people live depends on their experiences.
author: Kirie Kanoe

quote: At first, people only play as dots. But when lines of trust and friendship connect those dots, the lines become a circle and that circle is teamwork. As long as you keep playing as a dot, the others won't trust you either.
author: Major

quote: You shouldn't mouth off when you don't know shit.
author: Shinichi Izumi

quote: There are some scars that never fade.
author: Basara Tōjō

quote: If talking won't resolve matters, maybe inflicting some pain will.
author: Shinichi Izumi

quote: Shining brightly even for a split second is better than living a dull-grey life for eternity.
author: Jing

quote: People have many different ways of thinking. Even if you make a mistake, if you realize it was a mistake, You can always fix it. Then if you turn around, you will see the future. This must be realized by oneself.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: At times like these, you shouldn't depend on people's advice, but think about it thoroughly by yourself and make a decision. Because there's no right answer when it comes to love. Whatever your answer is, if it's your own choice, then it's right.
author: Yuyuka Nekota

quote: Don't judge me if you don't stand in my position.
author: Satsuki Shishio

quote: Charm is reserved for dealing with people with more power than you.
author: Chihayafuru 2

quote: Weak in order to love, strong in order to protect, both in order to stay at your side.
author: Elizabeth Midford

quote: Being free can mean many different things, but I think it's truest meaning is having a free heart that can't be bound by anything. So no matter what choice you make, as long as you remain who you are, you will forever be free.
author: Rei Ryugazaki

quote: If I die here, then I'm a man that could only make it this far.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: It's not just allies who support each other. From your enemies, you learn so much and gain so much. Until the day you meet again... Just knowing they exist helps you to withstand the loneliness. Those who compete, even if they're enemies, help each other out.
author: Hiroko Seto

quote: We are searching for a place where we can live our lives in peaceful days. No wars, no stealing
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: If you keep your vision clear you will see the future. What happens in our future is our own responsibility.
author: Rem Saverem

quote: Although my heart may be weak, it’s not alone. It’s grom with each new experience. And it’s found a home with all the friends I’ve made. I’ve become a part of their heart, just as they’ve become part of mine. And if they think of me now and then, if they don’t forget me, then our hearts will be one. I don’t need a weapon. My friends are my power!
author: Sora

quote: Facing irrationality doesn't mean not feeling fear, but rather possessing eyes that gaze upon fear and standing against the world.
author: Ganta Igarashi

quote: How will you live if every little thing from your memories always hurts you easily?
author: Daiki Mamura

quote: "My heart controls the world." But who can I control if I'm the only one living in this world?
author: Yuyuka Nekota

quote: To be sure, love can kill, but always remember, hate can never save. Never!
author: Odette Bouquet

quote: Fear. That is what we live with. And we live it everyday. Only in death are we free of it.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: The most annoying thing is that I can't do anything for you, even though you're crying.
author: Daiki Mamura

quote: Human hearts are complicated mysteries.
author: Haqua du Lot Herminium

quote: Books are information. And information that isn't correct is worthless.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: The strong use their strength as their weapon. The weak use their weakness as their weapon.
author: Mizufa Trudy

quote: I feel no responsibility to comrades who've lost lives under my command. Because they chose to fight in each battle.. Just as I chose this. But if there is something that... I can do for them. Something I can do for the dead... Then it is to win! I must keep winning to attain my dream. The same one they clung to, and risked their lives for!! To realize my dream, I will perch on top of their corpses.. It is a blood-smeared dream, after all. I don't regret or feel guilty about it.. But to risk thousands of lives while never getting myself dirty. It's not a dream that can be so easily realized!
author: Griffith

quote: Thinking about whether it's because of jealousy or just saying it out loud by accident, aren't they all part of love? Love isn't always sweet.
author: Yuyuka Nekota

quote: Luck of the draw isn’t about luck. Luck doesn’t decide a match!
author: Hidehiro Harada

quote: Humans aren't made perfectly. Everyone lies. Even so... I've been careful not to tell lies that hurt others.
author: Light Yagami

quote: Some lies are necessary for giving children dreams.
author: Shimura Tae

quote: What I desire is a heart... A heart that understands emotions.
author: Gowther

quote: I refuse to stand by and watch you give up. I won't lose you, I can't. We'll walk away from this battle together.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Neither one nor the other, not a demon, but not a human either, no place no belong… I thought the only way was to carve out your own place, by force
author: Inuyasha

quote: Even the strongest of opponents always has a weakness.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: I know the loneliness of being a prisoner. I know the joy you feel when your friends come to rescue you and the fear of them being injured and defeated.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: I do not allow anyone acting against me to look down upon me.
author: Akashi Seijuurou

quote: Poetry over philosophy. Embroidery rather than cooking. Dance instead of chess. Be an unknowing angel. Every girl born in the country of roses is raised by these three words.
author: Elizabeth Midford

quote: I'm the one who selfishly decides who's my friend and who's not.
author: Yuyuka Nekota

quote: People who use others are stupid, but people who are used are even more stupid.
author: Aoyagi Ritsuka

quote: Have faith in your inspiration. Feel the imagination!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: You can’t stop fighting to play. Once you've lost that drive, you’ll start to lose your edge.
author: Yuusei Nishida

quote: That’s something you can’t know until you've tried it, and you still won’t understand after you play. I've been playing for 45 years and I still don’t understand. I've never been able to figure it out. That’s why I keep playing.
author: Hidehiro Harada

quote: Clouds... come here. Drops... fall here. Drive out the flames... tell him... that despite all of this... the world is still beautiful.
author: Nike Lemercier

quote: It's not difficult to compose poetry. You just have to translate your feelings into meter.
author: Kanade Ōe

quote: Humans only can reveal their true potential during an absolutely critical situation.
author: Anna Kyouyama

quote: Different people have different perspective. So, I won’t deny the fact that some people are annoyed with the way I am. In exchange for those negative feelings, I just want to be the person that I am in love with the most.
author: Yuuri Makita

quote: Over the course of several hundred years, I've seen many ages end, conflict between people, hatred, wicked hearts. I always have hope that the new age will purify all of that. How many times has it happened? People repeat themselves. They commit the same mistakes, over and over.... They haven't survived, not in true sense. The precious race called people has become extinct.
author: Zeref

quote: Girls are more fragile than you think. They can be hurt by the smallest things.
author: Suzume Yosano

quote: I’m a complete failure. At everything I do, I’m absolutely worthless. I know this, and yet I continue to burden the human race with my presence. Every day I rob the world of valuable air by breathing. I’m a thief, and I hate myself for it. I don’t deserve to exist. But even though I know it’s the right thing to do, I’m such a useless coward.
