I don’t even have the courage to jump!
author: Ritsu Sohma

quote: I'm not afraid of the times I can't see him. When I feel pain in my chest, my song grows... The scenery feels closer. The next time I see you... I will, once again, fall in love.
author: Nike Lemercier

quote: Watching messy troubles from the sidelines is a hobby of mine.
author: Tomoe

quote: The fun things, the painful things, the things that happened, the things we've cried about, the things we've smiled about, when we remember them, everything will be glittering.
author: Hirunaka no Ryuusei

quote: Even if you lovingly collect every last piece of a shattered cup, pieces are still pieces. Once something breaks, it can never return.
author: Ryuuguu Rena

quote: What you learn at your school is more important than where you go to school.
author: Mikoto Misaka

quote: It doesn’t matter how much we see each other, but how much we think of each other.
author: Sora

quote: If you run now, you will be running for the rest of your life.
author: Reborn

quote: Then just become stronger. I have my ambition, you have your ambition too. Which means you should just keep walking forward towards that goal.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: You won’t know if you don’t give it a try.
author: Takeshi Yamamoto

quote: We have walked through the darkness of this world, that’s why we are able to see even a sliver of light.
author: Gaara

quote: If you can no longer believe in the person you love, then test him until you are satisfied.
author: Bianchi

quote: They say that ill weeds grow apace, but... You know, the nice ones don't live long.
author: Yatori

quote: Whether I go or not, I'll die anyway. I have an organ more important than my heart. Although you can't see it, I feel it going through my head down to my feet, and I know it exists within me. It lets me stand on my feet, it lets me walk forward without trembling. If I stop here, I feel like it would break... My soul will break.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: All these things you guys seek....hard work, guts, faith....I'll crush them all.
author: Atsushi Murasakibara

quote: I was too bent on fulfilling my objectives… I failed to see things from a larger perspective. I failed to build up a good relationship with them.
author: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: The more material you possess, the harder you'll feel the loss.
author: Arima Teppei

quote: There is no telling what kind of pain will come  after me, but... if I stop believing because of that, if the hero should change, it'll turn into another story from the one my master left behind. Then it wont be Naruto! I can't write novels like my master did. That's why the sequel has to come from the life I live no matter how great the pain, I'll continue walking because that's who Naruto is!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: People only have substance within the memories of other people. And that's why there were all kinds of mes. There weren't a lot of mes per se, I was just inside all sorts of people, that's all.
author: Lain Iwakura

quote: Sometimes we women must fight too, don't underestimate us!
author: Gi-gan

quote: When I was little, I was teased because of my weight. I tried dieting, but diets always failed. Little by little I started feeling gloomy. I got to the point where I couldn't make friends, and I started hating myself more and more. I became completely unable to smile. I thought, no one in the world would ever like me the way I am now. But at the same time I also thought, if that's the way it is, then I should at least like myself.
author: Tsumugi Motohashi

quote: I was only able to get back to being a real doctor by saving your life! I realized that human lives have equal value by saving you! Nobody has the right to take another's life! I've been living as a doctor with that engraved upon my heart for years!
author: Kenzo Tenma

quote: No one really starts out kind. All we know how to do at first is want. We want food, we want attention... It's just natural survival instinct, I guess... But kindness is something that we all have to learn as we go. It's something that grows and develops slowly over time... The same way our bodies do...
author: Honda Tohru

quote: Humans have always spent a lot of time on love. I’m not too interested in karuta, but I’m willing to work hard for love.
author: Sumire Hanano

quote: Right, It's too late for doubts now. There is no returning from this place I've come to.
author: Inaho Kaizuka

quote: The rain, the wind, the sun... you bring them all with you. Every time our eyes meet. You bring the world to me.
author: Nike Lemercier

quote: If you have faith, your dreams will surely come true.
author: Katsura Kotarou

quote: You wouldn't get an answer no matter how much you think about it. Love is not Japanese nor Math. It doesn't need thoughts of reasons. You will be aware of it when that person is next to you.
author: Yuyuka Nekota

quote: Life is an incessant series of problems... all difficult, with brutally limited choices... and a time limit.
author: Chapel the Evergreen

quote: I've been thinking... for a long while. For what purpose was I born into this world? Whenever I resolved one question, another would arise in its place. I sought the beginning. I sought the end. I've just been walking and walking, thinking all the while. Perhaps nothing will change, no matter how far I go. If I'm to stop my journey, that is fine, too. Even if I were informed that everything has reached its end, I'd just accept it. But even so, I found an answer to yet another of my questions today.
author: Tamura Reiko

quote: If you lose something big, that nothing can replace it... Then it’s okay if you have more than one, right? Even if the number is small, whether it’s 10 or 100, if you gather them up then you will have a reason to go on!
author: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: Even if you're a main character, you can still die... I better be careful-ttebayo.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: The feeling of not wanting to lose, everyone has it. If you find it unfair, you’ll have to work harder yourself.
author: Shuuko Murao

quote: No one can say they grew up in a sterile room, never failing or making mistakes. Life is an ongoing process of trial and error.
author: Sonozaki Mion

quote: I've no interest in a "Reality".
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Even if I'm an outsider, even if I'm hers for only a moment, I wanted to become someone special to her. Just by being together with me, just for a little while, I wanted her to be happy.
author: Daiki Mamura

quote: We can no longer go back though, I’m totally different from that person in the past, you too. That was just a brief reminiscing of our past, that’s all.
author: Kou Mabuchi

quote: The "tsun" personality is an armor that protects purity. An iron virgin.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: You're like a cat. If I get close, you'll ignore me and go far away. If I get hurt, you'll play around to share the pain.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: There's only one world for us, and things in it are set up so that we can find happiness in it.
author: Ryuuguu Rena

quote: I'm only attracted to girls in games!! Reality is just a shitty game.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Love is the best way to fill a gap in the heart.
author: Elusia de Lute Ima

quote: Yes, I have no reason to take part in the Absurd and Unreasonable real world.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: A flower raised in a greenhouse is still beautiful, even though it knows no adversity. But a flower growing in the field that has braved wind, rain, cold, and heat possesses something more than just beauty.
author: Ryuuguu Rena

quote: Because it has powers that surpass everything, a king must cut off his own desires and never use it.
author: Durandal Tobari Kumohira

quote: Songs are great. They reach people no matter how far they are. Even to people dear to you, who are no longer here.
author: Kamisama No Memochou

quote: To enjoy an ordinary life, you must constantly evolve.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: They come without asking, and then they leave just the same. But once you meet them, even if nobody ever knows it, that encounter will change your life for the better.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: I do not think humans are foolish. I have respect for people who live fulfilled lives.
author: Decim

quote: Whether we move forward or stop, we're going in different directions little by little.
author: Suzume Yosano

quote: I don't believe in destiny. I always thought that it was nothing more than an overlap of coincidences. But if a meeting changes from chance to inevitable, that's what we call destiny.
author: You Miyagi

quote: Sometimes I think delinquents are people… Who still have hope that things still can get better if they just put up a SOS sign. But I don’t even have the will to lift that sign anymore.
author: Masamune Takano

quote: There are some people who possess certain things that money cannot buy... as if it as as natural as breathing...
author: Ryūichirō Isaka

quote: I don’t know what you’re aiming at, but you can’t expect to be perfect right off the bat. You have to build up your confidence… by achieving small tasks one by one.
author: Masamune Takano

quote: If I give my best and am told that I’m useless, then that’s my own fault. But being considered useless, without having even tried, is something I can’t allow.
author: Ritsu Onodera

quote: You're not the first person I went out with... But you're my first love.
author: Masamune Takano

quote: Love in real life isn’t as smooth as in manga...
author: Shōta Kisa

quote: When I’m shown something so pure and innocent, I’m forced to see the filthy part of myself even more and it pisses me off.
author: Masamune Takano

quote: Since then… I’ve started to think…about things with the worst case outcome first. By doing so, even if you did get hurt a little bit, it wouldn’t end up being a lasting wound.
author: Ritsu Onodera

quote: My problem is probably that I don’t have any confidence about anything I do. Even if the thing I want most is right in front of me, I can’t help but imagine a future where I’m being rejected by it. I’m scared of getting hurt, so I run away from the people I love. What a good-for-nothing loser.
author: Shōta Kisa

quote: I can’t shake the feeling that I’ve met you before, but I can’t remember where.
author: Masamune Takano

quote: Why do I always do this? I fall in love with someone, then I get all these and then I feel brokenhearted. And It's always my fault.
author: Shōta Kisa

quote: God, my face hurts from forcing smiles all night...
author: Ritsu Onodera

quote: I knew that it was pointless to hope for anything. I was so apathetic because of this sort of upbringing.
author: Masamune Takano

quote: If you don't feel anything for me, just leave me alone. I don't want your tepid kindness.
author: Suzume Yosano

quote: When things change, isn't it better to get used to the new situation quickly? If that's the case, it's better to know what you have to do. Rejecting everything and doing things half-heartedly won't make it any easier. Hanging onto your pride will only weigh you down. So, to make life easier, sometimes it's best to go along with what other people want. As I said, it's just like the old saying: "When in Rome, do as the Romans do". Instead of others forcing it upon you, it's easier for you to want to do it yourself, right? You should try it, Mikoto. You'll be happier.
author: Tooru Kouno

quote: When you said that we were scary, that means deep down, you had started to care about us! The thought of losing someone again… That’s the scary part, right?
author: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: You all underestimate humans. Individually, they may appear weak, but that is not the case. What we need to recognize is that humans are a single life-form comprised of millions of individuals. Besides their individual brains, humans possess a different "brain" of enormous magnitude. The moment we act in opposition to that brain, we will lose.
author: Tamura Reiko

quote: An apple a day keeps any one away, if you throw it hard enough!
author: Marie Mjolnir

quote: People are mirrors. If you smile, a smile will be reflected.
author: Zeno

quote: I'm pathetic. I was observing the world from a safe distance. I was just scared of being hurt. I was lonely.
author: Amano Yukiteru

quote: You own the world, but you've never looked at any of it. What a waste.
author: Nike Lemercier

quote: To me, death is not the scariest thing at all.
author: Mikan Sakura

quote: We’re searching for a reason of existence. With our own strength, because maybe the truth is that there’s no reason for life from the very beginning. Everyone hopes and tries so hard to find a reason of existence. The reason of birth, of staying with someone, of existence, believing we have to find them all with our own hands. Like finding a place for ourselves in dreams, in jobs, in people. The reasons we conclude may be indefinite and fragile. We may lose it too, but even so, we want a reason. As long as I’m alive, I want it too. If possible, I want to find a reason of existence within a person, within someone.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: There are things that take a long time to acquire. Friends. Love. Really, nothing has been a waste.
author: Megumi Hanajima

quote: I won’t accept it! I want to have a choice, too! I don’t want to write poems about regret.
author: Sumire Hanano

quote: Destiny is a mysterious thing. It lets people reach their intended destinations.
author: Iraha Lemercier

quote: Any harm that comes to me because of you is harm that I need. I want to share your pain. So I want you to let me fight. With you.
author: Nike Lemercier

quote: The world just exists to hurt people and to be conquered. To survive, you mow down your enemies and take what you want.
author: Livius Orvinus Ifrikia

quote: You always seem to look back. The scenery in front of you, the people near you, don't you see it? Live right now. That's what life is.
author: Izumi Yukihira

quote: There will be some who give up because they are dissatisfied... But some feel unsettled and are lonely. So if... one day we could all laugh freely together... We, who are all in the same circumstances, can help each other... I think that will be more comforting than anything else and will also chase away loneliness.
author: Yuu Tobita

quote: Work together with everyone, motivating one another...even though they may not be your close friends, you can still understand each another. I'm looking forward to bonding with more people.
author: Mikan Sakura

quote: Will you stay by my side? Will you watch as we uncover a harsh truth that was meant to remain buried, and share in the pain that comes with the act?
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: I used to think that eating was only consuming needed nutrients. I never thought it could fill the emptiness in me.
author: Teito Klein

quote: A light comes out of the darkness. A heart that makes a flower bloom in the wilderness journeys through the sky. Music changes the world.
author: Haruka Nanami

quote: I know that I'm not alone, but I want to be strong even when I am.
author: Taichi Mashima

quote: It’s vulgar and foolish to spend all your time thinking about love!
author: Kanade Ōe

quote: Humans and spirits. We're indeed different beings, but that is why understanding each other is meaningful.
author: Tatara Phoron

quote: I don't need some ring or some throne! If it means that I won't lose you... I would throw everything away!
author: Livius Orvinus Ifrikia

quote: What you need are feelings and experiences. The feelings of the person seeking the rain must be in concert with those of the person making it.
author: Nike Lemercier

quote: Don't bother coming to the darkness that you don't need to see... I don't want to show you the darkness that doesn't belong to you... Don't let yourself be hurt so much anymore... Rather, let me be your strength.
author: Natsume Hyuuga

quote: Crying over ill luck won't do you any good. You must believe tomorrow will be better than today and smile.
author: Amane Rui

quote: Songs move people's hearts and make them passionate.
author: Haruka Nanami

quote: Those who aren't geniuses only have effort. All you can do is use effort to compensate for a deficiency of talent.
author: Kurusu Syo

quote: The society you all live in has long since turned into the Liar Game. Still, what all of you demonstrated through this game is that 'Believing' is by no means, an easy path to follow. Sometimes, taking it means allowing yourself be deceived or suffering heavy damage you will not ever recover from. And yet, 'Trust' born when you forget your personal interests and join forces to fight against the odds together holds tremendous power.
author: Artier

quote: Don't succumb to panic. Only those who see the bigger picture win.
author: Akiyama Shinichi

quote: The question is what does it take to be the one in control? Money? Brains? Strategic Prowess? Of course, all three are very important. However, there is something that outshines them all and provides a faster and more effective way to victory. And that is... information. The one in possession of information will be able to easily become the ruler of the liar game.
author: Yokoya Norihiko

quote: A former teacher of mine, Okabe-sensei, was always saying this to me: 'To believe people is to doubt them.'... meaning if you keep doubting people and searching what's inside them, sooner or later you're bound to understand something about them. And when you do, you'll be able to entrust something to them. That is what it means to trust and believe.
author: Akiyama Shinichi

quote: Accident or amnesia, you can't rewind your life and start again. If you struggle, you'll just hurt yourself, and the people around you.
author: Tada Banri

quote: Do you need a reason to not want to lose?
author: Shōyō Hinata

quote: The most precious thing is different for every human. They resist and kill each other because of their difference. It has nothing to do with the inability to sense the other's most important thing.
author: Shijima Kurookano

quote: It is a tasteless life if you don't have something you regret.
author: Inu X Boku SS

quote: Maybe everything you wish for won't become stars, but if you have a dream to believe in, they'll be thousands of the most glittering jewels in the night sky.
author: Ichinose Hayato

quote: The beating of a heart is the first source of music!
author: Shining Saotome

quote: If we love someone, we need to tell them about it. That way, we'll feel relieved and a lot stronger.
author: Suzume Yosano

quote: I never knew until the first years came, that we all cared about different things.
author: Chihaya Ayase

quote: I’ve been in your shoes. I was also given a chance. There’s no rush. You’ll get better very soon.
author: Tsutomu Komano

quote: There were many tears, many unsure times, and many troubled moments. The fun memories were only a few, but even so, those memories will shine bright like stardust and continue to shine on in my heart.
author: Suzume Yosano

quote: I knew this was a losing battle. Even though the outcome was obvious, I still wanted to bet on that one millimeter of a possibility.
author: Satsuki Shishio

quote: I always wanted to become stronger. At first it was to protect myself. Next, it was to protect Hak, who gave up everything for me. Now, it's to repay my friends, who enabled me to live.
author: Yona

quote: I'm always just waiting. Waiting for someone to reach out to me. But at the same time, I'm really self-conscious and a coward.
author: Chizuru Ooshima

quote: Justice. I can't think of another word more loved by the people. It does have a nice ring to it. However, without ever exercising your own strength, you seek the death of others at the hands of someone else. Well, the justice you refer to smells pretty rotten to me.
author: Balalaika

quote: To turn someone down and to be turned down by someone... To be hurt by someone and to hurt someone... A love where no one gets hurt doesn't exist.
author: Suzume Yosano

quote: Even though I'm expressionless, being told that I'm annoying still hurts.
author: Suzume Yosano

quote: In this world with only despair, how do you live?
author: Shuntarou Chishiya

quote: Our minds don't work the way we expect them to.
author: Suzume Yosano

quote: Honestly, someone who asks someone else to convey their feelings for them is the worst.
author: Daiki Mamura

quote: If I'd known that the end would come so fast, I would have said so much more.
author: Daiki Mamura

quote: Does it really matter that people don't like you?
author: Shizuku Mizutani

quote: If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, "I persevered." Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered.
author: Kyoko Honda

quote: Even if you can forget, you can't erase the past.
author: Kenzo Tenma

quote: Hatred is born when people gather together.
author: Johann Liebert

quote: I'm not sure why I've decided to do this. I'm not any stronger than I was, and nothing else has changed. But all the same, this time I'm not going to run away. It's okay to feel weak sometimes. It's okay to be afraid. The important thing is that we face our fears. That's... that's what makes us strong.
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: The hungrier one is, the more satisfying one's dinner.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: If it's a wish that can be fulfilled, then fulfill it. If there's hesitation and worries, then remove the sources of worries altogether.
author: Yoite

quote: An illusion is darkness. Those who cannot see the darkness cannot resist its sweet temptation and are stained black. Eventually the darkness envelops the light controlling everything.
author: Luka Crosszeria

quote: Human beings don't feel pain with their bodies. The brain is the thing that transmits the pain to the body.
author: Madoka Shishito

quote: With death staring you in the face, you truly understand what it means to be alive.
author: Saori Shibuki

quote: To leave the first tracks, we must go somewhere nobody's been yet.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: Phones, the internet - having the means alone doesn't lead to communication.
author: Saitō-sensei

quote: I wonder if our hearts really do determine our feelings. Or are they just some sort of aroma in the air?
author: Jinno Yuu

quote: What about when you reciprocate someone else’s emotions? Is that still coming from you… or is the air connecting you to one another?
author: Jinno Yuu

quote: Why are you looking for something when you can't even remember what it is?
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: There’s no such thing as a person who doesn’t belong. You’re here because there’s someone who wants you to be here.
author: Seki Kenji

quote: Embrace that feeling. Love’s never rational.
author: Suzuura Natsuki

quote: Romance is just trying to convey your feelings to another person.
author: Tadashi Isogai

quote: It would be cruelest to keep your hopes up when I already know the answer.
author: Shizuku Mizutani

quote: There's nothing more repulsive than being touched by a guy you don't like.
author: Natsume Asako

quote: Inability to overcome fear is human.
author: Yun

quote: Whether we die or not, isn't really that big a deal.
author: Juuzou Suzuya

quote: Prodigies don't understand how the incompetent feel.
author: Yun

quote: Life is built upon the taking of another life. If you have the resolve to kill, then you have the obligation to eat.
author: Usagi Yuzuha

quote: When the guarantee of safety is dangled right in front of their eyes, humans will turn their eye from probability.
author: Saori Shibuki

quote: Whether it's on the other side of the planet, or right in front of one's eyes, as long as one is safe, it doesn't matter how many others die. Isn't that humanity?
author: Shuntarou Chishiya

quote: Games are not boring. Games purify our souls and leave room for new development that challenges the mind! They are the products of human wisdom!
author: Seto Kaiba

quote: Life really is a mysterious thing. Each and every life spins its own, totally separate tale, yet they become intricately entwined in each other. And no one knows how they will end up.
author: Decim

quote: There is strength in words... Sometimes, they become words of power. I thought that if I said I'm fine, then I really would be fine. But it's no use... It doesn't work.
author: Ik-su

quote: A heaven that only watches has no meaning.
author: Su-won

quote: Making a fuss won't fix anything.
author: Hak Son

quote: Even if they were mistakes, all you have to do is keep walking down that mistaken path. Simply assume that nothing lies before you except mistaken paths. Just so you know, the "right" path can be surprisingly dull. There are times when it's right to take the mistaken path. The moment you decide a path is right, all of the paths behind it become right, regardless of what it originally was.
author: Tsuyoto Hiiragi

quote: You're afraid to face what you know you must. So instead... you run away. The air that you said was smothering you... you know that it can also heal you. But you refuse to let it. You refuse to let anyone see you for your true self. You're too afraid of what you might lose. You're running away because you're afraid to admit your feelings even to yourself.
author: Kazuma Sohma

quote: You can't bring back what you've lost, think about what you have now!
author: Jinbei

quote: This is the law of conservation of mass. Somebody's "happiness" is somebody else's "unhappiness". That's why I tried to be a "rubbish bin" for those guys who played othello on my back using white and black thumbtacks. My crying and screaming meant something, 'cause they were laughing... But I was wrong. It doesn't make sense, does it? If I enjoy being unhappy, that "happiness" will make someone else "unhappy"!
author: Madoka Shishito

quote: If you tell a bald man his head is useful in the dark, you'll get punched in the face. Santa Claus says such cruel things.
author: Ayumu Kasuga

quote: People derive their happiness in a variety of ways, even though it might seem cruel.
author: Adashino

quote: I think that "truth" is something that is covered up most of the time.
author: Lloyd Asplund

quote: When a man bleeds freely for the sake of other people, it's only proper to pretend that you never saw it.
author: Gen Takekura

quote: I want to hear it again, yet I don't want to hear it again. I want to see her, yet I don't want to see her. What do you call this kind of feeling again?
author: Kousei Arima

quote: There are times when people who are different cannot understand each other. Even if you think you understand the other person, you really don't. And what awaits in the end, usually, is despair.
author: Corticarte Apa Lagranges

quote: Whose fault is it that things ended up like this? Coincidence? An accident? Fate? There's no such thing as fate. It's simply a combination of one circumstance and the next. And who is it that creates those circumstances? Who is it? It's you.
author: Rize Kamishiro

quote: All suffering in the world is born from an individual's incompetence.
author: Yakumo Oomori

quote: Everyone is the main character of their own life.
author: Kaito Kuroba

quote: As of this moment, you're my official assistant. Your arms, your legs, your eyes, your ears, your throat, your nails, your teeth, and your tongue. Even the last drop of your blood. They all belong to me now.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: There are many things in this world that can't be protected simply by thinking of them or praying for them. To protect our lambs from having their dreams stolen and fading into despair, we Bishops bear arms and fight.
author: Castor

quote: As long as you keep anything about me within you... Always, my heart will be with you.
author: Frau

quote: Help can come from unexpected corners.
author: Kokoro Yome

quote: To truly love someone, is to always put their feelings before your own... no matter what.
author: Saki Hanajima

quote: In this world, there are crimes too depraved to ever be forgiven.
author: Tomio Ookawa

quote: Evil doesn't always seep out. It's possible to hide it if you’re careful and skilled.
author: Dog

quote: It is pointless to question who someone really is. All you can do is believe and accept. Because the way you perceive someone is their true identity.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: Just as no matter how hard you try to keep it away, despair will attack you again and again. In the same manner, hope will return to you. Again and again.
author: Kazuma Sohma

quote: God spares no salvation to those who would beg for it. Nor is he merciful to those who would beseech his benevolence. These petty requests are no invocation to god. They are your death.
author: Alucard

quote: We're always trying to justify our actions with ideals. But ideals cannot give grounds for killing another person. The act of taking a life will always be considered... evil.
author: Yoshimura

quote: When you get anxious about the future, it is better not to think about it. The more you think about it the more anxious you'll get. Of course it's important to think about what lies ahead, too, but if you only look at what's down the road, you'll get tangled by the "laundry" by your feet and fall, won't you? You see, it's also important to think about what you can do now. What you can do today, and if you keep washing things one at a time, you'll be done before you know it. Sometimes the anxiety will start to well up, but when it does... take a little break. Read a book, watch tv, or eat soumen with everyone.
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: A king is no king without his people. But people without a king are lost as well!
author: Lan Fan

quote: If someone lives, they will surely die. That is the absolute rule of this world.
author: Kazuki Kazami

quote: I've always lived in a world of deceit. And amidst the lies, I was able to find my true treasure.
author: Teito Klein

quote: There are always lazy people to deal with when you act as a group. Splitting into pairs and handling out jobs is more efficient.
author: Kazuki Kazami

quote: Because of our weakness, we trained our eyes, ears and the ability to think. Learning how to survive, that's our trait as humans! The human species can't use magic and can't even perceive it—but because we are weak, we have the wisdom to run away from magic and the intelligence to see through it! We don't have any extraordinary senses. But because we are weak, by learning and gaining experience, we gained the wisdom to achieve the unachievable—to predict the future...Rejoice! We are humans
author: Sora

quote: I believe that "I could have done something" is the most frustrating regret of them all.
author: Kazuki Kazami

quote: I don't think anyone is born with a reason to live. It's something you have to find for yourself.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: That makes four time. Listen. The more you say, "I'm sorry", the lesser it's worth.
author: Kazuki Kazami

quote: A life that lives without doing anything is the same as a slow death.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: In this world, there is only good and evil, that was the first universal truths I grasped from observing the world around me when I was a child. Every human being without exception ends up falling into one category or the other.
author: Mikami Teru

quote: I'd rather die with someone than let that person die before my eyes. More so if she's a girl like you.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: Those who win are not strong. It is those who lose and crawl back up who are strong.
author: Medaka Kurokami

quote: You see, the world will not change through naive talks.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: God, just how long are they going to squabble over such pointless things? They are all the same in my eyes. Nothing but a bunch of trash. Light and Darkness. Good and Evil. Poison and Antidote. Winning and Losing. Strength and Weakness. Black and White. Success and Failure. Happiness or Sorrow... They're all the same after all. Why hasn't everyone realized this already...
author: Najimi Ajimu

quote: There was no reason for me to get attacked by you. And therefore, there was no reason to dodge.
author: Medaka Kurokami

quote: You think something like that would hurt, after all I've been through?
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: I could give you baseless hope through empty encouragement, but you'd just make the same mistake again. You won't live long if you don't own up to your failures.
author: Mononobe Yuu

quote: There are some people who are rich and stay in beautiful places but are still unhappy. There are some people who are poor, but happy. In the end, happiness or sadness, only the person can determine.
author: Alicia Florence

quote: Whether a fish lives in a clear stream or a water ditch, so long as it continues swimming forward, it will grow up beautifully.
author: Korosensei

quote: People can only truly understand things that they've actually experienced.
author: Lichtendahl Tsery

quote: This is something my master used to say. "Kids who are too obedient and never think of themselves are the hardest to watch."
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: When cats are near death, they leave their owner's side, right? I'm sure that's exactly how I feel. I want to disappear while they can think, "What a noisy, stupid girl she was, I wonder if she's doing okay."
author: Makina Irisu

quote: At that point in my life, I couldn't find any value in anything. I was a brat who may as well be dead.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: Sometimes living can be hard! But it's only because we're alive that we can make each other laugh, cry, and be happy!
author: Honda Tohru

quote: We humans can indeed lose again something we've lost already.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: I'm not asking you to love me. No, actually, please don't love me. But please let me be in love with you.
author: Fuyou Kaede

quote: People who perish in other’s battles are worms… If one can’t live their life the way they want, they might as well die.
author: Guts

quote: Most birds fly, but there are some species of flightless birds. I suspect that Princess Asseylum might say that she find it sad that they cannot fly even though they have wings. But their inability to fly does not trouble them in the least. On the contrary, perhaps the ones to be pitied are the birds who can fly, but kept in a cage.
author: Slaine Troyard

quote: The sun may be wonderful but can you live on that alone? We all live because of the wind, the clouds, and the rain. They're not things you can throw out just because they're temporarily inconvenient, right?
author: Nike Lemercier

quote: There is nothing shameful about running away. Some things are just out of people's hands. If you think you're gonna die, just run.
author: Broken Blade

quote: History books are rewritten with the changing of times. At any rate, classroom lectures are worlds apart from the battlefield.
author: Zess

quote: It is far more difficult to capture an enemy than to kill them. Capturing a soldier involves three times the effort and three times the danger. If you wish to save the life of an enemy soldier, remember that you'll lose three of your own in the process.
author: Baldr

quote: Broken promises, regardless of how horrid transform into rage that stinks to the ocean floor. Through those bonds, we're drawn together countless times.
author: Narumi Fujishima

quote: Fear deals a crippling blow to soldiers. Be it a single man or a million soldiers, it makes no difference. Man can deny neither hunger nor fear.
author: Borcuse

quote: It looks like you're wishing you had died instead of someone else, but... isn't it wrong to think that way? No one can take the place of another. Each person has his own destiny.
author: Momo

quote: Have you ever imagined how it feels to be treated like you don't exist? You're right there, but you get treated like you're not. You're denied everything - every day your heart gets carved up and you experience disappointment again and again, but you have to smile anyway. Do you know how that feels?
author: Ryūto Sakurai

quote: One thing I'm especially good at is finding Yano, whenever or wherever he may be. Because he's the one I love.
author: Nanami Takahashi

quote: No one actually knows what's best or what the future holds. Until you actually see the results, no one ever knows. So at the very least, why don't we rely on what we do know. Let's keep the feelings that we have right now precious. Even though it seems like our lives never change, they slowly do. And just like how we never notice... the changing of the seasons... the same goes for our hearts.
author: Nanami Takahashi

quote: Readers betray their authors.
author: Miu Asakura

quote: Even if a fool dies, he won't be cured.
author: Atsushi Shimao

quote: Sometimes not lying can be a sin too, can't it?
author: Rokka Shimao

quote: It's not over yet. If we don't end it, nothing can start. Even if nothing at all begins, we must still put an end to it.
author: Yoshino Takigawa

quote: What's wrong with wanting to keep the man you love out of harm's way?
author: Hakaze Kusaribe

quote: If I got angry at every little thing, my body wouldn't be able to hold it all.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: It's not like we lost anything when there was nothing between us to start with. We could never really be equals. I've always been alone.
author: Izumiko Suzuhara

quote: Snowdrop. I also don't know what I'm looking for. What does the future hold? Will I be able to not forget what I have found?
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: Even if he hates me, being able to die with the knowledge that the one I love will never forget me… there is no greater happiness a woman could desire.
author: Hakaze Kusaribe

quote: O anger, turn to heat, dry up my brains! This mad thirst for vengeance must be quenched… no matter how cruel and merciless I must become!
author: Mahiro Fuwa

quote: To lose the woman you loved, not even being able to grieve… if not a tragedy, what is it?
author: Hakaze Kusaribe

quote: Forty thousand brothers could not, with all their quantity of love, make up my sum.
author: Yoshino Takigawa

quote: Profit could warm his coin purse, but never his back.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: One can hardly lose what one does not already have.
author: Horo

quote: It's good to not have any enemies, but it's normal to unintentionally make a few along the way.
author: Saya Irino

quote: To me, nothing is painful. There is no such thing as anguish. Even if some things seem like they hurt, deep down, everyone is a nice person. We can understand each other, or so I thought
author: Mato Kuroi

quote: Noblesse oblige. You have the power but not using that power is a sin.
author: Nyx

quote: It might be ridiculous to save the people. But when there are sad people in front of us... we can't just ignore them.
author: Angelique

quote: A smile is a seed of happiness. Anything can be made with it.
author: Kai

quote: Are you not your own master? You should walk the path you desire. No one else should be able to stop you.
author: Jet

quote: My hands can cultivate the earth. They can plant trees and sow seeds. They can even carry the manager. But will I ever be able to make her smile like that?
author: Ryōsuke Hazuki

quote: If there's a start, there's a finish. There's no rain that doesn't stop falling at some point. Not as long as you're alive anyway.
author: Ryōsuke Hazuki

quote: When it's time for the flowers to bloom, they'll bloom. When it's time for spring to come, it'll come.
author: Atsushi Shimao

quote: I called his name again and again. And I learned that each time, nothing called back. I learned that no matter how much you want something, how many times you scream to it, sometimes it's out of reach. I decided to stop calling out for someone who would never call back.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: Live a pleasant life in the unpleasant world.
author: Rokka Shimao

quote: Life is short, so fall in love, dear maiden, before your youthful ardor cools off, for there is no tomorrow.
author: Atsushi Shimao

quote: At the end of my life, it was just the two of us... You told me not to leave then so I decided not to go anywhere.
author: Atsushi Shimao

quote: Without a body, I can't even cry. Why am I here? I can't go anywhere. I'm neither here nor there. Who am I here for? What am I here for?
author: Atsushi Shimao

quote: Now, now, these things happen to everyone... EXCEPT ME!!!!! That's for making fun of my masterpiece! If there's one thing I hate, it's criticism!
author: Kenji Harima

quote: Until just recently, the stars were something I only saw by myself.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: When you go easy on the ones with just a bit of power, they give you more trouble than anybody else.
author: Madara

quote: This frustrating happiness... Days so warm it almost makes you dizzy. By this time next year... It may be time for me to stop looking away and know for real. Since I've decided to protect the Book of Friends... Since I decided to accept what I hear and see.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: I don't have much power and I'm trying to get stronger. But I'm not afraid of sharing my heart...
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: If the words are of rage and hate, I must accept them. I've run for so long but I can never forget.
author: Yobiko

quote: Was he the kind of master who would leave you behind? If you decided in your hearts to serve him, then believe in your master.
author: Hiiragi

quote: It's strange isn't it. The two groups, which looked like they hated each other, are now shining the same color as they vanish into the distant sky.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: There are still times when our different ways of thinking make me hesitate but I feel like there are ways we can balance each other because we're different.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: There are things you can't have no matter how much you want them. So it's easier to just forget them.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: Don't lie if you don't have to.
author: Kaname Tanuma

quote: When I look at their kind smiles and thought that I was supposed to be there smiling too... I couldn't stop crying. It hurt so much that I wanted to forget.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: They're part of who I am. No matter how much they hurt, they're important to me.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: When we first met, you set my heart ablaze. When I see you, all I can do is gaze. Gaze at the beauty and wonder that is you. The constellation Gemini will make me think of me and you. You are my Yami and I am your Hikari. I love you, my Yami. Now and forever.
author: Yūgi Mutō

quote: If you don’t do something because you think you can’t do it, you’ll never be able to do anything in the future.
author: Kira Yamato

quote: There were two kinds of strength. One was the strength that came with having something to protect. The other was the strength of having nothing to lose.
author: Horo

quote: Meals are always better with lots of people at the table.
author: Kido Tsubomi

quote: Even if your heart feels like it's been stabbed, it won't bleed or leave a scar behind. There'll be someone who'll help you bear the pain. It'll all work out, so don't brood over it. No matter how much it seems to hurt, it's all just a trick of the mind.
author: Saya Irino

quote: So what if you're an aristocrat?! Dying for the sake of honor is something an idiot does!
author: Saito Hiraga

quote: A lie that can't be disproven is no different from the truth.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: Even if you want to tell him and want to be with him, sometimes, that's not enough.
author: Tateyama Ayano

quote: No world is more painful to live in than this one.
author: Strength

quote: You can't get hurt without also hurting others.
author: Mato Kuroi

quote: Even when you want to say something, there are times when you'll lose the chance to.
author: Tateyama Ayano

quote: The more you rush, the less careful you become. Even a cautious rat will show its tail.
author: Henrietta de Tristain

quote: Death comes at the very end, doesn't it? Until that time comes, do your best at living!
author: Louise Françoise Le Blanc de La Vallière

quote: Damn. My eyes are naturally drawn in her direction. Is this the unibreastal law of gravitation? Leave it to Sir Isaac Newtit.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: I'm not rude... I just wasn't taught to politely pretend to be nice to people I can't stand.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Colors and lies both get blacker as you add more. Add enough red, and it'll turn black too.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: Even if it is a game... There are some things I just can't lose.
author: Basara Tōjō

quote: At this point, no matter how I change, the things I've lost won't come back.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: Why is it that the beautiful things are entwined more deeply with death than with life?
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: We do not give a starving man a fish. We teach him how to fish and make him independent.
author: Yukino Yukinoshita

quote: Maybe life has no equal trade, maybe you can give up all you got, and get nothing back. Even if I can't prove it's true, I have to try, for your sake, Al.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Loathe me, o fierce deity. Accept and awaken to your maelstrom of hate...god of calamity, Yato!
author: Rabō

quote: Duh!! There's no such thing as free wish.
author: Yato

quote: I believe that hope exists in the despair of certain death. Like a speck of gold dust buried in a gray gravel.
author: Seiken Tsukai no World Break

quote: Whenever we pray for someone's happiness, someone else must be cursed in exchange.
author: Sayaka Miki

quote: You should treat me with awe and wonder!
author: Yato

quote: Talent is a key factor, of course, but without some luck on your side you're likely to fail.
author: Reiko Mikami

quote: I wonder when I got into the habit of writing messages to nobody.
author: Takaki Tohno

quote: It doesn't do any good to pretend you can't see what's going on.
author: Yuuya Mochizuki

quote: I find no fault with you when it comes to standing against your enemy with courage. However, every few have the strength to sheath their sword once it's out.
author: Gildarts Clive

quote: Music speaks louder than words.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: No, things can change. But things don't have to change. Whatever is fine.
author: Hikari Sakishima

quote: People usually fall in love based on looks. But their true self might be very different from how they look.
author: Nagihiko Fujisaki

quote: Being in love is a difficult situation. Too much to bear, you can't help it. You can't control yourself to the extent that you're sad and in pain, and your heart is full.
author: Uroko

quote: There are no lives in this world that shouldn't be valued.
author: Moroha Haimura

quote: I was wrong, kindness is pointless.
author: Shū Ouma

quote: There isn't a chain in this world for a person to chain down another.
author: Moroha Haimura

quote: Those who do well, respect their chances. Those who pass on chances, may never be presented with that chance again.
author: Detective Conan

quote: What's wrong with change? In life, if you don't take shortcuts, you're the only one losing out.
author: Chihiro Iwasaki

quote: To deceive your enemy, begin with your ally.
author: Hattori Heiji

quote: The spell always breaks in the end. Girls will always transform back into their original shabby form. After that, you only have your own strength to rely on to accomplish anything.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: Admirals without soldiers are equivalent to fixed stars without planets. Their lights will only illuminate the darkness without any effect.
author: Dietrich Saucken

quote: No matter how much is in your heart, if you don’t tell that person, then it’s meaningless.
author: Junjou Romantica

quote: We don't have time to waste asking for the things we don’t have, we can only look for the best way to fight with the things we do have.
author: Hiruma Youichi

quote: What's the use of looking towards the past? If past data dictates reality... then our 33,1 winning percentage last year means we shouldn't even be playing the Mariners and their 66,7 winning percentage.
author: Toua Tokuchi

quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
author: Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei

quote: There is a word "world". Until about the time I was in middle school, I vaguely thought the word meant the area where the signals from my cell would reach.
author: Voices of a Distant Star

quote: You can take a picture of something and it never does it justice... I think about that sometimes when I see a picture of you.
author: Mikako Nagamine

quote: "I'm different.", "It has nothing to do with me.", "It's all happening in a different world." Turning away from reality like that is just a kind of inadvertent malice...
author: Tieria Erde

quote: The past is gone, you can not change it! But the future is based on the decision you make!
author: Yūgi Mutō

quote: My name is Duck. Yes, like the bird. Take it up with my parents. They never loved me!
author: Ahiru Arima

quote: Water, 35 litres. Carbon, 20 kg. Ammonia, 4 litres. Lime, 1.5 kg. Phosphorus, 800 g. Salt, 250 g. Niter, 100 g. Sulphur, 80 g. Fluoride, 7.5 g. Iron, 5 g. Silicon, 3g. And fifteen other elements. Those are the elements to make an average adult human body. You can buy these elemental ingredients at the market with the pocket money of a child. Humans are made so cheaply.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Listen up! Youth doesn't last all that long! These precious three years of your youth will zip by and you'll be left with nothing but regrets if you spend them running away in delusions and fantasies, so you have to make it clear whether you like someone or not!
author: Akira Fujieda

quote: Only one thing separates dangerous people and safe people: whether they know you or not. If they think you're a good person, they will all smile back at you.
author: Claude Claudel

quote: You don't dress stylishly or put on makeup to impress guys. You do it to keep other girls in their place.
author: Rika Yoshitake

quote: What a strange creature is man, who would cage himself so willingly.
author: Athena Areios

quote: Happy encounters and bittersweet memories, if there is nothing meaningful in the meeting itself and it's all about having met him, then what would be the true meaning of actually meeting him and the significance of wanting to meet him again?
author: Harriet Bartholomew

quote: Humans are nothing but the thread from which the dream of life is woven.
author: Kim

quote: The future has shown us with its glorious brilliance the time to seize our destiny and conquer all our fear is now! In ancient times, man rubbed sticks together and created fire, then they slaughtered the whales and battled one another for oil. After that, came the atomic age. In every chapter of our history, we've danced with danger. But now, for the first time in existence, we will be delivered from fear. Finally, we will escape the prison of our illusions and the beautiful night will embrace us all. It's already too late! I will live by this and I will die by this!
author: Dr. Franken Von Vogler

quote: To live is to undertake a journey - no, to undertake a journey is to live. To face the wind or to follow it, all journeys lead to the gates of death... The light in which all journeys are taken is deceptive - not hopeful, but sorrowful. And the struggle never ends. Everywhere on the earth is fleeting life. We are blown by the wind. The words we write in the sand disappear and finally, when we are swallowed by the sea we do not hear the waves. The humblest of creatures must face these dreadful barriers. No-not barriers, but challenges rather...
author: Guibu

quote: If someone were to drown in the seas for my sake, then I would be released from stone and return to life... to live once more. But if I were to return to life one day, which would give me the most important thing - I would then cry alone. I would cry longing for my stone. Of what use would my blood even be if it were to ripen like wine for it would not be able to bring back the one who loved me most from the water's depth.
author: Cossette d'Auvergne

quote: Living forever means that the suffering of life also continues forever.
author: Sakura Hiraga

quote: Oh, you're one of those guys... You don't care if somebody beats the crap out of you, but if someone lays a finger on a family member, you completely freak out. What a waste...
author: Greed

quote: Look, look around carefully. Strain your eyes. At the darkness around us... At the darkness... around me. You said, "anywhere but here". This is where. Here at the border. Gathered by the winds. Those who've met their final destiny hanging between jealousy and regret. Those who failed, swept together here. You say "It doesn't matter where". If you follow me, this is where you'll go! This is your Eden!
author: Guts

quote: It is actually more difficult to trust those who have no talent for scheming.
author: Lemrina Vers Envers

quote: An unreasonable situation deserves an unreasonable solution.
author: Kinichirou Imamura

quote: Before my eyes, it blocks my path. A high, high wall. What sort of scene is on the other side? What will I be able to see there? “The view from the top”. A scenery I will never be able to see on my own. But if I’m not alone, then... I might be able to see it.
author: Shōyō Hinata

quote: There is no encounter without meaning. I've encountered many people on my journey, and those meetings meant something.
author: Cardfight!! Vanguard G

quote: For some time researchers have understood that moderate stress has beneficial effects. It boosts the immune system for example. Stress motivates and prepares us for action. It compels our body to survive. However, routine psycho pass checks take away the stress from us. There are patients whose stress reaction is so numb, they can’t even recognize the basic stimulation of their senses. Once that happens, it’s a neurological downward spiral, they become like living corpses. Eventually their autonomic nervous system stops working and their vital functions shut down.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: Instead of humans who lie and cheat each other to get richer, I prefer animals who hunt to survive.
author: Detective Conan

quote: Death is not the end of life, it's the completion of life.
author: Irina

quote: I’m afraid of myself, because... I'm a monster.
author: Inori Yuzuriha

quote: Who a person hangs out with is their choice. And I couldn't care less about rumors. Until I tried talking to them myself, I wouldn't know...
author: Shougo Kiryuu

quote: The way of the sword lies in one's heart. As long as you have your heart, you can live even without the sword.
author: Mitsuyoshi Jubei Yagyu

quote: The way you perceive yourself doesn't match the way others perceive you. Those who work hard despite that discrepancy shine brighter than anyone else!
author: Kō Ōsaki

quote: The winner should not question his victory. If anything, your actions were responsible for making your own luck.
author: Baby Steps

quote: Just like wine, some human relationships need time to mature.
author: Daisuke Aramaki

quote: When you go to save someone you have to consider yourself, as well. If you can’t all say “Thank Goodness” together, then those who are saved aren’t saved.
author: Miharu Rokujou

quote: “Miracles don't exist in this world. All that exists are accidents, inevitabilities and the actions that one takes.” That’s Himura’s favorite phrase, isn’t it? But sometimes the outcome of your actions, which becomes inevitable, will overlap with accidents, and fulfill your dream unexpectedly. I don’t know if that can be called a miracle, but there’s one thing I’m certain about. Nothing will happen if you don’t wish for it.
author: ef: a tale of memories

quote: Whether we live or die isn't a big issue. If you focus on being alive, you develop fear. Your eyes get clouded. But if you have no such feelings... you are capable of fighting right to the end of the world.
author: Revy

quote: Sketching a scene as you see it gives you a sense of being there, that's totally different from painting a copy of a photograph.
author: Eriri Spencer Sawamura

quote: It is a poor knight indeed who slays one who defies him. The key is to show yourself to be superior that they will not defy you in the first place.
author: Slaine Troyard

quote: No matter how scared you are, it is important that you learn about what you fear.
author: Adolf Reinhardt

quote: Humans cannot reject temptation. When they are plunged into the depths of despair, likened to hell, they will hold on to anything that may help them escape from the situation they are in, even if it's merely a spider's thread, no matter what sort of humans they are.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: My mother told me something long ago. She said “The world belongs to you just as much as you belong to the world”. For you were born and that gives you the right to exist.
author: Lacus Clyne

quote: The warmth of another person's flesh is scary. It thaws out the loneliness that you had forgotten about so easily.
author: Rokka Shimao

quote: History is always made by the wisdom of the old and the passion of the young. Pave the way for a new age, youngsters of the next generation!
author: Donten ni Warau

quote: It's my belief that powers aren't meant to hurt people. Nor are they meant to make others happy.
author: Jurai Andou

quote: Even if you're trying to protect someone, you must never use your power to hurt others.
author: Jurai Andou

quote: Nature itself is absurd. Humans are the only ones who whine about it.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: Once you've been loved once and have loved once, you cannot forget it.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: What the hell is with everyone telling me to change? I don't want other people telling me who I am.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: All the liabilities in this world are due to the inadequacies of the person involved.
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: I thought that the closer the real and virtual world got, the better the future would be. But the more the boundary between them blurs, the more it starts to trick people.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: And what of it? If you're good on the inside, then looks don't matter!
author: Kei Enomoto

quote: We finally became friends. I've said everything I wanted to say. Now we know everything about each other. Though, from the moment we become friends, we'll never speak to each other again.
author: Touma Kazusa

quote: It's not whether you can or not. You just do it.
author: Kitahara Haruki

quote: A "Wish"
author: Kou Ichinomiya

quote: Sometimes the things that matter the most are right in front of you.
author: Asuna Yūki

quote: As long as one person still lives...it shall be proof eternal that mankind ever existed.
author: Yui Ikari

quote: Can anyone hear me? I'm the first man in space. If you look up, well, maybe you'll see it. Or at least please listen. We've left the oceans and climbed above the mountains. I'm flying. We've found the untouched realm of God. You have to look now, it's your only chance. Nothing is here yet, not even air or water to ruin. Soon the next man will follow to touch it, and another, and in all the rush, we may again destroy it. Maybe our killing comes from the madness of being confined. Please listen, there's no more reason to kill because we don't have any more borders now! Can anyone hear me? If you can hear me, then pray. The humblest of all things, the most noble – pray for each step you take. Make a path that is safe so that those who follow you will never stumble. Dear God, please give us your mercy - mercy for we are lost. Forgive the irresponsible, the trivial men who beg you from the dark for the forgiveness of your light.
author: Shirotsugh Lhadatt

quote: The individual exists because there is a point of reference to identify itself.
author: Haruka Shitow

quote: Even though it's painful sometimes, if you keep on living then good things can happen.
author: Nana Komatsu

quote: It's okay to set your goals high
author: Tatsuhiko Ookuma

quote: I always cursed my own life. The anxiety, anger and hatred I couldn't suppress. However, when I stopped to look at the sky... I realized just how small I am. There is an endless world spreading before me.
author: Ultear Milkovich

quote: The moon pierced down on the diseased world. There is no cure for the disease. An entire race falls mindlessly into destruction. Not even a man of colossal power may be able to prevent the inevitable. Death no longer terrifies men. The smell of blood is as common as the smell of white plums, so he creates slavery and savagery which surpasses the horrors of dying. These can only be fought with more bloodshed and the cycle never ends. My sword is guided by the reasoning of Hiten Mitsurugi, but when all is said, a sword is a tool for destruction not salvation. The only way I can retain my humanity is to bury its victims.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: When a dog soils the carpet, its master is responsible.
author: Cruhteo

quote: I’m saying that love is not something that you’re only supposed to give to a single person and not another. Love is something you’re supposed to give equally to everyone.
author: Yuuri Shibuya

quote: Huh? What are you, retarded? I'm super thoughtful. That's why I stay in the corner and don't cause anyone trouble.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: It's better not to look for more meaning than there is in a name. You'll lose sight of a lot more than you notice.
author: Asuna Yūki

quote: You did it because you had to protect someone else. In medicine, there are times when you must pick who lives and who dies. Of course, that doesn't mean it's okay to kill someone if you have a good reason. But everyone involved has the right to consider the lives they saved. You have the right. You have the right to save yourself, by thinking of the people you've saved.
author: Aki Natsuki

quote: If you lose your uniqueness for fear of being disliked, then no one will ever love you.
author: Yuuki Aito

quote: Don't hesitate to tell the people you care about the feelings you have for them, because they may not be there tomorrow.
author: Akagi

quote: You got in an accident. You couldn't do anything afterward. It's okay to feel ashamed about that. But don't run from that shame! You have to carry that humiliation with you and live on!
author: Tada Banri

quote: I'm just letting you know, I'm not telling you this because I want your pity! I'm just fed up with humans, that's all! They tell lie after lie, only accepting people who are the same as they are! Humans are such hypocrites!
author: Rachnera Arachnera

quote: Human minds are not designed to accept negative statements like ‘don’t do this’ or ‘I can’t do that’, ‘we can’t make any mistakes’, ‘failure is not accepted’. These kinds of thoughts only serve to counter productively stress the body and lead to further mistakes. And if just one mistake is made, it turns into a vicious cycle. The more they think about it, the more mistakes will be made, and the more the quality of their plays will drop.
author: Kuroko No Basket

quote: What are you good at, what do you like… You need to show something that makes people understand who you are.
author: Tatsuya Himuro

quote: (referring to his father) There are three lessons he taught me when I was six. Lesson one: Protect yourself, by yourself. Parents can't protect you forever. Work out or think hard and figure out a way to take care of things by yourself. Don't get close to things you can't take care of. Use your imagination to avoid danger. Lesson two: There's more than one answer. Things can be resolved in many ways. On the contrary, there's no answer in some cases. Don't get hung up with one way. And finally, lesson 3: Don't think your parents are always right.
author: Yūma Kuga

quote: This is what's inside your heart right now. A sky that has become this lovely, will not always remain sunny. There will be times when rain will fall and storms will carry on. The scenery will change, but if it is left alone, it will stay changed forever. For that, you must continue to fight, because that is to live. To live is to fight.
author: Shinku

quote: Human beings aren't known for remaining calm and rational.
author: Inaho Kaizuka

quote: My heart is a cold cage where lies a person far more than my self, with an eye that can see the truth but reflects nothing, a cold stare from a distant person that use to know how to smile.
author: Kirakishou

quote: There once was a boy, who dreamed of being a hero, who sincerely believed in the battle to banish darkness from a world of light. But light and darkness are equals and where one exists, so too must the other. When the boy finally realized this, that was when he started the path to becoming a true hero.
author: Record of Lodoss War

quote: It's true that there's a lot we don't know about this world. But that's why we must go forward and do what we can. One thing at a time.
author: Shiroe

quote: This world is far more complicated, rich and full of mystery, than people think.
author: Jirou Hatori

quote: Just live normally. You'll be better off if you can catch some fish. Dig up the caves so you can set sail whenever you need to. It wouldn't be easy. But you have an endless amount of time ahead of you.
author: Ginko

quote: It's true that your luster may not have been as bright as gold. You only shined on occasion. You were always arguing and fighting. You have wavy hair. You were lazy. You were the king of sexual harassment. You never paid the rent. You paid your people late. Still, you were brighter than the fake glint of gold plating. When you were angry, your entire soul was enraged. When you laughed, you laughed with all your heart. Your silver was much more beautiful.
author: Tama

quote: Immersed in ecstasy from killing weak things... A burdensome corpse with no benefit to people. Someone like that... I can't possibly forgive!
author: Rikuo Nura

quote: Light is radiant because there is darkness. And darkness is sublime because there is light.
author: Rikuo Nura

quote: Relying on someone else without exerting any effort of your own is just not right. Because the one you rely on most, can disappear, at any time.
author: Jodie Starling

quote: I'm always being told that I don't understand other people's feelings, and also that I don't understand what others are thinking. And I agree. But... If you don't try to stem the tears of a girl crying out for help, you're the lowest kind of man.
author: Kasuka Heiwajima

quote: No matter what your power is, no matter how strong your opponent, lose once and it's over. That's the kind of world that's out there waiting for us. And once you lose, there's no do-overs.
author: Nagakura Imari

quote: You don't need a reason to love someone.
author: Makoto Isshiki

quote: If I'm around you, I don't think I'll ever be bored.
author: Okazaki Tomoya

quote: The beginning exists for the end and the end exists for the beginning.
author: Quon Kisaragi

quote: Everyone wants to think like this: "It can't be helped if I lose against someone with talent". Like that, be it consciously or unconsciously... People put a lid on their hearts. They want to protect their pride, self-esteem... or whatever.
author: Jōichirō Yukihira

quote: The choices we make in life have unlimited possibilities.
author: Rem Saverem

quote: Without what you call absolute power, we'll be able to live free and strong... That's why I have to end this. Humans often betray, fight and do terrible things to each other, but if I can feel this heat and this pain in my heart, a future where everyone will be kind to each other will definitely come some day. I can believe in it now!
author: Ame

quote: I no longer even dream, for I no longer sleep. So I had this golden enclosed garden made. However, now the only place where I can be myself is in this room. And my wealth is just this one glass of water.
author: The Count of Monte Cristo

quote: What is evil? Is it the bad side of society? Breaking the Law? Indeed, those are evil, but the true essence of "evil" is different.
author: Jiro's Dad

quote: we persist. That is ""evil""."
author: are wrong? No. Even if it means the entire world is our enemy

quote: Love always happens without warning. At that time, the gears of fate will start spinning. Just like the hands of a clock, two people’s hearts will separate and meet again. Eventually, they reunite.
author: Konjiki No Yami

quote: Life and death come and go like marionettes dancing on a table. Once their stings are cut, they easily crumble.
author: Ghost in the Shell 2: Innocence

quote: Don't ever forget that with each step a person is able to take on their own, they have become that much stronger.
author: Tamahome

quote: Infinite wisdom requires infinite perspective. Only by experiencing each element, each moment separately and in their own time, does the beauty of the whole become apparent.
author: Galatea

quote: Those who close their eyes to the past, become blind to the future.
author: Juzo Okita

quote: Don't be distracted by the what-if's, should-have's, and if-only's. The one thing you choose for yourself - that is the truth of your universe.
author: Kamina

quote: In this world, there is no such thing as "absolute"!
author: Hokuto Sumeragi

quote: If you truly desire greatness, you must first know what makes you weak!
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: It's not always possible to do what we want to do, but it's important to believe in something before you actually do it.
author: Might Guy

quote: The opposite of love isn't hate, it’s apathy.
author: Kyouko Houin

quote: Loving a person isn’t about logic or reason.
author: Yukari Hayasaka

quote: If you can't understand the darkness in your opponent's heart, you will never comprehend the pain and suffering of others.
author: Yami Yugi

quote: We are nothingness. Our head is a void. And without anything around us, we are nothing. We become what we perceive.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: If you were given the chance to redo your life, would you take it?
author: Iori Nagase

quote: The beginning of a story is a sudden event
author: Edel

quote: That sort of thing happens all the time. You get drunk on your own “correctness,” and the more stubborn you get, the further happiness flies away from you. It’s a bitter pill to swallow.
author: Junko Kaname

quote: The envy of a man runs deeper than a woman's, surprisingly.
author: Yahiro Takigawa

quote: If you truly loved her, you'd save her even if you were weak or it would be painful. That's the pride of a man
author: Kyouya Sata

quote: Justice isn’t something that you can just proclaim. It’s a feeling you should keep near your heart.
author: Miwako Sato

quote: Trying to not hurt others is something you can’t do. People are creatures who hurt others just by existing even if they’re not aware of it. Whether you’re living or dying, you’ll always be hurting someone. Once you’re involved, you’ll hurt someone, and even by not being involved, you might be hurting someone else as well…
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: Math is like a puzzle or a game. There's a clear answer, and you're going on a journey to find it. But there are many ways to reach that answer. That's why it's so fulfilling when you find the solution. There are ways to find an answer promptly, or more freely. Even roundabout methods can bring you to a definite solution. The method may not be pretty, but when the answer you worked hard to discover is right, it makes you happy.
author: Kaori Fujimiya

quote: There are things that you can only learn by facing the unknown, be it a different species, different values, or upbringing.
author: Yoshiyuki Nakajima

quote: In all things, I think having a dream requires having the resolve to struggle with reality.
author: Juui

quote: A dream? That's right. Because there was the past, there is now the present. And because there is the present, we can believe in tomorrow and pursue our dreams.
author: Rio Kazumiya

quote: You're free to like or hate whoever you want.
author: Rachnera Arachnera

quote: If it's the army's job to end a war, it's the king's job to find a place for it to end.
author: Maou

quote: Girls who push their kindness onto others. I hate them to death. "I have a really beautiful heart, so please fall in love with me!" I'm only surrounded by these types of girls and they piss me off. But it's not that simple. In the end, they are just making a fool of themselves. But you... You're different from the other girls. You don't have ulterior motives or anything to gain. You've always been easygoing. That's why to you, I thought It'd be okay to at least say thank you.
author: Kyouya Sata

quote: Have you heard this story before? When a certain traveler left on a journey in search of what he desired, he was told by his teacher: "You mustn't lose your way, because if you make one wrong turn - you will never find what you were searching for". But, unfortunately, the traveler lost his way and hung his head in dismay... But when he raised his head again, what he saw before him was a world even more magnificent than what the traveler was searching for. It means if you don't make mistakes, there are things you won't discover.
author: Alicia Florence

quote: If it’s possible for one person to be hurt by another, then it’s possible for that person to be healed by another.
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: There are times when all we can do is stand aside and watch.
author: Cordelia

quote: As far as I'm concerned, I think I'd rather know the truth. Even if learning the truth changed who I am.
author: Franz d'Epinay

quote: Bruises and fractures heal with time, but the wounds in people's hearts do not heal as easily.
author: Rainbow: Nisha Rokubou no Shichinin

quote: There’s no such thing as parents who don’t think about their children. But there are few children who understand their parents feelings.
author: Ichi Terakado

quote: The greatest freedom is the freedom not to get involved.
author: Yang Wenli

quote: For as long as human history goes on, the past will continue to accumulate. History isn’t just records of the past. It’s also proof that civilization has continued to advance to the present. Our present civilization is the result of our past.
author: Yang Wenli

quote: People can say there is a balance, a logic that everything happens for a reason... But the truth is far less designed. No matter how hard you work, when you die, you die. Some spend their entire life trying to scratch their way to the top, and still die in poverty. While others are born into wealth without ever working at all. It's a cruel and random world. And yet the chaos is all so beautiful.
author: Dante (Fullmetal Alchemist)

quote: I think being able to openly take away the most important thing people have... "life"... is the best thing that ever happened!
author: Luciano Bradley

quote: You don’t waste your time following someone around unless you like him. Stalking is a sign of love.
author: Aoi Yamada

quote: Remember how you're supposed to let go right away when you fall off a horse and hit the ground? You don't need to hurt yourself for no reason. If you don't let go, you'll get dragged by the horse and get hurt.
author: Aki Mikage (Silver Spoon)

quote: Life is suffering, pain, and misery.
author: Nana

quote: Everyone has something they like, something they have to do, or something they want to do.
author: Yutaka Hasebe

quote: Boyfriends and girlfriends just want to be flooded with feelings of "Aah, I feel such fulfillment". They don't really love their partner.
author: Kyouya Sata

quote: Saying things like "It would be troubling for her" are just really convenient excuses for yourself. If you can forgive yourself like this, then you can just enjoy staying in your comfort zone, right?
author: Kyouya Sata

quote: You may come to a standstill or get irritated because things don't work out the way you want them to, but what you gain from hard work will never betray you.
author: Tooru Miyagishi

quote: If there is such a thing like happiness in this world, it should resemble the endless nothingness. Nihility is having nothing and having nothing to lose. If that isn't happiness... then what is?
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: Nobody will admire you just because you are strong. People respect the ones that choose the difficult path, even if they're weak.
author: Tejirof

quote: This is a world where people’s hearts are filled with hatred... where fingers have no purpose other than to pull triggers.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: First you must decide, then you must follow through. I believe that’s the only way you can get anything accomplished.
author: Lacus Clyne

quote: I look like I'm suffering, huh? That's not good... But of course I'd be suffering. I mean, I'm gonna sail in uncharted waters, right? Both, taking on a challenge and creating something. It is painful, but it's fulfilling.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: It may seem like we're all playing the same game, but in our minds, it is totally different.
author: Sonora Kashima

quote: I just realized I love learning things that I don't know anything about. It sort of feels like I'm one step closer to my dream.
author: Midori Imai

quote: We’re all afraid, you know.. to get up on stage. Maybe you’ll mess up. Maybe they’ll totally reject you. Even so, you grit your teeth and get up on stage anyway. Something compels us… moves us to play music.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: There's no shortcut to victory. You have to climb that steep mountain one step at a time. There's an abyss down below and it never ends. Your only choice is to keep climbing!
author: Ryuuichi Kazama

quote: Since I was a little girl, I acted before I spoke. Sometimes I inconvenienced those around me. I wasn't very good at expressing myself and was awkward... But that's when I found songs! Songs allow you to honestly convey your feelings. By singing, you can feel the same as others. By singing, you can connect with others. That's why I love songs. I love singing!
author: Honoka Kousaka

quote: People can never truly understand each other! That's why we communicate and try to understand. We can only understand ourselves through being with others!
author: Riki Naoe

quote: I don't care what normal people do anymore. I'm going to live my life the way that I want to.
author: Iori Nagase

quote: What you can't accomplish alone, becomes doable when you're with someone else.
author: Taichi Yaegashi

quote: You'll discover that problems have a way of working themselves out if you talk to your friends.
author: Ryuuzen Gotou

quote: My, my! Do I really need to spell it out for you? There is nothing that you can acquire without making a move on your own. It's the same with romance - your only hope is to be more aggressive.
author: Tachibana Marika

quote: In the world of sports, quickness doesn't necessarily mean having the fastest time. It could also mean the acceleration from zero to maximum speed or the deceleration from maximum speed to zero. This is known as agility.
author: Midorima Shintarou

quote: It's interesting, isn't it? The way that when someone expresses something, someone else always shows up to interpret it.
author: Kino

quote: A great enough sorrow can stop time, but someday, time will start moving again. No matter how many years may pass.
author: Grandmother Sawatari
