quote: I don't want someone that can easily be replaced by others. What I need is... what I really want is... someone that will be with me no matter what. A best friend.
author: Ginbei Haruomi Sawatari

quote: When boys get to a certain age, family becomes a bother. That's how they become independent.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Even in the depths of Hell... blooms a beautiful flower of friendship... leaving its petals as mementos... bobbing back and forth on the waves... may it one day bloom once more...the Okama Way.
author: Mr. 2 Bon Clay

quote: I won't say you'll definitely be able to do it if you don't give up. But if you do give up, then there'll definitely be nothing.
author: Daiki Aomine

quote: Don’t make decisions on your own without saying what’s important.
author: Juugo Yama

quote: You were wrong on two counts. Even the hardest substance can be broken, when crashed into itself. And the ability to feel pain is not a weakness. It’s a strength. Pain tells a creature its vulnerabilities, and not you expose them to attack. Your robot is dead. And so, I’m afraid, are you.
author: Kurama

quote: Why have I come to have this conscience? If it’s this agonizing, I shouldn’t have had it. Just what am I?
author: Alcor

quote: I care not if you call me an enemy. I shall bring you to submission.
author: Yamato Hotsuin

quote: This is all that remains of the world. Though we knew it was coming, it’s pretty shocking, huh? The disappearance not of matter but of awareness, of ideals. Not death. Something even more pure. The fact that we life-forms ever existed…… Our past, present and future, it will all disappear.
author: Fumi Kanno

quote: What is Living? Living is continuing to make choices. Living is enjoying oneself. Living is continuing to make choices. Living is expressing one’s will. Living is enjoying oneself. Living is continuing to search. Living is eating. Living is continuing to fight. Living is being lost. Living is preparing oneself.
author: Devil Survivor 2

quote: Our world is like a terminal cancer. Saying you’ll change things through individual will is the rambling of a peace-loving fool. Why don’t you understand it’s too late for humanity?!
author: Yamato Hotsuin

quote: We are far, far, very, very far apart... but it might be that thoughts can overcome time and distance.
author: Mikako Nagamine

quote: People who can't love themselves are the ugliest.
author: Ichijou Kazuomi

quote: Life is too bitter, so coffee, at least, should be sweet…
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: If you have the will to follow through with your beliefs, the results will follow naturally.
author: Kuroko Shirai

quote: Do you know what's the most important thing about climbing mountains is? It's not about having the courage to challenge it, It's about having the courage to back down.
author: Nozomi Tōjō

quote: If we give up before we try, then nothing is going to happen.
author: Eli Ayase

quote: In reality, the least interesting answer is usually the correct one.
author: Tet

quote: You're always above everyone else. But you make decisions and move forward by yourself, and no one can keep up with you. Even the much-loved sun is alone if no one can reach it.
author: Abeno Sousei

quote: What is "Courage"? Courage is owning your fear!
author: William A. Zeppeli

quote: Memories of someone who’s passed away remains beautiful forever and a person’s heart will linger over them, they say.
author: Ai Haibara

quote: You’re like big umbrella. You’re the shade from the strong sun’s rays when the weather is good. And you’re the shelter from the cold rain when the weather is bad. You’re always protecting others.
author: Angelina Nanatsu Sewell

quote: I guess I just want the person I love to be happy. I just want to do something for him.
author: Sana Inui

quote: Girls who are pretty and pure only exist in fantasies.
author: Rentarou Kurahashi

quote: Girls are so annoying. They’re always stubborn and full of jealousy, gossiping about who gets along with whom and who loves whom. Violent too.
author: Rentarou Kurahashi

quote: As long as you keep thinking out of the box, you’ll probably discover that imaginary situations you find in manga and games are already happening in real life.
author: Da Capo III

quote: No one’s going to criticize you if you get excited for something, or you laugh with all your heart! And if someone does, I’ll beat them up!
author: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: It's not like I had aspirations to be a hero or anything. However, I'm positive we followed a code of justice that all of us believed in without condition or compromise.
author: Togusa

quote: Even though we are going to shatter thousands of lives, wearing white is gonna make the blood look so pretty.
author: Ladd Russo

quote: A life with no changes can’t be called life. You can only call it experience.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Once you have a power, sometimes you are put into a situation which make you carry extra burdens, and live all your life with pain.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: Even if I'm not around, nothing will change, you say? It's not as if I'm living my life to prove something silly like that! We live our lives to see how the world changes around us, don't you think?
author: Kinichirou Imamura

quote: But I think it’s natural that not everything you try will go well, right? So, I’m gonna start again from scratch.
author: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: You know I think I understand now why you and I never had children…on some level we knew the world was ending, it may of seemed like we had found something else to obsess over but the truth is we’d given up on the future. That’s the real reason I was never able to get pregnant.
author: Cher Degre

quote: This whole world is nothing but lies, lies! Lemme show you what I like to call the truth, the truth called despair!
author: Hazama

quote: I am the white void, I am the cold steel, I am the just sword, with blade in hand shall I reap the sins of this world, and cleanse them in the fires of destruction! I am Hakumen! The end has come.
author: Hakumen

quote: The future isn’t written yet. There’s still time for things to change!
author: Yūsei Fudō

quote: I hate waiting, but if waiting means being able to be with you I'll wait for as long as forever.
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: Never forget that kindness can hurt instead of help.
author: Himeko Inaba

quote: If I show people how weak I am, they won't need me anymore.
author: Himeko Inaba

quote: Right now, I'm going to fight the person who freed me from being Reversed and saved the world. The strongest fighter... My best friend.
author: Toshiki Kai

quote: With out strong opponents, living isn't fun. It's perfect if I can't win.
author: Taiga Kagami

quote: If it's going to be a relationship of hardship and mental agony, you should put an end to it.
author: Masafumi Takeuchi

quote: How should I put this... There are times when you begin to hate everything around you.
author: Nanami Takahashi

quote: Even if it’s a coincidence, it’s wonderful when someone understands how you feel.
author: Norie Okazaki

quote: There are those people who are born aloof and prefer to stay away from groups. In such a case, others should just leave those people alone. It's not a matter of sympathy.
author: Shin Meguro

quote: The pain of getting hit, the frustration of loosing, the joy of winning, all of that. They've been driven into this body, fists, and this head. It becomes my strength in the next fight. All of my battles up to now, those memories, they are all of my power.
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: As far as relationships with other people go, they don't just end because one person decides that it's over.
author: Kinichirou Imamura

quote: If we're going to regret it either way, then let's regret doing something fun that we wanted to do.
author: Kinichirou Imamura

quote: Don't go thinking that there's a world where it's natural to be happy! Even if you start complaining, nothing will change! You need to make things fun by yourself!
author: Kinichirou Imamura

quote: If you’re too lucky, people will get jealous of you.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: In this world, who knows who might kill who.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: There’s no use. There’s no such thing as a victory that can be won through effort. It doesn’t exist.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: They say time and a people’s heart are inversely proportional. The more it passes, the more they grow apart. It seems there are some rare exceptions though.
author: Ai Haibara

quote: Regardless of who I was in the past or what I did, I feel like "me" of the present should take responsibility.
author: Yashiro Isana

quote: The scenery is so peaceful, you'd never think that wars were happening and people were dying around the world. If only this scenery could continue forever. But even if a time should come when I can no longer enjoy this scenery, as long as everyone is with me, I'll be fine. That's what I think today.
author: Meiko Inoue

quote: It's pretty hard just to survive as a human being. The world's a big place and there's a lot of stuff I don't understand, but I think there must be something important out there. I mean, that's what I want to believe. If I keep believing that while playing music, then maybe I'll be able to change the world just a bit.
author: Naruo Taneda

quote: Sorry, a trick is nothing but a puzzle mankind came up with. If you use your head, you can uncover the logical answer. It’s disappointing. No matter the explanation I think of, I cannot understand why one person would kill another. Even if I can see why, I can’t understand why.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Men are not men on the battlefield. We turn into some other creature. You can do the cruelest things... It doesn't even matter if it's an order or not. To protect yourself, your mind shuts out any emotions you have. It's like a steel door. But once the war is over, you can't keep it closed forever.
author: Fullmetal Alchemist

quote: We’re always serious. We’re seriously joking around.
author: Anarchy Stocking

quote: I mean, think about it. If someone pointed to a classmate of yours and asked you what they meant to you, how would you answer? What would you say?
author: Kyon

quote: Rejection is a part of any man’s life. If you can’t accept and move past rejection, or at least use it as writing material - you’re not a real man.
author: Jiraiya

quote: You know how they have parameters in games? Like, you're good at magic, but your combat skills blow, or you're a great fighter, but you lack in the brains department.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Events that happen in this world, are a continuous series of trifling things, and within those myriad pieces of puzzles, there is always a fragment that leads to the truth.
author: Kishou Arima

quote: Being alone and being lonely are two different things.
author: Yasushi Takagi

quote: Nobu is idealizing me, that’s why he fell in love with me. If you knew the real me, it would shatter your illusion. Then come on. Shatter my illusion. Because I don’t know what else I can do to stop loving you.
author: Nana Komatsu

quote: Everyone has their own reasons to fight! Sometimes, you have to settle it yourself or there's no way forward!
author: Tatsumi

quote: Everybody loves somebody. In time, everybody falls in love with somebody. Just as I found you.
author: Dera Mochimazzi

quote: Regardless of whether your friends believe, you still care for them, correct? Isn't that why you feel so sad?
author: Harumi Sakuraba

quote: “Your hard work will be rewarded.” What kind of idiot came up with that nonsense?
author: Hyuuga Junpei

quote: I don’t like hurting others. But that doesn't mean I won’t bear arms to protect places and people dear to me.
author: Kiriha Kurano

quote: I won’t lose to my own decisions, no matter what. That’s the proof that I’m me.
author: Nanana Ryuugajou

quote: I’m just trying to live my life, but it seems as if sadness always piles itself up around me. It’s in my bed, the toothbrush in my bathroom, and the memory of my cellphone. Over the past few years, I’ve wanted to move on, I’ve wanted to take hold of something I couldn’t reach. What that is, I have no idea. Not knowing where such obsessive thoughts were coming from, I simply drowned myself in my work. Then one day I realized that my heart was withering, and in it there was nothing but pain. And that my beliefs, that I once held so passionately, had completely disappeared.
author: Takaki Tohno

quote: It’s because we help out when they’re in trouble that we can count on them to come running when we need it.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: Frustrations will not last forever. Nobody can keep on going without some measure of reward.
author: Hidehiro Harada

quote: People who aren't doing anything themselves, shouldn't be so quick to tell others what to do!
author: Kinichirou Imamura

quote: What I hate the most in the world is when I'm already trying hard and I'm told to try harder!
author: Kinichirou Imamura

quote: The ability to understand others just by touching definitely exists. There might not be any reason to be afraid of touching and being touched by others, or hugging and being hugged by others.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: Only frustrated adults and naive kids believe themselves to be special.
author: Kiyomasa Senji

quote: No one would help me. And that's when I understood... That only I could help myself.
author: Mine

quote: Words are shallow. Just talking doesn't bring world peace.
author: Daichi Muroto

quote: Because we can’t understand each other, it makes us want to make things clear even more.
author: Sawako Kuronuma

quote: You don’t need something from someone else. What you need is to make your heart stronger. If you act naturally, people will naturally like you. And I’d like you more that way too.
author: Yokodera Youto

quote: Ironic, isn't it? How people without truly important things know about them more than those who have them.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: But I suppose it’s not so bad that an old friend is the same as ever.
author: Kotarō Katsura

quote: Everyone makes mistakes, but then you recover. Look at all of the friends you have here who adore you. It would be difficult for anything to change that. If you keep that in mind, you should be able to get back on your feet any number of times.
author: Ichiya Vandalay Kotobuki

quote: When you’re in love, you start to worry about the most trivial details. It should feel really restrictive, but worrying about this kind of thing makes me really happy instead.
author: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: Your high school life will be over before you know it. There are things you can only do now. You should do as many of them as you can.
author: Youichi Tanaka

quote: Having feelings for someone just brings sorrow to someone else. Someone always gets sacrificed and suffers. If this is what it means to fall in love, then falling in love is terrible.
author: Hikari Sakishima

quote: If you throw your life away, you won't even have the capacity to feel regret.
author: Ginko

quote: Where do people stray off the path? When do they begin to obey their greed rather than their ideals? Or are ideals just prone to morphing easily into greed?
author: Sion

quote: I'm not very good at sensing people's boundaries. Without knowing how far is too far, I gradually get closer and closer. It's terrifying. Being unable to sense that is terrifying.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: He who lies to make things beautiful is probably someone who admires pure feelings much more than anybody else.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: I am not a hero. I can't make anyone happy with any result. I can only do what I deem right with me not hating my choice at a later point.
author: Osamu Mikumo

quote: If you're gonna kill me, then kill me. If you're gonna execute me, stop waiting. Until then, I live by my own rules!
author: Ganta Igarashi

quote: The only people who make me feel remorse are those that do not possess any willpower.
author: Nagi Kengamine

quote: Why do you still want to be my friend? Is it because you feel comfortable being with me? Because I understand your awkward and useless self, and yet still love you? Quit acting so spoiled. When you rejected me, you lost the right to want those things!
author: Tada Banri

quote: If you could see everything but couldn't change any of it, or if you could live in freedom in darkness... Which do you think is more fortunate? I think it might not be that bad living in the dark, remembering the light.
author: Amane

quote: You were like a bomb, one wrong move and I might have lost you again.
author: Hayashida Nana

quote: The Present is ending. Here, countless versions of our past selves are always crying, laughing, falling in love, getting hurt, joking around, feeling happy and suffering. These feelings are born all the time and in the next moment, they became the past and die. It's over now. This is the end, but the truth is everyone's time is like that. Right after it's born, every moment becomes the past and dies.
author: Tada Banri

quote: Worrying about rejection may be the same as rejecting yourself.
author: Kaga Kouko

quote: If a person you love doesn't love you back, you're worthless. That's what I always told myself.
author: Kaga Kouko

quote: I want to spend a lot more time with you! But I don’t want you to think I’m annoying, so I’m holding myself back. When you’re away, I always wonder what you’re doing and thinking.
author: Kaga Kouko

quote: I may be unreliable, and I may not be able to do anything, but I’m here. I’ll always be with you. I’ll be always by your side.
author: Tada Banri

quote: When you want to scream or cry, I’ll be there. I’ll share your feelings and stay with you.
author: Tada Banri

quote: Even if you think I’m a nuisance, no matter where you go, I’ll find you. I’ll always be listening for your voice. When the rain falls, when the wind blows, when the flowers scatter, when shadow looms. In every sign, I’ll search for your voice.
author: Tada Banri

quote: I don’t want to waste a single second or meter. From your first step and second of the day, I want to be with you.
author: Kaga Kouko

quote: You meet someone and then part ways. It’s a natural part of the human experience. No one can promise they’ll be together forever.
author: Nana

quote: If you don’t interact with the people around you, it’d be hard for anyone to approach you.
author: Haimura Kiri

quote: I have to be her place to belong. I need to be a steady, reliable man whom she can trust.
author: Haruto Kirishima

quote: Aren’t we family? Aren’t I like your family too? So it’s okay to cry if you’re having a hard time. Then I’ll do anything to help.
author: Haruto Kirishima

quote: As long as I can be with you, I dont care what anyone says or how much I’m detested. As long as I can be with the one I love, that alone makes it okay. That’s what I longed for.
author: Yuzuki Eba

quote: In this world, there are things you’re better off not knowing.
author: Aizawa Yuuichi

quote: It may be better to go and regret it rather than staying here and regretting it. If you don’t move forward, you can’t gain anything.
author: Futaki Kanata

quote: I’m a very lucky person. I was able to meet people I love.
author: Noumi Kudoryafuka

quote: No matter what, I’ll be always be your friend. No matter how far you go, I’ll be thinking about you everyday.
author: Kamikita Komari

quote: Only a genuine wish makes one's own soul shine beautifully in this life. That light is a messenger from heaven lighting the way for our unwavering souls to be brought to the God's side.
author: Bastien

quote: No one dies alone. When someone dies, the part of them that lives inside someone else also dies. You already live inside me.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: I don’t believe in crap like coincidence, fate, or destiny.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: I don’t want to change. I want to change. We all hold in our hearts conflicting feelings, each back to back. And so, we live our days.
author: Dera Mochimazzi

quote: The others taught me something. That one needn't fear the future. That one needn't hate the world. From now on, the world will not simply be my fantasy. It will be our one and only, real future.
author: Kozakura Marry

quote: People say that if you fight, it means you're close to someone
author: Nana Osaki

quote: It’s like an automated vending machine for canned juice. You’ll get what you want so long as you have the money, but… You get nothing in return without it. You can’t buy your way into the hearts of others.
author: Ai Haibara

quote: Something that's supposed to die and doesn't will eventually rot away, whether it's a man or a nation.
author: Reinhard von Lohengramm

quote: Life is short so it will be appreciated. We live to our fullest due to that.
author: Hattori Heiji

quote: You don't need to make a hundred friends. Just make real friends that you care about a hundred times as much. Even if you only have one, so long as they’re a friend you really care about.
author: Yozora Mikazuki

quote: If what you lost was too big and you can’t replace it with something else, you don’t have to replace it with just one thing, right? If you get ten small things or a hundred small things, all together it will be enough of a reason for you to keep going!
author: Yoshioka Futaba

quote: We have to change our way of thinking if we really want to change the future.
author: Saki Watanabe

quote: Everyone's fighting for their own kind of freedom. It seems small
author: Nagi Kengamine

quote: I don’t mind getting in trouble. But I won’t let my friends' kindness go to waste.
author: Yuiko Kurugaya

quote: Every story has an ending. One day, we won’t be able to stay together.
author: Kyousuke Natsume

quote: People get corrupted. Not even saints and heroes are safe. There's nothing you can do to prevent it. That's our salvation.
author: Yuuki Shinjuurou

quote: Of the days that I have lived, only those I spent with you seemed real.
author: Vincent Volaju

quote: There are times when there's a great pleasure waiting at the end of laments, pains, and near-death experiences.
author: Hinagiku Katsura

quote: Even at a time like this there's not a single word of rescue from the one you worship. You see? That is the truth of this world. He doesn't watch anything and doesn't save anyone.
author: Aion

quote: If things were to change, do you think you could ever fall in love with me? Or fulfill a dream for which I long? The world is about to change. That's why I'm here now. I've come and this will mean a new beginning for my life.
author: Morgan Le Fay

quote: It’s not that I’m a tolerant person. I just don’t want to think about these troublesome things.
author: Ayumu Aikawa

quote: He realized that he had lost sight of something important. No matter what turn he took he should have kept singing. Even if his songs couldn’t save the world, he could still sing songs for her. Don’t ever lose sight of what’s important to you.
author: Yoshino Yūsuke

quote: What defines humans... Defines us? Nobody will notice a change on the inside if you look the same on the outside.
author: Iori Nagase

quote: You’d better not (rip my mask). Like Pandora’s box, you want to open it because you don’t know what’s inside. But if you know what’s inside before you open it… It’s boring, isn’t it?
author: Kaitou Kid

quote: It is called the memories of the body. When the mind forgets, the body remembers for it.
author: Yūko Ichihara

quote: Someone who cannot hate something, cannot love something, either.
author: Yang Wenli

quote: I understand your feelings of wanting to bring the bad guy to justice, but do bear with it. It also requires courage to hide oneself.
author: Ai Haibara

quote: The right thing is… to have faith in life, until you’re sure of death. That’s what makes a great detective.
author: Detective Conan

quote: If you force me to pick one… It’d be black. It covers up the things inside of me that I don’t want to be known about. Well, for the same reason… Black is the color I hate too.
author: Subaru Okiya

quote: Once the kiln is opened and the pottery inspected, all that are crooked or bear cracks are fated to be smashed. If all that awaited us was the fate of smashed pottery, then we decided we would rather run away in the hopes of finding a different future.
author: Maria Akitsuki

quote: You hit me with everything you had, so I decided I could trust you with everything I had.
author: Konno Yuuki

quote: It's a foolish thing, the human heart. Sometimes we fail to operate logically, and act on emotions.
author: Ichijiku Chisato

quote: I am ME. No matter, what I say or do, I'm still ME. The things I feel, the things I do, being a vampire, being a man, being betrayed by my mother. When all those things come together, they make up ME. But I'm none of these things taken separately.
author: Touma Kyohei

quote: Life perpetuates itself through diversity, and this includes the ability to sacrifice itself when necessary. Cells repeat the process of degeneration and regeneration until one day they die, obliterating an entire set of memory and information. Only genes remain. Why continually repeat this cycle? Simply to survive by avoiding the weaknesses of an unchanging system.
author: Puppet Master

quote: No amount of natural talent trumps hard work.
author: Rin Matsuoka

quote: Even if it is shameless and vulgar, somewhere I seek some sort of connection with people.
author: Kakeru Kurosawa

quote: The shadow of your former self won't vanish.
author: Kakeru Kurosawa

quote: No matter how hard you try, you cannot exceed your true capabilities.
author: Kakeru Kurosawa

quote: Even if this is a twisted way to go about it, even if a guaranteed way to save our hearts cannot be found, even so, it doesn't mean that people like us don't try and struggle.
author: Kakeru Kurosawa

quote: If it's this world behind the eyelids, anybody can become the person I imagine them to be.
author: Kakeru Kurosawa

quote: I never wanted anybody to hate me. I don't belong to any groups, and I have to fight and struggle to build myself up. In the end, all I want is just to not be hated by everyone.
author: Kakeru Kurosawa

quote: I'm prepared for it all. Even if my chest hurts, even if I'm ripped apart, I won't let myself taste any regret.
author: Kakeru Kurosawa

quote: If the only way to be granted life in this world is to surrender my body and soul to insanity, then I shall choose to meet my doom!
author: Keigo Oonishi

quote: You see, for as long as we draw breath into our lungs, we shall keep hope alive inside our hearts.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: They are those who come and go as they please. Even so, once you come to know them, even though there's no one else who notices them, it's a precious encounter that will keep your heart strong.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: Not killing people is really hard. Clean living is tough.
author: Killua Zoldyck

quote: You know, a lot of people make excuses when they lose.
author: Ryoma Echizen

quote: It's not like I'm desperate to have friends, anyway. I just don't like being looked down on as that sad person with no friends.
author: Yozora Mikazuki

quote: True freedom can't lean on anything. It's transient, lonely, and arduous.
author: Yoshii Kazuho

quote: The brain is a microcosm, creating its own stories. People then live out these stories.
author: Seiichi Kirima

quote: You think I'm making demons simply as weapons, but demons are created by the human soul.
author: Millenium Earl

quote: The strength of life lies in the possibility of dying.
author: Kouichi Aizawa

quote: There's probably no one who's more of a realist than the unpopular loner. I have lived my life with the Three Nevers of the Unpopular: Never to hold (hope), Never to open (your heart), and Never to treasure (sweet words).
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: What does it mean to be a winner? Is it the last one standing? It means to climb over a mountain of corpses to get to the top. By no means is it a glorious sight to behold, in fact, it is extremely cruel. Even so, if you still wish to seek victory... then you must become a devil.
author: Toua Tokuchi

quote: Dictatorship itself isn't absolutely evil, it's just another form of government. The point is how you can run it for the benefit of society.
author: Yang Wenli

quote: Maybe humans are capable of committing far more shameless acts than they imagine they are. If they hadn’t faced adversity, they might have gone without discovering such ugly facets of themselves.
author: Hildegard von Mariendorf

quote: Time does not exist. Only the illusion of memories exist.
author: Seiichi Kirima

quote: Even in the darkness, I’m sure it’s reassuring to have someone there to walk with you.
author: Noe Isurugi

quote: Listen here. Don't say you can't. Words bind you the minute you say them. Believe in yourself! You can do anything!
author: Tenka Kumō

quote: If all humans were saints and sages, all truths would be exposed. And every just cause, expedient, ideal, and lie would no longer be necessary, yes?
author: Kaishou Rinroku

quote: If you don't share someone's pain. You can never understand them.
author: Nagato

quote: If all you're good for is breathing in and out, then even an AC unit is more useful than you.
author: Yukino Yukinoshita

quote: Even the worst evil saves something... even the greatest good hurts someone.
author: Rouka Numachi

quote: It's meaningless to just live, and it's meaningless to just fight. I want to win.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Love breeds sacrifice... which in turn breeds hatred. Then you can know pain.
author: Pain

quote: I wonder if there really is a God... If such an entity really existed, wouldn't all honest, hard-working people be happy?
author: Vermouth

quote: Be as swift as the wind. Be as quiet as the forest. Attack as fiercely as the fire. Be immovable like a mountain. Move like the lightning. Be as impenetrable as a shadow.
author: Detective Conan

quote: People are born alone and die alone. But there isn't a single person who can keep standing alone forever.
author: Shigaraki

quote: Who can gaze into the mirror without becoming evil? The mirror does not reflect evil, but creates it.
author: Motoko Kusanagi

quote: Arrogance can plant a seed of sin. And loneliness can serve as its nursery.
author: Shinsekai Yori

quote: There was no reason for me to stay in the real world any longer. In the real world, it didn't matter if I was there or not. When I realized that, I was no longer afraid of losing my body.
author: Chisa Yomoda

quote: If it’s an important memory, then you shouldn't forget it. Since those who aren't with us only live on in our memories.
author: Wataru Takagi

quote: How weak the mind is when it wants to forget. Maybe you didn't forget. Maybe you're lying. Is it a lie you tell everyone around you, or perhaps a lie you tell yourself?
author: Johann Liebert

quote: The sea’s blue reflects because of the sky’s blue. Just like detectives and thieves. We’re all toying with the human mind. But the one who pries for others’ secrets is the one who’s truly impolite.
author: Kaitou Kid

quote: It's better trusting someone than to die doubting people altogether.
author: Kaitou Kid

quote: Society doesn't always do what's right. That's exactly why we ourselves must live virtuous lives.
author: Akane Tsunemori

quote: Perhaps in this universe, there exists a solitary, absolute truth. Perhaps it clarifies every question. But that’s beyond the reach of these short hands.
author: Yang Wenli

quote: What would you ask a grave, which can never reply? What do you pray for? Saying anything after someone's death is far too late.
author: Mahiro Fuwa

quote: Perhaps this is what it means to be bound by sin. To spin in the same circle, looking for where the sin lies, and at some point losing sight of the way out.
author: Renmei Communicator

quote: Inside my mind, there's a beautiful cup. A very beautiful, clear cup. And tiny drops kept falling into it: "drip, drip, drip", slowly but steadily, everyday. And today, I felt the cup had finally become completely full.
author: Kuu

quote: All heroes have established their thrones atop, not just their enemies. But a large quantity of allied corpses as well. There are no monarchs with clean hands.
author: Paul von Oberstein

quote: Children don't grow up looking at perfect parents. Rather, using their imperfect parents as anti-teachers, children nourish a spirit of independence.
author: Yang Wenli

quote: Love and the human mind can't be analyzed with formulas. It's not so unusual for love to make you forget the sense of care and respect for others. There's no logic. It's an uncontrollable urge. To tell you the truth, it’d be worrisome if you became like that. Your mind is keen, and your character is good. But passion has nothing to do with mind or character.
author: Alex Cazellnu

quote: You can't perform the same trick twice with one audience. If performed only once, the magic leaves a strong impression. It will then blossom into a beautiful miracle in their hearts. But, when used twice, rather than the audience enjoying the magic, they focus on unraveling the trick. As such, the chance of it being unveiled is high.
author: Kaitou Kid

quote: Humans constantly feel pain in their hearts. Because the heart is so sensitive to pain, humans also feel that to live is to suffer.
author: Kaworu Nagisa

quote: If you let anger and revenge consume you... You'll find yourself unable to behold the beautiful sights right before your eyes.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: A misty moonlight night washes over the land and though darkness ebbs with the glow of the full moon, shadows still remain. They conceal an evil which exists just beyond our grasp. Sides are chosen. Lines are drawn, ones that we dare not cross. But in the distance a ray of light shines to expose our path. It is then that we realize that some things in life are better left unseen.
author: Gen Fudou

quote: History is not merely a linear collection of points that we pass through on a timeline. They are connected by a line. No, perhaps it is more accurate to say that they are made to connect.
author: Serial Experiments Lain

quote: Swords exists for just judging and killing. They can never save others.
author: Kourin Shimizu

quote: Do you want to kill me? It's only natural that you do. But I cannot die right now. Because there is something I must do.
author: Su-won

quote: Coming together and working hard with everyone is a really fun thing!
author: Masaru Ōfuna

quote: On that day twelve thousand years ago, on the summit of clouds reaching the stratosphere, remember that evening when we watched the prominence rise from the sunspot together…
author: Toma Epanort

quote: They'll use you as much as they want
author: Mei Tachibana

quote: At night the moon shines with daylight. Our dreams are an ocean… each wave is the dream of an individual. The tide is controlled by the pull of the moon… it illuminates our dreams. If you open the moon, you will discover the path to dreams. When one finds death, they are submerged in the ocean of dreams. At the end of life’s path is a door that leads us to this ocean. Our dreams transcend the self to reach this sea… connecting us all within its lunar tide.
author: Gen Fudou

quote: Misfortune… that is my symbol. Unluckiness… that is my identity. I am a woman who looks best dressed in solitude and misfortune. That is who I am.
author: Hong Lihua

quote: I swear to God that when we die, we'll die together.
author: Mikage

quote: Isn't it arrogant to put a price on whether life is "higher" or "lower", Kaneki? We are just bags of meat. The weak bow down and the strong devour them. Rather, if you compared them to all living things, it's humans who have shaved away the most lives. We are different than them.
author: Shuu Tsukiyama

quote: You don't need to blame yourself just because you've hurt someone, just like when you're walking you can't really blame yourself to crush some ants... that's what being stronger ones means.
author: Shuu Tsukiyama

quote: Taking away someone's freedom is the ugliest thing one can do in this world. People like that ought to decay into dirt and come back as thorny roses.
author: Jae-ha

quote: There were sad days, and painful ones and there may be more. Even so they're treasured days that I'll never forget.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: The ordinary days that we live in may, in fact, be a series of miracles.
author: Koujirou Sasahara

quote: You need to accept the fact that you're not the best and have all the will to strive to be better than anyone you face.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: It's not a sense of justice. Figuring out difficult cases is my hobby. If you measured good and evil deeds by current laws, I would be responsible for many crimes. The same way you all like to solve mysteries and riddles, or clear video games more quickly. For me too, it's simply prolonging something I enjoy doing. That's why I only take on cases that pique my interest. It's not justice at all. And if it means being able to clear a case, I don't play fair, I'm a dishonest, cheating human being who hates losing.
author: L Lawliet

quote: I'm not going to protect you by being your shield or armor, but I'll be the dagger hidden below your pillow.
author: Shuu Tsukiyama

quote: Kindness is not a crime. But sometimes it awakens the weakness and greed in others.
author: Su-won

quote: Even though I don’t mind being alone, I don’t want others to think I’m lonely.
author: Ritsu Kawai

quote: I realized once again that my life is stuck on hard mode.
author: Kazunari Usa

quote: No matter how much this world may change, I shall always remain myself.
author: Jurai Andou

quote: People who abuse power they were born into piss me off more than anything else.
author: Mine

quote: If this world wasn't a complete hell for me, that's because you were alive.
author: Ein

quote: No matter how strong the pain is, it's our duty to move forward. You're wrong for running away from reality.
author: Ryosuke Takahashi

quote: I still don't know where to find happiness. But I'll continue to think about whether it's good to be here... whether it was good to have been born. But in the end, it's just realizing the obvious over and over again. Because I am myself.
author: Shinji Ikari

quote: The truth has power because it's the truth. And because it is the truth, that makes it just. It's persuasive, isn't it? Don't you want truth like that?
author: Taro

quote: My severe injuries had healed and the sweet taste of blood coated my mouth. I kept walking, my goal vague...trying to dispel the building unease in my chest... Upon entering an open area was the scent of rotting flowers and in the middle of the flowerbed, he stood... Without anyone saying a thing, without his name given, like an unsolved puzzle falling into place by itself, just by seeing that figure, I--understood exactly who I faced. The CCG's reaper. The undefeated ghoul investigator. A cold, vivid gaze. There, stood the God of Death. Why was it that I was seeing beauty in death rather than life? Strangely, I thought he was beautiful... Disoriented, I had failed to comprehend the scene before my eyes. It was not anything like flowers but a large amount of "Death". Had he done this alone?... It's a lie... Koma...Irimi...After all that... No matter how I tried to rouse my will to fight with hatred, more than sorrow, more than rage, the emotion that arose within me was despair.
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: No matter where you go, everyone's connected.
author: Lain Iwakura

quote: I don’t need to believe in God to believe in myself.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: The moment you find the courage to give up your life for someone, would be the moment you understand love.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: How can he hope to stand back up, when he is still in the process of falling? Let him fall, all the way to the very bottom, before telling him to stand up again.
author: Gen Fudou

quote: God doesn't give us trials we can't surmount. So someday all your wounds will heal and the day will come when you've surmounted all your pain.
author: Mikage Celestine

quote: ...The act of taking is equally evil. We, from the moment of birth, continue to take. Food, connections, even fellow blood. Living to utmost. Continuing to slaughter, kill, take. Life is to constantly sin. Life is evil itself. I am aware I am evil... And so are you all. Now, come kill me. And I shall do the same!
author: Yoshimura

quote: You only need a strong will and a clear purpose.
author: Kureo Mado

quote: If you smile once when you’re feeling down, you begin to feel better and become more cheerful.
author: Rito Yuuki

quote: You shouldn't judge a person based on circumstantial evidence.
author: Medaka Kurokami

quote: Everyone wants to have someone else's attention, and to be noticed. But the same thing goes for the other person too.
author: Nanana Ryuugajou

quote: It is meaningless to distinguish between the beautiful and the ugly, or between the talented and the ordinary. Every human struggles to survive.
author: Medaka Kurokami

quote: Dressing up on the outside won’t change what’s on the inside.
author: Uka-no-Mitama-no-Kami

quote: A fight isn't won once a victor is decided, it's won when someone loses.
author: Izayoi Sakamaki

quote: I lie all the time. Who cares if you know something, but you say you don't? Forcing something out of someone without permission is worse.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: ...and even if you were to hate yourself as much as you want, you have no choice but to live with yourself forever. Other people just go by. Eventually what's left to you at the end is only yourself. Even if you can't seem to like yourself, shouldn't you at least compromise?
author: Choi Yool

quote: There's nothing known for certain. Adolescence is like that anyway. It's like a train ride with no destination and nobody. There's no destination and outside everything is flashing by so you can't see anything.
author: Choi Yool

quote: If you're always positive, good luck will eventually find you.
author: Fe-chan

quote: Being alone is more painful than getting hurt.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: There is no such thing as being born into the world to be alone.
author: Saul Jaguar D

quote: Necessity knows no law!
author: Manabu Takasaki

quote: When you come to hate something you liked it is incredibly painful.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: If we give our best in something we love, we'll enjoy the victories from the bottom of our hearts.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: If I'm protecting someone, I won't let her die, and if I'm attacking, I'll cut you.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Don't start a fight if you can't end it.
author: Sanji

quote: I'll do what I want till the end. Cut me down if you want.
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: I like myself. I have never once hated myself. My high specs, my half-decent looks, my pessimistic, realist point of view... I don't hate any of it at all.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: I'm saying that practically nobody feels that they're talented. That's what makes us strive to improve. As we strive to improve, we notice the people around us improving too, which makes us work even harder. I guess you could say friends are like rivals, in a way.
author: Eli Ayase

quote: Why don't you give it a try? You don't need to come up with a reason, you try things because you want to. Isn't that how you start doing things that you really like?
author: Nozomi Tōjō

quote: Tears and rain, fall down on my face, my body is unable to stay yet my heart is unwilling to leave.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: If I were to survive, but couldn't protect what was important to me, then I might as well be dead.
author: Tama

quote: If I'm getting in trouble no matter what I do, I may as well make a grand frontal assault and fight to my last breath.
author: Yuuko Aioi

quote: * The Zone * In this state of extreme focus, all unnecessary thoughts disappear and the athlete becomes absorbed in his play. Only those who have practiced and practiced earn the right to stand before the door, and it only opens unpredictably. It is the ultimate domain, open only to the chosen.
author: Kuroko No Basket

quote: I've already decided. Getting good grades and listening to teachers can take me somewhere high and far away, but what if that's not where I want to go? Right here, by your side, Tomoya, is the only place I want to be.
author: Sakagami Tomoyo

quote: Listen, an idol's job isn't to show people their smiles, it is to make people smile. Never forget that!
author: Nico Yazawa

quote: I’m scared of hot and cold. In winter, I hide under the heating table and in summer, I lie in bed and do nothing.
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: I don’t know everything, I just know what I know.
author: Tsubasa Hanekawa

quote: It’s unbearable to die hating someone.
author: Detective Conan

quote: Doesn't seem to matter how far I travel, my destiny is always followed by blood and gunsmoke. The result is always the same every time, mountains of death and debris.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: You're trying to stay unscarred, aren't you? If you've come this far, you'll have to hurt someone. The more time you take to decide, the deeper and more it'll hurt. For all of you.
author: Sunohara Youhei

quote: The days I spent with you were a lot of fun. I realized for the first time that it makes me so happy to be needed by others. I thought I'd get along well with you like this. But I can't. I was being a jerk. While I was with you, I was looking at someone else. I kept it to myself even after realizing that. I was taking advantage of your kindness.
author: Okazaki Tomoya

quote: I will fight for my friends than watching them get hurt, I will fight for those I love.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: I guess not knowing someone doesn't mean you don't understand them.
author: Kyōko Kirigiri

quote: Being too rigid makes you fragile. You'll end up breaking yourself and those around you.
author: Yukina Himeragi

quote: Getting close to someone half-heartedly can cause you suffering.
author: Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi

quote: Getting used to it would be quicker than trying to work around it somehow.
author: Honoka Kousaka

quote: Hidden in truths lie lies, hidden in lies hides the truth.
author: Rokudou Mukuro

quote: Romance is like an extra in life. I don't mind having it, but I'm not in the mood to chase it.
author: Kyouya Sata

quote: I despise common sense. I’ve seen the world from every possible angle. This cruel, ridiculous, beautiful world.
author: Lacie Baskerville

quote: Some people think the act of investing efforts, trying your best is more precious than the result. But for mentors as well as their pupils, that approach feels bitter. 'I did my best', 'the fight was close'... words like that blow past and die out like a wind. Only the result is a stone. The stone you can reach by doing your best.
author: Hidehiro Harada

quote: Where will we be in five or ten years from now? No one knows. All we know right now, all we can see right now, is what's right in front of us. That's why we'll always live our 'right now' to the fullest!
author: Kanzaki Tomoyo

quote: Sometimes life is like jazz, and goes in an unexpected direction...
author: Kaoru Nishimi

quote: Grown-ups are idiots. If they really want to bring an end to this endless fighting, they need to sit down with one another and reach a truce.
author: Tobirama Senju

quote: There can be no happiness in a world where the undesirables are thrown away.
author: Monkey D. Dragon

quote: Feelings can be controlled, but tears never lie.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: There's no need to pretend to be cool. Let's show our lame sides. That's who we really are, after all.
author: Hidenori Tabata

quote: Humans cannot create anything out of nothingness. Humans cannot accomplish anything without holding onto something. After all, humans are not gods.
author: Kaworu Nagisa

quote: I've been around longer than you have, kid. And I've seen my share of troubles. You're not the only one who knows what it's like to lose somebody. It looks like neither of us has led a charming life, have we? Still, it's not that bad. At least you and I have been lucky enough to find new comrades to help fill the void.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Every society places the world in order, by the concept of opposites: inside and outside, religious and secular, celestial and worldly. The opposing concepts organize the world as it is today, but none of those can be distinctly separated. There is always a grey area where it is ambiguous.
author: Tohno Kyouko

quote: We cannot be satisfied until we have eliminated all others. It has nothing to do with reason. It is instinct.
author: Akashi Seijuurou

quote: For those who have come to power, wealth and glory not by their own strength and effort, but simply through inheritance, what right do they have to complain? The very existence of such blood-lineage dynasties is disgusting. Power is the property of one generation. It shouldn't be transferred, it should be seized.
author: Reinhard von Lohengramm

quote: If you plan to continue being a detective and using words to entrap people, inscribe this in your hearts: Words are like knives. When used incorrectly, they turn into foul weapons. You have to understand the opponent’s heart and use them with discretion. No matter who it is you’re dealing with.
author: Detective Conan

quote: There are countless ingredients that make up the human body and mind, like all the components that make up me as an individual with my own personality. Sure, I have a face and voice to distinguish myself from others, but my thoughts and memories are unique only to me, and I carry a sense of my own destiny. Each of those things are just a small part of it. I collect information to use in my own way. All of that blends to create a mixture that forms me and gives rise to my conscience.
author: Motoko Kusanagi

quote: Just as water runs downhill, the human heart also tends to revert to its basest instincts.
author: Hideo Kuze

quote: No matter how many more points you have at the end of the game, if you're not happy, that's not a victory.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: There's a limit to the amount of pleasure a person can obtain. But pleasure brought out by intellect is infinite.
author: Kouzaburou Touma

quote: All problems come from the human mind. In the mind, one's consciousness is just the tip of the iceberg. What lies beneath the surface... the subconscious... is far more vast.
author: Shun Aonuma

quote: Is it so strange to do something for someone else? If the people I love can stay smiling tomorrow... then you can call me foolish or whatever you want.
author: Takatori Kotori

quote: People don't vanish from this world the moment they die. Their true death is when they are forgotten by the living.
author: Tokou Nanami

quote: Don't break anyone's heart, they only have one. Break their bones, they have 206.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: It's impossible to work hard for something you don't enjoy.
author: Keiko Ayano

quote: But you're wrong, no one ever has the right to take the life of another person. No one, no one ever has the right to take the life of another. No one. And everyone, everyone deserves a future. Don't you think that's true? Please, please, it's time to stop the fighting now. It's up to us to end the cycle of hatred. If we don't work to end the sorrow this time, then the cycle of pain will just continue on. When we were all born, were any of us made to steal or cause others harm?
author: Meryl Stryfe

quote: Killing's easier than you think
author: Rosso

quote: People's feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Do you resent me? If you do, then keep on living and come kill me. I'll remember you. I'll never forget you.
author: Ogami Rei

quote: Walls are an unavoidable part of youth.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: By looking at what's blocking our way, with an open mind, a wall can be turned into a wide-open door.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: When people make a mistake, it is nice to give them advice, but... if they don’t listen, just leave them alone. Otherwise you'll do yourself a disservice by wasting your time and effort.
author: Ran Mouri

quote: Laziness is the mother of all bad habits. But ultimately she is a mother and we should respect her.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: The concept of lateness being evil is wrong in the first place... The police don't mobilize until after an accident happens, and it's standard for heroes to show up late. But would anyone condemn them for being late? So, speaking paradoxically, lateness is justice.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: The world runs on power. Everything is determined by the superior power. You are weak. That is why you lose.
author: Ayato Kirishima

quote: I think there are many things in this world we are better off not knowing. Sometimes the truth is the cruelest thing of all. Not everyone can bear it.
author: Maria Akitsuki

quote: (To Ichigo Kurosaki before getting shot point-blank by his Cero) I see. So you show no mercy. Just like a true Hollow. I care not. Defeated by you as I stand, my existence holds no further meaning. Do it.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: I think that the people who come to like and understand you, like you not because of your outward appearance, but because of your own feelings that aren't lies.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: It's not good to expect too much, but you can't do anything if you're being overly pessimistic. If you just wait thinking it's useless, nothing will come of it.
author: Shinobu Oshino

quote: People’s feelings sometimes go astray and lead to irreversible consequences.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Humans are easily tempted. When they are poised on the edge of hellish despair, and a spider-thin thread of salvation presents itself, they will invariably grasp it. No matter the human.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Words are like swords. If you use them the wrong way, they can turn into ugly weapons.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: The cycle of life goes only one direction, not even alchemy can change that.
author: Edward Elric

quote: For a man to stand up again, he needs one thing... "To make excuses".
author: Takamura Mamoru

quote: Are you afraid of other people? I know that by keeping others at a distance you avoid a betrayal of your trust, but you must endure the loneliness. Man can never completely erase this sadness, because all men are fundamentally alone. Pain is something man must carry in his heart, and since the heart feels pain so easily, some believe that life is pain.
author: Kaworu Nagisa

quote: People are strongest when they have got nothing to lose.
author: Katsuragi

quote: If you believe it was destined to happen it is most likely to happen, if you believe nothing has been decided then most likely nothing has been decided.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: Winning is everything in this world. The victors write history. The losers are wiped from it.
author: Akashi Seijuurou

quote: It's like I'd want to ask what justice is doing right now if it existed in this world. Well, justice is empty and ineffectual.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: How can someone who seeks a reason from another person be right? While you're forcing that reason on someone else, how can you take responsibility?
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: Each person has his or her own way of having fun.
author: Itsuki Koizumi

quote: Brush my teeth and go to sleep at night. Wake up and eat breakfast in the morning. People do those everywhere. When I realized that everyone did all these things on a daily basis, everything started to feel so boring.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: The real world is scary. It’s pain to deal with other people.
author: Shiori Shiomiya

quote: Mere scores do not measure a person’s worth.
author: Aoi Yamada

quote: No matter how ugly something is, if you look at it in a cute way, it'll seem dear somehow.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: To the me back then, you don’t need to worry. You’ll soon find something you can do, something you can set your heart on.
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: You can't extract a god out of a human. However, by kowtowing to the thing that is considered to be a god, it is possible to create a god and shove it down the throats of people.
author: Kaishou Rinroku

quote: Nothing in this world is free. Be thankful to those who speak strict word to you. Watch out for a person who talks too nicely.
author: Yūsei Fudō

quote: People can run from the things they don't like all they want. But if they're just averting their eyes, they're not running. As long as you think the current situation is okay, no one can help.
author: Mother Araragi

quote: To have something you detest is about as important as having something you love. Yet you accept everything that comes in your way. Because if you like anything and everything, they all end up being the same thing in the end.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: The beginning is what comes after the ending. Carve out with your own hands a future, filled with hope.
author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

quote: Despair to the ones who become swelled with pride.
author: Truth

quote: With a keen eye for detail one truth always prevails.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: There is great satisfaction in fighting for the sake of gaining power, but it’s joyless to fight for the sake of maintaining it.
author: Reinhard von Lohengramm

quote: Obeying a superior you can't even believe doesn't make you loyal. You're just fooling yourself.
author: Olivier Mira Armstrong

quote: It is not society that determines people's futures.  It is people who determine society's future.
author: Akane Tsunemori

quote: But the mass we call "world" keeps turning, ignoring our individual desires.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: To desire some results, one must take actions.
author: Suzaku Kururugi

quote: Shut up! I did what I had to do. People lie to survive. No one is blameless.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Death may be my only freedom.
author: C.C.

quote: Break them and they're all just trash.
author: Makoto Hanamiya

quote: It's not about doing what it takes to win. Sei-chan told me before "Winning is just like breathing". Victory isn't something that Sei-chan seeks. It's a natural part of his life. It's a basic bodily function.
author: Reo Mibuchi

quote: It’s not the time to be scared. Of course it’s better if the opponent is strong rather than weak, right!
author: Taiga Kagami

quote: Don’t you know the saying ‘Man proposes
author: Midorima Shintarou

quote: There’s no meaning if you win alone!
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: Even if other people think it’s meaningless, it’s disgusting for me to quit, even when the possibility is 0. Therefore, I will never... Give up !
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: If we have time to get upset, we should have used that time to move on… Even if just one step forward!
author: Kise Ryouta

quote: We need to have a mask that we never take off.
author: Uta

quote: If it's a fight between a man and man, choose the path you believe is right. Only a fool would stand indecisive after being frightened at the thought of being soiled by the mud.
author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

quote: What value does your will have? I asked you what price it carries. If money is enough, is your will for sale? A will that can be bought with money... what's the meaning of that? If your will can be bought with money... then it will vanish along with that money. Am I wrong?
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Memories. They are recollections of the heart. If those who are not human come to possess memories, people begin to fear the result.
author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

quote: If you only feel fear after knowing both the abilities of your enemy and yourself, flee with your tail between your legs. However, if you're going to stand firm and fight with a focused mind, you will definitely have victory within reach.
author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

quote: When the world is filled with red lights signaling danger, the world is safer than usual. But when it's filled with green lights signaling safety, it creates a place more dangerous than anywhere.
author: Ougi Oshino

quote: No person exists that is just virtuous, and kindness is only something piled on the outside. There are no humans with just virtue and fairness. Rather, they try to be that and just build up stress.
author: Meme Oshino

quote: People save themselves on their own. Nobody can ever save anyone else.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: Friends are connected by heart! You can't just rinse off something that's stained on your soul!
author: Ling Yao

quote: Humans are inconvenient creatures, aren't they? The species can't live on unless they all create a community and expand.
author: Homunculus (Character)

quote: If many negative emotions gather, they will end up influencing the entire world. But on the other hand, it is also possible to gather positive emotions and lead the world in that direction.
author: Scar's Brother

quote: Everyone worries and suffers, but they still go on with their lives. I'm expecting to be able to laugh again, so it's too early to despair!
author: Soramaru Kumō

quote: Who decided that if you cry, you're weak?
author: Abeno Sousei

quote: You can't be strong not because you can't throw away your weakness, but it's because you don't face your own weakness.
author: Kanoko Naedoko

quote: You were ready to kill another creature, yet you’re scared of being killed yourself. Don’t you think that is strange? When you point a gun at a living thing… this is what that act means.
author: Kurumi Tokisaki

quote: I haven't done anything yet. Getting depressed and losing confidence is way too egotistical.
author: Sorata Kanda

quote: There are times where we cannot stand without the support of others.
author: Kirijou Mitsuru

quote: It's not a crime if no one knows about it.
author: Nyaruko

quote: In exchange of being able to get something that normal people can't have... you must let go of what normal people have.
author: Aki Ogasawara

quote: You find a glimmer of hope, only to lose it. That is when your despair tastes the most divine.
author: Takaya Kurisu

quote: Sometimes one must lose the battle in order to win the war.
author: Sylphy

quote: "Obey the ones with power". That's the true meaning of the law of the jungle. If you don't wish to be bound by that, obtain greater power. Because there's always times one must fight power with power.
author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

quote: There's no telling when this war will end. No matter how many troops the country deploys, the desert just absorbs them like water. We suffer, conquer, and what's left? Nothing but sand.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: If you'll cower at the sight of the great foe before you, leave at once, coward. If you'll lose the strength you believed in, then fall to the ground, weakling.
author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

quote: The king exists for his people. Without his people, there is no king.
author: Ling Yao

quote: There's no point in dwelling on the past, so I'm trying to think of the future instead.
author: Sorata Kanda

quote: People die. Things break down. Nothing is unbreakable. And of course, I will break as well.
author: Yuuki Shinjuurou

quote: Everyone has desires they can't tell anyone about. It goes without saying.
author: Yuuki Shinjuurou

quote: People are beings where a love of what's right goes hand in hand with a desire to do all manner of evil acts.
author: Yuuki Shinjuurou

quote: There's no one the world would be better off without.
author: Arata Hinohara

quote: It isn't like I understand what you want. You want to change the world, huh? I understand, everyone feels that way... But it doesn't give you the right to treat other's lifes like toys. You can't just destroy what you want!
author: Lubbock

quote: Even in the depths of the darkest oceans, some light always pierces through.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: When you say you "can't hear the sound", doesn't it really mean you "aren't restrained by the sound"? Rather than the sound you hear with your ears, an image inside you is boiling up from the depths of yourself and taking over without you even knowing. The sound inside, the landscape in your heart, your wishes, a sound loaded with your thoughts
author: Hiroko Seto

quote: You know, I discovered something. Everyone has something... Something deep inside their hearts. For some, it might have been enmity. For others, admiration. Wishes, a craving for the spotlight, feelings that one wants to deliver, feelings for one's mother. Everyone was supported by their own feelings. I realize now that, perhaps, no one can stand alone on stage.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: By exchanging notes, you get to know one another, to understand one another. As if your souls were connected and your hearts were overlapping. It's a conversation through instruments. A miracle that creates harmony. In that moment, music transcends words.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: Didn't you know... girls are greedy?
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: Defiance toward parents is an establishment of one's self
author: Hiroko Seto

quote: As a musician, in the process of learning from a teacher, your differences breed a sense of discomfort which you should cherish. It's because of those differences that we have individuality.
author: Hiroko Seto

quote: There is no way to train your heart to be invulnerable.
author: Lubbock

quote: I’ve always been alone. The only one that can bring warmth into my life, is you.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: Bonds that are too strong create flaws over time.
author: Road Kamelot

quote: I do want to be useful for something and to be of help to people, but I want to decide what that "something" is by myself.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: Sticking through with a lie to protect someone, is probably harder than telling the truth.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: Nothing good ever comes from a man interfering with women's problems.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: I think that having no relationships with others is the loneliest thing in the world.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: It's more interesting when the future's uncertain.
author: Mashiro Shiina

quote: You won't survive if you just let your boiling blood dictate your actions.
author: Bulat

quote: I never once thought that the world was fair, but some things will never change. If you want things to change, don't wait for someone to do it for you, go change it yourself.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: There isn't anything more painful than to have someone say that he doesn't believe you.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: You don't have to try to get along with someone that you aren't interested in.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: At times, the truth can be cruel.
author: Shin Fukuhara

quote: The closer you get to the sun, the darker your shadow will be.
author: Aria Link

quote: One human only has the power to do so much. That's why I'm going to protect...even if it's just a handful of them...the ones most important to me.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: According to my master, when you're a kid, just being a fast runner makes you popular. In middle school, it's holding your own in a fight. After that, brains make you popular. Her point seemed to be, "Run fast, hit hard, and read books."
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: Setbacks are inevitable to superstars. Adversity is what separates the good from the great. After all, stars can only shine during the night.
author: Watari Ryouta

quote: When one thing ends, another begins.
author: Riko Aida

quote: Music is freedom.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: If I can be with you when the world ends, it'll be enough for me.
author: Blue

quote: Everyone’s gonna die. It’s a natural part of life. But if life has no purpose, you’re dead already.
author: Kiba

quote: The more I concentrate, the more I get consumed by my performance. The sounds I play fade away from my reach, tangling up like flowers seized by the spring wind and vanish.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth, evil for evil.
author: Ogami Rei

quote: The notion of set fate is ridiculous. Cause and effect can be bent through strength.
author: Yamato Hotsuin

quote: I have to accept that who I want to become and who I can actually become are different.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: I always wished to be accepted by my surroundings. I tried to change myself for that reason. But, I don't care if I'm disliked. I don't care if I don't have a place where I belong. I don't mind if everybody rejects me starting tomorrow. I will even become a devil for the person who is trying to protect me.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: Wrongly placed jealousy is ugly when it goes too far.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: To unite dreams beneath a banner of conquest. I praise your efforts. But, warriors... did you not understand? That all dreams must disappear when the dreamer wakes. Every last one of them. Therefore, it was inevitable that I would stand in your way. King of Conquerors, know the end of your eternal dream. I, myself, shall show you harsh reality. Now awaken, Ea! A worthy stage has been set for you! Look up and behold... Enuma Elish!
author: Gilgamesh

quote: If you accept everything you’re told without question, you’ll lose your ability to think. Even if you reached the same conclusion, it would still be worth analyzing the reasons behind it.
author: Lacie Baskerville

quote: There are things you can only share with someone by fighting. For instance, how serious you are.
author: Konno Yuuki

quote: Life isn't just doing things for yourself. It's possible to live in such a way that other people's happiness, makes you happy too.
author: Asuna Yūki

quote: If it's just a game, at least be brave enough to run towards the guns and die!
author: Asada Shino

quote: You know, in the end, people come home to the people they love most.
author: Karan

quote: If we are to die one day, wouldn't it be better to have no regrets?
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: If you feel like crying you should not hold back your tears. You should let it all out while you still can - because when you get bigger sometimes you can't cry even if you have something to cry about.
author: Okazaki Tomoya

quote: Time and titles do not matter in the bonds between people.
author: Sakagami Tomoyo

quote: Meeting you was the best thing that ever happened to me. You made me so happy. I don’t want you to be lost or afraid or anything like that. From here on out, I know things might be hard sometimes. But no matter what may await, please don’t regret meeting me.
author: Furukawa Nagisa

quote: Games are fun because you can do things you couldn’t in real life, right?
author: Akatsuki

quote: People who neglect to make efforts or who don't take any actions at all are always the ones who dream that someday they will suddenly become wildly successful.
author: Misaki Nakahara

quote: Stealing someone's name is never all right. It means you're unwilling to recognize them as human.
author: Shiroe

quote: A student who is too loyal to his master has no chance of surpassing that master... A mutinous spirit is the source of independence.
author: Boris Konev

quote: I can’t even imagine a world without Light.
author: Misa Amane

quote: If you need to run, you should run the best you can! Then you can just take your time to think.
author: Hajime Ichinose

quote: I'd rather be a pig than a fascist.
author: Porco Rosso

quote: A pig that doesn't fly is just a pig.
author: Porco Rosso

quote: When I saw you, I just wanted to find a way to protect you.
author: Shawn

quote: Human beings are dangerous. If we're seen, we have to leave. My parents said so.
author: Arrietty

quote: [his parting words to Arrietty] My heart is stronger now, because you're in it.
author: Shawn

quote: Sometimes you have to fight for the things that are worth fighting for.
author: Arrietty

quote: When the afternoon air currents mix, we can even touch the stars without fear!
author: Shizuku Tsukishima

quote: I'm no man's burden! I want to be of use!
author: Shizuku Tsukishima

quote: The reason the Yamadas get along fine is because all three adults are nuts. If one of you were normal it would unbalance the rest.
author: Noboru Yamada

quote: The weak always cling to words, and those with power die for those without it.
author: Claymore

quote: Tell you what… I’ll carve you up until you find yourselves cursing the fact that you have such resilient bodies.
author: Riful

quote: From the moment I first saw you, you’ve looked so sad. Your face shows so much pain. Your eyes were like mine. They looked so sad, so hurt, so lonely… as if you couldn’t stand it.
author: Claymore

quote: We're going to explore the outside world someday, right? Far beyond these walls, there's flaming water, land made of ice, and fields of sand spread wide. It's the world my parents wanted to go to.
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: People are crazy for believing that these walls will protect us forever. Even though the walls have been intact for the past 100 years, there’s nothing that can guarantee they won’t be broken down today…
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: You're not God, nor are you a sister. But it's because I feel that you're much closer to me than God, I'm much more afraid of being hated by you.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: Lies are like colours. The more you pile up, the blacker things get.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: What takes reason a hundred years to build a bridge to only takes the wings of faith a single night to reach.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: (Her dad) He'd always tell me that family isn't about being related by blood. Living under the same roof and caring for each other is what family is all about.
author: Charunee Kusakabe

quote: Ever since I was little, I've always been curious. Why doesn't the witch, who can use her magic to transform a shabby girl into someone lovely, cast a spell on herself? If she used her magic on herself, she could become lovely too. The witch does not use her magic on herself because she knows the emptiness that follows when the spell breaks.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: I despise myself... because others are too kind to me...
author: Yuichi Onodera

quote: As long as the kindness received from others... is returned back, it's fine even if it takes time.
author: Isogi Toshio

quote: There are always chances in life.
author: Isogi Toshio

quote: I think that what people who've committed crimes need isn't punishment, but rather the knowledge of the pain of being forgiven.
author: Isogi Toshio

quote: Every girl is born a princess, some of them just forget is all.
author: Kuranosuke Koibuchi

quote: Anyone can say that he likes himself best. When you say that you like someone, you just end up liking yourself in the moment of being with that person, right?
author: Yuusuke Kanda

quote: I think that no one wants to see others' sins.
author: Yuusuke Kanda

quote: It’s the most powerful words in the world. No just argument or eloquence can stand a chance against it. It’s… ”So what?”
author: Yang Wenli

quote: Even if the clothes are too large in the beginning, they’ll fill out as you grow. The same goes for courage… The secret of not getting killed by the enemy is to underestimate life’s difficulties.
author: Olivier Poplan

quote: My role is to darken souls, even pure ones, until they become pitch black. By doing so, you can stay beautiful and shine bright, Mother. I do everything because of my love for you.
author: Sakuya Tougane

quote: You disappointed me. So I have to give you a punishment. Regret your helplessness and feel despair.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: So how long will it be, then? How long before you're no longer cursed to walk the earth...?
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: So laugh... demon... Laugh that arrogant laugh of yours... And remember, I beat you to it...
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: I want nothing more than to be a bayonet
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: Hold your tongue, the dead don't speak.
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: Your voice sounds so lovely when you're whimpering in agony.
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: If anyone does not love the Lord Jesus Christ, let them be accursed at His coming. God save you from your fate. Amen!
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: What are humans’ desires? What I think the most troublesome desire is the desire for attention. It’s the source of jealousy and relationship problems, too.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: Providence may guide a man to meet one specific person, even if such guidance eventually leads him to darkness. Man simply cannot forsake the beauty of his own chosen path. When will man learn a way to control his soul?
author: Berserk

quote: Dreams, ambition, love, hope
author: Berserk

quote: What we need now is not the diary of the past, but instead the calendar of the future.
author: Dusty Attenborough

quote: Either way, the only ones who can die tomorrow are those who survive today.
author: Dusty Attenborough

quote: Dreams. Each man longs to pursue his dream. Each man is tortured by this dream, but the dream gives meaning to his life. Even if the dream ruins his life, man cannot allow himself to leave it behind. In this world, is man ever able to possess anything more solid, than a dream?
author: Berserk

quote: While many can pursue their dreams in solitude, other dreams are like great storms blowing hundreds, even thousands of dreams apart in their wake. Dreams breathe life into men and can cage them in suffering. Men live and die by their dreams. But long after they have been abandoned they still smolder deep in men's hearts. Some see nothing more than life and death. They are dead, for they have no dreams.
author: Griffith

quote: Humans always pursue things they can’t reach. Doesn’t it single-heartedly symbolize such yearnings?
author: Legend of the Galactic Heroes

quote: Friendship might begin with getting picked, but I don't think that you can stop picking for yourself either. But in order to choose, there are things you need to know. And in order to get picked, you need them to know certain things.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: I’d rather fight and regret it than not fight and regret it.
author: Reinhard von Lohengramm

quote: "Those who believe will be saved". It's just that I wanted to find out whether you'll be saved if you believed. If such a thing were true, I feel like I can change myself too.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: One victory greedily demands the next set of victories from the victor, until his death.
author: Legend of the Galactic Heroes

quote: If you're friends with everyone, you become a popular guy in return
author: Shin Meguro

quote: Regardless of the color of eyes or skin, the color of blood is the same for everyone, isn’t it?
author: Oskar von Reuenthal

quote: To me, Kawai-san is like a mirror. A mirror that reflects all the bad parts about you. A devil-like mirror that contaminates your heart.
author: Yuusuke Kanda

quote: But I wasn't slacking at all. I practiced till I passed out. I gave my all. And if I still turned in a sloppy performance after all that, then... That's who I am now. It's the current me, playing with everything I've got.
author: Kousei Arima

quote: Everybody has to display a certain loyalty to their paycheck. I was the same way. It isn’t just a piece of paper, but a chain that binds people.
author: Yang Wenli

quote: If you can move on, then you should.
