author: Furukawa Nagisa

quote: Nothing can stay unchanged. Fun things… Happy things… They can’t possibly remain the same.
author: Furukawa Nagisa

quote: The day before yesterday, I saw a rabbit. Yesterday, it was a deer. And today, it’s you.
author: Ichinose Kotomi

quote: Humans can’t reverse the flow of time. If you try to twist it against its will… You’ll be punished.
author: Ai Haibara

quote: Humans live behind masks.
author: Ai Haibara

quote: You need to decide where you belong before anything else. If you can do that, you can decide what you want to do.
author: Jin Mitaka

quote: Neither terrorism nor occultism have ever impacted history in any constructive way.
author: Yang Wenli

quote: Time brings an end to all things. Even if we plug our ears and cover our eyes.
author: Pharos

quote: In the long flow of time, living things know nothing of their ancestors, except for the genes they’ve inherited. Only mankind has history. Having a history differentiates mankind from all other living species. That’s why I wanted to be a historian.
author: Yang Wenli

quote: Perfection is a fairly nonexistent thing. If you couldn’t do it, it was probably impossible for anybody else, too.
author: Reinhard von Lohengramm

quote: One cannot live by jokes alone. But if there were no jokes, I’d rather not live.
author: Olivier Poplan

quote: Listen up, Cookie. Summer break is a break. We forget about homework. That's common sense. Understand?
author: Himeki Chifuyu

quote: See, "empty" just means you have plenty of room to take in all kinds of new things. Fun things, precious things, painful things, things you've never seen before!
author: Hana N. Fontainestand

quote: There are so many weapons scattered across my path that it makes me wonder if this world is made of little more than lead and gunpowder.
author: Jonathan Mar

quote: <About Ciel> He turns his back towards the light without hesitation. That figure that charges into the abyss at a dignified pace. How beautiful and foolish.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Put a steel mask on your face and armor on your heart.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: I just think we're missing out if we're not trying different things and having fun. Life's too short.
author: Birthday

quote: I always believed that everyone in this world was far nicer and smarter than me. That no matter how unlikeable they seemed to be, they still had a good conscience and had justifiable circumstances for acting the way they did. That’s why I hated myself for being so timid and depressed when I didn’t even have any good reason for doing so. …But now I see that there actually are people who’re despicable in every way and don’t blink twice at ruining another’s life. Now that I think about it, it’s almost strange. Why don’t most people try to kill other people? How can they just stand by and let the scum have their way without the slightest indifference? Maybe my expectations were too high. I’m only disappointed because I expected something from them. But the answer was quite simple all along. There’s no such thing as a decent human being in this world. Not a single one. I did what I had to do. And I feel quite refreshed after doing it. That’s why I can say that this world could afford to be a little more chaotic.
author: Punpun Onodera

quote: I always say what exactly what I'm feeling, and if they don't like me, that's fine! It doesn't change the fact that I was close to their hearts.
author: Konno Yuuki

quote: It's better to be hurt than to hurt others. Nice people can be happy with just that.
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: I never knew that spending an entire day doing nothing could be so terrifying. A plague of what-ifs assaults me, spinning and whirling, even though thinking about them makes no difference.
author: Meiko Inoue

quote: There is only one person who you can each truly love. It’s too bad that you can’t change who that person is. If you could, the you both would be a lot happier.
author: Juri Arisugawa

quote: Humans must think about living on. And, must also understand death. Most important, we must learn to understand the truth.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: Instead of regretting what we cannot do, it is better to do what one can. Even for example, what you do has nothing to do with results, you must forge forward.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: The depths of despair…. I feel so calm here. I won’t be tricked by anyone anymore, and I don’t have to resent anyone. There’s nothing here. Not even loving. Nothing but to keep dancing until I die away.
author: Rue Kuroha

quote: Although Punpun didn’t really want to think about what the point of having dreams that could never come true was… To have dreams and worries that you could talk frankly about… In a way, that was probably a more fulfilling lifestyle than his own, Punpun admitted. Being cool was merely a paper-thin difference away from being empty.
author: Oyasumi Punpun

quote: The main reason I got stronger was so I’d be able to survive.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: Believe in yourself... If you don’t have that... it doesn’t matter how many talents you have, you still won’t be able to hold your head up high...
author: Chiaki Nanami

quote: My will is society's will. My eyes are society's eyes. Since you vowed to respect the law, you cannot deny me... no matter how much you despise latent criminals.
author: Sakuya Tougane

quote: If the being casting judgment is perfect, then it has to judge itself as well.
author: Jouji Saiga

quote: Freedom, isn’t something earned through suffering or pushing yourself. You must accept yourself just as you are and live according to the flow of things
author: Monk Zuikou

quote: If comrades that you trust gather around you, hope can take physical form and become visible. That`s what I believe...
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Even if you're made a fool of by someone, even if the future becomes so dark that you can't see what's in front of you, even if the place we get to is the very end of the world, you and I are still together.
author: Naruo Taneda

quote: Why shouldn't you quit, if that's what you really want to do? Everything will work out somehow.
author: Naruo Taneda

quote: Nothing will progress while you can't make up your mind.
author: Ai Kotani

quote: You know why people stress over things? Because there aren't any easy answers.
author: Ai Kotani

quote: It'll still feel better to try and regret, than regret not trying at all.
author: Ai Kotani

quote: I realized it one day. The lyrics I struggled to create are only made up so I would have something to sing. Nothing genuine can come out of these flat and boring and ambiguous lives we're living, out of faking your worries for the sake of it.
author: Ritsuko Ayukawa

quote: Yeah, it might be totally stupid, but it's sad that you can't know yourself without being compared to others.
author: Naruo Taneda

quote: Yeah, I know there's no right answer. All I know for sure is that time keeps on flowing like a river, and a river eventually leads to the ocean. Maybe I will try swimming against the current.
author: Naruo Taneda

quote: No matter how well you get along together, sometimes the smallest of cracks turn into a lethal abyss in time.
author: Ai Kotani

quote: We've got no light of hope in our future! Nothing is going to happen! Our lives will be as dull as rocks! Maybe it's a life of boring happiness! But I don't want to be an adult who pretends to be satisfied with it!
author: Naruo Taneda

quote: When you lose something, you gotta find something to take its place. I guess it's just time... for me to move forward for once.
author: Kato Kenichi

quote: Once you see a guy ignore the light in order to cross the street, you just can't stand still.
author: Kato Kenichi

quote: Why did I fall in love with music in the first place?
author: Jirō Yamada

quote: A band isn't so simple... that you can just mess around and keep it going.
author: Jirō Yamada

quote: I might seem to be on the losing side to you, but I'm still fighting... Not all battles happen in the brightest, flashiest spots.
author: Saeki Ryutaro

quote: This town is overflowing with people, and each has their own worries, big or small... How many of them can truly say that they're happy?
author: Ai Kotani

quote: I'm begging you, don't make me a killer!
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: Do you know the truth of the battlefield? Kill a man normally, and it's considered a crime. But kill many on the battlefield and you become a hero!
author: Luciano Bradley

quote: Know how strong you are... and do what you can do. If you misjudge your abilities on the battlefield... you'll get yourself killed.
author: Yugo Kuga

quote: People aren't all perfect. They're weak, ugly, and they get jealous and try to bring others down. Oddly enough, the better you are, the harder it is to live. That's why I'm going to change this world and the people in it...
author: Yukino Yukinoshita

quote: When some things contradict each other, you should look at the opposite side of everything. And when the meanings behind the seemingly unnatural actions are made clear, a completely different answer might be reached... Justice can become evil. Reality can become an illusion. Meaning can be found in something that appears meaningless. Think. And find the answer for yourselves. A human ceases to be once he or she stops thinking.
author: Merlin

quote: I think, if you want to improve yourself, you should challenge your own limits.
author: Yukino Yukinoshita

quote: It’s hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: War is merely one method of diplomacy. However, it is the least efficient one.
author: Bismarck Waldstein

quote: Only fools wage war.
author: Charles Zi Britannia

quote: Lelou? I'm glad that I could talk to you in the end. You know? When I got my memories back, I was so scared... A fake teacher... Friends with no memories... Everyone was... lying to me... It was as if... the whole world was watching over me... Lelou, you've been fighting... all by yourself against this world... All by yourself... So that's why... I wanted to become the one thing truthful to you... I love you, Lelou. Even when I knew you killed my father... I couldn't... bring myself to hate you. Even when you tried to make me forget everything... I still fell... in love with you again... Even when my memories were altered... I still fell in love again... No matter how many times I'm reborn... I'm sure I'll... fall in love with you again, Lelou... This... is fate, right? So, it's okay, right, Lelou? That I fall in love with you when I'm reborn... No matter... how many times... I'll... fall in... love with you...
author: Shirley Fenette

quote: The scariest thing about killing people is getting used to it! When you kill someone and realize you won't be punished... That's when people forget all about punishment!
author: Satomi Rentarou

quote: Throughout all of history, no wise king has ever forced his army to obey him through oppression. People will only truly fight for what is right. And there is only one thing that is truly right in this world! The one true, unchanging righteousness in the world is... cuteness! Cute makes right! All our needs, desires, and instincts seek cuteness, and it is for cuteness that we will give everything we have! That's just the way men are!
author: Sora

quote: You'll have some painful, despair-ridden experiences. In fact, most of them will be tragic. But we chose to walk this path. We'll take on the dirty work. And change the world. After we finish, we can disappear.
author: Bulat

quote: Protecting the powerless is simply a soldier's duty!
author: Wave

quote: Everyone shows their true face on death's doorstep. Even a noble-minded gentlemen will cast away his principles to beg on the ground. Even a cordial and gentle lady will start cursing with a face like a demon's. Even a frivolous and humorous man will accept death without any punchlines... That is what I believe--The instant just prior to death is when all sorts of true natures will be revealed. Using fear and suffering leading straight to death, baring naked hearts to be admired at one's leisure... This is also one of the wonders of murder.
author: Syamaya Saki

quote: Pull yourself up after falling and advance with resilience.
author: Kamiya Kyousuke

quote: Whether in a brawl or anything else, bones can be broken but the spirit must not yield. Once a decision was made, it must be upheld until the bitter end.
author: Kamiya Kyousuke

quote: Love is never without trials and tribulations--precisely because of that, there's bitterness. What do you think? The feelings from liking someone... cannot be satisfied by your own efforts alone. It's not the same as simple anger or sadness. One-sidedly declaring your feelings... this doesn't bring satisfaction. Only when the other person feels the same way... Only when two hearts love each other is fulfillment achieved.
author: Kamiya Kyousuke

quote: I think that education will prove the most powerful force in this world.
author: Maou

quote: We lost. We got wiped out. We may be finished. Maybe it was all a waste. Like they always said... We're idiots who've wasted our time on something as pointless as games. Game junkies who never leave their houses. Vegetables. But who cares? We knew that all along. We knew it, and we do it anyway. But we love games. We chose this. And sometimes we'll win, and sometimes we'll lose. So what? We've dedicated our lives to it. So it's real!
author: William Massachusetts

quote: When you protect someone you want to keep safe, do you always weigh your own life against theirs?
author: Hak Son

quote: Everyone smiles, when they are with you. Please... from now on, go and help people in my place. Share your happiness with them.
author: Yui

quote: You stole this world and it's people. You're a king of thieves, alone upon a stolen throne!
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: If  you are lookin' back all the time, you'll never get ahead!
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: Do evil, get caught, then claim demons were brainwashing you. A common way that human politicians evade responsibility.
author: Maou

quote: Keeping all the wealth for yourself may make your rich, but it won’t make you prosperous. You give people money, and they spend it. True prosperity comes from a free flow of wealth and goods.
author: Maou

quote: If people want to, they can become angels or demons themselves.
author: Rika Suzuki

quote: There's no way of telling what people will do when their entire world gets turned upside down. There are people who selfishly take advantage  of the chaos and nice people who try to help others before even worrying about themselves.
author: Rika Suzuki

quote: Sometimes it's necessary to courageously retreat.
author: Ashiya Shirou

quote: I fell for you out of my own free will. So if I ever fall out of love, that'll be my own decision too.
author: Chiho Sasaki

quote: The peaceful world I'm fighting for is one where everyone has a smile on their face, not one where I have to pretend I didn't see you make my friend cry. I don't think that kind of peace is worth fighting for. And I don't think it's worth making sacrifices to achieve it.
author: Emi Yusa

quote: Life is like a node which is born within the flow of information. As a species of life that carries DNA as its memory system... man gains his individuality from the memories he carries. While memories may as well be the same as fantasy... it is by these memories that mankind exists.
author: Puppet Master

quote: All things change in a dynamic environment. Your effort to remain what you are is what limits you.
author: Puppet Master

quote: And can you offer me proof of your existence? How can you, when neither modern science nor philosophy can explain what life is?
author: Puppet Master

quote: Regret is the domain of those who have earned the right to look back at the past. All I have is shame.
author: Kurama

quote: There is no greater accomplishment in life than pushing yourself to the limit, always! Isn’t that so? That’s all there is to it!
author: Kiyotaka Ishimaru

quote: The city is changing. Our surroundings, and even ourselves. And then one day, just about everything will change…
author: Okazaki Tomoya

quote: Please don’t apologize. If you did, and I forgave you, then it’d be like it was all a lie. I want to hold those memories we had dear. The fun times… The painful times… All of it. So please, don’t apologize.
author: Fujibayashi Ryou

quote: You’re the spore of a flower. You’ll be going on a trip, taken away by the wind. To go to new places and meet new people. You shouldn’t always rely on your sister. Even if you’re apart, your bonds still remain. That’s what family is.
author: Sunohara Youhei

quote: If you get all worked up yourself, you’ll always get someone who’ll rebel. Being too eager brings negative results.
author: Sagara Misae

quote: What’s important is not losing sight of your path.
author: Yoshino Yūsuke

quote: Who’ll give up when it comes to such a mere setback? We haven’t lost yet! We’ll kneel on the floor and regret only after all possibilities are exhausted!
author: Yoshii Akihisa

quote: People normally say that mood and body have a close relationship. As the heart becomes weaker, the body will fall ill
author: Yoshii Akihisa

quote: Fear comes from within, and isn’t something that can be conquered psychologically in such a short while.
author: Yoshii Akihisa

quote: Nobody will be happy being told off for something they never did.
author: Sakamoto Yuuji

quote: Only I can help myself, and in the future, I can make up for all my misfortunes and change the world into a place where there's no irrational discrimination and that's why there's no way in hell that I can die here!
author: Mine

quote: When you are experienced you can become overly confident and such confidence can prove fatal.
author: Horo

quote: Living your life to the fullest 'til the moment of your death, this is the rule to live by in any world.
author: Crusty

quote: At times the life of a single man is worth more than that of a million, I thought that'd be common sense to a soldier.
author: Diethard Ried

quote: Right now, I'm letting you live. And I'll continue to keep you alive... until you've grown enough to become worth killing.
author: Hisoka

quote: Between dreams and reality is the vault of your soul. No one could see the “Dream World” without this path.
author: Ginko

quote: On this hand, imagine that these four fingers represent the animals, and the thumb represents plants. Then let's say people are here... On the tip of the middle finger, farthest from the heart.
author: Ginko

quote: Sometimes the best way to solve your own problems is to help someone else.
author: Iroh

quote: The moment you say a word of parting, you've already parted. So long as you and I are both somewhere in this world, we haven’t parted. So long as you don’t say it, you haven’t parted.
author: Satone Shichimiya

quote: What a laughable attempt. You should just stay where you are, groveling at my feet.
author: Akashi Seijuurou

quote: I am the shadow that has overcome the light.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: Violence is the greatest power of the world!
author: Meruem

quote: That’s right. I’m nice. After everything that has happened in my life, I still haven’t gone after anyone or anything in revenge. If I were normal I would have destroyed the world by now. In a sense it makes me a savior of sorts.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Knowing more means having more shit to deal with, you know.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Loneliness is peaceful, but there'll be no one to share happiness with.
author: Ayumu Aikawa

quote: This world is full of secrets meant never to be disturbed.
author: Ayumu Aikawa

quote: This is my darkness. Nothing anyone says can console me.
author: Mato Kuroi

quote: In this world, when you face forward, that's the future. When you look back, it's a memory. And if you clip a part of it out, that becomes a story.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: Being indebted to someone is nothing to be ashamed of. Not repaying that debt is.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: I was feeling down, but you distracted me by subjecting me to your selfish whims. There are times when selfishness can save a person.
author: Yuuji Kazami

quote: Good… death is chasing me. Ones who kill are also chased by death, always living alongside death… Jobs that risk one’s soul are truly beautiful! How rewarding… my battlefield!
author: Solf J. Kimblee

quote: It's not that I'm not sure or anything. I actually don't want to think about it. It's not that I don't care about the future, but I'm mystified as to why I should have to be in a rush to narrow things down right this minute. It's not that I'm trying to escape from it, but I want a little more of what I have now, easy and... or rather, spending time having fun. That's kind of how I feel.
author: Akiyama Sou

quote: The closer you are to someone, the more you have to put things into words to get your feelings across.
author: Sasaki Kaori

quote: Seeing them as the same is wrong. It's a touchy subject, but the weight of something you bear with your own power and with someone else's are different.
author: Maiko Shuu

quote: In the end, mustering the courage to confess is up to the people
author: Maiko Shuu

quote: If a person continues killing, their heart changes into that of a demon without them even noticing.
author: Gensei

quote: Old, young, man, woman,  a life is a life. Sinner or Saint it makes no difference at all.
author: Gensei

quote: No matter how many good deeds you perform, your past sins cannot be erased.
author: Sheele

quote: The world is a dark place... because you have a gloomy look on your face.
author: No-Sense

quote: To kill the one you love... If someone else will do it anyway, I'd rather do it myself.
author: Kurome

quote: Nanika, will you forgive me for being a bad big brother?
author: Killua Zoldyck

quote: Who falls for who depends completely on the person. If there are a hundred people, there are a hundred ways to love... There never is one absolute form of love.
author: Nenji Kashiwazaki

quote: Once my stomach settles down... You better be prepared, 'cause we'll really give you something to cry about in the mat... ugh... ch... uughh...
author: Shōyō Hinata

quote: It's true that I'm not very tall. However! I can jump!
author: Shōyō Hinata

quote: I kept the ball in the air, it’s not your place to give up.
author: Yuu Nishinoya

quote: Magic is not meant to be used to kill people... but without power we can't even protect the ones we love...
author: Mirajane Strauss

quote: You don’t win alone. That’s just how it is.
author: Tobio Kageyama

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Shōyō Hinata

quote: Little by little, what you’ve begun will naturally become important to you. What you need at the start is a little bit of curiosity.
author: Kiyoko Shimizu

quote: Lives are never of equal value. There is always a ranking order.
author: Mako Fujisaki

quote: You came without fear. Don't have any regrets, no matter what happens. This is the duel you wanted.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: You just went for my head, didn't you? You know you could kill someone by hitting a vital spot in their head, right? If you know this, then you were trying to kill me, right? So whatever I do next is what you deserve, right?
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: Because they saved me from myself, they rescued me from my loneliness. They were the first to accept me for who I am. They're my friends.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: They all grow up, the youths that are going to live in this era. Go forward, youths. Like a wind on a field. Your burning blood, sweat, and tears... are as beautiful as a parasol. Show no fear, youths.
author: Mavis Vermillion

quote: The fact that I’m standing here means that I’m resolved to fight for my guild. I do not need your sympathy. As long as I’m still standing, please come at me with all you’ve got! Please do!
author: Wendy Marvell

quote: It’s natural that men have things they need to protect.
author: Furukawa Akio

quote: Truly and deeply, thank you for giving, my life to me.
author: Kanade Tachibana

quote: You shouldn’t stop like that. If you can move forward, then you should.
author: Furukawa Nagisa

quote: Team isn't just something to be protected. A team also protects you. We don't support each because we are a team. We are a team because we support each other.
author: Teppei Kiyoshi

quote: As the survivors, we carry the feelings of those who've passed away on our shoulders.
author: Akame

quote: It's kinda scary how much people trust me.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Wrong or not, I'll follow my own path!
author: Mine

quote: People like you disgust me. You can't even face your own weakness.
author: Murasaki

quote: In this crazy-ass world, there's no point in playing the blame game.
author: Mahiro Fuwa

quote: When people truly get serious about something, all you can do is stay quiet and watch.
author: Ai Kotani

quote: When you close your eyes and look at the world, what do you see?
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: I, Okazaki Nagisa, will no longer cry. No matter what painful things I face, I’ll hang in there and overcome it. But, I might cry during moments of happiness. I hope that you can get along… with someone like me.
author: Furukawa Nagisa

quote: Ashes to ashes. Dust to dust. We are nothing, but dust and to dust we shall return. Amen.
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: Violence is never the right answer, unless used against heathens and monsters.
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: We mock their desperate wishes, and trample them like insects! Cowardly, base - we're more demonic than demons are! I'm just like them. I'm full of the same ugliness they were. This is how humans are. It's how we are, Sebastian!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Playing a game by yourself is boring. You need a loser to crush so badly they can't recover.
author: Five

quote: What isn't remembered never happened.
author: Lain Iwakura

quote: The Bird of the Hermes is my name, eating my wings to make me tame.
author: Alucard

quote: The moment a person says he's working hard without thinking, he's still being naive. He is not trying at all!
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: Your so-called "self-sacrifice" only satisfies yourself. Do you think you can save people with it? You're only protecting yourself! You don't know the suffering endured by those left alive. With your childish actions, you're only pushing the pain onto other people!
author: Elliot Nightray

quote: If you make light of other people's emotions, it will surely come back to bite you.
author: Kyōko Kirigiri

quote: Every living person is bound to have embarrassing memories and things that they want to keep secret.
author: Monokuma

quote: Girls could never understand the passionate bonds that we men share. Male friendship is a bond that runs thicker than blood!
author: Kiyotaka Ishimaru

quote: A man's weight consists nothing but what he burdens himself with.
author: Mondo Oowada

quote: Humans are suspicious and jealous creatures. When they see something perfect, they wanna find a flaw.
author: Hattori Heiji

quote: Don’t forget that kindness can hurt people too.
author: Himeko Inaba

quote: Don't mess with things that don't exist! It's dangerous!
author: Teshigawara Naoya

quote: He who is blessed with strength should become the guide. That is all.
author: Yamato Hotsuin

quote: You know… When something bad happens, I don’t like thinking it was someone else’s fault. See, if it’s someone else’s fault, then there’s nothing I, personally, can do about it. I want to think it’s all up to me. If that’s the case, then I can do something about the things that go wrong. Then I can always run and always fly.
author: Arata Kohata

quote: You’re wrong! None of that makes any sense! Grief and suffering isn’t something that can be taken away by dying in a fight! You have to resolve your problems by talking and explaining your points of view. Relying on others for it is wrong!
author: Mato Kuroi

quote: Isn’t there something strange in becoming friends because you’re asked? Friends aren’t given
author: Fujibayashi Kyou

quote: What are you so hesitant about? It’s your dream, isn’t it? It’s right in front of you and you’re wavering? You gotta be reckless, and take whatever you can!
author: Okazaki Tomoya

quote: The difference between stupidity and genius, is that genius has its limits.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: You are who you are. You have to do what you can.
author: Okazaki Tomoya

quote: Love, passion, why do we get caught up by such troublesome feelings? The mind couldn't ever get things straight, and you lose control to know what is sensible. Deep down it's all so vexing.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: If you love someone, they could make you sad. They could even make you feel lonely sometimes. But, that someone can also make you happier than you'll ever be.
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: The sun rises today and sets again. A flower that bloomed in the morning, falls from its stem. The sun sets today and rises again. Flowers bloom to fill the land, but not the flowers of yesterday...
author: Ginko

quote: People... humans are the being who look for happiness. What the Britannian boy, Lelouch, wanted to have was nothing but a small happiness. It's nothing special. At least at the root of his motives, there were only humble wishes that were simply natural to any human. Who could ever disclaim such dreams and such vows? Who could ever have the right to do that? However, whoever you might be, without choice, you have to deal with others and with the world, and have yourself be regulated and set down. Therefore, in the face of the world's wills, your personal speculations are so ephemeral they can't help being overwhelmed. Sins and punishments, destiny and judgment. What stands in front of Lelouch is the past he brought forth by himself. Is it a hatred resulting from the fact that humans are humans? Nonetheless, for now, we should be grateful... Yes, at least, to the fact that humans are the beings who look for happiness.
author: C.C.

quote: Doing what one likes is the right of the powerful.
author: Yakumo Oomori

quote: No matter what happens, no matter what, never stop, always keep walking.
author: Mana Walker

quote: It's human nature to judge by appearance. It's not just males who are superficial. No one bothers about things they cannot see... like the heart.
author: Yuzuru Shino

quote: There are no guarantees. But if there’s a chance it could help everyone avoid the calamity, isn’t it worth it? It’s sad when people die.
author: Mei Misaki

quote: But if that’s what you want to do, you might as well try. It’s just pathetic to give up on something before you even give it a shot.
author: Reiko Mikami

quote: That’s important, isn’t it? Whether you look good or pathetic in your own eyes.
author: Reiko Mikami

quote: I don’t like someone who makes a fool out of earnest people.
author: Noriko Paku

quote: Little fool, demons exist, all right. They’re inside our hearts.
author: Fujimoto Shirou

quote: If you were to write a story with me in the lead role, it would certainly be... a tragedy.
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: There are times when you have to give up on one thing to preserve the other. Your mother couldn't. That isn't kindness. That's just being weak.
author: Rize Kamishiro

quote: Sometimes good people make bad choices. It doesn't mean they are bad people. It means they're human.
author: Kishou Arima

quote: Mysterious things, when you were a child you used to think "They exist for sure!", but all of a sudden it changes to, "It would be nice if they existed." I wonder when and why you stop believing.
author: Akari Mizunashi

quote: Protecting someone means giving them a place to belong. Giving them a place where they can be happy.
author: Rayneshia El-Arte Corwen

quote: People tend to show off their act of kindness. It is not an act of good will, it is a demand because they are expecting a word of grace as a reward.
author: Itoshiki Nozomu

quote: The brighter they shine, the darker the shadow grows.
author: Makino Fumito

quote: Goodbyes aren't a one-sided affair!
author: Tetsudō Hisakawa

quote: Forgiving someone and being forgiven, that’s what binds people together.
author: Nagi Sanzenin

quote: Humans don’t see what they don’t want to see. No one wants to be put down. That’s why people do nothing even when they do know something is happening.
author: Kouta Hirano

quote: A world where power is everything. A world where the weak are trampled on and crushed. That’s why I… prayed to get stronger. To be strong like him.
author: Hidetora Toujo

quote: Words are imperfect. Putting it in words will just create misunderstandings. Words are the root of misunderstandings.
author: Nagi Sanzenin

quote: If you follow your rage into battle, I have a feeling that terrible things can happen.
author: Aladdin

quote: You’re always in my mind and it makes me both happy and sad.
author: Kuroyukihime

quote: I’m not the same as you. I’ll never dream about things that I know won’t come true.
author: Chiriko Tsurumi

quote: Love is hating someone but you still want to be with them.
author: Taichi Mashima

quote: What good are dreams, if all you do is work? There's more to life than hitting the books, I hope you know.
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: Every time I deal with another person, I’m reminded how little control I have over my life.
author: Shizuku Mizutani

quote: When you're upset, try making the intelligent decision. And then, you might actually get something you want for a change.
author: Tōdō Kaoru

quote: People do change, little by little.
author: Tetsudō Hisakawa

quote: The briefest glimpse of your smile is far more dazzling than any fireworks display.
author: Io Otonashi

quote: People can't live without their memories. But hey can't live on their memories alone either. They have to wake up from their dreams. Those dreams will become sadness if they don't. Even if you wake up from your dream, your memories will still be there. So please smile. I want our memories to be happy to the very end. I wish everyone would keep smiling so that everyone could be happy and everybody could be warmer.
author: Minagi Tohno

quote: There is a meaning for wings that cannot fly! It's a precious memory of when you once flew in the sky.
author: Yukito Kunisaki

quote: ...And the unbreaking bonds will... The bonds will... Ah, what was it? Ah, well. There was a bunch of stuff about the unbreakable bonds that you'll have to deal with while your guts overflow! Show the results of your everyday training and guts! Show off that splendor and guts to those weaklings without it! To make this tournament the best memory ever! By overcoming all sorts obstacles through trial and hardship and getting up everytime we fall down! OVERCOME EVERYTHING WITH GUTS!!
author: Sogiita Gunha

quote: It is not justice that can oppose evil. It is an absolute evil that overpowers evil itself.
author: Tendou Kisara

quote: God gave us eyes at the front of our heads so we can look forward to the future.
author: Kamina

quote: I have someone I like. I never had the confidence and I’ve doubted my feelings countless of times. But, when she stays by my side and smiles with me, I feel like I can do anything.
author: Yoshida Haru

quote: Crying when you need to cry is another way to show strength.
author: Fay D. Flourite

quote: One day a man had a dream. He dreamed that he was a butterfly. He fluttered and fluttered, flew and flew. He so loved the feeling of freedom that he decided that he was a butterfly. But when he woke up, he wasn't a butterfly. He was a human after all. Then the man thought, "I wonder if I, The Man, dreamed that I was a butterfly or if this moment is truly the dream. Maybe the man I am now is a dream that a butterfly is having.
author: Doumeki Haruka

quote: I am who I am because I learned your ideals and took your prayers to the heart. You've guided me. You've given me a life a mere puppet wouldn't have. You need not to pity me. I am a part of you.
author: Irisviel von Einzbern

quote: Nothing that happens is ever forgotten, even if you can't remember it.
author: Zeniba

quote: They may all look the same to you, but there are different kinds and different levels of evil. A first-class villain doesn't target honest lives.
author: Accelerator

quote: It doesn't matter what the essence of it is. The truth is what's hidden inside.
author: Hiro Hirono

quote: As a leader, you need to learn from the mistakes of others, not your own.
author: Nobuchika Ginoza

quote: No matter what troubles you shoulder, remember that in time, things will change. You shouldn't blame yourself when things don't go your way.
author: Mitsuki Sarue

quote: If you wanna make people dream, you've gotta start by believing in that dream yourself!
author: Seiya Kanie

quote: Children, this is the only gift I can give you right now. A formless gift you call a memory. I don’t have any money and I can’t give you something tangible. But even so, even if it isn’t tangible, a memory is something that will continue to be with you. That is what I believe…
author: Yoshino Yūsuke

quote: Strong emotions are what connect people. If you truly want to understand each other, don’t stop thinking about them.
author: Sumeragi Lee Noriega

quote: When you're in front of the enemy, even if your hands are trembling - fight.
author: Kureo Mado

quote: I think that loving someone is utterly useless. The more you want to be loved the more it will make you miserable
author: Kyoko Mogami

quote: You can't change the world without getting your hands dirty.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Don’t use such strong words. It'll only make you look weak.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Our crying for them won't bring the dead back to life.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Whether you like me or not, the fact that you're precious to me won't change, no matter what.
author: Hikari Sakishima

quote: After spending most of my life trying to live as someone else wanted, I’d apparently forgotten who I was.
author: Iori Nagase

quote: You still haven’t noticed that something precious to you has been replaced.
author: Haku

quote: No matter what kind of past you had, don't lose sight of yourself.
author: Ayato Naoi

quote: Whether you like it or not, time will leave you behind. In the same way that your beauty will wither away with time. In order to cling to the glorious past, people achieve peace by hurting others. People know it isn't the right thing to do, but they're unable to stop any of it. Wouldn't you agree that someone needs to teach them a lesson?
author: Ribbons Almark

quote: No one knows what’s going to happen to the world. But I believe we have the ability to deal with that. Although we cannot change the past - we can change the future. We can change it into the world we desire.
author: Saji Crossroad

quote: I came to believe that a world where people can understand each other isn't impossible. That's why even if the world rejects me... even if the world blames me... I'll keep on fighting.
author: Lockon Stratos

quote: Kabuto: Isn't acknowledging what you can't do the same as giving up?
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: It's okay to feel depressed. It takes time to overcome things. And then, by taking that time, you just start moving forward again. That's just what humans do.
author: Mondo Oowada

quote: If you want to get to know someone, find out what makes them angry.
author: Gon Freecss

quote: If you stick to a "lie", it'll eventually become the "truth".
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: The stronger a person looks, the weaker he is.
author: Minami Ryusuke

quote: You can come up with any number of reasons why you love someone. Like they are cool, or kind, or tall, or rich. There are all sorts of reasons you can say, but those are all lies. They're just excuses you tell yourself to rationally justify your emotions. Well, not so much excuses, as tricks. It's like a ladder you climb, based on the conclusion that you love them. When you feel like you want to be together forever, that's love.
author: Tsukihi Araragi

quote: If there are people you would call naturals, because they were gifted with talent, and if my two rivals (Florence Alicia and Glory Athena) are such naturals, then I just need to have a talent that exceeds theirs, through hard work. Yes, I just have to become a prodigy.
author: Ferrari Akira E.

quote: I think... memories never disappear. Just like the paint I use. Even if I mix it with a new color. The old one still remains. Forever.
author: Ana Gram

quote: Love is nothing more than a cultural idea attached to our pre-existing genetic needs to reproduce and gain recognition from our peers.
author: Akane Senri

quote: You want me to roll over like a dog? Give up, and accept defeat.. Ha! That seems to be the sort of language that your kind is used to using. Language for cowards who forfeited their humanity, because they were too weak to survive as such. Don’t look down on humans, you monsters. Come on. I’ll send you all to hell.
author: Integra Hellsing

quote: Once you question your own belief, it's over.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Friends are treasures, help each other and value the bonds you have. Even if someone betrays you, never betray anyone yourself. And if someone's in trouble, don't just walk on by.
author: Ryōsuke Kirishima

quote: The past is not what needs to be rectified. We learn from the past to rectify the future.
author: Goyle

quote: If a sorry could resolve everything, why would there be a need for hell in this world?
author: Kyoko Mogami

quote: Living your life sympathizing with others in your everyday life is more powerful, than living your life based on a religious belief or some story.
author: Akuto Sai

quote: Humans were meant to work and sweat for their money after all. Those that try to get rich quickly or live at expense of others - all get divine retribution along the way. That is the lesson. But, one thing about humans is that they quickly forget the lesson they have learnt.
author: Jet Black

quote: I think that loving someone is utterly useless. The more you want to be loved the more it will make you miserable.
author: Kyoko Mogami

quote: Caring for things brings a lot of trouble.
author: Kou Mabuchi

quote: ...Who decided a student can't win against a teacher?!
author: Kouta Tsuchiya

quote: I just like those who try their best, even when they're afraid.
author: Kirishima Shouko

quote: Anyone can smile if you give them something to be happy about.
author: Setsuna F. Seiei

quote: You don't have to be reasonable when you're in love.
author: Emi Yusa

quote: Love hurts. But it can hurt worse if you allow your eyes to wander.
author: Kirishima Shouko

quote: The day when you'll understand me... will never come...
author: Saruhiko Fushimi

quote: I’m sorry. But, you know? I'm only human. It's natural that I'll fail on occasion.
author: Sumeragi Lee Noriega

quote: Planets are just places for people to stand on. Planets are just rocks. It takes people to make it a world. You can have as many "Earths" as you want. I only care about what's inside.
author: Sakamoto Tatsuma

quote: I can't promise you that good things will come to your life, but I do know that no one but you have the power to give meaning to your life in this world.
author: Rin Asogi

quote: If you believe in it, it is real. If you do not - it is fiction.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: Cry... yell... act tough... be proud of the way you live... LAUGH!
author: Tenka Kumō

quote: Don’t push your feelings onto others. No matter what pretty words you use, your kindness is just hypocrisy. You’re pretending to be nice only to make yourself feel better.
author: Hallelujah Haptism

quote: Our fates... can be changed. All we have to do is try.
author: Renya Kagurazaka

quote: Forget about revenge. The fate of those who seek revenge is grim. It's tragic, You will end up suffering and hurting yourself even more. Even if you do succeed in getting revenge, the only thing that remains is emptiness.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: No matter how sturdy something appears, it should have some weakness.
author: Susanoo

quote: The weak are destined to lie beneath the boots of the strong. If that angers you, overcome your deficits.
author: Esdeath

quote: It's certainly good to be smart, but I think it's better that there are all kinds of people in the world
author: Rin Okumura

quote: A guy with only a cat for a friend won't look attractive by playing cool.
author: Saya Minatsuki

quote: Once you expect something in return, your good deed is no longer just a good deed.
author: Kayo Senju

quote: If reality is nothing more than what is in our mind, then what is the difference between this world and a dream?
author: Yuca Collabell

quote: Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Even if I force myself to smile. It seems I'm the type of person who ends up being hated.
author: Sai

quote: The longer you keep a secret, the harder it becomes to say it.
author: Taishi Ichimiya

quote: Dedication is a talent all on its own.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: Individuality that stands apart from the rest is a great asset.
author: Mitsuki Nase

quote: There are things in this world that you cannot oppose, no matter how hard you try.
author: Zeref

quote: Search out the facts, then string them all together... and that's when the truth will be revealed.
author: Saji Crossroad

quote: My childhood was filled with blood and strife. I have never needed love. Not then, not now.
author: Uryuu Minene

quote: If you see a girl lookin' unhappy, be a man and help her.
author: Wave

quote: What's wrong isn't me, what's wrong is the world!
author: Kaneki Ken

quote: It's because I loved her the most that I wanted to kill her as swiftly as possible.
author: Akame

quote: Goodbyes are only one side of the coin. You can't say goodbye until you've said hello.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: "Are you prepared to die?". Most astronauts answer with a simple "yes", but you can say anything. It's just a weak yes. You shouldn't be prepared to die. Instead, you should have the resolve to live until the very end! If there's someone who replies "no", you can trust them.
author: Brian Jay

quote: Sincere feelings transcend time and connect hearts.
author: Fairy Tail

quote: Don’t give up! There’s no shame in falling down! True shame is to not stand up again!
author: Midorima Shintarou

quote: If you can't see what's important, then it's because you're too ashamed to open your eyes.
author: Ganta Igarashi

quote: Weak humans are sly and irresponsible, they always put the blame on and hurt others.
author: Toto Sakigami

quote: Don't you think that true memories are a combination of fun ones and painful ones?
author: Rin Okumura

quote: Being able to realize your own fault is a virtue.
author: Akasaka Ryuunosuke

quote: Cheer up. No matter how hopeless you are, even if everyone else abandons you, I’ll always be here for you.
author: Kousaka Kirino

quote: You don't understand death at all. That's why you can't kill me, and why you're only able to kill a weakened woman. If you could see death, you couldn't maintain your sanity. All you can perceive is the part which keeps things alive. If you could see death, you wouldn't be able to even stand... It's like the world on the moon, a desolate wasteland. Being able to see the "death" of things means you are forced to see the world's uncertainty and fragility. The ground is like it's not there, and the sky seems about to fall at any moment. You don't know of the illusion that the whole world could perish in an instant. That is what it means to see death. These eyes, this power isn't something you can boast about like you did. Do you see your mistake, now, vampire? Life and death may be back to back, but they will never face each other. I'll show you. This is what it means to kill something.
author: Shiki Tohno

quote: I'll die smiling! Because if you ever think of me in the future, I want you to remember me smiling.
author: Donquixote Rosinante

quote: Even if I know you'll reject me, even if I'm afraid you won't accept me, even if I know it will really hurt if you dump me - I still have to tell you how I feel!
author: Kousaka Kyousuke

quote: After all, lying for someone's sake doesn't make it a lie.
author: Mizuki Hayama

quote: No matter how much you treasure them, both people and things will die someday. The bonds, the feelings, the memories, the hearts, and the lives. There's nothing in this world that won't die. There's nothing that won't break. Happiness is nothing more than a fabrication
author: Mizuki Hayama

quote: A miracle never comes to those who seek it.
author: Amamiya Yuuko

quote: None of that will ever happen. I hate myself! But still, I have to keep these fantasies going! If I have a thousand of them, at least one of them might come true one day. If you stop fantasizing, you have no choice but to be crushed by reality.
author: Kidou Eita

quote: Even if everyone calls you a liar, even if you hate yourself, I’ll be on your side.
author: Inori Yuzuriha

quote: You should realize that there are people whose hearts break each time they see you hurt yourself.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: I can't tell you that… You have to figure it out. Stand up and walk. Keep moving forward. You've got two good legs. So get up and use them. You're strong enough to make your own path.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Adventurers are free. They are more free than we are. It's true that we may be weaker than they are. But that doesn't mean that, in our weakness, we can become aggressive. We don't have the right to take advantage of our weakness and use them as tools!
author: Rayneshia El-Arte Corwen

quote: Humans have a desire for truth or they have a desire to what they know is the truth. In other words, what the truth is exactly second to that. Be careful of what is the truth and what is lie. In other words, always doubt yourself. Harbor an inner devil as you read along... and I won't forget to add that by that point, you might have already fallen into my trap.
author: Deishū Kaiki

quote: I make my own decisions, and see them to the very end. I had to find my resolve, so I could remain true to myself.
author: Saya Kisaragi

quote: You should enjoy the little detours. To the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.
author: Ging Freecss

quote: If you can't move with your hands then play with your feet! If you don't have enough fingers, then use your nose as well! Whether you're sad, you're a mess, or you've hit rock bottom, you still have to play! That's how people like us survive.
author: Kaori Miyazono

quote: I’m fine with being a monster. I’m fine with having fake emotions. But I’ll protect Shu. Because I am me! Even if I’m just a fake… To me, I’m the only… real one!
author: Inori Yuzuriha

quote: We are taught never to shed tears. For to shed tears means that the body has been defeated by emotion. And to us, this simple act of crying proves, without question, that the existence of emotion is nothing but a burden.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: I lost my pawns, my knight, my rook, my bishop, and even my queen. But, it's not checkmate, just yet.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Even if I can’t see you… Even if we are separated far apart from each other… I’ll always be watching after you. I’ll definitely watch over you forever…
author: Makarov Dreyar

quote: In that case, you have nothing to fear. Mistakes aren’t made by locking your feelings away and holding back… They’re made while wearing your heart on your sleeve.
author: Mavis Vermillion

quote: Because people don't have wings... We look for ways to fly.
author: Ukai Keishin

quote: Everyone has to die someday. But what they believed in will never fade away as long as someone protects it. Once you've resolved to take on those principles, no matter how much blood and tears you shed, you follow through with it! That's what it means to be a knight.
author: Meliodas

quote: Life isn't about what can and can not be done, it's about doing it or not doing it!
author: Shio Sakaki

quote: Listen up, brats! Today’s defeat is the seed for tomorrow’s victory! We’ll rise up and show them! We don’t know the meaning of giving up!
author: Makarov Dreyar

quote: Comrades are comrades because they help each other out.
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: Most people are irresponsible, changing their opinions easily based on unconfirmed information or convenient rumors.
author: Saki Morimi

quote: We have no choice but to accept the one and only life we're given, no matter how cruel and heartless it might be.
author: Yuri Nakamura

quote: There is no such thing as perfect in this world. That may sound cliche, but it’s the truth. The average person admires perfection and seeks to obtain it. But what’s the point of achieving perfection? There is none. Nothing. Not a single thing. I spit on perfection! If something is perfect, then there is nothing left. There is no room for imagination. No place left for that person to gain additional knowledge or abilities. Do you know what that means? For scientists such as us, perfection only brings despair. It is our job to create things more wonderful than anything before them, but never to obtain perfection. A scientist must be a person who finds ecstasy while suffering from that antinomy.
author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri

quote: They are your words! This is your heart! Our desire to help our friends belongs to us!
author: Happy

quote: There were many times I felt on the verge of giving up… And many times when I met with big trouble, and met with some really tough opponents… But during that time, he would always be there. And so would everyone else from the guild. Crying together, laughing together, so many of these things. Well, a lot of things really did take place… I’m sure that’s the way it should be… I’m sure that everybody carries a certain burden of their own. But even then, everyone tries their best to keep moving forward. That’s what makes Fairy Tail what it is. I really joined the best guild ever.
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: If someone here were hurt or lost their life because of me, I think I would also be in pain much like Loke. But, it’ll be all right. If everyone works together and unites in power, we can overcome any pinch ahead, right?
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Think of your shivers as excitement rather than fear. Cover the anxiety on your face with a smile.
author: Kurusu Keigo

quote: In life, it's better to assume that bad things will happen to you rather than good things. You can't look at someone else's success and assume that it will happen to you. There are a lot of people in the world, so it makes sense that one or two of them are going to be fortunate. But there's only one of you. Assuming that good fortune will come to you is no different than pointing a finger at a random person and predicting the same for them. But do you think that prediction would come true?
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: The important thing is to think of something nobody else is thinking of. "Ignorance is a sin" is not about knowledge - it's about wisdom.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: While it may be that ignorance is a sin, it's impossible to know everything.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: Stories are better when they have an ending, are they not?
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: When the time comes, I may need to borrow your chest to cry upon. That's one promise I'll need from you.
author: Horo

quote: The world is indeed full of malice, but there are some pitfalls one can avoid as long as one knows of them- ignorance is a sin, after all.
author: Horo

quote: If you value your peaceful everyday life, protect it for yourself.
author: Gai Tsutsugami

quote: When someone does something nice for you… shut up and accept it!
author: Tsugumi

quote: Life's a bitch, so if it's easy, you're doing it wrong.
author: Rin Okumura

quote: You were always there for me, and that’s all I needed. Just you. For some reason, I didn't feel sad or broken up, it just didn't seem real. But slowly I realized it was real – that you were gone. And little by little, I slowly felt something inside me go numb.
author: Jet Black

quote: Suppose that you were sitting down at a table. The napkins are in front of you, which napkin would you take? The one on your ‘left’? Or the one on your ‘right’? The one on your left side? Or the one on your right side? Usually you would take the one on your left side. That is ‘correct’ too. But in a larger sense on society, that is wrong. Perhaps I could even substitute ‘society’ with the ‘Universe’. The correct answer is that ‘It is determined by the one who takes his or her own napkin first.’ …Yes? If the first one takes the napkin to their right, then there’s no choice but for others to also take the ‘right’ napkin. The same goes for the left. Everyone else will take the napkin to their left, because they have no other option. This is ‘society’… Who are the ones that determine the price of land first? There must have been someone who determined the value of money, first. The size of the rails on a train track? The magnitude of electricity? Laws and Regulations? Who was the first to determine these things? Did we all do it, because this is a Republic? Or was it Arbitrary? NO! The one who took the napkin first determined all of these things! The rules of this world are determined by that same principle of ‘right or left?’! In a Society like this table, a state of equilibrium, once one makes the first move, everyone must follow! In every era, this World has been operating by this napkin principle. And the one who ‘takes the napkin first’ must be someone who is respected by all. It’s not that anyone can fulfill this role… Those that are despotic or unworthy will be scorned. And those are the ‘losers’. In the case of this table, the ‘eldest’ or the ‘Master of the party’ will take the napkin first… Because everyone ‘respects’ those individuals.
author: Funny Valentine

quote: Look well at Integra’s “battle”, Police girl! Integra cut herself open, shed her own blood… and chose to fight for her life. Giving up kills people. When people reject giving up… they finally win the right to transcend humanity. “Never give up, even if it means death”… that is the pride and dignity of our
author: Alucard

quote: Failing to act, for fear of the risk, is no different than a living death. No matter what world you’re in.
author: Crusty

quote: Humans lose focus of the big picture when they’re drunken in the midst of their feelings.
author: Tojuro Hattori

quote: I am content with just being a flower, blooming and withering away… that’s all I ever needed.
author: Dune

quote: Despair… It hides away propagates, expands, and finally explodes.
author: Gantz

quote: There comes a time when we can no longer tell the invaders from the invaded. That is what we call “War”.
author: Gantz

quote: Lots of things change with the flow of time. But there are things that never change. Things that are precious because they change, and things that are precious because they don’t change… Both are precious. Don’t you feel the same?
author: Akari Mizunashi

quote: Isn’t it okay to consider sad or hard times as the seasoning that lets you enjoy life? You can change them inside yourself so that you can enjoy anything. It truly is a wonderful thing, living each day.
author: Grandma Akino

quote: I never wanted to save the world or make everyone happy. I never wanted to play God like that. If I could just save my family, and my friends… If I could just be a hero like that, I’d be happy.
author: Sakura Kyouko

quote: Does losing prove that you are weak? Isn't losing difficult for all of you? A challenge where, after ending up on your hands and knees, you must see if you can stand up again? If you stay on your hands and knees, that proves that you are weak.
author: Ittetsu Takeda

quote: When a human is victorious is when they're most vulnerable.
author: Toua Tokuchi

quote: A woman's jealousy is blacker than the oceans deepest chasm. You may all begin screaming now.
author: Ryuuguu Otohime

quote: This eternally cursed power. This extremely disgusting existence! May this wretched body help me protect the things most important to me now! This is the only power that makes atonement for my sins possible! Ashes to Ashes, Dust to Dust, Earth to Earth! Amen!
author: Abel Nightroad

quote: What people seek when the depths of despair and death are upon them, may be the silhouettes of the ones they love.
author: Casshern

quote: For those who love another... To disobey, to rage, to curse, to fight, to kill... None of these disproves that love. A love that's too strong may even make those more likely.
author: Khamsin Nbh'w

quote: I killed many people to act on my ideal. I killed so many that I stopped caring about innocent people and I saved a thousand times as many as I killed.
author: Archer

quote: Was I not clear? Then lemme give you an example. Say that somewhere, there's this guy who's suffering the absolute worst fate in the world you could possibly think of. You get wind of this guy somehow and hearing what he's going through really upsets you. That would be meaningless sentimentality I'm talking about. This is a far-off, distant world we're talking about, one you shouldn't concern yourself with. So even if someone in this far-off world leads such a sad existence, it won't keep you from living every day with a smile on your face.
author: Avenger

quote: Do all of you really want... to win that badly? You all want the Grail that desperately?! You'd crush the only wish I have in my heart... do none of you feel any shame at all?! I won't forgive you... I? won't forgive ANY of you for this! All of you monsters who'd disregard a knight's honor for personal gain... let my blood taint your dreams! Let the Grail be cursed! Let the wish it grants bring disaster! And when you fall into the pits of hell... remember the rage of Diarmuid!
author: Lancer

quote: Pleasure is another thing that I lack. I seek for it but cannot find it.
author: Kotomine Kirei

quote: A warrior would rather die, than survive defeat.
author: Assassin

quote: If you cut a thread, and then tie it, the thickness will be different where you originally cut it, right? In that sense, it means irreversible change.
author: Kaminski Natalia

quote: People remember their high school days as the high point of their lives. People say these things because everyone holds fond memories of their time in high school
author: Oreki Houtarou

quote: People who are confident in themselves never talk about expectations. "Expectation" is a word rooted in giving up. It leaves you with no other choice. It makes it obvious that you're powerless.
author: Satoshi Fukube

quote: The best way to tame a mystery is with another mystery.
author: Oreki Houtarou

quote: No matter how important a person is, some day you will lose them. No matter how much you desire it, eternity is one thing you will never possess. It’s the time you do spend with that person that’s important, so that you can meet your parting without regret.
author: Amamiya Yuuko

quote: Even if I’m not perfect… Even if I’m not the ideal me… He says that I’m still my own person.
author: Iori Nagase

quote: But once you grow old, you become afraid of even losing things without any value.
author: Yuichi Onodera

quote: Do you have any idea how terrible the things you did really mean? Do you understand what it means to destroy a human being's sense of good and evil? Can you even begin to comprehend what happens when you awaken the monster inside each us? People should know in their hearts that food tastes good. They should always look forward to having picnics and wonderful places on their weekends. They should think that beer tastes good after a hard day's work. People should know how they should feel, that they're suppose to grieve, from the bottom of their hearts when they have to bury their own child.
author: Wolfgang Grimmer

quote: Whether here or in the real world, you can cry when it hurts. There's no rule that you can't show feelings just because it's a game.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: In every world, once you die, you're gone.
author: Akihiko Kayaba

quote: When I began thinking of him as I fell asleep, I stopped having nightmares. I began to look forward to seeing him. For the first time since I arrived here, I was happy.
author: Asuna Yūki

quote: To protect themselves, human souls can merge fantasy with reality.
author: Alice

quote: How much weight can a simple promise carry?
author: Yoshino Takigawa

quote: Fragility is always lurking behind our peaceful day-to-day life. Terrible things don’t only happen in places far beyond our reach.
author: Kyousuke Natsume

quote: A half moon. A bright half and a dark half. Just like me.
author: Gasai Yuno

quote: We are the sum of our memories. Erasing the memories edged in oneself is the same as loosing oneself.
author: Ergo Proxy

quote: This area feels weird, it's been throbbing hard since that time. When you told me not to go. When you held me so tight. It won't go away. Your voice is still in my ear. What happened to me? Is this... love?
author: Mashiro Shiina

quote: What is the point if those with the means and power do not fight?
author: Eren Jaeger

quote: I too used to believe that the world would be a better place if I hadn’t been born. I was hated merely for the fact that I existed, and I died for the happiness of many people. But there was one thing I wished for with all my heart... If I’m ever given a second chance in life, I want to live for only myself. That is my sincere wish.
author: Ymir

quote: Even if you have your reasons and there are things you can't tell me, no matter what, I'm on your side.
author: Historia Reiss

quote: I was, I am, and I remain a soldier, sworn to devote my heart and soul to the restoration of humankind! There is no greater glory than than dying for that belief!
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: We didn’t give up on our dreams! We changed our dreams into your dream! That’s what parents do! That’s what a family does!
author: Furukawa Akio

quote: I hate this town. It’s too filled with memories I’d rather forget. I go to school every day, hang out with my friends, and then go home. There’s no place I’d rather not go ever again. I wonder if anything will ever change? Will that day ever come?
author: Okazaki Tomoya

quote: Isn’t it fine as long as you find it? Isn’t it fine as long as you find the next fun and happy moments again?
author: Okazaki Tomoya

quote: Even if I could redo the past, I must not take back what has already happened, because if I do that, everything would be a lie: those tears, that pain, those memories, that cold reality that hurts my heart, all of it. There were people who died in pain. There were people who risked their lives to save others. There were people who mourned for the deaths. But then, if everything were taken back and it did not happen, where would all of those go? The dead people would not come back. Reality cannot be overturned. To continue on remembering the pain and the weight… isn't that how lost things remain? People will eventually die and death itself is sad, but pain shouldn't be the only thing that remains. A death is painful, but it also leaves behind bright memories. As I am bound by these people's deaths… As I am protected by my memories of Kiritsugu... I believe memories become constraints and change the people living now... Even if... They are memories that will eventually be forgotten.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: There are many kinds of fights in this world, but if you don't stick to the rules you won't win support from the people around you.
author: Maebara Ichirō

quote: A skilled dictator is much more beneficial to humanity than a democracy of ignorant people.
author: Gene Smilas

quote: A guy who can't do what needs to be done today, definitely can't do it tomorrow.
author: Goro Shigeno

quote: I will acknowledge you as my enemy and destroy you.
author: Acnologia

quote: I particularly dislike this emotion you call ANGER. It makes me lose sight of myself, you know. Just thinking of what happens to me if I'm not MYSELF. Disgusts me to no end.
author: Mard Geer

quote: 'Goodbye' is the word that I've come to hate the most.
author: Goro Shigeno

quote: People change. And as the years go by, so do our environments. I think it’s alright for there not to be a "proper" way of living. But I do believe that instead of trying to be satisfied on just one answer and blocking out the rest, searching for more answers, despite the pain they may bring, is a much more honest way of living.
author: Harumi Shuntarou

quote: Everyone in this world carries around their own sins, and they never go away...but that doesn't change the fact that we do what we must.
author: Wolfgang Grimmer

quote: You don't like being lonely, but you're afraid of people expressing their affection towards you. You pretend not to notice. You run away. You brush it off. You cover up. You reject. You even lie to yourself, convincing yourself that no one has any feelings for you.
author: Rika Shiguma

quote: The system created by the divine ones segregates every single person into his living assignment in the world, determines his roles and controls them...the melancholy voices of those born into this world have pierced the depths of my heart. I feel the need to do something for them without discriminating against anyone.
author: Celestin

quote: The double grief of a lost bliss is to recall its happy hour in pain.
author: Shuichiro Keido

quote: Well, everyone's unsure of their fighting abilities. When that happens, just train more! When you're afraid, just train! When something doesn't feel right, just train! When you don't believe in yourself anymore, just train! The only thing that won't betray you is your training.
author: Shio Sakaki

quote: Even the most noble of the sacrifices is based on "self satisfaction". Jesus Christ himself was crucified for the sake of his people for "self satisfaction". That's why you shouldn't expect anything in return when you help someone. Because the moment you expect something, your act would become worthless.
author: Seiko Miyazawa

quote: Only brute warriors find glory in destruction!
author: Saber

quote: A king must live a life more vivid than any other and be figure for all to admire! The king is the one who collects the envy of all his heroes and stands as their guide! Therefore, the king is not alone! For his will equals that of all his followers combined!
author: Rider

quote: A miracle something like that won't come if you're waiting for it. A miracle is something you work for!
author: Taro Raimon

quote: Only two kinds of people exist in this world, those who steal and those who are stolen from.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Time never comes back once it’s gone.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: Is it really worth saving this sad and ugly world, when there is nothing left after it is saved? With all this death, cruelty and sadness, do you still want to become a hero?
author: Archer

quote: We're all the same. No one really remembers the day he was born. We all have to trust another's word on the matter. It doesn't matter if it's true or not. Just having a birthday makes one happy I think.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: He who forgives and acknowledges himself... that is what it truly means to be strong!
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Let us talk about the brain. The brain is said to be the place where our consciousness resides. As we speak, each of us possesses our own distinct consciousness. We are all experiencing reality through our own point of view. To each of us, reality unfolds as a unique story as a result of our consciousness. However, looking to the outside from this box called the self, reality is subjective.
author: Akihiko Chuuzenji

quote: Dear me - how pitiful. A monster like me, lagging from such a small wound?
author: Abel Nightroad

quote: Do you think your sin will disappear if you lie?
author: Johann Liebert

quote: People who can see get to choose... if you want them to know you can see. To pretend to be able to see, even when you can't... Or to pretend that you can't see even when you can.
author: Akagi Shigeru

quote: I am not so noble that I would stake my life for someone else. Nor am I so forgiving that I would sit by and allow someone to trample me. I am selfish... and self righteous human being! That's why! I... to clear my own shame... I used your power. Not for anyone else! But for myself!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: You don't get to choose who you fall for. The heart doesn't always work the way you want it to. You should just follow your feelings honestly. You'll be happier that way.
author: Ayumi Sanda

quote: No matter how you look, as long as your judgement is clouded you won't find the truth.
author: Igor Neuhaus

quote: The best way to succeed is to use your own abilities to the fullest.
author: Yukio Okumura

quote: Such shallow emotions evoked by simple and cheerful stories won't solve anything! What people need is a more tangible sense of values with which to resolve the conflicts of everyday life! Even if that causes others to think of you as warped, as long as you can remain true to yourself until the moment you die
author: Sachi Nanjou

quote: Wherever there is hope, there is most definitely despair.
author: Junko Enoshima

quote: I hate people with a big heart. All they do is look down on you from above. They don’t give a damn about the petty struggles of the people serving under them. If that’s what it means to be a king, then that’s just sad and pathetic.
author: Saruhiko Fushimi

quote: Not many can do the “right thing” when it counts.
author: Kuroh Yatogami

quote: We all live under the same sky. If each of us learns to shine, it won't matter how far apart we are. We'll be able to see each other.
author: Minori Kushieda

quote: As long as no one got hurt, it's all good. Who cares who saved who?
author: Kamijou Touma

quote: You don’t need a good reason to save a friend. If you want to save them, then save them. I know someone who kept saying those stupid things even when he was driven to the brink of death, and he really did save over 10,000 people in the end. And that idiot that saved so many people is trying to save someone today like always. I know I can’t stop him. No matter how much I don’t want him to do anything dangerous, seeing him off with a push to the back is the sign of a good woman!
author: Mikoto Misaka

quote: If you want to do something and have the power for it, then do it!
author: Kamijou Touma

quote: I can only say that the human curiosity is something completely irrational.
author: Kyubee

quote: Those stars look like they're close to each other, but they're actually very far away, aren't they? It's like Kitamura-kun and I. The things you see aren't always real. How hard must I try in order to understand the unseen truth?
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: Human potential for evolution is limitless.
author: Netero

quote: There are people out there who would say there's nothing more important than love. But is love really that great? There are women, who because of love, get chased around by men. And there are men, who because of love, get killed by women. To put it down, for love to be so great, there's gotta be something else behind it that's even greater.
author: Dante

quote: Time passes, people move. Like a river's flow, it never ends. A childish mind will turn to noble ambition. Young love will become deep affection. The clear water's surface reflects growth. Now listen to the Serenade of water to reflect upon yourself.
author: Sheik

quote: It's fine even if you're useless right now. As long as you keep looking towards the future, I'm sure a day will come when you'll find your worth.
author: Sachi Nanjou

quote: Even the hardest of things can shatter when one little crack appears.
author: Sachi Nanjou

quote: There is one thing I've learned here. To keep doing your best, up until the very end.
author: Asuna Yūki

quote: Somewhere along the line, I had decided that I can't interact with others. That I have no choice but to be alone, but I've found a new reason to stay. It's because everyone is alone, senpai. Everyone is all alone.
author: Mirai Kuriyama

quote: Just as there is a light at night and darkness in the day, there will always be darkness in the world. At the same time, the world will never be engulfed by the darkness. In that mix of ambiguous colors, everything moves on: our fates determined...
author: Akihito Kanbara

quote: A person can work for their ideals. But if you lose sight of those ideals, when things don't work out as you hoped, you'll never accomplish anything! You won't be able to protect yourself or those dear to you.
author: Hiroomi Nase

quote: The heart may be weak and sometimes it may even give in, but I've learned that deep down, there's a light that never goes out!
author: Sora

quote: A drama has a progressive thought, an emotional climax and a resolution, but our lives aren't like that. All we get day after day, are a bunch of vague anxieties that are never really resolved.
author: Kaoru Yamazaki

quote: If you don't see her, you won't fall in love. If you don't fall in love, you won't get hurt.
author: Satou Tatsuhiro

quote: Stop trying to change things that can't be changed. The past is the past and you have to let it go and embrace the future.
author: Jack Atlas

quote: There's something that cannot be expressed in words: human emotion. Emotions of the heart can't be just tucked away in a closet. There's a way to know the emotions: look into the eyes. The gentleman lied to me when I trusted him, but the moment I looked into his eyes the angel of destiny began to unravel the truth. Just look into their eyes, there is only one truth.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: A hint is one thing, but simply sharing the answer it leads to is dangerous.
author: Kyōko Kirigiri

quote: A pistol’s job is what its handler chooses. If I don’t wanna shoot, then I won’t.
author: Saya Minatsuki

quote: If there's an ugly truth, a beautiful truth must exist too. Stories aren't purely ugly. They're not purely tragic or sad either. There are tender things and beautiful things in there.
author: Konoha Inoue

quote: I believe that some truths should never be known.
author: Konoha Inoue

quote: What is true happiness? Everyone seeks the land of happiness as if they're on a pilgrimage. They try to walk there. Still, no matter who they are, at times they become tired. Stories exist for those times. If you open the covers, you'll encounter someone else's imagination. If you feel lonely on your own, try reading a book. Try to imagine what the author was thinking, what he wanted to say. Then you might be able to obtain something wonderful.
author: Amano Touko

quote: I just don't understand the reason why humans continue living on all the while as our individual egos hurt each other...
author: Yuichi Onodera

quote: I wonder why it is, that people fall in love with others? I think that to seek out love even when you already have a nice family is being greedy. No matter how much you like another person, you can never be with that person forever... But I dislike that. I don't care if I have to throw away everything else. I just want you to look at me.
author: Aiko Tanaka
