quote: True happiness only lasts for a brief time, so you better enjoy it while you can, right?
author: Yuichi Onodera

quote: The difference in ability... What about it? Do you think I should give up just because you're stronger than me?
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Memories - they can sometimes become vague and foggy and there are times when they disappear altogether. Therefore, because there are many things I don't want to lose track of, I will record everything in here (his diary) for the sake of those moments that should not be forgotten.
author: Keisuke Urashima

quote: It is only through the eyes of others that our lives have any meaning.
author: Haku

quote: Don't believe in the you that believes in me and don't believe in the me that believes in you. Believe in the you that believes in yourself.
author: Kamina

quote: I want to become weak and if that's not possible, then I at least want to make friends that are as strong as me.
author: Coyote Starrk

quote: If you give me wings, I will soar for you even if this whole land sinks down to the water. If you give me a sword, I will fight for you even if this whole sky shoots through with your light.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: I wanted to hurt you, make you suffer, and make sure that you'd never forget me.
author: Miu Asakura

quote: In my family
author: Miu Asakura

quote: Don't underestimate me! I don't quit and I don't run! You can act tough all you want! You're not gonna scare me off! No way! I don't care if I DO get stuck as a Genin for the rest of my life! I'll still be Hokage someday!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: The right to use my friends as a weapon, that is the sinful crown I shall adorn.
author: Shū Ouma

quote: No matter how colossal a power you obtain, no matter how gigantic an army you bring with you, I ain't scared. While you've abandoned a hundred, I've connected with a thousand. While you've destroyed a thousand, I've been helped by ten thousand. So what's an army of a few thousand? We have protected everything as just three people. We're the Yorozuya.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: People can be so mean, no matter what you've done for them they will believe the first cheap rumor they hear. In the end they only care about themselves.
author: Natsu Tanimoto

quote: What do you think are the most important things in life? Money, dreams, sympathy towards others... Yes, they're all important things as well... But the most important thing is responsibility for your own actions.
author: Yuichi Onodera

quote: There're a lot of people who want to be in despair just so they can pity themselves... But I think it's a waste of time, that's all. After all, you're the one who wishes to be left alone and refuses to share your pain with anyone else.
author: Sachi Nanjou

quote: I hate it when knowledge is misused by people who have lost sight of reality, due to biased perceptions and prejudices. It is the source of misunderstanding, ignorance and conflict. I want us to understand each other.
author: Aeolia Schenberg

quote: Sometimes the blood rushes to my head and I feel like, if I run I'll lose something important.
author: Portgas D. Ace

quote: In this moment, I am euphoric. Not because of any phony Shinobi's blessing. But because, I'm enlightened by my intelligence.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Embrace your dreams. If you want to be a hero, you need to have dreams.
author: Zack Fair

quote: If all things are in fact preordained, then why... why is humanity able to think for itself?
author: Alcor

quote: In this world is the destiny of mankind controlled by some transcendental entity or law? Is it like the hand of god hovering from above? Perhaps men have no control even over their own will.
author: Berserk

quote: You trusted me, so I'll trust you too. That's what being friends means, doesn't it?
author: Rin Okumura

quote: Knowledge and awareness are vague, and perhaps better called illusions. Everyone lives within their own subjective interpretation.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Learn to embrace the fear of feeling about what it's like to contemplate what it is to know true pain. Because when I had nothing and no one - I always had Pain.
author: Pain

quote: There's nothing unusual here… The appropriate one stands in the appropriate place after the inappropriate ones have collapsed to the ground, defeated. There is nothing unexpected or odd about it. Because this is reality. Not one shred of uncertainty exists here. Not even fear, of course…
author: Asura

quote: I don't want fear for a future, that may not even come, to stop me from acting today.
author: Simon

quote: I'll never show you my tears. These are the tears of those who died with regrets. If there's a way to take away these regrets, I'll make sure I'll find it. If it's fear that you speak of, then I'll stand and face it. I'll never give up. The only time I lose is when I die!
author: Black Star

quote: Sitting there in the dark, I had the chance to think about a lot of things, including the nature of the world itself. And after lengthy consideration, I realized something
author: Asura

quote: There is no inherent right or wrong in this world, those labels are just artificial constructs. Right and wrong are held by positions of authority. That is the way it's always been, so how then could anyone know this truth you speak of? Don't you see the reality is that truth long ago became nothing more than a shadow of itself
author: Franken Stein

quote: Those who do not want to advance spiritually are fools.
author: K

quote: It's only natural for the girl you're crushing on to be in love with someone else. Since you're in love with her, she sparkles in your eyes. That's why people fall so irrationally in love.
author: Watari Ryouta

quote: Rules make the world work. They don't protect you.
author: Osamu Mikumo

quote: Upon researching the concept of demons, I believe that, among all life, humans are the closest thing to it.
author: Migi

quote: Be more confident despite your weaknesses and failures.
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: I choose my own battlefields. Not by my blood, but by my heart! I stand on the battlefield to protect what's important to me. And if anyone stands in my way, I don't care if it's one of my kind, my brother or anyone else… I'll crush them all!
author: Kagura

quote: You can change fate as long as you believe you can.
author: Furude Rika

quote: If you just submit yourself to fate, then that's the end of it.
author: Maebara Keiichi

quote: Everybody makes a wrong turn once in a while.
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: No matter how cold and distant people may become, on the inside something warm and precious always remains, something that never changes. To me, that’s what family is like.
author: Sakagami Tomoyo

quote: If you hurt someone, you must be prepared to receive the same amount in return.
author: Mana Ouma

quote: (About Sakura) Was she having fun in her little make-believe fantasy of true love? As for me, I have absolutely no reason to love her and likewise, I can see no reason why she would love me.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: The weight of a sin depends on the person measuring it.
author: Featherine Augustus Aurora

quote: They say some defeats are meaningful and losing makes you stronger. Do you understand what that means? For living creatures victory is life, and defeat means death. It's an extreme example, but humans retain that instinct. Those who know the terror of defeat, hunger for victory.
author: Teppei Kiyoshi

quote: It’s natural to want to stay in the game world and hope the game will never end. However, I’ve learned one thing from playing all those online games. There’s nothing lonelier or sadder than the end of a game with no ending. More and more players get bored and move on to other games... And one day, even NPC's like your favorite blacksmith or landlady disappear forever as they smile. I've experienced that moment and cried many, many times. That isn't how games should end. It definitely isn't!
author: Haruyuki Arita

quote: The real fun is in constantly pushing beyond your limits. So if you're thinking of everything as a game, you won't be able to fully experience it.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: I've only just started to understand it myself. That by depending on others, and letting them depend on you, people can exceed what they can do as individuals.
author: Mikoto Misaka

quote: People make a lot of mistakes, and strength is necessary to straighten those out.
author: Yahiro Samukawa

quote: You’re too kind. Remember this and take it to heart: kindness sometimes leads to even greater tragedy.
author: Homura Akemi

quote: I came to realize something. Parenthesis are amazing! No matter how negative something sounds, if you throw "LOL" in some parentheses behind it - it becomes positive!
author: Monokuma

quote: Don't just accept loss or defeat! Accept it after you're dead. If you lose without dying... it means that luck is on your side. If that happens - focus on surviving! Survive and Kill the one who couldn't kill YOU!
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: If you like, you can stay over here tonight. If you're lucky, you may see some cannibalism and that's always fun...
author: Uta

quote: I  can neither live with you. Nor without you.
author: Uta

quote: The longer you live... The more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering and emptiness...
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: If failure is the hallmark of being young, like they say. then someone who has failed to make friends must be at the peak of his youth, right? However, I'm sure they will disagree. All of this is just their double standards at play and nothing else. Here's the bottom line: Fools that enjoy their youth should go kill themselves.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: About marriage or about future, I don't know what will happen in the future. In this world, it's normal that when there's a preparation, then a new grief is born, but everyone has the right to desire happiness. Our efforts need to be held for the sake of our future.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Forcing yourself to like something you don't like brings sorrow.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Any treasure you attain without anyone ever working for it is no treasure at all.
author: Nyanta

quote: Everything in this world is just a game and we are merely the pawns.
author: Gasai Yuno

quote: When people get close to death they change.
author: Jin-Ie Kwon

quote: In order to learn you may have to risk your life... no, even your soul.
author: Chun-Woo Han

quote: Courage is the mindset of not surrendering even if you lack the strength.
author: Chun-Woo Han

quote: I didn’t choose you. Don’t you see this is all just an accident. You actually thought you were chosen because you’re so smart or something? Don’t be so vain. It just happened to fall around here and you just happen to pick it up, and that’s all there is to it.
author: Ryuk

quote: Only I could do it! I was well aware that killing people is crime in itself! Yet at that point it was the only way to make things right! I thought to myself that someday people will come to realize this as much, and regard it as an act of justice! I had no choice but to act as Kira… it was the destiny given to me. I was chosen to renew this rotten world, to bring about true peace – a utopia.
author: Light Yagami

quote: This world is rotten and those who are making it rot deserve to die. Someone has to do it, so why not me? Even if it means sacrificing my own mind and soul, it's worth it. Because the world... can't go on like this. I wonder... what if someone else had picked up this notebook? Is there anyone out there other than me who'd be willing to eliminate the vermin from the world? If I don't do it, then who will? That's just it: there's no one, but I can do it. In fact, I'm the only one who can. I'll do it. Using the death note, I'll change the world.
author: Light Yagami

quote: Wishes shouldn't be granted. They're better off not coming true. When their wishes aren't granted, people actually put in effort. It's because they don't come true that people make progress. But if all their wishes come true, people won't be able to move forward anymore, you know?
author: Alis Color

quote: Violence, greed, slaughter, corruption, defeat, failure, immorality, humiliation… These are everywhere. As long as you live, you will face them.
author: Hampnie Hambart

quote: I do want to die. But I want to die happily. Like I have for others, I want someone to wave me off. My friends, my wife, and my children... Making them mourn for me, making them long for me, and leaving things that I should have done behind... That is how I want to die.
author: Hampnie Hambart

quote: Someday, maybe you’ll find someone like you to share your pain with. I can’t tell you when that will happen.... But the important thing is to not reject them.
author: Mei Tachibana

quote: But there's nothing wrong about worrying. It's like a wall you need to overcome, to make it to the next level. If you're running up against that wall, it means you're moving forward. I wonder how many walls I've broken up until now, but if you won't move yourself, you will never get anywhere.
author: Aiko Mutō

quote: In the end no one's going to protect you but yourself.
author: Yamato Kurosawa

quote: Life is like a playground swing, the higher and farther forward you go as you swing, it carries the risk of falling just as far back.
author: Jiro

quote: When you trust someone and get to know them, you eventually learn about their wounds too.
author: Mei Tachibana

quote: A beast in human's clothing understands better than anyone how people want to be treated.
author: Kurapika

quote: I tried to carry on, while rejecting any relationships with others, but once you reject people, you're stuck. You lose the opportunity to meet someone and change.
author: Mei Tachibana

quote: It’s like a doll house. You hang out together and pretend to be friends, but when it doesn’t suit them they abandon just you.
author: Mei Tachibana

quote: If you haven't changed, that means you haven't improved.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: How did you learn of the reality that you speak of? The entire world is governed by the reasoning of dirty-minded adults. We're able to obscure reality according to our obsessions. We're never actually shown what reality is. In this case, the reality that you speak of is a half-baked nonsense that has been altered. Trying to conform this bullshit reality into the one you want is like trying to join two pieces of a puzzle that do not fit.
author: Franken Stein

quote: Working hard alone doesn't assure you that you'll achieve your dreams. Actually there are more cases where you don't. Even so, working hard and achieving something is some consolation at least.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Anime - it's not something that can be thought of in a hall for conferences. It is made out of strange juices current from the brain of animators.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: It's not too late to change ourselves and have a meaningful life.
author: Hanamichi Sakuragi

quote: A person is very strong when he seeks to protect something.
author: Akihiko Kayaba

quote: If there's a miracle that can be reached by fighting to the end, then I want to see it.
author: Amano Yukiteru

quote: Not knowing everything in this world is fun.
author: Akise Aru

quote: Become strong not just for your own sake, but for your friends.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: A victory won through dishonesty means it's no victory at all.
author: Suzaku Kururugi

quote: Even if your feelings or wishes do not come true, or if things don't go as you planned - on another road grows another flower. A new flower blooms there.
author: Dera Mochimazzi

quote: It doesn't matter what you achieve in life. It's how you live that really matters. Countless men have lost their lives in war without fulfilling their life's ambitions. Shiba stood by his convictions, no matter how lonely he got. So I think that in the end, he must've been happier than anyone.
author: Deerhound

quote: If you know pain and hardship, it's easier to be kind to others.
author: Ryoji Kaji

quote: To take responsibility is to take the pain onto yourself. It means to bear more pain than what others felt because of your mistake.
author: Toua Tokuchi

quote: People who grow up in different environments will invariably have different tastes and preferences. Therefore, could one say that the subsequent marriages necessarily lead to happiness?
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Though possessing two eyes, most creatures can see but a single thing at a time.
author: Horo

quote: An idiot that knows he's an idiot, is even harder to deal with than an idiot that thinks he isn't.
author: Sora

quote: Love is like a mirror that reflects your bad side. Especially when it’s unrequited, you get envious, jealous, prejudiced, and resentful. You have to face all sorts of emotions, but there’s no reason to find that shameful. It shows how serious you are. Oh yeah, do you want me to tell you how to break that mirror? It’s not anything hard, understand the other person. That’s all. Don’t make any quick judgment and let them do the same.
author: Margery Daw

quote: There are people in this world who don't understand that what they consider a harmless prank can deeply hurt someone else.
author: Mio Nishizono

quote: Having someone saying you're okay as you are and being needed by that person... It was nice to have someone like that.
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: Death is the end of everything. Your past and future will be lost in an instant where there will be no second chance. However as long as you live there will be a chance of pulling a win.
author: Kazuma Yagami

quote: If you want to know what others think, you first have to say what you think.
author: Akise Aru

quote: Just by living, people hurt others without even realizing it. So long as humanity exists, hate will also exist. There is no peace in this cursed world. War is just a crime paid for by the pain of the defeated...
author: Pain

quote: I know everyone has their stories of pain and sadness or things that they don't want to bring up, but if you can't be a good friend without telling that, then I don't need any friends at all!
author: Sonozaki Mion

quote: By depending on others and letting them depend on you, people can exceed what they can do as individuals.
author: Mikoto Misaka

quote: A normal person looks away from what they don't want to see even though they know there are things they can only acquire if they face the things they hate.
author: Sorata Kanda

quote: The reason doesn't matter. As long as tiny bit of hope exists, that's all that matters.
author: Tatsumi

quote: Once you miss the opportunity to say something, the words become increasingly toxic. The best thing to do is to just say everything.
author: Hayashida Nana

quote: A farewell is like the other side of a coin. It will only happen when there is an encounter. Rather than dreading the day we have to part, shouldn't we be happy that we had the chance to meet today instead?
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: You can die anytime, but living takes true courage.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: No matter what lies you tell, you can't fool your own heart.
author: Meliodas

quote: There are many different ways to solve a problem. But once it's solved, we must live our lives. Which means we should choose not the simplest solution, but the one that will allow us to feel the most at peace once it's done.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: Even if it's small, take a step forward.
author: Takashi Natsume

quote: Change will never come about if you don't make it happen.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: The second humans lose their comfort zone, the more simplistic their actions become.
author: Accelerator

quote: If you have memories no one else remembers, what's the point in remembering them?
author: Liu Cheng-Long

quote: Your past shouldn't stop you from achieving your goals and dreams.
author: Rin Okumura

quote: Let me teach you a thing. Normally the weak person's weakness is the strong person, but the strong person's weakness is also the weak person.
author: Itsuki Minami

quote: Sometimes, the blood rushes to my head and I feel like, if I run, I'll lose something important.
author: Portgas D. Ace

quote: Never give up without even trying. Do what you can, no matter how small the effect it may have!
author: Ōnoki

quote: Once I'm dead, I won't even be able to remember you. So I'll win, no matter what. I'll live, no matter what!
author: Mikasa Ackerman

quote: Being hurt on the outside is better than being hurt on the inside.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I'll admit that you're stronger than before. But because of that, you seem to have lost sight of what's truly important. Now listen carefully. The people of the village, who once abhorred you, have begun to admire you. They think of you as a comrade. It's because you fought hard for their acceptance. You once said it was everyone who cares about you who helped you get where you are now. If you forget others because you have power, and become arrogant and egotistical, you'll eventually become just like Madara. No matter how powerful you become, do not try to shoulder everything alone. Becoming the Hokage doesn't mean people will acknowledge you. But when the people acknowledge you, you can become Hokage. Never forget your friends!
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: The always naughty woodpecker. Today, too, you open holes and ruin the forest. The angry wood god turned your beak to poison. Poor woodpecker, your nest has been poisoned. Your food has been poisoned. If you touch your friends, they all die. The sad little woodpecker. Your tears of poison sparkle brightly...
author: Shiro

quote: The ones who aren't able to acknowledge their own selves are bound to fail.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: I understood that killing people was a crime. There was no other way! The world had to be fixed! A purpose given to me! Only I could do it. Who else could have done it, and come this far? Would they have kept going? The only one who can create a new world is me.
author: Light Yagami

quote: People who continue to put their lives on the line to defend their faith become heroes and continue to exist on in legend.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Everyone makes mistakes. What's important is how to make up for it.
author: Yoshino Yūsuke

quote: The world has too many heroes. It needs a monster.
author: Dracule Mihawk

quote: The truth is the truth, regardless of whether it comes out of a genius' mouth or a commoner's.
author: Tsuchimikado Natsume

quote: Marriage, the institution where one's existence goes to die. All married people prattle on about their so-called marital bliss about how they love saying "I'm home!" to their spouses, or how seeing their sleeping kids motivates them for tomorrow. But think about it: you can say "I'm home!" if you live your parents, you can even buy some mouthwash and say "I'm home!" to the hippos on the label. And if they're talking about seeing their sleeping kids, that just means they're working hellish overtime hours. How is that in any way blissful?
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: It seems that you still want to dance but... You will not be able to make steps anymore.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: No one cared who I was until I put on a mask.
author: Obito Uchiha

quote: I'd be lying if I said things are going according to my plan... but beggars can't be choosers, right?
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: [Last words to Hashirama] As comrades, huh... well... if that's how... we... will.... *smiles*
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: ....Would you consider dying together "Teamwork" as well?
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: If you look away and just turn your back on those you don't understand, you'll regret it someday. Accept what's happening before your eyes as a fact. That's a shortcut to becoming an adult.
author: Nobuchika Ginoza

quote: I don't understand you! You said you don't love me, but you act like you do! Then you tell me to stay away. Do I have a chance or not?!
author: Yoshida Haru

quote: Try relying on others once in a while. No one asks what's wrong without wanting to hear the answer.
author: Kai Takemura

quote: No matter how painful, no matter how much solitary struggle awaits us, because we have joyous moments like this, we can face the challenges over and over again.
author: Chiaki Shinichi

quote: A choice isn't something someone gives you, it's something you make for yourself.
author: Papillon

quote: Whether you walk or run, the destination won't change. So then... You might as well run there!!!
author: Itsuki Minami

quote: People's lives don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: The scariest and the most painful thing is to be hated by someone you truly love.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: People's feelings can change. You may hate someone today, but you might come to love that person tomorrow.
author: Naoki Irie

quote: It's difficult to make a girl smile, even as a grown-up. But you should never, ever, make a girl cry. And if you ever see a girl crying, help her. You might not be able to make her smile, but they'll know how you feel.
author: Yokodera Youto

quote: The probability of you remaining yourself until the day you die is extremely low. The hopeless spark you have now will be corrupted and in the most awful way there is.
author: Hampnie Hambart

quote: Recklessness is the way of the young and tolerance is the beauty of adulthood.
author: Nyanta

quote: You can steal the very last bite of my very best food. You can mock me all you want. But if you insult my best friend, I will obliterate you.
author: Choji Akamichi

quote: Three times now... We've fought world wars for our own nations, our own villages. We've hurt one another. We've hated one another. That hatred bred a lust for power, and that lust for power created ME. I was a Jinchuuriki, the embodiment of hatred and power. And I hated this world, and all the people in it... I wanted to destroy it with my own hands. The exact same thing Akatsuki is trying to do today. But one man, one ninja from Konoha stopped me. I was his enemy, yet he wept for me! I hurt him, yet he called me his friend! He saved me! My enemy, my fellow Jinchuuriki... He suffered the same pain as me, yet bore no ill will! There are no enemies here because we've all suffered at Akatsuki's hand! SO THERE IS NO SAND, NO STONE, NO LEAF, NO MIST, NO CLOUD! THERE ARE ONLY SHINOBI! And if you still hold a grudge against the Sand, then when this war is over, come and take my head instead! Our enemies are after the friend who saved my life! If they take him, if we hand him over, our world is finished! I want to protect him, and I want to protect our world! But I'm too young to protect it all on my own! All of you lend me your aid!
author: Gaara

quote: Love requires no reason. That is what makes it love!
author: Kyousuke Natsume

quote: I lost all of what you could call feelings of love. They weren't sealed, so they can't be released. They weren't broken, so they can't be fixed. That which is lost, cannot be recovered.
author: Tatsuya Shiba

quote: Even if we're not confident that we'll win, even if others tell us we don't stand a chance, we must never tell ourselves that.
author: Daichi Sawamura

quote: Any kind of life can go wrong, or sicken or suffer. Lives get old, decay, and finally die. Disliking that fact because it hurts, isn't any different than disliking life itself.
author: Nyanta

quote: A world where everyone is equal and receives the same treatment. No such place exists. If there was a world of equality, where talent and aptitude didn't matter, we would all be equally snubbed there.
author: Tatsuya Shiba

quote: Whether you're a monster or human there's no difference in the value of someone's life.
author: Mizore Shirayuki

quote: If you're going to dig, dig to pierce the heavens. Even if it's my grave I'm digging, I'll keep going! When I break through, that means I've WON! Who the hell do you think I am? I'm Simon. I'm not my bro, Kamina. I'm ME! Simon the Digger!
author: Simon

quote: All for one, one for all! There are times when a man has no choice but to act!
author: Brook

quote: Now there's something I understand a little better. Hate, sadness, even joy. To be able to share it with another person... Naruto Uzumaki. From fighting him I learned that. He knew pain like I did and then he taught me that you can change your path. I wish that one day I can be needed by someone. Not as a frightening weapon... But as the sand's Kazekage.
author: Gaara

quote: I'll marry you! No matter what kind of sickness you have! Even if you can't walk or stand, or even when you can't have kids! I'll still marry you! No matter where or how I meet you, I'll fall in love with you. If I can meet you again, against the 6 billion to 1 odds, and even if your body can't move, I'll marry you.
author: Hideki Hinata

quote: Don't beg for it, earn it. Do it, and you'll be rewarded.
author: Renton Thurston

quote: I am who I am now because of my past. Calling any choice I made a mistake would be calling who I am now a mistake.
author: Iori Nagase

quote: You know, with talented people... They draw people to themselves, and without even trying to, they tear them to shreds. The closer you are to them, the more viciously you'll be torn apart. They're living in a completely different world above us. One that us normal people can't reach. In a world that we'll never see. A world above the clouds. That's the kind of world they live in.
author: Jin Mitaka

quote: A sin, once committed, is never forgotten. It haunts you for all eternity.
author: Shinobu Nunotaba

quote: They want to believe that's true and when someone wants to believe something is true, they usually will.
author: Henrietta

quote: Don't try to excuse yourself by saying you're doing it for someone else's sake.
author: Xerxes Break

quote: No one's more aware of discrimination than the ones being discriminated against, huh?
author: Tatsuya Shiba

quote: Being weak means that there is a room to grow.
author: Ittetsu Takeda

quote: Hey God, if you're there, my life has really sucked. So please, for once, let me have a sweet dream.
author: Kyōko Sakura

quote: Even if I can't see. Even if I can't hear. I have light inside me. The path I walked with my friends, is bringing light to my future. I don't fear anything! This isn't even worthy of being called pain! The worst pain is.. The pain of losing your light.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Don't mistake borrowed power for your own ability!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: All of the disadvantage in this world stems from a person's lack of ability.
author: Rize Kamishiro

quote: Real pain is the result of losing someone you care about.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: Old man, everyone!! And you.. Luffy. Even though I've been good for nothing my whole life, even though I have the blood of a demon within me... You guys still loved me! Thank you so much!!
author: Portgas D. Ace

quote: If fate is a millstone, then we are the grist. There is nothing we can do. So I wish for strength. If I cannot protect them from the wheel, then give me a strong blade, and enough strength... to shatter fate.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: It's only the end if you give up!
author: Elfman Strauss

quote: Maybe we can't help feeling scared alone! But we're all right here, together! We've got out friends close by!
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: We know our weakness. Now what will we do?
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: "Checkmate" doesn't mean you've simply cornered the enemy king. It's a declaration that the enemy king is yours. That's why I said it the first time I met you. "Checkmate."
author: Sora

quote: What kind of king makes his men fight at the front line while he sits behind them relaxing?
author: Sora

quote: Huh? In a real war, what fool waits for their enemy's "turn"?
author: Sora

quote: It's better for a man to be slow than fast.
author: Sora

quote: Being strong on your own is meaningless. To have power you need other people, and they need a world where they can be at their best.
author: Shiroe

quote: Do you always want to live hiding behind the mask you put up for the sake of others?! You're you, and there's nothing wrong with that.
author: Ymir

quote: If you can't do something, then don't. Focus on what you can do.
author: Shiroe

quote: What does it take to end a war? Well, if both sides wish for peace and set aside their hatred... No. Warfare is nothing but a means of negotiation between states. Wars break out even when there is no hatred. Territory, resources, or interests that you are determined to own. Ideology, religion, pride. Wars are fought over those objectives all the time. Meaning that when those objectives are met, the war will end. That, or the war will end when the human cost outweighs the gains. Anger and hatred are only tools to tilt a war in your favor. I'm not interested in those emotions. So I wouldn't hate anyone just because they're Martian.
author: Inaho Kaizuka

quote: If lives were lost today, then lives were also born. How important each day is... Depends on how important you feel it is to you.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: When there is evil in this world that justice cannot defeat, would you taint your hands with evil to defeat evil? Or would you remain steadfast and righteous even if it means surrendering to evil?
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: You're either an open pervert or a closet pervert!
author: Naotsugu

quote: I pity you. You just don't get it at all... there's not a thing I don't cherish!
author: Cloud Strife

quote: Why did he smile? Why? Did he know he would be saved? No. In that instant, he must have understood that his life was going to end. Death. He accepted it. He was fully prepared for it and smiled.
author: Smoker

quote: I lost my mother when I was 8...and killed my father when I was 10. Those with the title of "Executive" or above...are my "family", with whom I've shared my joys and sorrows. They're the only thing I have! I won't forgive anyone that laughs at my family. Understood?
author: Donquixote Doflamingo

quote: You can't change anything unless you can discard part of yourself too. To surpass monsters, you must be willing to abandon your humanity.
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: It doesn´t matter what day it is as long as you are happy.
author: Juvia Loxar

quote: Feel pain, think about pain, accept pain, know pain... Shinra Tensei!
author: Pain

quote: It's not because I'm lazy, it's just because I don't care.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: You're right, all efforts are pointless... If you don't believe in yourself.
author: Might Guy

quote: If love is just a word, then why does it hurt so much if you realize it isn't there?
author: Gaara

quote: Family? Let me tell you what kind of link I have with them. They are just lumps of meat linked by hatred and murderous intent!
author: Gaara

quote: I understand now. Even if I must take the devil's fruit, I must gain power. I am an avenger.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: Someday, I promise you, they will all watch as I change the world.
author: Monkey D. Dragon

quote: Inherited will, the swelling of the changing times, and the dreams of people. These are things that cannot be stopped. As long as people seek the answer to freedom, these will never cease to be!
author: One Piece

quote: The thing called "justice" changes its shape... Depending on where you stand.
author: Kuzan

quote: To define true madness. What is it to be nothing else but mad?
author: Franken Stein

quote: We don't have to know what tomorrow holds! That's why we can live for everything we're worth today!
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: Everybody can fight. It's just a choice of whether you should.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: It's our job as normal people to ensure the potential of those misunderstood ones are realized.
author: Sora

quote: About Whitebeard "Even in death, his body did not fall. His figure, taking down enemies while losing half of his head, was truly monstrous. The total number of sword wounds he received in this battle was 267. He was shot by 152 bullets. And was hit by 46 cannonballs. And despite all this, his proud back, over the course of his entire life as a pirate, never received a single scar from running away!"
author: Whitebeard

quote: I'm no one. I don't want to be anyone. All I care about is completing the moon's eye plan. This world is completely worthless. There is nothing left in it but misery.
author: Obito Uchiha

quote: Either people change or they die before they do. It's one or the other.
author: Orochimaru

quote: Humans... Do humans have a purpose when they are born? I have been wondering recently. Because they are born, do they have an important duty? The meaning of being born... For humans to find that answer... It is the one freedom God gave them.
author: Kimimaro

quote: Even if I can't see you... No matter how far away you may be... I will always be watching you.
author: Makarov Dreyar

quote: I want you to be happy. I want you to laugh a lot. I don't know what exactly I'll be able to do for you, but I'll always be by your side.
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: There's no point in the world. But isn't that wonderful? Because if there isn't one, then you can decide what it is for yourself.
author: Filicia Heideman

quote: "Time" is proof that people have lived. Every person lives the time that has been given to them... that is life.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: If I were to lose a friend...then I couldn't die in peace!
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: Your so called "hope" is to throw the past into despair?
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: If I can do it tomorrow, I won't do it today!
author: KyÅko ToshinÅ

quote: I have told you before, I'm an avenger. I don't care about this test, Chunin or whatever. 'Am I strong?' that's the answer I want.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: Every week, when it is time, they stick to the TV. They watch my actions in the comfort of their families after dinner. Children watch my actions and their hearts leap. They see me stand up to evil spirits and... they know what courage is! Do you understand, boy? With them watching, I can't run away from the enemy
author: Don Kanonji

quote: I can't deny, I don't know very much about Rukia. That's not the point, I might not risk my life for her, but Ichigo wants to save her life and that's all I need to know. What may seem like an unworthy cause to you is more than enough reason for me.
author: Yasutora Sado

quote: I am strong. Stronger than all of you. Extremely strong. I can kill all the titans out there. Even if I am alone.
author: Mikasa Ackerman

quote: You're either incompetent or you're spineless cowards. How pathetic. You can just sit here and suck on your fingers. Yeah, do that.
author: Mikasa Ackerman

quote: The village does have its dark side and its inconsistencies, but I'm still Konoha's Itachi Uchiha.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Wake up to reality! Nothing ever goes as planned in this world. The longer you live, the more you realize that in this reality only pain, suffering and futility exist.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: It's too late to regret. Reality is just cruelly moving forward.
author: Tobi

quote: Abandon your fear. Look forward. Move forward and never stop. You'll age if you pull back. You'll die if you hesitate.
author: Zangetsu

quote: The difference between your decision and ours is experience. But you don't have to rely on that. CHOOSE... Believe in yourself, or believe in the survey corps and me. I don't know... I never have. I can believe in my own abilities or the choices of the companions I trust. But no one ever knows how it will turn out. So choose for yourself, whichever decision you will regret the least.
author: Levi Ackerman

quote: It's not about being right or being wrong. There are more important things than that. That's why apologies and forgiveness become necessary.
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: Helping other people is the best way to make up for your mistakes.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: There is no such thing as "truth" or "lies" in this world
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Man seeks peace, yet at the same time yearning for war... Those are the two realms belonging solely to man. Thinking of peace whilst spilling blood is something that only humans could do. They're two sides of the same coin... to protect something... another must be sacrificed.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: I know love. The convenience store was selling it. For 298 yen.
author: Mayoi Hachikuji

quote: We can't live if we don't keep running forward.
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: Before the heart of truth, there is no need for words.
author: Nico Robin

quote: You are defeated yet you will not step back, why not?
author: Dracule Mihawk

quote: An island from a dream within a dream? I could never pass up a great adventure like this!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Even if you can't walk or stand and even if you can't have kids, I'll still marry you, I'll always stay by your side.
author: Hideki Hinata

quote: If you hurt somebody... or if somebody hurts you, the same red blood will be shed
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: There are people in this world who prefer solitude. But there is no one who can withstand it.
author: Makarov Dreyar

quote: Everyone has an ability. And it means that everyone should use that ability to the fullest.
author: Chitoge Kirisaki

quote: If you don't have the courage to change things then you might as well just die!!!
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: There's no more trusted observer than someone who suspects you.
author: Sora

quote: If you married someone, that means you love every side of your significant other that you already know. So if you find a new side after to love, doesn't that mean you'll love your partner even more?
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: If that bullet could also kill a player in the real world, and if you didn't shoot them, you or someone you loved would be killed, could you still pull the trigger?
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: I don't even know the real names of the two... no, three that I killed back then. I just close my eyes, put my hands over my ears and tried to forget it all.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: People are stupid. If I don't do this, there will be no peace. Eventually, time will pass and the pain will heal. Eventually, checkmate's power will weaken and people will begin fighting again. This time, they will use the weapon themselves and once more know true pain. And for the short time, peace will come again. It will give birth to short period of peace within this endless chain of hatred. That's my wish.
author: Pain

quote: We'll worry about the future once we get there.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: Isn't changing yourself the same as running away? Why can't you just accept who you are?
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: You can't achieve anything if you don't make a move. Love is an all-out assault.
author: Tachibana Marika

quote: Maybe the future is bad. But there's a future beyond that, right?
author: Gasai Yuno

quote: Do whatever you think is right. That's the way of the Fairy Tail mages.
author: Makarov Dreyar

quote: If I have to hurt someone, if I have to injure a comrade, then I might as well hurt myself.
author: Juvia Loxar

quote: It's not about what you should do, it's about what you want to do.
author: Takeshi Yamamoto

quote: You won't know if you don't give it a try.
author: Takeshi Yamamoto

quote: The point of life isn't to be perfect. It's to do what you want to do. To be who you want to be.
author: Iori Nagase

quote: When you give up, your dreams and everything else, they're gone.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: No matter where I might have met you, I'm sure I'd come to love you.
author: Hideki Hinata

quote: Pain is the way to bring peace.
author: Pain

quote: Hurting people won't help you regain your pride!
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: Small animals have their own ways of surviving.
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: You can believe in anything. But it's your heart...That ultimately decides.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Humans have faith too. It's important not to lose oneself. The strength to think, the courage not to run away.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Power is not will, it is the phenomenon of physically making things happen.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: There's no law that says you can't go after someone just because he's already in love with someone else.
author: Ruri Miyamoto

quote: You cannot restrain me with logic.
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: The more painful the memories one recollects, the better the laughter.
author: Horo

quote: Sometimes you must hurt in order to know, fall in order to grow, lose in order to gain because life's greatest lessons are learned through pain.
author: Pain

quote: Once you taste poison, you might as well finish the meal. If it comes to that you would make as fine a dish as any.
author: Horo

quote: Even if things are painful and tough, people should appreciate what it means to be alive.
author: Yato

quote: No matter what my heart will be forever yours and I will fight until the day I see you again.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: Don't improvise what you cannot handle.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: If miracles only happen once, what are they called the second time?
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: It's sad when people die.
author: Mei Misaki

quote: Although my life hasn't been very fortunate until now, I'm glad if I caught your eye because of that misfortune...
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Success comes only to those who have dared to stand up without fear!
author: Kamijou Touma

quote: The worst kind of pain is when you're smiling just to stop the tears from falling.
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: This is the world I live in. The dirty world of the adults.
author: Uryuu Minene

quote: I don't need a reason to save someone.
author: Kamijou Touma

quote: Yeah I lied
author: Haruko Haruhara

quote: I really hate violence ...
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
author: Jiraiya

quote: You donÂ´t need a reason to cry. All you need to feel the warmth that dwells in your chest.
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Sorry. Our world isn't as nice a place as yours. When it comes to war and killing, we have far more expertise than you do.
author: Sora

quote: Blaming others isn't going to resolve anything. There'll be a lot of things that are injust throughout your life. You will have to stand up by yourself.
author: Kazuichi Arai

quote: Hard work is worthless for those that don't believe in themselves.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: The moment you back down is the moment you lose!
author: Coach Kamogawa

quote: Being able to work hard is the best talent of all.
author: Hiroshi Kido

quote: It's not because we can't take vengeance that we should feel sorry. The real reason to feel sorry... is when one is hung up on revenge and can't live their own life.
author: Yoshimura

quote: People who say they don't know their own feelings are deluding themselves. It's because you refuse to accept what you're thinking deep down in your heart, you think you don't understand.
author: Kenji Yamaguchi

quote: Compared to the "righteous" greed of the rulers, the criminals of the world seem much more honorable. When scum rules the world, only more scum is born.
author: Eustass Kid

quote: If you don't risk your life, you can't create a future. Right?
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Everyone has to decide for themselves which choice to make. If you fight, people may die... but if you don't fight, people may still die. There's no "right" or "wrong" choice to make.
author: Christina Mackenzie

quote: Do you think everyone can make their dreams come true through hard work? Hard work isn't always rewarded.
author: Atsushi Murasakibara

quote: Life is like a mountain - you can say you've reached the top, but only after climbing back down.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: My happiness can only be made by my own hands. My happiness doesn't depend on anyone but me!
author: Minori Kushieda

quote: A man has the right to dream. There are endless possibilities stretched out before him.
author: Outlaw Star

quote: Some of us don't have time to die.
author: Ganta Igarashi

quote: Even if you're weak, there are miracles you can seize with your hands if you fight on to the very end.
author: Uryuu Minene

quote: Believe in yourself and create your own destiny. Don't fear fate.
author: Outlaw Star

quote: The loneliest people are the kindest. The saddest people smile the brightest. The most damaged people are the wisest. All because they don't wish to see anyone else suffer the way they did.
author: Jellal Fernandes

quote: We have to fight in order to live. That's what will make us strong.
author: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood

quote: If you turn your eyes away from sad things, they'll happen again one day. If you keep running away, you'll keep repeating the same mistakes. That's why you have to face the truth straight on.
author: Riki Naoe

quote: It's not a matter of real or fake. These avatars are idols on the net. in other words - icons. Icons cannot solely exist through their own will. Neither Hayama nor Sugawara established their status on their own. They were able to become Talsiman and Spooky Boogie because their fans idolized them based on their own distorted perceptions. Their true feelings and colors are not the same as the ideals their characters represents. It's not surprising that a fan could do a better job than the real owners of playing the idol the fans expect to see.
author: Kougami Shinya

quote: Everyone here is the same. They don't notice anything. They don't say anything. And they don't think anything. They are merely a shell of their former selves and soon they will disappear like the melting snow. This epidemic leads innocent people to their deaths, and yet, its pathogen will never be eradicated. This is a disease called serenity - a form of death that people have wished for.
author: Oryou Rikako

quote: So fucking what if I'm not you?! That doesn't mean it's okay for you to give up! If you do, I'll never forgive you as long as I live. God knows I'm not perfect either. I've made tons of stupid mistakes and later I regretted them. And I've done it over and over again, thousands of times. A cycle of hollow joy and vicious self-hatred. But even so, every time I learned something about myself.
author: Misato Katsuragi

quote: Chastity and grace - traditional virtues that have been lost. They comprise the educational ideology of Ousou Academy. They're priorities that are not valued in boys, only in girls. After having them instilled in us, we're shipped out as brand-name product, refined, sheltered maidens, and purchased by men who seek a classic piece of furniture called "a good wife and mother" in a formality known as marriage. Students in this school are all components that will be processed into an artwork called "the lady". They are rough stones waiting to be polished and finished up. They live sad and boring lives, even though there are many other possible ways they could bloom.
author: Oryou Rikako

quote: When you entrust so much of your everyday life to those electronic devices, the argument that you aren't a cyborg isn't very convincing. To you, those portable terminals are already your second brain. Isn't that right? It can be said that the history of science is a history of the expansion of the human body's functionality, in other words, the history of man's cyberization. That's why it's a matter of degree.
author: Toyohisa Senguji

quote: You sure say some funny things. Solitude? Does that only apply to me? Who isn't alone in this society? The time when our connection to others was the basis of our selves is long gone. In this world where everyone is watched over by the system and live within the system's standards, a community isn't necessary. Everyone just lives in their own cell, and the system tames them by giving them each their own personal serenity.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: Isn't using the net just like using knives for cooking or using paper to write things down? It has nothing to do with good or bad. It's like, it's there, so we accept and use it.
author: Akane Tsunemori

quote: Some people want power and they get mad when they don't get it. They take their fury out on everyone else. You don't want it, it becomes you.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: I read in some book that sad and painful things are the spices of an enjoyable life... But I seem to get nothing but spices!
author: Tomoko Kuroki

quote: "I would die for you" is what the weak say. If you're in love with someone - live for them.
author: Ross

quote: There is no such thing as a perfect person. That is why we cannot live alone.
author: Chichiri

quote: Can you not be something unless you're already somebody else's something?
author: Ross

quote: Until now, I had never felt any need to be understood. I had never felt lonely. Not until I met you.
author: Galilei

quote: I'm Hatake Kakashi. Things I like and things I hate? I don't feel like telling you that. My dreams for the future? Never really thought about that. As for my hobbies... I have lots of hobbies.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered. The point is to discover them.
author: Galilei

quote: Everyone has an equal right to live. If you have more than others, you should share with those who have less. If you feel happier than others, help those in need. That is the duty of those who are given so much.
author: Galilei Donna

quote: Admiration is the furthest thing from understanding.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: No matter what bonds you forge with others, time will tear them apart. Well... Doesn't thinking about it make you sick?
author: Shinobu Oshino

quote: Even children are forced to grow up in the face of pain.
author: Pain

quote: There are things you can't turn back, even if you want to.
author: Jūdai Yūki

quote: Communication is the only way people can move ahead.
author: Tsukiko Tsutsukakushi

quote: Do you know about the Happy Prince? It's such a happy story. The Prince helps everyone together with a little swallow, then he dies happily. But I wonder how the swallow felt? His wish wasn't granted because he helped the foolish Prince. Was the swallow really happy? It's always like that. The Prince and all the people he helped are happy, but what about the swallow? He helped the Prince more than anyone, so why is he ignored completely?
author: Azusa Azuki

quote: Man, kids these days. They think it's a competition to have the most friends. One is enough. Find someone completely unique.
author: Yato

quote: It's human nature not to realize the true value of something, unless they lose it.
author: Orochimaru

quote: In society, those who don't have many abilities, tend to complain more.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: We all have the right to choose our own future. We should be able to walk the paths that we choose, not the future youÂ´ve decided for us.
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: A real man is someone who forgives a woman for her lies!
author: Sanji

quote: In every time, in every world, the strong polish their fangs while the weak polish their wisdom.
author: Sora

quote: I've forged my own way alone. While you were consoling and fighting with one another, I faced everything myself, head on. Now look at how strong I am.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: People don't give damn about reasons, but nobody can resist miracles.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: If you have love in your life, you must keep living.
author: Juvia Loxar

quote: Your back is your one big blind spot.
author: Yoko Littner

quote: We are Partners. If you are a Witch, then I am a Warlock.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: You think you're special? You're not. Everyone lies, everyone hides things... Nobody makes it through this life being completely honest.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: The minute you think of giving up, think of the reason why you held on so long.
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something, and has lost something.
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Care to little, you lose them. Care too much, you get hurt.
author: Gajeel Redfox

quote: We are all different from each other and that's what makes us all special.
author: Mirajane Strauss

quote: Bring on the hardship. It's preferred in a path of carnage.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: It's frightening that there's no guarantee that I'll ever be loved.
author: Akito Sohma

quote: I want to believe that life isn't full of darkness. Even if storms come to pass, the sun will shine again. No matter how painful and hard the rain my beat down on me.
author: Akito Sohma

quote: It would be nice to live in a kind world without any fear, without any troubles, without hurting anybody, without ever being hurt
author: Akito Sohma

quote: Talking about peace whilst spilling blood, it's something that only humans can do.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: If you don't like the hand that fate's dealt you with, fight for a new one!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: The pain of being alone is completely out of this world, isn't it? I don't know why, but I understand your feelings so much, it actually hurts.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: I guess we won't be living together forever as gods. But still... This is forever, too.
author: Ikusaba Marco

quote: If the truth is a cruel mistress, then a lie must be a nice girl.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Keep fighting on, even if it ain't worth much.
author: Uryuu Minene

quote: I wanted to be saved too...
author: Uryuu Minene

quote: It works better if you don't try as hard, just like in real life.
author: Nagisa Hazuki

quote: I've been trying so hard... Even though you rejected me, I've been trying my best. But if I go on liking you like this then nothing will change.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Only idiots start fights they can't win.
author: Sora

quote: Now that just looks horrible. It's like some feudal society. If that's what it takes to make friends in this world, forever alone is fine by me.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: There's no point. Would apologizing serve any purpose? If it will, I'll do it.
author: Mei Misaki

quote: Just consider hardships as another part of training and keep working hard.
author: Klein

quote: A temporary defeat is nothing if it leads to ultimate victory!
author: Stephanie Dola

quote: One of the things Blank loves best is saying 'No' to people who think they've got an absolute advantage.
author: Sora

quote: Even if the world doesn't accept you, I'll always be right by your side!
author: Tendou Kisara

quote: Know what makes Ganta so amazing? He always gets up again.
author: Shiro

quote: Life hurts, you think we don't know that? But some of us choose to go on regardless. Some of us don't have time to die cause people count on us to survive.
author: Ganta Igarashi

quote: I don't have time to worry if it's right or wrong, you can't hope for a horror story with a happy ending!
author: Eren Jaeger

quote: Happiness is only happiness when everyone shares it.
author: Ryuugajou Nanana

quote: Adoration never leads to a balanced relationship.
author: Ami Kawashima

quote: Getting dumped always makes a man stronger. But then again, men aren't meant to pursue happiness.
author: Jiraiya

quote: A way for the weak to stay weak, but still defeat the strong. A way to stay who you are but surpass your limits. To soar through the sky, even if you can't fly. He's always found a way, inside despair, suffering and darkness.
author: Kurami Zell

quote: Humans tend to think logically, but their actions are driven by emotions...
author: Sumire Muroto

quote: I was just dreaming a little. About my old world. It's strange. In the dream, I wondered if everything here, in Aincard, if everything that had happened with you, was only a dream. I was really scared. I'm happy this wasn't a dream.
author: Asuna Yūki

quote: I cried alone every single night. It felt like every day that passed here stole another piece of my real life away. After I cried, I'd go and fight as hard as I could. My only thought was winning, moving forward and getting stronger.
author: Asuna Yūki

quote: I too, was looking for something. Something real in this world. For me, it was the warmth of your hand.
author: Lisbeth

quote: Even if I die, you keep living okay? Live to see the end of this world, and to see why it was born. Live to see why a weak girl like me ended up here. And the reason you and I met.
author: Sachi

quote: The spring of my heart surges upon the sight of your fresh smile, my love.
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: Do you think you could tell me what true strength is? I may be out of line, but hiding your true self and putting on airs doesn't seem any different than running away to me. I would think that embracing the things you truly like and being able to enjoy them is worth more than anything. To just be yourself… I believe that's what true strength really is.
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: I'm not stupid enough to use a cannon to hunt a rabbit.
author: Dracule Mihawk

quote: Either in belief or doubt, if I lean to one of these sides, my reaction time will be dulled if my heart thinks the opposite of what I choose.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Memories are, in a word, learning. And there's no shame in learning from a formidable enemy!
author: Rufus Lore

quote: The world...what a glorious place! Seek freedom, and it will lie stretched out before your eyes. If the endless dream guides your restless spirit, seize it! Raise your flag, and stand tall!
author: Gol D. Roger

quote: It's as if you are stuck in some predetermined program, following some predetermined script. If you really want to live in reality, then fight against it. Break through destiny with your own hands, and build your own reality!
author: Sarutobi Ayame

quote: There is no need for any proof. There is no need to create any. We just have to live every second to the fullest, and the traces of the path we lived will burn into the ground. That will serve as proof of our existence.
author: Hijikata Toushirou

quote: The hole in one's heart gets filled by others around you. Friends won't flock to someone who abandons the memory of his friends and gives up on the world just because things don't go the way he wants them to. That won't help fill the hole in your heart. And people won't help those who run away and do nothing. As long as you don't give up, there will always be salvation.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Be daring in the midst of caution, you can't win if you're afraid of taking risks.
author: Tetsuya Yūki

quote: The only one who can beat me, is me!
author: Daiki Aomine

quote: Even when times are at their hardest, don't let it show on your face. If the captain is shaken, the team will waver.
author: Tetsuya Yūki

quote: Change is never easy in this world. I can't even change one friend, let alone a whole country.
author: Kotarō Katsura

quote: No one would intentionally set an easily accessible place as their goal. It's a challenge, because it's difficult. It is a dream because it can't be achieved easily.
author: Isashiki Jun

quote: A great calligrapher doesn't blame the brush.
author: Fuji Shuusuke

quote: Flattery will get you everywhere.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: We are NOT asking him where the treasure is hidden!!! We're not even asking him whether there IS any treasure or not!! I'm not sure, but... ...everybody set out to sea, risking their lives to search for it!!! If you ask this old man anything about it here and now... Then I'll quit being a pirate! I don't want to go on a boring adventure like that!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: They say people can change, but is that really true? If they decide they want to fly, will they grow wings? I don't think so. You don't change yourself, you change how you do things. You have to make your own way. You have to create a way to fly, even while you stay the same.
author: Sora

quote: There is no such thing as luck in this world. Rules, prerequisites, psychological states... There are any number of invisible factors that combine to produce an unpredictable, but inevitable result. The winner of each game is decided before it even begins. Chance is never a factor.
author: Sora

quote: We evolve beyond the person we were a minute before. Little by little, we advance a bit further with each turn.
author: Simon

quote: If you believe in your dreams, I will prove to you, that you can achieve your dreams just by working hard.
author: Rock Lee

quote: Feelings aren't black and white. Even if they're fuzzy and contradictory, if they're sincere, they are what they are.
author: Murasaki

quote: There's no such thing as useless effort.
author: Taiga Kagami

quote: The only people who say that money doesn't matter in this world are the ones with lots of it.
author: Takasugi Shinsuke

quote: Family is the society that you came into contact with first
author: Reisi Munakata

quote: No matter how beautiful a person may be, they will still age and ultimately - die. But even so, even if appearances change, don't you believe that we have, in us, things that don't change? Even as our bodies crumble, even as the months and years take their toll... don't you believe that we all have something that time can't spoil? Even if you cover us with wrinkles, we won't lose to you. That's because we know what beauty truly is.
author: Shimura Tae

quote: People need to live their life with a clear conscience. When you want to walk on a straight path, somehow you get yourself stained with mud. However, as long as we never give up, one day the mud on you will dry up and fall off.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Maybe nothing in this world happens by accident. As everything happens for a reason, our destiny slowly takes form...
author: Silvers Rayleigh

quote: Accept that your life will be painful, bite back your grief and find the power to stand again.
author: Nakiami

quote: What took a very long time to build up takes mere moments to destroy. But you can always start over. Next time around, you'll do a better job.
author: Kenji Makabe

quote: The way of the sword doesn't belong to any one nation. Knowledge of the arts belongs to us all.
author: Piandao

quote: Not one wish ever gets granted in this world.
author: Tobi

quote: We will not just fade away, thought there's no way to know how long it may last. We WILL leave our mark on this world!
author: Katakura Kojūrō

quote: The Time is now for us to start something new. Everybody's struggling, you think you're special - you're not. Forget it, there's no time. Don't try to hide in the corner barking and don't take your aggression out on others. If you got time for that, step forward and stand tall, it's our future and no one is gonna give it to us. It's a future that we're gonna build for ourselves, with our very own hands. What's the point in being at the mercy of others. You can't lose as long as you don't give up. No matter how trapped you feel, no matter how unfair you think it is. The only thing that matters is what you see, with your own two eyes. What hope do you have if you turn away from that? What can you hope to achieve without facing the cold hard truth? A person has to have a reason to live, but you don't need any excuse to die.
author: Hibiki Tokai

quote: There are two kinds of fights. As long as we place ourselves in battle, we must always know the difference, a fight to defend life or a fight to defend pride.
author: Ukitake Jyuushirou

quote: Death no longer terrifies man, the smell of blood is as common as the smell of white plums. So, he creates slavery and savagery... which surpasses the horror of dying.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: The worst part about being strong is that no one ever asks if you're ok.
author: Accelerator

quote: Good is predicated on corruption and evil.
author: Tamaki Tsunenaga

quote: After all, justice in this world is just a bunch of principles, made by those with power to suit themselves.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Yes, I'm the nice twin, but this conversation bores me. Go play in traffic, please.
author: Hikaru Hitachiin

quote: Game over. If that's the case. I just have to play again.
author: Megumi Yamamoto

quote: No matter where you are, you have to have the energy to keep on doing the things that you like until the final moment.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: You've got to enjoy life, or else you'll end up wasting it.
author: Revy

quote: Learn to make your own decisions, instead of relying on others to make them for you. Otherwise, those decisions will never really be made.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: If you don't want to die - think.
author: Levi Ackerman

quote: Laws exist only for those who cannot live without clinging to them.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Even if you can't move anymore, or your back gets bent out of shape, it doesn't matter! What matters is what's inside! Not what someone looks like, dammit!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Even if armed with hundreds of weapons... there are times when you just can't beat a man with a spear of conviction in his gut.
author: One Piece

quote: No matter what changes, I'll still be me. And I can be whoever I want to be.
author: Amu Hinamori

quote: You're your own worst enemy. If your worries and doubts torment you, then just stop thinking about them.
author: Binboda Momiji

quote: The world is full of choices unseen. With the willingness to notice, anyone can choose a world of their very own, from an infinity of choices.
author: Shinku

quote: If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: It's a nice thought to believe in a "next time". If it was a real battlefield, there wouldn't be a "next time".
author: Tatsuya Shiba

quote: If you think music is only made of sounds, you're mistaken. Silence is also part of music.
author: Kunio Yaobi

quote: I hate memories. Because reality is better than memories. A reality where I exist and you're here right next to me.
author: Motoharu Yano

quote: Victory isn't determined solely by who has the superior physical abilities.
author: Tsumugu Kinagase

quote: It's over when you give up.
author: Brook

quote: You came into my life as a story, you left as a legend.
author: Reborn

quote: I've seen this before. This sensation... I get it now. This is what I wanted. No need to rely on or work with other people. I just want to drift through the water alone in silence.
author: Haruka Nanase

quote: For living creatures, Victory if Life, and Defeat means Death.
author: Teppei Kiyoshi

quote: We have to live a life of no regrets.
author: Portgas D. Ace

quote: If there's no one happy, is it really a victory?
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: Nothing good can come by rejecting yourself.
author: Riki Naoe

quote: We simply cannot see the world as it is. The world people see is nothing more than how our brains translate it. In other words, it's subjective.
author: Alis Color

quote: The same thing as always. No matter how many times I reach game over and no matter how many times I must pathetically hit continue, I will not stop moving forward.
author: Kamijou Touma

quote: The real sin is averting your eyes and failing to believe in anyone.
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: Comrade isn't simply a word. Comrades are about heart. It's the unconditional trust in your partners. Please, feel free to lean on me.... And I, too, will lean on you as well.
author: Mavis Vermillion

quote: Feelings of romantic love are, in the end, just some chemical reaction. Under the right conditions, they occur no matter who the other person is.
author: Kaoru Yamazaki

quote: In essence, language accounts for a mere 30% of human communication. The other 70% is made up of information collected from eye movements and other body language. With that, even a loner who never takes part in conversation can pull off 70% of what we consider communication.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Remember this. The only words that can keep you alive are "I want to live."
author: Hampnie Hambart

quote: Sorry. I don't believe in fate. I explore my future with my own strength. Good or bad, it's my own choice.
author: Manjoume Jun

quote: I don't like the terms "good person" or "bad person" because it's impossible to be entirely good to everyone or entirely bad to everyone. To some, you are a good person, while to others, you are a bad person.
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: If you live life by other people's standards, then your life is no longer yours.
author: Eddie Lee

quote: There are two types of people in this world - those who do what they're told and those who stay true to themselves. Most people think you're supposed to follow a predetermined path, keep your head down, obey the rules, do whatever's popular. But some prefer to follow their own path in life.
author: Yuji Sakurai

quote: Giving into the pain and thinking you want to die just means you've been spoiled by life. If you don't want to die, then don't act spoiled. Suffer through life
author: Ogami Rei

quote: This is how culture spreads. When someone has a new idea, it is immediately copied.
author: Watashi

quote: Real strength only reveals itself when one is faced with great turmoil! Therefore, I shall always tread a thorny path!
author: Aoi Asahina

quote: Life is basically like a soap bubble. It rides on the wind, flying here and there... and before you realize it - pop! It's gone. When it's about to disappear, you think that you could've flown a little higher. But by the time, it's already too late.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: That's what I call smallness as a human being. No matter how much I'm irritated by it, I can't do anything about it. It's not complex, just stunted. Because as a human being I'm small, or something.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: Everyday was the same. Deep down, I felt bored. But it wasn't the days that felt boring. It was being just like everyone else.
author: Sorata Kanda

quote: Those who have no skill, require harsh instruction if they are to have any hope to get any better.
author: Nanashi

quote: When you live, your life will end sooner or later. The body will return to the earth. Grass and flowers will grow on top of it. The soul will nourish the hearts... and it will live on in the hearts of other people. Everything in this world flows around and circulates. That goes for human lives too.
author: Izumi Curtis

quote: Spilled water will never return to its container.
author: Hei

quote: As long as you do not give up, nothing is over.
author: Yuzuki Eba

quote: Listen up, kid. There's one thing you need to understand. Human life is a fragile thing. So weak that I can destroy it with a touch of my finger. So watch what you say. If you don't, I may break something I shouldn't.
author: Accelerator

quote: Nothing can suppress a human's curiosity.
author: Eren Jaeger

quote: There's no meaningful difference between a real and a virtual world. It's pointless to ask anyone who they really are. All you can do is accept and believe in them, because whoever they are in your mind, is their true identity.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: If the world outside is void of hope, and if despair is contagious, then I'll just have to infect everyone with my hope. Living in despair really isn't living at all.
author: Makoto Naegi

quote: Sakura-chan would probably say "Strength can only be obtained by standing up to adversity. So I choose to walk down the path filled with thorns."
author: Aoi Asahina

quote: I want to hear who you are, not what you have.
author: Nino

quote: When people are protecting something truly special to them, they truly can become... as strong as they can be.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: There's no advantage to hurrying through life.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: I'm no saint. A sense of duty, a sense of righteousness - they're just nuisances in life.
author: Okajima Rokuro

quote: I want to live... I want to hold something in my hands and feel its warmth.
author: Dune

quote: Anyone can make a mistake. If you feel bad about it, will that sin disappear?
author: Akoes

quote: Good and bad are human concepts, so something that is not human cannot be classified as neither good nor bad.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: When I tell you to leave, leave. In this world, winning is everything. Winners are affirmed completely, and losers are denied completely. I've never lost at anything before, and I never will. Because I always win, and I'm always right. I show no mercy to those who oppose me, not even my own parents.
author: Akashi Seijuurou

quote: Don't worry about being so considerate of adults. You can only be a kid for so long, so you might as well enjoy it.
author: Charles Beams

quote: Even though there's such a thing as an impossible game, there's no such thing as an impossible reality.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: If one side was just, it would be called a defense or a suppression. But this is war. And wars happen because both sides are just.
author: Kajoumaru Hidetomo

quote: To someone who bears responsibility, there's no greater treasure than experience.
author: Litonar

quote: If you're felling like there's nowhere you belong... That you're trapped in a small world. It's those feelings that drive us beyond our world.
author: Reiji Nitta

quote: People have to save themselves. One person saving another is impossible.
author: Meme Oshino

quote: It's difficult to change the world on your own, but twisting it a little might not be all that hard.
author: Shinobu Oshino

quote: The longer you're with someone, the tougher it is to part ways.
author: Sawako Kuronuma

quote: All I need is the power to be able to protect my comrades. So long as I can have the strength to do that, I don't care if I'm weaker than everyone else in the world.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: There are some things in life that will only be understood through words.
author: Winry Rockbell

quote: You yourself have to change first, or nothing will change for you.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: I don't know which option you should choose. I could never advise you on that... No matter what kind of wisdom dictates you the option you pick, no one will be able to tell if it's right or wrong until you arrive to some sort of outcome from your choice.
author: Levi Ackerman

quote: This is our show. We're the ones who are writing the script.
author: Taiga Kagami

quote: The trick of real combat is that everyone is human.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Don't just think about the ones you have lost. You can't get back what you have lost. What is it that you still have ?
author: Jinbei

quote: What is right? What is wrong? In this mixed up world, deciding what is right and wrong is not easy. You can't just go by somebody else's rules. If you let yourself be controlled like that, you'll just become a puppet that can't make decisions on it's own. You have to live by your rules.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: If we are frightened, the people behind us will be, as well. You must be a shining star... that washes away fear, so that those behind you wil not be afraid!
author: Genjuurou Tsukishima

quote: How you change is up to you.
author: Midorima Shintarou
