quote: If we're unable to climb down the mountain, then we won't know whether there's another mountain to climb up.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Why are you punching? What are you chasing? You should already know the answer to that. To become strong.
author: Coach Kamogawa

quote: No single thing is perfect by itself. That's why we're born to attract other things to make up for what we lack. I think we start walking in the right direction only after we start getting our counterparts beside us.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Being frightened of a strong enemy is perfectly natural. Confidence is something you build up, triumph upon triumph.
author: Rain

quote: Bare emotions tell the truth much eloquently than any justification.
author: Konan

quote: The past and the future are not the same, but they're not completely separate either.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: For people like us, we do not have a choice over the environment we're in, but we get to decide what we will make of it and what path we will take from there.
author: Yu Fujikura

quote: When you're on a bike, the ocean's a lot closer than you think. The autumn salt wind went right through to the back of my nose. And maybe it's because, like Haruko said, my head was empty.
author: Naota Nandaba

quote: When extremes are reached, evil turns to virtue.
author: Riki

quote: It's scary to decide, isn't it? But we have to decide something. If we make a decision, things might change.
author: Hajime Ichinose

quote: Our injuries will heal as long as we're alive. But the scars will remain.
author: Allen Walker

quote: If we only believe when the odds are with us, then that's not believing at all.
author: Ousawa Akatsuki

quote: I pretended it was someone else's fault that nothing happened. But I was wrong. If you put your mind to it, you can change the color of your world in an instant.
author: Sorata Kanda

quote: I realized why I was lost. It's not because I didn't have a map... It was because I didn't have a destination.
author: Yuuta Takemoto

quote: I'm not stupid. I'm just too lazy to show how smart I am.
author: Oreki Houtarou

quote: When I was a child, whenever it snowed, I would play and make snowballs. When you start rolling a snowball, someone will always appear out of nowhere and help you make it bigger and in the end, everyone goes home satisfied. It was then that I suddenly thought “This is what I want to grow up to be like”.
author: Alicia Florence

quote: I am not going to take sides, I am neutral. I am talking about standpoints here, that is all. Miss Class Representative (Hanekawa Tsubasa) has her point of view and her parents have their own. There is no way for an outsider to know which of them is right. Actually, there is not a right one in the first place. It is just about who is easier to agree with.
author: Meme Oshino

quote: Do not lose to the obstacles that you will meet in the future. I have my own set of goals but do not pursue them because of my laziness.
author: Okazaki Tomoya

quote: Run until you can't run anymore, and then run again. Constant effort is life's greatest shortcut.
author: Coach Kamogawa

quote: A garden retains its beauty as long as it is tended to and cared for. Life in general, is the same. Once it becomes pretty, it mustn't go back to being the primitive mess it started out as.
author: Kotori Kanbe

quote: Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don't care.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Knowing what it feels to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
author: Jiraiya

quote: Although I'm weak and full of flaws, I will never stop moving forward. No matter who I am, no one other than myself will create my own existence. No matter what others may think or feel, I will still move forward as myself.
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: A person can only murder another once. The act of murder is giving up the humanity that is within oneself. What is left is just emptiness. You can not lose humanity if it is already lost. The act of murder turns into the act of slaughter. They are two different things.
author: Ryougi Shiki

quote: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: On the internet, we only know each other's usernames. If we were talking face to face, I probably would never talk to them this way. They look at the "Real Me". They support me a lot... I wish there were more people like them.
author: Sumino Hikage

quote: You only understand the true value of things after you've lost them.
author: Ayumu Aikawa

quote: Words alone, can make an entire army withdraw.
author: Yuusha

quote: Moping around with sadness and sorrow... what will come of it? Even dead people can do that. However, I'll live and stand on my own two legs. If we are going to die one day, wouldn't it be better to have no regrets?
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: The world is destined for even greater chaos.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Remember this... no matter where you go, the strength of your mind and spirit is the most powerful magic of all.
author: Princess Emeraude

quote: You didn't raise a weapon. You raised a son.
author: Shura Kirigakure

quote: You should keep your distance from me if you want to live. My place is in the shadows, yours in the light. We walk opposite paths, Aberline. It's best that you remember that.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: You want to keep everyone from dying? That's naive. It's war. People die.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: When you confess your feelings, you should do a proper job.
author: Oogumo

quote: I'm neither a soldier, nor a brave man. Not to mention that running away isn't the same thing as losing. You only truly lose by dying. So as long you're alive, you win!
author: Senator Figaro

quote: A past will chase you if you try to escape from it, but once you confront it, it's just an old memory inside you.
author: Saiyuki

quote: I'm rather proud of my ability to tell lies. I can trick not only others, but even my own heart.
author: Ludenberg Celestia

quote: The meaning to our existence... is to live. To remember those who have died and face the world. God doesn't exist. I will. Through my own will.
author: Setsuna F. Seiei

quote: It's not that you don't know how to interact with people. It's just that no one ever came to interact with you.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: When you're hiding a secret from the whole world, it puts a weight on your shoulders.
author: Taichi Yaegashi

quote: Everything doesn't have to be decided by life and death. Just think about the future.
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: We found ourselves in conflict with each other many times. There were hard times when we wanted to run away or give up. But it was only because that rain fell, that the seeds of our emotions could sprout. And the flowers of deeper friendship could bloom.
author: Misaki Kamiigusa

quote: Before creation there must be destruction. If my soul stands in the way, then I'll toss it aside. Yes, I have no choice but to move forward.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Everyone can make a choice after they have learned what it will result in. It is so easy to say we should have done it this way afterwards. But you can't know what your choice will result in before actually choosing.
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: You must look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self reveal itself.
author: Iroh

quote: I'm not against socializing, so long as it's not tiring.
author: Oreki Houtarou

quote: Rock, if you think about it, other than this, what do we really value in life? God? Love? Don't make me laugh. When I was a brat, crawling around in that shithole city, it seemed God and Love were always sold out when I went looking. Before I knew better, I clung to God and prayed to Him every single night — yeah, I believed in God right up until that night the cops beat the hell out of me for no reason at all. All they saw when they looked at me was another little ghetto rat. With no power and no God, what's left for a poor little Chinese bitch to rely on? It's money, of course, and guns. Fuckin' A. With these two things, the world's a great place.
author: Revy

quote: If you're lonely, you should say something! If you're worried, say something! Most people aren't as sharp as you are! If you want those people to understand you, you should say something! Even if you're worried that you'll embarrass yourself, you should still say something!
author: Iori Nagase

quote: I haven't lived all that long yet, but there is something I firmly believe in. The people who have the ability to change something in this world, all without exception, have the guts to abandon things important to them if they have to. They are those who can abandon even their humanity.
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: Why are you staring at me? Are you annoyed that I am the only one who has cake?
author: L Lawliet

quote: To climb a hill on a difficult road, you need to be walking steadily.
author: Ayumu Aikawa

quote: Gohan, you showed me that power is nothing without being guided without love.
author: Piccolo

quote: I don't think anyone is born knowing the reason why they're here. It's just something you have to find as you go along.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: To become a monster like me, is to admit you were too weak to remain a human.
author: Alucard

quote: Those who rely on "someday" will only grow weaker and lowlier.
author: Shana

quote: "I long to see someone who died", "I want to be rich", "I want women", "I want to protect the world"... They're all desires. In other words, wishes. If you ask me, there's neither "right" or "wrong" when it comes to greed. You humans go around ranking certain types of greed in order from good to bad, which makes you so hard to understand.
author: Greed

quote: Sometimes, we have to look beyond what we want and do what's best.
author: Piccolo

quote: The world lies! Thou shalt not commit murder, thou shalt not bear false witness, thou shalt not cheat, thou shalt not steal, thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's wife. All of these are lies! Mere illusions and nothing more! They don't want to be killed, they don't want to be robbed, using the twin lies of justice and morality, the weak are endeavoring to protect themselves. But the first truth is that the strong devour the weak, so let us feed upon people, upon wealth, upon riches and power! We, at Britannia, shall feast upon the raw flesh of the world itself! We will crush this deception and bring forth the truth! All Hail Britannia!
author: Charles Zi Britannia

quote: Denying possibility is denying thought.
author: Alcor

quote: Laws aren't perfect, because humans who created laws aren't perfect. It's impossible to be perfect. However, the laws are evidence of the human's struggle to be righteous.
author: Soichiro Yagami

quote: It's stupid to talk about things you're not. Be yourself and you'll be fine.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: We are all farsighted, we give importance to those things that are far from us, while neglecting the things that are close to us... only to realize their value later, when they are out-of-reach again.
author: Kawamura Sachiko

quote: Manga endings might always end the same. However, if it comes to life. Neither you or I are mere readers. We are writers. We can change the ending.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: People are like dice, a certain Frenchman said that. You throw yourself in the direction of your own choosing. People are free because they can do that. Everyone's circumstances are different, but no matter how small the choice, at the very least, you can throw yourself. It's not chance or fate. It's the choice you made.
author: Black Lagoon

quote: Murder doesn't necessarily mean evil, right? The world being what it is, a lot of people out there deserve to die, don't they? But those who do take it upon themselves to kill others, have to be prepared to have others try to kill them as well. And that's what they call the law of Karma, my friends. That's why good or bad, the only ones who are going to be left standing are the ones with the strongest wills to survive.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: Time flows constantly, it doesn't care about the people who are struggling.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: The world is not meant just to be looked at, it’s important to get the feel of things. Don’t be captivated just by what’s in front of you and neglect the rest. Free your mind from evil and accept everything as it is. This is what we call enlightenment.
author: Priest

quote: I love this game that people call "life" from the bottom of my heart.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: It's because I've experienced pain in the past, that I can even consider what would be best for the future!
author: Ohnoki

quote: What do you suppose the most irrational thing is? - It's humanity.
author: Deadman Wonderland

quote: The world consists of "choices", in other words, it consists of continual gamble. Other guys are not aware of this. Thus they moved about in confusion.
author: Ikazuchi Akatsuki

quote: There's nothing that won't change, every day things will change a little bit more.
author: Ganta Igarashi

quote: Resignation is what kills people. Once they've rejected resignation, humans gain the privilege of making humanity their footpath.
author: Alucard

quote: A certain scripture mentions that humans are superior to angels. Why? Because there are people who know of evil, but do not become evil. It's different from angels, who know only of good since birth. Humans have evil, but can live as good, so they are superior to angels, who know only good.
author: Kotomine Kirei

quote: Reject common sense to make the impossible possible!
author: Simon

quote: Some things can't be prevented. The last of which, is death. All we can do is live until the day we die. Control what we can... and fly free!
author: Deneil Young

quote: God is emotional bullshit.
author: Revy

quote: Whatever your thoughts may be, if you don't say them, none of it will be acknowledged by others.
author: Tomoyo Daidouji

quote: I think having a dream, working hard, and never giving up couldn't possibly bring misfortune.
author: Miho Azuki

quote: You must be prepared to face the worst possible scenarios. Because harsh reality strikes without warning.
author: Hunter X Hunter

quote: Don't start a fight that you can't finish.
author: Sanji

quote: I don't care what the society says. I've regretted doing anything. I will survive and do what I want to.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: The fear of interacting with people...even I understand that one.
author: Soul Evans

quote: You can never tell what'll happen next in life. But so long as you have faith in your feet, the road you walk will be a part of you.
author: Iori Nagase

quote: There's nothing that's entirely black or white.
author: Yoki

quote: Drop ink on the finest snow-white paper and it will inevitably absorb into black. Its purity demands it. Tainted men have immunities. Black does not absorb black.
author: Shinobu Sensui

quote: "If I do this, I can stop the rebellion", "if I do that, I can stop the rebellion"... Open your eyes, princess! Your zealous idealism disgusts me! Ideals can only be spoken by those powerful enough to carry them out. And that excludes you!
author: Crocodile

quote: The balance between hope and despair keeps itself to zero. When was it you told me that? I understand what you mean now, I did save quite a few people, but in exchange hatred and jealousy filled my heart, I even hurt my best friend. Someone has to be cursed to balance out a wish for someone else's happiness.
author: Sayaka Miki

quote: Sometimes the truth can hurt others more than a lie.
author: Nonomiya

quote: Regardless of our limitations, we can always be of some use. Our power may seem insignificant... but it may just prove to be useful in the grand scheme of things. Stay focused. Never avert your eyes, because if an opening arises, even our insignificant power may be enough to determine the fate of the world. Which is why everyone must stay alert and ready to strike at any moment!
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: Humans have the ability to actively put things to an end rather than simply accept what's in store.
author: Souda Manatsu

quote: I want to find a path that no one else had taken into consideration.
author: Miyuki Sagara

quote: There are three conditions to terrify someone: One, the monster can't speak. Two, the monster has to be unidentifiable. Three, it's meaningless if the monster can die.
author: Aozaki Touko

quote: It's not possible to save everything. Prioritize your goals.
author: Uryuu Minene

quote: Even if I was someone, people couldn't comprehend me. And even if they could, they wouldn't be able to communicate it to those around them. I do not belong to the world. That is the world's limit, the boundary between the world and the self.
author: Ergo Proxy

quote: When you are trying to rebuild a build that was made incorrectly, you first have to destroy it. I thought this was the true.
author: Seta Soujirou

quote: No one can draw a clear line between sane and insane. You move that line as you see fit for yourself. No one else can. You'll understand soon... that the one that's insane is this world.
author: Vincent Volaju

quote: Don't you think dreams and the Internet are similar? They are both areas where the repressed conscious mind vents.
author: Atsuko Chiba

quote: If fighting could provide us with the truth, nobody would make any mistakes in their lives. A person's life is not that easy. The truth you must learn from yourself, from how you live your life.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: From the perspective of others I am part of the world, but when I observe the world from my perspective I am nowhere to be found. To observe is to create perspective. I can never cease to be the point of origin from my perspective. I observe that which is not myself. This is the first principle to find.
author: Ergo Proxy

quote: A lie is truth, until you recognize it as a lie. To see the truth behind those lies is probably the right thing to do. However, it may not necessarily bring happiness. Lies are Happiness.
author: Hoody

quote: Know much about purgatory? It's the place between heaven and hell, where those who were left behind, unable to get into heaven continue to suffer, a place of struggle and pain. In other words, the world that we're in now.
author: Vincent Volaju

quote: Do what you can until you learn what you need. If you're going to try something, you may as well aim for the top.
author: Deneil Young

quote: Real power is forged from the desire smoldering in the heart. It fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity scarcely imagined to be possible.
author: Orochimaru

quote: Remember. You can feel it if you hold your hand against your chest. It belongs to no one. It's our pulse, yours and mine. This is what brings us to the truth. It's what proves that we are the very world itself. Follow your instincts. The answer is already there.
author: Ergo Proxy

quote: There's nothing special about being born. Not a thing. Most of the universe is just death, nothing more. In this universe of ours, the birth of a new life on some corner of our planet is nothing but a tiny, insignificant flash. Death is a normal thing. So why live?
author: Johann Liebert

quote: In our society, letting others find out that you're a nice person is a very risky move. It's extremely likely that someone would take advantage of that.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Because my time is limited, I don't have any time to waste hesitating. That is why I can walk straight ahead. That is why I never stop.
author: Rosette Christopher

quote: Now I feel that maybe knowing who I actually am is the key to reach perfection. Because that means knowing what I can and cannot do.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Who are you again? Sorry, I have a bad memory for ugly faces.
author: Ayasegawa Yumichika

quote: Only hope can give rise to the emotion we call despair. But it is nearly impossible for a man to try to live without hope, so I guess that leaves Man no choice but to walk around with despair as his companion.
author: Kagetoki Kariya

quote: No matter how hard you practice, "someday" and "maybe" aren't good enough. I need to know if you have ambitious goals and the will to accomplish them.
author: Kuroko No Basket

quote: Trying without the winning intent is meaningless.
author: Hiruma Youichi

quote: Of what worth is a king who fails to protect the powerless?
author: Saber

quote: Under normal circumstances, humans should have continued to evolve as the greatest creatures upon this earth, but we were actually regressing. A rotten world. Politics, law, education... Was there anybody around who could correct this world? But someone had to do it.
author: Light Yagami

quote: Do you understand how to handle cards now? I win as long as I can make you think "there's no way he will play that card".
author: Hiruma Youichi

quote: Sinful? Corrupt? I don't understand your logic. Why must pleasure and sin be connected? Pleasure gotten through evil means could be a sin. But pleasure can also result from good deeds. What kind of philosophy calls pleasure itself a sin?
author: Gilgamesh

quote: It's not the final judgement of "good" and "evil" that's important. What matters is that you come to that decision yourself. That you agonize over it and eventually accept it.
author: Akane Tsunemori

quote: Life that has been lost cannot be brought back again. That very truth is what shows us the meaning and value
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Did you know every time you sigh, a little bit of happiness escapes?
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: The ones who do what they want and enjoy the most of their lives are the ones who win in the end.
author: Charlie Staz

quote: If you dislike the situation, use your strength to change it.
author: Hoshimura Junichirou

quote: The power of imagination is what changes everything.
author: Shinsekai Yori

quote: Fright is about the feeling that you will die. The true meaning of terror doesn't lie in a static condition, but in a change.
author: Caster

quote: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
author: Brook

quote: Children's minds are immature. They do not possess a firm resolve and the strength to turn their misery to anger. Confronted with a cruel fate, they were not provided with the choice of having a strong will. Moreover, as they have not lived through and comprehended life, ideals such as honor and hope are yet to be completely nurtured in them. Therefore, in moments of despair, children are more prone than adults to seal away their own mind, lock up their own heart. Because they have not tasted the joy of life they can afford to discard. Because they have not understood the meaning of future, they can sink into despair.
author: Matou Kariya

quote: Even if no one in the world believes you, stick out your chest and scream in defiance.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: Discouraging, isn't it? It's always easier to tear down than to build... And much more difficult to tie than to untie.
author: Ayasegawa Yumichika

quote: Why don't you buy paper books? E-books lack character.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: The best way to remove your lies is to make them come true.
author: Suzaku Kururugi

quote: Things like protecting the world are no more than moral reasons that sound good.
author: Soi Fon

quote: If you run into a wall and pretend it doesn't exist, you'll never make progress. The wall will never change, so you're the one who has to change.
author: Hijikata Toushirou

quote: One's true worth shows as hardship increases.
author: Kotomine Risei

quote: Moving on doesn't mean you forget about things. It just means you have to accept what's happened and continue living.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: You wanted revenge? You're just making other people as miserable as you. Revenge is just the path you took to escape your suffering.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: The freedom to do better than you do now, to be better than you are now. The spirit did not create us perfectly good. She gave us the freedom to keep trying to be better everyday.
author: Maou

quote: When people have different opinions, you should apply the majority vote.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: I think the best disciplining is pain.
author: Levi Ackerman

quote: Our bodies get bigger, but our hearts get torn up.
author: Mikoto Suoh

quote: Any man who has the brains to think and the nerve to act for the benefit of the people of the country, is considered a radical, by those who are content with stagnation and willing to endure disaster.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: If you let the fly live, the spider is going to die. You can't save both without one suffering.
author: Millions Knives

quote: Is it that you get the power, then you choose to protect someone else? No! We first want to protect someone, that's why we try to get stronger in the first place.
author: Kamijou Touma

quote: Whether I win or lose is up to me.
author: Akise Aru

quote: There is no match that you know that "you can't win". Even if a match like that exists, the thing that decides the defeat is your heart. That makes you think you've "lost".
author: Yoichi Karasuma

quote: So what if the government collapses or the country is ruined? I'm not civic-minded! All I want to do is stand tall and live on until the day I collapse and die!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Failing doesn't give you a reason to give up as long as you believe.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: No matter how hard or impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: The bonds we have with those close to us, keep us connected always.
author: Aladdin

quote: What keeps me alive in this world is neither bodily organs, nor muscles - it's my soul!
author: Brook

quote: If you trip while running down a hallway, you'll get a nosebleed. If you trip in life, you'll cry.
author: Minori Kushieda

quote: Time waits for no one.
author: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time

quote: True destiny cannot be changed. The reason is actually quite simple. True destiny isn't granted - it is earned.
author: Count D

quote: If the father's responsibility is to protect the child... then my responsibility is to exceed the father.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: The flowers bloom, then wither... The stars shine and one day become extinct. This earth, the sun, the galaxies and even the big universe,
author: Virgo Shaka

quote: laugh
author: just a little time. In that short time - people are born

quote: When I was at the brink of life and death, I used all of my will to survive. I drew upon a different power than that of self-sacrifice and mastered an ultimate technique. The will to live is stronger than anything else. That was the ray of light that my master risked his life to show me. As Hitokiri Battousai, I have committed so many crimes that I cannot possibly repent for them. That is why I had secretly believed that it didn't matter when I died or was killed. However, now... even if I am formally punished or restrained. I will never lose the will to live.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: It doesn't matter if you can make 100 friends. Instead, make real friends who are as important to you as 100 is to them. It doesn't matter if you have one, as long as it's a friend that you care about.
author: Yozora Mikazuki

quote: No need to be afraid of the end, because this world is infinite!
author: Kuroyukihime

quote: If someone didn't have any pride, wouldn't they also be lacking in self-confidence? If someone was free of greed, wouldn't they have trouble supporting their family? And if people didn't envy one another, wouldn't they stop inventing new things?
author: Eru Chitanda

quote: If you have friends - you'll have a full life. And if you don't, you can still manage somehow.
author: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko

quote: Peace cannot be kept by force. It can only be achieved by understanding.
author: Setsuna F. Seiei

quote: You want to kill me? You couldn't even kill my boredom!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: I realized that back then, the reason I wanted to become human, was that I really just wanted to have friends. Now, I just want to be a monster that can help Luffy.
author: Tony Tony Chopper

quote: There are times when working hard may not be enough. But those who succeed worked hard.
author: Coach Kamogawa

quote: If you don't like to be treated like a kid, then why don't you try showing how much you have grown up.
author: Fujimoto Shirou

quote: A frog in a well does not hope to swim in the ocean, or go to dive in deep sea. What they're looking at since they are born, isn't the ocean, but the sky.
author: Itsuki Minami

quote: People can live without friends. Friends are not oxygen or water, they're more like luxury goods.
author: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko

quote: Hey! I'm totally an adult! I bitch and whine, lie through my teeth, and do things that are unfair.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Pain isn't something you have to feel, it's something you have to express.
author: Mikiya Kokutō

quote: Doesn't matter if you're weak. If you struggle hard enough, you can make a miracle happen.
author: Uryuu Minene

quote: People's mind are like alien existence. We don't know where they are, and we can barely scratch the surface of what they really are.
author: Denpa Onna to Seishun Otoko

quote: You sure can talk the talk, but you're not quite ready to walk the walk. Time's up, it's my turn.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Sometimes, no matter what kind of effort you put in, it just doesn't really pay off.
author: Coach Kamogawa

quote: Living is anxiety and pain. It's continuing to think, continuing to choose.
author: Alcor

quote: If something has a strong core, it won't break. That's true for both - swords and people.
author: Hamrio Musica

quote: Is fighting right, or wrong? Does winning in the end mean justice? Truthfully, I don't know. But I know we must fight this battle! Or we will never save the world.
author: Haru Glory

quote: The first person to love the other, is considered as a loser.
author: Hikari Hanazono

quote: Nothing is unforgivable. So if you cannot forgive him, it means you do not want to.
author: Shirley Fenette

quote: While we are talking of peace, people are dying.
author: Setsuna F. Seiei

quote: You people, are you satisfied with this kind of world? I'm not.
author: Lockon Stratos

quote: If you wanna climb a mountain, you obviously aim for the top, but you gotta enjoy the scenery too.
author: Teppei Kiyoshi

quote: It is not the strong or the smart that survive, but the ones who can bring about change.
author: Ludenberg Celestia

quote: Transfer students, no mater what world or time they're in - exist to be stared at.
author: Ohtorizawa Akatsuki

quote: The more exciting it was to meet, the sadder it feels to say goodbye, right?
author: Haruto Kirishima

quote: Our world is like a terminal cancer. Saying you'll change things through individual will is rambling of a peace-loving fool.
author: Yamato Hotsuin

quote: There are some things that can only be conveyed through words.
author: Winry Rockbell

quote: The life of each human is worth one life, that's it. Nothing more, nothing less.
author: King Bradley

quote: If I was the protagonist in this story, I'm sure someone would come save me. It would be like a miracle. But I have no one to save me. There is no god who would grant me a miracle. I'm a murderer, after all. But I've done nothing bad. All I did was feed myself. If I hadn't, I would have starved to death. Would it have been better that way? Am I evil because I didn't let myself starve to death? Give me an answer, Muroi-san! I didn't willingly become such a creature. But if I have a life, shouldn't I treasure it? Is that a sin? Muroi-san! This is what it means to be abandoned by God.
author: Sunako Kirishiki

quote: The moment of one's confession, is the moment of another's dumping.
author: Kenji Harima

quote: Dreams are illusions. All they do is interfere with reality.
author: Ein

quote: I want you to understand something. If you should lose, not only does your future end, but also the future of the one you are trying to protect. Defeat isn't an option for the sword that protects others. You should keep that thought engraved in your heart.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: It is foolish to listen to one who will not listen to you. Do as you wish.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: Why do people lie? It isn't only because they struggle against each other, it's also because there is something that they're seeking.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: It's not a matter of a creature's individual worth. It's a matter of a creature's personal feelings.
author: Tatsumi

quote: *to Alucard* Demons do not cry... You became a demon, because you couldn't cry anymore, right? Humans cry, and when their tears finally run dry, there is nothing left, but a demon, nor a monster, and one finally prayer for death...
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: If a man will not work, he shall not eat.
author: Olivier Mira Armstrong

quote: Everything eventually faces destruction. Everything eventually disappears.
author: Tatsumi

quote: When you're ten, they call you a prodigy. When you're fifteen, they call you a genius. Once you hit twenty, you're just an ordinary person.
author: Haruka Nanase

quote: We're all lost... That's why we're sad.
author: Van Hohenheim

quote: I can't stray from my path for those I've left behind.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: Friends are nothing more than the people who you spend the fun, yet meaningless times with. When those times get rough, they aren't there to support you.
author: Ryuuguu Rena

quote: It's because Sakura loves Sasuke that she doesn't want him to sink any lower. It's because she loves him that she wants to rescue him from the evil path he currently walks. Even if the only way to do it is to kill him with her own two hands, I believe, she's prepared to do it because she loves him.
author: Sai

quote: Even though one is dumped, no matter how one shows his misfortune and seeks kindness, the world doesn't give a damn about it.
author: Kenji Harima

quote: Rather than not doing anything and regretting it, we should do something and regret it.
author: Yakumo Tsukamoto

quote: You might be able to do it if you try. But if you don't try, you definitely can't.
author: Inori Yuzuriha

quote: Cherry blossoms in Spring. Stars cover the sky on Summer. Full moon shines on Autumn and in Winter, the snow covers the ground. All these things make sake taste good. If it tastes bad, it's because there is something wrong in you.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: You can't keep something without fighting for it.
author: Hajime Kanzaki

quote: We shouldn't blame ourselves for bad things that happened to us. Sometimes, no matter what we do, we are victims of the circumstances. We should just have to pull ourselves out.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: When a person loses their sense of belonging, they want someone else to hand it back to them on a platter.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Murder is the only art a swordsman may practice. No ornamental words can change that. You want to protect people with murder? You'll slaughter legions so that a few may live. Many years, long before you were born, my sword was tearing asunder the lives of men. Yes, all of those men were evil, but they were human beings first and foremost, Kenshin. The world you ardently desire to enter will not know what to do with you. It will deceive you into believing that you are saving lives even as you destroy them. You will accept these lies all the while, your hands will be stained with the worst of offenses.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: The dead don't desire revenge, but the happiness of the living.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: There are things that cannot be taken back. But the world will keep on spinning whether you laugh or you cry. High school life will eventually end too.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Here, my armies once rode across the land. The place all the heroes who stood with me, through joy and sorrow, will never forget. I can make this world real because it still exists within our hearts! Behold my endless armies! Their bodies destroyed, and their souls offered to the world as Heroic Spirits. And still, these legendary heroes pledge their loyalty to me! My bond with them is my greatest treasure, my path of kingship! The ultimate Noble Phantasm that I, Iskandar, possess. Ionian Hetairoi!
author: Rider

quote: It is a simple story. There is nothing that brings me happiness. It does not matter, let it be believing in people or having people believe in me. What other people called happiness did not bring me any joy.
author: Kotomine Kirei

quote: It is fine to assume that the Master's role is to support the battle from the back. But there are always exceptions. There are Masters who can only fight head on.
author: Souichirou Kuzuki

quote: Hughes, just a bit of advice. The soldiers who never shut up about their girls back home... They don't make it.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: I'm going to evaporate every molecule this scumbag is made out of!
author: Kaze no Stigma

quote: This era is not so simple that you can put everything on your shoulders and be the only sacrifice. And, at the same time, one person's happiness isn't that simple, either. If you should fall as a sacrifice, one girl who came to Kyoto with the one wish to see you will definitely face misfortune. Remember that. No matter how strong you get, you are just a human being. There is no need for you to either become Buddha, or a murderer.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: Everyone has a past they wish to erase.
author: Kaoru Kamiya

quote: Accepting one's own strength, and the strength of others, is an important quality of a swordsman.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: Without strength, you won't be able to save anyone.
author: Kizaru

quote: No one knows when they will die. Neither you nor I may be able to live that long. But no life is so little as to give up, to think "I don't care when I die."
author: Seishin Muroi

quote: I suppose having your name recorded in the history books is a form of immortality. But if that just means your name gets passed down for two thousand years and nothing else, I'd have preferred to have even a hundredth of that added to my actual life.
author: Rider

quote: How does one figure out if they're in love with a member of the opposite sex?
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: When one person kills, resentment is born. That resentment makes a person kill again. To sever that vicious cycle--that is the purpose of this sword that cannot kill.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: Having someone to lean on is an amazing thing. Some things that can't be done alone can be achieved with the courage of two. And in times when you try your hardest and still can't make it work. When it's so tough you're ready to cry... if you have someone there to support you, you can make it through. The smallest words of support can save you.
author: Gokou Ruri

quote: There's no point in incapable people pushing themselves. You're better off calling for an expert in the field.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: When you lose sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart.
author: Allen Walker

quote: No matter how strong one may be, no one can stop the flow of time.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: No matter how hard you blow, you can never extinguish our fire. As long as a single flare remains, the others can be relit.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: In this world, there are things you have to protect even if your hands get stained with blood.
author: Okita Sougo

quote: Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.
author: Iroh

quote: "The important thing is to take part." Famous words spoken by Pierre de Frédy, Baron de Coubertin during a speech. However, this quote tends to be frequently misused and serves as kind of a threat to force participation. There are tons of wild-goose chases in this world, y'know. If the most important thing is to take part, then surely one could find meaning in not taking part as well. And if everything's worth experiencing, then there's little doubt that the feeling of not experiencing something is, in itself, worth experiencing. In fact, you could even call it a valuable experience to not experience something everyone else does.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: If someone starts doing the right thing, the others will follow.
author: Ronaldo Kuriki

quote: Everything we see, everyone we meet, is caught up in a great unseen flow. But it's bigger than that. It's the entire world, the entire universe even. And compared to something as big as that, Al, you and I are tiny, not even the size of ants. Only one small part within a much greater flow. Nothing more than a fraction of the whole. But by putting all those "ones" together, you get one great "All", just like Teacher said. The flow of this universe follows laws of such magnitude that you and I can't even imagine them.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Never forget who you are, for surely the world won't.
author: Zuko

quote: It is important to draw wisdom from different places. If you take it from only one place, it becomes rigid and stale.
author: Iroh

quote: The true mind can weather all lies and illusions without being lost. The true heart can touch the poison of hatred without being harmed. From beginningless time, darkness thrives in the void, but always yields to purifying light.
author: Lion Turtle

quote: Being prepared to die doesn't mean shit. The real hard part, is being prepared to live.
author: Midou Ban

quote: In the darkness, hope is something you give yourself.
author: Zuko

quote: Humans can possibly exist without actually having to fight. But, many of us have chosen to fight. For what reason? To protect something? Protect what? Ourselves? The future? If we kill people to protect ourselves and this future, then what sort of future is it, and what will we have become? There is no future for those who have died. And what of those who did the killing? Is happiness to be found in a future that is grasped with blood stained hands? Is that the truth?
author: Lacus Clyne

quote: If you only face forward, there is something you will miss seeing.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: But we're alive, aren't we? We don't have any magic power, but we're alive! We have the strength to overcome the weakness and the fear! That's what it means to be alive!
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Water is mysterious, isn't it?. It can become vapor. It can become snow. It may take various forms, but in reality - it's all water. Even if it's invisible to our eyes, it cannot disappear from this world.
author: Saki

quote: We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails.
author: One Piece

quote: The curtain that falls down at the end, shall be pulled down by the blade of my sword.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: For a winner, there is nothing to say to a loser.
author: Daiki Aomine

quote: To me, friends are people who feel each other's passion up close.
author: Haruka Nanami

quote: Life is something that can never be lived twice. Even this pointless act will eventually end. And while thinking that one day, I'll surely regret its end...
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: I've been thinking about this for a long time. We put all our trust in alchemy but in the end... what is it? "Alchemy is the science of understanding the flow of matter and its laws. The process of comprehension, deconstruction, and reconstruction. The world flows too. It must also follow laws. Everything circulates. Even death is a part of that circulation. You must accept the flow." Hmm, Teacher sure drummed that into our heads, didn't she? I thought I understood it. But I don't understand anything... Mom proves that. Now here I am again, trying desperately to figure out a way to do the impossible. I'm such a hopeless idiot. All this time and I haven't grown up one bit. I thought maybe the rain would wash away some of this gloom that's been following me... but right now, every drop that hits my face is even more depressing.
author: Edward Elric

quote: I don't think ignorance is necessarily a bad thing. The more you know, the more problems you have.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Whenever humans encounter the unknown, they tend to lose perspective.
author: Knov

quote: Choose the best thing you can do now, in order to get a step closer to your dream.
author: Tsukitachi

quote: Rules exist to make the game more interesting. You, who don't know basic things like that, have no right to create the systems people play by.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: To be able to forgive those who have wronged you... only the truly strong can do that.
author: Kanako Watanabe

quote: Everyone has a sword within their hearts
author: Gankutsuou

quote: A wandering soul in isolation, has no need for a place to belong.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: One face is given to us by God. The other - we make ourselves.
author: Skull Man

quote: I want Dr. Verde's intellect. In all honesty I wish he were just a brain and nothing more.
author: Rokudou Mukuro

quote: If you follow the rules, there's no way you can outdo them.
author: Motoharu Tsuchimikado

quote: If it means mankind will live on, I don't mind being called a murderer
author: Dot Pixis

quote: Heaven is a six-tatami, one room, second floor apartment on Earth. Being a NEET is the best.
author: Urushihara Hanzou

quote: If you feel the ends justify the means, how does that make you different from us demons, exactly?
author: Maou Sadao

quote: [about Verde] His head is a bit off and he's a pervert scientist.
author: Rokudou Mukuro

quote: The real me is super cool!
author: Reborn

quote: I can stand not eating or sleeping, but I absolutely would not be able to live without my computer.
author: Kisaragi Shintaro

quote: The real evil is the power to kill people. Someone who finds himself with that power is cursed. No matter how you use it, anything obtained by killing people can never bring true happiness.
author: Soichiro Yagami

quote: Are flaws really bad? Because they are not perfect, they become worried. They don't stand still and instead move forward. After they become perfect, they will stand still. Incompleteness is the ideal.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: You can certainly fulfill your wish to "save someone". But a wish for you to save yourself, does not exist. You will embrace a borrowed ideal that is not yours, and you will probably pursue it until you die.
author: Archer

quote: The world doesn't get to decide whether my life is boring, fun, or ordinary, because that's my decision to make. As long as I have the will, nothing is impossible!
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: One person needed courage to face the past.
author: Yuzuru Otonashi

quote: I don't want other people to mention my "self". Besides, if I can be changed with a few words, then that wouldn't be my "self", would it?
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Nobody can take anybody's place. There isn't a person in this world that could take your place. It doesn't matter if you were based on me or have the same face.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Helping someone out is not a justifiable reason for you to get hurt.
author: Shizuka Hiratsuka

quote: Everything in existence has a flaw. Not to mention humans, but air, will, and even time. It's natural to have an end if it has a beginning.
author: Ryougi Shiki

quote: People share only one common fate... death.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: If everyone were perfect, there would be no need to look out for others. Sympathy or love is needed because people are imperfect. A perfect human cannot love anyone.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: I envy you people. What I sought, but could not obtain. What I obtained, but could not obtain. Many things slipped out between my fingers, no matter what commandment I used.
author: Kotomine Kirei

quote: [To Waver] The path of devotion is a great labor. Do not ever mar it.
author: Gilgamesh

quote: Blue sky is in the distance. It feels so close. Yet, I cannot grab it even if I reach out with my hands. I looked up at the stars before. The stars that I cannot reach and the wishes that will not be granted. There is nothing we have been able to leave behind for each other. Therefore, traces and memories will disappear someday. But still... Even if it will not reach her, there should be something that will remain in our hearts. There is nothing that remains in our hands, but we lived the same time and looked up at the same things. If I can remember that. I can believe that we can be together even if we are far apart.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: Betrayal demands revenge. Sin must have punishment.
author: Horo

quote: When you build something, you must be ready to spend time and money on failure. The best materials won't always yield the best results. However, if you build something by improving on failure, you'll end up with good results.
author: Mutta Namba

quote: It's always a lot easier to let something fall apart, than it is to try to hold it together.
author: Ayasegawa Yumichika

quote: Loyalty to someone is different from depending on them.
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: They say those who die, go to heaven. I don't think so. I think when we die, we go to live on in someone else's heart. We live on in their memories. Just like how our parents stay in our hearts. But with time, memories fade. That's why people wish to leave something behind. They don't want to be forgotten. Nobody wants to be forgotten.
author: Kaito Kirishima

quote: Legends from the distant past are always exaggerated, but eventually, someone outdoes them... that's when new legends are born!
author: Shikaku Nara

quote: What's your wish? Peace? Money? Or the world? Whatever you wish for, it's something you have to get with your own strength!
author: Gamabunta

quote: The things that are most important aren't written in books. You have to learn them by experiencing them yourself.
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: People fear death because they don't "understand" it, and we're afraid of strangers because we don't "know" them. Not being able to understand the one you love... is the worst fear of all.
author: Mitsuzaki Yosuga

quote: Indeed. I wanted to see Oceanus with my own eyes. Unfortunately, my dream never came true. Oceanus is still my final destination. A dream that never ends. Go ahead and laugh. Two thousand years later, and I still have the same dream. Every bit the fool as well. And so boy... a pact with a fellow idiot seems ideal.
author: Rider

quote: That is why I will keep running for now. If I aim for the distance, there should come a day when I would be able to reach out to what I have been aiming for.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: It should be natural for you to drink until dawn with someone you get along with, even if he may be your enemy.
author: Lancer

quote: [To Gilgamesh] That's right. I don't create swords. I create a world that contains infinite swords. This is the only magic allowed for me. There's no need to be surprised. These are all imitations. As you say, these are all trifling swords. But there is no rule that says an imitation cannot defeat the original. If you say you are the original, I will surpass every one of your weapons and destroy your existence. Here I come, King of Heroes! Do you have enough swords in stock?
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: Impossible, right? Compared to the enemy we're facing, you and I are the same, no more than dots! What's the point in comparing our heights? That is what makes this exciting! The smallest, the weakest - it doesn't matter! I should still wish to go and take over the world, with nothing more than my tiny dot of a body! Within my chest, beats the heart of the King of Conquerors!
author: Rider

quote: Emiya Shirou! Listen, you are not "one who fights". You are nothing more than "one who creates". Don't think of irrelevant things. There is only one thing you can do, master that one thing. Do not forget. The thing you image is always "your strongest self." You don't need any other enemies. The opponent you have to fight is none other than "your own image".
author: Archer

quote: Making his presence felt on his favorite piece of work - this is an oppurtunity no otaku would miss.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: I won't give up, I will fight til the bitter end, cause there's no way I will back down after what you did to my friends. They are what made me the person I am today, that's why I'll keep fighting... For my friends!
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Bearing the sins of the children of earth, the moon begins to consume its light.
author: Bertha

quote: If strength is justice, then is powerlessness a crime?
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Don't judge me unless you have looked through my eyes, experienced what I went through and cried as many tears as me. Until then back-off, cause you have no idea.
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: When pressured, people tend to choose the decision that is best fitted to the situation, but they usually realize later on, that it was a mistake.
author: Tezuka Kunimitsu

quote: It's a mistake to choose your path based upon the sins that you carry. We don't choose our path based on the sins that we carry, but we must bear our sins on the path we choose.
author: Aozaki Touko

quote: What do you think a truly unusual life would be like? Something really unique. It'd be the kind of life where every single day, nothing new ever happened. Nothing changed. That kind of a life is truly unusual.
author: Anri Sonohara

quote: Love is like a firework from the past... it's more beautiful for it to go to pieces and scatter far off.
author: Shima Katsuki

quote: The Sun does not ever give, almost all choose to take from it selfishly.
author: Dune

quote: The heart becomes scratched and dented and repaired over time, and with one glance, you'd be able to tell your own from others.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: The world is not so simple. You can't save people with kindness only.
author: Anji Yūkyūzan

quote: Of course, every soldier is prepared to die. But these people aren't just pawns on a chessboard. They all have names, families and feelings in their hearts too. They are all humans who live and bleed. You have the responsibility to ensure their death will not be in vain. No matter what may come, remember this in your naive heart, and be ready to die to fulfill that duty.
author: Rico Brzenska

quote: Someday, I just want to marry a regular girl who isn't too ugly and not too pretty. Have two children, first a girl, then a boy. Retire after my daughter is married and my son becomes a successful ninja, and spend the rest of my life playing shōgi or Go. Then die of old age before my wife.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: No matter the journey, when you come to a fork in the road, you must decide in an instant which path to take.
author: Horo

quote: He, who knows how to do something, is the servant of he, who knows why that thing must be done.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: They say that if you change yourself, you'll change the world. but that's a complete lie. They're just forcing you to compromise, by feeding you a convenient little fib.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: The stronger the light, the darker the shadow.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: If you're looking at a single withered tree, it can seem like a big wound to the forest. But from the forest's perspective, that tree's remains will nourish other plants, acting for the good of the whole forest. If you change your perspective, a situation right in front of you, can reverse itself.
author: Horo

quote: We do not live in a fairy-tale world. We cannot simply take revenge on those who have betrayed us and say "the end". We have to live on after this. And taking revenge for betrayal only invites more revenge.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: What do you think killed the most people in history? It wasn't explosives or drugs. It was information. To know is to die.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: Even if a question has a proper answer, sometimes one cannot simply give it away.
author: Horo

quote: A wounded heart needs time to heal.
author: Hibiki Kuze

quote: A traveler does not leave regret behind in a village, but good memories.
author: Kraft Lawrence

quote: Relying on someone, helping each other out, and supporting each other. Most would say that's the right thing to do. However, that's just idealistic. In reality, someone always gets the short end of the stick.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Even if you're not interested, just read my recommendation. Putting aside disliking the food before trying it, I won't forgive you if you dismiss manga without giving it a chance.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: Well, life is like the weather. It can be sunny or cloudy. Sometimes it rains, and sometimes it storms.
author: Deneil Young

quote: Self-sacrifice... A nameless shinobi who protects peace within its shadow. That is a true shinobi.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Excuses are meaningless. The tougher things get, the more likely people are to come to their own conclusions.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: Hell is in human heart.
author: Ai Enma

quote: Forcing their interest on someone else, that's a legitimate previlege of an otaku.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: Fear is necessary for evolution. The fear that could be destroyed at any moment.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: When in doubt, don't worry about what's right. You'll run out of time. Don't use your head, you'll find the answer lower. Your heart knows what's right. Choose the answer that will be fun.
author: Sharon Kaneko

quote: I don't want to regret anything. I want to make all the tragedies that happened into meaningful things by believing that my path is right.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: Your own feelings are the most important, when it comes to enjoying the interesting things in life. If you just follow what someone else says to do, or just do what you're told, you won't even be able to enjoy the things you like.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: People who think that they can make up their past follies with regret, cannot be forgiven.
author: Kurama

quote: This world is full of things that defy all common sense.
author: Kousaka Kyousuke

quote: Stress makes you bald, but it's stressful to avoid stress, so you end up stressed out anyway. In the end, there's nothing you can do.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Doing something you want, isn't doing something you are good at, nor is it doing something you are able to. If it's to fulfill your wish, even if you're weak in it, you'll do it.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: Tomorrow's promise will never come. I wonder how many of tomorrow's promises have disappeared as though they have never existed.
author: Yoshino Takigawa

quote: All meetings must end with partings.
author: Dera Mochimazzi

quote: Everything in the world is actually connected. That means, even if we get separated, we'll never be alone.
author: Aladdin

quote: To become an observer, you shouldn't have someone you like or dislike, because special feelings or bias info would make it difficult for one to judge a situation.
author: Kanoko Naedoko

quote: Honest feelings can sometimes lead to cruel endings.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Paying the price for something valuable, that's the pride of an otaku.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: There will come a time in a man's life, when he must accomplish something at the risk of his life.
author: Suguru Daimon

quote: We do have a lot in common. The same earth, the same air, the same sky. Maybe if we started looking at what's the same, instead of always looking at what is different... well, who knows?
author: Nyarth

quote: There are bad ways to win and good ways to lose. What's interesting and troubling, is that it's not always clear which is which. A flipped coin doesn't always land heads or tails. Sometimes it may never land at all.
author: Grimsley

quote: There's always someone better. That's why I can't stop fighting.
author: Hidetora Toujo

quote: Just because of your angry, childish actions, do you know how many will suffer from it? Don't you go thinking that lives are not connected, you idiotic brat!
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: It's not because the game was so interesting, that everyone's trying to ask sensei about it. But it's because sensei's interesting, so the students are talking about the game with him.
author: Minako Kanou

quote: An earnest failure has meaning.
author: Mutta Namba

quote: I'm going to kill you, have a beautiful laugh, then dance until I go mad.
author: Ladd Russo

quote: It doesen't matter how far away a leader is from it's group, a leader is always a leader.
author: Takeshi

quote: People who've lost their dreams, don't need a place to go.
author: White Rabbit

quote: We have no reason to fear death, for we have become ghosts while still alive.
author: Goose Perkins

quote: I don't really like people who go around brandishing the banner of justice. No matter the reason, where human's are involved, there is no black or white, no justice or evil. There is only our will.
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: Love is... care and devotion you feel for the precious ones around you.
author: Yashamaru

quote: It doesn't matter what you do, if you live and die as you like. However, no matter what road you end up taking, remember to protect the people that are precious to you.
author: Hiruzen Sarutobi

quote: In life, nothing good comes out of hurrying.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: I don't know which is more pathetic
author: Jirobou

quote: What's the point of something that disappears as soon as it's born?
author: Sasori

quote: A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot, even if it is a fake one. Surprisingly enough, everyone takes it at face value.
author: Sai

quote: War brings death. And wounds and pain to both sides. There's nothing harder to accept, than the deaths of those you love. So you believe they could never die. Especially those who haven't known war.
author: Nagato

quote: Emotion leads one to hate... and hate leads one to conflict and war.
author: Shimura Danzo

quote: Isn't chasing our dream our job right now?
author: Minako Kanou

quote: Heroes might be lonely, but they aren't fighting alone.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: Because of our broken instincts, we are in pain. We continue living in pain, because our instincts have been twisted by reason. So, what are we supposed to do? Should we abandon knowledge? Throw away reason? In any event, that wouldn't be possible. For better or for worse, we ate the fruit of knowledge long, long ago.
author: Satou Tatsuhiro

quote: The bully always says it's a joke. But to the one being bullied, it's dead serious!
author: Fujisaki Yusuke

quote: If something gets in the way of your job, get rid of it. That includes your feelings, your beliefs, and visions of that guy. [referring to Soichiro Kurebayashi]
author: Master Masuda

quote: Even if we don't understand each other, that's not a reason to reject each other. There are two sides to any argument. Is there one point of view that has all the anwers? Give it some thought.
author: Alder

quote: [To Lan Fan] Brat, quit blabbering on about trifling topics such as love and sadness. Don't underestimate us. She's the woman I chose. A will is unnecessary between us. That's usually how it is between a King and his companion.
author: King Bradley

quote: [To Father] You've certainly mellowed out... you used to be fun, full of life and emotion. Lust, Greed, Sloth, Gluttony, Envy, Wrath, and Pride. Of course, excessive want will destroy anyone, but those same desires are necessary to understand what it means to be human. Why did you rid yourself of them?
author: Van Hohenheim

quote: Ah... what a beautiful sound. It doesn't get any better than that. I can feel it deep in my bones, like a part of me I never noticed before. That sound is an extension of my being. And this land - this land that's governed by death - I will paint it red with this shard of destruction.
author: Solf J. Kimblee

quote: This body comes with many inconveniences. But inconveniences don't make me miserable! There is no reason for you to pity me! My life was put back together with alchemy by my brother. If I deny myself, that would mean I'm denying my brother, along with alchemy. I believe in the potential that alchemy holds. I want to believe in it!
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: A person grows up when he's able to overcome hardships. Protection is important, but there are some things that a person must learn on his own.
author: Jiraiya

quote: Is it wrong to do stuff by yourself? If someone worked hard on their own until now, why do they have to face rejection here?
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: I am who I am and there is nothing wrong with that. The days continue like they always have, bringing neither excessive desire nor despair, nothing's changed. Yet I'm overwhelmed by this sense of fulfillment. I'm over here, you're over there. If I'm your savior, then you're mine.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: No human beings, regardless of who they might be, want to look directly at their own shortcomings.
author: Satou Tatsuhiro

quote: People who can't throw something important away, can never hope to change anything.
author: Armin Arlelt

quote: Live by your own rules. And have reality accept your own rules. If you are able to do that, the future is all yours.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: I bet it's not easy to persevere in one's goal. I never tried, so I wouldn't know. But to achieve a goal, one must work hard even when no one is looking. Having a dream might not be all that great.
author: Fujisaki Yusuke

quote: Imagine what'd happen if I let someone like you loose on a bunch of politicians and scientists. You'd have them brainwashed in three days flat. First, you'd whisper your promises into their ears, getting them interested, and before they knew it, they'd be eating out of your goddamn hand. One of those scientists would say, "Hey, this Huey fella, I think he's a really swell guy. We should talk to him and see what sort of information he might share with us". And you can bet your ass by that point his brain would already be dribbling out his ears. Then oh, look, a strap on your straight jacket came loose, and oh, the next day they walk in and find out everyone in the lab is dead, and oh, Huey fucking Laforet is nowhere to be fucking seen! Oh no, oh what ever shall we fucking do Mr. Talbot, please do something even though you told us this exact thing was going to happen and we ignored you like the fucking idiots we are... and then they'll try and get me to find you, but you know what? I'll say no! Lemme say that again! No! Once more for good measure! Read my lips! Enn! Oh! No!
author: Victor Talbot

quote: Everybody's weak. That's why we rely on others. We live by helping one another. We can say, we need one another. I've been able to survive because I have you and the others.
author: Hibiki Kuze

quote: The human mind is uncertain things. Within mind, even contradictory thoughts may coexist.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: When you someday find a way of life that you can truly be proud of, you'll be forced into your own battle whether you like it or not.
author: Rider

quote: Memories... of the people we were. They're subtle, but they're real. It took me a lot of time to understand what I saw. Books say we shouldn't have memories. Or at least that they're only the memories and emotions of the alchemists who made us. But they are wrong. Those memories are mine.
author: Lust

quote: But you're thinking on too large a scale there, kid... If we don't want to drive ourselves crazy, we can only deal with what's directly in front of us.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Educating a heterosexual person about anime, is a joy for an otaku.
author: Kagami Junichirou

quote: If you ever reach the point where you need to pray, you're already a failure of a man.
author: Hyoudou Kazutaka

quote: In manga, there's always a character who gets a sudden boost of power, right? Usually, it's when they're driven into a corner. Readers actually call it a "convenient power up", but it actually does happen in the real world as well. We humans only truly show our mettle when we're pushed into a corner.
author: Shinobu Takamiya

quote: Being alone is best. I mean, it's true, isn't it? In the end you'll be absolutely alone
author: Satou Tatsuhiro

quote: A database can't draw conclusions.
author: Satoshi Fukube

quote: Crying is the same thing as pouring all your frustations and regrets out of your body. You may use it as a weapon, but that's just too easy. Whenever you feel like crying, just smile instead. That's what it means to be a man. You get it?
author: Tatsumi Oga

quote: Humans are so voracious, though. They eat everything from plants to animals... almost as if they think they are the top living creature to roam the earth. No being is more full of themselves as the humans.
author: Hildegard

quote: The inferiority you feel is actually the quality of a king. You may grumble a lot, but you know how small you are. And yet you still struggle to reach heights greater than you can imagine.
author: Rider

quote: Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world out there, that lives outside of ourselves and our dreams.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Maybe you are right. Where did I come from and where will I go? When I die? Maybe all this time that is what I wanted: the freedom to find out.
author: Lust

quote: You think surrendering, and offering yourself will stop the war? How arrogant. The life of each human is worth one, that's it. Nothing more, nothing less.
author: King Bradley

quote: When you notice an insect on the ground, do you stop to consider it a fool? The life of an insect is so beneath you that it would be a waste of your time to even consider judging it. That would be an accurate summation of my feelings towards you, humans.
author: Father

quote: If the ways of this world are based on equivalent exchange, as alchemy says, then in order to allow for a new generation to enjoy good fortune, the price that we must pay, is to carry the bodies of the dead across a river of blood.
author: Riza Hawkeye

quote: Love is based on unpredictable events.
author: Kotarō Katsura

quote: Using a simple method to accomplish something impressive, far outshines using a complex method to achieve the same thing.
author: Rider

quote: A name has nothing to do with loving someone.
author: Seiji Yagiri

quote: Fear beyond rational limits, forces people to cling to normality.
author: Gantz

quote: On the day we left, we burned down the family home and all the familiar things inside. Because some memories aren't meant to leave traces.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: [To Envy] Now I see. You're Jealous. You're jealous of humans, aren't you? According to you, humans are supposed to be a lot weaker than Homunculi. And yet, even if they get discouraged after being beaten, and even if they get close to falling down after losing their paths, they continue to get up and fight. Everyone around them helps them get back up. And you're envious of that.
author: Edward Elric

quote: The death of a culture, is the death of a people.
author: Miles

quote: The time known as "LIFE", cannot be rewound.
author: Ultear Milkovich

quote: In a conflict between creatures that are fundamentally the same, defeat is equavalent to annihilation.
author: Chamber

quote: I wouldn´t mind being eaten, as long as it was by a scorchingly hot lady titan.
author: Dot Pixis

quote: I want to see the splendor of people's souls.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: Cast aside the illusion that there is a beginning and end to the story. The story has no beginning. And it has no end. All there is, is a performance of people connecting, living, influencing each other, and departing.
author: Gustav St. Germain

quote: You don't have any power or technique like Jack Johnson or Jack Dempsey either! You know any boxer names? You know I'm right? If you're an American, of course you know! If you say you don't know, or something, I won't forgive you! I will never forgive you! And even if you know them, I still won't forgive you, though!
author: Ladd Russo

quote: Canaan is still alive. Her existence is shining so brightly. Too bright for the naked eyes to look at directly... I'm a bit scared, but I want to touch it. I want to touch her radiance.
author: Maria Oosawa

quote: Canaan. You're a victim whose past was taken away by war. And she's a defeated person who lost her past in a power struggle. Soldiers who are born within destruction, take hatred as their weapon. Even though you and her became soldiers for the same reason, you both live differently. Listen Canaan, you cannot counter hatred with hatred... ever.
author: Siam

quote: Trusting someone not to hurt you... how idiotic is that?
author: Crona

quote: If I could sell boredom, I would make a fortune out of it.
author: Izayoi Sakamaki

quote: Breaking a bond is every bit as painful as being physically torn apart. Can you endure that?
author: Amamiya Yuuko

quote: Let me tell you an incomprehensible story! What is it for the actions of men to be incomprehensible? It would seem to me that if it can't be comprehended, one should not even bother trying. It is useless to even think about it, I think. That said, I don't know exactly what's going on but may we continue fighting please?
author: Graham Specter

quote: Hatred will never be erased! The only thing you can do... is erase the ones you hate!
author: Ren Hakuryuu

quote: Let me tell you how important it is to keep your mouth shut. Me, I've seen so many damn people going on and on about "these will be the last words you ever hear" and "take these words with you to the afterlife", and then that gives whoever they're fighting an opening to strike back. Crazy, isn't it? I see it all the time, in books, in plays, even in real life! I don't even know why, but somehow the more comfortable someone is with killing, the more they flap their mouth when it comes time to do the deed, yakking on and on and on. As you might have guessed, I myself happen to be such a person! And therefore, as such, in light of that revelation, I'll say that one is enough, and since that one is of course myself, I want you all to shut up. You're boring. Swallow those words and take them to the afterlife yourself, if you want them delivered there so damn much.
author: Ladd Russo

quote: [Talking to Riki] We've spent time together that made our hearts dance. But every story has to come to an end. No one can stay a kid forever. Time passes, and people grow up. There will come a day when we will no longer be together.
author: Kyousuke Natsume

quote: There are a few things that people can't avoid while they live. People can't avoid misfortune. There are lots of hard things in life. There might even be times when you want to die.
author: Ayumu Aikawa

quote: There's no knowing how others are feeling unless you ask them. And your feelings can't get through to others unless you tell them directly.
author: Sawako Kuronuma

quote: No... this is wrong! Didn't I fall into hell? This can't be hell! Surrendering my body to the devil, I should have become a wrinkled hag! My hair should be full of hateful snakes, my skin should be the color of a vile frog's! And my blood should be burning with the jet black flames of my grudge..! A lie. This form, it's a lie! I've been tricked! I wanted to become a terrifying woman, one that just a look from, would send anyone running. I have to be such a woman! I don't want to forget my anger and hate!
author: Jeanne

quote: You can't change reality, just your perception!
author: Father

quote: You see, I'm sure we can change, because we're weak. And because we die. We have to fight in order to live, and that is what will make us strong.
author: Trisha Elric

quote: Open your eyes. "God" is nothing more than a construct created by man to inspire fear and promote order.
author: King Bradley

quote: No matter how messed up things get, you can always figure out the best solution.
author: Eren Jaeger

quote: Appearances rarely share the whole truth.
author: Pride

quote: Don't kid yourself, Mustang. You know how humans love to watch other people suffer while making fools of themselves. I mean, why else would you constantly be at war with each other?
author: Envy

quote: Destruction and creation are two sides of the same coin! You must destroy to create! That is the law of the universe!
author: Alex Louis Armstrong

quote: Love for the dead is pointless. We fight to keep them alive, that is all.
author: Olivier Mira Armstrong

quote: It's all right to grieve over your defeat. It's important to admit when you've lost. Not being able to do so makes it impossible for you to climb back up after a fall, and even more impossible, for you to move forward. So go on ahead and grieve to your heart's extent. But after you're done grieving, be sure to set your eyes upon your next goal and move towards it.
author: Yoshii Akira

quote: A peaceful every day life hides its fragility. Fear and violence aren't just something in another world, completely unrelated to us. If a disaster happens, we can't change it. But as long as we small gears are linked together, we can keep moving forward, even if it's only one small step at a time.
author: Kyousuke Natsume

quote: What would you ask for if you could have your wishes granted? Would you ask to be rich? Or to have the woman you're in love with be yours?  You can wish for whatever you want, it's your business, but to have one's wishes come true always comes with a price. Every deal has a catch. You'd better be nice and careful.
author: Dante

quote: I believe there are many things in this world that people haven't seen yet. If you really want to see something, there's nothing you can't see. You can't see it because you're closing your eyes on purpose. Because if you use your eyes to see it, it'll be painful, and sad. That's why they're closed in the first place. I think photography is like borrowing someone else's eyes. So even if your eyes are closed... you can borrow someone else's.
author: Maria Oosawa

quote: It's not that you can fall in love with someone new because you forgot the old. It's because you fall in love with someone new, that you're able to forget about the old. Only love can heal a heart that was hurt by love.
author: Bokura ga Ita

quote: Guys are simple creatures. Just by talking to them, they get the wrong idea.
author: Hachiman Hikigaya

quote: There are some things you can gain by letting some things go. Happiness isn't just what you have here and now.
author: Kunio Yaobi

quote: Anything can happen. No one ever thinks it will until it does. What will happen, happens. That's how the world is. The most important thing is to not let the tragedy defeat you. To believe that you can get through it.
author: Kyousuke Natsume

quote: Effort is nothing but a means to an end. Being proud of the fact that you tried is just putting the carriage before the horse.
author: Yoshii Akira

quote: The weak don't get to decide anything, not even how they die.
author: Trafalgar Law
