author: Casshern

quote: In addition to knowing the secrets of the universe, I can assure you, I am quite potty trained.
author: Koenma

quote: I wonder if the flowers themselves are happy, being forced to last so long. Eternity doesn't exist in this world, does it? It's just that one could think that a heart that longs for eternity is beautiful.
author: Mamiya Chida

quote: If the world is full of things we never wanted to know, is our only option to look away? You won't solve anything by looking away.
author: Kyousuke Natsume

quote: All men are NOT created equal! Some are born smarter, or more beautiful, or with parents of greater status. Some, by contrast, are born of weak body or mind, or with few, if any, talents. All men are different! Yes, the very existence of man is discriminatory! That's why there is war, violence and unrest.
author: Charles Zi Britannia

quote: Often times, people simply deny the existence of what they do not understand, and anyone who tells them otherwise is a liar.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: It's simple. Even the strongest tree will die if left in the dark. I find that to be the best way to describe us. A giant oak, crashing through a dark soil, bringing order to an otherwise chaotic land. The Shinobi have done their job for centuries, and done it well. But in recent years, we have caught glimpses of the outside world, and asked: "Why not us? Have we not earned the privilege others take for free?".
author: Touya

quote: A sinner once passed away will never return, but sins will never vanish and the love will never die.
author: Les Soldats

quote: I'm in the mood for loooooove! *Hot nurse walks in.* I'm in the mood for seeeeeeeeex!
author: Carrot Glace

quote: Humans can't live without memories, you know. Still, they can't live on memories alone. You have to awaken from your dreams eventually. Because dreams you don't awaken from eventually become sadness.
author: Michiru

quote: Is there a different sorry for simple and complicated situations? Whether it's a simple or complicated problem, if you think you've done something wrong, then in the end you'd say sorry either way.
author: Tadashi Karino

quote: The words “fly” and “fall” are tied together. But the more you're hooked to flying, the more you forget about that fact. As a result, you end up trying to reach the skies even after you die. Not falling to the ground, but falling toward the sky.
author: Aozaki Touko

quote: Even though there is life, no one here is living it. Life is overflowing and they are merely drinking their fill. But Dio and all the people I've met on my journey aren't like that... they're.. they're more... they were blazing with fire. They were torches burning with life.
author: Casshern

quote: It wasn't the pain that hurt me. Rather, it was the feeling of me being ripped apart, and the sound of the knife plunging deep, deep into my heart. That incomparably bittersweet fear. My body shook and trembled at the thought of it. My silent weeping contained my uneasiness, my loneliness, my will to live. My tears aren't from the pain either, or from the fear of the encounter. It was for the brush of death that I had never before experienced, but had now fallen in love with, even though I pray every night for the strength to live.
author: Fujou Kirie

quote: not me... Not even the ring itself."
author: ladies and gentlemen. Not you

quote: A heart's a heavy burden.
author: Sophie Hatter

quote: They often say that humans can't live alone. But you can live pretty long by yourself. Instead of feeling alone in a group, it's better to be alone in your solitude.
author: Faye Valentine

quote: What do you think people are made of? I'm not talking about blood or flesh. We do care about what's on the exterior, but we want to focus more on what people even now still call the "inside." You can also call it "nature". I guess you are either born this way or raised to act this way. Are people born like this or do they become like this? The answer is...
author: Fumito Nanahara

quote: Vision is not what your eyes see, but an image that your brain comprehends.
author: Aozaki Touko

quote: Sorry, I've had enough of running away, Sophie. Now I've got something I want to protect. It's you.
author: Howl

quote: The scar of my past will determine my future!
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: Do you think I can shoulder everyone's lives and not feel any weight? I don't want to be indifferent. I want to be worthy of everyone's feelings.
author: Gai Tsutsugami

quote: I was younger then, I wasn't afraid of anything, I didn't think about dying for a second. I thought I was invincible. Then I met some girl. I wanted to live, I started to think like that
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: I am who I am now because of everything that's happened. If I try to deny my past, I'm denying the person I've become. I don't want to do that.
author: Iori Nagase

quote: When I say it doesn't hurt me, that means I can bear it.
author: Killua Zoldyck

quote: Whether it's good or bad, it's so unfortunate to wake up during a dream.
author: Judeau

quote: A life with no adventure in it is boring. The least a friend can do is stir up a little trouble in your heart.
author: Gai Tsutsugami

quote: Naruto... Just so you know, there will be a war to protect the Eight-Tails and Nine-Tails. In other words - you. For the sake of the ninja world and as the Kazekage, I will guard you with my life. If as a member of Akatsuki, Sasuke Uchiha stands in the way of the ninja coalition... I will show him no mercy.
author: Gaara

quote: It's my own business what I decide to do and where I decide to do it.
author: Chiaki Shinichi

quote: Don't get too close to him, his stupidity is contagious.
author: Hiruma Youichi

quote: Make one peep and I will rape you.
author: Yoshida Haru

quote: No matter where you are, people find a way to entertain themselves.
author: Shuusei Kagari

quote: You have gone and taken all those lives, and not even because you were thirsty! Is it fun... Huh! Is that what it takes for filth like you to get off..? Cheap little two bit terrors.
author: Alucard

quote: I was the only one who got an A ranking for the Public Safety Bureau. There were more than 500 students and I was the only one. So I thought that there must have been something that only I could do at the Bureau. If I went there, I thought I could find my purpose in life... I thought I'd be able to find out why I was born here and now!
author: Akane Tsunemori

quote: You don't have to worry about being special or normal compared to everyone else! It doesn't matter who it is. So as long as they think you're special, then you're special.
author: Eru Chitanda

quote: No matter what changes, I'll still be me. And I can be whoever I want to be!
author: Amu Hinamori

quote: Everything has a beginning and an end. Life is just a cycle of starts and stops. There are ends we don't desire, but they're inevitable. We have to face them. It's what being human is all about.
author: Jet Black

quote: Sadistic? I don't mind you calling me that. If you don't want to get hurt, don't attack me when I say not to.
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: His soul was as pure as snow.
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: What would you have me say? "Don't worry, I'm sure he's still alive."? Ridiculous. I am not here to comfort you. I don't understand why are you so fixated on life and death? At any rate, your friends will soon be annihilated. So what if that's one step closer? They should have seen this coming from the start. If they couldn't see it coming, the fault lies in their own foolishness. Laughing them off as a group of idiots would be sufficient. Why can't you do that? If it were me, and my friends entered Hueco Mundo without first gauging their strength, I'd be infuriated by their stupidity.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: It's always like this. The only things I can ever do for Naruto are the little things anyone could do...
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: Rush in there right now and break his hands and legs so he'll never be able to use them again. Make it so he won't be able to do anything without you anymore. Then he'll be yours. His heart, body, everything.
author: Sakura Kyouko

quote: Listen to your seniors once in a while or I will kill you.
author: Hyuuga Junpei

quote: Accepting something is easier said than done.
author: Togashi Yuuta

quote: You keep imposing your ideals on them. Don't worry about other people. You only need to do what you think is right.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: I always lied to you telling you to forgive me. I used these hands to keep you at distance... I did not want you to get involved. But now... I think you could have changed father and mother. Perhaps even the entire Uchiha. If I would have stood in front of you and looked you in the eyes from the very beginning... talked to you instead of down to you... and been open about everything. But I failed, and speaking to you now, like this, isn't going to undo the permanent damage that's already been done to you. That's why I wanted to show you the truth. Even if it's just a little. And no matter what you decide to do from here on out, you never have to forgive me - I will always love you.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: A detective who corners a culprit with their reasoning and drives them to suicide in front of himself - is no different than a murderer.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Fear isn't a bad thing. There are some things that can only be done by cowards.
author: Shun Izuki

quote: Let me tell you something about dying. It hurts like hell.
author: Heero Yuy

quote: Hmm... never noticed those before *after accidently groping Momiji's chest*.
author: Mamoru Kusanagi

quote: Beautiful flowers, too, eventually wither and fall. That's the fate of all living beings.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: Quotes were invented in Korea, you know!
author: South Korea

quote: Children aren't sweet or innocent. The weird ones are left unchecked. It's rare to find anyone you can trust!
author: Y

quote: Forget what hurt you in the past, but never forget what it taught you.
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: They say that fools learn from their experiences, while the wise learn from history. I hope you're not a fool.
author: Nobuchika Ginoza

quote: I'm still very very young. I want to go shopping, and I want to eats lots more of all kinds of yummy foods, you know? And of course... Of course... have a wonderful romance too. If I could have something like that, it would be the best. Yeah... That really would be the best.
author: Anemone

quote: Because she learned about happiness, she feels lonely for the first time. And because she knows unhappiness, she understands happiness for the first time.
author: Himura Yuu

quote: Always skillfully manipulate your pieces, that's how you survive. Use me and madam red, any piece within your reach. Even if the bodies of your pawns pile up in front of your thrown. Because if the king falls - this game is over.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: There's no lack of painful things in this world, but hunger and loneliness must surely be two of the worst. Thanks to you, I didn't know a moment of either of them.
author: Sakae Jinnouchi

quote: People must continue to fight for their fate. Unless they fight for the future they wish for, they will never know whether or not they can attain it.
author: Annelotte Kreuz

quote: Words are very powerful. That's why you have to watch everything that comes out from your mouth.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: They say when you fall, it's best to fall straight to the bottom, and the farther you have to crawl back up, the stronger and greater you'll be as a result.
author: Hiyono Yuizaki

quote: Life is like a tube of toothpaste. When you've used all the toothpaste down the last squeeze, that's when you've really lived. Live with all your might. And struggle as long as you have life.
author: Sonozaki Mion

quote: I'm sorry. I couldn't keep my promise. I wanted to go into a line of work where I could protect people. That's why I became a detective. But Makishima changed everything. That man will continue to kill people. And yet, the law can't judge him. As long as I'm a detective, I can't touch him. This case made me aware... that the law can't protect people.
author: Kougami Shinya

quote: It's a beautiful night. It almost makes me want to go out for a bite to drink.
author: Alucard

quote: The flash of light I felt when I was stabbed in the heart. The overwhelming torrent of death and the beat of life. I always thought I had nothing, but there is still that simple thing left in me. This fear that sends a chill down my spine. I have to feel the most death I can to feel the happiness of life. For everything in my life I have ignored until now. But it probably would be impossible to die like I did that night. I probably cannot hope for such a striking end. That death pierced me like lightning, like a needle, like a sword. That's why I will try to come as close to that as possible. I don't have any idea right now but I still have a few days to think about it. And I've already decided on the method. I don't think I even need to say this, but I think my end should be a long fall from a place overlooking the world.
author: Fujou Kirie

quote: Ask of me, and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance, and for thy possession, the ends of the earth. Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron. Thou shalt dash them in pieces, like a potters vessel. Be wise now, therefore ye kings. Be admonished ye judges of the earth. Serve the lord with fear, and rejoice with trembling. Kiss the son lest he be angry, and ye perish in the way, though his wrath be kindled but a little.
author: Alexander Anderson

quote: In this world, wherever there is light - there are also shadows. As long as the concept of winners exists, there must also be losers. The selfish desire of wanting to maintain peace causes wars, and hatred is born to protect love.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: Life isn't that sweet. That's why everyone wants sweet things.
author: Undertaker

quote: It's easier to crush a dream than realize one. Forming a bond is infinitely more difficult than breaking one.
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: Entire civilizations were built and destroyed between now and the last time you said "we'll go soon"! I'll have rotted and turned to ash by the time this "soon" of yours comes!!
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: It's not that I hate the person in front of me. If I had met him under different circumstances, this never would have happened. But I did meet him that day, and now there is no turning back. I must distinguish the difference between past and present. Everything must be left behind, and the man in front of me is the wall
author: Kanami Yuta

quote: Sometimes all people need is a good listener.
author: Shiki Misaki

quote: Check it out yo, how kick ass is my new fighter plane of doom!? Dude, it blowin your mind yet or what?
author: America

quote: I don't have anywhere to go back to. All we can do is keep moving forward.
author: Kiba

quote: "If I do this, I can stop the rebellion”, “if I do that, I can stop the rebellion”... Open your eyes, princess! Your zealous idealism disgusts me! Ideals can only be spoken by those powerful enough to carry them out. And that excludes you!
author: Crocodile

quote: Come with me. Overwhelming madness and power await.
author: Little Demon

quote: The moon peers down on a diseased world... There is no cure for the disease, an entire race walks mindlessly into destruction. Not even a man of colossal power, would be able to prevent the inevitable.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: The human heart is the source of all our power... We fight with the power of our hearts.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Listen up, I don't care what you punks do around the universe. But with this, my sword… anywhere it can reach, is part of my country! Asses who blunder in and violate my things… whether it be a Shogun, whether it be space pirates, whether it be a meteorite - I'll destroy them!!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: I consider your class of demon very worthy, worthy to fight, and worthy to die.
author: Youko Kurama

quote: You don't need a driver's license to hit and run!
author: Kagura

quote: I've told you, this isn't a cigarette. It's a lollipop!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: The aura of offensive smell has come to such a strong extent that you can even see it!!
author: Misaki Ayuzawa

quote: False tears bring pain to those around you. A false smile brings pain to one self.
author: C.C.

quote: The future is not a straight line. There are many different pathways. We must try to decide that future for ourselves.
author: Kikyo

quote: But men are always boys at heart until the die.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: How worthless. Why are you saying things are impossible? You just decided that to make yourself feel better! Sure, there are things you can't do, things that seem impossible, but that's what makes everyone unique!
author: Rima Mashiro

quote: Pirates are evil? The Marines are righteous? These terms have always changed throughout the course of history! Kids who have never seen peace and kids who have never seen war have different values! Those who stand at the top determine what's wrong and what's right! This very place is neutral ground! Justice will prevail, you say? But of course it will! Whoever wins this war becomes justice!
author: Donquixote Doflamingo

quote: Assassination — It's the family trade. We all take it up. My folks see me as an exceptional prospect. But I don't see that I should have to live up to their expectations.
author: Killua Zoldyck

quote: If a girl chases after you, it's likely a trap.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: But hating something you love is a painful feeling.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: True, I've given up on the real world. However, I haven't given up on myself.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Well, hurting girls isn't one of my hobbies. That's why I'll make it my hobby to stomp on their cell phones. Hahahahahaha! I'm so bored of it now... it's no longer my hobby to stomp on cell phones.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Detective, don't waste your time trying to change their minds. Fight by their meaningless rules and you'll be pulled down with them. There's only one real law of the dark tournament: the strongest man prevails. I've retrieved enough energy to rip my way out, let's show this entire stadium a new definition for victory!
author: Hiei

quote: Smiles and laughter are always good, but never forget your Poker Face!
author: Kaitou Kid

quote: Yes, Children can be quite demanding about their games.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: It's probably a lie. The reason why I only stay for three days in any country. I'm afraid I'll settle down, if I stay too long. Because if I settled down, I would cease to be a traveler.
author: Kino

quote: I do not fear death. I fear only that my rage will fade over time.
author: Kurapika

quote: You are right. I am not a detective, but a thief. And stealing is what thieves do best, even if it's a persons heart.
author: Kaitou Kid

quote: Unfortunately, in reality there is no situation where one can win merely by following the rules. There will be knights that break the rules, and even chess pieces that betray him.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Justice is not something that you can express in words.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: A man who raises his hands on a woman is trash. If I have to become trash in order to survive... It'll be just like dying.
author: Abarai Renji

quote: You can never tell a good seed from a bad seed until it blossoms.
author: Labrador

quote: Unwilling to listen or see anything else, you lost yourself in your own world and became incapable of seeing the things around you.
author: Raiko Shimizu

quote: If you turn your back on something you wanted, you don't deserve to call yourself greed!
author: Ling Yao

quote: If you're going to hide a tree, put it in the forest.
author: Frau

quote: I guess it's only natural for inferior beings to ride on the coattails of their superior counterparts. If they wish to keep their lives, they have no choice but to obediently comply. It's a never ending chain... as the ones who are burdened with that trust, in order to escape that burden, seek to find someone even greater than themselves. These greater beings then seek others even greater than themselves to shelter them. This is how Gods are born. But make no mistake. They all still abide to me. Because from this point onward, you will witness first hand, the power of the God they foolishly placed their faith in. I will become that God they have no choice but to believe in.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Mysterious things are everywhere. So bizarre as often as you can hear of them. Without witness, with sight unseen, without a care it is simply a phenomenon. Merely not of concern. In this world, mankind itself has its own fantastic wonders.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: We aren't flying away from everyone to leave them, but rather so we might see them again someday.
author: Frau

quote: It's difficult to change someone's emotions, no matter how they are, so long as they are deeply engraved in the heart. I suppose hatred would be the hardest. Many people will say that hatred fades over time, but that doesn't mean it ever really goes away. It's still there. It's just hiding where you can't see it, and given the slightest chance, it will reassert itself. Now then, given hatred's persistence, what should you do if you can't get rid of it? The only possibility is to overwrite it with an equally powerful emotion – with an emotion as strong as hatred… Yes, those would be love and trust.
author: Fumito Nanahara

quote: I've been looking out at the world through windows I've opened across the net. It's an extremely close-minded and twisted world.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: NEET is not a stereotype. It's a way of life.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: You can use whatever technique you like, but now that I said I will kill you... your death tonight has been assured.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: *after Misa-chan says that she can't imagine a world without Light* Hmmm... Yes, it would be dark!
author: L Lawliet

quote: I can't help you. I belong to a world where all is death. Your world of choices was not meant for me to interfere with.
author: Alucard

quote: That dog is neither man nor monster. Only a man can truly hope to kill a monster.
author: Alucard

quote: Rather than leaving someone to die, I'd much rather die together with them.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: Look at my soldiers and their mean faces! I taught them that face!
author: Prussia

quote: Leave this guy's key to me, I'll do what you cant do
author: Sanji

quote: I won't live my life by another person's script.
author: Mahiro Fuwa

quote: Normal people don't become authors to begin with, Hermes.
author: Kino

quote: To reign over the kingdom of the world, to make its peace and write its laws
author: Alucard

quote: Pain tends to heal as time passes, but personally, I don't want time to heal my wounds. You may think you've escaped the pain and forgotten it, but that's nothing more than stagnation. You can't move forward without the pain.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Is he living his dreams in death? Or.. is death the end of dreams?
author: Griffith

quote: Are you telling me to flee from my foe!? The blood of a coward doesn't flow through these veins!
author: Elliot Nightray

quote: A thief is a creative artist who takes his prey in style... But a detective is nothing more than a critic, who follows our footsteps.
author: Kaitou Kid

quote: It is at the moment of death that humanity has value.
author: Archer

quote: One who does something he hates just because he's told to.. is called an errand boy.
author: Guts

quote: It doesn't matter who your parents were. Everyone is a child of the sea.
author: Whitebeard

quote: I found a job after graduation, but it was at the school. So much for sentimental farewells.
author: Y

quote: I'll do whatever it takes to have everything make sense again!
author: Mahiro Fuwa

quote: Don't concern yourself with what those tasteless idiots say.
author: Xerxes Break

quote: I was born alone in this world and alone I will die. If this is my fate, why are tears coming out of my eyes?
author: Alan Humphries

quote: There's no one who can live their whole life being completely uncorrupted.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Say, how about we put an end to all of this? The two of us could become Witches and destroy everything! Everything in this world that has ever made us hate, everything that has ever made us cry, will turn to ashes until nothing is left, like it was all just a bad dream! We'd have no worries! Isn't that nice?
author: Homura Akemi

quote: Aah... I said I'd "answer you" ... Not that I'd "give you a straight answer".
author: Xerxes Break

quote: You can play any character and yet in the end, you yourself are nobody. Your core personality is null. It's empty. That's how you could wear any mask all over your smooth, featureless face and have it fit perfectly.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: I really don't know what I should believe in anymore... Even if I believe I'm doing the right thing... Nothing goes well at all.
author: Hakua Du Lot Herminium

quote: I am the Defender of the pride of New Hell...!!
author: Hakua Du Lot Herminium

quote: ...Have I... Stumbled upon a brand new shitty game again...?
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Water is the greatest enemy of games.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: In the first place, the logic that says "those who play games are kids" is itself an allusion, therefore one might say that shoehorning reality into your stubborn dualism is already a criticism of the self. In short, humans can only recognize reality through the filter called "me" and so they are unable to escape the constraints of their uncanny existence.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Humans shouldn't just disregard something they cannot comprehend while also trying to define it.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Maybe, just maybe, there is no purpose in life... but if you linger a while longer in this world, you might discover something of value in it.
author: Orochimaru

quote: True power is forged from the desire smoldering in the heart, it fans into a flame and begins to burn with an intensity one scarcely imagines to be possible...
author: Orochimaru

quote: An unforeseen situation... An unexpected turn of events... In the face of those, you too will face your true self.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: I wonder what sort of criteria you use to divide people into good and evil.
author: Makishima Shougo

quote: The world is lucky! Despite of how much I hate the world, I have decided to mend it rather than destroy it.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: I always thought of humans as intelligent dominoes, since they tend to follow each other.
author: Watashi

quote: Dying or getting killed isn't something unnatural. Living aimlessly without a purpose is.
author: Kiba

quote: I did say that you could ask, but I didn't say that I would answer.
author: Xerxes Break

quote: If the ideal world can be found in a bad game, it can be found in the real world as well.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: The game design for life is flawed.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Being happy is not a right, but a duty. A duty to yourself. Waiving rights is one thing, but failing in your duty is downright irresponsible.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: No fair, sky. I'm the one who feels like crying.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: I should use a cheerful joke to lighten the mood. Would you like a snack? Or, maybe I should snack on you instead?
author: Watashi

quote: If you cling to life, you live in fear of death. And that fear will cloud your judgment.
author: Revy

quote: You can't sit around envying other peoples worlds. You have to go out and change your own.
author: Chiaki Shinichi

quote: They weren't my friends, they were my possessions! Money, women, henchmen... they're all possessions! So killing my henchmen is the same as stealing from me, and I don't let people take what's mine!
author: Greed

quote: What could be more beautiful than doing work that puts your soul at risk, because that's what it means to be alive!
author: Solf J. Kimblee

quote: I am not a friend of justice. I am an enemy of evil.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: The sun is my enemy, but the moon has been good to me.
author: Shinobu Oshino

quote: Any betrayal you can see is trivial,  what is truly frightening and much more lethal, is the betrayal you cannot see.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Stories where love and courage win in the end always turn out like that, you know? When I think about it, I became a magical girl because I always loved those stories.
author: Sakura Kyouko

quote: There are... many types of monsters in this world: Monsters who will not show themselves and who cause trouble
author: L Lawliet

quote: Ancient creatures died and left naught but fossil fuels, like coal and petroleum. Without that sacrifice, our present energy civilization would not exist. That sort of sacrifice is what is always demanded.
author: Souji Mikage

quote: This device paints the illusion of fairy tales for those with naive wishes in their hearts, who say they wish something eternal existed, who say they wish the power of miracles existed. But, there's no place higher than this room. This room is the summit of Ohtori Academy, and of the world.
author: Akio Ohtori

quote: It's often said, "People who are similar can be called friends", right? You haven't been making a good life for yourself, have you? Well, I guess I'm no better.. People don't try to make a life that they can't be proud of... They have the intention of staying on the straight path, but out of blue, they're in the dirt. But, even so, with heart and soul you try to brake through. There will be a day, that even dirt will dry and fall off.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: A normal detective eavesdrops, goes on stakeouts, and gathers information by foot to find out what they're looking for. But a NEET detective can search the world over to find the truth without stepping out of their room!
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: The summer continues to make me wonder. So my head, boiling like a pot, will never cool. With the heat. With the cicadas buzzing. With the twinkling of the myriad stars floating in the sky.
author: Makoto Niwa

quote: The only thing you can change about the past is how you feel about it in the present.
author: Lockon Stratos

quote: When a person encounters that which they cannot understand, what do they do? Why, they think. But you know, the more you think about something, the further you get from the truth. Yes. Your thoughts get in the way of what your instincts desire. In the way of the real answer.
author: Fumito Nanahara

quote: People don't realize they aren't able to choose whether or not to believe something. If they subconsciously believe something, therein lies the potential for a curse.
author: Kanoe Yuuko

quote: I am the Dark Flame Master. Perish, enveloped in the flames of darkness!
author: Togashi Yuuta

quote: To have a name. To remove one layer of the unknown. To be painted in reality. If you have your feet firmly planted to the ground, you may have a chance to pull someone down.
author: Makoto Niwa

quote: If you don't trust the boy who cries wolf - in other words, a child who lies, your sheep and goats will all get eaten. But who gives a damn about moral lectures. The important part is that because the boy believed in his lies, he really brought a wolf to the village. You can't deny that! *to Niwa Makoto*
author: Yashiro Hoshimiya

quote: For questions where your chance of being correct is 50/50, it's best to go with your gut response.
author: Maekawa

quote: True detective work is beyond the general masses. After all, we're advocates for the dead. We dig up what was lost to the grave and hurt the living to defend the honor of the dead. And we humiliate the dead to comfort the living.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: There won't be any pain if you don't do anything stupid.
author: Himeko Inaba

quote: Humans are weak. For every cure found, another disease is uncovered. It's a game of chase.
author: Kazutaka Muraki

quote: You could say history is like an endless waltz. Three measures of war, peace, and revolution continue in an endless cycle.
author: Mariemaia Khushrenada

quote: You're proud of your white clothes?.. It sounds like a laundry detergent commercial.
author: Pesche Guatiche

quote: You have to do the things you don't want to do, before you can do the things you truly want to do.
author: Tsutomu Komano

quote: The Other Side of the Other Side of the Other Side would be the Other Side.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: They don't call me Greed for nothing! I want money, I want women, status and power! I want everything this world's selling and eternity's topping the list!
author: Greed

quote: People can wish for anything. Happiness or unhappiness. No matter what kind of choice you made, it was the result you chose... As long as you're not regretting the result, it is all right.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: We are but men, drawn to act in the name of revenge that we deem to be justice. But... if there is justice in revenge then that same justice will breed only more revenge... and trigger a cycle of hatred.
author: Pain

quote: How can you say that you will never change? That you will not change, no matter how great the pain you face? Can you continue believing in yourself forever? Can you guarantee it? Can you have such faith in yourself?!
author: Pain

quote: Men don't get touchy-feely with each other.
author: Taichi Mashima

quote: When I become Fuhrer President, all female personnel in the military ... will have to wear mini-skirts.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Behind this mask is...Another mask! Pretty cool, huh?
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: What is eternal? ...Eternal life. Eternal love. Eternal flow of time. Instinctively, they all seem wonderful, but in reality, they are also cruel.
author: Yuki Saegusa

quote: My smile is nothing more than a pose, I can give it to anyone, anytime, anywhere...
author: Kojima Mizuiro

quote: A sword is a weapon. The art of swordsmanship is learning how to kill. What Miss Kaoru says is nothing but sweet and innocent talk, only those whose hands have never been stained with the blood of man can believe.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: I would think that he's already seen through your heart, and is simply playing the fool to use you. He yanks on the strings of your cheap pride and you dance like a little marionette.
author: Hajime Saitou

quote: In this world, filled with violence, blood and scheming, the promise we made on that day was my one and only refuge.
author: Mina Tepeş

quote: Different conclusions are reached when one fact is viewed from two separate points of view. When that happens, there is no immediate way to judge which point of view is the correct one. There is no way to conclude one's own conclusion is the correct one. But for that exact reason, it is also premature to decide one's own conclusion is wrong.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: I find it fascinating how we can see something with our eyes, hear with our ears and speak from our mouths. Although science tells us how they work, I just really can't grasp it. I don't know how everyday items like phones work. I can't even explain why a bicycle is fast. When I think like this, I wonder how many things I really understand. Yet I can live on. Because all these mysteries have joined together to keep me alive. Sometimes I admire that before I go to bed.
author: Mifune Ryouko

quote: You will not touch these innocent people with even one inch of your dirty blades, if you require an opponent, I will fight you. If you wanna taste the ground, feel free to attack me.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: A man that can't hold on to his beliefs can only be pathetic, dead or alive.
author: Hajime Saitou

quote: Run-chan was chasing a butterfly and was about to get hit by a car...
author: Ichii Tooru

quote: Trust me, you don't want to make the whole world your enemy. At the very least, you have a friend in me.
author: Abel Nightroad

quote: A true warrior would never beg someone for his life.
author: Kira Izuru

quote: Listen to yourself whining and complaining like some sorry little victim! You can whimper all day for all I care, you're nothing but a coward!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: One day I'd like to become something precious to others.
author: Gaara

quote: My motto is to be stronger than yesterday, if I have to I'll be stronger than half a day ago, even a minute ago!
author: Rock Lee

quote: Battles aren't supposed to be heroic affairs. They are not supposed to be fun or exciting, to us every battle is filled with despair, they are dark, horrifying, grizzly. We should fear warfare, avoid it always and whenever possible choose the path of peace.
author: Kira Izuru

quote: How I envy the feeble and frail... If I were inept, I could simply blend in, not stand out, and get lost in the crowd. I yearned to be just another sheep... And if that was asking too much I'd settle for... walking among the lions.
author: Starrk

quote: There are only two professions in the whole world that give meaning to those who have died and what have been lost... They're writers and detectives. Writers are the only ones able to revive what was lost through their visions. Detectives are the only ones able to dig up the grave and bring back lost information. But the information us detectives dig up is nothing more than the truth as recorded in Heaven's Memo Pad.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: When you find yourself wishing that a certain person was also here, that person is like family to you. Regardless of how long or how well you know them.
author: Tsutomu Komano

quote: The crowd of people looks just like pixels in a picture to me. A single pixel is meaningless. But add two, three and four... They pile up rapidly until they ultimately form a picture. But I've never seen that picture.
author: Narumi Fujishima

quote: NEETs aren't people who can't do or won't do things. The only difference is the rules. Because we're playing with different rules, we're forced to do things differently. The participants are disoriented. They frown. Then they are discouraged by labeling and stereotyping and find comfort in isolation.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: There are only two paths you can choose. You can sit quietly and be selected out of this world, or you can adapt and change.
author: Gai Tsutsugami

quote: A detective must become nothing more than an advocate. We must never put words to the feelings that failed to take form.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: The world... is a very small place, but... for those who know it, it is very, very large. And the world... when it is viewed by those who know... is far larger than just one world can hold.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: You won't be able to achieve anything if you worry about everything.
author: Miharu Rokujo

quote: Everyone is sacrificing something precious to them in order to save something else. Is that the reason for human action?
author: Shijima Kurookano

quote: In this world, the weak are the sustenance of the strong. The strong live, the weak die.
author: Makoto Shishio

quote: Revenge never does anyone any good. Killing the person you hate will never ease the pain. Always look forward! Follow the path of light!
author: Mikage

quote: There are three kinds of secrets. Something that you hide at the bottom of your heart because you don't want it to be mentioned. Something that you can't say even if you want to and something that you hope someone asks about even though you're hiding it.
author: Kazuhiko Yukimi

quote: This is the world you've stuck yourself into, if you aren't strong enough to lead, then you lose the privilege of getting what you want.
author: Genkai

quote: Human emotions are ambiguous. A person can have contradicting feelings. I know how they are capable of creating lies and pain when reflected in the real world. That's why we have words. Words are brutally precise. They give form to feelings while mercilessly killing anything left unsaid.
author: Shionji Yuuko

quote: New eras don't come about because of swords, they're created by the people who wield them.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: Ugly? I'll have you know they call me The Rose of Martial Arts around here!
author: Kaoru Kamiya

quote: Oreki, you're strange!
author: Mayaka Ibara

quote: Well, it's not a big deal or anything... but I was almost killed.
author: Yashiro Isana

quote: Hey, I'll have you know that I almost really did kick the bucket during that training, so don't you dare sum it all up in one word, even if it is a nice one like "potential".
author: Sanosuke Sagara

quote: A man who cannot play by himself, cannot improve by himself.
author: Midorima Shintarou

quote: Once the revenge is dealt, you are required to pay the compensation.
author: Ai Enma

quote: Rule breakers should be punished. If you go easy on them, they'll think explaining their circumstances will get them forgiven, and the same thing will only happen again.
author: Myouri Unzen

quote: I'd rather trust and regret, than doubt and regret.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: It's not justice if you don't go overboard.
author: Myouri Unzen

quote: While you're alive, you need a reason for your existence. Being unable to find one is the same as being dead.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: The only principle is that there is no principles.
author: Kurapika

quote: No one's going to give you a map. You've got to walk your own path.
author: Hilda

quote: Your sudden smiles always surprise me. But are dangerous enough to make my heart race.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: Normally, those people would never wake up from their fantasy worlds. They live meaningless lives. They waste their precious days over nothing. No matter how old they get, they'll continue to say, "My real life hasn't started yet. The real me is still asleep, so that's why my life is such garbage." They continue to tell themselves that. And they age. Then die. And on their deathbeds, they will finally realize: the life they lived was the real thing. People don't live provisional lives, nor do they die provisional deaths. That's a simple fact! The problem... is whether they realize that simple fact.
author: Yukio Tonegawa

quote: Justice and charity don't mix.
author: Myouri Unzen

quote: After all this time, after being by your side and always looking after you I failed to make a place for myself deep within your heart.
author: Masafumi Takeuchi

quote: I am a single bullet. It has no heart. Therefore, it does not think. It just flies straight towards its target.
author: Kanzaki H Aria

quote: Death and pain are just a small price to pay for the enjoyment of battle!
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: Excavating won't always get you what you want. Maybe after digging, nothing will come out at all. That's why I love it. Because if we don't try, we would never find anything.
author: Noriyasu Seta

quote: If one side is putting all their efforts into killing a normal high school student and the other side is putting all their efforts into saving that normal high school student, which side do you want to be on? Which side could you proudly say you were on?
author: Mikoto Misaka

quote: A boss is someone who puts his life on the line for his subordinates.
author: Reborn

quote: If we make it back to the real world, I'll find you. And fall in love with you all over again.
author: Asuna Yūki

quote: I don't have anything anymore, but if there's something on the floor, I'll pick it up.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: You and I, our levels are as distant as the earth from the heavens. Must I spell it out for you? I have discarded my left arm, discarded my left leg, and yet even then I have not nearly lowered myself to your level.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: For everything you wish, you have to pay an equal price in return. You can't get more or give more. You can't get less or give less. It must be in balance, or else there will be chaos.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: No matter how unimportant the meeting... how small the outcome... it will always have some later effect on you. It can be the smallest of things. It can be the shortest of moments. It may never be remembered. It may have never been recorded. But a bond of fate never disappears once tied.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: The world is constantly changing. And you can't expect it to stay the same, even for a second. If that's true, there's no need for you to go on a journey, Kino. Even if you stay in one place, you'll be able to keep experiencing the world.
author: Hermes

quote: Look at this world, so many people deserve to be killed. At the same time, a murderer must be ready to be killed as he lives. That's what retribution is. So, in this world, evil or whatever, a person strongly determined to live is the one who survives in the end.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: As it turns out, living was a punishment.
author: Himari Takakura

quote: Let's share the fruit of fate.
author: Kanba Takakura

quote: When people realize just how lonely they are on their own, they will become kind.
author: Mirajane Strauss

quote: Alcohol is humanity's friend. How can I abandon a friend?
author: Yang Wenli

quote: We all live in the space between one moment and eternity. We meet and part. Everyone lives their lives to the fullest in a world where things change with the passage of time. But I'm sure some things won't ever change. There also things that change and can never be gotten back. But we already now. Even if things change, they'll begin anew. And as long as we have the will, humans will always move on forward. For we can accelerate.
author: Haruyuki Arita

quote: Sincerity with respect to yourself! No matter what your objective... no matter who you are... if you are going to do something or not do something, that is a promise to yourself. And the one who keeps the promise, or breaks the promise, is you. No one else can be burdened with holding you to a promise that's made to yourself.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: It's okay not to feel "whole". Even if you feel only partly complete, if you repeat that enough, it'll eventually be "whole". A part... is better than zero.
author: Elhaym Van Houten

quote: But its power goes beyond what is necessary... Does one really need the power to destroy everything?
author: Fei Fong Wong

quote: Childish ideals pale when placed before reality.
author: Citan Uzuki

quote: If you are doing it, I'm doing it. If I don't do it, will you? If you don't do it, I'll do it. I'm doing it so that you'll do it too!!
author: Kamina

quote: My obvious charms and god-like powers always dazzle the simple, ordinary folk.
author: Dark Schneider

quote: Do you think it's possible to send Flame Alchemy through the phone and burn someones ears off?
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Even if the truth is as one suspects, it may still be worthless.
author: Deishū Kaiki

quote: The zipper is a window to society.
author: Kotarō Katsura

quote: I'm sure there's a reason that, even after I stopped being lost, I stayed here. I won't leave until I know what that reason is.
author: Mayoi Hachikuji

quote: Any time one isn't familiar with something, it all looks the same. Knowledge and education are required to properly judge a thing.
author: Suruga Kanbaru

quote: There's no point in having physical strength alone. The real deal needs to have mental strength and will.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: We can't let the past be mere water under the bridge. Even so, there's no reason that we can't come together.
author: Shinobu Oshino

quote: The past is just the past. There's no inherent value in getting over it or catching up to it.
author: Deishū Kaiki

quote: In a way, the supernatural is what's behind the curtain. Normally, you only need to see what's happening on stage. That's how reality works. If you don't know, it's best that you don't. Actually, learning about the supernatural only increases the number of things you don't know.
author: Mayoi Hachikuji

quote: You can lose the match and the game, but if you don't lose to yourself, it isn't a loss.
author: Karen Araragi

quote: People who kill too much, turn into dragons one day. Beasts that rule the land atop piles of money and fly the skies with authority. They become more and more violent, until they can no longer understand the language of men. We cannot allow dragons to remain in this world, even though we are the ones from which they are spawned. To slay a dragon is the greatest of honors.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: I don't know everything. I just know what I know.
author: Tsubasa Hanekawa

quote: A fake with more power than the real thing is more dangerous than the real thing.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Just as there isn't a problem that can't be solved by being right, there isn't a problem that can't be solved by money.
author: Deishū Kaiki

quote: The first requirement of being a hero isn't being right. It's being strong. That's why the hero always wins.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: Weapons are used by soldiers on the battlefield. If you have never used them yourself, you have no idea what you're selling.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: Sharing your secret with someone means you involve them in your problems. It may make things easier for you, but your family could end up suffering for it too.
author: Mayoi Hachikuji

quote: The world is not beautiful. Therefore it is.
author: Kino

quote: Whether doing good or evil, I will be the boss.
author: Kagura

quote: You can't direct armies from your bedsheets.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: In their own way, fights are also a valid form of communication.
author: Tsukihi Araragi

quote: Whatever you value... What you consider right is up to you. But don't force those ideals onto other people.
author: Yozuru Kagenui

quote: Those who get fooled are partially at fault.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: The fake is of far greater value. In its deliberate attempt to be real, it's more real than the real thing.
author: Deishū Kaiki

quote: If you pick a fight with a god of death, I can't guarantee your soul's safety.
author: Death the Kid

quote: I'm an arms dealer anyway. There's no point in fearing what I sell.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: Stop making me repeat myself! Its bad for my health!
author: Duo Maxwell

quote: It really shouldn't be all that uncommon - having a wish you'd go so far as to trade your life for. I think there are a lot of people in the world with wishes and desires like that. If we can't think of anything, it just means that we really haven't had anything that bad happen to us. We've had too much given to us and have become dull and stupid. It makes me wonder: Why us?
author: Sayaka Miki

quote: Oh, right, Senjougahara. I've got a great story to tell you. It's about that man who tried to rape you way back. He was hit by a car and died in a place with no connection to you, in an event with no connection to you. Without any drama at all. [...] That's the lesson for you here: You shouldn't expect your life to be like the theater.
author: Deishū Kaiki

quote: I thought that everyone in Japan had to be packed in there. So I turned to my dad and asked him,"Do you know how many people are here right now"? He said probably fifty thousand, since the stadium was full. I was only one little person in that big crowded stadium filled with people, and there were so many people there, but it was just a handful out of the entire population. Up till then, I always thought that I was, I don't know, kind of a special person. It was fun to be with my family. I had fun with my classmates. And the school that I was going to, it had just about the most interesting people anywhere. But that night, I realized it wasn't true. All the stuff we did during class that I thought was so fun and cool, was probably happening just like that in classes in other schools all over Japan. There was nothing special about my school at all.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: Idiots in their idiotic way have their own idiotic worries.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back. It's not like somebody's gonna save you if you start babbling excuses.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: It is man's heart which sets the world aflame.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: By experiencing both, victory and defeat, running away and shedding tears, a man will become a man.
author: Shanks

quote: It's amazing how much you kiss your own ass.
author: Kyon

quote: It's impossible for someone to replace someone else.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: It is not wise to judge others based on your own preconceptions and by their appearances.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: I think society where people prefer earning to spending is a healthier one.
author: Akira Takizawa

quote: You can never win if you're afraid to lose so much that you refuse to put up a fight.
author: Furude Rika

quote: I think people should try to ignore their race, and just treat each other as equals.
author: Edward Elric

quote: It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Your darkness and hopelessness are like vapor. They're nothing more than shadows that shall melt away and disappear under the moon's light
author: Chikane Himemiya

quote: Come on, scribbles on the bathroom wall, please show me the path that I must follow!
author: Excel

quote: Something as useless as emotions, I never had them to begin with.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Don't beg for things, get them yourself or else you won't get anything.
author: Renton Thurston

quote: Whatever happens, happens.
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: My name is VASH THE STAMPEDE!! Forgive the lack of warning, but it's time for my daily massacre! If you do not believe I am the real thing, take a good look at me and start freaking out!!
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: If you can fool your friends, you can fool your enemies.
author: Xelloss Metallium

quote: No matter what we learn, no matter what we obtain, nothing ever changes! People are amazing that way! They become envious, hate each other, and destroy each other! If that's what they truly desire, why don't they simply exterminate each other!?
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: Aren't we all monsters inside?
author: Lucy

quote: Rely on your Instinct, rather than Logic.
author: Takeshi Yamamoto

quote: Fact is genius's can take all the hard work of the common folk and turn the whole entire thing around, so that it's like it was all for nothing. As one of those with talent, let me apologize. I know it's unfair but... TOUGH SHIT, SUCKER'S!!
author: Takamura Mamoru

quote: Every human being thinks different things are right, and different things are wrong. Whether something is normal or not, it is still different for every person. Happiness is the same – everyone has their own definition of it.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: The world might seem boring. But, if you just look, you'll find all kinds of crazy stuff. The world is the best form of entertainment. Something like this couldn't just have happened by chance. There must be a writer writing the stories of more than five-billion people. And the only thing we could possibly call this person is God.
author: Ryuunosuke Uryuu

quote: The probability of success was zero percent. But I've learned that probabilities are meaningless when it comes to you guys.
author: Lordgenome

quote: Listen, Haku. I don’t remember it, but my mom told me... Once, when I was little, I fell into a river. She said they’d drained it and built things on top. But I’ve just remembered. The river was called the Kohaku River. Your real name is... Kohaku.
author: Chihiro Ogino

quote: Once you look up to someone, you can't overtake them.
author: Kise Ryouta

quote: Living things are restrained by Chains: The laws of nature, the flow of time, the vessel known as your “body”, and the existence called your mind. There's only one chain that people can wield: WORDS.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: There's no such thing as a coincidence in this world. What does exist is only the inevitable.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: Hey! Don't you know the rules!? When heroes transform, ride in their machine, or stand in their main pose, no one should attack them!
author: Da Cider

quote: Attaining happiness is quite simple. All you have to do is cast away your humanity.
author: Akihiko Chuuzenji

quote: I CAN DO THAT TOO!" *He takes out a banana and squishes it, giggling evilly*
author: Imadori Kyousuke

quote: You think you're the only ones who matter. You think you can put off death. But that peace made you foolish and thoughtless. If you kill someone, someone else will kill you... this hatred binds us together.
author: Pain

quote: *To Lambo*  Smile... I said smile! Smile! Damn you!
author: Ryōhei Sasagawa

quote: Master Sergeant Fuery, during your last physical it was discovered you have Athletes Foot, and we now believe it is affecting your brain.
author: Riza Hawkeye

quote: Jomy is still young, he doesn't know that there will be problems that he can't overcome with just will.
author: Soldier Blue

quote: Do you understand pain a little now? If you don't share someone's pain, you can never understand them. But just because you understand them doesn't mean you can come to an agreement. That's the truth
author: Pain

quote: You'll never know what's right or wrong until everything is over.
author: Soldier Blue

quote: It's awfully quiet back there. Are you two making out?
author: Cho Hakkai

quote: The ticket to the future, is always blank.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: A fallen angel banished from heaven, arises into the light to be recieved by the benevolence of God...
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: There has never been a report about a stomach ache or any other related medical trauma from swallowing your pride.
author: Daisuke Aramaki

quote: And your eyes were a strange colour that I'd never seen before. And they drew me in.
author: Sion

quote: Knights cannot save the world.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: If you can tell me what you want to say, tell me then. I want to hear it... Because no matter what you say, my feelings won't change.
author: Shouta Kazehaya

quote: You've set fire to my frozen heart, I shall engrave this anger and sadness that's running through my blood onto you.
author: Alexander Nikolaevich Hell

quote: They call certain methods of fighting good and others evil, acting as if there were some nobility to the battlefield. Such illusions, perpetrated by heroes throughout history, have led countless young men to their bloody deaths, all for the sake of this valor and glory.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: Righteousness cannot save the world.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: Life is all about challenges, There's no point in living if there's no one strong to play with, It's better if I can't win.
author: Taiga Kagami

quote: How come you wear glasses? I mean, you're really pretty but you can only appeal to a tiny section of the fanbase. *To Miyuki*
author: Konata Izumi

quote: Why don't you understand? Nunnally was blinded! My own sister was crippled! She knew... she knew that there were things in this world that she will never be able to do by herself! So her smile... Nunnally's smile... was her way of expressing gratitude!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I strive for something beyond the strongest, that challenging me would be the most ridiculous thought ever, that fighting me would be a sin! *To Imouto 10032*
author: Accelerator

quote: Really, what's with that? Such a power doesn't even appear in Academy City's databank. If I am a 1-in-328,571 prodigy, then aren't you, the only one in Academy City, a 1-in-2,300,000 disaster?
author: Mikoto Misaka

quote: When you talk properly, you get your feelings across properly, right?
author: Shouta Kazehaya

quote: You're Puss in Boots, the one who tricks the prince. He hides who he really is and pretends to be someone else forever. So in time he becomes that person, so his lie becomes the truth, see? He transcends the mask. Don't you get it? That's how he finds happiness. That's pretty good, right?
author: Eri Ninamori

quote: Are you looking at the stars?.. In the middle of the city? Even though the only stars you can see from here are fake?
author: Shinoda Chiaki

quote: *to Jack* If you accept everything you're told without question, you'll lose your ability to think. Even if you reached the same conclusion, it would still be worth analyzing the reasons behind it.
author: Lacie Baskerville

quote: I wonder if it's the selfish people who get ahead in this world, after all.
author: Shū Ouma

quote: Levels are just numbers. In this world, strength is just an illusion. There are more important things.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: Maybe I got something wrong, but it doesn't matter because the thought of wanting to help others definitely isn't wrong.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: It's simply fun to be part of a group sharing the same interests, regardless of what those interests are.
author: Watashi

quote: *to Reim* It means that you have no affinity for chains with fighting skills. You try to avoid violence even when you fight. That's a very good thing.
author: Xerxes Break

quote: The world you can see isn't all out there. In the world there are a lot of fascinating things that no living soul has ever seen! And just in knowing that is one cause for happiness. I'm sure you can find happiness meant for you! It might be something you might not quite understand yet. But you'll find it, that much is certain!
author: Fujitaka Kinomoto

quote: To me... This world is like a dark night that swallows everything.
author: Jack Vessalius

quote: Nothing amazing happens here. Everything is ordinary. The huge factory that can be seen from our town, the Medical Mechanica Plant, all the adults got excited when it came here, like it was really a big thing. The white steam that blows out every day at the same time, it looked to me like smoke that signified some kind of omen. Smoke that spreads out and covers everything.
author: Naota Nandaba

quote: If you are still determined to take your own life, please do so outside... *To Grell*
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: You're wrong... You're wrong about that as well, Oz! We're just two people who met through someone called 'Elliot'. You're quite mistaken thinking we were friends through him. Because I don't know a thing about you!
author: Leo Baskerville

quote: How could I burden that brat with the weight of my life? *about Oz*
author: Elliot Nightray

quote: I've never talked to a girl before. I don't know how to handle it.
author: Crona

quote: Those who come to the Abyss are all the same. They're all desperate to get something back. But everyone goes mad partway. It seems being with the dear dollies - the Chains - is no good for them... Fu fu.. but you were different. You didn't lose yourself, not even at the end.
author: Will Of The Abyss

quote: Zuko's gone crazy! I made a sand sculpture of Suki and he destroyed it! ... Oh, and he's attacking Aang.
author: Sokka

quote: The times when you want to cry are when you have to try your hardest. That's why I decided I'll cry in general. Then, when I have to shed tears for a time when I really want to cry, my tears would have run dry.
author: Jacuzzi Splot

quote: I just know you are all my newest enemies... and you have really nice guns. You people are all the same. You think you're so special! "Oh yeah, with all of our wonderful guns on this pathetic train, there's no way anyone can stop us! We are invincible and unbeatable! We are so strong with all of our men and our guns!" *laughs*
author: Ladd Russo

quote: Tedium is such a crime. It takes the limited amount of time that is given to man, and rather than spending it in indolence or drowning it in pleasure it just sits there sucking, eating it up. I can't put up with that, tedium is a crime! Death to tedium! Die!
author: Graham Specter

quote: No surprise...the meeting ended once again without any resolution. Blast all. I really do wish there was someone around here who I didn't always fight with. ... Flying Mint Bunny! Did you come to try to cheer me up, huh? ...This is great! All my magical friends at the same time! But let's have no murders go around, okay? I'm serious guys! Hey, no fair chewing on my sleeve, Uni! I'm too ticklish, so stop the snuggling! You're naughty, Captain Hook, Tinkerbell's not big enough. Take that big, goofy, kissy face back to your little leprechaun friends, since they're the only ones who care! Kidding! Seriously, you're all nutburgers! What am I to do with you?
author: England

quote: People who call others stupid are usually more stupid. But I'm stupid, so I'll say it anyways...YOU'RE STUPID!
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: I shall now express my utter disgust and anger with you through the piano.
author: Austria

quote: Stop being such a bitch, Sweden!
author: Poland

quote: Risking my life for European politics would make me grassy!
author: Poland

quote: Don't care anything and do not do anything that's a waste of energy.
author: Oreki Houtarou

quote: I can only tell the fortune of girls.
author: Shima Kinzou

quote: Keep reinventing and polishing yourself, and who you want to be can be reborn over and over.
author: Su

quote: How worthless. Why are you saying things are impossible? You just decided that to make yourself feel better! Sure, there are things you can't do, things that seem impossible, but that's what makes everyone unique!
author: Nagihiko Fujisaki

quote: If I don't have to do it, I won't. If I have to do it, I'll make it quick.
author: Oreki Houtarou

quote: The prince's ice cream - it's an indirect kiss!
author: Su

quote: One shot is for all you did to everyone here... And all the rest are because you messed up my clothing.
author: Cross Marian

quote: You - Idiot! Go ahead and cry! When I'm with you, you don't have to hold back. *Usagi runs into his arms, sobbing*
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: You are from a world Su will never understand.
author: Su

quote: Careful what you do, cuz "God" is watching your every move. Hold my hand in the dark street, for if you do I know that I'll.. be safe. Even if I'm far away and alone, I can be sure that you'll find me there, this I know. You told me close for a while, so quite. You tell me everything. If I forget what to say then you'll come to me and tell me again, yes you'd tell me once again. But what happens when I know it all and what should I do, after that, what then?
author: Misa Amane

quote: Hey Kaiba, maybe we should duel sometimes.
author: Joey Wheeler

quote: We don't know if trying our best will help, but we do know, that if we don't try our best, it won't help for sure!
author: Eru Chitanda

quote: Gohan, let it go. It is not a sin to fight for the right cause. There are those who words alone will not reach.
author: Android 16

quote: Well, nothing in life is ever certain.
author: Watashi

quote: Look at the sky, it's so far away. But right here, right now, it seems so close.
author: Lee Yunlee

quote: *to a dying Elliot* I really liked you. It was only thanks to you that Gil managed to live in that house without forgetting how to smile.
author: Vincent Nightray

quote: Gilbert, I know everything about you... because we are connected by an extremely deep bond. No matter how far apart we are, we will surely return to the same place. Because that is our fate!
author: Vincent Nightray

quote: *to Duke Nightray* You've let your own son die for the honor of your household and other such rubbish. You've lost almost all of your family, and yet all you can think of is your own interests.
author: Vincent Nightray

quote: I am Elliot Nightray and I will not let you take that away from me!!
author: Elliot Nightray

quote: *to Reim* Like I said before!! To me, being blind is nothing! It's only because I had just woken up, that's why Oz found out. Give me 3 more days. By then, I'll have assimilated. Then I'll be recovered and everything will be like normal. Even if I were thrown in a midst of Pandora members, I have faith that I will be able to kill them all!
author: Xerxes Break

quote: Humpty Dumpty. I reject you.
author: Elliot Nightray

quote: *to Eliot* Fred, Claude, Ernest... The Head Hunter killed all of them! Because of that, our mother lost her mind... And... Fell prey to the lies of that foreigner. And our father still pretends to not notice what's going on!..
author: Vanessa Nightray

quote: It doesn't matter where I look, it's always idiots as far as the eye can see.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: This is the first and last time I bring a dude to my bed.
author: Sha Gojyo

quote: Eat until you can't anymore, play until you drop, sleep the day away, it's okay to laugh, cry or yell, just live, live, live!
author: Saiyuki

quote: Apparently Goku hasn't eaten in 500 years, his body's making up for lost time.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: Freedom is something you have to fight for, rather than something you're given. Being free means being prepared to carry that burden.
author: Charles Beams

quote: Ninjas are revolting, they stole my idea. I'll have to kill them now.
author: Hiei

quote: When I left Syrup Village, I left everything behind! Tranquility… Safety… They face hardships every day, and they laugh like they’re really having fun! That’s why I decided to go out to sea! I want to laugh ’til I cry, too! But if I don’t fight with everything I’ve got, there’s no way I deserve to be on the same boat as them! There’s no way I can laugh with them!
author: Usopp

quote: Don’t tell me he wants to conquer the world? Can’t he come up with something more original?
author: Lina Inverse

quote: High school girls, high school girls, all for me, high school girls!
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: Problems that cannot be solved do not exist in this world.
author: Yuki Nagato

quote: They say that we should love ourselves first, before other people learn to love us, but it's not as easy as it seems. Sometimes, we need someone to accept us and love us first, then we would learn to see ourselves through that person's eyes and learn to love our-self.
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: *To Tamaki* It's easy to feel sorry for him, but the hardships that he endured as a child, molded him into the person he is today. He'll be fine, the Host Club is his refuge, which means when all is said and done... he still has us.
author: Kyoya Ootori

quote: Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world out there that lives outside ourselves and our dreams.
author: Edward Elric

quote: I'm watching a dream I'll never wake up from.
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: I know that we can be foolish and make mistakes and we get hurt so easily. But with each mistake, we improve ourselves and with each wound, we don’t want to be hurt again. We keep moving on. We cherish the past, the present, and the future.
author: Lina Inverse

quote: *To Tayuya* How many times do I have to tell you? The first move is always a feint. It's the most basic thing, to land a hit with the second move.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: The world you want can’t be built after destruction. We build it everyday -step by step!
author: Lina Inverse

quote: I wanted to see your homework from the other day. And I got to see your face while you were sleeping... so don't sweat it.
author: Konata Izumi

quote: *To Herself* Hah. You know you're happy about it. Is she worried about me... because of the new virus going around? I figured she only ever had games and anime on her mind. I'm a little touched.
author: Kagami Hiiragi

quote: *To Temari* It really doesn't matter to me if I ever become a chūnin or not, but I guess I shouldn't let myself be beaten by a female, so let's do it.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: Our relationship has already been formed. No matter how trivial a meeting and the incidents that follow may seem, a relationship is made. Even if it is just for a short amount of time, a knot that has been tied does not unravel. It means that during your lifetime, every incident that passes has meaning. The meeting between you and I also has meaning, so remember it.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: Oh look at that. My tea has gone cold.
author: Itsuki Koizumi

quote: Someday you'll let go of my hand. When you finally look to the far, far sky, I'll kick you from behind and laugh at you to hurry.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: I'm so hungry, I can't even move.
author: Son Goku

quote: You guys are free to have a fight anywhere you want to, but interfering with an innocent girl’s meal is unforgivable. And, if it happens to be Lina Inverse’s meal, you’re lucky to be alive!
author: Lina Inverse

quote: Prince Zuko, pride is not the opposite of shame, but rather it's source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.
author: Iroh

quote: Pride is not something you can surrender.
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: You have already fulfilled my expectations. It appears that you’re still hiding a wealth of potential. I was watching you while your Guardians struggled to overcome their trials, and I could tell from your behavior and actions that you were always putting them first. And that didn’t change when Daemon set his trap. I witnessed your resolve to protect your Family, and I was impressed. Your Guardians also responded similarly. Sawada Tsunayoshi, I deem you worthy as boss of the tenth-generation Vongola Family
author: Vongola Primo Giotto

quote: *To himself, while fighting Temari* Oh man... those clouds are so lucky. so free. More to the point, I didn't feel like doing this in the first place. And I only became a ninja because I thought life would've been more interesting as one... I suppose things aren't gonna be that simple.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: *To Gajeel Redfox* You guys are complete idiots! I feel so sorry for you, I think I\'m tearing up. Phantom Lord? The spirit ruler? What a joke
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: We don't die for our friends, we live for them.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: I would solve a friend's problem... then also find a way to keep them from ending up with a new one.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: It is sky that allows the cloud to move about freely. But someday, I will even bite up the sky itself.
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: I'm the only one who can bear the full brunt of your hate! It's my job, no one else's! I'll bear the burden of your hatred... and we'll die together!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: The root of all evil is the kotatsu.
author: Chiaki Shinichi

quote: Even your gravest mistakes shouldn't stop you from moving forward.
author: Edward Elric

quote: If I wouldn't have tripped, you wouldn't have stopped, now would you?
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: Whatever you do or don't do, you're the one who always makes the decision.
author: Masafumi Takeuchi

quote: There's something wrong with people who seek reality in fiction.
author: Kyon

quote: I am known as Valentinez Alkalinella Xifax Sicidabohertz Gombigobilla Blue Stradivari Talentrent Pierre Andri Charton-Haymoss Ivanovici Baldeus George Doitzel Kaiser III. Don't hesitate to call.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: Hero? No! We're pirates! I love heroes, but I don't wanna be one! Do you know what heroes are? Say there is a chunk of meat. Pirates will have a banquet and eat it, but heroes will share it with other people. I want all the meat!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I could say I'm not sad, but I'd be lying. The problem is the world won't let me stay a kid forever, so I can't lie around crying about it either.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: I'm not smart enough to figure out answers no matter how much time I spend thinking. All I can do now is to empty my head and dash forward.
author: Rin Okumura

quote: You'll always stand by the light. That is your basketball.
author: Taiga Kagami

quote: I'm going to teach you how to talk to your seniors, baldy.
author: Hyuuga Junpei

quote: *after touching Misa's butt and getting away with it* This is an outrage... taking advantage of this situation! I assure you, I will get to the bottom of this!
author: L Lawliet

quote: And what's the real lesson? Don't leave things in the fridge.
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: You're thinking in Japanese! If you must think, do it in German!
author: Souryuu Asuka Langley

quote: So, who should we hold responsible? Compensation. Punishment. If you didn't want any problems you shouldn't have taken risks.
author: Watashi

quote: The chickens have earned their right to live, while the humans will go hungry.
author: Watashi

quote: I bet that when they run out of delicacy points, girls turn into old ladies.
author: Watashi

quote: It's quite educational, seeing the thought process of someone in charge.
author: Watashi

quote: They have no faces, no mouths... Their slimy bodies are completely hairless! They are... the skinned chickens!... Or you could just say they're chickens.
author: Watashi

quote: I've done it! After years of climbing the ladder, I've finally made it! Now that I have control of all good, no one can stop me! I now rule the human race! First, I will restore all the long-abandoned customs! Control the people! Control the goods! Control the economy! Once that's done, I can easily take over the nation! I'm in position to wield all of the power! Time to implement a dictatorial democracy! I can be a tyrant!
author: UNESCO Director

quote: Hide the truth. Manipulate information. Use intimidation.
author: Watashi

quote: A politician in the past once said: "My secretaries did it all."
author: UNESCO Director

quote: And so... I have written down the lesson I've learned from this vital experience in form of a title suitable for a business reference book: "Never hold meetings. The outcome is determined before the meeting begins."
author: Watashi

quote: If you pity my existence, please eat me.
author: Loaf

quote: Necessary murder. Man must kill to live. That hasn't changed, even with humanity's decline. The situation has reached the point in which escape and refusal are no longer options, so I must act.
author: Watashi

quote: You can go anywhere you want in this world with a single blade. This may be a virtual world, but I feel more alive here than in the real world.
author: Kazuto Kirigaya

quote: If someone you care for is ever in the eyes of danger, don't hesitate to save him/her.
author: Aoi Toori

quote: Shinto, Buddhism, Catholic, Protestant, Murasai, Anglican Church, Russian Orthodox Church, Dunhi, Oat, Techno-magic, swordplay, martial arts, gunsligning, mechanical beasts, phoenixes, dragons, aerial warships, civilians, knights, musketeers, samurai, ninja, warriors, kings, nobles, sovereigns, dynasts, emperors, popes, Far East, K.P.A. Italia,  Hexagone Franchise, England, Svet Russia, P.A.
