ODA, Qing, Union of India, money, rights, negotiations, politics, public opinion, armed forces, information, Divine Weapons, Armaments of Deadly Sins, Testament Arma, Summit Five, Eight Great Dragon Kings, Chancellor's Board, Student Council, men, women, those who are neither, the young, the old, the dead, and the living, the emotions, the logic, the resolve, for those here who have the power to be able to duel those on the Musashi, all of us, and all of you, and others, many others, many more, so very many more things that I still don't know about, among all of us! Let's find out who's the strongest out there!
author: Aoi Toori

quote: No amount of passion can overcome a lack of technical expertise.
author: Fuyumi Irisu

quote: Every individual must be aware of themselves. If not, those who watch them think fools of themselves.
author: Fuyumi Irisu

quote: The strong don't win. The winners are the strong ones.
author: Tsutomu Iwamura

quote: It's where all parallel lines meet. Where conflicting ideas are reconciled. It is... above the horizon.
author: Horizon Ariadust

quote: Once you get everything back, you'll be down to having nothing but loads of fun left.
author: Aoi Toori

quote: When you look back after a long life, you'll realize there's nothing that's really worth risking your life for.
author: Mackenzie Glen

quote: It's when things are tough that you have to keep your head up high. You won't find hope lying on the ground.
author: Inspector Sayama

quote: You can't just wait. You need to make things happen yourself.
author: Tokie

quote: I may be inept, but at least I don't forget to aim high!
author: Aoi Toori

quote: If you act only on what you should do without heed for what you want to do, you're nothing more than a machine, a phenomenon.
author: Kaminski Natalia

quote: Our mom put us in one of those *points to dresses* when we were little. We still get called 'her darling little girls' at our family reunions.
author: Hikaru Hitachiin

quote: *To Haruhi, when at her home*  You like strawberries, right? Here, you can have mine.
author: Takashi Morinozuka

quote: Loyalty is only given meaning through one's actions.
author: Futayo Honda

quote: I'm scared. Or should I borrow your words and say this is exciting?
author: Waver Velvet

quote: The wish of wanting everyone to be happy is merely a fairy tale!
author: Archer

quote: A path not chosen is the same as a path that never existed.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: Ephemeral and brilliant one, fall to my embrace. That is my decision.
author: Gilgamesh

quote: People like you walk your paths, believing that something you desire is waiting for you. I walk it to confirm that there is nothing there.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: *To Kaoru* Even if I searched the world over, no one could compare to you.
author: Hikaru Hitachiin

quote: It was my fault. It was my carelessness that led to Mitsukuni's cavity. I forgot to tell him to brush his teeth before napping... twice.
author: Takashi Morinozuka

quote: *To Pantherlily* We'll stop it, even if my body crumbles to bits, I'll stop it with my soul!
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: I think it's fun to get to know a person little by little, through looking at their personality.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: Then let me ask you, do gods of death love apples?
author: L Lawliet

quote: Besides, it doesn't really matter, does it? Why should I care about appearances and labels anyway. It's what's on the inside that counts.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: *To the twins* We've had enough of this! You're both to blame for this fight! Hika-chan and Kao-chan, I want you to make up and go halfsies on this cake, okay? But, I want to have a piece too, so I guess we're gonna have to go thirdsies. We're not going to be able to split the strawberry on top though. What should we do? Maybe I should just take it. After all, strawberries are my favorite. Oh, I forgot to ask, Hika-chan, Kao-chan, do you like strawberries?
author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka

quote: I'll make you so in love with me, that every time our lips touch you'll die a little.
author: Koizumi George

quote: The result is the most important thing.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: There probably isn't any meaning in life. Perhaps you can find something interesting to do while you are alive. Like how you found that flower. Like how I found you.
author: Orochimaru

quote: My face feels heavy, and I can't walk in these shoes.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: If I can, I'd prefer nobody to be sad.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: *To Kuchiki Rukia* Are you any different!? You sacrificed yourself to save me that time!! At that time were you thinking about complicated stuff like "this is my Shinigami duty"!? That's not what sacrificing yourself is! At the very least... I'm different! I haven't accepted any commitment. If things get bad I might run away... since I'm not a good enough person to be able to sacrifice my life for total strangers. But unfortunately I'm also not trash that can live happily without paying back his debts!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: An ideal is only an ideal after all. As long as you embrace that ideal, the friction with reality will continue to increase. So you will someday face reality and will have to pay the price for your compromises.
author: Archer

quote: I hate all these damn rich people.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: I was reckless when I was young. I educated myself by cursing the heartlessness of the world. The world was cruel - so I made myself more heartless and used that as a weapon, trying to follow through on my ideals.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: I'm sorry! I'm sorry, Takashi! I won't forget to brush my teeth again! I won't forget!...
author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka

quote: Mom... Mom in heaven.... Does love come suddenly like this
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: Know that the only people you can save like that are the ones that survive.
author: Archer

quote: Even if we are far apart. We'll always be united by tennis.
author: Fuji Shuusuke

quote: It's still too early for you to win against me.
author: Fuji Shuusuke

quote: Hinata... this is the unalterable difference in strength... the distinction that separates the elite from the failure. This is the unchangeable reality. From the moment you said you wouldn't run, your defeat was inevitable. The only possible outcome was your present despair... Withdraw!
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: I'm gonna kick your ***.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: [To Sarutobi] What nonsense! In the grand scheme of time, you're nothing more than a trivial footnote in the brief history of a cluster of huts called the "Leaf Village"! In time, the Hokage Stone Faces will crumble and be worn down to nothing...
author: Orochimaru

quote: [To Hinata At Chuunin Exams] So you're not going to withdraw? Then don't blame me for what happens to you.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: They say that the best blaze burns brightest, when circumstances are at their worst.
author: Sophie Hatter

quote: People like you... are the reason why people like me need medication.
author: Inuyasha

quote: Oh sorry, my hand slipped.
author: Death the Kid

quote: I think running a restaurant would fit you better than being an assassin.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: {TO NARUTO} Oh, by the way... I'm a boy
author: Haku

quote: You're a hero to other poor people, Fujioka. You've shown the world that even a poor person can excel at an elite private academy. It must be hard for you to constantly be looked down upon by others... Spurned, neglected, but that doesn't matter now. Long live the poor! We welcome you, poor man, to our world... of beauty!
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: Often people have it wrong, mistakenly believing... that showing mercy to an enemy is kindness. They spare the foe whose life is in their hands. But don't you see? It's an empty existence, to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!
author: Haku

quote: Could you stop skipping the thinking process when you respond?
author: Kagami Hiiragi

quote: *To Haruhi Fujioka about him helping her search for her wallet in water* A little water never hurt anyone. Besides, people are always telling me that I'm dripping with good looks.
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: Bitter crimson tears flow from lifeless eyes, and mingle with the endless sands... Bestowing ever greater power upon the demon god.
author: Gaara

quote: I put a propulsion engine under your seat just in case you messed up.
author: Yuri Nakamura

quote: And the TV show ended by saying how young people are becoming increasingly illiterate, but doesn't browsing the Internet and blogging actually improve your literacy?
author: Konata Izumi

quote: Don't make it sound so easy! Don't you realize how hard I had to study? I worked hard... I worked so hard!
author: Hakua Du Lot Herminium

quote: Bye-Bye now.
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: Their mistakes were simple ones. Gouki's mistake was being overconfident and Kurama's... sympathy for his human prey.
author: Hiei

quote: Sounds like a lot of work, I think I'll pass. I'd rather play and I'll ask for help when I get stuck.
author: Konata Izumi

quote: I love the type of woman who can kick my ***.
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: All they saw in me was another little ghetto rat with no power and no God. What's left for a poor little Chinese bitch to rely on? It's money of course. And guns. Fuckin' A, with these two things, the world is a great place.
author: Revy

quote: Finally I saw... A world so bright I almost wanted to cry... It was then, that my consciousness was engulfed in darkness.
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: In my mind this jacked-up sideways ridiculousness is the normal state?
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Depending on your request, whether I will laugh or get angry - that will decide your lifespan, boy.
author: Ladd Russo

quote: Incomprehensibility is a part of human life. But what does this mean? I just can't understand it.
author: Graham Specter

quote: When we hit our lowest point, we are open to the greatest change.
author: Aang

quote: I'm impressed. No one has ever gotten the better of me like that. It is almost a shame to take the bending of someone so talented. ALMOST.
author: Amon

quote: We didn't even know each other then. And now, I can't imagine my life without you in it. You're the most loyal, brave and selfless person I've ever known.
author: Mako

quote: All people have sanctuary which mustn't be touched. A scar of sadness which mustn't be entered. The living confront each other to achieve their ideals. In a quiet voice, the man in the white coat told me... that he had finally found me, that he wanted my life. That man smiled a smile deeper than darkness. Legato Bluesummers, a man fascinated by Death...
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: Between being eternally unable to wake from a dream, and being eternally unable to dream, which do you think would be more unfortunate? Still, both the dream that we deemed eternal, and this very reality, are destined to end someday.
author: Lau

quote: I think it's good if someone smiles when you smile at them. The beauty of voluntary acts can foster goodwill in the hearts of others. Love which doesn't ask for collateral gives us respect as people. However it's wrong to sustain that. In time, the strain will bloom into the flower called Lie...the thorny flower which hurts people.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: Can a world this interesting actually be reality?
author: Lau

quote: So what if I'd spare him? In my mind it's the certainty in myself that I possess which allows me to have that kind of mercy or compassion. There's no wavering on that point. It's fixed like the stars. The fact is I'm never gonna be killed! So remember this: mercy and compassion are virtues that only the strong are privileged to possess. And I am strong.
author: Claire Stanfield

quote: The power of one man doesn't amount to much. But, however little strength I'm capable of, I'll do everything humanly possible to protect the people I love, and in turn they will protect the ones they love. It seems like the least we tiny humans can do for each other.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: There's no need to change the past. Because of the past we are who we are now. Every second, every action from then is linked to us here and now.
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: I have no parents, and I'm not a product of love. Therefore, I can't understand what a 'good wife' is. Even so... the love he gave me is my entire world. No one can humiliate that.
author: Irisviel von Einzbern

quote: Why is it that when humans regret the decision based on a misunderstanding they feel resentment toward the other party?
author: Kyubee

quote: You are calm and composed. You are able to see through things clearly at this age. You are outstanding. And... Always being able to make the correct judgments, not falling into darkness. Outstanding. "That won't do", "This is wrong". You reject any number of paths... Choosing your path with cynicism. What do you want to do? How are you going to do it? What is your motive? Where do you want to move forward to? Say it. Hmm? Fine. Then stick to the ground forever to move forward, you creep. You little coward who can only move forward by using the method of elimination. Until you found something to reject... You shall just lie on the ground helplessly.
author: Little Demon

quote: I won't die no matter what. That's what I believe, so stay silent and believe in me. I am a guy who will never die.
author: Claire Stanfield

quote: Oh, life is fun! Try sayin' that ten times fast ten thousand times a minute every day for the rest of your life and it'll screw with your head so bad that all problems will disappear like MAGIC! Okay okay okay, I've gotten past the sadness and as of now I'm evolving to a HIGHER STAAAATE! Right? Tell me you all think so! Life is a magnificent beast, and it excites me!
author: Graham Specter

quote: I can see the ending!
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Our lives were real! Not a single moment of them were fake! Everyone lived the best they could! We carved those memories into ourselves! Memories of living as hard as we could! No matter what kind they were, they're the life we led! Erasing them in the blink of an eye like that... Wasn't your life also real to you?!
author: Yuzuru Otonashi

quote: There is always a chance of success, and if there isn't any, I'll just have to make one.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: I don't think it's possible to save everyone. I just want to save as many as I can.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: I only have one chance to have my life, and it's right here. It's the only life I have. This is my life. I can't give it to anyone else, It can't be stolen, I can't force it on anyone, or forget it, or make it disappear, or trample on it, or laugh it away, or beautify it. I have no choice but to accept this one cruel, meaningless life! That's why I will fight, and why I will continue fighting.
author: Yuri Nakamura

quote: Celebrating Mr. Jesus's birthday (Christmas) was fun, why don't we celebrate Buddha's and Muhammad's birthday next time?
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: That's why people hesitate. In front of all the choices, one could lose hope and try to run away, because no excuse could be used. No matter how dangerous the long journey in life was, or how one admits to being dealt the short end of the stick, everything was the result of one's own choices, it was a road chosen by oneself. Even if this path is hard, and there's no chance of changing past choices, one cannot place the blame on other people. No matter how angry or frustrated one was, one would be alone on that path, for no one to replace you.
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: This world is mine. I think this world may even just be a long, long dream I'm watching. You guys may just be illusions, and it can't be proven whether or not you really exist either. In other words, this world was created with me at the center. So what will happen if I die? I don't know. My imagination isn't very creative
author: Claire Stanfield

quote: I dreamed that you were a dog. And the dog was my husband. Anyway, it was the worst dream ever.
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: If the results come true, it's as if there's only one future. If it fails, we can think that other futures exist... I want to believe that in our future there are many possibilities waiting.
author: Fujibayashi Kyou

quote: You get free hatred for everything you sell. I've amassed a real supply of it, so I'd like to sell it too... But no one wants to buy it from me!
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: Don't be upset because of what you can't do. Do what you do best, live as carefree and optimistically as you can, because some people aren't able to do that.
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Well, I'd better get back to my seat. The unmarried woman with her unmarried face is about to come to start the unmarried homeroom.
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: Even if we forget the faces of our friends, We will never forget the bonds that were carved into our souls.
author: Yuzuru Otonashi

quote: I only joined this war to avoid spilling rivers of blood. Fight for the Holy Grail, no meaningless bloodshed, minimize sacrifices, one person taking up the mission of fate instead of armies of men and competing here! This is what we Servants should do.
author: Saber

quote: You should know. Your wish will not come true unless there is a clear evil. Even if it's not something you approve of, a hero of justice requires a villain to defeat.
author: Kotomine Kirei

quote: Reality is just a crappy game!
author: Keima Katsuragi

quote: Anything edible is acceptable. Extravagance is our enemy.
author: Saber

quote: Strength isn't just about winning. Even if my attempts are pathetic and comical, and even if I'm covered in the mud of my defeat, if I can keep fighting and look up at the sky as I lie on the ground, that alone is proof of true strength!
author: Haruyuki Arita

quote: The world as it is, the human nature as always, it is impossible to eliminate battles. In the end, killing is necessarily evil. If so, it is best to end them in the maximum efficiency and at the least cost, least time. If you want to slander that as foul and demean that as nasty, then do as you wish. Justice can not save the world. I have no interest with things like that.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: No one knows what the right decision, to make in life, is, and that is not why I made this choice.
author: Tetsuya Kuroko

quote: In the battlefield, there is no place for hope. What lies there is only cold despair and a sin called victory, built on the pain of the defeated. All those people who met there have wholeheartedly admitted the evil and foolishness of this act called war. As long as people don't repent and don't regard it as the most evil taboo, then hell will endlessly reappear in the world.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: Conflict is humanity's primal instinct. Eliminating it would mean eliminating humanity itself.
author: Kotomine Kirei

quote: Justice cannot save the world. It is useless.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: Up until now, have you not faced the same enemies as I? That means you are my friend! So hold your chest high, and consider yourself my equal.
author: Rider

quote: If you truly want to continue escaping from everyday life, you've no other choice but to keep evolving. No matter whether you're aiming higher or lower.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: If you make fiction just as valuable as reality, then any reality you don't need can be a delusion.
author: Erika Karisawa

quote: I don't have have much time. It's not that I'm busy, but I'm only willing to give you about two and a half more minutes of my life!
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: I don't believe in god. There's no proof he exists. In a world where there isn't even proof of the future, the past exists. Even if it's tainted with misunderstandings and delusions, if the people themselves believe in it, the past is the truth to them. And, if you base your actions or your life around it, in a way, it's a type of god itself.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: I don't have the strength or wisdom to stand up against someone who is insusceptible to reason. You won't even give me time to make an effort. That's why I'm going to rely on numbers!
author: Ryuugamine Mikado

quote: Reality is such a pain. And for those of us who get fed up with that kind of reality, we simply choose to make a new one. We create little walls, and separate the trash from the stuff we like, and when that's all done we keep the things we care about and kick the rest to the curb. You'd be amazed how well it works! A whole world made out of just moe, tsundere, and BL, it's the best discovery ever! If you ask me, that really is the best way to separate reality, from fiction.
author: Erika Karisawa

quote: Well, hurting girls isn't one of my hobbies. That's why I'll make it my hobby... to stomp on their cell phones. Hahahahahaha!
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Our hearts beat in the same rhythm, so why does time flow differently for the two of us?
author: Saya Otonashi

quote: I've always been asking myself this question. Am I a memory? or is the memory... ME? Are we nothing but a collection of memories?
author: Motoharu Yano

quote: If I hadn't met you, I never would have realized what kind of person I am. I would have grown into an apathetic, clueless, obedient adult. However, after spending time with you, in tears, laughter, and anger, I now know that I have all these emotions inside me, too. And that makes me proud. I'm glad to have known you.
author: Sion

quote: I find myself hard to understand sometimes.
author: Eru Chitanda

quote: Now you know what fear does to you. In the face of death you thought.
author: Kasper Hekmatyar

quote: Madoka. My only friend... If... If it's for your sake... I don't mind being locked in this eternal maze!
author: Homura Akemi

quote: If you want to protect humans and remain human, you shouldn't throw away your feelings, no matter how painful it is.
author: Tsuchimiya Garaku

quote: So how about we become monsters together?.. And turn this world upside down? So that... nothing bad... or sad... would remain. Destroy, destroy, destroy it all!
author: Homura Akemi

quote: I don't want... to run away by myself. Because no matter what, I'd rather be together with everyone...
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: How can a snake fly? It's not even a man!
author: Elfman Strauss

quote: I never rely on luck. It's all my own choice. It leads me to the future.
author: Kagura Mikazuchi

quote: I hate the word "fate." Birth, encounters, partings, success and failures, fortune and misfortunes in life. If our lives are already set in stone by fate, then why are we even born? There are those born to wealthy families, those born to beautiful mothers, and those born into the middle of war or poverty. If that's all caused by fate, then God is incredibly unfair and cruel. Because, ever since that day, none of us had a future and the only certain thing was that we wouldn't amount to anything...
author: Takakura Shouma

quote: Make a contract with me, and become a magical girl!
author: Kyubee

quote: Even though I've lost my way, I will save you.
author: Homura Akemi

quote: My companions make my heart strong. If I'm fighting for those I love, I care not what happens to this body.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: I love the word "fate". Because, you know how they talk about "fated encounters"? A single encounter can completely change your life. Such special encounters are not just coincidences. They're definitely... fate. Of course, life is not all happy encounters. There are many painful, sad moments. But this is what I think: sad and painful things definitely happen for a reason. Nothing in this world is pointless.
author: Ringo Oginome

quote: Kindness can bring you even bigger troubles.
author: Homura Akemi

quote: In our culture, the phenomena known as emotion is considered a mental disorder.
author: Kyubee

quote: Repeat. I'll repeat it for however many times I have to. Until I find the only way out.
author: Homura Akemi

quote: If you ever feel like dying to help the universe, just let me know. I'll be waiting.
author: Kyubee

quote: Miracles aren't free. When you wish for hope, it creates an equivalent despair. That's how the balance of this world is preserved.
author: Sakura Kyouko

quote: It's all useless.
author: Homura Akemi

quote: We're fighting for our own wishes. It's normal not to get noticed or remembered.
author: Homura Akemi

quote: As long as you laugh at people's suffering, your goal will always be out of reach. If you never want to be defeated, you must first learn your own weakness, and always be kind.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: You need to learn how to make mistakes before you grow up. When you are young, you can recover quickly when hurt. When you get older it's harder to make mistakes. The more responsibilities, the less mistakes you are allowed to make.
author: Junko Kaname

quote: Listen up, you lowlifes who will never amount to anything!
author: Himari Takakura

quote: Why are people born? If people are born only to suffer the hard life, is it meant as some kind of punishment? Or a cynical joke? If that's the case, animals that adhere to the survival strategies programmed in their DNA are far more elegant and simple. If there really is an existence worthy of being called a God, I want to ask him just one thing: Is there really fate in the universe? If a man ignored fate, and ignored his instincts and DNA to love someone else... Dear God, is he really human? Just wondering. I hate the word "fate".
author: Kanba Takakura

quote: With kindness comes naivete. Courage becomes foolhardiness. And dedication has no reward. If you can't accept any of that, you are not fit to be a magical girl.
author: Homura Akemi

quote: If you're just living for your own sake, it's all up to you. No hard feelings. No regrets.
author: Sakura Kyouko

quote: If someone says it's wrong to hope, I will tell them that they're wrong every time. I could tell them that countless times!
author: Madoka Kaname

quote: That's when I realized! That I had become a child who would be found. So I broke into tears of happiness. No matter how far we're separated, you two would definitely find me. It's nice knowing someone will find you.
author: Himari Takakura

quote: I shall grieve, and I shall weep. But I shall never regret.
author: Rider

quote: Glory lies beyond the horizon. Challenge it because it is unreachable. Speak of conquest and demonstrate it.
author: Rider

quote: Protect the one thing you want to protect until the very end.
author: Sakura Kyouko

quote: I don't regret using my wish for another's sake. If I regret my decision now, the feelings upon which it was based will be for naught.
author: Sayaka Miki

quote: It sucks, but you can't reach a happy ending just by doing what's right all the time. Actually, the more people get stubborn and insist they're in the right, the further away happiness gets.
author: Junko Kaname

quote: Those who hurt her, put her in danger, those who caused her misfortune, I eliminate them. Even if the cause is me.
author: Isayama Yomi

quote: Killing one man won't change anything. Kill every last person in the world. If you could do that, it might be possible.
author: Kaminski Natalia

quote: There's nothing happy about having your fate decided for you! You have to grab your own happiness!
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Weaklings will stay weak forever. But weakness is not evil, since human beings are weak creatures to begin with. Alone, you feel nothing but insecurity
author: Makarov Dreyar

quote: In this world, guns are always within arm's reach, and sadly they are more trustworthy than kindness.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: Whatever you do, enjoy it to the fullest. That is the secret of life.
author: Rider

quote: A cowardly thief would sneak away in the night
author: Rider

quote: Choosing your calling based solely on your talents won't always guarantee you happiness.
author: Kaminski Natalia

quote: All men are jealous and stupid, and all women are stupid to be happy about it, idiots are everywhere you look!
author: Horo

quote: What I want isn't money or pretty dresses, but a place that recognizes me as who I am. Fairy Tail is my other family, and it is a far more warming family than here!
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Did you not understand? All dreams eventually disappear when the dreamers wake.
author: Gilgamesh

quote: God loves human virtues like courage and hope, but he loves screams, blood and despair just as much!
author: Ryuunosuke Uryuu

quote: Even peaceful people, given a gun, can go crazy. Afterwards they can't even understand what led them to do it.
author: Johnathan Mar

quote: Your darkness...I will...seal it...
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: The Santa that showed up at my Kindergarden Christmas festival? I knew he was fake. And I never saw Mommy kissing Santa Claus, either. But I have to say, even as a little kid I knew better to believe in some old man who worked only one day a year.
author: Kyon

quote: Whether fairies have tails or not, or whether they even exist, nobody knows for sure. So it's like an eternal mystery, an eternal adventure.
author: Makarov Dreyar

quote: When the hunger seemed to kill me, I was wondering if the world hates me. I can't explain it, but I still love the world.
author: Johnathan Mar

quote: There are times in a man's life when he must STRIP
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: There are people in this world that enjoy being alone, but there isn't a single person who can bear solitude.
author: Makarov Dreyar

quote: Someone who could shed tears for their friends... could never be rejected from Fairy Tail!
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Modern-day saints carry assault rifles, and spread the word of God with their bullets.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: Sometimes you can't see what's right in front of you.
author: Ryuunosuke Uryuu

quote: What you speak of at greatest length is what interests you the most.
author: Gilgamesh

quote: If you do evil out of a hatred for evil, that rage and hate will merely birth new conflict.
author: Saber

quote: Kindness is weakness. Your weakness will delay the trigger by a moment. This world doesn't treat kindness kindly.
author: Koko Hekmatyar

quote: You're useless, Lucy. You can't understand a woman's heart.
author: Happy

quote: No one can decide what someone else should do with their life.
author: Makarov Dreyar

quote: What we call the human heart... It's such a mystery, isn't it?
author: Irisviel von Einzbern

quote: Fear isn't evil, it only allows us to learn our own weaknesses. When we learn our weakness, people can grow stronger and kinder.
author: Gildarts Clive

quote: Ice can even stop the time of life itself. So, you'll never be able to catch up, for eternity. You'll always be stuck there, staring at the fairy's tail.
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: You're as good as naked before my spear.
author: Lancer

quote: Being alive...is a sign of strength!
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: We cannot go back to the past, no matter how hard we try. No matter how wonderful it was. The past is nothing but the past.
author: Eikichi Onizuka

quote: Darkness. When everything that you know and love is taken away from you so harshly. All you can think about is anger, hatred and even revenge. And no one can save you.
author: Orochimaru

quote: Never look at your life as something insignificant. Never forget those friends of yours that you loved.
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: I'm the tomato box fairy!
author: North Italy

quote: But that's why I can't let myself be weighed down by fuckin' regrets. A bitch lives as free as a bird that can never be caught.
author: Anarchy Panty

quote: He turned a room full of strangers into a room full of enemies with just one sentence.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: If you were to turn into a snake tomorrow and began devouring humans, and from the same mouth you devoured humans, you cried out to me, "I Love You!" Would I still be able to say "I Love You," the same way I do today?
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: Perhaps living without sin is a sin in itself.
author: Furude Rika

quote: It's difficult to like me when I'm being myself.
author: Ami Kawashima

quote: I'm a half-demon, more egotistical and greedy than any other living creature — that's what human beings are, right?.. But with human blood flowing through my veins, I never give up! Don't you understand? When you have someone to protect, your power increases multifold!
author: Inuyasha

quote: A terrible premonition can bring about a terrible reality.
author: Ryougi Shiki

quote: But our world as we knew it had already been completely destroyed.
author: Takashi Komuro

quote: The big secret to breaking the rules is to make it look as though you're following them.
author: Johann Liebert

quote: When you're in the darkness, you only sink deeper into it. Keep the light shining.
author: Kenzo Tenma

quote: The strong one doesn't win. The one who wins is strong.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Your name sounds like an air conditioner.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Spoiling stories... is an unforgivable sin in this world.
author: Leo Baskerville

quote: Forget about revenge, and live on.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: The trees cry out as they die, but you cannot hear them. I lie here. I listen to the pain of the forest and feel the ache of the bullet in my chest and dream of the day when I will finally crunch that gun woman's head in my jaws... She is my daughter. One of the wolf tribe. When the forest dies, so does she. I caught her human parents defiling my forest. They threw their baby at my feet as they ran away. Instead of eating her, I raised her as my own. Now my poor, ugly, beautiful daughter is neither human nor wolf.
author: Moro

quote: There is nothing left to believe in.
author: Vicious

quote: Please don't worry, Mister, I only came here to obliterate you – not rob you.
author: Excel

quote: If you want to know the truth, you must have the courage to accept it.
author: Bear

quote: Just as planets seek the light of a star and circle around it, I was a planet that sought the light of a pure star. Even the moon can't shine by itself. It shines so brightly because it reflects light from the sun.
author: Takada

quote: Just killing time until the world ends.
author: Furude Rika

quote: But I have a fear stronger than the fear of losing. It's the fear of boredom. I fear those days full of boredom.
author: Berserker

quote: Is it painful to be the person who waits? Or is it more painful to be the person who makes others wait? Either way, there's no need to wait anymore. That's what is most painful.
author: Takada

quote: In the end of that lonely path you are going, there is nothing.
author: Fuurinji Hayato

quote: For you I will go deeper than mountains, and higher than sea.
author: Apachai

quote: Hope and passion slip through your fingers like sand.
author: Takada

quote: Give a kid a smoke and he'll be happy for a day. Teach him how to smoke... he'll be happy for his whole shortened life.
author: Eikichi Onizuka

quote: Miwako, George is Bi. He is gender blind.
author: Daisuke Yamamoto

quote: I'm not a genuine idiot like you! I'm an idiot who accepts the fact that he's an idiot!
author: Aoba Kouyou

quote: You were always smiling, real friendly like, but the way you smiled was so empty it hurt to watch you.
author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood

quote: Listen up numbskull, if Kasumi isn't back by dinnertime, we're gonna have to eat Akane's cooking, and if we do that, man oh man we're gonna wish we were lost at sea!
author: Ranma Saotome

quote: The ocean is so salty because everyone pees in it.
author: Son Goku

quote: If I get reincarnated... I wanna become a clam.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: [Onizuka's p*nis is bit by a snake]Someone. Suck the poison out! ...Fuyutsuki-chan! I beg you! Suck it out quickly!
author: Eikichi Onizuka

quote: Listen midget! I'm going to curse you and make you shrink 1 cm everyday, and in only 156 days you'll vanish completely!!
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: When you're in high school you should be doing things, about which you could never tell your parents!
author: Kurosaki Isshin

quote: It's a simple formula. The greater the tragedy, the greater the emotional effect.
author: Legato Bluesummers

quote: Why don't we drink to me and my reflection in your lovely eyes?
author: Andy Von De Oniyate

quote: You know, Nana... Even now, sometimes on street corners... when I meet someone, I see your shadow. I'm sure that even now, you're still wearing that man's cologne... so you can sleep, even alone...
author: Nana Osaki

quote: A woman's happiness is in throwing everything away to live for love.
author: Daisuke Yamamoto

quote: Kuwabara, come back! You're like an ugly singer with a good voice, best for backup!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Laugh at love and love will make you cry.
author: Yasushi Takagi

quote: Once, there was a tiger striped cat. This cat, died a million deaths, revived and lived a million lives. And he had various owners that he didn't really care about, the cat wasn't afraid to die. Then ONE day, he met a white female cat, the two of them fell in love and lived together happily. Well, the years went by and the white female cat got old and passed away. The Tiger Striped cat cried a million times, then he also died. But this time.....he didn't come back.
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: Urameshi, I'm gonna mess your face up so bad that kittens won't even look at you.
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: The reward for ambition too great... is self destruction.
author: Guts

quote: Stop rushing me. I want to take my time falling in love with you.
author: Koizumi George

quote: People say love can be developed, but in the end the only person they love is themselves, that's why you choose to love someone who can please you the most.
author: Takumi Ichinose

quote: Every moment hesitated is a moment gone from life.
author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood

quote: *аfter a customer tells Tamaki she's afraid that her father will yell at her if she drinks this* What if I let you drink it from my mouth?
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: People bring the small flames of their wishes together... since they don't want to extinguish the small flame... they'll bring that small flame to a bigger fire. A big flame named Griffith. But you know... I didn't bring a flame with me. I think I just stopped by to warm myself by the bonfire.
author: Guts

quote: Whenever I look at you, I'm reminded about everything I hate about myself. It hurts.
author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood

quote: Things that don't change go extinct.
author: Milly Ashford

quote: However, I do know one guy who whines, cries, and throws tantrums but still manages to save everyone. He's a crazy man who's not afraid of anything. Even though he's been scarred from head to toe, he'll always be there.
author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood

quote: Everyone has a right to pursue a happy life. The difficult part is to be given that right.
author: Frederica Bernkastel

quote: I... Despise the way you fight. Without ever lifting your own hand... To steal bonds of camraderie and torture opponents is the height of cowardice. It is a lack of shame deserving of death. I am here. Strike me down. I shall kill you and cast you aside... Before you finish swinging your blade.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Welcome home. Thank you for your great efforts.
author: Komui Lee

quote: Uh, sorry... I forgot I'm supposed to airsit, I mean babybend, I-i mean babysit the kids.
author: Korra

quote: We believe that God exists. And he exists because we exist.
author: Itsuki Koizumi

quote: A Gun is Good. Unlike A sword or a knife, it doesn't leave the feeling of a person dying in your hands.
author: Riza Hawkeye

quote: You think you can just escape? Walk out of this world like it's some bad movie? It's too easy to make like a bird. To flap your wings as you chicken out after causing all these problems. The tough part's walking. Taking what comes along and walking right through it. That's what real people do.
author: Eikichi Onizuka

quote: A man who inflicts suffering can't rest. His guilty mind won't allow it. But today, I can finally close my eyes to the living nightmare. And lay down, knowing that I won't wake again.
author: Scar

quote: I already lost this life. I do not intend to stretch it out at the cost of my honor.
author: Jean

quote: Happiness is hot chocolate on a cold day.
author: Nanami Takahashi

quote: The thread of human hope is spun with the flax of sorrow.
author: Kaworu Nagisa

quote: True Change cannot be made if it is bound by laws and limitations, predictions and imagination.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Normal? What's normal? To only do what the masses do? And what is the benefit of that? Where is the problem in adopting a custom that is "abnormal" if it has no negative effect on the world at large?
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: A brat who is afraid to be hurt isn't qualified to love someone.
author: Eikichi Onizuka

quote: There are many unusual things in this world. Everyday events occur that cannot be explained. Bizarre phenomena that often go unnoticed because people close their eyes to what they don't understand. But the truth of the matter is, there are many unusual things in this world. And people... People are the most mysterious of them all.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: My own mother thought I was a monster. She was right of course... but it still hurt.
author: Azula

quote: Actually... Ponytails turn me on... that ponytail you had back then, it looked so good it was criminal!
author: Kyon

quote: If dying is the only way to get my freedom... Then I'm willing to die right now. And then I'll stop caring about people around me. Because they didn't care about me from the very start anyway.
author: Aoyagi Ritsuka

quote: What does a view from a high place remind you of? The impulse you feel when you look down at the world you live in. A violent cognition that attacks you even if you refuse it. An emotion created by an overlooking view - That's "far". The scenery you see from a high place is magnificent. Even an ordinary landscape looks beautiful. But a vision that's too large creates a boundary between you and the world. It's more correct for you to recognize the large world you see as the world you live in rather than as the small space around you. But you can't feel that you're living in this big world no matter how hard you try.Your reasoning, represented by your knowledge, and your experience, respresented by your realization, will crash against each other. And eventually, you will lose yourself and confusion will begin. And then you will fall. Vision is not what your eyes see, but an image that your brain comprehends. Our vision is protected by our common sense. Humans cannot live outside their box... under normal circumstances.
author: Aozaki Touko

quote: My eyes can see the death of everything. I can cut the lines as long as I understand the death behind it. This means I can kill anything, even if that thing is God.
author: Ryougi Shiki

quote: After all.. love is all about timing. If you don't say the right thing at the right moment, no matter how much fate was involved in the relationship, everything will be ruined. Even if you regret it, it'll be too late.
author: Masafumi Takeuchi

quote: As time passes, the day will come when everything will fade to memories. But, those miraculous days, when you and I along with everyone else, searched together for just one thing... will continue revolving forever. Somewhere deep in my heart as my bittersweet memory.
author: Yuuta Takemoto

quote: Now that I think about it, I really didn't understand anything back then. Neither what it meant to pray for a miracle...nor the price of one.
author: Sayaka Miki

quote: Even if Hell is where we're headed. You people might not have found it, but we're going to. We will find Paradise.
author: Tsume

quote: I've got nowhere to go back to. So all I can do is move forward.
author: Kiba

quote: There are three things I hate the most: Kids, pets, and women with attitude. So tell me, why do we have all of them packed into our ship!?
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: *points to Jet*Don't give me that art of war crap! And you!*points to the other man*You take too long to take a sh*t!
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: Hey! Sameji, why don't we give Takkun a little preview of forbidden lesbian love?
author: Haruko Haruhara

quote: Oh great, it's a kid! I thought I was rescuing a babe, a luscious damsel in distress, not some flat chested little girl.
author: Gourry Gabriev

quote: This is the impenetrable wall of Jericho third child. Take one step over this wall, and you will be a dead man.
author: Souryuu Asuka Langley

quote: I don't wanna live a thousand years. If I just live through today, that'll be enough.
author: Portgas D. Ace

quote: As long as I exist, I don't care if there's hell, or if only suffering exists there.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: The country? the skies? You can have them. I'm busy just protecting what's right in front of me. I don't know what'll happen to me in the future, but if something has fallen at my feet, then the least I can do is pick it up.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: He made three requests. That I protect him and never betray him until he obtains his revenge. That I obey his orders unconditionally. And that I would never lie... to him.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: The melody of logic always plays the notes of truth.
author: Ayumi Narumi

quote: Because the sight of your beautiful smile causes the fountain inside of me to start overflowing.
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: You can train a dog with food. You can buy a person with money. But there isn't a man alive able to influence the wolves of Mibu! Some things will never change. A wolf will always be a wolf.
author: Hajime Saitou

quote: Perhaps the distant part of the sky always seems clearest, so that we will always strive to reach it.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: Killed in action and promoted two ranks for it. Brigadier General Hughes. You were the guy who was supposed to work below me and to push me to the top. Then you get yourself killed and surpass me in the ranks. I don't know what's more absurd, You or the State.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: There are things people can't accept, even if they do understand them.
author: Athrun Zala

quote: And while you're waiting for us to kill you, we highly recommend p!$$!ng yourself, Followed by a course of praying to your impudent god. And cowarding in the corner and begging, always good. But if you act now, there's still time for an old-fashioned suicide!! Thank you London! We love you! Goodnight!
author: Jan Valentine

quote: Your grievance shall be avenged.
author: Ai Enma

quote: No matter how strong, for a human to fight a monster means he has submerged his humanity and transformed himself into a greater monster.
author: Schierke

quote: Our names are given to us by God. I have betrayed God, and so I no longer have a name.
author: Scar

quote: People who sin say that they had to... had to survive. People who sin say that it's too late to stop now. The shadow called Sin dogs them steadily from behind, silently, without a word. Remorse and Agony are repeated, only to end up at Despair. But what sinners don't know, or what they have forgotten, is that there is a light, a light which keeps shining on them ever so warmly. A light that will never fade.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: A dog's happiness is measured by how useful he is to his master.
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: What else would I be here for? To illegally enter the premises, of course.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: However, as always, this girl was thinking up all sorts of nonsensical stuff. I can't help but wonder if there's a black hole inside her head, since her common sense seems to come from a different universe altogether.
author: Kyon

quote: A localized, non-corrosive amalgamation of asynchronous space is independently occurring in restricted condition mode.
author: Yuki Nagato

quote: What a terrible story. But appropriate for our world. Sometimes I feel like I'm walking over a giant pile of shit. Morality and justice don't really suit me. Words like that and what comes out of asses are surprisingly similar.
author: Revy

quote: Missy, could you please lend me your underwear?
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: When will the war end? When someone wins.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: So many faces looking like they're thinking even though they're not. So disgusting.
author: Anemone

quote: They say the tongue is the root of all misfortune.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: It's absurd to think your life won't have a meaning unless you leave some work behind. Just living is enough.
author: Shinobu Morita

quote: Don't tell me he wants to conquer the world? Can't he come up with something more original?
author: Lina Inverse

quote: I'll get what I want... even if I have to steal it.
author: Rue Kuroha

quote: I'm the one who's in the wrong, so if you really want to break someone's nose, break mine.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: I'll never forget that you wasted three minutes of my life.
author: Barnaby Brooks Jr.

quote: There isn't just one truth out there, everyone carries their own form of it
author: Frau

quote: If I described him in one word, it'd be di*k[beep]!
author: Chika Akatsuki

quote: Wasted effort is one of the privileges of the youth.
author: Undertaker

quote: I was born to end up alone.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: If we fight again... We're both gonna die.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Your best friend is a... polar bear dog. Somehow that makes perfect sense.
author: Mako

quote: But what's important isn't the Magic, it's the heart of the wielder who uses it.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Does it hurt? Relish the taste, because it is going to be the last sensation you feel in this life.
author: Asakura Ryouko

quote: You guys are so small...
author: Hao Asakura

quote: I don't remember saying that I would kill you because I'm a Soul Reaper. The reason I am killing you is simple. It's because you aimed your blade at my only pride.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Nothing you or your friends say will affect my life in any way, shape, or form.
author: Jinta Yadomi

quote: When I told him my feelings, he understood. When I said I wasn't lying, he believed me.
author: Sawako Kuronuma

quote: The moment a soldier dons his uniform, he accepts that he might be buried in it.
author: King Bradley

quote: Huh?!? Aliens!? What kind of a person believes in aliens anyway?! I know. A STUPID ONE.
author: Maebara Keiichi

quote: I never feel more human than when I'm fighting real monsters.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: If you have time to think of a beautiful end, then live beautifully until the end.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Look straight at the people you kill
author: Solf J. Kimblee

quote: The gush from my fountain of wisdom told me.
author: Victorique de Blois

quote: C'mon, there is no such thing as gross stuff in this world...  Except for GROSSLY CUTE things.
author: Fuura Kafuka

quote: So she knows how to smile.
author: Kento Miura

quote: He feared sleep. He'd say that his soul would slip down into nothing. They say that man never dreamt after the day he cut his pillow.
author: Ginko

quote: I'm sorry, but I never lose to the same opponent twice.
author: Fuji Shuusuke

quote: We are perfect for each other! She's strong, I'm strong. She's fun, I'm fun. She's beautiful... I'm GORGEOUS!
author: Bolin

quote: Sooo... Korra. There they go, here we are, all alone in the gym... just you and me... TWO, alone people. Together. Alone.
author: Bolin

quote: There's no such thing as a perfect person in this world.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: So, are you stupid enough to fall for such a stupid trap that such stupid people set up?
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: What good is this cursed hand if I can't protect the woman I love?
author: Miroku

quote: I have no use for a religion that's been forsaken by its own god.
author: Maes Hughes

quote: Even a piece of garbage has its pride.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Everyone's gonna die. It's a natural part of life. But if life has no purpose, you're dead already.
author: Kiba

quote: Let's just say... what's mine is mine, and what's yours... is also mine.
author: Hajime Saitou

quote: Why is it?.. I'm so sad and so lonely. But the tears just won't come.
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Dreams start by believing.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: You can only disgrace the dead so much.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I don't care if it is fortunate or unfortunate that Light picked up the Death Note. However... It is generally bad luck for a person to be followed by a God of Death.
author: Ryuk

quote: To defeat evil, I shall become an even GREATER evil.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: That's interesting. Don't do it again.
author: Eucliwood Hellscythe

quote: If you want to change, don't wait for someone else to make it happen. Do it yourself.
author: Kawai Maria

quote: The weaker you are the louder you bark.
author: Tenten

quote: When you're old, all you want to do is stare at the scenery. It's so strange. I've never felt so peaceful before.
author: Sophie Hatter

quote: That's all it is: information. Even a simulated experience or a dream
author: Batou

quote: I feel confined, only free to expand myself within boundaries.
author: Motoko Kusanagi

quote: *to Sophie* You're wearing that hat? After all the magic I used to make your dress pretty?
author: Howl

quote: Playing is more important. You can work any time.
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: If we all reacted the same way, we'd be predictable, and there's always more than one way to view a situation. What's true for the group is also true for the individual. It's simple: overspecialize, and you breed in weakness. It's slow death.
author: Motoko Kusanagi

quote: Sometimes violence is the only way to get the message across.
author: Eikichi Onizuka

quote: But am I... am I normal? I have strength. I can kill with my bare hands. I bleed red, but the pain always goes away quickly. Sometimes I see things in my head that never happened. I am a cyborg. I'll never be useful as anything else.
author: Henrietta

quote: It's a bad habit of mine. When I concentrate on one thing, I forget other important things.
author: Tsukushi Makino

quote: Why do you get so cold when you're old? I'm fatter than ever, and yet, the wind blows right through me.
author: Sophie Hatter

quote: If you think about it, death really isn't so frightening. Who knows, you might actually enjoy it.
author: Karasu

quote: I will slay all my enemies.
author: Van Fanel

quote: Babies aren't born after just 5 months!
author: Riza Hawkeye

quote: Don't you want to hang out and waste your life with us?
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: How could I forget? He's into dead girls.
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: Only a fool refuses a woman who offers herself.
author: Inuyasha

quote: Stop Whining! All I did was cut off your stupid legs! Summon your demons! Transform yourself! Regenerate your legs! Stand up! Pick up your gun and attack me! Do something! The night is still so young, and the real fun is yet to start! Hurry, hurry, hurry, HURRY!!!
author: Alucard

quote: I am literally hemorrhaging generosity.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Fishing is a life and death struggle between man and fish. Forget this and you will most certainly get hurt.
author: Mugen

quote: Like I always say, can't find a door? Make your own.
author: Edward Elric

quote: People can have lovers. They can have friends. They can be together. But when you think about it, you'll see that originally, we're alone.
author: Nana Osaki

quote: Religion, ideology, resources, land, spite, love or just because. No matter how pathetic the reason, it's enough to start a war.
author: Pain

quote: One guy's killed for killing another and then he's killed for killing him. How is that kind of twisted thinking ever gonna bring us peace?
author: Cagalli Yula Athha

quote: I'm not defined by my abilities alone.
author: Kira Yamato

quote: Human nature pursues strife.
author: Pain

quote: I can't develop feelings. That's how most idiots screw up.
author: Light Yagami

quote: You got two legs and a heart beat. What's stopping you?
author: Inuyasha

quote: You're a strange one, all right. But having pride doesn't count for much if you're dead, you know?
author: Hige

quote: What you see isn't necessarily reality. Everyone has secrets, things they feel that they can't tell anyone. There's no such thing as a normal person.
author: Celty Sturluson

quote: Thanks for such a boring time, it was a blast!
author: Sohma Hiro

quote: The thing that we call power is dynamic, it keeps on changing.
author: Yasutora Sado

quote: Now I got some common sense for you,if I wore a tie, it wouldn't change who I am, if I had no piercings it wouldn't mean I'm nice, and if my hair was black it wouldn't stop me from kicking your ass!
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: Dammit! I'm fine, I just stepped in a hole.
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: Have you ever realized how insignificant your existence is on the planet?
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: All the girls in Konoha are so hot these days.
author: Jiraiya

quote: She beat me like I owed her money.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: I'm getting a litte bored of this curse of yours Ashitaka just let me cut the damn thing off.
author: Lady Eboshi

quote: Those who are bound, are bound wherever they go. And those who are free, are always free. Whoever you serve and wherever you live, if they are your own choices, you are free.
author: Sanada Yukimura

quote: The key is to be like the leaf, flow... with the movement of the gates. Airbending is all about spiral movements. When you meet resistance, you must be able to switch directions at a moments notice.
author: Tenzin

quote: You're the only ones who are gonna need a hospital. And for your sake, I hope there's one near by.
author: Korra

quote: Her sword shines, a dream that all warriors  scattered in battle, past, present, and future, hold and mournfully exalt as their final moments approach. She carries their will as her pride, bidding them to remain steadfast in their loyalty.
author: Irisviel von Einzbern

quote: A soul naturally seeks pleasure, consciously or not.
author: Gilgamesh

quote: What must triumph here is the knight's path of chivalry that we champion. Is that not so, Heroic Spirit Arturia?
author: Lancer

quote: The weight of my sword is the weight of my pride. The wound from my battle with you is an honor, not a fetter.
author: Saber

quote: Heroic Spirits... I want you to find a path to victory.
author: Rider

quote: Are you selling soup or donkey piss?
author: Jigo

quote: Well, I give up. Can't win against fools.
author: Jigo

quote: Ashitaka... can you save the girl you love?
author: Moro

quote: That curse will spread throughout your whole body, bone and flesh alike and finally kill you. Now leave this place at sunrise. Return and *I* shall kill you.
author: Moro

quote: Life is suffering. It is hard. The world is cursed. But still you find reasons to keep living.
author: Lady Eboshi

quote: You see everyone wants everything, that's the way the world is. But I just might actually get it.
author: Jigo

quote: Well, they say that happy women make a happy village.
author: Prince Ashitaka

quote: When you're going to kill a god, let someone else do your dirty work.
author: Jigo

quote: These days, there are angry ghosts all around us. Dead from wars, sickness, starvation, and nobody cares. So - you say you're under a curse. So what, so's the whole damn world.
author: Jigo

quote: Cut off a wolf's head and it still has the power to bite.
author: Lady Eboshi

quote: Now watch closely, everyone. I'm going to show you how to kill a god. A god of life and death. The trick is not to fear him.
author: Lady Eboshi

quote: *referring to his curse* Look, everyone! This is what hatred looks like! This is what it does when it catches hold of you! It's eating me alive, and very soon now it will kill me! Fear and anger only make it grow faster!
author: Prince Ashitaka

quote: Ugh! I smell like a human.
author: Moro

quote: *when Lady Eboshi asks him what he's here for* To see with eyes unclouded by hate.
author: Prince Ashitaka

quote: Ah, you're awake. I was hoping you'd cry out in your sleep, then I would have bitten your head off to silence you.
author: Moro

quote: Never beg and earn by winning or else you won't get anything.
author: Renton Thurston

quote: Hundreds of gallons of blood from all the people I've killed in the past, have seeped into this body.
author: Holland Novak

quote: Is this God's punishemt for falling in love with an angel? As the gossamer floats ever eluding my grasp, it weighs heavily upon my heart.
author: Talho Yuuki

quote: Whoever said one's first love is bittersweet, is a liar. It is only bitter.
author: Renton Thurston

quote: Did you know? The world is full of hate and there isn't any reason for it?
author: Anemone

quote: If you don't believe in anything, it no longer has the power to hurt.
author: Eureka

quote: Killing others is never justice, no matter what kind of noble cause one upholds.
author: Seishin Muroi

quote: By the time I noticed, so much time had passed that even my little sister would have died naturally already.
author: Sunako Kirishiki

quote: The cold tears of a vampire, whose body is without warmth...
author: Yuuki Natsuno

quote: Making someone I hate suffer feels really great!!
author: Megumi Shimizu

quote: Just like humans, approve killing animals in society, we, approve the killing of humans.
author: Mutou Tohru

quote: At first, everyone is disgusted. Afraid to bear the sin of killing people. Afraid to receive punishment for replenishing themselves with the life of another. But, once you realize that you won't be punished for killing people, you get used to the guilt pretty soon. The guilt of using humans for food. Aren't humans the same?
author: Mutou Tohru

quote: You've just gained the privilege to kill.
author: Tatsumi

quote: People are such strange beings. The sad memories seem to just fade away, until all a person is left with are the happier ones. People are certainly designed so conveniently.
author: Eva Heinemann

quote: What exactly is the end? The end. The end. The end. I've seen the end over and over. What is the end?
author: Johann Liebert

quote: Don't just follow orders! You're men, not machines! In your hearts, you know what's right, the answer is sitting there, waiting for you. Are you brave enough to look inside yourselves?
author: Wolfgang Grimmer

quote: Doctor Tenma, for you all lives are created equal, that's why I came back to life. But you've finally come to realize it now, haven't you? Only one thing is equal for all, and that is death.
author: Johann Liebert

quote: To win, but not destroy
author: Rider

quote: However, humans did not realize that truth no matter how high they staked their mountains of corpses. That's because in no matter what era the courageous and fearless great heroes have always bedazzled the eyes of the multitude with their splendid heroic legends. Because of the wistful actions of those idiots and their refusal to admit that bloodshed is by itself evil, the essence of humans has stayed on the same spot since the Stone Age!
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: It's not that I'm on the side of humans. I just really don't like you guys.
author: Yuuki Natsuno

quote: Death is terrible for anyone. Young or old, good or evil, it's all the same. Death is impartial. There is no especially terrible death. That's why death is so fearsome. Your deeds, your age, your personality, your wealth, your beauty... They are all meaningless in the face of death.
author: Sunako Kirishiki

quote: It must be the way you look, Vash the Stampede. Your very existence seems to cause me undue irritation.
author: Legato Bluesummers

quote: And to think, I could kill every man, woman and child here in the blink of an eye if I wanted to. The power of death is intoxicating.
author: Legato Bluesummers

quote: How did I pass? She beat me like I owed her money.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: A man can't just live on carbohydrates alone...
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: To Grell Sutcliff: Then, it's fine if you don't be careful on your way home. Rather, I'd prefer you walk through dangerous roads with your eyes closed.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: [To Tamaki] Sleep first, then dream.
author: Kyoya Ootori

quote: I'm okay with anything as long as it doesn't harm me.
author: Kyoya Ootori

quote: There are always things more important than someone's dream...
author: Edward Elric

quote: Our motto is to make use of our characteristics to answer customers' needs.
author: Kyoya Ootori

quote: It's not that I missed. I missed on purpose.
author: Kouta Hirano

quote: (to Komuro Takashi) In a war like this, there is no surrender or shit like that.
author: Kouta Hirano

quote: *to Rei Miyamoto* I'd be an actor if I could look happy right now.
author: Takashi Komuro

quote: I'm getting wet!
author: Saeko Busujima

quote: We ran through our school that was filled with noises, screams, life and death.
author: Takashi Komuro

quote: Stay the fuck back, you freak!
author: Saya Takagi

quote: What the fuck is going on?!
author: Takashi Komuro

quote: Honestly, how meaningless.. For something called love, which has neither meaning nor form. Laughable, isn't it?
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Wanting to be loved, for that sole obstinate reason, people can even go this far.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: I would be nothing without you.
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: Even if you hate it or whatever, I'll never let go of you. If you run away, I'll probably come after you and lock you up.
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: If you're going to modify me, at least turn me into a grasshopper man! Or a beetle! Or one of those imaginary freaks!
author: Itoshiki Nozomu

quote: The biggest mistake in my life is that i was born!
author: Itoshiki Nozomu

quote: A Coma doesn't exist, it is a preparatory research for the next life.
author: Fuura Kafuka

quote: That morning's dawn was painted a beautiful scarlet, the likes of which I had never seen before. Like the color of Erza's hair, it was warm and passionate... If she could only lift her face a beautiful sky would be spread out before her.
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Bury the pain of losing your loved ones... into the arms of your friends.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Everyone has changed. That's not it. The one who's changed the most, is me.
author: Jinta Yadomi

quote: Ruin Myself, huh? I like it.
author: Ohana Matsumae

quote: Whenever I counted on someone, I ended up getting hurt.
author: Ohana Matsumae

quote: I don't want the precious time we have together to be taken away by anyone!
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: To be able to stay beside a beloved one is the special privilege of a friend.
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: He is so twisted that if he sees someone wandering around lost, he's the kind of guy who will screw and toy around with the poor soul before he even bothers to help...IF he even bothers to help!
author: Misaki Takahashi

quote: The moment you challenged me, you had already lost.
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: I am not a person who only wants to receive things from him, I want to be the person who can give things to him.
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: I have a lot of different words desperately trying to get my message across. However, you, were able to pass on what you wanted to say with just a few of them.
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: A person who can't even take care of himself has no right to have a pet.
author: Takafumi Yokozawa

quote: I'm going to become the best manga editor anyone's ever seen! And then you can kiss your job goodbye!
author: Ritsu Onodera

quote: You know... You like me more than you think you do.
author: Masamune Takano

quote: Loving someone means entrusting all of yourself to that person.
author: Ritsu Onodera

quote: I'm going to make you say you love me again. Just you wait.
author: Masamune Takano

quote: No matter who I was with, I could never forget you.
author: Masamune Takano

quote: My heart was beating so fast, that one heart wasn't enough.
author: Ritsu Onodera

quote: How much more love do you need for you to accept me?
author: Masamune Takano

quote: Why you ask? That's the stupidest question I've ever heard.  The answer is obvious.  Because I want to! *to Misaki Takahashi*
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: To everything that comes near you, I am jealous.
author: Akihiko Usami

quote: It pisses me off... Like a knife, he violates me even through my ears.
author: Misaki Takahashi

quote: I'm so happy I think I might die.
author: Misaki Takahashi

quote: I'll take fragments from the chaos of this world... and using the fountain of wisdom inside me, will reconstruct them into truth.
author: Victorique de Blois

quote: *about Grevil* He's the owner of the oddest hair in all of Sauville.
author: Victorique de Blois

quote: *after seeing Grevil's unicorn hairstyle for the first time* I've never seen such a creative hairstyle!
author: Kazuya Kujō

quote: You were chosen as a single fragment with which I will fill up my boredom.
author: Victorique de Blois

quote: As long as she's alive and well, that's all I hope for. I can't bear to see another woman die.
author: Inuyasha

quote: [to Kagome, angry at her for saying she believes in him] You are nuts! This sword is good for nothing! Me, I'll live, I'm half demon. You though, you ain't got a chance.
author: Inuyasha

quote: [to Sesshoumaru after he steals the Tetsuaiga] Blah, blah, blah. A guy gets his hands on a new sword, and already he's lookin' for a soap box to stand on and preach it to the world!
author: Inuyasha

quote: Half breed or full breed, to me it don't matter. But when you insult my mother, that's when I get angry. For her sake then if for nothing else... I'm gonna make you pay! [he jumps up and attacks Sesshoumaru, hitting him for the first time]
author: Inuyasha

quote: My only ambition is simply to kill as many people as humanly possible.
author: Bankotsu

quote: I can't save you. I can't do anything to help you, except stay like this. If only I could stop time.
author: Inuyasha

quote: [after witnessing a small argument between Inuyasha and Kagome] Inuyasha, your patience with this creature is astonishing to me. You protect her, indulge her, even seem to love her.
author: Sesshomaru

quote: Inuyasha, after meeting you I renounced my postion as a shrine priestess. I became an ordinary woman. I longed to embrace you like this when I was alive...
author: Kikyo

quote: I can't compete with Kikyo, because, after all, I'm still alive
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: [about 500 feet behind InuYasha] I can see why being called a mutt by Koga would upset him... but now that I see him sitting there sniffing the ground he does look like a dog.
author: Shippou

quote: Life itself is a frightening image for every human being... being strong in life isn't easy.
author: Miroku

quote: A wound of a heart is different from a flesh wound. Unlike a flesh wound, there are no ointments to heal it, and there are times when they never heal.
author: Yashamaru

quote: It doesn't matter whether this world is crazy or not. It doesn't matter if this absurdity is real. It doesn't matter how messed up this place may be... I want to survive.
author: Ganta Igarashi

quote: Being awesome is being nothing but yourself~
author: Shiro

quote: Justice comes from vengeance, but that justice only breeds more vengeance.
author: Pain

quote: Normally I hate people who whine all the time, but in your case... it would be okay to complain, be selfish and say what you want once in a while. It's okay to let yourself be sad.
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: A conscience grows, just like the body. It's bred within your heart. That's why the shape of people's kindness is so different.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: If we're going to win, we might as well get the best deal out of it in the process.
author: Kyoya Ootori

quote: Use whatever is at hand, be it friend or foe.
author: Kyoya Ootori

quote: I humbly call the Gods of Harvest. Follow my wishes, leave none unfulfilled!
author: Izumo Kamiki

quote: No matter how much he wants it, he can't be a normal human anymore. *about Rin*
author: Yukio Okumura

quote: I dunno, getting rid of stuff that doesn't even exist... it's basically just counselling, isn't it?
author: Rin Okumura

quote: If you truly have the nerve to feel that way... then you should give yourself up to the order Headquarters, or just die please.
author: Yukio Okumura

quote: For the time being, all an idiot like me can do is to keep moving forward...
author: Rin Okumura

quote: It is simply the duty of the elite to protect the ignorant masses.
author: Souryuu Asuka Langley

quote: Senpai, take me to the art museum again. Next time, I'll carefully listen to what you say. Please feed me worms!
author: Noda Megumi

quote: You play like you're jacking off. [about Ryuu playing piano]
author: Noda Megumi

quote: The president did say please.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: I'm not going there to die. I'm going there to find out if I'm really alive.
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: Love and Peace!
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: Never show your stupid self in public.
author: Kanade Maki

quote: Don't do something wasteful as to wash your frustrations with tears. Your frustration is motivation that you can use to make yourself better. Hold it inside like it's an important thing!
author: Maria Momoe

quote: Mankind has no time left.
author: Shinji Ikari

quote: Does a death wish cause you to talk to me that way?
author: Hiei

quote: I'm not fighting because I want to win. I'm fighting because I have to win.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: The pain... the pleasure... and the shame all drive me crazy.
author: Misaki Takahashi

quote: I thought I could just apologize tomorrow. But that tomorrow... never came.
author: Jinta Yadomi

quote: I'll rip that mouth of yours apart, so you can never again utter such spells!
author: Reiji Shiratori

quote: *chanting* Blessed be the Lord! For he hath heard the voice of my supplication. The Lord is my helper...and my protector. Thou shalt perish where thou standeth!
author: Fujimoto Shirou

quote: Fool! Next time you see the sun at night, know it's your last!
author: Yashiro Hoshimiya

quote: I just want to keep looking at her.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: It's my job to make school fun.
author: Eikichi Onizuka

quote: Love is brightest in the dark.
author: Katara

quote: Isn't it lonely when you wake up and you don't hear any voices?
author: Nako Oshimizu

quote: *to Ohana* You can't do everything by yourself!... But I can't do it by myself, either. I need your help.
author: Minko Tsurugi

quote: I can hardly tell anymore where the truth ends and the lies begin.
author: Naota Nandaba

quote: Yes, it really﻿ was a fairy tale. A pretty girl reached out her hand to me and ... told me to die!
author: Ohana Matsumae

quote: The moment you find the courage to give up your life for someone... Would be the moment you understand love.
author: Kenshin Himura

quote: I'm not going to lose. No matter how hard it is, I'm not going to run away. Watch me use this hand and capture the future!
author: Yukari Hayasaka

quote: Even I... know what it's like to be jealous.
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: It's fine. I'll work hard on my own.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Well, there's this one hopeless idiot... who'll probably end up crying if I see you again.
author: Atsushi Otani

quote: Everytime Otani says or does something, I end up going to heaven, or hell.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: A comedienne is no match for an ex girlfriend.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Don't be indecisive. Just go for it.
author: Atsushi Otani

quote: This is straining my heartstrings.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Don't ever lie, even if it's about your feelings.
author: Misaki Ayuzawa

quote: I wish I could rewrite my past.. but I can't. If I could, I'd do all I could if it would stop you from crying. But.. that's impossible. My past won't change. That's why we need to make my past pale in comparison to our present.
author: Motoharu Yano

quote: I'm a little grateful to you. I wonder if I'll forget these feelings too.
author: Misaki Ayuzawa

quote: It's fine, I'll come to save you as much as you want. I'll make you fall for me as much as you wish. Leave this to your master.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: Enough. I've had enough. I'm dropping out.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Human memories are too vague. Thinking something has color when it doesn't, making things more dramatic than they really are, glorifying things... It gives new greater meaning than was actually there. That's why I don't believe any of this talk about "beautiful memories".
author: Motoharu Yano

quote: I love clichés, I love predictable scripts, I love it when they paste over problems and I love it when they force a happy ending too. What's wrong with working towards that?
author: Ryuugamine Mikado

quote: No, she's hiding something. But what could it be? Snacks? Guitar? Wait, maybe ton-chan.
author: Sawako Yamanaka

quote: It's painful when you get disappointed by the person you look up to.
author: Misaki Ayuzawa

quote: I'll be waiting for you to get your asses back here!
author: Sawako Yamanaka

quote: Well, I won't be disappointed, no matter what you do.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: I guess I'm a girl who lacks self-awareness as one, or just too manly, eh?
author: Misaki Ayuzawa

quote: Usui, you perverted, outer spaceman human being!
author: Misaki Ayuzawa

quote: I really don't get it. Why don't you tell her how you feel if you care for her so much? Why would you lie like that and keep yourself from pursuing her?
author: Soutarou Kanou

quote: I don't know much about you. You were the one who selfishly entered my world...yet you immediately plunged into silence. What were you thinking? Did you really pick on me just because it was fun? Which one is serious and which one of it is just a joke? That's enough now, making me all messed up like this.
author: Misaki Ayuzawa

quote: About Usui, I really don't know anything at all. It's mortifying... Yet I already don't want him to turn away.
author: Misaki Ayuzawa

quote: That's exactly the way it should be. Doing only unexpected things, otherwise, I'll lose my reputation as a perverted outer-space human.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: If it is with Ayuzawa, whatever I do, wherever I am, I am happy. So it's okay.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: I'm actually a hardcore otaku who likes maids more than having three meals a day. And I only read books related to maids. Also, I only visit maid cafes. Of course, I also collect maid figurines. I play games which feature female maids and it turns me on so much. Then I wear maid uniforms and jump in joy. I'll take my leave now.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: I don't want others to hear the words that I've been waiting anxiously for... I want to be the only one to hear them.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: It's okay, no need to thank me or say anything else. I will always be there for you, I will make you fall for me over and over again.
author: Takumi Usui
