quote: Walking along the path that she chose, without being affected by others... in this sense, white is her color...in another sense, it also makes me want to put more colors on her.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: If you have money, life is the same no matter where you go. But if you don't have money, your life can adapt to where you are.
author: Balsa

quote: Ayuzawa, you are the first person ever to appear in my life and able to make me a mess.
author: Takumi Usui

quote: How far do you want me to suppress myself so that you'll be satisfied?
author: Takumi Usui

quote: Nothing amazing happens here. Only the ordinary.
author: Naota Nandaba

quote: ...Watermelon. Or like a panda with a mean face, or like sandals with pressure points drawn on them, or the smell of a blackboard eraser, or a Sunday morning where you wake up and it's raining. Well, I like him more than hard bread.
author: Mamimi Samejima

quote: [a giant satellite bomb is headed towards the city] If that thing hits, do you think we'll have school tomorrow?
author: Mamimi Samejima

quote: Please don't tell people our bakery's motorbike ran you over.
author: Haruko Haruhara

quote: It takes an idiot to do cool things. That's why it's cool.
author: Haruko Haruhara

quote: Face it kid, I'm much too big of a guy for you to handle and you know it. Do you see how the very ground shakes beneath me feet?
author: Black Star

quote: Can I shoot them now?
author: Death the Kid

quote: He's seriously crazy, he must be insane.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: Now you're suddenly in a big rush to go? What's the point in hurrying, we're already three hours late.
author: Elizabeth Thompson

quote: Black Star, it's over between us.
author: Soul Evans

quote: *points at Black Star* What is that? Some kind of monkey? Yeah...it must be a monkey.
author: Elizabeth Thompson

quote: The last time I let you do my eyebrows it took you a month.
author: Elizabeth Thompson

quote: That is why I prefer using you two pistols. There is symmetry to wielding you two, right? (Getting aggravated) But when you two are in human form, your hairstyles and your heights are completely different... (Grabs their breasts) Even your cup sizes are completely different!
author: Death the Kid

quote: This guy's a special kind of stupid.
author: Death the Kid

quote: Ooops....My finger slipped.
author: Death the Kid

quote: Man this guy is stupid, ugly and a bad shooter.
author: Death the Kid

quote: You should quake in fear of your impending death.
author: Black Star

quote: So, you don't like to get hit, huh? Well, you're about to have a very bad day.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: You're about to find out what it's like to fight a real super saiyan...and I'm not talking about Goku.
author: Trunks Brief

quote: This young girl, whose small body is only half the size of mine, has taught me that tears can flow from these silver eyes.
author: Teresa

quote: Regrets are just a way for the foolish and the guilty to pass time.
author: Cho Hakkai

quote: Humans are creatures that dream. Different from others, they want to be special. They want to be adored by others, just like the heroes in comics and games, achieving great things with unique powers. Of course, no one ever believes deep down it will happen. Everyone knows there's no magic in this world.
author: Yoshiyuki Sakurai

quote: D-mn! I just stepped in a pile of chiroptoran sh-t!
author: Saya Otonashi

quote: Chicks dig guys in black.
author: Haji

quote: Saya, no matter what happens, do what you believe is right. Accept your past. And if you trip, remember nankurunasia. Live through today for tomorrow's sake.
author: George Miyagusuku

quote: No matter what happens, you are still you...our family.
author: Kai Miyagusuku

quote: I'll do what I can, because I'm desperate.
author: Kai Miyagusuku

quote: There is no guarantee that your dreams are just good ones.
author: Haji

quote: There is only a fine line separating art from madness.
author: Nathan Mahler

quote: (In response to Seaman's question) When real men do what they're supposed to, it's not always about what they want.
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: Ever since that day, I've kept this broom balanced on my fingertip.
author: Shiina

quote: She's an idiot, right?
author: Yui

quote: I'm pretty confident about my reflexes. And pretty strong too. I'm a guy after all. When the time comes, I can protect you even at the cost of my life.
author: Hideki Hinata

quote: Crazy baby.
author: TK

quote: [after masturbating over Asuka's comatose body] I'm so fucked up.
author: Shinji Ikari

quote: Songs are good. Singing brings us joy. It is the highest point in the culture that Lilims have created.
author: Kaworu Nagisa

quote: My mind is being eaten away... Kaji-san, it's unravelling my mind! What do I do? It's defiling my mind!
author: Souryuu Asuka Langley

quote: [naked and smiling at Shinji] Hey Shinji, you idiot! Want to become of one mind and one body?
author: Souryuu Asuka Langley

quote: I wonder how you're suppose to give up... Do I just decide to give up and act accordingly? And move further and further away from what my heart really wants? Then will I forget everything one day?.. Everything including the pain in my heart? Everything? Without a trace as if nothing was there to begin with?
author: Ayumi Yamada

quote: It must really be a lonelier journey than anyone could imagine. Cutting through absolute darkness, encountering nothing but the occasional hydrogen atom. Flying blindly into the abyss, believing therein lie the answers to the mysteries of the universe.
author: Takaki Toono

quote: The things I had to tell her...The things I hoped she would listen to...There were so many of them.
author: Takaki Toono

quote: Every minute felt like an eternity time, clearly as if it had malicious intent, slowly ebbed away from me, I clenched my teeth and keeping myself from crying was the only thing I could do...
author: Takaki Toono

quote: Hey... They say it's five centimeters per second. *Takaki asks her what she means by that* The speed at which the sakura blossom petals fall... Five centimeters per second.
author: Akari Shinohara

quote: At what speed must I live...to be able to see you again..?
author: Takaki Toono

quote: You are the most important person to me in the whole wide world.
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: Uhh.. Syaoran.. it's okay if you don't have any more feelings for me, that doesn't matter to me at all. But I'm in love with you and I just wanted you to know, that's all.
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: Even if this feeling important to me disappears...I'll feel this way about you again.
author: Syaoran Li

quote: What a punchline, no... that was just a punch.
author: Arisawa Tatsuki

quote: Dammit, I'll show you who's more skilled with his language skills!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: So he killed my father and murdered my people. That means nothing to me. Strength is the only thing that matters in this world. Everything else is just a delusion for the weak.
author: Vegeta

quote: The interaction of men and women isn't very logical.
author: Ritsuko Akagi

quote: It's overpriced, but that's okay, HERE'S YOUR CHANGE!
author: Touji Suzuhara

quote: This is your home now, so make yourself comfortable. And take advantage of everything here, except me.
author: Misato Katsuragi

quote: Man fears the darkness, and so he scrapes away at the edges of it with fire. He creates life by diminishing the Darkness.
author: Rei Ayanami

quote: Survivability takes priority.
author: Misato Katsuragi

quote: Understanding 100% of everything is impossible. That's why we spend all our lives trying to understand the thinking of others. That's what makes life so interesting.
author: Ryoji Kaji

quote: Up, up! Down, down! Left, right, left, right! Bringing the motherfucking death by Konami! Ahh I'm so fucking hard right now! [laughs]
author: Jan Valentine

quote: Little Hellsing chicky, I'm coming to find you. Come out and play, little Hellsing. It's going to be a lot of fun. We just want to torture you, kill you, maybe skullfuck your corpse a couple of times, burn your house to the ground, go home, and masturbate, okay?
author: Jan Valentine

quote: Hey bitch, get off me! I'm supposed to be on top!
author: Jan Valentine

quote: Such a shame. I overestimated you. As a vampire, you were just a pathetic piece of shit. And now you're nothing but dog shit!
author: Alucard

quote: I highly recommend pissing yourself followed by a course of praying to your impotent god.
author: Walter C. Dornez

quote: A four-poster coffin. Bloody hell.
author: Seras Victoria

quote: I'm surrounded by idiots.
author: Integra Hellsing

quote: You're too loud, Police Girl. I don't care if you're a vampire, you're still English. Have some manners.
author: Integra Hellsing

quote: Eat Harkonnen, bitch!
author: Seras Victoria

quote: They're... eating my people!
author: Integra Hellsing

quote: Immortality is wasted on the young.
author: Alucard

quote: Have you ever wondered, Master, what it feels like to be hunted?
author: Alucard

quote: These monsters dare to enter this house built on blood and honor! I will see them all roast in the deepest pits of Hell!
author: Integra Hellsing

quote: Eternity is wasted upon the likes of you. Try as you might, immortality slips away. And you remain with only your shame.
author: Alucard

quote: Beautiful night, isn't it, Police Girl? It's especially beautiful, of course, if you're a bloodsucker.
author: Alucard

quote: [clenches Fist] No matter how intelligent or how strong they are still nothing but vampire trash.
author: Integra Hellsing

quote: You are a fool who creates slaves to do your dirty work. A coward and an incompetent, incapable of doing anything on your own. You are not worthy of the lowest pits of Hell!
author: Alucard

quote: [To Yubaba] I'm not leaving until you give me a job!
author: Chihiro Ogino

quote: It's just...a bad dream! Wake up, wake up...
author: Chihiro Ogino

quote: [To Chihiro as she's sleeping] Meet me at the bridge. Come alone.
author: Haku

quote: Three days of eating our food and her smell will go away. And if she doesn't work hard, roast her, boil her, do whatever you want. Now get back to work!
author: Haku

quote: I finally get a bouquet and it's a goodbye present. That's depressing.
author: Chihiro Ogino

quote: FUCK YOU. I'm human, the real deal, right down to the fuckin' marrow of my bones. Don't lump me together with you faggot-ass monsters.
author: Guts

quote: If you're always worried about crushing the ants beneath you... you won't be able to walk.
author: Guts

quote: Death on the battlefield comes regardless of class, royal or common. The loser must die!
author: Griffith

quote: In the end the winner is still the last man standing.
author: Guts

quote: I don't want what another man can give me. If he grants me anything, then it's his to give and not my own.
author: Guts

quote: Could you settle for a smile, and a fond farewell?
author: Guts

quote: For me to call a man my friend, he must be equal to me in all respects.
author: Griffith

quote: I'd rather fight for my life than live it.
author: Guts

quote: Throughout my life, the moments, and people who have defined me... they have all been illuminated by sparks.
author: Guts

quote: A dream... It's something you do for yourself, not for others.
author: Griffith

quote: He appeared right in front of me, and he wasn't a demon... but what looked like a human. As if he'd been yanked from before into the present unchanged. I gazed at him and for a second... I forgot to kill him.
author: Guts

quote: I want out of this damn moat!
author: Guts

quote: When you meet your God tell him to leave me alone.
author: Guts

quote: You have the strongest armour, because you are the weakest!
author: Guts

quote: My place really was here. I was too foolish and stubborn to notice. But, what I truly hoped for then was here. Why do I always realize it... when I've already lost it.
author: Guts

quote: You're going to be all right. You just stumbled over a stone in the road. It means nothing. Your goal lies far beyond this. Doesn't it? I'm sure you'll overcome this. You'll walk again... soon.
author: Guts

quote: Stake your lives on this fight! Our survival demands that we stake our lives on this fight! And to survive, is to be victorious!
author: Griffith

quote: Every sword belongs in its sheath. Go back to the sheath your master holds. Go back to Griffith.
author: Guts

quote: Humans are weak... but we want to live. Even if we're wounded... or tortured... we feel the pain.
author: Guts

quote: Do whatever you want now. But if you disturb me, I'll kill you.
author: Guts

quote: A friend would not just follow another's dream... a friend would find his own reason to live.
author: Griffith

quote: Let's have a drink. Hh shut up... The alcohol will disinfect me from the inside!
author: Guts

quote: Among thousands of comrades and ten thousand enemies, only you... only you made me forget my dream. I see it!
author: Griffith

quote: You're right, we are mortal and fragile. But even if we are tortured or wounded, we'll fight to survive. You should feel the pain we feel and understand. I am the messenger that will deliver you to that pain and understanding.
author: Guts

quote: An oasis for my withered heart in this harsh reality.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Thanks a lot, dream wrecker.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: I bet dead people are easier to get along with.
author: Crona

quote: Just look at it Liz, Patti, just look at how the clouds are! Flowing right towards the sun! It's so beautiful, even the sky is symmetrical!
author: Death the Kid

quote: Victory and Glory!
author: Excalibur

quote: About the 1,000 provisions that you are required to observe. Now I would like for you to participate in the most important provision. Number 452 the 5 hour story telling party.
author: Excalibur

quote: Reaper Combat Art: Mortal Sin Stance.
author: Death the Kid

quote: Excalibur! Excalibur! From the United K! I'm looking for heaven! I'm going to California!
author: Excalibur

quote: You disgust me. I am a Grim Reaper, I refuse to grant anyone the freedom to kill!
author: Death the Kid

quote: FOOL! As someone who is unaware of the vital role that singing has played in the cultural history of mankind you are in no position to question me. Remember that the next time you stop to consider your place in this world. You do not possess the power to deny a singer his song. Do you understand what I'm telling you?
author: Excalibur

quote: Thus at long last the fighting between the rival gangs had ended! To sum up, this leads us to number 778 of the 1,000 provisions you must observe. Never mail a letter without the return address or the proper postage. And don't call collect.
author: Excalibur

quote: I'm going to keep fighting until this world is the way it should be. Until the world is balanced.
author: Death the Kid

quote: I was all dried up. Yes, nothing could satisfy me anymore. I was but a shell of a man. An unspeakable emptiness grew deep within my heart. I became frustrated, sad, hollow. The gapping hole inside of me was growing larger everyday. Slowly consuming me from the inside out. At least until that day came.
author: Excalibur

quote: To sum up, that is what led to number 679 of the 1,000 provisions you must observe. Always place a dehumidifier in your room.
author: Excalibur

quote: I can't lose weight, I don't know how to deal with being any skinnier than I already am.
author: Crona

quote: I do not deny evil, nor do I believe that any human is completely free of malice. Everything must be in balance. As long as evil and good maintain an equilibrium in this world, there is no problem. Perfect balance is the key to everything.
author: Death the Kid

quote: SILENCE! This is number 349 of the 1,000 provisions you must observe. Meisters should eat everything regardless of personal likes and dislikes. Never say anything as selfish as "I don't like carrots." again.
author: Excalibur

quote: I hate, hate, hate everyone.
author: Crona

quote: I partnered with these two specifically so something like this wouldn't happen. I need symmetry! Maybe I should have listened to my father. He tried to pick out a good weapon for me, but I refused to listen to him! Stubborn! All I cared about, all I wanted was symmetry! Two symmetrical weapons! Was that so much to ask for?! And now all my efforts have been completely and utterly wasted! Damn it!
author: Death the Kid

quote: This brings us to number 278 of the 1,000 provisions you must observe. I hate carrots. Never even think about putting them in my food, you get it?
author: Excalibur

quote: It's quite basic actually, perhaps the simplest of tricks there is. True it may not seem so simple from an ordinary persons point of view, some people may even consider it a baffling, utterly perplexing problem. Things will often appear complicated on the outside while in truth they are simplicity itself. Of course how one sees these things depends on the person, many people find there is a fine line separating the complex to the very simple.
author: Excalibur

quote: I'm scared of everyone. I need to learn to deal with people better.
author: Crona

quote: Get your ass moving Kid!
author: Patricia Thompson

quote: If you want to do damage to the other ship you have to ram them in the middle! Now do it again!
author: Death the Kid

quote: One must take time to think! Rushing forward without considering things beforehand is the hight of foolishness. Ahh yes, that reminds me of another time when I had to consider things, that case was long ago but I remember it still. It was back when I still hung my hat on Bakers St. and called it home.
author: Excalibur

quote: Thus I found myself carrying the entire weight of the troop as I preformed my dance before a capacity crowd at the opera house.
author: Excalibur

quote: There are stars and planets floating around me. I don't think I could handle astronomy right now.
author: Crona

quote: Row, row, row your boat, gently down the stream. Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily, life is but a dream.
author: Patricia Thompson

quote: We're hunting after a legendary sword. Finding a fairy or two shouldn't be surprising.
author: Death the Kid

quote: A symphony can not be created using common sense and probabilities. It is already written in the fate of the composer. No... that's not it. A symphony is the inevitable result of a bad childhood, deafness, and too many beans eaten after a certain time of day.
author: Excalibur

quote: Humming and the nightly news share a very tight connection indeed.
author: Excalibur

quote: You know about it, don't you, Witch Medusa? About the Kishin beneath the DWMA.
author: Franken Stein

quote: Thumbtacks in my shoes would stick into my feet whenever I tried to walk. It would hurt. I don't think I could deal with that really.
author: Crona

quote: You better watch out! I can break your neck!
author: Patricia Thompson

quote: I'll ward off the water from above, can you handle the water on the ground? We'll work together, it's a good thing there are two of us here. This plan would be impossible alone. Quite an obstacle.
author: Death the Kid

quote: Black Star, I can't come down, there's water. Carry me.
author: Death the Kid

quote: Number 58 of the 1,000 provisions I would like you to observe, never talk to me while I'm humming to myself. This is an important provision do you understand?
author: Excalibur

quote: Of course they are my family, isn't it obvious? And a wonderful family they were. It happened long ago when I was still in the flower of my youth. The cities began to grow wild, people lost hope for the future, they became lazy idol time wasters. And to my everlasting shame I was no exception. Thus I began to watch the 7 O'Clock news religiously every night!
author: Excalibur

quote: This is fear. That's good then, I had forgotten what it felt like.
author: Franken Stein

quote: I've never seen a man with a screw sticking out of his head before. I don't know how I'm supposed to deal with a guy like that!
author: Crona

quote: Giraffe! Giraffe! I love Giraffes!
author: Patricia Thompson

quote: Yeah it's going to be freaking awesome!
author: Patricia Thompson

quote: We were born as weapons and we loved the power that came with it. Nothing could scare us. We walked around town like we owned the place, taking whatever we wanted whenever we wanted it. No one ever thought to ask what our lives were really like.
author: Elizabeth Thompson

quote: What If I didn't fold the toilet paper? Something like that could ruin my life forever. I can't be defeated by toilet paper, if I turn my back on this I shouldn't be allowed to live anymore.
author: Death the Kid

quote: That's right, I said destory it.
author: Medusa Gorgon

quote: Hey! Hold on, come back! I'll tell you what! I can lower those 1,000 provisions down to 800, just as long as you take part in the five hour story telling party.
author: Excalibur

quote: Before becoming my Meister there is a list of 1,000 provisions you must peruse. Be sure to look through all of them, they're important. I greatly look forward to your participation in number 452 the five hour story telling party.
author: Excalibur

quote: Ha ha ha ha! Promise me something, if you're gonna sue, go after the spirit first, okay?
author: Franken Stein

quote: I don't like it, the dark circles under my eyes will come back and I don't know how to deal with the dark circles!
author: Crona

quote: Hey sis, I've been wondering. How come everyone always closes their eyes when they sneeze? Is it to keep their eyes from popping out of their heads?
author: Patricia Thompson

quote: I can see through you, you're lying, you want to gobble up my hot body!
author: Elizabeth Thompson

quote: I'm a pig, a louse, a useless cow! I destroyed Anubis! Such utter garbage cannot be allowed to live! I deserve to die!
author: Death the Kid

quote: A sound soul dwells within sound skin and sound cuticles.
author: Elizabeth Thompson

quote: Yeah Kid you're not garbage. If you were garbage you would smell a lot worse so why don't we just get up and try again okay?
author: Patricia Thompson

quote: No I can't go on like this! I should die! How could this happen? Did I really forget to fold the tip of the toilet paper into a triangle?
author: Death the Kid

quote: I'mma... I'm not very good at talking with girls. They make me nervous.
author: Crona

quote: This much I know, my blood is black.
author: Crona

quote: Are you helping because you're a doctor? Or is it because you're a Witch?
author: Franken Stein

quote: Nothing beats a cup of herbal tea in the morning.
author: Excalibur

quote: My legend dates back to the 12th Century you see. My legend is quite old. The 12th Century was a long time ago.
author: Excalibur

quote: *chuckles* Looks like your little kitties failed. The taste of victory is very sweet!
author: Medusa Gorgon

quote: You're horrible! Commenting on my appearance like that! I don't have to listen to this from you! It's sexual harassment!
author: Medusa Gorgon

quote: Free, we gotta inject the Black Blood into the Kishin, if we don't then Medusa is gonna slaughter us!
author: Eruka Frog

quote: Pum, Pum, Pum, Pum. I always get what I want, so just give it to me. Pum, Pum, Pum, Pum. I'm a beauty, beautiful pretty lady. But you know, you know I've got a secret yes I do. Pumpkins, Pum, Pum, Pumpkins. Pum, Pum, Pumpkins because that's my magic spell. Pum, Pum, Pumpkins, Pum, Pum, Pumpkins yeah!
author: Blair

quote: Pum, Pumkins, Smashing Pumkins!
author: Blair

quote: It's so lovely to have been born a Witch.
author: Eruka Frog

quote: You don't feel as good on my foot now, change yourself back into a frog.
author: Medusa Gorgon

quote: Young ones! Do you want to hear the legend of me? Do you want to hear a heroic tale?
author: Excalibur

quote: I think I'd like to dissect you now!
author: Franken Stein

quote: The doors here only open one way. They open inward.
author: Crona

quote: You're disgustingly hideous! What the hell kind of thing are you? I've never seen anything more messed up in my life! Do you know nothing about symmetry? Whoever made you should be dug up from his grave, shot and reburied! You make me violently ill.
author: Death the Kid

quote: Tornado Flip!
author: Death the Kid

quote: Oh! My little scythey boy!
author: Blair

quote: Next time I really am going to kill you Medusa ribbit!
author: Eruka Frog

quote: It will be alright, have faith in yourself. Crona, you will be a Kishin.
author: Medusa Gorgon

quote: No autographs!
author: Excalibur

quote: Welcome. Welcome to my cave young ones. Please forgive the belated salutations I am the holy sword Excalibur!
author: Excalibur

quote: All the more reason to dissect one, before the whole species dies off.
author: Franken Stein

quote: Symmetry is key everything must be esthetically pleasing. That's why I use the two of you as twin pistols in order to preserve symmetry. When I hold you both I'm completely balanced on the right and left. It isn't perfect because your human forms are so different from each other though. Your hair styles and height for example. Even your boobs are different sizes!
author: Death the Kid

quote: I never said I was a witch did I? You just made that assumption all on your own. I'm really just a cat with a ridiculous amount of magical power.
author: Blair

quote: I can't stand that witch, stupid snake woman.
author: Eruka Frog

quote: Ribbit.
author: Eruka Frog

quote: Um well Miss Maka? Can you do me a favor and help me out with your father? I can't get him off my leg.
author: Medusa Gorgon

quote: Nake, Snake, Cobra, Cobra.
author: Medusa Gorgon

quote: My mornings begin with a cup of coffee with cream at the cafe. My afternoon begins with hot tea with two lumps of sugar. And my evenings... In the evening I change into my pajamas.
author: Excalibur

quote: My legend dates back to the 12th Century thank you very much.
author: Excalibur

quote: I can't seem to get my head on straight.
author: Franken Stein

quote: No, it can't be 7, say 8 damn it! 8 is better! It's physically impossible to cut the number 7 in half and make it symmetrical! It has to be 8 instead! 8 cut vertically or horizontally stays perfectly symmetrical! Take it back I beg of you! Please say 8, PLEASE!
author: Death the Kid

quote: I'm an abomination! I'm filthy and dirty! And unbalanced! Why is there only one set of stripes?! I'm garbage! Asymmetrical garbage! I deserve to die!
author: Death the Kid

quote: Symmetry is what makes the world beautiful.
author: Death the Kid

quote: When do you think people die? When they are shot through the heart by the bullet of a pistol? No. When they are ravaged by an incurable disease? No. When they drink a soup made from a poisonous mushroom!? No! It’s when... they are forgotten.
author: Dr hiluluk

quote: I am lightning. No matter how hard they try, mankind can never overcome lightning. Since ancient times, mankind has labeled the unknowns of nature as God. And anything they could not understand, they feared. Everything which befalls mankind is said to be the work of God. Mankind accepts that it cannot defeat natural disasters. And I am one of them.
author: Enel

quote: If I told her how I feel, she'd miss me even more. Afterall, I'm the guy who keeps breaking her heart by making her wait an eternity... even though I'm always by her side. I don't wanna see her cry anymore. Even if it means I no longer have a place in her heart. Seems pretty childish of me, doesn't it?
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Are you scared? I understand. The first time I saw my reflection in the mirror, even I was frightened by how BIG my reflection was.
author: Black Star

quote: I'm worthless garbage who can't even write a straight looking K!
author: Death the Kid

quote: Human is an existence full of sin.
author: Ai Enma

quote: Any technique is worthless before my eyes.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: The human world is a boring place with boring people doing boring things.
author: Ryuk

quote: The bells are very loud today.
author: L Lawliet

quote: The word "discipline" is something that I would never give up, no matter what. But it's not because it is my pride that I will not give it up. It's because I cannot give it up, that's why it is my pride.
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: This is vengeance, so I am to ferry you to hell.
author: Ai Enma

quote: When one person is cursed, two graves are dug.
author: Ai Enma

quote: I will become a bigger badass than my father. And a stronger shinobi than my mother!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: You don't understand anything, do you?! The most important thing isn't power, it isn't courage, it isn't even having friends! The only thing that matters is that you can rely on ME.
author: Black Star

quote: Do you know where hell is? Inside your head.
author: Crona

quote: It's the sky...that allows the clouds to move about freely.
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: If it's something I can only cry about in my heart, it's almost like a sin.
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: Yes I've used a condom before. They can store up to 1 liter of water.
author: Sousuke Sagara

quote: [pulls a gun on a boy harassing Kaname] I'll let you go this time but if I see you doing this again, I'll come after you and all your relatives.
author: Sousuke Sagara

quote: [to a dating simulation that has just dumped him] Wait! If you cut off negotiations, it can only lead to war. Accept a truce, and I will listen to whatever you have to say. Let's work toward a compromise!
author: Sousuke Sagara

quote: I don't have any regrets. I'm glad I met you, Sousuke Sagara.
author: Kaname Chidori

quote: Using a rescued civilian as a hostage? So do you still feel justified in fighting by their side with these cowards? Kira?
author: Athrun Zala

quote: Seems appropriate for Nicol. A weapon fit for a coward.
author: Dearka Elsman

quote: What the hell can you hope to protect when your feelings are the only weapons you've got?
author: Kira Yamato

quote: You always seem to get in my way, Mu La Flaga. Though I imagine you'd say the same about me.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: If I have the power to make a difference, I should put it to good use.
author: Kira Yamato

quote: But your kindess doesn't come from being a Coordinator... it's because of who you are Mr. Yamato
author: Lacus Clyne

quote: What a lovely voice! But I have to wonder though... is that voice a result of fiddling around with her genes?
author: Sai Argyle

quote: I can't exactly fight a war with a big smile on my face.
author: Athrun Zala

quote: Nicol was fifteen. He loved the piano and Kira just cut him down.
author: Lacus Clyne

quote: [to Athrun] What is it you believe in? What is it you're fighting for now? Is it for that medal you received? Or your father's orders?
author: Lacus Clyne

quote: From now on, Lacus Clyne will be singing the song of peace.
author: Lacus Clyne

quote: Athrun Zala. Justice. Launching!
author: Athrun Zala

quote: [about Rau] But are you sure that's me? Oh well. He will be my successor in any case. Why should that woman's child be my heir? Keep a close eye on him and educate him well. Whatever you do, don't make him into another weakling.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: [Kira thinks he has just killed Andrew Waltfeld and cries] It didn't have to end like this.
author: Kira Yamato

quote: I don't know how to give up!!
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: In the end, aren't they just a bunch of weaklings?
author: Alice

quote: I HATE LEEKS!!!
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: It's simple. Even a single Coordinator is a threat to the Earth's survival, and our goal here is to get rid of them all!
author: Muruta Azrael

quote: I can't just quietly follow orders when it looks like all we're trying to do is wipe out every last Natural alive.
author: Dearka Elsman

quote: You're a monster who deserves to die, right here, with me.
author: Natarle Badgiruel

quote: Why torment yourself saying, "Eventually, someday?" How long have you been fighting with your thoughts clouded by that brand of sweet poison?
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: [as he prepares to fire on the Eternal with Lacus Clyne on board] It's a shame really, I did enjoy your songs. But the real world isn't as kind as the one in pop songs!
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: I'll give it a try. Anything that man can do, I'm sure I can do just as well.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: Do you think you can change what's going to happen? Nobody can do anything about it. The whirlpool of hatred is engulfing the universe!
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: I am the only one who's earned that right in the entire universe! I alone have the right to judge all of humanity!
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: The final door is about to open! And I am the one opening it! Then the world that we know of will come to an end! This world of insatiable desires will end!
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: I am He, that arrogant fool who thought he could fool death itself with his money. Al Da Flaga, your father, but I am merely that man's defective clone.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: They thirsted for knowledge! They sought to fulfill their desires! And ultimately, they forgot why they were doing it. Even as they proclaimed their reverence for human life, they began toying with it, and then they began destroying it!
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: [To Kira] You are the dream of humanity, the Ultimate Coordinator. It was in pursuit of that dream that Dr. Hibiki created the artificial womb. And you are the only viable child it ever produced. For that result, a very large number of your siblings were sacrificed.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: Aren't you the least bit curious? About the ultimate extent of humanity's insatiable desires? About the fools who pursued their insane dream in the name of progress? Because after all, Kira, you're a child of this too.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: If it's my fate to be shot down by you, I thought this place would be appropriate... However, it doesn't look like there's any chance of that happening. After all, how could the "child" ever hope to defeat the "parent"?
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: Why you little... nobody takes a shot at me!
author: Shani Andras

quote: Nobody is ever born into this world as a soldier.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: What's so fun about firing at targets that aren't moving?
author: Yzak Joule

quote: [to Athrun] I bet your head is like a hamster running in its wheel right about now.
author: Cagalli Yula Athha

quote: Kira... what are you thinking about, now?
author: Athrun Zala

quote: I went with raven for a long bathroom break.
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: It's something that appear on the chests of illegal contractees.
author: Gilbert Nightray

quote: Illegal contractees kill people to be able to change the past.
author: Gilbert Nightray

quote: I wonder why illegal contractees try to kill people?
author: Alice

quote: Hey, Oz. what are you lazing around for?
author: Alice

quote: Don't tell me what to do, you seaweed head.
author: Alice

quote: Irony abounds in warfare.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: I may be able to operate the mobile suit... but that doesn't mean I know how to fight a battle!
author: Kira Yamato

quote: Athrun! Show us that same spirit that made you defy orders!
author: Miguel Aiman

quote: What you say may be correct, that there is a war going on outside our world. But we don't agree with it! We dislike war! And that is why we chose to be here, in neutral territory!
author: Kira Yamato

quote: Mu, I'd actually be pleased if you'd vanish right about now!
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: You always seem to get in my way, Mu La Flaga! Though I imagine you would probably say the same about me!
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: You kids don't understand anything! By declaring that you're neutral and have nothing to do with this, you can still distance yourselves from what's happening? You don't really believe that, do you?
author: Murrue Ramius

quote: Tell me, do you feel my presence? Do you sense it the same way that I sense yours? A rather unfortunate twist of fate, wouldn't you say... Mu La Flaga?
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: It seems we have an unforseen problem. A rather annoying fly buzzing around.
author: Rau Le Creuset

quote: Damn piece of Earth trash!
author: Miguel Aiman

quote: Trying to pilot that mobile suit? You're in way over your head, Natural!
author: Miguel Aiman

quote: It doesn't matter how good your armor is... if you can barely move!
author: Miguel Aiman

quote: I knew it. The Earth Forces' new mobile weapons. Father, I knew you'd betray us all!
author: Cagalli Yula Athha

quote: Kira... fails to see he's being manipulated by the Naturals! Brilliant as he is, he is also naive and good-natured. They're exploiting him, but he's blind to it. That's why I have to go back! I have to reason with him! Kira is still a fellow Coordinator! I'm positive that he'll come around to our way of thinking.
author: Athrun Zala

quote: I coulda been a contendah...
author: Joey Wheeler

quote: Let me get this straight. You're going to defeat me with a creampuff and an elf?
author: Seto Kaiba

quote: [sounding like Marlon Brando] I'm the Godfather of Games. Capsice?
author: Joey Wheeler

quote: Ready or not, Spirit, this is where you take over.
author: Yami Yugi

quote: No matter how dark things may get, the special bond I share with my friends will always find a way to shine through! I may be scared, but that fear won't keep me from dueling!
author: Tea Gardner

quote: Exodia, OBLITERATE!!!
author: Yami Yugi

quote: I found out I hate virtual dogs.
author: Joey Wheeler

quote: Say good-bye to The Unstoppable Exodia!
author: Underwood Weevil

quote: I'm gonna take you out in one giant bug blitzkrieg!
author: Underwood Weevil

quote: My grandfather's deck has no pathetic cards, Kaiba. But it does contain... the unstoppable Exodia!
author: Yami Yugi

quote: *after Joey offers him to duel* No thanks, I think I'll have much more of a challenge playing solitaire.
author: Seto Kaiba

quote: You've fought a valiant duel, my friend, and this is the hardest move I've ever had to make. But this ends now!
author: Yami Yugi

quote: It's game time!
author: Yami Yugi

quote: Power rules the Heavens just as Power rules in the Lower world.
author: Homura

quote: Quiet down or I'll shoot you bastards!
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: Maten Scripture binding force of power where light is darkness and darkness is light I call upon your power to cast my enemy back Into OBLIVION!
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: Life is basically a fuedal struggle until you die.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: If you meet Budha - kill him, If you meet the father - kill him. Never be captivated by anyone, just live for yourself.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: I dont need to believe in God to believe in myself.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: I don't believe in anyone, nor do I believe in God. I just believe in myself.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: From the time I was born, till the day I die...The only side I am on, is my own.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: Consume wine, don't let the wine consume you.
author: Genjo Sanzo

quote: I can't see Kyoko-san...anymore. But she left me something. Her advice, her feelings... and Tohru. They all... all become fertilizer to help me grow.
author: Arisa Uotani

quote: But even though she's gone... she's not really gone, right? That the light won't go on in that apartment... is a lie, right?
author: Arisa Uotani

quote: Maybe I was lonely. Maybe I've just... always... been lonely.
author: Arisa Uotani

quote: Hmm... you can go anywhere you want? Cuz' I'll go... anywhere with you, y'know. (To Kureno)
author: Arisa Uotani

quote: HANAJIMA, MY SPEAR! GET ME MY SPEAR!
author: Arisa Uotani

quote: This may have been a useless time for you... but I really wanted to see you!
author: Arisa Uotani

quote: Is that the kinda attitude you show to someone concerned about you?! What's gonna happen to the person who wants to see ya, huh?!?! Its obvious... Its obvious you wish to see each other... SO COME AND FREAKIN' SEE ME ALREADY!!
author: Arisa Uotani

quote: I...think that my performance today was a success because he played opposite me. Kyo-kun...Thank you. (To Kazuma)
author: Saki Hanajima

quote: I do...want to be with you...I want to be with you...! (To Tohru and Arisa)
author: Saki Hanajima

quote: ...If Tohru-chan were to die, I...I wonder if I'd be able to smile again one year later? Or if I'd wish that I could forget ever having met her. ...Tohru-chan... has tried really hard...
author: Saki Hanajima

quote: Please stop adding to my misery. (to Ayame)
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: It's over between Kana and me. We're not going to get back together. Even if we were together, I would only miss her... (To Shigure and Ayame)
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: He's just...he's still a child. There are still a lot of things he can't give up. There's no rush. (To Ayame about Yuki)
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: One more word Shigure and the entire publishing industry will know every embarrassing thing you've done since you were four.
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: I started crying. It was the first time in my life that I felt forgiven. Like I was saved. Like the frozen snow that's melted by spring, the tears wouldn't stop.
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: A sixth sense cannot make up for a total lack of common sense.
author: Saki Hanajima

quote: It's true, crying unexpectedly does make you feel better. When you're an adult you forget that.
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: Go ahead! I'll just turn you into the police for assaulting a minor! (To Kyo)
author: Sohma Hiro

quote: [thinking] I only take family as patients and I still get worked to death.
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: Since when did the "Cat" set the rules for this house? You mean to tell me that you contribute more to this house than anyone else? Do you pay all the bills? I can't stand people who do absolutely nothing but complain all the time! (To Kyo)
author: Sohma Hiro

quote: Often times in memory, we have the tendency to overly romanticize the people we care about.
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: So, what are you saying? You mean if your wife wasn't controlling you, you wouldn't be a villain? You mean you've never thought it's just because you're incompetent? And what's that supposed to mean anyway? (To the story, "Mogeta")
author: Sohma Hiro

quote: It's not the fun and games you think. It's bizarre... sinister... cursed. (speaking of the curse to Tohru)
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: You're so gullible! Don't you have any standards? So if I told you to spin around, you'd do it? If they told you to jump off a cliff, would you do that, too? I can't stand people who have no individuality!! (To Tohru)
author: Sohma Hiro

quote: Please... even if I die surrounded by snow that never melts... please let her be happy.
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: Waah, Kyo's picking on me! (Repeated line)
author: Sohma Momiji

quote: I've gained freedom...and yet... it's so lonesome... (after declaring he was leaving Akito's side)
author: Sohma Momiji

quote: Strangely enough, when you get older, the things you didn't understand when you were a child... start to make sense. "When this happened, I should have done that." "When that happened, I should have said this." Those types of things. You start to understand rather than regret. It may be closer to repentance. So it may be that I do want to repent and erase the ignorant self from my childhood. Maybe that's what they mean when they say adults are selfish.
author: Sohma Ayame

quote: Pain, suffering. It's pointless to just think about those things. The traveler (referring to "The Most Foolish Traveler" by Natsuki Takaya) didn't. That may be stupid to some people but that's not stupid to me. Yuki... Kyo... when you close your eyes, what do you think?
author: Sohma Momiji

quote: And if when everything ends, nothing is left in my hands...that's alright.
author: Sohma Rin

quote: Your happiness is in a much more vast world. Look for it. Find it. (to Hatsuharu)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: (thinking) I want Haru. I want all of him.
author: Sohma Rin

quote: Something this, something that--jeez you're annoying. (to Yuki)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: (to Kagura) Sorry that's your cue to say "Shigure you perv" and roll your eyes, slap me, whatever.
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: I do intend to pay you for your services.
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: You don't look like you'd be endowned with something so great (To Tohru, referring to "womans intuition")
author: Sohma Rin

quote: Another story of Fruits Basket manga has begun. I have something very important to tell everyone. Yuki is actually...A GIRL!
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: Eventually, someday, whatever! If it will break, and we'll be free then that's good enough for me! (To Tohru)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: So this is how...it feels... (After just being released from the curse)
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: How long are you gonna sit in front of me sobbing your little eyes out?! It's depressing! (To Tohru)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: We've just witnessed a classic example of what I like to call "misdirected rage". Though I believe the technical term is being an ass.
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: I don't need someone as unreliable as you for a partner! (To Tohru)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: With so much at stake... are you willing to take the one in 10,000 chance?
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: A bond may seem like a beautiful thing from the outside...but if those involved see it as a burden, it's nothing but a shackle.
author: Sohma Rin

quote: You're trying to break the curse. Stop it. What are you trying to do? Do you look down on us? Do you pity our wretched state? Don't bother! We never asked for your sympathy! (To Tohru)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: People aren't born social. Sure it comes easier to some people... but most people, like you, need to work at it. Some more than others. You're just inexperienced. For example, as a martial artist, you have the strength to break the table with your fist. But you also have the self-control to stop your fist right before it hits the table. You weren't born with that control, were you? You had to refine it. It's the same as interacting with people. But training for that isn't in the mountains - it has to be in town where people live. Mingling with people, hurting them, getting hurt by them. That's how you learn about people and about yourself. If you don't, you'll never care about anyone but yourself. You may be a black belt fighter, but you're still a white belt in dealing with people. For the sake of the girl who will one day tell you she loves you... Don't turn away. Keep training.
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: I have nothing but me. I'll give you myself. You can use me however you like for the rest of my life. (To Shigure)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: You reject your femininity... yet at the end here you are using it.
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: (thinking) Haru understood me. He cared for me. He loved me.
author: Sohma Rin

quote: I do love Akito... I love her then... I still do now.
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: (thinking) I can't stand up...on my own. I can't go...any further. Not...all by myself.
author: Sohma Rin

quote: I yearn for you more than anyone else. I love you Akito... And that is the irrevocable unwavering truth.(shigures answer to akitos question "do you like me?" during a child hood flashback)
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: The biggest idiot is you! So why don't you go back to school or whatever it is that idiots like you do and don't ever bother me again! You piece of shit! (To Yuki)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: I'm ho-ome! Yuki-kun, Tohru-kun, I'm home! Oh, and let's not forget stupid-clumsy-Kyo-kun-who-lost-yet-another-fight!
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: I don't need you anymore. I'm tired of you. (To Haru)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: Even I... know what it's like to be jealous. (referring to Kureno and Akito's relationship)
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: You talk big yet you're nothing but Akito's toy! (To Yuki)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: I love you!! Even if you go bald or like underage girls, I can handle it! I'm crazy with love!! (Young Kyoko talking to Tohru's father/her husband)
author: Kyoko Honda

quote: For there to be pain, there has to be kindness. For darkness to stand out, there has to be the sun.
author: Kyoko Honda

quote: Ah, I'm sorry, I guess this is farewell. Let Tohru find happiness. Please by many people let her be loved. If you become perplexed or make errors, in the end have the kind of life that you can have pride in living. The kind where you can say, "I persevered". Repeating delightful things and sad things. And in that way keep getting older. I persevered. (Part of Kyoko's last words that were never said)
author: Kyoko Honda

quote: If you don't protect that child, I will never forgive you! (referring to Tohru as she was talking to Kyo on the day of the accident)
author: Kyoko Honda

quote: Hippo.
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: (to Kyo) oh, shut up. shut up! shut up! AAHHH!! AAHHH!!
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: We're all born with selfish desires so we can relate to those feelings in others. But kindness is created individually by each person... So it's easy to misunderstand when someone is trying to be kind to you... But, Tohru, people's differences are something to celebrate.
author: Kyoko Honda

quote: DON'T LEAVE ME!!
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: Tohru, you must always be yourself and do things at your own pace. Someday... you'll catch up.
author: Kyoko Honda

quote: Is it okay for me to have my own life now, father, now that I'm not "special" anymore?
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: It's you that I want. Do you not want me? Don't you want to be together? (to Rin)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: I still can't control my wish to see her. I never thought of how important she was to me. (about Rin)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: I want to possess her...to make her belong to me, and only me. (about Rin)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: Sometimes when I'd go to visit her in the hospital...she would purposely avoid me. Then I didn't know what she was thinking about anymore... (to Yuki, about Rin)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: Don't try to be a hero, stupid cat. (to Kyo)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: I'm creating trouble. Can't you see?
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: If you don't let me see Rin... I'll kill myself! If I don't kill you, I'll kill myself! (to Akito)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: I'll always love you. (To Yuki)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: It's Valentine's day, silly! It's the day when lovers are together!
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: Don't judge me based on the same story and laugh.
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: I thought that, if I could shorten the distance between us, and if you would like me back, then the me that ran away - the dirty me - would be washed away. (To Kyo)
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: Shut up. Quit shouting like you're king of the figgin' world. You're making my ears bleed you bastard. Now I've got some common sense for you... If I wore a tie, it wouldn't change who I am. If I had no piercings, it wouldn't mean I'm nice and if my hair wasn't black, it wouldn't stop me from kicking your ass! Who do you think you are anyway? You think you're God huh?! What's the matter?! Run out of things to say? No more advice?! You're not so hot anymore right now are you?! (Black Haru yelling at student council president for shouting at Momiji)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: ...There's nothing to feel sorry for on my behalf. I've been a very selfish girl. For the first time, I was able to see that. Thank you for worrying about me, mama. (to her mother)
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: So stupid! Stupid, Stupid! You're so stupid! You want to live your life scared of being ratted out?! Screw that! I'd rather let everyone know everything!! (to Yuki, Tohru, Kyo, and Momiji while destroying a classroom)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: I was... relieved. I realized that, compared to the cat, I had it easy. (To kyo)
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: A mystery... (Haru says this a lot, usually when it's not a mystery at all)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: SHII-CHAN, YOU SON OF A BITCH!!!! (after learning that Shigure invited Akito to the summer house)
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: Why..? How can she say things like that so easily? If we hear that from our parents, what are we supposed to do? Rin thinks that she's been "bad". But who do you think is the one who's being "bad" here!?! Having people take their anger out on us, being laughed at, not being taken seriously. We kids get hurt just like you do! Why can't you understand something so simple?! Apologize! APOLOGIZE! APOLOGIZE TO RIN!! [Rin's mom shuts the door] HEY!! I TOLD YOU TO APOLOGIZE!!
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: It's just that I'm fighting the pain of lost love. I guess it's what you'd call a rude awakening... or, maybe... the weight of responsibility? But I'm fine. I'm fine. Caring for someone isn't based on logic. You can't really rationalize emotions. Once I think "I like him"... it's all over.
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: It's amazing no one's locked you up yet (to Shigure)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: Kyo-kun! Kyo-kun! I do love you, Kyo-kun! I love you!!!
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: Oh, you know... I'm gonna do this, and a little of that... and I'm definitely gonna do THAT...! (to Kyo about Tohru, after calling her Kyo's girlfriend)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: Starting today... I'll be with you! I'll always be by your side! (to a young Kyo)
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: You pansy! What kind of girly punch is that? I didn't even feel it! (to Kyo)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: Especially Yuki... He was my first love after all... [Tohru stops walking]
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: You sicko...I knew you were depraved, but I never imagined how low you could sink! (to shigure)
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: Kagura... Regardless of what your reason was, when you played with me...I was happy. Thanks. (To Kagura)
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: [To Tohru] Ever since you left I've been getting pissed off about everything, and because I couldn't understand why, it just pissed me off even more!
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: Yo...time to pay the piper rat boy...I'm here to collect
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: Tohru, I can't stand not being with you... I... because I love you.
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: I love you. When did I start to love you so much?
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: [to Kyo after they trip] What can I learn from a stupid cat like you? You didn't even know that Jason isn't really a bear! He's a character from a horror film!
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: ...As they played the game...I waited for someone to call "onigiri". But no one called. I was very little then. I had almost forgotten about that. But they knew...there would never be room for an onigiri...in a fruits basket.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: [To Yuki] Liar! Moping around like a sad rat who lost his cheese!
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: STOP IMAGINING ME!
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: [To Kyo] Being away from everyone else may be lonely, but being away from you will be even lonelier.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: [referring to Tohru] If anyone can find a way to choke on rice, it's her.
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: Don't you ever talk about Miss Honda that way again, you low life.
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: It's not always easy to see the good in people. In some people, you might even doubt that it's there at all. But if you can somehow, find a way to believe...sometimes that's all it takes to help someone, to give them the strength to find the good in themselves.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: Be selfish, say what you want once in a while. It's okay to let yourself be sad.
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: My mom told me, it's better to trust people than to doubt them. She said that people aren't born with kind hearts. When we're born, all we have are desires for food and material things. Selfish instincts, I guess. But she said that kindness is something that grows inside of each person's body, but it's up to us to nurture that kindness in our hearts. That's why kindness is different for every person.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: Mom taught me that people's differences are something to celebrate. When I thought of all the different shapes of human kindness -- imagining them as round or square...I got really excited. Your kindness is like a candle Sohma-kun. I can feel it light up, and I just want to smile. It's that kind of kindness.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: Maybe I'm not perfect. Maybe I have a long way to go. But someday... someday I'll be able to stand and walk on my own. Without hurting anyone... and without being a burden. (to Kazuma)
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: A woman who can talk tough while completely naked...amazing. (about Rin, the horse)
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: [After seeing Yuki, Shigure, and Kyo Sohma transform for the first time] THEY'RE ALL ANIMALS!
author: Honda Tohru

quote: I don't want to be anyone's burden. I don't want you to be my dad if it's going to hurt you. (thinking about Kazuma)
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: [To Kyo] Perhaps if you'd just die you'd be reincarnated as something more pleasant.
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: [On first seeing Kyo] The ceiling... Is he hurt...? Wh-who... Well, hello, orange-head...
author: Honda Tohru

quote: ou know you're a real wise ass, you know that?! (to Yuki)
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: Leave her out of this... who we let in this house is really none of your concern. You're the one who doesn't belong here. (to Kyo)
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: It's a mystery. Just because of a simple sentence... I get shaken... or I get happy. Kyo-kun is mysterious indeed. (After Kyo says, "You wanna kill some time... with me?")
author: Honda Tohru

quote: I'm gonna take my place as a true member of this family!
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: Ha ha! Eat my dust, rat-boy! (to Yuki)
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: I never... [chuckles]... laughed this hard in front of my parents.(to Tohru)
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: As long as you live things will keep happening! As long as you're alive wishes will keep being made!
author: Honda Tohru

quote: You know... you really are something... (to Tohru)
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: Skin him. Now. Barbeque the bastard!! (referring to Ayame)
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: [To Ritsu Sohma] Sometimes living can be hard, but it's only because we're alive that we can make each other laugh, cry...be happy! [thinking] If that's not the reason for being born in this world...I don't know what is!
author: Honda Tohru

quote: Yo... Are you ready for me to break your neck... Rat-boy?
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: (referring to the letter for Kisa from the teacher) Here. It says to "like yourself". But good things about yourself... how are you supposed to find them? I only know things I hate about myself. 'Cause that's all I know, I hate myself. But even if you force yourself to find good things... it feels so empty. It doesn't work that way. People like your teacher just don't get it. I think... when you hear someone say they like you, for the first time... then you can begin to like yourself. I think when someone accepts you, for the first time... you feel like you can... forgive yourself a little. You can begin to face your fears... with courage.
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: [in her head] My happiness comes from the kindness of those around me.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: [To Kyo] Seriously... Must you break something every time you come home? When are you going to learn? You're too weak.
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: [To Ritsu Sohma] I'm sure that inside your heart...you're trying with all your might to find it on your own...the reason you were born. Because...because really...there might not be anyone who was born with a reason. I think that everyone might have to find one on their own. [in her head] A reason for being born... A reason that it's okay to be alive... A reason to exist. [aloud] I think everyone might have to find it themselves...and decide for themselves. It could be your dreams...your job...or a person. ...The reason you're looking for...might be vague, unclear...and uncertain. [in her head] And you might lose it. [aloud] But as long as you're alive...you have to keep searching for that reason.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: [To Kyo Sohma]If you think of someone's good qualities as the umeboshi in an onigiri, it's as if their qualities are stuck to their back! People around the world are like onigiri. Everyone has an umeboshi with a different shape and color and flavor. But because it's stuck on their back, they might not be able to see their umeboshi. "There's nothing special about me. I'm just white rice." [in her head] That's not true. There is an umeboshi -- on your back. [aloud] Maybe the reason people get jealous of each other, is because they can see so clearly the umeboshi on other people's backs. I can see them, too. I can see them perfectly. There's an amazing umeboshi on your back, Kyo-kun.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: I want to be the only one... who can help the one I care about.
author: Sohma Hiro

quote: Someday... no matter how cold it is now... the snow will melt. Without fail.
author: Sohma Hatori

quote: NOW, SPARKLE, MY HOUSE OF LEARNING!!
author: Sohma Ayame

quote: But I think... I want to live with all my memories. Even if they're bad memories. Even if they're memories that only hurt me... that I'd rather forget. If I keep them and keep trying, without running away, then someday I'll be strong enough that those memories can't defeat me. I believe that because I want to think that there's no such thing as a memory that's ok to forget.
author: Sohma Momiji

quote: Sometimes I think the whole world is conspiring to destroy my house.
author: Sohma Shigure

quote: Why don't you stop forcing yourself on him and calling it love? It's painful to watch (to Kagura about Kyo)
author: Sohma Rin

quote: Idiots should do what idiots can to be quicker.
author: Akito Sohma

quote: True kindness isn't something we're born with. It's something we had to work on... (to Tohru)
author: Kyoko Honda

quote: I just told you what I think, now say something DAMMIT!
author: Sohma Kagura

quote: You make me sick, you and your pathetic girly whining... You're not a MAN! You're just a little kitty-cat who's afraid to fight! Know what?! YOU CAN GO TO HELL! HAHAHAHAHA! UGH! (gets kicked by Kyo in the face)
author: Sohma Hatsuharu

quote: Stupid ocean!!! Ya want me to kill you? Huh??
author: Sohma Kyo

quote: I won't ask what you wish for. I only hope it comes true by your own two hands. (to Kyo)
author: Sohma Yuki

quote: [After Hatori asks what snow becomes when it melts]Ah...um, well...hmm. It becomes spring! No matter how cold it is now, spring will come again! Without fail. It's strange isn't it? But it's true.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: A lot of people are too scared to admit that they're still children. They do everything they can to avoid it. So people who can admit that have a lot of courage.
author: Honda Tohru

quote: You must believe in yourself, follow your path without fear.
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: A poor choice seals our fate.
author: Kurama

quote: I'll help you... But not by death, this world has enough of that. You can keep your life as long as you change the way you live it. It's never too late, believe me.
author: Kurama

quote: Does he really believe we would turn around after all that we've been through?
author: Kurama

quote: Underestimating an opponent is the first step towards defeat.
author: Kurama

quote: We've gone far past the stage of fighting for our honor.
author: Kurama

quote: You do them one favor and they think you're their best friend. This is why I could care less if their entire species was swallowed up.
author: Hiei

quote: You try to sound like you think things through, when in fact, you're not thinking at all.
author: Kurama

quote: I've been under too much stress lately. Killing you should be a good remedy.
author: Hiei

quote: I'm not a fighter of good. I just hate people who are bad.
author: Genkai

quote: Being lucky seems to be your greatest tactic.
author: Hiei

quote: I can't lose to my older sister! Right now she's ahead of me by 2 millimeters in chest size!
author: Risa Harada

quote: *to Riku* At least I'm the cute one!!
author: Risa Harada

quote: Mom, dad, Risa became a delinquent!
author: Riku Harada

quote: He wouldn't notice if I got a crew cut, shaved my head bald, or even grew an afro!
author: Riku Harada

quote: You'll break. Humans are so fragile.
author: Argentine

quote: Are you, what they call, a heart?
author: Argentine

quote: He told me...that which is incomplete seeks completion... yet...that which is incomplete is no better than that which is complete. Do you understand?
author: Argentine

quote: I'm scared to go over there!
author: Masahiro

quote: His stupidity is 50% above normal levels.
author: Masahiro

quote: My name is Krad. But you do not have to remember it, because here you will die.
author: Krad

quote: Risa is a bitch.
author: Krad

quote: Yuusuke... Dammit Yuusuke, listen to me! Everyone has to fight with time to find their place before their inevitable death. Toguro... he ran away from that fight. Don't you ever do the same. No human is ever a one man show. Every decision that you make will affect the countless people who care about you. Do you understand? You can't be a cocky kid anymore.
author: Genkai

quote: Thanks for the real vote of confidence. You two should be cheerleaders, you'd look cute in skirts!
author: Genkai

quote: You've trapped yourself in a body you hated hiding in the pain, and now you want to torture yourself again for eternity...haven't we both paid enough?
author: Genkai

quote: I fight to get what I need, and I kill whoever gets in my way. I always have.
author: Genkai

quote: Oh, silly me. I must have forgotten to turn on my hearing aid. When you're a washed up old hag like me, the memory is the first to go.
author: Genkai

quote: What a silly little girl I was, thinking you would change. I should have known how you would turn out. You had it written in ugly black letters all across your soul.
author: Genkai

quote: I know you play by higher standards, but at least give me credit for the nose.
author: Genkai

quote: Don't make me slap you upside the head, just shoot the damn thing!
author: Genkai

quote: Use the Spirit Wave to float on top of the spike. Good. Now we'll hold this for twelve hours.
author: Genkai

quote: (To Sensui) Here's a one way ticket straight to Hell! YOU BASTAARD!
author: Hiei

quote: Obviously you are underestimating Kurama. Do you know why I chose him to be my partner? To avoid fighting him myself. Watch, he's more cut-throat then I am when it comes to battle, and unbelievably precise.
author: Hiei

quote: My arm did not obey a certain command I gave it, so I decided it needed to be punished.
author: Hiei

quote: I'm warning you. You so much as bruise what you hold in your hand and I will show you pain. The hue of your soul will cease to matter, because you will not be judged when you die, you will no longer to exist.
author: Kurama

quote: What repulsive creature makes my eardrums bleed?
author: Hiei

quote: Nerd violence...
author: Kurama

quote: Even as a child, I found tremendous pleasure in spilling my enemy's blood. Their screams of agony were my music. Once I learned that my mother's frozen tear drop was valuable, I began wearing in open sight of everyone, hoping their greed would entice them to challenge me, thus giving me the opportunity for my next kill.
author: Hiei

quote: Agh, it penetrates my brain!
author: Kurama

quote: Do I have to kill you to stop you from being foolish?
author: Hiei

quote: What irony. Such beauty, sprung from such an ugly soil.
author: Kurama

quote: This is the second time today I hold your life in my hands. I somehow doubt that Sensui will be more merciful than I am.
author: Hiei

quote: Logic is panic's prey.
author: Kurama

quote: This is pure offense. They gave up fighting with their brains a long time ago.
author: Hiei

quote: Tired hands are better than none.
author: Kurama

quote: I know as much of games as I do of hugs and puppies, and care for them even less. Wake me for the end of the world.
author: Hiei

quote: I think Monster Beast Doughnut is a perfect name.
author: Kurama

quote: Kurama, do not make me come over there and remove that precious thing you call a voice box.
author: Hiei

quote: You should know better than to corner an animal like a fox... We have a tendency to show our teeth.
author: Kurama

quote: Don't worry fool, we've entered into an alliance and I'm not the type to break it. Of course, after we win the tournament I can't guarantee anything.
author: Hiei

quote: I thought clowns made everyone else laugh.
author: Kurama

quote: Kurama, there is no person who does not carry scars upon their heart, and if there were such a man, they would be a shallow soul.
author: Hiei

quote: All the while we've been thinking you were a brilliant strategist when really, you're just a lucky fool.
author: Kurama

quote: He's swinging his sword with the grace of a flyswatter. That's no way to survive.
author: Hiei

quote: Regret is a different beast when you live for centuries.
author: Kurama

quote: Tell me, how does it feel to live in a constant haze of stupidity?
author: Hiei

quote: Sorry, I don't have time to be arrested.
author: Kurama

quote: You're a team player, a save-the-day superhero... I hate people like you.
author: Hiei

quote: Any prize worth having requires a risk.
author: Kurama

quote: Rely on impulse and not even your thoughts can betray you.
author: Kurama

quote: What are you waiting for, your balls to drop?
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: *to Urameshi* Sacrificing your life to save billions of others. You've lit our torches and I won't let your death be in vain... even if it means I'll be joining you soon.
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: Please no eat me, please no eat, no!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: First you say I'm faster then you get the heads up on me like I'm an old lady crossing the freeway! Just once I'd like some honesty from the bad guys!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Bite my ankles shorty, I swear I'll make you cry to your mom! If you have a mom, that is!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: I don't know what you're trying to pull, but I'm not into this kinky stuff, and you're WAY too old!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Of all the nerve, assault me and then ask for a meal, you're getting squat!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: So maybe I can't defend against attacks from multiple angles, but sometimes a good defense is just kicking ass!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: How about I gently shove my foot down your throat?
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: You can't end a good party without someone on the floor.
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Stop laughing hamster legs!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: Alright already, you had me at shut up.
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: It smells girly. I don't think I like it.
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: I don't care if it's a girl, a baby or someone's grandma. I'm gonna fight her anyway.
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Maybe there've been times when I've been pissed and hated things, but it wasn't from this work. My dad's a no-show, my mom's lush and school sucks, but this job is the one damn thing I'm good at. If all the crap in my life hasn't screwed up yet, then neither will this and neither will you.
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Aw, man. You're such a friggin' disgrace. I can't believe I spent so much time trying to defeat such a coward. Now get up and fight!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: What the hell was that? All my punches were solid, but he brushed them aside like broccoli he didn't order! Didn't even give me a chance to kick his ass!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Ugly?! Who you callin' ugly?! C'mere you mouse!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: Fine! You heard fox boy, there's nothing we can do for the old hag if she's already limp. Just gotta keep on truckin, yes sir! I'm gonna go outside and make myself a nice, big, shiny first-place medal, sit in the sun, and have a stupendous friggin day, dammit!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: You took my teacher, and now I let you take my friend. What the hell do you want from me?
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Why does everything you say makes me wanna bash your face in?
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: Damn, at least one of us should've died!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: That rose whip of his must be ten feet long. Where does he stash it? All the ways I can think of sound kinda painful.
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: Kurama really is a fox thing, and to think I let him near my kitten!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: Ugly people shouldn't be allowed to smile that much!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: This is DUUUMMMBBB!!!!!!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Hey! Shorty's a lot cooler than I thought.
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: Yusuke Urameshi, age 14. Survived by his mom and everybody. After going through a big ordeal to get his life back, Yusuke had a brief second chance until he was eaten by a fish! That's right! No heroic death! No fighting evil villans! Fish food!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: We all have to die when our time comes, but if we do our duty we don't got regrets. So taste a little piece of my sword, Toguro!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: You know, it'd really be embarrassing to get eaten by something that came out of an egg this tiny.
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: That's it! My head as a trampoline is where I draw the line!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: You know, I really can't stand it when guys pick on people weaker than them...but I guess I'll do it to you anyway!
author: Kazuma Kuwabara

quote: So sorry you caught me on such a bad day, it makes me a real jerk!
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: You shouldn't talk. It makes you sound stupid.
author: Yuusuke Urameshi

quote: Huh? What are you doing falling into a hole? Some genius you are. Serves you right!
author: Silver

quote: (singing) A tisket, a tasket, a pokemon egg basket!
author: Kojirou

quote: Stop meddling in Team Rocket's affairs!
author: Rocket Grunt

quote: Well, I like to look at myself in my spare time.
author: Kojirou

quote: I thought I just heard someone say 'We're blasting off again' but we copyrighted that!
author: Kojirou

quote: I have no idea what just happened, but I'll gladly take credit for it.
author: Kojirou

quote: Okay, I'll talk! Take the elevator to see my boss!
author: Rocket Grunt

quote: Fruit doesn't grow on trees, you know!
author: Kojirou

quote: Being good guys for once would be super-dupulous!
author: Kojirou

quote: When it comes to catching Spinda, we sure are the Winda!
author: Kojirou

quote: We're pulling a big job here! Get lost, kid!
author: Rocket Grunt

quote: Quick! It's coming! Dance like an eggplant!
author: Kojirou

quote: (using a rental Pikachu doll) Thundershock, Thunderbolt, Thunder. I've been defeated so many times by Pikachu's attacks, I know them all by heart! Ahahahahahaha!
author: Kojirou

quote: We have a proud tradition of failure to uphold!
author: Kojirou

quote: Steal one, get one free!
author: Kojirou

quote: This steak is too well done. Take it back and make it rare.
author: Kojirou

quote: How can you not see the beauty of our evil?!
author: Rocket Grunt

quote: Team Rocket may be dirty rotten criminals, but we're not in the business of destroying children's dreams! At least, not yet.
author: Kojirou

quote: With enemies like that, who needs friends?
author: Kojirou

quote: Don't touch the poster at the Game Corner! There's no secret switch behind it!
author: Rocket Grunt

quote: Like, wow, don't I make like the COOLEST girl?
author: Kojirou

quote: Drat, we wasted this episode cheering the good guys!
author: Kojirou

quote: Time for action, Weezing!
author: Kojirou

quote: I'd better split before I catch loser-itis!
author: Green

quote: You stinker! I took it easy on you!
author: Blue

quote: What?! Unbelievable! I picked the wrong Pokémon!
author: Blue

quote: Smell ya later.
author: Blue

quote: There's no sense in going out of your way just to get somebody to like you.
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Whoever smelt it dealt it!
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: The chosen one? I feel more like the frozen one.
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: She is trying to use rep... per... pre... what is it again? Oh, yeah! Perverse Psychology on me!
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Right now, I kinda wish that my mom named me Bob instead of Ash.
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: I'm an apple for a day and I need a doctor right away...
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: And I thought you were going to buy a stone to evolve yourself.
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: You look like a guy anyway!
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Everyone makes mistakes the first time around.
author: Hikari

quote: A left... and then a right. Or is it a right and then a left? Hmm... maybe the postcard's upside-down.
author: Hikari

quote: Oh, no! Wrong way! I want my mom!
author: Hikari

quote: And I'll be happy to vouch for his insanity!
author: Haruka

quote: I think Romeo likes Juliet!
author: Haruka

quote: (after Pikachu accidentally zaps her bike to a crisp) My bike's been barbecued!!
author: Haruka

quote: But just between you and I, what I'm more interested in is traveling and seeing new places. (screams as she goes down a hill after being scared by a Duskull) I guess I... shoulda worn a... (crashes into a tree) helmet.
author: Haruka

quote: Ahh, don't get your underwear in a knot.
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: For a second there I thought the floor was going to--AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!! Where'd the ground go?
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Mom, you're embarrassing me! In front of all these people? Don't you know I'm a big kid now?
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Pikachu, you're a Pika-pal!
author: Kasumi

quote: If anybody's out there, you can come out. And if you're a monster or a ghost, you can stay where you are, and we won't bother you.
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: It's my own recipe which I call Misty's mystery stew, and it's got 47 secret ingredients.
author: Kasumi

quote: Let's eat fast so we can eat again!
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Hahahahahahahah! Now we'll see who has the last quack!
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Very funny. Carrots, peppers, and bugs! Everyone has something they don't like and I don't like bugs!
author: Kasumi

quote: Treecko! Use your Tail Slap attack!
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Ash will never really be alone cause he's got... me.
author: Kasumi

quote: Eat righteous Ponyta dust!
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: If I want your opinion I WILL GIVE IT TO YOU!!!
author: Kasumi

quote: Uh, my name... is... Ketchup! No, wait! My name is really Tom Ato!
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Isn't that color a little bright for a ninja?
author: Kasumi

quote: I'm having a major hat crisis. Could you try to steal Pikachu some other time?
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Love is all about who lands the first punch!
author: Kasumi

quote: We'd love to get up, Ash...unfortunately, you're STANDING on us.
author: Kasumi

quote: PIKA-CHU-UUUUUUU!
author: Pikachu

quote: I have my own method of bending spoons. (bends the spoon with his hands) Ha! Muscle over mind!
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: It was an egg-cident! Get it? 'Egg?
author: Ash Ketchum

quote: Pika Pika!
author: Pikachu

quote: How is this possible? I must be the first person in history who was flushed down the toilet!
author: Yuri Shibuya
