quote: This has got to be a joke! I'm being sucked into a black hole inside a toilet! Either that or there's one gigantic vacuum cleaner down here.
author: Yuri Shibuya

quote: The past is the past. We cannot indulge ourselves in memories and destroy the present.
author: Murata Ken

quote: If... If you have such good deductive skills, you should have been able to see through my sister's disguise easily... But... but... WHY...!!!
author: Ai Haibara

quote: Idiot... There's no win or lose in this, no higher or lower... There is always...only ONE truth.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: This is my case! I'm going to solve it!! Don't get involved!
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: If you stay hidden like this, you'll be able to get away from the police, however, you will never escape your crime... Madam, are you trying... Are you trying to force your son to carry this burden for the rest of his life?
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: You're always away during the important times and all you do is call. There are times when you are finally here, but then you disappear unexpectedly. Every time... every time... always, always, leaving me behind alone. What do you think I am? I love you Shinichi!
author: Ran Mouri

quote: She should want to see me. If I had said how I feel about her, she would miss me even more. All this time, I've been breaking her heart by keeping her wait, yet I can't still appear before her eyes. I never want to see her cry anymore. Even if it means I no longer exist in her heart. How immature of me, right?
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: The only ones that can miss a kick draw match are those who have enough courage to kick it.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Flowers are fragile and ephemeral... Even if you meant to protect them with a surrounding fence from wind and rain, they would die without sunlight...and a spindly fence has no power against a strong wind. Are you fully aware of that, Kudo-kun?..
author: Ai Haibara

quote: Even if you are facing a bitter aspect of life... Drugs and murder are foul, without any excuse. Deserve a red card, for a loser.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: There is only one truth.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Courage is a word that gives you the strength to do what's right, you should not use it as an excuse to murder someone.
author: Ran Mouri

quote: People can really change. When they're far away from each other, their hearts will change. It's so cruel that the only thing I can do is wait.
author: Ran Mouri

quote: Is a reason nesessary? I don't know why you would kill someone. But as for saving someone... A logical mind isn't needed, right?
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: I am sane. It's this world that's crazy.
author: Kariya Jin

quote: I don't give a rat's ass about going to hell. I guess it's because I feel like I'm already there.
author: Mugen

quote: Don't live your life making up excuses. The one making your choices is yourself!
author: Mugen

quote: If you're gonna send people after me, bring on the strongest you have.
author: Mugen

quote: *to Mugen* Do you want to go through all the trouble of causing an uproar to expose the level of your idiocy? Try to moderate your self-importance.
author: Jin

quote: They say "there's always room for dessert", but for me, it's more like "there's always room if someone else is paying".
author: Kasumi Fuu

quote: I have no desire to kill you. In fact, you're not worth killing. Killing you, would only tarnish my blade.
author: Jin

quote: When you point a sword at someone, either you kill them or they kill you, there ain't no in between. So quit talkin' like a fuckin' pussy. Anyone who can't handle that should just SHUT THE FUCK UP and GET OVER IT!
author: Mugen

quote: [after drawing the infinity symbol] I thought of it myself, it stands for... Mugen.
author: Mugen

quote: I think I've found what I was looking for all this time. I, who was always alone... found comrades for the first time.
author: Jin

quote: I think that every day the sun rises, it may be the last time I bask in the sun.
author: Mugen

quote: This world would be in darkness without a sense of duty.
author: Kasumi Fuu

quote: If we were all the way up there, no one here'd look any bigger than a grain of sand.
author: Mugen

quote: [in front of an execution squad] I don't give a rat's ass about going to hell. Guess I feel like I'm already there. What I do mind is the thought of being killed by you ugly bastards. I've gone my whole life without being helped by anyone else, and I'll be damned if I'm gonna let you help me into my grave.
author: Mugen

quote: There's always room for free food.
author: Kasumi Fuu

quote: [looking at a porno magazine] Geez, doing it with a squid.
author: Mugen

quote: [Fuu passed out after one drink and is asleep] Sleeping so carelessly. I could do something to you so easily.
author: Mugen

quote: Kiss my ass.
author: Mugen

quote: Cutting down a man who's done nothing wrong. Is that what you spent all that time honing those skills for? In my opinion, you're worthless.
author: Jin

quote: Forget all that formal crap 'bout comin' at me one at a time. I'll take all you bitches on!
author: Mugen

quote: #NAVN?
author: Lancer

quote: Atone for my sins? [...] I have no sins to atone for, nor have I forced such a meaningless concept on anyone.
author: Archer

quote: Saving someone means not saving someone else.
author: Emiya Kiritsugu

quote: ...She's scary. People who can put on a serious face while joking are the scariest.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: I'm home. What, are you greeting me in an apron? You look pretty good in it.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: Oh, immortality. Heh, I gave that to the snake.
author: Archer

quote: Fortunately, I do not have any pride. But what about it? Will the name of the hero be disgraced? Hah, don't make me laugh, Lancer. You can wash away disgrace with results. You can feed your meaningless pride to the dogs.
author: Archer

quote: You are a hateful woman. You oppose me to the very end. But I shall forgive you.
author: Archer

quote: Yes, the seats are limited. There are always fewer seats called "happiness" than there are people to fill them.
author: Archer

quote: ...a man without fear cannot be wise.
author: Saber

quote: But that's enough. If there is overwhelming power and speed, there is no room for technique. Techniques are something humans invented to compensate for their weaknesses.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: ...Yes, the desire to protect something... is, at the same time, none other than the wish for something to violate it.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: It is the path you have chosen. Take pride in it.
author: Kotomine Kirei

quote: The world is just another word for the things you value around you, right? That's something I've had since I was born. If you tell me to rule such a world, I already rule it.
author: Tohsaka Rin

quote: My goal is so far away that I'm not even on the starting line yet.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: Heroes always die due to unreasonable orders.
author: Lancer

quote: That's right! I admired his desire to save people because it was beautiful! But none of that feeling is my own! What else can you call it but hypocrisy?! I was driven by my obsessive need to help someone. I kept running, neither noticing the pain nor how wrong I was! But it's all a fake. Such hypocrisy can not save anything. No, first of all, I didn't even know what I wanted to save!
author: Archer

quote: Defying me till the very end, huh? But I'll forgive you. Some things are beautiful exactly because they are unobtainable.
author: Archer

quote: The weakness that had accepted death now became the strength of wanting to live.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: I am the bone of my sword. Steel is my body, and fire is my blood. I have created over a thousand blades. Unknown to death. Nor known to life. Have withstood pain to create many weapons. Yet, those hands will never hold anything. So as I pray,
author: Archer

quote: Hunger is the enemy.
author: Saber

quote: A lot of something is ugly in itself.
author: Gilgamesh

quote: Yes, I saw it over and over... Meaningless massacres. Meaningless suffering. Meaningless happiness! I was forced to watch it all. Even when I refused to look, it surrounded me. That isn't what I wished for! I didn't become a Guardian for this!
author: Archer

quote: People die when they are killed.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: Do you have enough swords, King of Heroes?
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: It feels so close to me, yet I can't reach it even if I hold out my hands. But even if I can't reach it, there are things that will stay in my heart. Being in the same time and looking at the same sky – if I can remember that, then even if we are far apart, I believe we can still be together.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: Someday, my memories of her will fade. Her voice, her actions – I might forget them as well. But even then, I will always remember that I loved her.
author: Emiya Shirou

quote: You suddenly appeared in front of me in this hell. The day that I would get to meet you...I always wanted to apologize to you...I only endured because of that! I kept on living.
author: Lucy

quote: I hate these horns.
author: Lucy

quote: When you are miserable, you need something that is even more miserable than you to feel good about yourself.
author: Lucy

quote: I was going to let you go. After all, there aren't many of us out there, but you're just such a pain in the ass.
author: Lucy

quote: Everyone in this place is unhappy. And since they're unhappy, they're probably looking for someone worse off than they are.
author: Lucy

quote: I was afraid of the me that didn't know what he wanted to do. And the days just keep on moving. But even then If I keep on going like this, will I be able to see it? Maybe someday.
author: Yuuta Takemoto

quote: To have the one you think is your ideal self standing in front of you, it's tough...
author: Yuuta Takemoto

quote: A guy who likes someone else shouldn't be taking care of the girl he just dumped.
author: Takumi Nomiya

quote: Mayama, if you can't be with her on every festival, then you have no right to say anything.
author: Takumi Nomiya

quote: I put my hopes in it that maybe I could turn your heart just a little. Why do I end up dreaming over and over again without getting tired of it as if that's all I know.
author: Ayumi Yamada

quote: When we were together, my heart felt tight, too tight to even drink water. If that's called love, then it was really just me who was in love. Just me.
author: Yuuta Takemoto

quote: A day when everything is perfect, when everything will turn into memories, will eventually come.  But I'll probably remember over and over again you were there and everyone else was there. The day we all searched for just one thing.
author: Yuuta Takemoto

quote: I pushed him away and hurt him yet he still stood by my side.  It's not a sane relationship. To be saved by seeing his hurt expression.
author: Rika Harada

quote: There's no way I'm dying before you do, you morally bankrupt Colonel with a God complex.
author: Edward Elric

quote: [telling Mustang about the investigation on Scar] His bloodstained clothes washed up further downstream. We don't know if that means that he's dead, or just naked.
author: Maes Hughes

quote: We will take revenge on your behalf.
author: Ai Enma

quote: I shall cleanse away thy bitterness...
author: Ai Enma

quote: You are coming with me, we are going to hell.
author: Ai Enma

quote: Pitiful shadow cloaked in darkness. Thy action cause men pain and suffering. Thy hollow soul drowns in thy sins. How would you like to see what death is like?
author: Ai Enma

quote: Yeah, it's still a nameless sniper. It's become quite a topic among us. She's still a cadet from the military academy, but at any rate she's got a good arm. It seems she's been brought all the way out here. Hah... to think they have to pull out even a little chick like that... this must be the end.
author: Maes Hughes

quote: *to Edward* So, you hooked up with your mechanic, huh? Not too shabby, sprout.
author: Maes Hughes

quote: A bratty little midget.
author: Maes Hughes

quote: A normal guy like me isn't going to be part of some "believe it or not" episode with nutcases like you guys!
author: Maes Hughes

quote: Are you telling me to go back and put a corpse on trial?
author: Maes Hughes

quote: If you use your head, you won't get fat even if you eat sweets.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Let me tell you about the difference between you and me. It's like the story of the monkey trying to capture the moon. However close he thinks he is to the moon, it's still just the reflection of the moon in the middle of the lake. No matter how he struggles to capture that "moon", he inevitably sinks to the bottom of that lake to no avail. You will never reach me.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: If the pride of a senshi means hurting each other, I don't want it. Nothing will come out of fighting. Fighting isn't the only way to solve things.
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: One day, we will vanish. New senshi and new stars will be born. But you, Sailor Moon, you will forever be immortal. You will be the most beautiful star shining in the sky for eternity.
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: I'm as normal as they come and this is a contest of freaks! What do you want me to do, shoot my slingshot at him?
author: Maes Hughes

quote: If your opponent is of choleric temper, seek to irritate.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: The great flow that maintains the universe, call it the cycle of life, the course of nature each one of us is just a small part of that part. One in the all. Yet without all the individual ones, the all can't exist. This world flows by following grander laws that we can't even imagine. To recognize that flow, to work in it. To decompose, and recreate, that is alchemy.
author: Edward Elric

quote: I wasn't always fighting for love and justice. I was fighting for my friends and loved ones.
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: Some memories... aren't meant to leave traces.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: Don't look back. If you got something to do, then only look forward.
author: Kurogane

quote: [about Vash] The way he looked at me... it was as though he had shot the kid...
author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood

quote: Vash the Stampede... every time I observe his actions I can't help but sense something hidden deep within him, something we can't being to understand. But this much is certain: everyone who has become involved with him has somehow regained an emotion which was once lost.
author: Meryl Stryfe

quote: I picked up my first gun at the age of seven. And I shot. I remember how strangely easy it was to pull the trigger. Ha. I actually laughed. Because that one shot was all that was needed to silence that sickening piece of garbage who had the nerve to call himself my guardian. Ha. It was that simple. And so I was free. Yes, tomorrow would be different. Hm. Tomorrow. As much as I wanted to believe, it only went from bad to worse. A vicious cycle... I didn't want other kids to grow up like me, so I started my own orphanage. It was gratifying work, I was actually doing something for the good of others. It was my place of peace and happiness... yet sometimes, I still think to myself "there's no place worse than this planet. It's horrible here."
author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood

quote: NEEDLENOGGIN!
author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood

quote: Dangerous toys are fun, but you can get hurt.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: Those who make mistakes blame themselves and close their hearts. It's impossible to fix the mistake. Men can't return to the past. That's why they drink. Lushes, drunks, sliding alcohol down their throats to try to dilute the memories that can't be forgotten. Frank Marlon, the gunsmith, does nothing but drink, and questions the glass after it's empty. "Am I wrong? Was I wrong?"
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: Come again, Needle Noggin?
author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood

quote: [singing] Total slaughter, total slaughter. I won't leave a single man alive. La de da de die, genocide. La de da de dud, an ocean of blood. Let's begin the killing time.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: I meditate diligently every morning. The subject is Life and Love. I quit after three seconds.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: I don't let anyone in my sight get away, and my bullets never miss their mark. Especially if it's the heart of a beautiful lady... BANG.
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: Does this man look like the legendary gunman Vash the Stampede? That droopy-eyed, weak-looking, bristle-headed, promiscuous-looking donut freak of a man?
author: Meryl Stryfe

quote: I always knew you were no mere mortal... but I had no idea that you were a cat.
author: Nicholas D. Wolfwood

quote: Hey, "Thou Shalt Not Kill", remember? What kind of church man are you?
author: Vash the Stampede

quote: You're not as slow as you look, monk.
author: Naraku

quote: Well, well, if it isn't the holy monk.
author: Naraku

quote: *to Inuyasha* Your stupidity knows no boundaries. Run and hide while you can.
author: Sesshomaru

quote: The little man is having trouble holding his sword. *to Inuyasha*
author: Sesshomaru

quote: All that for a memory and a dead mortal girl. If I've known that this is all it took to make you fight, I would have killed her sooner. (to Inuyasha)
author: Sesshomaru

quote: *to Inuyasha* You fight as though you're still a child.
author: Sesshomaru

quote: This scheme of yours is beneath me.  Should it fail, Jaken, you will die.
author: Sesshomaru

quote: Be not a fool, I have no such time to waste.
author: Sesshomaru

quote: *to Inuyasha* I quite miss you as well, little brother.
author: Sesshomaru

quote: Can it be that I'm afraid or is it merely I know not my own limit?
author: Sesshomaru

quote: I wish for a heart. A heart of the man whom I'll never allow to forget me.
author: Kikyo

quote: Tragic he said. I'm tragic?
author: Kikyo

quote: Stop coming after the jewel. I do not wish to waste more arrows.
author: Kikyo

quote: I despise you with my last breath. My spirit will not forget that all consuming hatred.  So long that you live, my spirit can not be free. *to Inuyasha*
author: Kikyo

quote: You vile beast. I despise you. You loathsome half man.
author: Kikyo

quote: Inuyasha, you and I were fated to never meet again.
author: Kikyo

quote: Say please, before asking for favor.
author: Inuyasha

quote: I will hunt down Kikyou's killer and avenge her death
author: Inuyasha

quote: Well excuse me for making you sleep in the wild all the time.
author: Inuyasha

quote: That's pretty bad when you can even give a half demon the creeps. *to Kagome*
author: Inuyasha

quote: Are you going to keep staring at me because it's ticking me off. If you got something to say, say it.
author: Inuyasha

quote: It's nice not to be alone.
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: He's thanking me? That can't be good. *about Inuyasha*
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: I was wrong, kill him.
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: Maybe it's just the morning light, but he looks pretty cool standing there with his sword. *about Inuyasha*
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: You sent me into a battle armed with a mere hunch?
author: Inuyasha

quote: I'd rather give up my eye, than give up his sword. Maybe I'm not so worthless after all.
author: Inuyasha

quote: I'm gonna slit your stomach, take out your guts, and put them in a bowl. By the time I'm through with you, you're going to wish it was you who was dead.
author: Inuyasha

quote: Don't be stupid. You're just a human. So back off, shut up, and butt out. *to Kagome*
author: Inuyasha

quote: That's why Kagome sent me, so I can protect you from being protected by him.
author: Shippou

quote: Kagome, what do you have in your bag? Rocks?
author: Shippou

quote: Just apologize, even if you don't mean it. *to some kid, about Inuyasha*
author: Shippou

quote: Six innocent peasants down, hundreds of thousand more to go.
author: Shippou

quote: Aahhh someone saves me.
author: Shippou

quote: You shouldn't talk to yourself. People will wonder.
author: Shippou

quote: Why am I always the one handing out apologies?
author: Shippou

quote: But is it necessary to keep stroking my leg while you talk. *to Miroku*
author: Sango

quote: *while stomping on Inuyasha* Lay down, be silent, sleep, rest, sleep... how many times do I have to tell you...
author: Miroku

quote: This may come as something of a surprise, but I'm a sore loser.
author: Miroku

quote: You're a real sight for sore eyes. *to Kagome*
author: Miroku

quote: I must find a place to pawn this off.
author: Miroku

quote: Someone the exact opposite of Inuyasha.  That's the perfect guy for me.
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: I didn't say get naked, stupid. I just can't stand seeing you in those clothes.
author: Inuyasha

quote: Think you're pretty smart, you old hag. (to Kaede)
author: Inuyasha

quote: I would come up there and finish you off. If you didn't look half dead already.
author: Inuyasha

quote: *guilty voice* Because of my carelessness Araragi-kun realized that his brain is slower than others.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: *to Araragi* A creature like you having a brain residing in his skull...is already a miracle in and of itself.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: *to Araragi* I'm suprised you know such useless things. This is the first time since birth that I've admired you.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: You.... Could it be that you're just an idiot? *to Senjougahara*
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: I don't want that kind of twisted love.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: She's been like that ever since I bought a box of donuts and had one more than her.
author: Meme Oshino

quote: No one cares about Araragi-kun.
author: Meme Oshino

quote: I don't think much of you for sending a girl your age to the place where a wierd man lives.
author: Meme Oshino

quote: Right now, I'm afraid of losing you. Although my life hasn't been very fortunate until now, I'm glad if I caught your eye because of that misfortune. Because of that, I was able to fall for you. So we'll definitely do something, but I want to wait just a bit. So, right now, the last thing I can offer you... Is this starry sky.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Don't get me wrong. It's not like I'm worried about you. But if you don't come back I'll never forgive you.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: You're all grown up, so you won't feel dirty looking at my body, right?
author: Nadeko Sengoku

quote: Don't move. Oh, my bad. I mean, you can move if you want, but it'd be very dangerous.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: I told you, anything is OK, like saying you want me to end all my sentences with "nyu" for a week. Or that you want me to not wear underwear to school for a week. Or that you want me to wake you up every morning for a week, wearing nothing but an apron.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Anything at all. Just this once I'll fulfil whatever your wish is. Whether is world conquest, or eternal life, or to defeat the saiyans that are coming to earth.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Don't call me "this chick".
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: By the way, Araragi-kun... I've never broken up with a man before. Hence, I won't be breaking up with you either.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Come on. I don't like this trend of explaining anything and everything about my love life. It's impossible.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: If anyone else kills you, I'll kill that person.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Being kind to everyone, simply means there's no one special.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: No one's gonna save me. People just accept help selfishly, for their own sake.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: Even crabs have to go on a journey sometime.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: You've got nice solid childbearing hips, so I think you're sure to have healthy babies. Uwehehehe
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: And, Araragi-kun....I love you.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Sunday, May 14th at 14:15:30--the moment I got Senjōgahara's phone number.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: If I fail to make my every-minute reports, a gang of 5,000 brutes will attack your whole family.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: My abusive language is alchemized through 40 kg copper, 25 kg of zinc, 15 kg of nickel, 5 kg of ice that keeps my cool, and 97 kg of spite.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Fine. I'll correct myself. I have no experience. I'm a virgin. More to the point, the only kind of girl who'd talk to an unappealing virgin like you are late-bloomer virgins like me!
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Idiot! Don't spit while you talk! Your virginity might be contagious!
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: If I may suggest, I recommend my waking you up every morning wearing nothing but an apron. Then I can cook you breakfast. Isn't it a man's fantasy to watch that from behind?
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Is that so? Then I'll just use "pathetic" next time.
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: The word "ignorant" has a nice ring to it, so I don't mind being called that, but "incompetent" is going just a bit too far...
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: There stood a high school boy, who for selfish reasons had twice beaten an elementary school girl unconscious, and had gotten all nihistically worked up about it. Actually, that's still me.
author: Koyomi Araragi

quote: Copper, 40g
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: If I kill you, that means I'll be the one closest to you when you're on your deathbed. Isn't it romantic?
author: Senjougahara Hitagi

quote: Gekokujou.
author: Wakashi Hiyoshi

quote: Time gives us happiness, but it can also take everything away from us.
author: Conrad Weller

quote: [To Yuuri Shibuya] Does your Majesty believe in Time? Time gives us happiness, but it can also take everything away from us. During the 15 years that I waited for your Majesty to grow up and for the day when you would come to this world, Time gave me happiness every day. And after you came to this world... This is my conclusion, made during all the time that I have been with you.
author: Conrad Weller

quote: Sorry, I saw an opening that just screamed 'ATTACK,' so I did, ha!
author: Son Goku

quote: Kakarot! Dodge this next attack, if you can!.. But even if I miss you... THIS WHOLE PLANET'S GOING UP IN SMOOOOKE!
author: Vegeta

quote: [Vegeta's last thought before he dies fighting Majin Buu] Bulma, Trunks. This is for you.
author: Vegeta

quote: What's wrong Frieza? Is your brain another one of your weak and under used muscles?
author: Vegeta

quote: Hey hun! I've got a great idea, let's trade! Yo take my spot and I'll fight Hercule!
author: Krillin

quote: My ears do more than just frame my face.
author: Piccolo

quote: Tell me, are all you Saiyans so full of yourselves? Is this how you hide your incompetence? We androids will always be superior to your kind.
author: Android 17

quote: [clapping] A beautiful speech, I can see it now, you truly are a prince with the royal blood of a Saiyan.
author: Android 17

quote: How can androids have babies?
author: Son Goku

quote: Father, you're so tough and proud, hard and cold like a rock. But still, deep down, your heart beats like mine does... I know you feel... I'm your son and I will always love you.
author: Trunks Brief

quote: While I was with you guys, I became more human. I didn't like that. I even have a family and started to like living on earth.
author: Vegeta

quote: Trunks, I never hugged you as a baby... let me hug you.
author: Vegeta

quote: I would rather be a brainless monkey than a heartless monster. (To Frieza)
author: Son Goku

quote: Don't remind me. I'm mad enough to hurt somebody and pounding you just might be the therapy I need.
author: Vegeta

quote: There's only one certainty in life. A strong man stands above and conquers all!
author: Vegeta

quote: Let me ask you. Does a machine like yourself ever experience fear?
author: Vegeta

quote: I'm not going to lie to you, Vegeta, although the answer may be difficult for you to hear. This is the truth. Goku devoted his life to protecting the lives of other. Because of his selflessness, when he died, he was allowed to keep his body and travel to King Kai's Planet. You, on the other hand, have spent your life in pursuit of your own selfish desires. You've caused too much pain. When you die, you will not receive the same reward.
author: Piccolo

quote: I could go one step farther if I wanted to.
author: Son Goku

quote: Not bad, for an early prototype.
author: Piccolo

quote: Even with the energy you took from me, my power is still far greater than your own.
author: Piccolo

quote: You never thought to kill, or fight for revenge. Only to test your limits, and to push yourself beyond them, to become the strongest you could possibly be. How can a Saiyan fight like that, and at the same time be so gentle that he wouldn't hurt a fly? It makes me angry just thinking about it. But perhaps it is my anger that has made me blind to the truth for so long. I see it now. This day has made it all too clear. You're better than me, Kakarot. You are the best...
author: Vegeta

quote: Are you ready now, to witness a power not seen for thousands of years?
author: Vegeta

quote: It looks like they only want me, and that's exactly who they'll get.
author: Son Goku

quote: You can take control of my mind and my body, but there is one thing a Saiyan always keep... his PRIDE!
author: Vegeta

quote: That's what you think, Captain Cocky!
author: Son Goku

quote: Well, this blows.
author: Son Goku

quote: We'd rather die than abandon our comrade!!!
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Sorry, but it doesn't matter if you're a woman or even a child... I don't go easy on anybody who hurts my nakama.
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: I am an ice sculpture mage. I can make anything.
author: Gray Fullbuster

quote: It is always sad to part with those whom you love, but your companions will help you bear that sadness.
author: Erza Scarlet

quote: Keeheehe. I like him. I'm going to make him my cat.
author: Gajeel Redfox

quote: What's the point of magic to begin with... if I can't use it to protect my friends?
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: It's not a crime! Caring about your friends is not a crime!
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Stellar Spirits are not "Shields".
author: Lucy Heartfilia

quote: Why do you find it easy to kill? These are lives dammit!
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: Mages of Fairy Tail... specialize in property damage!
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: To become Hokage is my dream!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect, but it's there for us, trying the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: The ones who suffer from the loss of the game, become stronger. They will challenge us by throwing away everything like their pride and past glories.
author: Tezuka Kunimitsu

quote: Even if you destroy the world, the world you wish for won't come.
author: Cho Hakkai

quote: It looked like it was going to be germ warfare, but the Bacterian fight got me ready for that.
author: Krillin

quote: First it was that sewer-face and now I'm up against a superhero.
author: Krillin

quote: Yamcha, I was worried about you. For all I knew, you were dead in a ditch in a country you can't pronounce. You'll have to make this up to me. And you're going to enjoy it.
author: Bulma

quote: (after Goku moves a huge boulder all by himself) Krillin wants everybody to know he's speechless right now.
author: Krillin

quote: (after Master Roshi tells him they have to dig in a farm) First we're the milkmen, and now we're stinkin' farmers. We never did this in Orin Temple.
author: Krillin

quote: But, you will not go in there with hopes of winning the tournament the first time you compete. To do so would be arrogant! And arrogance is for fools, not warriors! So you will enter the tournament with the sole purpose of improving your fighting skills.
author: Master Roshi

quote: (Master Roshi is reaching for Launch's buttocks as Krillin barges in and makes him angry) Do you time this?
author: Master Roshi

quote: Look Goku, you can go out in public and have your hair sticking out in every direction if you want to, but not me!
author: Bulma

quote: Hey! It looks like now is a good time to do a little tail fishing!
author: Son Goku

quote: Where is your tail? (Searching for tail in Bulma's butt)
author: Son Goku

quote: This might come a little late but... you people make me sick.
author: Galatea

quote: Don't cry. It will make your face even uglier.
author: Galatea

quote: Looks like most of what you say immediately vanishes from your head once you say it. I really envy you for a brain with such a lively metabolism.
author: Galatea

quote: Sorry... I really... want to let you savor your moment of glory a little longer. But I really can't be having this. After all is said and done... he is still my man after all.
author: Riful

quote: My goal isn't your death. I will just torture you, make you awaken and then make you my friends!
author: Riful

quote: Being thrown away by humans, devoted to them even though you aren't one of them... and once they are finished with you, they have you end your life yourself... and not even an ounce of gratitude for all that. On the contrary: for your whole life you are hated and reviled. It really is idiotic. We are a different species after all. Once you start seeing things that way, it all becomes very easy to accept. Do humans shed tears for the birds, pigs, cows and sheep that become their food? Of course they don't. They are a different species after all. That is nature. That is the truth. That is Providence. Your way of thinking up to now was the warped one.
author: Riful

quote: Live, Clare! Your staying alive is the only proof that Teresa ever existed.
author: Irene

quote: Teresa had plenty of chances to kill Priscilla. The reason she didn't was that after being with you, Teresa's heart lost the toughness of a warrior. The Teresa I knew would have dispatched Priscilla without hesitation at their first encounter. After she met you, she was no longer fit for battle. That's why she died. That's the truth. But I think Teresa was happy.
author: Irene

quote: Seeing the same thing at that time and place, either moving forward or running away... I suppose that's what separates those who are fit for battle from those who are not.
author: Irene

quote: [Last words] Well done. You win. As promised, I entrust you with everything. After all I can't do any more at this point anyways. Man, this really annoys me. I really hate people, who put their life on the line like you. Now quickly, finish me off. If you don't hurry, I'll regenerate again. Since you will be fighting in my stead, I won't stand for it if you lose, understand?
author: Ophelia

quote: The idea that you can't die yet because you still have something to protect... that is the foolish illusion of the weak.
author: Ophelia

quote: This is called the "Rippling Sword". "Rippling Ophelia"... Great name, don't you think? But it's not too well known yet. Because most of the people who've seen it are dead.
author: Ophelia

quote: Really! How marvellous! You two are simply marvellous. Which one of you should I kill? Which one of you would be more fun to watch as you wail in agony?
author: Ophelia

quote: Don't you think it's beautiful? That rosy red that spreads only where the body is wounded. Shall I paint you in that lovely red... little boy?
author: Ophelia

quote: [Last words] All right then, I'll put you out of your misery. [Her hands are sliced off] Eh?
author: Teresa

quote: You can come after me as many times as you want. I'll cut you down every time.
author: Teresa

quote: Say your prayers, wretches. Filth like you is even lower than Yoma. I'm going to kill... every last one of you.
author: Teresa

quote: This little girl, who's not even half my size... taught me that tears can flow even from these silver eyes.
author: Teresa

quote: Even if it's a rule... whether or not I follow it is up to me. Whether I obey the rule or break it and get killed by my comrades... is my choice.
author: Teresa

quote: Don't be so quick to throw away your life. No matter how disgraceful or embarrassing it may be, you need to keep struggling to find your way out until the very end.
author: Clare

quote: You said I should have forgotten everything and lived as a human, but... there's no way I could do that. At that time, Teresa was everything to me. Everything I lost... my life, my voice, even my joy in living... Teresa gave those back to me. Teresa gave me everything. So I had no choice but to move forward. I wasn't strong enough to forget all that and continue living.
author: Clare

quote: My existence was nothing more to her than a stone by the side of the road. I wasn't enough to fill her belly. Or perhaps I didn't even get reflected in her eyes. I couldn't even hate the beast that killed Teresa. It was me, overcome by fear, that I could not forgive.
author: Clare

quote: It's okay. There's no pain. [something snaps inside Morty] Oops! [grins maniacally at Yoh] I'm sorry.
author: Johann Faust VIII

quote: No one can predict the future, so it's pointless to fear the unknown.
author: Yoh Asakura

quote: I don't wear these beads just to make a fashion statement. These are my spirit beads - my link to the afterlife.
author: Anna Kyoyama

quote: Boys, am I not always telling you to get in touch with your feelings, your inner gangster? Okay, actually I don't care about your feelings, never did, never will.
author: RYU

quote: I will protect Hinamori.
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: I love adventures.
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: I'm the afro-hair guy.
author: Brook

quote: They call me the "demon child".
author: Nico Robin

quote: I am crazy and stubborn.
author: Franky

quote: I want a devil fruit.
author: Tony Tony Chopper

quote: I'm the smartest member in the Straw Hat group.
author: Nami

quote: I'm the sniper king, sogeking.
author: Usopp

quote: Black leg!
author: Sanji

quote: I'm a pirate hunter.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: There is something mysterious about the life of a pirate.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Even if I DO sacrifice my own life, I will only do it to save my friends.
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: Kira is a god.
author: Mikami Teru

quote: I am Light's girlfriend from university.
author: Kiyomi Takada

quote: I love chocolates.
author: Mello

quote: I am a complete opposite of Ryuk.
author: Rem (Death Note)

quote: I am a famous model.
author: Misa Amane

quote: I stole a death note.
author: Ryuk

quote: I have a mind of a genius and a strong sense of justice.
author: Light Yagami

quote: *referring to Jun* Look at her! Because she hasn't got any boyfriends around she fawns all over her guardian ghost.
author: Tao Len

quote: What are you talking about, Ryu?! That's no damsel, that's a dude!
author: Horohoro

quote: When you get a piece of Ryu you get the whole pie!
author: RYU

quote: There is no sense in worrying about something you cannot control, so why bother?
author: Yoh Asakura

quote: Don't enter a mans bath like that!!!
author: Manta Oyamada

quote: Many things can be achieved, as long as you believe in it.
author: Yoh Asakura

quote: Are you a coward...OR ARE YOU A MAN OF AMERICA?!
author: Tao Len

quote: I'm Faust VIII, your opponent. Please be gentle.
author: Johann Faust VIII

quote: How rude! You knocked his block off, and you didn't even have the courtesy to yell 'Heads up'!
author: Johann Faust VIII

quote: And now it's time for formal introductions. Eliza, my darling, meet Yoh Asakura. Yoh Asakura, meet your doom!
author: Johann Faust VIII

quote: Your friend thinks he can win the prize crown, but he has no hope whatsoever. He is a mere shadow of a true shaman and he will be the first in a long line to perish in my hands.
author: Tao Len

quote: Let's see what kind of heart you have!
author: Johann Faust VIII

quote: I will stay by your side, my friend. Know that I am here, and that I am sorry. I am sorry that... I failed you. After waiting 600 years I made a beginner's mistake. I underestimated my enemy.
author: Amidamaru

quote: [thinking] Step awaaaay from the psycho...
author: Manta Oyamada

quote: That was the sound of the last train back to my house. And once again, I missed it. Our English class always gets out late on Tuesdays, so I have to walk home. But that's OK, because I like English. And the walk home's not so bad. Usually.
author: Manta Oyamada

quote: The easiest way to test a person's real ability is under extreme conditions. Therefore, it's appropriate to choose the Shaman King through fighting.
author: Yoh Asakura

quote: *to Yoh* Because I aim to be the First Lady of the shaman world... You will become Shaman King, whether you want to or not.
author: Anna Kyoyama

quote: *referring to Yoh* [annoyed] Why does he always seem so carefree? He doesn't study... He listens to his favorite music... He even watches the rivers and stars!.. I wish I could live like that...
author: Manta Oyamada

quote: Strength that knows no boundaries is merely violence.
author: Bismarck Waldstein

quote: Only once every hundred years can a Firebender experience this kind of power.
author: Iroh

quote: If I had been more decisive, and acted sooner, I could have stopped Sozin, and stopped the war before it started. I offer you this wisdom, Aang, you must be decisive.
author: Roku

quote: I didn't know what or when, but I knew I'd know it when I knew it!
author: King Bumi

quote: I am not Toph! I am Melon Lord! (Toph laughs maniacally)
author: Toph Bei Fong

quote: All right! Team Avatar is back! Air, water, earth, fire- (grabs a bunch of leaves) fan, and sword! (his leaf limps)
author: Sokka

quote: Get over here, Zuko. Being part of the group also means being part of group hugs.
author: Katara

quote: *referring to the man that took her mothers life* I wanted to do it. I wanted to take out all my anger at him. But... I couldn't. I don't know if it's because I'm too weak to do it, or if it's because I'm strong enough not to.
author: Katara

quote: (to Katara) I know who killed your mother.
author: Zuko

quote: The past can be a great teacher. (trips over a wire, opens a spike trap, and manages to blow himself over it just in time and looks back fearfully) Zuko? I think the past is trying to kill me!
author: Aang

quote: (to himself, after revealing to Aang that he was the one who sent Combustion Man) Ugh, why do I have to be so stupid? How could I tell them that I sent an assassin after them? Couldn't I say that Azula did it? They would've believed that! Stupid! (Hits his head)
author: Zuko

quote: Uh, Toph, I think your feet need their eyes checked.
author: Katara

quote: (gazing at Zuko with a dark look) You might have everyone else buying your... "transformation", but you and I both know you've struggled with doing the right thing in the past. So let me tell you something right now. You make one step backward, one slip up, give me one reason to think you might hurt Aang, and you won't have to worry about your destiny anymore. Because I'll make sure your destiny ends, right then and there. Permanently. (exits the room, leaving Zuko shocked)
author: Katara

quote: To be loved out of sympathy is more devastating than to be rejected.
author: Shinobu Takatsuki

quote: I wonder... isn't it that when you become an adult, you have freedom to explore such a large world. I wonder why is it I feel that the world is so constricted at this moment.
author: Yoh Miyagi

quote: Why is it that I'm anxious when I love him?.. No. I love him, that's why I'm anxious. It's because I love you that even if I take off the armor I've worn all my life, I'll still chase after you.
author: Yoh Miyagi

quote: I'd been wondering all this time, whether there's any meaning to a failed love. Is it something that will disappear, the same as something that never existed. Now I know, there is meaning...there was a meaning...right here.
author: Yuuta Takemoto

quote: To cry because there is something you want to do and to cry because you can't find it. Which is more painful? The only thing I can say is even with all the words I have now, I can't stop her tears.
author: Yuuta Takemoto

quote: To wish for your own happiness is sometimes coupled with another's unhappiness. Since I couldn't pray for my own happiness, I prayed to the moon in the night sky for the happiness of the one whose warm hand I held.
author: Yuuta Takemoto

quote: Why am I so bad at being good?
author: Zuko

quote: Please tell me you're here because the Firelord is a big wimp and you didn't need to take him down.
author: Sokka

quote: Chakras, chakras, everybody loves chakras! Chakras, chakras! Chakra sandwich tastes good! Yum!
author: Pathik

quote: You're not the only one who draws power from the moon. (Hama is shocked that Katara managed to resist her bloodbending) My bending Hama, is more powerful than yours. Your technique is useless on me! (draws water from the ground and forms a ring around herself before directing it at Hama)
author: Katara

quote: With Roku gone and the Great Comet returning, the timing was perfect to change the world. I knew the next Avatar would be born an Air Nomad so I wiped out the Air Temples, but somehow the new Avatar eluded me. I wasted the remainder of my life searching in vain. I know he's hiding out there somewhere: the Fire Nation's greatest threat, the last Airbender.
author: Sozin

quote: Without you, all my plans are suddenly possible. I have a vision for the future, Roku.
author: Sozin

quote: (Zuko is standing before a huge portrait of Fire Lord Sozin)It's never too early for a sitting with the court painter, Zuko. (Sarcastically) Make sure he gets your good side.
author: Azula

quote: Bad skin?! Normal teenagers worry about bad skin, I don't have that luxury. My father decided to teach me a permanent lesson... ON MY FACE!
author: Zuko

quote: [after winning a game of beach volleyball/"Kuai Ball"] Yes! We defeated you for all time! You will never rise from the ashes of your shame and humiliation! [pause] Well, that was fun.
author: Azula

quote: Ladies and gentlemen, THE FLAMEO'S!
author: Aang

quote: Or, as they say in the Fire Nation, "stay flamin'!"
author: Aang

quote: Nice speech, Azula! It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way!
author: Ty Lee

quote: I've seen enough of Ba Sing Sei. And I can't even see!
author: Toph Bei Fong

quote: Looks like Long Feng is long gone! (laughs) Oh, I've been waiting to use that one!
author: Sokka

quote: I know I am not the person you expected...and I did not expect to be licked by a giant tongue just now.
author: Pathik

quote: Don't you know that fans only make flames stronger?
author: Azula

quote: [Ty Lee unleashes a furry of jabs into the back of a Kyoshi warrior, dropping her, and unleashes a final taunt] You are not prettier than we are.
author: Ty Lee

quote: It's always best to believe in one's self but with a little help from others can be a great blessing!
author: Iroh

quote: You call it dirt. I call it a healthy coating of earth.
author: Toph Bei Fong

quote: (singing) Leaves from the vine
author: Iroh

quote: It won't work. You country-bumpkins will stand out a mile. [Eats food with her hands]
author: Toph Bei Fong

quote: I know you're not supposed to cry over spilled tea, but (sniffs) it's just so sad!
author: Iroh

quote: [looking through a periscope at the dust cloud Toph made] Hey... Look at that dust cloud. It's so...poofy! [Mimes by closing and opening her hand] Poof!
author: Ty Lee

quote: *referring to Azula* She can shoot all the lightning she wants at me, I'm not going into that wall sludge juice. [shudders]
author: Mai

quote: Yesterday my mouth tasted like mud. Now it tastes like sand. I never thought I would miss the taste of mud so much.
author: Toph Bei Fong

quote: I'm going to spend my vacation AT THE LIBRARY!
author: Sokka

quote: Gooood morning earth-bending student!
author: Toph Bei Fong

quote: Aang, this is my friend Foo-Foo Cuddly Poofs, Foo-Foo Cuddly Poofs, Aang.
author: Sokka

quote: [yelling angrily toward the sky] You've always thrown everything you could at me! Well, I can take it, and now I can give it back! Come on! STRIKE ME! You've never held back before!
author: Zuko

quote: [aiming at a small prey animal] You're awfully cute, but unfortunately for you, you're made of meat.
author: Sokka

quote: The stars sure are beautiful tonight. [angrily] Too bad you can't see them, Toph!
author: Katara

quote: Azula always lies, Azula always lies.
author: Zuko

quote: Somebody's a little light on his feet. What's your fighting name, the Fancy Dancer?
author: Toph Bei Fong

quote: [after Aang enters the ring] Do people really want to see TWO little girls fighting out here?
author: Toph Bei Fong

quote: [after finding his stolen boomerang] Boomerang! You do always come back!
author: Sokka

quote: [About Omashu] There really is no fathoming the depths of my hatred for this place.
author: Mai

quote: [to Azula] Please tell me you're here to kill me.
author: Mai

quote: No! Bad Fire Nation baby!
author: Sokka

quote: Look, I hate to be the wet blanket here, but since Katara's busy, I guess it's up to me.
author: Sokka

quote: You make a fine octopus, Pupil Aang.
author: Katara

quote: [as Zhao threatens the moon spirit] Whatever you do to that spirit, I'll unleash on you tenfold! Let it go now!
author: Iroh

quote: [to an unconscious Aang] I finally have you. But I can't get you home because of this blizzard. There's always something. Not that you would understand. You're like my sister. Everything always came easy to her. She's a firebending prodigy and everyone adores her. My father says she was born lucky. He says I was lucky to be born. I don't need luck, though. I don't want it. I've always had to struggle and fight, and that's made me strong. It's made me who I am.
author: Zuko

quote: [to Katara] You rise with the moon. I rise with the sun.
author: Zuko

quote: [after Princess Yue unexpectedly kisses him] Okay, now I'm really confused. Happy, but confused.
author: Sokka

quote: I laugh at gravity all the time. Hahaha, gravity...
author: Aang

quote: To master the bending disciplines you must first master discipline itself, but you have no interest in this so I have no interest in you.
author: Jeong Jeong

quote: Water brings healing and life. But fire brings only destruction and pain. It forces those of us burdened with its care to walk a razor's edge between humanity and savagery. Eventually, we are torn apart.
author: Jeong Jeong

quote: Destiny? What would a boy know of destiny? If a fish lives its whole life in this river, does he know the river's destiny? No! Only that it runs on and on out of his control. He may follow where it flows, but he cannot see the end. He cannot imagine the ocean.
author: Jeong Jeong

quote: You want to walk into a Fire Nation town when they're all fired up with their, you know, fire?
author: Sokka

quote: [to Zuko] You know what the worst part of being born over a hundred years ago is? I miss all the friends I used to hang out with. Before the war started, I used to always visit my friend Kuzon. The two of us, we'd get in and out of so much trouble together. He was one of the best friends I ever had, and he was from the Fire Nation just like you. If we knew each other back then, do you think we could have been friends too?
author: Aang

quote: That's how Sokka started. Now look at him! He thinks he's an Earthbender!
author: Aang

quote: I'm too young to die!
author: Sokka

quote: Sokka, you're supposed to put the tarp on top of the tent. You know, so we don't get rained on?
author: Katara

quote: [soothing Appa] Sokka's just jealous 'cause he doesn't have an arrow.
author: Aang

quote: *to Katara* Try to understand. I need to capture him to restore something I've lost. [Katara jerks her head away from Zuko] Perhaps in exchange, I can restore something you've lost.
author: Zuko

quote: The disturbance in the stitch, is a disturbance in the heart.
author: Anissina von Karbelnikoff

quote: I like playing with my hair.
author: Gian Carlo

quote: I'm a devilish and talented butler.
author: Gian Carlo

quote: La lang natamad na ako.
author: Gian Carlo

quote: Listen carefully because I'm only gonna say this once, I love you.
author: Motoharu Yano

quote: *singing* It's a long long way to BaSingSei, but the girls in the city they look so pretty~!
author: Iroh

quote: The coin is appreciated...but not as much as your smile.
author: Iroh

quote: *to Aang* You need to find someone who WAITS and LISTENS before striking.
author: King Bumi

quote: Neutral Jing is the key to earthbending. It involves listening and waiting for the right moment to strike.
author: King Bumi

quote: *talking about King Bumi* This isn't about finding a teacher. This is about finding my friend.
author: Aang

quote: A small mistake can make a huge difference.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: The best way to escape reality without running is smiling even if it is obviously fake.
author: Sai

quote: It's always a lot more easier to let something fall apart than it is to try to hold it together.
author: Ayasegawa Yumichika

quote: Learn to treasure your life because unfortunately, it can be taken away from you anytime.
author: L Lawliet

quote: I don't care how pathetic or embarassing I look in front of everyone. My love for him...only that...is my bitter sweet treasure.
author: Ayumi Yamada

quote: ‎[to Takumi Myama] Why are you blocking us when you have someone else that you like? We can easily see her feelings towards you so there's no way you haven't realized what's there. Yet you just leave the situation half-finished. Aren't you just saving her for when things don't work out with your favorite?
author: Takumi Nomiya

quote: Its ony one simple thing, but why do I feel like forever I cannot reach it. Only keep on and on, staying at the same spot.
author: Ayumi Yamada

quote: Look what I found! These are packue berries, known to cure the poison of the white jade plant... THAT, or makaoli berries that cause blindness.
author: Iroh

quote: Hmm... *puts on a happy face* Delectable tea... *changes to serious face* or deadly poison?..
author: Iroh

quote: *to Zuko* You're looking at the rare white dragon bush. It's leaves make a tea sooo delicious, it's heartbreaking... THAT, or it's the white jade bush, which is poisonous.
author: Iroh

quote: In the avatar state... You're at your most powerful, but you're also...at your most vulnerable. If you're killed in the avatar state, the reincarnation cycle will be broken and the avatar will cease to exist.
author: Roku

quote: The avatar state is a defense mechanism - designed to empower you with all the skills and knowledge of the past avatars. The glow is the combination of all your past lives. Focusing their energy to your body.
author: Roku

quote: *to Zuko* Why would father want YOU back? Except to lock you up where you can no longer embarrass him!
author: Azula

quote: *to Zuko* You know, father blames uncle for the loss of north pole... and he considers YOU a miserable failure for not finding the avatar.
author: Azula

quote: [sarcastically] In my country, we exchange a pleasant "hello" before asking questions.
author: Azula

quote: *to Kikyo* I swear... I will never let Naraku harm you.
author: Inuyasha

quote: Are you stupid?
author: Inuyasha

quote: Don't you faint on me, you stupid girl.
author: Inuyasha

quote: Windscar!
author: Inuyasha

quote: Hey, Shippo. Your village called.They're asking for their idiot!
author: Inuyasha

quote: I am not going to kill you - I am going to break you.
author: Naraku

quote: [with a bow and arrow ready to fire] Not as pretty as his, huh? What would you know about it? You live in a time where they don't even have SHAMPOO.
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: [repeatedly] Inuyasha, sit, boy.
author: Kagome Higurashi

quote: Mighty Katara..? I like that.
author: Katara

quote: Who knew that floating on a piece of drift wood for three weeks with no food or water... and sea volchers waiting to pluck out your liver could make one so tense.
author: Iroh

quote: I was in the avatar state... But I was outside my body watching myself. It was scary. I was scary...
author: Aang

quote: There are reasons each of us are born. We have to find those reasons.
author: Iroh

quote: [to Zuko about Aang] It was not by chance that for generations people have been searching for him, and now you have found him.
author: Iroh

quote: *to Aang* Protection and power are overrated. I think you are very wise to choose happiness and love.
author: Iroh

quote: You are not the man you used to be. You are stronger and wiser and freer than you ever used to be. And now you have come at the crossroads of destiny. It's time for you to choose. It's time for you to choose good.
author: Iroh

quote: [to Iroh, while he's bathing] Enough. we need to leave now! Get out of the water.
author: Zuko

quote: Earthbenders! You don't know me, but I know of you. Every child of my water tribe village was rocked to sleep with stories of the brave Earth Kingdom and the courageous earthbenders who guard its borders. Some of you may think that the Fire Nation has made you powerless. Yes, they have taken away your ability to bend, but they can't take away your courage and it is your courage they should truly fear! Because it runs deeper than any mine you've been forced to dig, any ocean that keeps you far from home. It is the strength of your hearts that make you who you are, hearts that will remain unbroken when all rock and stone has eroded away. The time to fight back is now! I can tell you the Avatar has returned! So remember your courage, earthbenders, let us fight for our freedom!
author: Katara

quote: The guards will show you to your chamber. The one that used to be the bad chamber, until the recent refurbishing that is. Of course, we've been calling it the new chamber, but we really should number them. Uh, take them to the refurbished chamber that was once bad!
author: King Bumi

quote: There's an airbender in our presence and not just any airbender, the Avatar! Now what do you have to say for yourself, Mr. Pipinpadaloxicopolis?!
author: King Bumi

quote: *referring to Sokka* He's just upset because a bunch of girls kicked his butt yesterday.
author: Katara

quote: Relax, Sokka. Where we're going, you won't need any pants!
author: Aang

quote: Simple: girls are better at fixing pants than guys, and guys are better at hunting and fighting and stuff like that. It's just the natural order of things.
author: Sokka

quote: This whole Avatar thing... maybe the monks made a mistake.
author: Aang

quote: *after Zuko defeats Zhao* So this is how the great Commander Zhao acts in defeat? Disgraceful. Even in exile, my nephew is more honorable than you. Thanks again for the tea. It was delicious. [Iroh and Zuko leaves]
author: Iroh

quote: [to himself as he chops at the ice] I'm just a guy with a boomerang. I didn't ask for all this flying and magic.
author: Sokka

quote: *after meeting Aang for the first time* Good news for the Fire Lord. The nation's greatest threat is just a little kid.
author: Iroh

quote: [after Zuko calls him a child] Well, you're just a teenager.
author: Aang

quote: [to Aang, who is playing around] Stop! Stop it right now! What's wrong with you? We don't have time for fun and games with the war going on.
author: Sokka

quote: [to Katara] If you want to be a bender, you have to let go of fear.
author: Aang

quote: [to Katara] Come... closer... closer... Will you go penguin sledding with me?
author: Aang

quote: [sarcastically, after Aang tells him about his flying bison] Right, and this is Katara, my flying sister.
author: Sokka

quote: I don't need any calming tea! I need to capture the Avatar!
author: Zuko

quote: My grandmother used to tell me stories about the old days, a time of peace when the Avatar kept balance between the Water Tribes, Earth Kingdom, Fire Nation, and Air Nomads. But that all changed when the Fire Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, only he could stop the ruthless firebenders. But when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years have passed and the Fire Nation is nearing victory in the war. Two years ago, my father and the men of my tribe journeyed to the Earth Kingdom to help fight against the Fire Nation, leaving me and my brother to look after our tribe. Some people believe that the Avatar was never reborn into the Air Nomads and that the cycle is broken, but I haven't lost hope. I still believe that somehow...the Avatar will return to save the world.
author: Katara

quote: Ore-sama no bigi ni yoi na!
author: Keigo Atobe

quote: All humans die the same, the place they go after death isn't decided upon by a god it is Mu (nothingness).
author: Ryuk

quote: It's impossible to feel exactly the same as someone else... but when you both care for each other, your hearts are able to draw a little closer together. I think that's what it means to make your hearts as one.
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: There's a lot of products that you can buy with money...but my love is the only limited product that only you can have.
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: There was no place for me, so I had to make one for myself, and then I realized, I had a place, but I was the only one in it. I didn't know any other way to live.
author: Inuyasha

quote: I've heard similar threats from a number of poor fools whose memories I keep alive by dancing on their tombstones!
author: Inuyasha

quote: I loathe all things, I despise every living creature who's bound to time.
author: Kikyo

quote: To live is to die, to die is to live. Pure is unpure, unpure is pure.
author: Kikyo

quote: Yudan sezu ni ikkou.
author: Tezuka Kunimitsu

quote: Mada mada dane.
author: Ryoma Echizen

quote: If history repeats itself, and moves in a circular path, then believing that whatever force is turning it is perfect, is all we can do as we move ahead. Pushed along by forces beyond our control, waiting, for the blade to be swung.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: If I really liked him I should hope for his happiness. But like you said in the car, I actually hoped they would break up.
author: Ayumi Yamada

quote: The person you like the most, likes you back the most. It seems so simple. But why is it? It feels like it will never come together...forever like this...
author: Ayumi Yamada

quote: So shut up about "destiny" and...how people can't change! 'Cause... unlike me... you're not a "failure".
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Sasuke! Sasuke! Sasuke! What does he have that I don't have?!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Sasuke, I always knew you were alone. In the beginning I was glad because I thought you were like me - I wanted to talk to you! But you... didn't speak. You always had everyone watching you. You could do everything and we were too different. So I decided that you would become my rival. I didn't want to lose because I was called a loser all the time. Even when we became Team 7, I still thought this way. I always tried to lie but... but the truth is... I always wanted to be like you. I aspired to be like you. Because of that... I was glad that you wanted to fight me.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: When I'm with Iruka-sensei, I think if that's what having a father is like... *to Sasuke* When I'm with you, I think if that's what having a brother is like.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Sakura-chan, you sure do love Sasuke, don't you?
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: DYNAMIC ENTRY!
author: Might Guy

quote: [after learning Guy Sensei's name. Might Guy] Yeah, mighty stupid looking guy!
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: Hmhmhmhm, I think I will play with you a bit before killing you!
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: Hmm... Itachi... it would be annoying if he moved around a lot. Perhaps we should cut off a leg or two?
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: I'll enjoy shaving you to death.
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: Konoha's Uchiha clan and the Mist's Seven Shinobi-gatana seem petty before his name.
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: Against the power of will I posses... The capability of my body is nothing.
author: Kimimaro

quote: [after Naruto does his Shadow Clone Jutsu] Oh, there sure is a lot of garbage scattered around here. But, trash is just trash after all. It simply needs to be cleaned up.
author: Kimimaro

quote: I don't hate the darkness. It was IN the darkness that I was raised.
author: Kimimaro

quote: I've been wondering... There must be a purpose for people being born into this world. Why are we here? What does it mean? I've been thinking about it a lot lately. I realized that finding our purpose IS the meaning. That's why we're here. And the ones who find it... They're the only ones who are truly free.
author: Kimimaro

quote: *referring to Orochimaru* I am not his pawn..! He is the one, the only one who ever gave my life meaning!! But how could the likes of you EVER UNDERSTAND THAT?!?
author: Kimimaro

quote: I will see the truth of this world... LORD OROCHIMARU WILL SHOW ME!!!
author: Kimimaro

quote: I see...since I am no longer going to be Lord Orochimaru's vessel, my duty is to protect the vessel.
author: Kimimaro

quote: You've only seen one of my dances.
author: Kimimaro

quote: Lets see, how should I kill you?
author: Kimimaro

quote: [to the Sound Ninja Four] Which do you prefer? To die, or to obey?
author: Kimimaro

quote: Is there really a god? If there is one, why does he keep me confined in here?
author: Kimimaro

quote: If Tayuya comes back, I'll kill her.
author: Kimimaro

quote: Akamaru, what's wrong boy? Have you forgotten my scent? We've always been together haven't we? We grew up together. Akamaru please, somewhere in there, there has to be a part of you that remembers. Show me that you remember. AKAMARU! Forgive me. Can you? I know that I've brought you nothing but pain and suffering. I broke my word. I swore I'd always protect you. Akamaru I'm sorry. Sorry I wasn't a better master. I'm here. Here for you. Forever.
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: I called you an idiot, idiot!
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: It's not bad enough they buried us alive in the oversized dung heap, but now they're stealing our chakra. You gotta give these guys credit for thoroughness!
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: A wall's a wall and there's no wall I can't punch a hole through!
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: Hinata, untie the ropes before you faint.
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: I must be a pretty pathetic owner for you to have bitten me, Akamaru....
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: A fair warning... we ninja of the Sand aren't as easygoing as those of the Leaf. But getting close to Kuroari so carelessly...isn't good!
author: Kankuro

quote: [Thinking] What a sucker. He doesn't know I can re-establish control over my puppet within a blink of an eye. It's what makes me an expert puppet master. And so what if Crow's body is out of commission? I don't need his body. Every part of him is a lethal weapon. [To Shino] Looks like you underestimated me, bug boy. For the last time! There's enough poison on that to drop an elephant, so you're dead.
author: Kankuro

quote: You tick me off. I hate short people anyway. And you're so impertinent for someone younger than me. It makes me want to break you.
author: Kankuro

quote: But I want to play around before some noisy people come!
author: Kankuro

quote: Gai...what I said earlier...I was out of line. I was being a self-righteous fool. I realize now that if I'd been in your shoes, I probably couldn't have stopped him, either.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: I don't know what this boy means to you, Gai, but I shouldn't have to tell you that we never bring our personal feelings into play. I didn't think you were capable of it.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: I've lived longer than you. And times have been bad. I know the pain of loss. You and I haven't really been fortunate. It's true. But it could be worse. For me, and for you, too... We've found good friends, haven't we? Because of your losses, you should understand.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Sorry I'm late. You wouldn't believe the traffic.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Sorry I'm late guys, a black cat crossed my path so I had to go the long way.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: [thinking] If I'm still sane by the time I finish their training it'll be a miracle!
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: I will show you my own move.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: A ninja must see underneath the underneath.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Leaf Village Secret-Finger Justu...1,000 Years of Death!!! *sticks his fingers up Naruto's ass*
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Hmmm...how do I put this? My first impression of this group...you're a bunch of idiots!
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: [about the inefficacy of his attack against Tsunade] Did it not penetrate deep enough because of her fat breasts?
author: Kabuto Yakushi

quote: The more you want something, the harder it is to wait for it.
author: Kabuto Yakushi

quote: Mm, she's strong and scary. I bet she's single.
author: Kabuto Yakushi

quote: [About Naruto] Well that's typical. Not happy unless he's giving people a heart attack.
author: Iruka Umino

quote: [when Naruto transforms into a woman in front of the whole class] CUT THE STUPID TRICKS! THIS IS YOUR LAST WARNING!!
author: Iruka Umino

quote: [as a child] Why should I be sad?! My parents died protecting the village from the monster fox. They're heroes, and I'm the son of those heroes! If I cry, it's because I'm happy! I'm not even sad that they went and left me all alone...
author: Iruka Umino

quote: I hate the fox, but the boy - I don't hate the boy.
author: Iruka Umino

quote: It seems like the small leaves in the Village of Konoha have inherited that "will of fire" you spoke of, Third. The fire on the leaves will eventually burn greater and stronger... It will flash its light and protect this village.
author: Iruka Umino

quote: When a person dies, he disappears, along with his past, current lifestyle, and his future. Many people die in missions and wars. They die easily and in surprisingly simple ways. Hayate was one of them. Those who die have goals and dreams. But everyone has something as important as those. Parents, siblings, friends, lovers... people who are important to you. They trust and help each other. The bond between the people important to you ever since birth and the string that binds them becomes thicker and stronger as time goes by... It's beyond reason. Those bound to you by that string will do that because it is important.
author: Iruka Umino

quote: Billboard brow!!!
author: Ino Yamanaka

quote: Oh, I'm sorry. Her head's so empty, so I mistook her for a vase and put flowers in her. You might want to spit that out quick, though. Those can be quite poisonous.
author: Ino Yamanaka

quote: I believe you have the potential to bloom into something even more beautiful than the cosmos.
author: Ino Yamanaka

quote: I am of no more use as his tool. Please, kill me.
author: Haku

quote: Often people have it wrong, mistakenly believing...that showing mercy to an enemy is kindness. They spare the foe whose life is in their hands... But don't you see? It's an empty existence... to go on living... alone and unloved... when defeat's already cost you your dream!
author: Haku

quote: Can you understand? Not having a dream... not being needed by anyone... The pain of merely being alive.
author: Haku

quote: That is when I realized that in all of the world no one needed me. I was alone.
author: Haku

quote: I'm sure that the boy I killed, who shared that skill, must also have grown up knowing the pain of which I speak. We are special. We are powerful. And we are feared.
author: Haku

quote: I want to make his dreams come true...
author: Haku

quote: Is there... somebody precious to you?
author: Haku

quote: I took the life of the woman I was supposed to call mother in the process of being born... in order to become the world's strongest shinobi... I became the incarnation of sand...
author: Gaara

quote: It's too bad I don't think of you as anything. If you get in my way... I'll kill you.
author: Gaara

quote: BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!! MY BLOOOOOOOOOOOOOD!!!
author: Gaara

quote: You can make a rain of 1,000 needles. I will make it rain blood.
author: Gaara

quote: People cannot win against their loneliness.
author: Gaara

quote: [When Ino visits him in the hospital] Hehe. I'm also the type that gets girls to visit him. Take that, Shikamaru!
author: Chouji Akimichi

quote: I'm not fat, I'm pleasingly plump!
author: Chouji Akimichi

quote: This punch is heavier than life itself!
author: Chouji Akimichi

quote: Chubbies rule!
author: Chouji Akimichi

quote: Time's a-wastin' people, let's go!
author: Anko Mitarashi

quote: *to Ichigo* I thought you were interesting before, but now you're just a creepy kid.
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: There ain't a single coward who'd turn tail and run from just that! Not among the men of the Shiba clan!
author: Ganju Shiba

quote: *to Ichigo, after he released his bankai for the first time* What is that? Are you saying that this small thing is a bankai? Isn't it just the sealed form of your zanpakutō? I see. First the execution, and now Bankai. I can see that you enjoy treading on our pride. Very well, then. I will carve into your body...The punishment for injuring our pride!
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Though you fight a fierce battle on the outside, your inner world trembles not the slightest.
author: Zangetsu

quote: To fight...Or to live...Choose.
author: Zangetsu

quote: Ichigo... I hate the rain. Rain falls in this world, too. When your heart is in chaos, this sky becomes clouded. When you are sad, rain falls so terribly easy. Can you understand...the horrible feeling of being pelted by rain when you're all alone in this solitary world? If only to stop that rain, I shall lend you any strength. If you trust in me, I won't let a single drop of rain fall from that sky. Ichigo, trust me...you are not fighting alone.
author: Zangetsu

quote: Just how many times must I strain my voice before it will reach you? And yet, nowhere in this world can there be anyone who knows me better than you.
author: Zangetsu

quote: *referring to Ichigo* I see. So I still haven't reached you...
author: Zangetsu

quote: [When she hops into the bath with Ichigo, but in cat form] What? Are you a little disappointed? Come on, be honest. You are, aren't you? You little pervert!
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: That's enough, Soifon. You remind me of myself. I even think of you sometimes as my little sister.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: Kisuke and I used to play here when we were kids. We modeled the one under his shop after this one. It was our own secret playground.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: [thinking after Soifon asks why she didn't take her with her] You've gotten stronger since the last time we were together, Soifon.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: No matter how many times I do this, it results in a wonderful reaction from you, Ichigo!
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: It looks to me like you've completely lost your touch.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: Are you sure you don't want to see this smooth skin of a young woman? This will be the last time...
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: Do you remember the first time you walked? No. So you weren't conscious of it. Then why did you walk? Everyone was born knowing how to walk. It's called instinct. That's what this boy reminds me of. He knows he can achieve bankai, so he continues.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: In three days, I will make this boy stronger than you.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: It's been a while... Byakuya-bo.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: You shy, little boy.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: Can't you tell, Aizen? You no longer have a place to run away to.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: Ichigo...We can't...Watch any longer...Eachother's backs...I just can't...I just can't help you out anymore.
author: Yasutora Sado

quote: I will defeat him. It may cost my life to do it. However, if I survive, I'll make a promise. The same promise as that time, on the same thing as that time.
author: Yasutora Sado

quote: [in reply to Shunsui Kyōraku] It's true, I know nothing about her (Rukia). It might not be quite enough for me to risk my own life over. But...Ichigo wants to save her. That reason is enough for me.
author: Yasutora Sado

quote: I don't believe that an absolute power really exists in any world. Power is unstable. It changes constantly. Small differences will always appear, as one has between you and I. So the one who widens that gap will be the winner!
author: Yasutora Sado

quote: [to Arrancar Gantenbainne Mosqueda] It seems that my power is more akin to yours than that of a Shinigami or a Quincy.
author: Yasutora Sado

quote: Abuelo... That means grandpa.
author: Yasutora Sado

quote: [thinking to self about her past, and when she first met Kenpachi] I had no name. I had no parents. I was from District 79, "Kusajishi", of the North Alley of Rukongai. I had never seen anything in colors other than the bloody red... Everyone was more beast than human. It wouldn't have been strange to have a baby get stepped on and die. But then you appeared. From District 80, "Zaraki", of the North Alley of Rukongai. You appeared to me from even deeper in the darkness. You demolished the chaotic world that was dyed in blood... And then, you gave me a name. If it wasn't for you...I wouldn't be alive today. Yes...Since that day...You've been everything to me in this world.
author: Kusajishi Yachiru

quote: [to Ichigo] Try to stay alive, okay? That way, you and Kenny can play again some day!
author: Kusajishi Yachiru

quote: Ken-Chan!
author: Kusajishi Yachiru

quote: Someone get this creature off meeeeeee!
author: Kusajishi Yachiru

quote: Sorry, but...believe it or not, I'm a male too.
author: Ryuk

quote: Hey, all it did was go around in a full circle.
author: Ryuk

quote: As a rule, they say humans haunted by a shinigami have nothing but misfortune.
author: Ryuk

quote: Apples taste so much better indoors.
author: Ryuk

quote: For me, apples are like cigarettes and liquor for humans. If I'm deprived, I go into withdrawals.
author: Ryuk

quote: That was worth an academy award, Light.
author: Ryuk

quote: I feel like I'm watching a sitcom.
author: Ryuk

quote: Humans are so... interesting.
author: Ryuk

quote: That may be so. What is right from wrong? What is good from evil? Nobody can truly distinguish between them. Even if there was a god. Now, supposing a god and his world existed, even then I'd stop and think for myself. I'd decide for myself whether his teachings are right or wrong. After all, I am just the same as you. I put faith in my own convictions as to what I believe is right, and consider them to be righteous.
author: Near

quote: Seriously, enslavement is funny...
author: Near

quote: I've wanted to make him taste his own pathetic failure with all my heart.
author: Near

quote: Does she understand what she's doing, this stupid woman?
author: Near

quote: For me and Mello, L has been the only person we adore, and the only person who deserves our respect.
author: Near

quote: You said she's smart, but it only means she got high marks, and she's actually a stupid woman.
author: Near

quote: Making such a sleazebag a spokesman...
author: Near
