quote: People in supervising positions in investigation are supposed to give too much of their opinion, and if they are wrong, all it would take is an apology.
author: Near

quote: I don't know what to say. Now, I think it's just best to observe closely.
author: Near

quote: To Mello, it's like playing a videogame against me, I think. "See who gets to Kira, the last boss, first."
author: Near

quote: You, who've taken on his name, have managed – well, nothing.
author: Near

quote: It's not whether it's feasible or not – it's what I'm doing.
author: Near

quote: You let them take it from right under your nose.
author: Near

quote: Things are getting interesting now.
author: Near

quote: And that's precisely why it's so convenient, don't you think?
author: Near

quote: I'm pleased to meet you at last, L Number Two.
author: Near

quote: Near and the others told me that this woman was supposed to be the second Kira. But could it really be this unbelievably stupid girl?..
author: Mello

quote: Matt... I never thought you'd be killed... I'm sorry.
author: Mello

quote: It's my turn to use you.
author: Mello

quote: *to Near* Which of us will get Kira first... it's a race!
author: Mello

quote: I'm not just a tool for you to use in order to solve your puzzles, you know!
author: Mello

quote: So, how about you tell me right now whom you'd like me to kill, and how. I'll treat'cha to it.
author: Mello

quote: He's terribly reasonable, this new L.
author: Mello

quote: In the end, there is no greater motivation than revenge.
author: Mello

quote: It's time I started living my own life.
author: Mello

quote: If you keep my secret, this strawberry is yours.
author: L Lawliet

quote: I haven't said anything about letting them commit murder...yet.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Actually, if you're smart, you can eat sweets without gaining weight.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Risking your life and doing something that could easily rob you of your life are exact opposites.
author: L Lawliet

quote: This isn't divine jugdement. It's the work of some childish killer who's playing at divine retribution. That's all.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Let's show him...that the good guys always win.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Kira is childish and he hates losing... I'm also childish and hate to lose. That's how I know.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Let's value our lives.
author: L Lawliet

quote: It was the only way the world had to be fixed! A purpose, given to me!
author: Light Yagami

quote: This world is still rotten!.. With too many rotten people.
author: Light Yagami

quote: That's right, I am Kira. And what can you do? Kill me right here?
author: Light Yagami

quote: Our battle will be concluded, and I will begin my reign from the summit of victory!
author: Light Yagami

quote: In the end, L is indeed the greatest detective on earth...
author: Light Yagami

quote: But you know the saying, "play with fire, and you'll get burned". I'll make you regret underestimating L...underestimating me.
author: Light Yagami

quote: I must protect my fledging Utopia.
author: Light Yagami

quote: No matter what the world, the god of that world creates the rules. In truth, you have been defeated by the rules I created. And as punishment for defying the God of the new world, you will die...
author: Light Yagami

quote: I've won. Exactly as planned.
author: Light Yagami

quote: For murderers, there is no good or evil. I know that.
author: Light Yagami

quote: The thing I hate the most is to trample on other people's good will.
author: Light Yagami

quote: I've never considered finding that notebook and gaining that power a misfortune.
author: Light Yagami

quote: You can't ever win if you're always on the defensive. To win, you have to attack!
author: Light Yagami

quote: This is the first time in my life that I've been provoked to hit a woman.
author: Light Yagami

quote: L, do you know gods of death love apples?
author: Light Yagami

quote: He was someone who deserved to die.
author: Light Yagami

quote: [To Orihime] Am I frightening... woman?
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: [To Orihime] You're just in time. Watch closely. This is the moment that the man you've put your hope in will lose his life.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: If it is because of what you call a heart, then it is the heart that causes you humans pain. It is because of your heart that you will die.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: Kurosaki Ichigo, those are the words of someone who does not know true despair. So I will show you. This is what true despair looks like.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: [To Ichigo] So you can withstand my Cero even without your mask... You've gotten stronger. Is it because you defeated Grimmjow? Or...Is it because of her? [Motions to Inoue] Or maybe because of your friends, still fighting down below. That girl is already one of us. Even if you manage to rescue her, that won't change. Rescuing her...Is meaningless.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: [To Orihime] Your heart? You humans say that word so lightly. As if it were something one can hold in the palm of one's hand. But my eye sees everything -- Nothing can escape it. What it doesn't see doesn't exist. That's how I've always fought. That's how I've always lived.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: [To Yammy] They're all trash...kill them all.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: Even saying they were just a bunch of fools would suffice. So why can't you? Were it me... I would be angry at the ignorance of those who would enter Hueco Mundo... without even testing their own power.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: It seems I have overestimated you quite a bit. Your evolution did not even satisfy my expectations. This is the end.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: Kurosaki Ichigo, you have no chance of defeating me. Even if you somehow manage to defeat me, there will be three more powerful than myself for you to fight. It doesn't matter if you stand up again a thousand times. The road to victory does not exist.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: I was not capable of stopping it even while using both hands. That surprised me a little. Was that your full power? Well, it seems to be... disappointing.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: And it seems you've acquired a new power. However, is that all you are capable of achieving with it? This is the end. You will no longer interfere. The sun has already set in our hands.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: [To Orihime, when she refuses to eat] Shall I force it down your throat? Or would you rather be strapped down and given IV's?
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: Therefore let me inform you...All of your dreams are to be thrown away.
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: I am calm. That's why I can fight you!
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: [to Yammy Rialgo, as the Espada grips the edge of a hole in the floor] Mala Suerte. I pity you. [shoots the floor just before Yammy's hand, causing him to fall] Oh, and I broke the pillars on every floor on the way up. So, you'll probably fall all the way to the bottom.
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: [to Renji] I assure you, my gratitude is sincere.
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: The right to choose life or death lies with the victor. And the victor of this battle is me.
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: Seele Schneider isn't a sword. [strings the weapon on his bow] A Quincy's only weapons...Are bows and arrows. [fires the Seele Schneider]
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: That's right...If I'm the first one here, I can save Kuchiki-san. Kurosaki must've wanted to rescue her himself...If I did it, he'd get really pissed...Heheheh...
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: I hate Shinigami.
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: [to Mayuri Kurotsuchi] It's a good thing Orihime isn't here. I wouldn't want her to see what I'm about to do to you.
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: [lying about coming to save Rukia] Just passing by. No big deal.... Well, if you must know, I felt a sudden urge to go to Sunflower Seams, that 24-hour dressmaking shop. There's a branch near here. That's where I was headed at this late hour. I certainly didn't bring this bag with me just so I would have an excuse for suddenly leaving the house because I sensed the spirit energy of a shinigami, all right?
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: Calling me a coward, eh? At least say it so I can hear it...
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: [to an arrogant projectile-specialist Shinigami] Apparently, on this side, "ultimate master" means a windbag with diarrhea of the mouth.
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: Ah, Kurosaki. I'm glad to see you've finally realized the importance of a cape.
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: [to Luppi] Hyourinmaru is the strongest of all ice-type Zanpakutoes. Your weapon may have eight arms, but mine is all the water in the atmosphere! Sennen Hyourou!! [causes several pillars of ice to form, before using them to crush Luppi] Sorry. Eight wasn't enough.
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: I didn't come here to fight! I came here to hack at you violently!
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: We are all like fireworks. We climb, shine, and always go our separate ways and become further apart. But even if that time comes, let's not disappear like a firework. Let's continue to shine... Forever.
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: Stand back? [To Kira after Gin asked him to stand back] No, Kira...Run. Run until you're out of my sight, and keep running. Otherwise...I can't guarantee you won't get dragged into this and be killed.
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: I'M﻿ NOT AN ELEMENTARY STUDENT!!!
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: Aizen, I will kill you.
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: Don't come back... "Bed-wetter" Momo.
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: Dummy. I'm not gonna dwell on what happened forever. All that junk... it's the furthest thing on my mind. You should especially quit worrying about it and get some more sleep. Hurry up and get rid of your Panda eyes, got it?
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: No, not yet, now that you've made me this serious. Regret as much as you damn well want!!
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: [to Gin Ichimaru] If you make Hinamori shed even one drop of blood, I'll kill you.
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: Sit upon the frozen heavens! Hyōrinmaru!!
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: Seek not beauty in battle. Seek not beauty in death. Consider not your own life. If you wish to protect that which must be protected, then strike while your opponent's back is turned.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: All creatures want to believe in something bigger than themselves. They cannot live without blind obedience. And to escape the pressure of that trust, those in whom faith is placed in turn look for someone higher than themselves. And then those people in turn look for someone even stronger. That is how all Kings are born. That is how all Gods are born.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Trusting someone...means relying on them and only the weak do that.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: I never ask them to trust me at all. I told them to come with me but I never told them to trust me. And I always tell them not to trust anyone, including myself. But sadly, there are not many strong enough to do that.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: [To Barragan, before he was recruited by Aizen] Isn't it ironic, king of Hueco Mundo? Dressed in black and poised to attack, you look just like a shinigami.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: [To Orihime, after she had being taken from Ichigo once again] A girl like you should smile more often. Overcast skies blot out the sun, and that always brings people's spirits down. So why not let the sun shine...For just a while longer?
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: No matter what may happen... As long as you walk by my side... There shall be no enemy that can stand before us.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Good evening, Espada. There has been an enemy attack. But first...Let us brew some tea.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: [After Gin offers to kill some Arrancars] No thanks, for that would be boring.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Oh? I thought I severed your body from the waist-down, but...It seems the cut was too shallow.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: In my eyes, there is no difference between wiping away one speck of dust or two.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: "No longer the Aizen you know," hm...? I'm afraid you've been deluded, Abarai-kun...The 'Aizen Sousuke' you knew never existed to begin with.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: It's very difficult for me to step on an ant without crushing it.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Don't use such strong words -- It makes your weakness all the more apparent.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: I had no intention of deceiving anyone. It's just that none of you could understand...My true self.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: [To Hitsugaya, after stabbing Hinamori] Aww...You found her. Sorry, I didn't want you to find out this way...No. I should have chopped her into little pieces and hidden them away where you would never find them.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: I've liked him for so long. So long. But Mayama likes someone else. But I wanna hear his voice. I want to hold his hand. I feel like this.
author: Ayumi Yamada

quote: Never once did I say it.  But just as he knew my feelings and couldn't return them. She will probably realize his and probably his heart wouldn't have a chance either? When I think about things like that, my tears won't stop.
author: Ayumi Yamada

quote: I'll show you a real assassination. No... Maybe you won't even be able to see it.
author: Soi Fon

quote: I thought I told you. If you see your allies losing, that's your chance. Don't step between them. Take the enemy down from behind. And if the enemy's so strong, you can't even do that, then just watch your allies get killed. That's what it means to be Special Forces.
author: Soi Fon

quote: Of my five older siblings, two died on the first mission, then two more on the second. Then on the sixth mission, the last one... Died as well. I felt sad, somewhat, but more than that, I felt ashamed of their incompetence.
author: Soi Fon

quote: I'm inadequate in everything.
author: Soi Fon

quote: Such words are wasted on someone like me.
author: Soi Fon

quote: Showing your back in a battle? You've become a fool Yoruichi!
author: Soi Fon

quote: You know the power of my zanpakuto, Suzumebachi. If someone gets hit twice in the same spot... They die!
author: Soi Fon

quote: The one hundred years we were apart were meant to bring me power and make you weak! Yoruichi!
author: Soi Fon

quote: Why didn't you take me with you!? Yoruichi?
author: Soi Fon

quote: Only underlings get caught up in the matter of style and lose the battle. A captain can't afford such indulgences. Don't try to be a good kid. Whether you own somebody or they own you. The moment you start a fight, you are wrong in either way.
author: Shunsui Kyōraku

quote: [To Starrk, about Lilynette] That child with you... Can you send her somewhere else? I can't really go all out with her there.
author: Shunsui Kyōraku

quote: Why so cold, Nanao-chan?
author: Shunsui Kyōraku

quote: Do we really have to fight, Yama-jii?
author: Shunsui Kyōraku

quote: I placed this blade of grass in my mouth thinking I'd look cool. But it must be poison 'cause ith makinth ma mouth numb.
author: Shunsui Kyōraku

quote: Cute, cute Nanao-chaaaan. Lovely, lovely Nanao -- AHHHHHHH!!!!
author: Shunsui Kyōraku

quote: Nanao-chan is last place!
author: Shunsui Kyōraku

quote: Flowers are disturbed, god of flowers weeps, winds of Heaven are disturbed, demon of Heaven laughs. Katen Kyōkotsu!
author: Shunsui Kyōraku

quote: I was glad you did not pretend to be a saint and claim to love the world despite everything. That is why I decided that I would be your true friend. I would accept your sorrow. And I would share my joy. If you strayed I would reprimand you. If you made mistakes, I would forgive you. And when you found yourself in trouble, I would be there for you. So that you who learn to hate the world, would come to love it once more.
author: Komamura Sajin

quote: Back then. I felt a kernel of untruth in your words. You talked about "The world she loves" many times. But made not a single mention of "The world I love".
author: Komamura Sajin

quote: You destroyed those Menos Grandes. That's enough for me! I have decided to fight by your side! I won't accept no as an answer, masked ones!
author: Komamura Sajin

quote: You are right. I have not yet introduced myself. I am Captain of the Seventh Division Komamura Sajin. And though it shames me, I am just as you say -- A meager worm of a man.
author: Komamura Sajin

quote: [to Choe Neng Poww, as the giant Arrancar charges a Cero after making a comment on Komamura's strength] I see...Then I shall stop that yawn in its tracks. Bankai.
author: Komamura Sajin

quote: Don't retreat, Tetsuzaemon. No matter what. You stand firm right behind me!
author: Komamura Sajin

quote: [thinking at the grave of Tosen's friend] O' anonymous friend of Tousen... If you had been there...What would you have said to stop him?
author: Komamura Sajin

quote: Let us commence, Zaraki! Your favorite game of carnage!!
author: Komamura Sajin

quote: [during Tosen, Gin Ichimaru and Sosuke Aizen's escape from Soul Society] Get down here, Tosen! Why did you become a Shingami? Was it not for your deceased friend? Was it not to carry out justice!? Where is your justice now!?
author: Komamura Sajin

quote: [holds up juice box] How do you drink from this?
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: You can see me? Rather, you kicked me...
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: I see. I feel a strong pulse.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: Have you been out on the window ledge all this time, in plain sight? What if the neighbors report a silver haired elementary student burglar?
author: Abarai Renji

quote: I already told you...you can't kill me with that sword anymore!
author: Abarai Renji

quote: If you wanna talk to me, do it while I cut you to pieces. But, I'm not gonna hold back one bit! Bankai!
author: Abarai Renji

quote: Don't just blame yourself. You're not tough enough to withstand everything. Split the load, to my shoulders, and to Ichigo's. Just stack it little by little. That's why we've become stronger. Believe in him, Rukia.
author: Abarai Renji

quote: I've always been afraid...Always been pretending to follow you closely, always pretending to sharpen my fangs, when the truth is...I'm scared to death just treading on your shadow.
author: Abarai Renji

quote: I shall light a fire upon the fang that falls short, so that I needn't see that star...So that it shall not tear this throat of mine.
author: Abarai Renji

quote: Ichigo...I know this is shameful, but I'm begging you -- Rukia...Please save Rukia!!
author: Abarai Renji

quote: The stray dog in me is dyed into my bones... All I do is howl at the moon, but I don't have the guts to bite...
author: Abarai Renji

quote: Howl, Zabimaru.
author: Abarai Renji

quote: I knew it. You can't even ask your own zanpakutō its name.
author: Abarai Renji

quote: You're just an overnight shinigami. You couldn't put one scratch on us real ones.
author: Abarai Renji

quote: *to Ichigo* So you're the human who got his powers from Rukia?
author: Abarai Renji

quote: I'll tattle-tale to Yachiru if you keep that up, Ikkaku!
author: Matsumoto Rangiku

quote: I don't know if you noticed, but you just called him "Captain."
author: Matsumoto Rangiku

quote: I hate talkative guys... They gross me out.
author: Matsumoto Rangiku

quote: Growl, Haineko!
author: Matsumoto Rangiku

quote: [Rangiku steps out of the bath naked to comfort a crying Orihime] There, there! Cry, cry, you poor thing. Drown all of your sorrows in my chest!
author: Matsumoto Rangiku

quote: [to Momo on Aizen's final letter] As a vice-captain, I think it's a great honor to be the receiver of her captain's final words. Read it well.
author: Matsumoto Rangiku

quote: [thinking as Nel tells her to cheer for Ichigo] That's right. To begin with, I came here just thinking I wanted to protect everyone. But when I heard they had come to save me, I couldn't help but feel a little glad, just a bit in my heart. When I look at Kurosaki-kun in that mask, I think that he might not have come here to save me at all. Even though it's wrong, they shouldn't be going that far for me.
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: Kurosaki-kun... I'm weak, so it's always like I turn back to look to you for help. But now I won't turn back and I'll go forward. The next time we meet I won't look to you for help, Kurosaki-kun, I'll be able to fight on my own.
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: We don't look any different from those shinigami. We just dress diferently.
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: It's just that... It's just that not being able to fight with everyone makes me feel lonely...!! But what would make me feel worse than being lonely is getting in everyone's way... that would make me feel worse!! If it means getting in the way of Kurosaki-kun and everyone... then I would rather be lonely, very lonely.
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: I'm a terrible person, aren't I? "If only Kurosaki-kun would cheer up, I'd be happy." At least, I thought that was how I felt. Then Kuchiki-san came back and cheered Kurosaki-kun up. I should have been really happy, but... but... [starts to cry] but instead I'm jealous of Kuchiki-san!
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: If I were the rain, that binds together the heavens and the earth, whom in all eternity will never mingle, would I be able to bind two hearts together?
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: [to Nemu about Uryuu. Nemu is currently attempting to restrain Uryuu so Mayruri can heal him, but she is unknowingly smothering him with her breasts] Yes, Nemu. Just smother him with those things. Worst case, he dies happy.
author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri

quote: [to Szayel Aporro Grantz] Immaculate being... Was it? In this secular existence, perfection is an illusion, regardless of those who utter the contrary. This is the reality. Common man seeks it out, they strive to achieve it, as if it were some tangible thing... But... The fact of the matter is, perfection is a hollow shell. It is devoid of any substance. I spit on perfection. Perfection, after all, implies you've reached the summit. No trial and error, no ability to conceptualize. An omniscient being would have no need for such superfluous things... Am I making myself clear? For people who dabble in the sciences, such as ourselves, perfection would make us obsolete. Many magnificent things have been, and will continue to come into existence... And yet every last one of them will fall short of perfection's finish. Our function as men of science relies on their many shortcomings. Then, and only then, can we apply the fruits of our labor. To put it simply... As soon as you began spouting that nonsense about being an immaculate being... your fate was sealed. How dare you call yourself a man of science?
author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri

quote: [upon arriving at Szayel Aporro Grantz's location] Arrancar, Arrancar, Arrancar... Espada! Hueco Mundo is quite the treasure trove.
author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri

quote: Oh, you know what I'm talking about. That stupid line that all you Quincies keep saying up until the moment you die. By the honor of the Quincy I cannot do this, by the honor of the Quincy I won't allow that. Quincy this, Quincy that! Every last one of you! It's so annoying!
author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri

quote: Killing you now will be as easy as strangling a baby.
author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri

quote: A grenade that's thrown should not come back.
author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri

quote: [to Chad and Orihime] Your transformation is not a disease. You were just given the key to the door in front of you. There's no need to know the cause. No need for sorrow or sadness. What comes next is up to you. You can use your keys to open the door...or lock it tight. And if you do choose to open it... You can still decide not to pass through.
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: Awaken, Benihime.
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: [Singing to Yammy] Aizen-sama will get maaaad at youuuu!
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: Oh, it IS a chore. Risking your life and keeping busy are all the same!
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: Noooo, there's no way I, a mere handsome and sexy shopkeeper, could possibly have bankai!
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: [To Yoruichi] It's alright! Kurosaki-san's potential is greater than mine!
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: [Sees Yoruichi in cat form] Yes! It's Yoruichi! You've come back! Ha ha ha!! [Picks her up] Come here you little devil, let me take a look at you! You're my fuzzy little troublemaker, yes you are! Now who's your daddy? Hmm?
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: I'll drive you into a corner and make you remember that attack.
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: [Urahara writes Ichigo a message in blood] Please meet at Urahara shop immediately. [After Ichigo freaked out] P.S: If you look at this message and think that it is the message of a person before his death... then you have no sense of humor.
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: A warrior who has lost his ability to fight is only going to be in the way.
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: Lately, I've been looking at these two guys only. As expected, I see flowers when there are women in the workplace... the atmosphere!
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: [In his Resurrección form] I can see! I can see! I can see!!! So this is the sky!! So this is blood!! So this is the world!! ...So this is what you look like. Komamura. You are uglier... than I thought.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: [to Hisagi after stabbing him] I am afraid. Then and now, my fear has always been that I would die a shinigami like you.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: [to Komamura] Don't make me laugh. Aizen-sama has given me something far more powerful than a bankai.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: [to Hisagi] Open my eyes? You? Open my eyes? You never change.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: [after Hisagi thanks him] Aren't you clever? Is that supposed to be sarcastic?
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: I knew it would. Someday we would cross swords and one of us will die.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: It must make you sick to know an underling like me is going to kill you.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: I was trying to chop off your head from the eye up. A little scratch counts as a miss.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: Justice without a great cause begets nothing more than slaughter. That same slaughter in a great cause...Is Justice.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: I told you before, Komamura. The only paths that I see with these eyes are the ones not dyed with blood. Those paths are the paths to justice. So whichever path I choose...Is justice.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: If it's not enough to believe in justice, then I will become justice. I will seek out all evil in this world and wipe them out like the clouds in the sky. I swear I will...For justice.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: [about his deceased friend] I never overcame my shyness and told her that I actually liked clouds.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: [to Kenpachi Zaraki, after Tosen's senses-robbing Bankai still does not discourage the Eleventh Division Captain from fighting] I see. It's understandable. You are a demon. You belong in the darkness. So of course you do not fear it.
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: I do not hate you. However, to protect our peaceful existence, there is no other way!
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: [to Kenpachi Zaraki] I did not say that I hate you. What I mean to say is that you are unforgivable!!
author: Tousen Kaname

quote: When we die, our bodies disintegrate and become part of the reishi that make up Soul Society. And when that time comes...where does your heart go? It gets passed on to your nakama (comrades). If you pass it on to them, then your heart will always live on within them. Kuchiki, that's why...you must never, ever, ever die alone. Got it, Kuchiki?
author: Shiba Kaien

quote: Whenever you fight from this point on, there is one thing you must never do. Which is...to die alone.
author: Shiba Kaien

quote: Every time you and I interact...a bit of "heart" is born between us. Heart isn't something inside you. But whenever you think, whenever you remember someone, that's when heart is born. I mean, if you were the only one alive in the whole world, heart wouldn't exist, now would it?
author: Shiba Kaien

quote: The fight to protect life and the fight to protect honor——that's Captain Ukitake's policy. But you know, Kuchiki...I think that in the end, those both end up being the same thing. ...Heart.
author: Shiba Kaien

quote: [when Rukia asks why she is in the Gotei 13] What the hell?! That's so obvious! To "fight" and to "protect"!
author: Shiba Kaien

quote: [dying] Kuchiki, I dragged you into this...I'm sorry. You must've been scared. Thanks, Kuchiki. Thanks to you...I can leave my heart here.
author: Shiba Kaien

quote: [possessed by a Hollow] Why do you keep calling my name so? Are you that worried about me? Are you that much in love with me, little girl? If you love me so much...I'll eat you first!
author: Shiba Kaien

quote: Uncoil the seas and heavens, Nejibana!
author: Shiba Kaien

quote: But don't forget... as long as you're in my division, I'm on your side until death and beyond.
author: Shiba Kaien

quote: The Commander-General's rather violent today, wouldn't you say?
author: Ukitake Jyuushirou

quote: If you were in this situation, what would you have done? You would run after Byakuya...And then kick him in the butt, right? No matter how one captain complains, the Central Government won't change their decision for one person. But if it was you, you would still run around appealing to save Kuchiki...No. You would probably do something completely different. You always chose the path that lead to the most danger. Am I right...Kaien?
author: Ukitake Jyuushirou

quote: My, my. So dangerous.
author: Ukitake Jyuushirou

quote: If you save Kaien, then what becomes of his pride? If you go to his aid now, his life will be saved. But... at the same time, it would end up killing his pride for all eternity.
author: Ukitake Jyuushirou

quote: All waves, rise now and become my shield, lightning, strike now and become my blade! Sōgyo no Kotowari!
author: Ukitake Jyuushirou

quote: You may be able to save us. If you stay and protect us. But what's good is that everyone else dies! Please go!! Captain Komamura!!!
author: Kira Izuru

quote: It increases the weight of whatever it hits, until my opponent can no longer bear the weight and falls to the ground. And then they bow their head as if in apology. That's why it's called "Wabisuke".
author: Kira Izuru

quote: War is not heroic. War is not exhilarating. War is full of despair. It's dark. It's dreadful. It's a thing of sorrow and gloom.
author: Kira Izuru

quote: Farewell, warrior of the sky. I pray... you don't forgive me.
author: Kira Izuru

quote: Raise your head, Wabisuke.
author: Kira Izuru

quote: [in reference to Mizuho Asano, Keigo's sister] I owe this crazy woman.
author: Madarame Ikkaku

quote: You can't carry me AND dodge at the same time, Tetsuzaemon!
author: Madarame Ikkaku

quote: Awww maaan, and I really didn't feel like using it this early either. Better watch closely, and make sure you don't tell a soul! Bankai!!
author: Madarame Ikkaku

quote: Well, you sure have weird ways of doing things. The one who taught me how to give your name out to he whom you are about to kill also said... that it was always the last lesson he taught his students. That way, if you do end a person's life... at the very least, they will know the name of the one who slashed their mortal coil. I'm of the 11th Division, 3rd seat, Madarame Ikkaku! You're right, there's no reason for me to hear your name, because the most important thing is that you know mine. After all, it is the name of the man... who will send you to your death!
author: Madarame Ikkaku

quote: I got no intentions of becoming a captain. Becoming a captain would mean that I can't fight under Captain Zaraki. If your wish is to surpass Kuchiki Byakuya... then I just have one wish: to fight and die under that man's command. That's all.
author: Madarame Ikkaku

quote: Live well, Ichigo. Live well, age well, go bald well, and die after me. And... if you can, die smiling.
author: Kurosaki Isshin

quote: I didn't hate it as much as I said. That hollow, that is. If there's anything that I've truly hated for 20 years without thinking twice... it'd have to be the fact that I failed to save Masaki on that night.
author: Kurosaki Isshin

quote: It's one of the basics... So I will teach you. A shinigami at the rank of Captain can control the size of his zanpakuto got it? Otherwise everyone'd carry around ginormous swords... just like you. Remember this well. You can't fathom the power of your rival simply from the size of his zanpakuto. You shouldn't give lectures about Shinigami until you understand that.
author: Kurosaki Isshin

quote: [to Yuzu] Ah! It's okay, Yuzu, don't cry! Daddy will show you something really hilarious!
author: Kurosaki Isshin

quote: [to Karin] Do as your heart desires! Jump into your father's bosom!
author: Kurosaki Isshin

quote: It's not anyone's fault that Masaki died. It's just that... the woman I fell in love with... was a woman who could die protecting her son. And don't forget. You are the guy... the woman I loved gave her life to protect.
author: Kurosaki Isshin

quote: GOOD MOOOORNING ICHIGOOOOOO!!!!
author: Kurosaki Isshin

quote: We can't waste time worrying about the what-if's. Rukia's execution date has been changed to noon tomorrow. So what? If the deadline has been changed to tomorrow... I'll just have to finish today!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: The moment I came out of that hole was the moment your luck ran out!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: I see. So basically, you're a shinigami? And you came all the way from some place called Soul Society to vanquish evil spirits? Which means that monster earlier was one of those evil spirits? And it attacked that little girl? Okay, I belie- NO WAY I'LL BELIEVE THAT, DUMBASS!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Dammit, is that how you greet your son who went out of his way to help a ghost on the way home?!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: [about his Hollow group prior to them becoming Arancar as he eats pieces of them] You sicken me. You're all just a bunch of bloody cowards. Alright, I'll eat all of you. You'll see how it feels on the next level, as a part of my own flesh. I am... I am the king!
author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques

quote: [To Orihime] I've repaid my debt to you. Now, you're gonna accompany me on a little errand.
author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques

quote: [to Ichigo] I don't care if you're a human, a Soul Reaper or even a Hollow! I'll crush anybody who looks down on me! And you, Kurosaki, will be the first to go!
author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques

quote: [to Ichigo] You're a Soul Reaper and I'm a Hollow. Whichever side loses will be massacred! It's been that way for over a thousand years! Who needs any more reason than that?! Now bring it! The last man standing gets to go home alive! That's all there is to it!
author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques

quote: [about Ulquiorra Cifer, after he takes out Ichigo] I'll teach him what happens when you steal someone else's prey.
author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques

quote: [to Ichigo] Don't forget my name, Soul Reaper, and you better pray that you never hear it again! Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez...because the next time you hear my name, you'll be a dead man...I promise.
author: Grimmjow Jeagerjaques

quote: [as a child, to Rangiku Matsumoto] I've decided. I'm going to become a Shinigami. Become a Shinigami and change things. So that they'll end...without Rangiku having to cry.
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: Emotions? Nope, I've got nothin' like that. I told you when we first met, didn't I? I'm a snake. With cold skin, no emotions, that slithers around searching for prey with its tongue, swallowing down whatever looks tasty.
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: [Talking about Hueco Mundo] There isn't even water! Huh? Then how'd we have tea earlier?
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: [Referring to Tosen] He's such a boy scout, wouldn't you agree?
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: Oops. They found us.
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: [To Rukia as she is taken to Sokyoku Hill] Bye Bye, Rukia chan! See 'ya at the execution grounds.
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: If you pull your sword in a place like this, I'll just have to stop you, won't I?
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: Sorry, Aizen-sama. I got caught.
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: A gatekeeper ain't supposed to open gates.
author: Ichimaru Gin

quote: No matter how strong a defense, a stronger offense will always shatter it.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: "Control"... you say? When you stand before me... that word holds no meaning. Bankai. Senbonzakura Kageyoshi.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Exactly when did I say that I do this because I am a shinigami? My killing you is no other reason than the fact that you... Pointed your blade [view shifts to Rukia] at my pride.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: The arrogant one is you, Espada. But rest at ease. The reason for your loss is not due to that arrogance. It is simply due to a difference in power.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: You and I...our levels are as distant as the earth from the heavens. ...Must I spell it out for you? I have discarded my left arm, discarded my left leg, and yet even then I have not nearly lowered myself to your level.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: It is a thousand years too early... for you to become worthy enough to die by my Bankai.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Well done. That time, your fang definitely touched me.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Be proud as someone who, after being struck by this power, is still able to retain the shape of a body.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Your blade will never be able to touch me. Ever.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Put away your sword and you shall live...unless you're still dreaming about defeating me. Did you forget, or did it just never occur to you...that I have Bankai as well?
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: The curtain that falls at the end...shall be pulled down by the blade of my sword.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: That's not possible. With your ability, you couldn't even make one of my knees touch the ground.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: The Kuchiki clan is one of the four noble houses. We must set the standard for all shinigami. If we do not abide by the code...then who will uphold it?
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: No choice, then. Before you become intoxicated by your own power, I shall show you a decisive power gap that you could not overcome in a millennium of struggle.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Are you telling me to exploit an opening for the likes of you? Do not speak out of your league, boy.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Disappear. My sword does not exist to crush insects like you.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Scatter, Senbonzakura.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: You're slow, even when you're falling.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: Gin-chan told me to pay people back double for revenge!
author: Kagura

quote: Shinpachi, just remember this... We aren't friends with justice or even your sister. We're YOUR friends.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Gin-san, aren't you gonna make fun of me? Are you just gonna ignore me?!
author: Sarutobi Ayame

quote: I watch over Gin-san to protect him. Just like a fairy, like Tinkerbell!
author: Sarutobi Ayame

quote: *about Katsura, who apparently got his head hit very hard* Forget his name, this guy's questioning his own existence!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: *while eating Super Spicy Senbei* It's spicy... It's spicy. Damn it, why am I... It's so spicy I have tears in my eyes.
author: Hijikata Toushirou

quote: I just...    ...want to make the woman I love happy.
author: Hijikata Toushirou

quote: *to Okita* I don't care about that gap you created on your own. I'll jump across it as many times as it takes, and punch some sense into you.
author: Isao Kondō

quote: If someone went the wrong way, the other two would beat him up until he got back on track. That's how it always been. That's why we'll always stay on the right path!
author: Isao Kondō

quote: *talking about Shinsengumi* Every time I'm with all of you, there's always a gap. I'm different from all of you.
author: Okita Sougo

quote: I smelled something: The scent of a Lunar Flower. It was coming from this city.
author: Kiba

quote: [talking to Kiba, who is being held in a cage] Man, you really screwed up. I mean, I've seen one of us get hurt before, but never this badly. And you're caught, too.
author: Hige

quote: [to Toboe] I wanted to take you to paradise.
author: Tsume

quote: I finished Hige off. I don't want to move any more either. I knew it from the beginning, I knew it somewhere in my heart. That's why I led a spontaneous life. I was confident after having met you... that I wasn't the one who would open Paradise. [groans]
author: Tsume

quote: [tsume bites into his neck] Let's meet up again in Paradise.
author: Hige

quote: Can you do me a favor? Could you kill me with your fangs? Can you still not forgive me? Am I still a traitor?
author: Hige

quote: That hot dog must've fried your brain!
author: Hige

quote: *to Hige* Coming from you, that sounds kind of fishy.
author: Kiba

quote: We would not have met, and the flowers will protect you. Kiba, because you protected this one, the flowers will return and bloom once more. So when the world is reborn, and Paradise opens, we will meet again. This one will be waiting for you. Find this one. And this time, the Paradise you hoped for will be...
author: Cheza

quote: They say there's no such place... as Paradise. Even if you search to the ends of the Earth, there's nothing there. No matter how far you walk, it's always the same road. It just goes on and on. But, in spite of that... Why am I so driven to find it? A voice calls to me... It says, "Search for Paradise."
author: Kiba

quote: Why? Why do humans always look to the sky? Why do you try so hard to fly when you don't have any wings? We'll run on our own legs.
author: Kiba

quote: I hate sweets.
author: Yu Kanda

quote: Even if my left arm can transform into a monstrous claw and can destroy Akuma, im just a normal person with a promise...
author: Allen Walker

quote: Inside your mouth, it's rat-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta-ta, wonderful.
author: Hijikata Toushirou

quote: I don't like lectures from someone who plays fixed matches.
author: Ryoma Echizen

quote: As time goes by without anyone eating it, it starts getting dry and looking anything but appetizing, and no one's willing to make a move, but when the busboy takes it you go 'wait, we're not done with that yet.' kinda on reflex. But then you end up leaving without eating it.
author: Konata Izumi

quote: Can you stop guessing if they got the question right based on the amount of time left when they cut to commercial!?
author: Kagami Hiiragi

quote: Hijikata-san. I forgot my flute at the headquarters, so I'm gonna go back and get it real quick.
author: Okita Sougo

quote: Is there a limit to how much you can love somebody? No matter how much I hurt him or get hurt by him, I find myself far from hating him, actually hoping that those wounds will scar, like burns...because then you can never forget me.
author: Hiroki Kamijou

quote: What is it, you? Bang bang banging on people's heads like that. Are you hoping to become a tambourine player? If you don't like Shin-chan, then how about Sen-chan from secret operation?
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: He won't play up to anyone. He won't be led astray by anything. He simply places himself in a clear space.
author: Yu Kanda

quote: To me, the world is not only the shape on the map. On the battle field, all I see are the faces of the order and my friends... I am an awful person aren't I? Instead of the real world, all I care about is my friends. That's because they are my whole world... Even if just one of my friends dies, to me, it's the same thing as part of the world being destroyed.
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: The best way to live a full life is to be a child, no matter your age.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: I'm not eating early. In my country, we always ate hot dogs during class.
author: Kagura

quote: Do you really intend to lose even more of your friends for something like that? I'll pass on that. As long as I'm alive, I'll live by my own rules. I'll live as I see fit and protect that which I hold dear.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Katsura, just stop this. No matter how elegant you think dying is, your death won't appease your conscience and won't change anything.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Shut up you! What's with that TV drama attitude?!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: We could drive them off the entire earth if we had your strength, Gintoki!
author: Kotarō Katsura

quote: No matter how gifted you are... You, alone, cannot change the world.
author: L Lawliet

quote: If I sit like a normal person my investigative abilities are only working at 50% efficiency.
author: L Lawliet

quote: I am Justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil. I'm the one that will become the god of a new world that every one desires!
author: Light Yagami

quote: Humans are things that don't know the true value of something precious until they lose it...and if somehow, they get that precious thing back, they'll forget its value again.
author: Midou Ban

quote: I'll always be by your side, just like the wind that flows through your hair.
author: Kazuma Yagami

quote: Unless I grip the sword, I cannot protect you. While gripping the sword, I cannot embrace you.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Though we had to part, though we could never be together again. We had no regrets. Even if she returned to her world, married another man and had children with him. If the woman I loved was happy, then I could be happy. And I am. Our hearts had joined and so, even if she lived in a different world, that time, we really were together always, always. I would never let go of this feeling, or my love for her.
author: Syaoran Li

quote: Heh, I guess somehow without me knowing, it just feels so natural now, to have Kagome by my side.
author: Inuyasha

quote: Sebastian, you know what to do.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Ciel, how are you?
author: Elizabeth Middleford

quote: Gintoki, will you take up your sword once again to cleanse this rotting nation? Lend me the strength of the fearsome white demon once again. [flashback to when they were fighting together] Is this it? Rather than falling into enemy hands, we should kill ourselves and die as warriors.
author: Kotarō Katsura

quote: I'm on TV! I gotta call my folks!
author: Kagura

quote: *to Okita, who tells him that he should take his job more seriously* Shall I put you to sleep, ingrate?
author: Hijikata Toushirou

quote: You mean that we failed again to prevent a bombing? What are you doing, Hijikata-san? You should take this job more seriously.
author: Okita Sougo

quote: It might be dog food. Take it.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: *talking about a nosebleed* And why would a girl your age pick hard enough to get a nosebleed?!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: We've got nothing left at home but salt and sugar.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: [Shinpachi and Kagura are stuck in a trashcan, and have been pushed onto the train tracks. Shinpachi sees a train coming]This timing's just like some manga!
author: Shimura Shinpachi

quote: I don't like men with glasses.
author: Kagura

quote: Who the hell are they? Pedophile yakuza?
author: Shimura Shinpachi

quote: In this country, we don't call someone who can stop a scooter with her bare hands a girl. We call her a mountain gorilla.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: [after hitting Kagura with his motor scooter, Gintoki looks inside a vending machine slot] D-don't worry. A-all we have to do is find a t-t-time machine.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Oh crap! Today is Jump release day! I forgot it comes out on Saturday this week! We have to go back!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Shut it! Do you know the pain of having a permanent perm?!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: A samurai doesn't need a reason to do what's right. If you want to protect her, you must draw your sword.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Damn that sister of mine! She's always talking about our father, but what did that baldy ever do for us?! He just played Othello with us from time to time!
author: Shimura Shinpachi

quote: Leave it at that. Even though she was raised by gorillas, she's still a woman.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: *to Shinpachi* Was your sister raised by gorillas?
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: *after Shinpachi caught up to him, while running from the police* What a nice boy you are. Have you come to return my wooden sword? That's all right. It was just a souvenir I bought on a school trip.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Blah, blah, blah, blah… quit your blabbering. Look at this. [holds up an empty glass] Thanks to you assholes, my chocolate parfait [hits one of the amanto with his bokuto] fell to the ground!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Ah, I wish I could have a bankai like that.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Hey, if you take a step over that line, your territorial law won't mean shit!
author: Isao Kondō

quote: You can't just run away, especially from the things you want to forget!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Don't go thinking you're my rival, you circus freak!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: [crashing through the gate on his motor scooter] Thanks for the support! Here come the real heros!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: That's like what an evil organization in some anime would do.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: We're not going to sneak in, we're gonna bust in. To bust in means to go in from the front, guns blazing.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: I've told you before, he's not one to trust, Otae-san. No trustworthy man has eyes that look like a dead fish's eyes.
author: Isao Kondō

quote: *talking about Gintoki* It's the same as always. He doesn't pursue those who leave, and ignores those who come.
author: Kagura

quote: [Shinpachi is tied up, hanging from a tree, and the rope is held by the client] What kind of training is this? What kind of potential does he have?
author: Shimura Shinpachi

quote: *after Katsura asks him about what he is doing* Well, I suppose I'm doing something odd, like jogging or taking a walk or something like that.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: [after the client asks Shinpachi, Kagura and Ayame to get him stronger] Well, whatever. At any rate, raise his hit points another hundred or so.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Hey, what's that natto for, anyway? If you intend to seduce me with it, you're way off base, you know.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: The earth's rowdier than a group of five high school guys living under the same roof.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: What are you, some tantrum throwing brat who forgot to buy his Jump? Having no money is like having a sinus infection. You just have to ignore it and not pick at it, and it'll go away.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Yeah, I know. It's not good to be reading Jump at my age.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Goodbye, vice captain. Why don't you suck on some mayonnaise in the afterlife? [he shoots, blowing up the whole wall]
author: Okita Sougo

quote: What are you talking about? We LET you corner us.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Oi, oi, why are you letting them chase you, idiot?
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: You will never be able to love anybody else until you love your self...
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: The sky is so low.
author: Alto Saotome

quote: Our souls, together till the end!
author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa

quote: I'll admit, Black Star makes some dumb calls from time to time, but the important thing is I'm here to back him up no matter how big a fool he is. If we're fools, we're fools together, that's the kind of team we are.
author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa

quote: You guys are a team, you have to work together if you want to do anything! One person can't make a decision without the other, you decide together and you fight together!
author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa

quote: I have a friend who has helped me realize something. He's helped me see that a Camellia does have a fragrance!
author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa

quote: When I fall it will be silent and tragic.
author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa

quote: The Camellia Blossom also know as Tsubaki, is a flower without fragrance. It proclaims nothing, blooming in silence. When the blossomed pettles scatter, it's quietly tragic. I am Tsubaki. A silent flower without fragrance.
author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa

quote: Silence means approaching quietly!
author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa

quote: Excuse me... I'm not a microphone! I'm a chain scythe.
author: Tsubaki Nakatsukasa

quote: As long as I don't admit defeat, then it'll never be a loss!
author: Black Star

quote: If it's fear that you speak of, then I'll stand and face it. I'll never give up. The only time I lose is when I die!
author: Black Star

quote: I'll never show you my tears. These are the tears of those who died with regrets. If there's a way to take away these regrets, I'll make sure I'll find it.
author: Black Star

quote: It's Me with a capital M! I'm the only one big enough to capitalize Me!
author: Black Star

quote: London bridge is falling down dude!
author: Black Star

quote: Who cares about snow? Snow can't touch me, I could be naked out here and it wouldn't bother me at all.
author: Black Star

quote: I'm not going to let myself get beaten by a jar!
author: Black Star

quote: I'm Black Star. I'm on a whole different level than you. I'm a big man! I beat death! Who else can say that?!
author: Black Star

quote: My soul wave length just got taken away. I'm gonna miss it.
author: Black Star

quote: What's the point of worrying about the past? A real star keeps moving forward.
author: Black Star

quote: Hey, Tsubaki, come out of there already. You haven't lost to him, have you? You can put on a better show than that, come back out on stage. Encore, encore. Tsubaki encore, give us an encore!
author: Black Star

quote: Alright then! Come here! Come over here, Black Star's giving you a big hug!
author: Black Star

quote: I'm just a dude who's way ahead of his time you know? Does that mean I was born too early because time can't keep up with me?
author: Black Star

quote: You can lean on me, Tsubaki.
author: Black Star

quote: The tattoo is a symbol of my family, the Star Clan. They were a clan of assassins. Everybody knew they would do anything for money. After a while killing people wasn't enough, they were hungry for even more power so they began hunting human souls. But now it's just me, I'm the last member of the Star Clan. 13 years ago their souls were taken by Lord Death and the Meisters from the Academy. At the time I was still a baby, so they didn't take my soul. That's when the school took me in. That's it. The end.
author: Black Star

quote: Stars. Don't. Clean.
author: Black Star

quote: Soul! Soul! Are you okay?! You are going to be alright - Black Star is here for you now!! Open your eyes! One look at my big handsome face and you'll be cured for sure!
author: Black Star

quote: You wont be laughing once you taste our power of friendship!
author: Black Star

quote: It could be real difficult to hide when you're as big a star as I am.
author: Black Star

quote: Finishing Strike! Black Star Big Wave!
author: Black Star

quote: You can look high or low but you wont find a bigger guy than me!
author: Black Star

quote: Compared to a man as big as me you realize how small you are, don't you? I understand how you feel. Even I can be frightened by my own greatness. So I find it difficult to stand in front of mirrors.
author: Black Star

quote: My name is Black Star. I'll surpass the power of the gods.
author: Black Star

quote: Dying now, my breath will be erased, okay?
author: Black Star

quote: Sometimes I'm such a big star that I can't handle it.
author: Black Star

quote: I am the great assassin Black Star! And I've come here to assassinate you all!
author: Black Star

quote: Assassins Rule Number Three - Speed: Take out the target before the target notices your presence.
author: Black Star

quote: Assassins Rule Number Two - Transpositional Thinking: Analyze the target in order to predict his thoughts and movements.
author: Black Star

quote: Assassins Rule Number One - Silence: Dissolve in the darkness and erase your breath. Wait for an opening to attack your target.
author: Black Star

quote: YAAAAAAHHHHHHHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!
author: Black Star

quote: You're stubborn and reckless, all you like to do for fun is read, so you're boring, and you have fat ankles.
author: Soul Evans

quote: Anybody want to take the sexy kitty home? She's free.
author: Soul Evans

quote: If you forget your fear you become reckless.
author: Soul Evans

quote: As far as I know music isn't picky about when it gets played.
author: Soul Evans

quote: What is this place? Where am I? Wherever it is, it's completely dark. I can't even see my own body. It hurts... Which way is up? Which way is down? Where am I supposed to go? Someone help me.
author: Soul Evans

quote: I am your weapon partner Maka! That means I'm always prepared to die for my Meister!
author: Soul Evans

quote: You know what they say! When in Rome eat lots of pasta!
author: Soul Evans

quote: I'm hungry! can we just get his damn zombie soul already?
author: Soul Evans

quote: Come out! Nap times over zombie!
author: Soul Evans

quote: I hope it's a cool morning. That's how cool days always start out. And a cool guy like me deserves the coolest morning possible.
author: Soul Evans

quote: Souls are so yummy.
author: Soul Evans

quote: In the end the shape and form don't matter at all, it's only the soul that matters right? Nothing else.
author: Soul Evans

quote: After all cool men don't cheat on their partners, do they?
author: Soul Evans

quote: Damn that witch. How am I supposed to be cool when she is all hot and naked like that huh?
author: Soul Evans

quote: It's okay, cool guys see naked women all the time, I'm totally used to it.
author: Soul Evans

quote: Your soul is mine!
author: Soul Evans

quote: Naked lady!
author: Soul Evans

quote: What are you smoking? Don't you see how cool I am? You think I'm going to settle for a flat chested girl like her?
author: Soul Evans

quote: We might be scared but that's what makes us stronger!
author: Maka Albarn

quote: Watch it, or I'll take your soul!
author: Maka Albarn

quote: What could that creep possibly be thinking sending sexy underwear to his own daughter.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: Papa was only 18 years old when I was born. He used to read a lot of books to me back then.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: It doesn't hurt! It's not hot! I'm not scared! I will not be beaten!
author: Maka Albarn

quote: I refuse to let my fear control me anymore.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: We have to find a way to face this scar.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: I was wondering. Do souls taste good? You seem to like 'em.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: Stop looking at my soul you creep!
author: Maka Albarn

quote: The legendary super-skill of the Scythe-Meister! Witch Hunter!
author: Maka Albarn

quote: People need fear to survive. We experience it so we can grow stronger.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: You men. All of you, you're horrible. Cheating on every woman. But you, you I actually decided to trust. I put my faith in you. I can't believe this. I wish that all of you would just die!
author: Maka Albarn

quote: 42-42-564 whenever you wanna knock on deaths door.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: A sound soul dwells within a sound mind and a sound body.
author: Maka Albarn

quote: MAKA CHOP!
author: Maka Albarn

quote: Wrong, holy man. All we want is to get our bodies normal again. See, we don't lie about what's possible. We didn't start a cult.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Sun, it's just a mass of hydrogen... Get too close to it and all you do is burn.
author: Edward Elric

quote: *referring to Armstrong taking off his shirt* Did he have to strip?..
author: Riza Hawkeye

quote: Foolish alchemists who have turned their backs on the ways of God...shall all be punished.
author: Scar

quote: I think you've got me all wrong. My motives aren't so sophisticated as "revenge" or "honor" or any of that... The reason I killed all of those men... was because I could. It's that simple.
author: Solf J. Kimblee

quote: You clearly have nerves of steel. But, I'd say you still have much to learn about the world.
author: King Bradley

quote: Save your breath. The laws of alchemy don't justify murder!
author: Edward Elric

quote: Whoever invented stew is brilliant! It has milk in it and it still tastes good.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Hughes again? Put him through. It's me. I won't listen if you're going to be bragging about your daughter. *...* Hughes? Hughes... Hey! Hughes! Hughes!!
author: Roy Mustang

quote: You're lucky Al. Since your body's huge.
author: Edward Elric

quote: *referring to Winry* I didn't know she could be so cute.
author: Edward Elric

quote: For one that turns against God to come in person to receive judgement... Today is a good day!
author: Scar

quote: I am an instrument of divine judgment!
author: Scar

quote: No matter what, if you intend to interfere, I will eliminate you too.
author: Scar

quote: If there is such a thing as the work of the devil, then there's no doubt it's what happened in this incident.
author: Riza Hawkeye

quote: Hey, mutt! I need exercise, so I'll play with you!
author: Edward Elric

quote: *to Edward* There's something disturbing about having to be in your debt...
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Don't give alcohol to minors!
author: Edward Elric

quote: It was just a rebound! Don't make a big deal over one or two arms!
author: Edward Elric

quote: If there's no door, then I'll make one!
author: Edward Elric

quote: Come down here and face me, you third-rate fraud. I'll show you there's no comparison between us!
author: Edward Elric

quote: It's like that myth about the hero... He made wings out of wax so he could fly... but when he got too close to the sun... to God... the wax melted and he crashed to the ground...
author: Edward Elric

quote: What pride... are you saying that you are God's equal?
author: Rose Tomas

quote: AHA-HA-HA! Alchemists are scientists. We don't believe in unprovable concepts like "God". *Rose looks angry* We strive to uncover the principles of creation in the matter of the world, to pursue truth... *gazes at Leto statue* it's ironic that we scientists... who don't believe in God... are in a sense the closest things to him.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Ed believes he saved that town, it's one of the first successes he's had. I'll let him keep thinking that for a while. He'll learn the truth soon enough: we always do.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: DON'T CALL ME SMALL! I'LL BREAK DOWN YOUR FEET AND STICK THEM ON YOUR HEAD!!
author: Edward Elric

quote: Of course! Dogs embody loyalty, they follow their master's commands above all else! Be a jerk to them and they don't complain, and they never once beg for a paycheck! Trust me Fuery, they're the great servants of man! *singing* Loyal canine how we salute thee! *laughs maniacally*
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Yeah, I get it. You couldn't see me since I'm so short, you couldn't distinguish me from all the grains of sand. VERY FUNNY!!
author: Edward Elric

quote: Even with your stones, I'm on a whole other level!
author: Edward Elric

quote: You know, it's funny. Every crook I meet wants to tell me how much I'm just like them. But there's a big difference between you and me and the burdens we bear.
author: Edward Elric

quote: WHO ARE YOU CALLING SO SMALL YOU WANNA CRUSH LIKE AN ANT?!
author: Edward Elric

quote: Come on now. Is that anyway to talk to your new boss, landlord, and all-around overseer?
author: Edward Elric

quote: I don't know if we chose the right path, brother. But I do know this: I don't want to be in this suit anymore. I want to feel things again. It's strange. We've been right beside each other all this time. But I can't remember what your skin feels like, or how you smell.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: CHILDBIRTH'S NOT ALCHEMY, YOU DOPE!
author: Edward Elric

quote: Those people had us dancing right in the palms of their hands, didn't they? I guess it doesn't matter what we do. We'll never be the ones in control.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: You can call me Roy Mustang, or just Lieutenant Colonel. Hell, you can call me the Flame Alchemist. Whatever you do, remember the pain.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: Attention, gun-toting extremists! Can you hear me all right, or did you blow your ears out playing target practice?
author: Edward Elric

quote: WHO ARE YOU CALLING A RUNT SO TINY HE COULD ONLY BE SEEN WITH A MAGNIFYING GLASS, YOU JERK!
author: Edward Elric

quote: *on the phone* I'm sorry to interrupt you, Major, but let me offer a bit of feminine advice. BABIES AREN'T BORN AFTER JUST FIVE MONTHS!
author: Riza Hawkeye

quote: Nobody calls me a pipsqueak and gets away with it! Not even a little girl!
author: Edward Elric

quote: *referring to Alphonse* This pain's nothing...compared to what he's given up...
author: Edward Elric

quote: Dad left... A long time ago, when brother and I were still boys. Mom stared off into the distance a lot. But she carried on as if nothing were wrong.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: What do I have to live for now that I know Cain won't come back? You tell me that, Ed!
author: Winry Rockbell

quote: WHO ARE YOU CALLING A MOUSY LITTLE PIPSQUEAK?!
author: Edward Elric

quote: Told you, Rose. Get too close to the sun, and you'll burn.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Don't look away, Rose! You need to see what happens when you try to bring a human to life, when you cross into God's territory or whatever the hell it is! Is this what you want?! Look!!
author: Edward Elric

quote: By the way, I don't get my skills from a pocketwatch.
author: Edward Elric

quote: You combined animals, the most depraved kind of alchemy there is.
author: Edward Elric

quote: It's true, I don't have a body, but I'm here. This is my punishment for setting foot on holy ground where mortals are forbidden. We made a mistake, Rose, and we're paying for it.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: *grabs two citizens and swings them around in a circle* Shorty?! Could a shorty do this?! What else you want to call me: a half-pint bean-sprout midget?! I'm still growing you backwater desert idiots!
author: Edward Elric

quote: *spits out his juice* I don't think so, pops! Do I look like a clown to you?!
author: Edward Elric

quote: I sunk again. *after sinking in the desert*
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: I hate deserts. It's nothing but sand. *collapses* If there was some grass, I could turn it into bread. I'm starving! Huh? Hey! Al, where'd you go? Al? Hey!
author: Edward Elric

quote: Alchemy: The science of understanding the structure of matter, breaking it down, then reconstructing it as something else. It can even make gold from lead. But alchemy is a science, so it must follow the natural laws: To create, something of equal value must be lost. This is the principle of Equivalent Exchange. But on that night, I learned the value of some things can't be measured on a simple scale. My brother and I knew the laws of science, of Equivalent Exchange, that gain required sacrifice, that something had to be taken from us. But we thought there was nothing more we could lose. We were wrong.
author: Edward Elric

quote: The Philosopher's Stone: those who possess it, no longer bound by the laws of equivalent exchange in alchemy, can gain without sacrifice...create without equal exchange. We searched for it... and we found it.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: Kuro-woof-woof.
author: Fay D. Flourite

quote: I don't wanna see your face ever again. Keep that helmet on until you die.
author: Kurogane

quote: Fighting's fine, but losing looks like it'll hurt... so that'd suck.
author: Fay D. Flourite

quote: *Holding Syaoran's hand* If I sleep like this, the first person I want to see when I wake up, is Syaoran.
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: I work by myself. Only for Princess Tomoyo.
author: Kurogane

quote: Readiness and sincerity, qualities that are indispensible in order to accomplish anything. Qualities you are well provided with.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: But there are no coincidences in this world. There is only Hitsuzen. You were destined to meet each other.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: Fine then, in exchange, you can roam around looking like a cosplayer, violate weapon laws, get arrested by the police, and get interviewed on television.
author: Yuuko Ichihara

quote: In my room at the palace, right before I go to sleep... I always think to myself, "What's Syaoran doing right now? Is he thinking about me?".
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: Can't whistle, so I just say the words wheet-whoo.
author: Fay D. Flourite

quote: To all the young ones in your group, you are no longer someone who passes through their lives and is forgotten. You have become someone very important to them. Your hardships are their hardships too.
author: Fay D. Flourite

quote: No matter how painful it might be... I'll do everything in my might! So please, you too, act according to what you believe in!
author: Syaoran Li

quote: *punches Kurogane* That was payback, Kuro-sama!
author: Fay D. Flourite

quote: Because I wished for everyone to live, I did everything I could.
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: *yelling at Fai* You, shut up!! If you want to die that much, I'll kill you myself! But until that day, you're going to live!
author: Kurogane

quote: For all my life... I've wanted strength. I didn't want those things precious to me to be taken away from me anymore. But, to have strength means to invite disaster to come to you. And strength alone can't really protect you.
author: Kurogane

quote: Because we knew you were waiting, we did our best so that we'd return.
author: Syaoran Li

quote: If I can protect, I want to protect.
author: Syaoran Li

quote: Even death can't cure idiocy.
author: Yui

quote: She's an idiot, but she's useful.
author: Hideki Hinata

quote: That's right. Our weakness is that we're utterly stupid.
author: Yuri Nakamura

quote: Glad you're okay *wink* I kinda like you.
author: Hideki Hinata

quote: Hurry up! You can make it! Oh, run to her and hug her tight!
author: TK

quote: I kiss you!
author: TK

quote: Are you talking to me, scum? I'm God.
author: Ayato Naoi

quote: Are you saying I can be god?
author: Yuri Nakamura

quote: I said she's not an Angel. She's a human, just like us. Didn't you notice?
author: Yuri Nakamura

quote: Hey, why does this situation look like something at the end of a shonen manga?!
author: Hideki Hinata

quote: Care about me!!!
author: Yui

quote: Um, if we encounter the Angel here, I'm going to pee buckets on the spot!
author: Yui

quote: Just give up already. Or do you want my other knife to slice your throat?
author: Yuri Nakamura

quote: Messing around at night together... This calls for punishment.
author: Kanade Tachibana

quote: For all our sake I will sing and pee my heart out in the name of spirit!
author: Yui

quote: You got away with just physical damage, but I'm going to take CRITICAL MENTAL DAMAGE!
author: Ooyama

quote: Wow, he did it. He's gonna fl- *boosts up to the ceiling and smashes his head*
author: Hideki Hinata

quote: I'll be back.
author: TK

quote: Don't think that the me tomorrow will be the same as the me today. You'd better be careful.
author: Hideki Hinata

quote: What is the resulting amperage when applying 3.0V to a conductor with 20ohm resistance?
author: Yuzuru Otonashi

quote: Knockin' on Heaven's Door.
author: TK

quote: Scrambled it trouble down.
author: TK

quote: He can't dance in my world right now. Don't let me cry!
author: TK

quote: Hey, yo, check this out! It's a moonwalk, it's a moonwalk! Head spin!
author: TK

quote: Ouch! Are you serious?
author: TK

quote: Just wild heaven.
author: TK

quote: Come on let's dance... aw yeah don't be afraid.
author: TK

quote: I want to see confused and troubled Lithuania to come crying to me.
author: Russia

quote: Real GAY will not be swayed no matter how cute a girl is. Please remember this: out of a hundred men... five are GAY.
author: Kyon

quote: Don't use a serious tone. Don't breathe on me. Your face is too close. Freaking me out.
author: Kyon

quote: I didn't abduct her. It was voluntary arrest.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: This feels like extortion.
author: Kyon

quote: What is a glasses man?
author: Yuki Nagato

quote: ...but as they say, it ain't over till the fat lady sings. I don't know which fat lady is doing the singing or where she's planning on doing her singing. But if I find out where she is, I'd like to put her out of commission for a year!
author: Kyon

quote: The person that needs to be as far away from the H-bomb switch as possible in all of Japan, is right here.
author: Kyon

quote: If you're scared, you might as well just cling to my arm. Creates more of an atmosphere.
author: Kyon

quote: I'll back off for now. Next time I won't hesitate to destroy you. Take this time to make your tombstone...
author: Yuki Nagato

quote: Every school story has to have a maid character!
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: I had a dream where I fell into a surreal world with a girl I knew, and then ended up kissing her! A dream so easy to understand that even Sigmund Freud would laugh out loud.
author: Kyon

quote: Kyon, I'm hot!
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: Afterall, the fate of the world rests on my pitching. The world sure isn't worth much these days.
author: Kyon

quote: Kyon. The contest begins the second someone challenges you. Anything the loser says otherwise is merely an excuse.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: Kyon-kun. If I become ruined for marriage will you take me?
author: Mikuru Asahina

quote: *to Haruhi* I'm begging you. Establish the context before you start talking.
author: Kyon

quote: *thinking* Normally, one would call an ambulance or ask for help from one of the nearby residents, but this particular boy decided to carry the unconscious, innocent girl... and where the hell are you taking her, bastard?
author: Kyon

quote: Remote islands are all about strange incidents, right?
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: *to Haruhi* Are you a moron?
author: Kyon

quote: *commenting on Haruhi's naming of the SOS brigade* Haruhi's incomprehensible words settled the matter. Oh, joy. Just do whatever you want.
author: Kyon

quote: *referring to Haruhi* She must have been born dumb.
author: Kyon

quote: Emblem? Looks like a grumbling, drunken tapeworm to me.
author: Kyon

quote: And without any buildup or fanfare, we now see Nagato Yuki. Even if she were ordinary, she sure doesn't look like a normal person and naturally, she was actually an evil magician. And an alien on top of that.
author: Kyon

quote: If your face gets any closer, someone who isn't supposed to be in this scene is going to come over there and kick your ass!
author: Kyon

quote: A picture of you sleeping with a stupid look on your face totally oblivious to the dangers of this trip serves as a warning to future generations!
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: *referring to Haruhi* It would appear that she views guys on the same level as potatoes.
author: Kyon

quote: Anyone accepting defeat will be punished by running ten laps around the school, naked! And you'll have to yell "Green Martians are chasing me!" for the whole ten laps!
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: Let's calm down. The enemy is shooting at us.
author: Itsuki Koizumi

quote: It's time to launch the dams!
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: *thinking* Every day, I hang out with an alien, a time traveler, and a Esper...and I'm still as sane and objective as ever. Hmm...I wonder if that makes me special or something.
author: Kyon

quote: ... After all, our goal each year should be to increase the NUMBER of goals we set for ourselves!
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: *mockingly* That's amazing, Mikuru! We're counting on you! The Earth is in your-- *breaks into uncontrollable and hysterical laughter*
author: Tsuruya

quote: I can't take you seriously when you're dressed like that! I'm sorry, Mikuru, but I'm being controlled by the alien right now. Here goes nothing!
author: Tsuruya

quote: Well, I don't think we can deny the distinct possibility that the world we are in now was freshly created, by Her, last night! In any case, it's an honor to meet you and Miss Suzumiya again. *laughing softly* Be seeing you after class!
author: Itsuki Koizumi

quote: You're the new Adam and Eve. Go on, procreate, increase the population.
author: Itsuki Koizumi

quote: The top brass at the organization is seriously panicked, right now. Nobody knows what will happen to the "real world", now that we've lost our Deity. If Miss Suzimiya is feeling merciful, we might get to keep on living, on this side of the bubble.
author: Itsuki Koizumi

quote: I don't know how I know, I just know that I know, y'know?
author: Itsuki Koizumi

quote: Sometimes I get the feeling that we're all just a bunch of clowns standing on our tiptoes at the edge of a great abyss.
author: Itsuki Koizumi

quote: If there's really that many people in the world, then there had to be someone who wasn't ordinary. There had to be someone who was living an interesting life. There just had to be. Why wasn't I that person?
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: You know, Kyon...have you ever realized just how insignificant your existence on this planet really is?
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: Oh please, won't you just give up? You're going to die no matter what, so let me kill you.
author: Asakura Ryouko

quote: You think it's a joke? Huh. You don't want to die? You don't want me to kill you? I'm sorry, but I just don't understand the concept of death regarding organic lifeforms.
author: Asakura Ryouko

quote: Stop kidding around! You're gonna hurt someone with that! Even if that's a rubber knife, you're scaring the hell out of me!
author: Kyon

quote: *to Kyon* I'm getting bored and just fed up watching something that doesn't seem to be changing at all. That's why...I'm going to kill you and see how Miss Suzumiya reacts.
author: Asakura Ryouko

quote: Listen! This isn't fun and games! You mess around and I'll kill ya!
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: I am not referring to the absence of universally accepted personality traits. What I mean is literal, that Haruhi and I are not like other organic lifeforms such as yourself.
author: Yuki Nagato

quote: It's exactly what the SOS Brigade needs! We need something like a mysterious transfer student!
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: Then I'll tell everyone at school that all you geeks ganged up on her and ed her.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: Feelings of love are just a temporary lapse in judgment. Like a mental illness.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: I'm Haruhi Suzumiya, from East Junior High. First off, I'm not interested in ordinary people. But, if any of you are aliens, time-travelers, or espers, please come see me. That is all!
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: That's classified information.
author: Mikuru Asahina

quote: *to Yammy after recieving his punch*  I barely feel a thing. Now I'm sure you think I'm a big fly or something. But if you are going to punch, you better put in some effort you great big worm.
