author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: Never admit defeat and ask for a quick death! Die first, then admit defeat! If you are defeated but didn't die, it just means you were lucky! At those times, think only about survival! Survive and think only about killing the one who failed to kill you!
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: You idiot! There's always shadows wherever there's light!
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: Oh, shut up. I was just thinkin'. With four arms, you're just gonna keep on blockin' my blade. That's no fun at all. So, while I was layin' on the ground, I was thinkin' about how to stop you blockin' all my attacks. But, you know...I couldn't think up a single good idea lying down there. So I figure...I'll just have to take out those arms, one by one.
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: Finished? It'll never be finished. A battle isn't like some stupid argument. As long as someone's still breathing, the fight isn't over.
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: Playing comes first, you can work later!
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: The reason that I'm no good... Even though I can't do anything well, I will attempt it anyways. Even though I decide not to try anymore, I regret it, and end up trying again. After all, I can't do anything right, it's better if I just don't try at all. I'm an idiot, aren't I...
author: Miranda Lotto

quote: The old clock that nobody could budge. The sound of the chime moved my heart. It seemed like the clock had approved of my clumsy self.
author: Miranda Lotto

quote: I've never had anyone say "thank you" to me. That means I've never been helpful to anyone. I wanted somebody to say "thank you" to me and I wanted them to accept me.
author: Miranda Lotto

quote: You know how there are people who aren't good at anything? Well, that's how I was.
author: Miranda Lotto

quote: It's not a sacrifice. We're helping each other so we can can live.
author: Komui Lee

quote: Wait Lenalee! Komurin is not evil! The coffee is evil!! Hate the crime, not the person. Hate the coffee, not Komurin, Lenalee.
author: Komui Lee

quote: In this world, the only organisms that get cursed are humans.
author: Komui Lee

quote: Seeing you like this, you don't look like a villain who's turned the whole world against him.
author: Tyki Mikk

quote: As expected, you've gotta be evil to have fun.
author: Tyki Mikk

quote: We only look immortal...because you guys are weak!!!
author: Tyki Mikk

quote: Haha... He was my enemy. Shouldn't I kill him?
author: Tyki Mikk

quote: If I'm not careful, I won't be able to go back. I don't want to lose it. Just... the white side of me... and the black side of me... having both of them is what makes it so enjoyable!
author: Tyki Mikk

quote: I guess Noah's can cry.
author: Road Kamelot

quote: Allen has presumably exorcised Tyki’s Noah.
author: Road Kamelot

quote: You know, though I like Allen, my family is also special to me... This kind of feeling is the same as yours, Allen. Don't move. I am not quite myself at the moment. Do you want to see holes open up in the bodies of your companions?
author: Road Kamelot

quote: You're so nice, Allen~ You hate me, don't you? Don't shoot. Your hand is also a weapon, Allen. But an Exorcist crying because an Akuma disappeared is a big no-no. If you act like that, no one will like you. Let's play again sometime, Allen.
author: Road Kamelot

quote: Do not underestimate the Innocence... They will do anything to defeat us... for they are demons.
author: Millenium Earl

quote: There's a famous saying in the East. Even with a crappy gun, shoot a lot and you'll hit something. I have a hell of a lot of Akuma.
author: Millenium Earl

quote: I'm creating Akuma for people's sake.
author: Millenium Earl

quote: You can't just keep quiet and watch anymore, right? You are a failure.
author: Lavi

quote: The time spent in the Order passed on. I soon came to a point where I didn't know whether my smiling face was a lie or not.
author: Lavi

quote: No matter where we go, it's just battles, battles and battles. I get it already, humans are stupid.
author: Lavi

quote: *to Allen* We're not their allies. We're only involved... in order to record history. A Bookman has no need for a heart.
author: Lavi

quote: That's it! I've had it with this. YOU'RE SCARY!! You're freakin' scarier than the Akuma!!
author: Lavi

quote: I don't know, yeah? I'm suspicious of everything. I'm always suspicious of everyone around me. Someone I met yesterday could be an Akuma today. Cause that's the type of thing we're up against. You should understand that, Allen. We are at an overwhelming disadvantage. We're different from you, yeah? Not having that convenient eye. Akuma are mixed in with the humans. The other Exorcists and I... we end up looking at all humans as the Earl's minions.
author: Lavi

quote: Innocence... Please take these feelings and change them into strength to protect everbody. If you do that, I will follow you. I will follow you till the day it all ends. Wherever you take me. But...please, at the end... At the very end, you must promise me you'll let me return to my brother's side.
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: Please, God, I hate so much. Grant me power. For the first time, I want the Innocence so much.
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: That day, when Brother came for me...that was when I thought I can't run from this place anymore. I stopped running away, back then. I stopped running...and I became an Exorcist.
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: You shouldn't treat people's lives like toys. It's as if you're still kids, even though we're about the same age..! You're simply fools trying to look strong! For someone who treats this as a kid's game, Allen-kun who knows the importance of life is much, much stronger than you!!
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: Move...Move! You are my legs! SO MOVE!!
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: ...we will. We will definitely win. I swear.
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: Miranda... Don't bear the burden alone, ok? You are not the only Exorcist. We are all in this together. We are all walking this road with you.
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: We can't just go back from here. If we turn back now, we are trampling down on the lives of those that got us this far.
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: Lavi, when I got back to the ship, I was going to apologize. Allen, you've suffered so much. Yet, you're always looking out for me, thank you. I really shouldn't have borrowed this, Anita's precious hair band... Allen, I... I know you'll come back to us, that's what I decided to believe in.
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: I said I'd kill him. Now get lost. Or should I start with you guys first?
author: Yu Kanda

quote: You're naive. We're destroyers, not saviors.
author: Yu Kanda

quote: There are sacrifices that must be made, rookie.
author: Yu Kanda

quote: This coat isn't a pillow for the wounded..!! It's the uniform of an Exorcist!!!
author: Yu Kanda

quote: Die? I...I cannot die before I find that person.
author: Yu Kanda

quote: It's...it's... gross. Knowing there's something inside me I don't understand. It's gross.
author: Allen Walker

quote: When there's something you can't understand no matter how much you think about it, you can't just let yourself brood over it forever!
author: Allen Walker

quote: Tyki Mikk. There is something about us, Exorcists, that you do not understand. You think Exorcists are mere humans and by destroying their anti-Akuma weapon which is the Innocence...they will become powerless since they are mere humans. But the opponents you should really be afraid of are those humans.
author: Allen Walker

quote: If it could come true, this is all I'd want. It would have been good if we just played poker and nobody died.
author: Allen Walker

quote: Stupid master... If you die, I'll hate you for it.
author: Allen Walker

quote: Because I am a small man, my heart is moved by what's in front of my eyes, not by what the world needs. I just can't abandon what's there in front of me. I want to protect everything I can!
author: Allen Walker

quote: Finally... I have come here, Mana. Finally, I am at the starting line.
author: Allen Walker

quote: Hey, you, don't you dare call me by my first name or I'll slice you up!
author: Yu Kanda

quote: Bring salvation to this poor akuma's soul!
author: Allen Walker

quote: I will shave your entire body.
author: Allen Walker

quote: Kanda, isn't your long hair in the way? You should cut it. *after that Kanda tells him to GO DIE*
author: Allen Walker

quote: As If I'd go down that easily, dumbass.
author: Yu Kanda

quote: He's a she!
author: Lavi

quote: *beating his hammer in the sand* It's just like whack-a-mole and of course "Strike"!
author: Lavi

quote: General Cross is worse than an akuma.
author: Allen Walker

quote: *to Allen* Bean sprout!
author: Yu Kanda

quote: Wow you guys are slow.
author: Allen Walker

quote: Allen, you know you're bleeding, right?
author: Lavi

quote: *after Lenalee hits Lavi* Wow, Lenalee's punch of love.
author: Allen Walker

quote: The only home that a man should ever need is within his heart.
author: Lavi

quote: I'd rather get whipped by a pretty girl like you, than fight this pesky war.
author: Cross Marian

quote: This world is dark and it's so hard to breathe... but in this instant, when I laughed along with you, I felt that breathing just got a little more easier.
author: Yu Kanda

quote: My left I give you to the Akuma. My right I give you to the humans. Both are a part of me. And equally important. So neither side be disappointed. Humans as well as Akuma will be saved!
author: Allen Walker

quote: Kid, we came to pick you up, y'know ?
author: Tyki Mikk

quote: I am sure to choose my own path and walk down it, right? This path that I'm walking down... It's not the path that was chosen for me, is it?
author: Allen Walker

quote: God? I don't care about that. I've made an oath to myself that I would destroy the devil! To my friends that I would fight alongside them! To my Father that I would keep walking until the end..! I Made An Oath To All Of Them!! This is the only path that I can take to feel alive.
author: Allen Walker

quote: It's because of you that we're here now. That is more than enough. I'll bear my own injuries. As long as I live, I'll be able to recover. If I live, I can heal. Although scars will remains.
author: Allen Walker

quote: Even if I can no longer see out of my left eye, I intend to continue being an exorcist... Just like my friends. I have made the vow.
author: Allen Walker

quote: This is bad, Lenalee! You have to think more sexy thoughts, or else, you'll never find a lover!
author: Lavi

quote: What would you do if I told you that you would have to kill someone you love when you become the fourteenth?..
author: Cross Marian

quote: Hate the game, not the player. Hate the coffee, not komurin II.
author: Komui Lee

quote: I want to be a destroyer who saves.
author: Allen Walker

quote: *to Lavi* Get of your high horse!
author: Allen Walker

quote: Kitchen Knife-kun!
author: Tyki Mikk

quote: I'm a master of science.
author: Komui Lee

quote: If you're going to fall, do it by yourself!
author: Yu Kanda

quote: Boobie squeeze!
author: Timothy Hearst

quote: *to Allen* If it gets cold we're gonna have to cuddle.
author: Lavi

quote: I ain't your son!
author: Yu Kanda

quote: You fake gentleman!
author: Yu Kanda

quote: *after Road suggests to make a farewell party for Skin* Don't you mean a funeral.
author: Tyki Mikk

quote: It's just as you say. I wanted to tell you, that I'd come back. I knew you'd come for me, Brother... This time, I will kill you. I will kill you and become the Millenium Earl!
author: Allen Walker

quote: War is sorrowful. The flames of war burn away life and dreams and bonds, leaving behind countless sorrows. So sorrow gives birth to tragedy. And tragedy gives birth to Akuma.
author: Lavi

quote: If there's nobody left, even if the real world is saved, I'll be destroyed...
author: Lenalee Lee

quote: Let's overlook everything you did to the members of the Order... I'm not that cruel of a man after all. But then again, you went and messed up my clothes.
author: Cross Marian

quote: Oi! You! You're in the presence of a beautiful being! Filthy things shouldn't get near me!
author: Cross Marian

quote: No matter how faint our hopes are, even if we don't have anything we can rely on...I will NEVER give up!
author: Allen Walker

quote: A path is something you create as you walk it. The ground you've trodden hardens, and that's what forms your path. You're the only one who can create your own path.
author: Cross Marian

quote: *Laughing* Touya, you can't help but think that Sakura is really, really cute.
author: Yukito Tsukishiro

quote: I see you have a determined spirit, Sakura... however... I am not as sentimental as Keroberos.
author: Yue

quote: I'm really lucky to have a dinosaur for a little sister!
author: Touya Kinomoto

quote: If he can fly, I can fly! I can do anything he can!
author: Meiling Li

quote: You really loved Mr. Clow, didn't you? It hurts, doesn't it? It hurts to lose someone you love.
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: Water... is a thing that flows.
author: Clow Reed

quote: *to Syaoran* No matter what you are thinking, if you don't say it, you won't be able to express it.
author: Tomoyo Daidouji

quote: *to Kero* Our relationship chart has gotten rather complicated.
author: Tomoyo Daidouji

quote: I didn't know everything. There were a couple things that happened that weren't expected by myself or Clow Reed.
author: Eriol Hiiragizawa

quote: In this life, I'm known as Eriol Hiiragizawa. In my past life, I was known as...Clow Reed.
author: Eriol Hiiragizawa

quote: *to Sakura* A smile suits best on your face.
author: Eriol Hiiragizawa

quote: *to Sakura* I... I love you.
author: Syaoran Li

quote: I'm going to get all the Clow cards.
author: Syaoran Li

quote: Even if I lose this feeling, I'm sure that I'll just fall in love with you all over again.
author: Syaoran Li

quote: I am not a monster!
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: *to Yue*  I don't want to be your master. I want to be your friend.
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: The person he loves, I love that person too, and I'm sure that person loves him too. So it's okay that he doesn't love me.
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: Whatever your thoughts may be, if you don't say them, none of them will be acknowledged by others.
author: Tomoyo Daidouji

quote: Yuki, have some antidote before you leave. *to Yukito, as he eats Sakura's cooking*
author: Touya Kinomoto

quote: *to Kero* Stop eating snacks so mindlessly and think of what we can do!
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: *to Li* In the elevator, when you called me "Sakura", it made me very happy.
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: I know! You must be hungry! No wait, that's me.
author: Yukito Tsukishiro

quote: Get my cool pose as well!
author: Kero

quote: I know our magic is hidden in these forms and he can't sense a thing. But a FAIRY?! How would YOU like to be called a fairy?!
author: Spinel Sun

quote: Men are complicated!
author: Tomoyo Daidouji

quote: The greatest happiness for me is to let the person I most like have the most happiness.
author: Tomoyo Daidouji

quote: You always look at me with such a scary face.
author: Eriol Hiiragizawa

quote: I have never dreamed that I would be chased by a piano...
author: Tomoyo Daidouji

quote: Yue-san is handsome, but Yukito-san is... schweeeet!
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: If that brat had become the Master, I'd have lost all my confidence to live!
author: Kero

quote: Living in a world without the feeling for the person you love most is too harsh!
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: Niichan, you really do work part-time everywhere...
author: Sakura Kinomoto

quote: I'm always where food is!
author: Kero

quote: Sakura's head is as hard as a rock.
author: Touya Kinomoto

quote: Do Japanese panthers have wings?!
author: Meiling Li

quote: Girls are scary when they're angry!
author: Kero

quote: I always thought that red would suit Cheshire.
author: Will Of The Abyss

quote: Hey, hurry and come pick me up. I've prepared many different kinds of dolls for you. Let's play together. Let's chat until we feel sleepy. And also... and also... yeah... my beloved ones.
author: Will Of The Abyss

quote: Hurry. Hurry... come pick me up.
author: Will Of The Abyss

quote: You will definitely regret... choosing the Black Rabbit over me.
author: Will Of The Abyss

quote: The sky, the people, and me... it's all so red.
author: Vincent Nightray

quote: No one needs to know what happened 100 years ago.
author: Vincent Nightray

quote: I... I could never hate you!
author: Vincent Nightray

quote: You don't remember?.. That's good.
author: Vincent Nightray

quote: *to Glenn* I don't want to kill you!!
author: Jack Vessalius

quote: Humans...are weak aren't they?
author: Jack Vessalius

quote: Be careful. You're being watched by the Will of Abyss.
author: Jack Vessalius

quote: She is me, and I am her. Our existence is both the same and different. Alice. That was the name we were given.
author: Alice

quote: In the book Sharon showed me, there was a man who became more energetic after his cheeks were bitten!
author: Alice

quote: What is jealousy? Can you eat it? Is it sweet?
author: Alice

quote: I'm in a contract with you. You are my manservant, and as a manservant, what were you thinking, leaving me behind!?
author: Alice

quote: I'm scared that I'm not human. I'm scared that I'm different from other chains... I fear the things I don't know. I fear the things I already knew... and at every moment... I always... more than anyone... fear myself the most!
author: Alice

quote: Shut up, Seaweed Head.
author: Alice

quote: Nobody touches my PROPERTY! And Oz is my manservant - therefore, he is my property!
author: Alice

quote: *to Gilbert* Don't think that I will abandon you!
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: *to Break* Perhaps Break is a lot weaker than I always thought he was. However, I'm sure that he's a whole lot stronger than he thinks he is.
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: I feel so...warm. We know... This calm won't last for long, but...we can't help hoping... That this dreamlike moment... will last.. Forever..
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: There's no reason... I'm just merely, obeying what I believe within me!
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: So... Alice just has to remain Alice!
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: I was rejected, never given any expectations... Then at least, I won't be a burden to others. It's alright if the only one who hurts is me!
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: It's fine, dummy! Since you're the one wearing it! *to Gilbert, while giving him clothes for the coming of age ceremony*
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: I want to know what it is, this "sin" they say I've committed.
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: Alice is my sun.
author: Oz Vessalius

quote: He makes you unhappy?...well then, Cheshire will destroy him!
author: Cheshire Cat

quote: Liar, liar, LIAR!!!
author: Cheshire Cat

quote: You might as well let Cheshire eat you!
author: Cheshire Cat

quote: Everything that made you sad, everything that hurt you, Cheshire will destroy them!
author: Cheshire Cat

quote: In other words, it's fine if you die.
author: Gilbert Nightray

quote: *to Alice* Shut up, you stupid rabbit.
author: Gilbert Nightray

quote: *to Oz* No matter what happens, I will be beside you.
author: Gilbert Nightray

quote: Protecting the master... is supposed to be my job!
author: Gilbert Nightray

quote: Young Master!
author: Gilbert Nightray

quote: *after Kain asks him if he getting slapped by Kaname was worth thinking about Yuuki's blood* Shut up, shut up, shut up, shut up, shut up!!
author: Hanabusa Aidou

quote: BANG!
author: Hanabusa Aidou

quote: The nice smell is your blood, Yuki.
author: Hanabusa Aidou

quote: Hey baby, what's your blood type?
author: Hanabusa Aidou

quote: I wish to erase the past but I have killed too many vampires to let that happen.
author: Kaien Cross

quote: His and my passionate oath!
author: Kaien Cross

quote: I want to put an end to the war between humans and vampires – a war that has been continuing in the darkness of history since ancient times! I want the young vampires, with their natural intelligence and unfettered hearts, to become a bridge between the two species!! I'm educating them for that purpose! That is why I created the Night Class!
author: Kaien Cross

quote: What is beautiful is not the world, but your beautiful eyes that embraces it.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: *to Yuki* You have stopped opening your heart to me. That's the only thing about you that has to change.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: Are you sure? Even if the hidden truth is drenched in blood... Do you still want to know?
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: I've been wondering ever since before, why do you always look so sad whenever you're with me?
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: It's all right, for now. Yuki will eventually come to me.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: Humans should never be turned into vampires. But in the old days, hidden from history, when the war between vampires and vampire hunters was at its peak, vampires turned many humans into vampires to use in battle. And now the aristocrats have the duty to manage those survivors. Sometimes we have to kill them off...
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: It's all right. You be just the way you are, Yuki. You're different from the Night Class students who wait on me... You're a warm-hearted girl, Yuki. That's more than enough.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: The blood has stopped flowing, but the puncture wounds...he really pierced you deeply. Yuki...does it hurt? Are you afraid of vampires now?
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: You devoured her mercilessly. She can't even stand up. Was her blood so delicious?
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: A human bitten by a pureblood vampire transforms into a vampire. When that happens, there can be only one of two results, dying from the loss of blood, or unfavorably surviving and suffering the pain of slowly transforming into a vampire. Other vampires don't possess this dark power that purebloods have. I respect his strength of will, he was only a human, yet he resisted the powerful vampire instinct for four years.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: Headmaster Cross, how much longer are you going to keep Zero in the Day Class? That time is approaching for him.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: After we turn around, the next time we see each other, I will kill you.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: Listen up, brats! Get the hell back to your dorms! Why do I have to deal with you running around screaming "Kyaa! Kyaa!" every damn day?! Why?!
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: But you thought it would be okay to become a vampire, right? I will never let you turn into something like that. Even if it means I have to make Kaname Kuran my enemy...and even if it means you will hate me.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: Former humans eventually fall into the Level E category, Yuki. They gradually lose their sanity, reaching their "end" - their destruction.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: I borrowed it from the Headmaster. It's a gun to use against vampires. If I lose the human part of me, and go mad as a vampire...shoot me with that gun. Not yet, but that day will eventually come. Kill me by your own hand then.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: I couldn't stop myself from devouring you. I may kill the next human I target as my prey. Shoot me. You're afraid of me, aren't you? Hold the gun with both hands, and aim straight. Aim for my heart. It's not a crime to kill a vampire.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: You heard it too? The sound of your blood being sucked in by me. After such a hair-raising experience you can't act as if nothing has changed. So don't interfere anymore.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: Come on vampires. I've been pissed off lately.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: The Headmaster talks about the Night Class like they're good vampires who support his pacifism, but I don't trust them. I won't let my guard down. I'm cooperating so I can find the most effective way to kill those beasts in human form.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: I will keep running away so Zero has a reason to live.
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: Both of us understand, but neither of us will say it. It's a sin to keep a vampire alive by offering my own blood as bait. We are doing something that is forbidden. No one must find out about this.
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: Being like this makes me feel like we've returned to the old days somewhat. Yeah. Zero is Zero. Even if you are a vampire now.
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: I didn't understand anything. Zero suffered and suffered for four years. What were you thinking, all by yourself? He loathes vampires so much, he wants to kill them all. All this time, Zero wanted to kill himself too.
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: Yuki, I can't accept it after all, that my most precious girl was bitten by another.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: When I think of him, I feel so much love and such sadness...is it a bad thing that the same feeling makes me want to latch onto his throat and devour his blood and even his life to taste his feelings in it?
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: I refuse to breathe the same air as those creatures. I refuse to wear the stupid uniform full of buttons that those creatures wear. If I am imprisoned in a classroom full of those creatures, I will certainly lose it, I will massacre every single one of them.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: You are the only one who brings color into the dull gray ashes that my heart is.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: If my only option I have is to lose you, then I would prefer death instead. Be it yours, by my hand, or could you please kill me then yuki..?
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: Her warm hands against my face like that... They were like a plank I would hold on to, so I wouldn't drown.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: It is the vampire hunter's duty to kill vampires.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: Yuki, who made those wounds on your neck? In our classroom the night before last, we suddenly smelt blood, we were surprised. I was the only one who noticed right away that it was your blood.
author: Hanabusa Aidou

quote: That's right...you should run away. Yuki...you make me cruel.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: I didn't think that the day would come where you would talk about other guys. How unfair.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: Yuki, don't cry. For this day to come, I have waited impatiently for a very long time.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: You've finally fallen to the blood lust of beasts, Zero.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: You could never betray her, because you are under her obligation. You are being let to live because of that, Zero. By me.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: I'm a bit annoyed that you bit me without any restraint.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: Do not ever forget...who gave you this blood.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: A glimpse of what I saw earlier was something so distant from me. And yet right now, this man is lying here in my arms. It's such a strange feeling.
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: I still think about protecting you two...even if it's considered as an act of taboo by "humans".
author: Kaien Cross

quote: Go Yuki... Go and be by the side of the man who can spend an eternity with you.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: I long for him...but I understand. There's a line that vampires and humans can't cross.
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: Because Yuui was there, I might have been able to live on...
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: Yuki is my dear girl. The only one in the entire world.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: You're a disgrace to all vampires.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: If you need to, Zero, you can drink my blood... *blush blush*
author: Kaien Cross

quote: I want these gentle hands... and this kind smile...Even though I should not want such a thing.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: Yuki, the safest place is beside me.
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: I love you Kaname-sama. You are the beginning of my world, and everything in that world... So even if I couldn't remember my past...I wasn't scared.
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: Do you want to be a vampire Yuuki, become a blood sucking monster like me....and live for eternity by my side...?
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: Do you want to be my friend..?
author: Kaname Kuran

quote: I can't know about somebody who isn't here. But, you shouldn't depend on people who aren't here.
author: Nia Teppelin

quote: Do you want to die? If you're scared, it's okay to run.
author: Nia Teppelin

quote: *to Yoko* If your fat ass slows us down, I'll leave you behind, Undergrounder.
author: Kamina

quote: I have no reason to listen to anything a human says!
author: Viral

quote: *to Kamina* However, surprise attacks need more than surprise. It won't work again.
author: Viral

quote: *to Kamina* Boasting like that is just asking for death.
author: Viral

quote: I'll tell you two things: First, any human on the surface will be completely annihilated by our Human Eradication Army. Second, that is my dinner - give it back!
author: Viral

quote: This-Is-The-Real-Spirit-Of-Men' Cannonball Attack!
author: Kamina

quote: How-Dare-You-Do-That-To-My-Precious-Underling' Punch!!!!
author: Kamina

quote: Well, Well, Well, Well... Listen up, big guys! I'll only say this once... Undefeatable, untouchable, with no regrets! Never looking back, never wavering! You can't win against this man's will! Gurren Brigade's Kamina-sama will be your opponent! Believe it!
author: Kamina

quote: If you become a wall that stands in my way... I'll tear open a hole and break through you every time! That's... MY DRILL!
author: Simon

quote: We'll break through the heavens and dimensions!
author: Simon

quote: Our burning blood will cut through fate!
author: Viral

quote: Now then... I've come to reclaim my helm! That's what I wanted to say, but before that... put on some damn clothes!!!
author: Viral

quote: *to Nia* I don't fully understand, but it doesn't matter why you were born, or if you're a princess. The Nia right here is you. So it's okay if you just be yourself.
author: Simon

quote: Who-The-Hell-Do-You-Think-I-Am kick!
author: Kamina

quote: My-Wife-Is-The-Best-In-The-Universe throw!
author: Kamina

quote: I keep telling you I'm a girl!
author: Yoko Littner

quote: If there's no road, we'll forge it with our own hands!
author: Simon

quote: If there's a wall in our way, we'll destroy it!
author: Simon

quote: Bro is dead. He's no longer here. However, on my back, within my heart, he continues to live on!
author: Simon

quote: When I feel weak, or when I lack self-confidence, I remember Simon's back as he dug tirelessly. I wanted to become a man who's back would never break. That's what I thought.
author: Kamina

quote: When we were trapped in that hole...there was nothing I could do. But Simon just kept on digging. Believing in my show of courage. In the end, he was the one who saved me.
author: Kamina

quote: I didn't have any confidence. I thought I was living the wrong way. Impatiently. Why couldn't I go where my father could? Truthfully, I wasn't strong enough.
author: Kamina

quote: Kamina told me before. "He's the one that always saves me.", "He's the one that doesn't give up, even at the end.".
author: Yoko Littner

quote: Listen up, Simon. Don't forget. Believe in yourself. Not in you who believes in me. Not in me who believes in you. Believe in yourself!
author: Kamina

quote: I can't even rest in peace, can I..?
author: Kamina

quote: In the eyes of the weak, everyone is strong. But I am truly strong.
author: Shinku

quote: Meatball head, don't go in there alone! You'd probably get lost in your own closet!
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: Psst, hey Rei, major question. You didn't forget to kiss Chad goodbye, did you?
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: Come on you pastey-faced two-timing nega-twit!
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: You want trouble pal... you're lookin' at it!
author: Makoto Kino

quote: Hello? Planet earth to player b.
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: I'm alright, but the big ugly thing isn't.
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: *referring to Tsukino* Are you stupid, or just incredibly lazy?
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: You know, Darien. Even in a dream, you're just toogood to be true.
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: Stupid weatherman, he NEVER gets it right!
author: Makoto Kino

quote: Who needs sunshine anyways...
author: Makoto Kino

quote: I am Darian, Prince of Earth.
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: The future is something you build by yourself.
author: Ami Mizuno

quote: Who wants that? I'd rather choose to fall in love and be hurt. Sometimes I can't even sleep because I love someone too much. And there's always sadness in our lives. It's that sad feeling that keeps us going.
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: It's sad that a selfish woman like you will never know how wonderful being in love is! Your beautiful world of ice will just be a dark land of death! How could a world without life be beautiful?
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: We're gonna chew you up, and spit you out!
author: Rei Hino

quote: Whoops! Froze the whipping cream!
author: Minako Aino

quote: Jupiter Thunder Crash!
author: Makoto Kino

quote: Venus Crescent Beam!
author: Minako Aino

quote: You use you power only for evil, Jedite. Big mistake.
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: Give it back! Give it back to Raye right now! You'll pay for your rotten ways!
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: Bullying little kids, how far you go, pal? Are you just a schoolyard bully?
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: I won't let you take her... do you hear me? Nobody takes her without facing me first... YOU'RE DUSTED BUSTER!
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: I've had it with this itchy costume! We were supposed to be dwarves, remember? Not animals! I feel like some little five-year old back in kindergarten!
author: Rei Hino

quote: That's as good an excuse as any. Now it's my turn. You better take some notes, 'cause you're gonna get beaten and beaten badly.
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: Very impressive, you didn't land a single punch.
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: You've got guts, Jupiter. But it takes more than guts to beat the Negaverse. Give up now, you'll never win.
author: Mamoru Chiba

quote: Mars Fire Ignite!
author: Rei Hino

quote: You've got to stop reading so many romance novels!
author: Makoto Kino

quote: Look who's talking! You think the paperboy likes you just because he rides by your front door every morning!
author: Minako Aino

quote: I was just warming up, hotshot.
author: Makoto Kino

quote: Better enjoy that laugh, Beryl. It's the last one you'll ever have.
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: Mercury Bubble Blast!
author: Ami Mizuno

quote: *to Sammy* You're cruisin' for a bruisin'!
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: I am Sailor Moon! I stand for love. And I also stand for justice. And in the name of the Moon, I will punish you!
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: Venus lovechain encircle!
author: Minako Aino

quote: Moon Prism Power! ...And make it fast!
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: But I'm the one with the most talent here!
author: Makoto Kino

quote: A talking cat! Oh man, I have been studying too hard!
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: Ow! That hurt! I don't want to do this anymore!
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: *while being chased by a jet* How will I ever explain to my friends why I have tire tracks down my back?
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: I am Sailor Moon, the champion of justice! In the name of the Moon, I will punish you! I will right wrongs and triumph over evil and that means you!
author: Usagi Tsukino

quote: Good God, is she in the running for 'brattiest princess ever'? Must've been spoiled rotten when she was growing up
author: Hikaru Hitachiin

quote: People are able to hold onto hope, since death is that which cannot be seen.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: It's not luck, I'm cheating.
author: Allen Walker

quote: You're such a child. You talk of nothing but pipe dreams... there are times when people must make painful choices.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: That's why for you, you have the right to be cruel to me. No matter how much you make me worry or how much danger you put me in, just as much as you like. But these are not enough "compensation". Even if I have to sacrifice my left over life for you, I would not utter a word of complaint.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: You said it yourself once...The reason why they look like humans...is so that they can hunt us down more efficiently.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: If you go one step ahead of me, I'll make you cry...
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.
author: Shinichi Kudou

quote: Humankind cannot gain anything without first giving something in return. To obtain, something of equal value must be lost. That is alchemy's first law of equivalent exchange. In those days, we really believed that to be the world's one and only truth.
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: If he made a ripple in the long, long lazy life of a demon, then Alois Trancy's soul also was worth cracking open, per...haps.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: Passion to insincerity, lies to reality, a stray dog into an Earl. That is...'s but...ler.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: Ciel Phantomhive, I will pierce your soft skin with my needle... and slowly suck out your sensual soul.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: *to Sebastian* Say, have your demonic senses weakened after devoting too much to that human's soul?
author: Claude Faustus

quote: Passion to calm, hesitation to resolve, love to gravestones. That is the Trancy butler.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: I simply have a hell of a desire to devour you, Master.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: For a mere butler, to go that far... Don't worry, Young Master. The menial soul that can give love to one is only a butler.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: *teasing Sebastian* A demon and a butler... I am one too.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: Master.. I will always stay by your side. Day and night, sugar and salt, living and dead, impure and pure.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: *to Sebastian* To touch something that is meant to transport food with one's shoes is a disgrace for a butler!
author: Claude Faustus

quote: *to Alois* I am your loyal servant. Even if you do not try to attract my attention, I want to greedily devour you to the very end.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: Yes, Your Highness.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: Everyone, everything is happy!
author: Alois Trancy

quote: *to Ciel* Oh, so we were not going to the restroom together?
author: Alois Trancy

quote: *to Luka* They should all die! All of them! Everything, annihilated!
author: Alois Trancy

quote: My heart was entwined in a spider web. You'll always be my Highness. I wanted your love.
author: Alois Trancy

quote: How does my blood smell? Do you want to devour me now?
author: Alois Trancy

quote: *to Claude* Then show me those eyes. Not the eyes of those villagers who looked as if they'd seen a pile of vomit. Not the old man's greedy, inflamed eyes. That day, those eyes. Those eyes that longed only for me, Claude.
author: Alois Trancy

quote: *to Claude* You are...you yourself are...My Highness!
author: Alois Trancy

quote: Hannah, don't you think a sunny-side-up egg is pitiable? Its shell is broken and it's forced to publicly show an indecorous appearance. Then it becomes an eyeball, internal organs, or a plume. And I rob it of any and all possibilities.
author: Alois Trancy

quote: How pitiable.
author: Alois Trancy

quote: In this world, Earl, there're people who can't survive because of the cruelty of reality. I sell those people dreams.
author: Lau

quote: The spider's web has already been woven. The more you struggle, the harder it becomes to escape from those bonds. Whatever the prey, once they get involved with me, catching them is only a matter of time.
author: Lau

quote: I've got to exterminate the bad rats infesting my city, don't I? So I keep a cat. Meow!
author: Lau

quote: The earl said there's no point in going after the small fries, but someone who tries something once will try it again, right?
author: Lau

quote: Meh, Ran-Mao is my little sister. Yeah, my sister. Even though we aren't related by blood.
author: Lau

quote: *to Ciel* That means you will steadily sink into mud. Even if you step toward a place from which you can't return, you choose not to reveal your screaming for help to other people, eh?
author: Lau

quote: *referring to Vincent Phantomhive* I came to love my red hair that was just like my father's. I came to love red. I came to love you.
author: Madame Red

quote: I used to hate my red hair that was just like my father's. I used to hate red.
author: Madame Red

quote: *to Ciel* You want to take revenge for my murdered sister? Sister would definitely have not... we would not have wanted you to be like this.
author: Madame Red

quote: *when Ciel questions why he's dressed up as a female for Aleister's party* Because I've always wanted a daughter! A cute daughter who would look lovely in those long flowing dresses!
author: Madame Red

quote: *referring to getting into Aleister Chamber's party* Aren't you underestimating me? Aren't I rather popular? A few words here and there and it'll be arranged.
author: Madame Red

quote: I'll keep to what the young master has told me. To face the master with a clean mansion every day. That is a maid's job. I wipe away the mansion's dirt.
author: Maylene

quote: These are my precious glasses that the young master bought for me! These maid outfits as well. Before I'd come here, I'd never worn anything like a skirt. I'm so happy I'm a maid now.
author: Maylene

quote: The young master doesn't give me injections every day. The young master doesn't kill my friends. The young master doesn't lock me up. I love it here. That's why I decided I'd protect it.
author: Finnian

quote: *to Agni, who tells him to be nice to the trees* Treat them kindly,' huh? Before I came here, I don't think I would have understood. But now, I feel like I can do it!
author: Finnian

quote: It used to be that I couldn't go outside like this. So now it's fun to do it every day. I can touch trees and bugs and people.
author: Finnian

quote: *when Agni asks him to mash potatoes* It requires strength? Since that's the case, I might be able to do it! I wanna do it! Please allow me to do it!
author: Finnian

quote: But my strength is too large, so Mr. Sebastian forbids me to touch anything in the kitchen.
author: Finnian

quote: *after Sebastian tells him to design the garden* Then... then ... I'll make a cool garden that looks like a transforming robot! Can I?!
author: Finnian

quote: Do not-arrogant people exist?
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I ... humiliated as a pet ... my house was burnt, my family was killed. I was such a... powerless kid. Therefore, I returned to this place in order to make those people who put me through such fate taste the same humiliation. The successors of the generations killed three years prior would come to me as long as I am the head of the Phantomhive family that stands in their way. I'm waiting ...for them to come and try to kill me here.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: So what? You're another person, so of course you look different. What do you need to be ashamed for? Besides, I'm free to be with whoever I want. No one has the right to say anything about it.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Listen when people are talking to you!!!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: He is nothing more than one of my pawns. However, he is not a normal pawn. He is a pawn that can get across the whole board in one move.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: What are you lazily standing around for? You obtained me my revenge. This is an order! Come and eat my soul already! Until the very moment when you eat all my soul you are my butler - Sebastian Michaelis!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: *to Sebastian* Let's go, you cat-obsessed moron.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I'm sorry. Seeing Sebastian's corpse so many times... is just too much for me...
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I'm a human being, Sebastian!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I'm arrogant, but not so much that I'd irresponsibly save someone just to brag about it.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: *to Sebastian* I don't need your "fawning". It's disgusting.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: *to Prince Sohma* Who's my best friend? Don't say such ridiculous things.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: It's in bad taste to play games that make me feel like throwing up, Demon!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Enough already! I'm going to feel queer if I continue to live like this!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Father, Mother, God, please... Why? Why is there no one? No one comes to our rescue.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: *to Sebastian* You shall never betray me. You shall never leave my side. No matter what!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I'm afraid today's game was quite uninteresting.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: To smile happily, I've... forgotten.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: *to Sebastian* You idiot!! Do you think I'd dance with a big, male partner like you?!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: It's not like I became her fiancée. I was forced to do it.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Yes, "kids" have a great greed for games.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: *to Sebastian* Ah, I can finally appear before you in my real form! Because isn't it embarrassing to appear before a handsome guy without makeup?
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: *to Sebastian* Such an ice king you are! A beautiful tyrant! An angelic devil! A raven with the wings of a dove! My little lamb with the appetite of a wolf... My very own Sebastian DARLING!!!
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: *to Claude* Ally? What's with that cliched word? Supreme love is always a battle to death!
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: I am the queen of all fruits!
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: *to Sebastian* This is great! I'm getting goosebumps all over my body, Little Sebas-chan! If I have your child, I will definitely give birth to it!
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: I'm going to use the heels of my shoes to step on this cold, uncaring face of yours! I want you to lick my shoes clean!
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: A good man's past makes people curious! But if he's a bad man, then it makes me wanna see even more!
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: *to Sebastian* Don't say that. I'm sure you'll become addicted to the taste of my "death scythe".
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: Even if I'm like this, I'm still the butler of death!
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: Lately, I've only been encountering unsophisticated prey. My scythe and I are unsatisfied.
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: Oh, Little Sebas-chan, I do love red the most. Hair, clothes, lipstick, I love them to be red. That's why I love using fresh blood to do make-up for those ugly women. The more flamboyant a woman is, the more she's as beautiful as a poisonous flower, right?
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: *to Sebastian* I really wanna do some vigorous exercise with you.
author: Grell Sutcliff

quote: Those round and innocent eyes that know no filth or foulness, those tails that lovingly swish as if they belong to nobility, those paws in the soft shade of warm light pink!
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Grell* You really have no standards.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Yes...I am a demon. There's no way I could understand my prey, a human's sense of taste. What I understand is...only the taste of a human's soul.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Grell* Isn't it a hot day?
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Hannah* I have a contract. Even if you steal him from me, he is still my Young Master. The lot of you aren't fit to even lick his soul.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Forsake the future, sacrifice your dreams, while stained with deep despair, elude the past, fight the reality, and never relinquish your nobility. Just like that, Young Master. That is the soul I wish to consume.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Claude, teasing him* This is your way, right? Day into night, sugar into salt, dark blue into gold. Then I will turn the gold... into black.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Young Master... It's time to wake up.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Now I can show you my true nature.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Claude* How can you say that. I'm one hell of- wait, it's still early for that.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: I do not need a thousand souls, I only need one, which is my master's.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: I'm a butler. I can't let my master see the form that speaks badly of my reputation.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Ciel* I shall make it as gentle as possible.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Heaven? That has no hold over me.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Ciel* I am your knight, after all.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Unseemly... ugly... vicious... My true form.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Cats are great. They don't talk about useless things. Or do them. Nothing is cuter. They are something that don't exist in my world. They have pets over there as well...but...it doesn't quite compare.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Beast*  Wouldn't it be good to forget everything even if it's just for tonight? Indulge in pleasure...breathe a sweet poison deep into your lungs.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Ciel*  In your current state...you are even more like...My Lady.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: For a king to survive it's good for him to be able to skillfully manipulate the other pieces using both the knight and the queen. Beneath the throne the bodies of your pieces will pile up along with your sins. You must not lose.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Ciel* You're a child when it's convenient, huh.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Any game becomes boring when it lacks thrills.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: As long as there is the contract, I will protect your life. However, if you make a mistake of your own accord, you will possibly suffer a painful experience while alive. You already know that, don't you?
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to William Spears* My, my. How difficult to handle alone. But this large quantity of souls, shall a demon like me offer you assistance with them?
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: It has nothing to do with England or India. No matter where or when, it's the same. Humanity, that is.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *to Ciel* Well, aren't you a very young master. You have summoned me. This fact will not change for all eternity. What has been sacrificed will never be returned. Now... choose.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *talking to other servants* Why don't you all kneel down on the ground and beg for even a mere scrap of Agni's talents? Perhaps it would even improve you a little.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: However, when trying to reach your goals, you need to learn how to eat some humble pie occasionally. If you don't, one small trip one day might mean your fall.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Heaven? I don't have an affinity with that place.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: *about Finnian* I have lived for a long time, but this is my first time meeting a space alien. What kind of counter-attack is that sparkly, smiley face expecting from me?
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: It seems your talent for dancing is non-existent. It must be crushing, young master.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Now... Earl, give me that!
author: Undertaker

quote: *to Ciel* You don't need to tell me, I know why you came, with just one look I can tell what's on your mind.
author: Undertaker

quote: I wonder, if the butler isn't here, is the earl just a child who can't do anything?
author: Undertaker

quote: Victoria, aye? I'm not a fan. She sits herself up so high above everyone else, and leaves the painful dirty work to the earl.
author: Undertaker

quote: Today is a particular woman's special gala. The final great ceremony in each human's life. A funeral.
author: Undertaker

quote: I don't want any of the queen's money!
author: Undertaker

quote: *to Ciel* Welcome, Earl. Do you want to see how it feels to sleep in my custom-made coffin?
author: Undertaker

quote: This is super-dimensional soccer. (he's not freaking kidding)
author: Endou Mamoru

quote: My presence is thin.
author: Kageno Jin

quote: It's been a long time since I talked this much, so I felt really nervous.
author: Kageno Jin

quote: I came here because I want to be a man with a more visible existence.
author: Kageno Jin

quote: I want to play soccer with you Endou!
author: Ichinose Kazuya

quote: Endou! Show me the soccer I came to love!
author: Ichinose Kazuya

quote: I need to be faster.
author: Kazemaru Ichirouta

quote: I need more power to beat Aliea Academy.
author: Kazemaru Ichirouta

quote: I'm not as strong as you, Endou.
author: Kazemaru Ichirouta

quote: *to Fideo* Thanks for bringing that man back to his old self.
author: Kidou Yuuto

quote: *to Kageyama* So this is the real you.
author: Kidou Yuuto

quote: *to Endou* Maybe when I join your team, I may find the soccer I'm trying to find.
author: Kidou Yuuto

quote: When I kick the ball, I feel like I'm playing with my father.
author: Kidou Yuuto

quote: *to Haruna* I never stopped thinking about you.
author: Kidou Yuuto

quote: Being perfect doesn't mean I had to become Atsuya. It was to fight alongside my friends...To become one with them!
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: I swore with Atsuya that I would become stronger with him.
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: I'll become perfect through this match. For everyone's sakes, I have to!
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: I want to be useful to the team!
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: Coach please let me play in this match!
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: I'm not perfect, I can't help anyone.
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: If I stay here, nothing about me will change.
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: Why am I sitting here? I chose to stay with the Captain and the others so I could become perfect.
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: We're getting goals, right? Just leave it to me!
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: You can't win without good defense.
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: Let's run like the wind together.
author: Fubuki Shirou

quote: On Earth, there aren't any allies or enemies when the match is over.
author: Endou Mamoru

quote: *to Gouenji* You're always late!!
author: Endou Mamoru

quote: Don't mind! Don't mind!
author: Endou Mamoru

quote: Oh, a headband! *runs off in that direction*
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: In the manga, when I wasn't in the picture, even if I didn't sing nobody noticed, but if I don't sing in the anime...
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Make sure you don't mistake soy sauce for sugar.
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: He's so cute, I want to put peanuts in his nose.
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: We'll follow her BUTT and find out what kind of guy she's dating!
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: MAN! I'M SO JEALOUS!
author: Jun Suzuki

quote: I want to be able to snap my fingers!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: The Cake is a Lie!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Where on earth would you find such a hot fifty year old?
author: Sawako Yamanaka

quote: Wait, does that mean you're in your fifties?
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Thou art not good! Thou shalt not become a great actress at this rate!
author: Ritsu Tainaka

quote: You and Mio-chan...you're hitting each other and bonding through bodily contact, right?
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: Ritsu~! Don't do this~! MEN ARE ANIMALS!
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: I have one last request. Please slap me in the face with that wad of cash.
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: I'm tree G! Pose of a tree!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: I'm FLYING!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: High schoolers are kind of amazing!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Mugi-chan, you have really thick eyebrows.
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: *to Ritsu* If you were a boy, I am sure you would be very popular with the girls!
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: Jello is nice...
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: We didn't call you because we thought you have a date with your boyfriend or something.
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: All your sweets are belong to me!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Do you want me to transform you into someone that even you won't recognize?
author: Sawako Yamanaka

quote: *joyfully* I've never caught a cold! *they say only idiots don't catch colds*
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Tapping!?
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: Speed shredding!?
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: Teeth shredding!?
author: Ritsu Tainaka

quote: I'll go out with you if you want.
author: Sawako Yamanaka

quote: Not joining a club means you become a NEET?!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: Squishy~!
author: Yui Hirasawa

quote: I've always wanted someone to ask me if I would like fries with that.
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: Would something like that make her feel better... - OH, IT DID!
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: There are only two kinds of rock guitarists: Jeff Beck and everyone else.
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: Yes, but I'd rather be friends with fun people that I don't meet often.
author: Tsumugi Kotobuki

quote: So we're like rare animals?
author: Mio Akiyama

quote: *about Shikamaru* Amazing. This slacker-clown outsmarted me!
author: Temari

quote: Sharpen your kama at sunset.
author: Temari

quote: *to Lee* Get yourself and that loser out of my way.
author: Temari

quote: *to Shikamaru* You are awfully fragile. What kind of man are you?
author: Temari

quote: Wasn't much of a match...kinda boring.
author: Temari

quote: There are no enemies here because we've all suffered at Akatsuki's hand! So there is no Suna, no Iwa, no Konoha, no Kiri, and no Kumo! There are only "shinobi"!
author: Gaara

quote: He was the one who taught me to deepen my bond with my people. Thanks to him, I was able to regain my true self. That village has him, the one who cherishes a friend's bond more than anyone I know. Naruto Uzumaki... Knowing him and the friends he holds so dear, they will overcome this disaster and grow even stronger from it.
author: Gaara

quote: This is where it all starts for me. Starting with this small bond. I too want to become someone who is needed, instead of a weapon that is feared. And as the Kazekage of Sunagakure.
author: Gaara

quote: I know him well. He takes too many risks when it comes to his friends...that's why.
author: Gaara

quote: *to Naruto* I think of you as a friend. I used to think "friend" was just another word... Nothing more, nothing less. But when I met you, I realized what was important was the word's meaning.
author: Gaara

quote: *to Naruto* If you're truly prepared to take up the mantle of a Kage, then as Sasuke's friend, you know what you have to do.
author: Gaara

quote: Peace under an illusion is not a true peace. It's only meaningful if the real world manages to accomplish it.
author: Gaara

quote: When did you forsake yourselves?
author: Gaara

quote: Up until now, my bonds with others have only been ones of hatred and murder. But, seeing him fight so hard made me wonder what a bond really is. I think I understand a little now. Suffering, sadness...and joy. To be able to share it with another person. Naruto Uzumaki...when I fought him, I feel that is what he taught me.
author: Gaara

quote: Perhaps the companionship of an evil person is preferable to loneliness.
author: Gaara

quote: You're the same then. When you feel the honor of your idol under scrutiny... you become enraged, as if it were your own honor being questioned. The more precious your idol is to you... the harder you fight for him.
author: Gaara

quote: I shall kill you. I will not cease to exist.
author: Gaara

quote: *to Sasuke* You have the same eyes as I do...the eyes, filled with hatred and death, that long for strength... Just like mine. Your eyes tell me how badly you wish to kill the one who put you through the hell called loneliness.
author: Gaara

quote: I am a relic they want to get rid of, so why do I exist and live? In order to exist you need a purpose, to exist for no reason is the same as being dead... I would love only myself and fight for only myself. If all other people exist to magnify that love, then there is no more a splendid universe than this one...
author: Gaara

quote: The corpse's bitter crimson tears flow and mingle with the endless sand, filling the chaos within me - and making me stronger.
author: Gaara

quote: I finally understand... I'm alone. I won't believe in anyone, or love anyone. I'm alone.
author: Gaara

quote: What does pain feel like?
author: Gaara

quote: I wasn't cast aside. It was my choice, and mine alone.
author: Anko Mitarashi

quote: *to Orochimaru* But why? How could you do this!? I don't get it, I've looked up to you more than anyone in the world!
author: Anko Mitarashi

quote: *about Sasuke* I don't care what the heck he is! If he stays, he's a danger to everyone! Don't you see!? As he gets stronger, so does the Curse Mark! That thing is feeding off his chakra! It's a Forbidden Jutsu that devours the one who bears it! It's incredible the kid's still standing. By now, he...should be dead.
author: Anko Mitarashi

quote: *to Orochimaru* This is no time to reminisce, you're an S-class criminal, top of the most wanted list. You've got to be taken down, and it's only fitting that I'm the one to do it. 'Cause after all, you're the one that taught me everything, right, Sensei?
author: Anko Mitarashi

quote: *to Naruto* Tough guys like you usually leave their blood all over this forest.
author: Anko Mitarashi

quote: He was a worthy opponent! A man who lived and died like a real shinobi! Kisame Hoshigaki! I'll remember that name for the rest of my life!
author: Might Guy

quote: *to Kisame* A failure will win even at the cost of their own life!
author: Might Guy

quote: That's it, Lee! Let the power of youth explode!!
author: Might Guy

quote: When a man struts around like a peacock, acting like Mr. Big Stuff, he should keep his promises. Even if it kills him.
author: Might Guy

quote: Gahh! Kakashi! You make me so mad! Why do you have to act so cool?!
author: Might Guy

quote: You have the gift of perseverance, and that's what makes you a genius too!
author: Might Guy

quote: Don't let anything stir you up the path you have drawn for yourself! Forge ahead in the end! Stick to it Lee! Make me proud! Be everything you can be!
author: Might Guy

quote: You worked hard Lee, there's no doubt in my mind the surgery will be a success. You have the power to shape your own destiny. And on the one-in-one thousand, no, one in a million chance something to happen to go wrong, I will die right along with you. Since the day I met you, my nindō has been to train you to become the most splendid ninja possible. That's a promise!
author: Might Guy

quote: *to Neji* I was a failure when I was your age, but now I can even beat Kakashi, the elite genius. It's only a matter of time until Lee finally surpasses you!
author: Might Guy

quote: People call me the Leaf's Noble Gentleman!
author: Might Guy

quote: That's it, Lee! Run...run towards the setting sun!... But don't mess up your hair!
author: Might Guy

quote: Look deep into my eyes and accept my sincere apology! Also notice my handsome manly features.
author: Might Guy

quote: *to Kakashi* What is with your attitude?! We'll never be young like this again!
author: Might Guy

quote: I kind of hate him.
author: Shino Aburame

quote: If you fight me, you won't be able to recover. Forfeit and withdraw.
author: Shino Aburame

quote: Never underestimate your opponent, no matter how small they may seem.
author: Shino Aburame

quote: Even if it's been a while, you should remember your comrades faces. Why? Because otherwise you will hurt their feelings when they call out to you.
author: Shino Aburame

quote: I hate explaining the same thing twice.
author: Shino Aburame

quote: This is what a real trump card is.
author: Shino Aburame

quote: If I kick enough asses I might even end up Hokage!
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: Let's die together.
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: *to Naruto* You? Hokage? You can't even beat me! No-one's deluded enough to think that you have what it takes to become the next Hokage, not even you! Tell you what, though... I'll become Hokage in your place!
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: Don't think you can run away from my nose.
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: Heh, I don't know what's going on, but I'm always up for getting wild.
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: Yahoo! Akamaru, let's do this!
author: Kiba Inuzuka

quote: I'm gonna eat until I can eat no more!
author: Chouji Akimichi

quote: I can't forgive you for calling me fat! But even more than that... Not just for stealing the last chip... or calling me fat... most importantly I won't forgive anyone who insults my best friend!
author: Chouji Akimichi

quote: Fat!? I'm big boned!
author: Chouji Akimichi

quote: *to Shikamaru* I won't let even YOU eat the last barbecue chip!
author: Chouji Akimichi

quote: My master entrusted me with a lot, from big things to little things. It's the same for you an unlimited number of things, don't you think it's about time for us, to be the ones who entrust not the entrusted, it's a pain in the ass but I can't say that. Someday you'll be the one to treat others to ramen and you'll be called Master Naruto... We can't stay kids forever, like Asuma and Jiraiya, I wanna be as cool as them.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: *about Temari* Subtle as a rhino... she might even be scarier than my mom.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: *about women, to his father* If women made you a better person, I wouldn't want to know what you were like before.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: *about girls* C'mon. You know what they're like. You can never figure them out. You never know where you could stand with them. The smallest things could put you in their bad side. Always playing little mind games with you. Trying to make you do what they want. They're just a big pain basically.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: When you have that kid, I'll have to protect it. So I've gotta grow up to be a cool adult too!
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: We're not stupid enough to go out there planning to die.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: *to Hidan* That pathetic Lord Jashin or whatever isn't your God anymore. I am. The only one bringing down vengeance is me.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: *to Hidan* See, you and I have different beliefs. I believe in the Will of Fire.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: Ughh. Great. What's the point in setting the alarm if I'm going to wake up before it goes off? What a total waste. Now I've gotta shut it off but I don't feel like moving. But if I don't shut it off it will just keep ringing and ringing. Sigh. It makes me tired just thinking about the whole thing. Some mornings are such a drag...
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: You would think just this once, when it was life or death, I could pull through.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: How many times do I have to tell you? The first move is always a feint.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: I never really liked Sasuke, but all the same, he's a member of the Hidden Leaf village, he's a comrade and I'll put my life on the line to help him, that's the way of our village. I know I usually seem like a pretty lazy guy, but not today. Because now, I'm responsible for your lives too.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: Sometimes I wish I was just a cloud, floating along.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: *about Ino* What a drag... I say a single thing against Sasuke, and I have to get that evil look from her eyes.
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: Who're you calling "pig", you billboard brow?!
author: Ino Yamanaka

quote: *to Sakura* You bloomed into a beautiful flower.
author: Ino Yamanaka

quote: *talking about Naruto* I could almost fall for him.
author: Ino Yamanaka

quote: Wise words, Guy sensei! So simple but filled with such profound meaning!
author: Rock Lee

quote: The lotus of the Leaf Village blooms twice.
author: Rock Lee

quote: I want to show I can be a splendid ninja as well even if I don't have ninjutsu or genjutsu... I want to prove it to the whole world!
author: Rock Lee

quote: Sakura, please go out with me! I'll protect you with my life!
author: Rock Lee

quote: A rock thrown at a pole will not hit, but if one does not aim at the pole, it will hit! That is the law I used!
author: Rock Lee

quote: Amazing... The brilliance of the blade... the design. They're all beautiful! I want to take them all home!
author: Tenten

quote: Three members of Team Guy specializes in Close-Contact battles so I often render aid from the distance. I don't mind providing back up, but I was hoping to find new ninja tools that would enable me to fight on the front lines.
author: Tenten

quote: You're gonna fight Sasuke alone? And you think all of us are just gonna stand here and let you?!
author: Tenten

quote: Let's just say I don't like being kept in the dark!
author: Tenten

quote: I'm not running away and I'm not giving up. I will save this child.
author: Tenten

quote: I won't let that happen. You're not getting off that easy. No way! The people you and Raiga killed, they all wanted to live but you didn't leave them that choice! You decided for them! Well you don't get to decide this time, ok?! You're gonna live and you're going to take some responsibility for all those people's lives you cut short!
author: Tenten

quote: I can't stand weak and indecisive people!
author: Tenten

quote: I want to be a great and powerful ninja! To walk in the footsteps of the legendary kunoichi, Tsunade!
author: Tenten

quote: It's not because they're girls you know, Neji. It's just that those two are using kid gloves. It doesn't matter if you're a man or woman in battle.
author: Tenten

quote: *last words* When the tree leaves dance, one shall find flames. The fire's shadow will illuminate the village, and once again, tree leaves shall bud anew.
author: Hiruzen Sarutobi

quote: It is a place where every year shinobi are born, raised, grow old, fight, and die to protect their home. These people are precious to me. We share a home, we share a life, and though we may not share ties of blood, they are precious to me. They are my family. And if I do fall, you still will fail. I am only one of a long line. I carry this title in trust for those Hokage who came before and those who will come after. I am the Third Hokage!
author: Hiruzen Sarutobi

quote: I wonder...do you have it, young as you are... the Will of Fire?
author: Hiruzen Sarutobi

quote: He has combined Shadow Clone with his own invention, the Sexy Jutsu. What a foolish ninja technique...and he could probably get me with it, too.
author: Hiruzen Sarutobi

quote: I am the Fifth Hokage... You've trampled on our ancestors treasure...their dream...and you will pay the price! As the Hokage, I will put a stop to you here and now!
author: Tsunade

quote: *talking to the advisers* People like Jiraiya...and Sarutobi, and Elder Chiyo of the Sand possessed something you two sorely lack. Do you know what that is!? ...Faith! My grandfather, the First Hokage, believed in you and entrusted you with the village. Now it's your turn to believe in these children and entrust it to them!
author: Tsunade

quote: Grow up... Death comes with being a shinobi. There are times when death is hard to accept, but if you don't get over it, there's no future...
author: Tsunade

quote: *to Orochimaru about Naruto* "I will die before I let you touch him!
author: Tsunade

quote: Why am I putting my life on the line? Because now... I am the Fifth Hokage of the Village Hidden in the Leaves!
author: Tsunade

quote: Jiraiya, are you the one who taught him the Rasengan? Are you acting like a teacher by teaching him something he can't master? Don't give him any ideas! That's why this kid likes to daydream that he's going to become Hokage someday.
author: Tsunade

quote: *about to fight Naruto* One of the Legendary Sannin taking on a snot-nosed Genin... I oughta be ashamed of myself.
author: Tsunade

quote: *last words* Itachi-san... It seems that in the end... I'm not so terrible after all.
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: I get stronger in direct proportion to how strong my opponent is. I do not tire, and cannot be defeated.
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: *to Asuma* My massive blade, Samehada, doesn't slice... It shreds to ribbons!
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: Sharks start out as eggs, but incubate and hatch in the womb. Sometimes the number of pups is less than the number of eggs that were fertilized. Do you know why? Cannibalism. The pups start eating each other within the mother's womb the moment they hatch. They start killing their siblings the moment they enter the world, viewing everything they see as nothing more than prey. As of today you and I are fellow members of Akatsuki. So be careful... of me.
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: I knew that from the first time I had to kill my comrades... Kill a Kiri ninja as a Kiri ninja. What does that make me? Am I a friend or foe? What is my purpose and my position? Where do I go? Where can I go? I'm well aware that my entire life has been a one giant lie.
author: Kisame Hoshigaki

quote: *to Kakashi* I died as a human!
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: *last words* You were always at my side, the least I can do is to be beside you at the end. I know it cannot be, but I wish I could go to where you have gone. How I wish I could join you there, Haku.
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: I can't think of a more fitting destination for a demon ninja, can you?! I'm told there are many demons down there - of all shapes and sizes! Oh yes, I should fit right in! You, on the other hand, Gatō... Well,I fear you're in for a long and very painful eternity!
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: Even the unremarkable Demon of the Hidden Mist can die and become a real Demon in hell!
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: Uh uh...I won't be joining Haku. Where he's gone I cannot follow. We wouldn't be welcome where Haku's gone to. Hell's where WE'RE going, Gatō!
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: Well? Cat got your tongue? Are you so surprised to discover that I'm human? Even shinobi are human. No matter how hard we try, we always fail to escape that simple fact. Well at least, I have failed.
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: *to Naruto* Your words cut deep, deeper than any blade.
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: When you've hovered between life and death so many times that it doesn't faze you, you may be called a ninja. When you've become so deadly that your profile has been entered into my bingo book, then you may have earned the title ninja.
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: You're right. Those little people and their little dreams, why should I care about them?! I have my own dream!
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: When I was your age, my hands were already soaked in blood...
author: Zabuza Momochi

quote: I used to always cry and give up... I made many wrong turns... But you... You helped me find the right path... I always chased after you... I wanted to catch up to you... I wanted to walk beside you all the time... I just wanted to be with you... You changed me! Your smile is what saved me! That is why I'm not afraid to die protecting you! Because... I love you...
author: Hinata Hyuuga

quote: I won't let you lay another finger on Naruto!
author: Hinata Hyuuga

quote: *to Naruto* You make mistakes... but... because of those mistakes... you get the strength to stand up to them. That's why I think you are truly strong.
author: Hinata Hyuuga

quote: *to Naruto* When I watch you, I feel strong, like I can do anything - that even I am worth something.
author: Hinata Hyuuga

quote: You're wrong, Neji... Because I can see that you are suffering more than me... You are the one who is confused and suffering inside the fate of the head and branch families.
author: Hinata Hyuuga

quote: Was I able to change myself...even a little, N-Naruto-kun?
author: Hinata Hyuuga

quote: I will never go back on my word, because that too is my ninja way!
author: Hinata Hyuuga

quote: By the way, I'm a boy.
author: Haku

quote: My name is Uzumaki Naruto. I like ramen. I hate the three minutes you have to wait while the water boils. And my dream is to one day become a Hokage. Then everyone will have to respect me at last.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Sasori...your strength came because of your soul, not in spite of it. You tried to erase it, to become a puppet yourself, but couldn't change completely. Now you've got your immortal body, but you've fallen, sunk to the level of the puppets you used to control. You were supposed to be a top class ninja puppeteer, not a worthless nobody who lets someone else pull the strings.
author: Kankuro

quote: How well or poorly we execute our ambush will have a huge impact on this war and how many casualties we suffer. If you wanna protect your friends and family, the only thing you should be thinking about is how to make this operation a success!
author: Kankuro

quote: *to Naruto* Aww, don't sweat it. Women always go weak in the knees for that cool, elite type of guy. So what can you do, am I right?
author: Kankuro

quote: Naruto... please save my little brother.
author: Kankuro

quote: I'll show you the real power of the battle puppet Crow.
author: Kankuro

quote: I can't back down when they show me no respect.
author: Kankuro

quote: *thinking about Naruto* This brat...I'm going to kill him.
author: Kankuro

quote: Growth occurs when one goes beyond one's limits. Realizing that is also part of training.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: *last words* Forgive me Sasuke... It ends with this.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: *to Kisame* Those who turn their hands against their comrades are sure to die a terrible death. Be prepared.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: The people of this clan are all the same. You focus on the trivial, and lose sight of what's most important. Change is impossible, in this fog of ignorance. How can we evolve when regulation is all we know?
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: I've had enough, there's no hope left for this pathetic clan.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Don't cry, Sasuke. Your big brother is here to protect you, no matter what happens.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: You and I are flesh and blood. I'm always going to be there for you, even if it's only as an obstacle for you to overcome. Even if you do hate me. That's what big brothers are for.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: *last words* Just when me and Kakashi were becoming friends... I couldn't bring myself to confess to Rin... I wish I had more time with everyone...
author: Obito Uchiha

quote: *to Kakashi* I'm about to... die... but I'll become your eye.
author: Obito Uchiha

quote: I believe the "White Fang" is a true hero!
author: Obito Uchiha

quote: *to Kakashi* I am Uchiha Obito and I will surpass you once I awaken my Sharingan!
author: Obito Uchiha

quote: I have already awakened.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: I don't understand what's going on, but I'll just pretend that I do. *nods head in agreement*
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: *to Naruto* Finding a new me, that is the lesson you taught me.
author: Kabuto Yakushi

quote: I decided I wished to be like you as well, Naruto-kun, and for that reason...with Orochimaru-sama now intregrated into this body, I plan on finding a new "me", one stronger than Orochimaru-sama himself!
author: Kabuto Yakushi

quote: Hehehe...you can't beat me. You have no skills, unlike Sasuke.
author: Kabuto Yakushi
