quote: *to Naruto* You've just thrown it all away! Dreams don't come true when you're dead!
author: Kabuto Yakushi

quote: Little kids think life is so easy. That's why they go on and on about their dreams. That's why they never give up.
author: Kabuto Yakushi

quote: Oh you look so beautiful... We're not here for a picnic you know.
author: Kabuto Yakushi

quote: Don't worry, this will be over in five seconds.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: We're just some normal ninja, we don't want to see what's under your mask.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: *to Naruto* Lord Jiraiya only had praise for you. He was always boasting about you, saying you were like his own grandchild. He had faith that you were the one who would inherit his will, and truly believed that you would one day be a great Hokage. Lord Jiraiya will always watch over you. Even this very minute, he's watching from somewhere. He wouldn't be happy seeing you sad like this. So...be your usual self, the one he praised so much. Don't stay depressed forever. For Lord Jiraiya himself, one of the Legendary Sannin...acknowledged you as his promising student!
author: Iruka Umino

quote: So I acted like an idiot. It was tough, has it been lonely for you Naruto, was it tough Naruto??
author: Iruka Umino

quote: We are humans, not fish. We don't know what kind of people we truly are until the moment before our deaths. As death comes to embrace you, you will realize what you are. That's what death is, don't you think?
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: You are weak. Why are you so weak? Because you lack... hatred.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: If I can't do 400 push-ups, I'll hit the dummy 800 times! If I can't hit the dummy 800 times, I'll do 2000 jump ropes!
author: Rock Lee

quote: I am the Handsome Devil of the Hidden Leaf Village! My name is Rock Lee!
author: Rock Lee

quote: Guy-sensei is the coolest! He practically GLOWS with cool!
author: Rock Lee

quote: Stop calling me Ero-sennin!!
author: Jiraiya

quote: Baka, baka, baka!! They found out I was peeking! Now my research is ruined!
author: Jiraiya

quote: The only thing that can keep a fire from dying and give it more power, is wind.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: If I become as strong as you, will I really become like you? To die as a tool...that's...that's just too sad.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: *last words* The Tale of Naruto Uzumaki... yes... that has a nice ring to it.
author: Jiraiya

quote: There, that ending...was a little better. The frog at the bottom of the well drifts off into the great ocean. Heh heh ...yep. Pretty damn honorable... pretty damn honorable...
author: Jiraiya

quote: *to Naruto* I think we all have to acknowledge you. Gamatatsu, Gamakichi, Sakura, Tsunade...and I... We all admit you've worked really hard. But I wonder what's pushing you forward.
author: Jiraiya

quote: Never go back on your word...and never give up. That's your ninja way...and as your mentor ... I have no business whining! Because the student's ninja way should be the master's too! Isn't that so, Naruto?!
author: Jiraiya

quote: The true measure of a shinobi is not how he lives, but how he dies.
author: Jiraiya

quote: *to Orochimaru about Sasuke* Because it's no fun to train a genius!
author: Jiraiya

quote: *to Orochimaru* You're wrong, that's not what makes a shinobi. You never did get it, a real ninja is one who endures no matter what gets thrown at him... Let me explain something to you, there is only one thing that matters if you are a shinobi, and it isn't the number of jutsu you possess. All you do need, is the guts to never give up.
author: Jiraiya

quote: *to Naruto* Even I can tell that hatred is spreading. I wanted to do something about it...but I don't know what. I believe... that someday the day will come when people truly understand one another!! If I can't find the answer, it will be up to you to do it!!
author: Jiraiya

quote: When people get hurt, they learn to hate... When people hurt others, they become hated and racked with guilt. But knowing that pain allows people to be kind. Pain allows people to grow... and how you grow is up to you.
author: Jiraiya

quote: Wherever someone thinks of you, that's where home is.
author: Jiraiya

quote: I'm not a pervert... I'm a super pervert!
author: Jiraiya

quote: Die! Just Die! You have no talent at all!!
author: Jiraiya

quote: Shut up you flat-chested bitch Tsunade!
author: Jiraiya

quote: You are the strongest enemy I have ever fought.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: No one can determine another's destiny.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: The heavens will not allow a pawn who can only seek victory at the cost of himself to advance...
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: *about Gai* He's so childish. He acts like a seven-year-old!
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: *about Lee and Gai* As usual, I can't keep up with their craziness.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: Because Naruto... you saved me from the darkness.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: All this time I've been called a genius, so I cannot lose.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: Sasuke's out there right now, heading toward Orochimaru. We can't allow such evil to take someone from our village... that is not our way.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: Naruto... Sometimes, your eyes are even better than mine.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: Father, is a person's destiny a thing like a cloud flowing with an inescapable flow? Or can a person choose the flow he wishes... I still don't know the answer to this. Either way the destination may be the same in the end. However by choosing to live like the latter, a person can live and strive towards a goal. And in this match I have finally understood those who have that are truly strong. Father, I have but one goal, I want to become stronger... Enough not to lose to anyone... That's how I feel. Father, the birds are flying freely today... They look so happy.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: There's no method but death to escape this horrible curse.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: The curse represents a mark of the bird in a cage... It is... the symbol of being tied down to an inescapable destiny.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: *to Naruto* These eyes of mine show me many things. One thing they've shown me...people's limitations are set, fixed, and unchangeable. Only a fool wastes his time trying to become something he can never be!
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: Do you understand now? You have no way of beating me!
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: Once a failure, always a failure. You can't change that.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: Right now, Sasuke is in the darkness. The only one who can save him is you, Naruto.
author: Neji Hyuuga

quote: Try it trash! I'll return the pain a thousand times over!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: I am, Jiraiya, the epitome of manliness! I shall fall for no woman's wiles! When you're me, you only need to flash that sexiness to have women fall at your feet.
author: Jiraiya

quote: WHAT?! Why wasn't he affected by my sexiness?!
author: Ino Yamanaka

quote: SHIKAMARU! Beat her up with a 16 HIT COMBO!
author: Ino Yamanaka

quote: There's no meaning to a flower unless it blooms.
author: Ino Yamanaka

quote: A soul needs a purpose to live...and so I concluded that my purpose was to kill everyone besides myself. I felt alive...
author: Gaara

quote: I fight for my sake only and live to love no one but myself.
author: Gaara

quote: *young Gaara attempts to slash his wrist* It's no use, the sand gets in the way.
author: Gaara

quote: The concept of hope is nothing more than giving up. A word that holds no true meaning.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: The Uchiha is a clan destined for revenge...
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: *to Minato, about his reason for attacking Konoha* Oh, you know...it's fun, it's part of my plan...to start a war...to bring peace...
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: It will be a new world... A world of truth, not lies.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: *to Sasuke* No matter how far Orochimaru fell, he still loved him... Now I know how the Third Hokage felt.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: *to Sakumo* Regardless of what happened, you did the best you could. I understand that now...you broke the rules for all our sakes - I'm proud of you now...
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: *to Pain* The people from this village are different from your average village. Even if it means dying, there's not a single one of us, who would sell out a comrade.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: *to Naruto* You've become as strong...if not stronger than me.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Like the fate of the two who founded the village of Konoha... Naruto and Sasuke...your fates are like theirs.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: This place makes me think about the mistakes I've made in the past... and I've made a lot.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: *to Orochimaru* I don't care if you are one of the legendary Sannin, the great shinobi of legend, I swear take one more step towards Sasuke and one of us will die here!
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: I'm Kakashi Hatake. Things I like and things I hate...I don't feel like telling you that. My dreams for the future...never really thought about it. As for my hobbies...I have lots of hobbies.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: A genius, huh? What does that mean? "Genius"? So I was not born with a whole lot of natural talent, not gifted like Neji ...but I work hard and I never give up! That is my gift, that is my ninja way!
author: Rock Lee

quote: *to Sasuke* I refuse...to let this happen! I am Orochimaru! I am immortal! I will not die here! Destined to discover the true meaning behind everything! Destined to take control of everything in this world!!
author: Orochimaru

quote: When there is a true desire in the heart and that desire is strong... That is when he finds real strength that even he did not know he had!
author: Orochimaru

quote: Everything will be mine.
author: Orochimaru

quote: *about Sasuke* When I watch this boy, I look back to the time I was called a genius, and think how ridiculous it was.
author: Orochimaru

quote: *to Sasuke* How impressive. A thousand foes stand before you and you don't even bat an eyelid.
author: Orochimaru

quote: *talking about Naruto* This child... intrigues me to no end!
author: Orochimaru

quote: Hate only gives birth to even more hate.
author: Orochimaru

quote: I want to obtain all the jutsu and gain a true understanding of everything in this world. The first one to mix blue and yellow called the new color "green". I want to do something similar to that. If blue is the chakra, then yellow is the seal, and green is the jutsu... Just as there is no end to the variety of colors, there are so many thousands...tens of thousands of jutsu in the world as well. But in order to obtain every possible jutsu and truth, it would require an eternity. Only one who understands everything after spending such time on this can be fittingly called the Ultimate Being.
author: Orochimaru

quote: *to Kabuto, talking about Tsunade) The best medicines always taste bitter.
author: Orochimaru

quote: Naruto's here because he's made up his mind. My resolve is nothing compared to his now! I'm supposed to be a ninja, but all I've ever done is lean on him and cry... I was supposed to change that... I came here and I thought I was ready. But I can't do anything... I can't say anything. The only thing that remains for me...is to believe in them!
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: *about killing Sasuke* I... Sasuke... I... I thought I could do this...
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: I'm the one who made Naruto suffer the most... I've just been getting it wrong. Just been messing it up... I don't want to get it wrong anymore...don't want to screw it up anymore.
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: *talking to Yamato* Same as always... I can only do the dumbest of things for Naruto...
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: A smile is the easiest way out of a difficult situation.
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: *to Sasuke* I... I love you with all my heart!.. If you were to stay here with me, there would be no regrets...because every day we'd do something fun, we'd be happy I swear..! I would do anything for you! So...please, just stay with me!
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: I've always considered myself to be a true ninja...but those were just empty words, because Sasuke and Naruto were always in the lead! But now it's my turn to take the lead, and all of you can watch me from the background!
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: *to Ino* Didn't you know? Women have to be strong in order to survive!
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: All I've been doing is watching you two from behind... Now, get a good look at MY back!
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: *talking to Sasuke* On that day, you taught me that solitude is painful! I understand that so well right now. I have family, and I have friends but if you're gone... To me... It will be the same as being alone.
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: In the ninja world, those who break the rules are scum, that's true, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: I won't allow my comrades to die. I'll protect you with my life. Trust me.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: The next generation will always surpass the previous one. It's one of the never-ending cycles in life.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: *making excuses for being late, as usual* Hello students, today I got lost on the road of life.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: *making excuses for being late, as usual* A cute girl stopped me on the way, so I danced.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Naruto, it's nice that you removed the poison so spiritedly, but you'll bleed to death if you lose any more blood... Seriously...
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That's how they define "reality". But what does it mean to be "correct" or "true"? Merely vague concepts... Their "reality" may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world, shaped by their beliefs?
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: If you want to kill me, despise me, hate me, and live in an unsightly way... Run, and cling to life, and then some day, when you have the same eyes as I do, come before me.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: You aren't even worth killing, foolish little brother.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: If you think I'm just a foolish kid ruled by his emotions, that's fine. Following Itachi's path would be childish, the whispering of fools who don't know hatred. If anyone else tries to ridicule the way I live, I'll slaughter everyone they ever cared about. And then maybe they'll understand what it's like to taste... a little of my hatred.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: *Talking to Naruto* Just shut up for once! What the hell do you know about it?! It's not like you ever had a family in the first place! You were on your own right from the beginning, what makes you think you know anything about it?! Huh?! I'm suffering now because I had those ties, how on earth could you possibly understand, what it feels like to lose all that?!
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: *Introducing himself to Kakashi, Naruto and Sakura* My name is Sasuke Uchiha. I hate a lot of things, and I don't particularly like anything. What I have is not a dream, because I will make it a reality. I'm going to restore my clan, and kill a certain someone.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: I have long since closed my eyes... My only goal is in the darkness.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: Hey, you stupid fox! You're in my body and you owe me rent! So for payment, I'll take your chakra! You got that?!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: The pain of being alone...is not an easy one to bear. Why is it...that I can understand your pain? But...I already have many people who are important to me now...and I can't let you hurt any of them. Even if I have to kill you!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: I won't run away anymore... I won't go back on my word... That is my ninja way!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Thank you... for loving me!
author: Portgas D. Ace

quote: Fine! Go see for yourself, Straw Hat... What a real nightmare is... In the New World!
author: Gecko Moria

quote: A dumbass is still a dumbass. *looking at Duval's new face*
author: Usopp

quote: A place where you can never ever EVER enter? *Luffy, in Skypea*
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: The name of this era is WHITEBEARD!
author: Whitebeard

quote: I am only one man with one heart... Call me a demon, call me a monster... but I can't be the strongest forever!!!
author: Whitebeard

quote: I am going to save you even if it kills me.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I wonder if it'll be fun to see mermaid-san's panties.
author: Brook

quote: These fools... thinking that this might truly be enough to take my life... I need no help! I AM WHITEBEARD!!!
author: Whitebeard

quote: *talking to Zoro* The world's greatest swordsman, that's great! And it's fitting since your new boss is going to be King of the Pirates! Anything else would make me look bad!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Just shut up with your god crap, already!!! What kind of GOD... CAN'T SAVE A SINGLE DAMN THING??!!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: A wound that'd make an ordinary man unconscious... I won't lose to it. A wound that would kill an ordinary person... I won't lose to it! To face one who is extraordinary, Hawk Eyes... I can't allow myself to be ordinary!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Let the heavens deal with life and death, even the most fearful lose to that. Let's live for another moment!
author: Marshall D. Teach

quote: It's not like "thanks" are something I can eat.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: There should be a limit to how similar a couple looks like.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: When I decided to follow my dream, I had already discarded my life.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: If you kill yourself, I'll kill you.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: *to Captain Kuro* If you want to compare ambitions, mine is bigger!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Well, how about this. My "luck" versus this thing's "curse". Wanna see what's stronger..? If I lose, then I'm just that much of a man anyways...
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: If I get reincarnated.... I wanna become a clam.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: There is someone that I must meet again. And until that day...not even Death itself can take my life away!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Weakness is a sin.
author: Crocodile

quote: People don't fear god, fear itslef is god.
author: Enel

quote: You selfish people! Can't you see that he's hungry? Why do you hurt him? I think he is sick, so he can't find food by himself. Am I right? Here! Eat this food. *Luffy tries to eat Sanji* Die!!
author: Sanji

quote: A cow? A cow can swim? I think it's a hippo!
author: Sanji

quote: Let's continue eating.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Since 8 years ago, that girl has never cried again, and she's never asked anyone for help. Because she doesn't want to die like our mother. She was 10 years old, and Nami decided to fight alone in that situation. Have you ever realized how much pain she's been going through?
author: Nojiko

quote: Any person who hurts Nami-san's feelings! I won't let them live peacefully!
author: Sanji

quote: *talking about Nami* Because it was the only way to save the village, she decided to join the people who killed her mother.
author: Usopp

quote: Just one more time and everything will be the same. Everything will come back to me. And I will be free from Arlong. Bellemere-san. Finally, I can laugh with all my heart.
author: Nami

quote: Why does that man have a pinwheel on his head?
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Everyone is expecting help from you, but you come here and don't think about doing anything to help those people?
author: Nami

quote: Why? The work that the marines should be doing now...there are many things that you have to take care of. Don't know that Arlong has killed many people and destroyed many villages? Under his control, everyone was treated like a slave! And you didn't do a single thing about that!! And now you just want to find the treasure of one thief? Is this a real government?
author: Nami

quote: Don't touch Bellemere-san's orange with your dirty hands! I won't give that money to you. That money is...
author: Nami

quote: Don't you dare make my navigator cry!!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Moron! I'm not worried about you. I meant that you shouldn't take all the credit for yourself.
author: Sanji

quote: There is no such thing as impossible in this world.
author: Marshall D. Teach

quote: I don't know. I'm not sure why myself. But if I were to take even one step back, I believe that all those important oaths, promises and many other deals 'til now, will all go to waste and I'll never be able to return before you, ever again.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: A true pirate should fear nothing, not even death!
author: Gecko Moria

quote: Sometimes the only thing you have to doubt is your own common sense.
author: Nico Robin

quote: Being alone hurts worse than pain.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Your honor isn't worth your life.
author: Shanks

quote: If you don't want the negative reputation you shouldn't be a pirate.
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I won't let you touch him. Young master would be sullied if an inferior, dirty person like you were to touch him. *says to Alois*
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Victory or defeat can be determined in a single moments misstep.
author: Kizaru

quote: Under one of your orders, I am to be your pawn and your sword. So please, young master, move me into check.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Even though I dislike being kicked by others, I do enjoy the feeling of kicking others.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: We shouldn't worry about being able to achieve our dreams, as long as we have the desire to do it!
author: Coby

quote: So what if you're a girl.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Listen to this! I woke up earlier than Germany for once!
author: South Italy

quote: Oh this is perfect! Now my arm's fallen off too! Today is a terrible day!
author: Alphonse Elric

quote: When a guy gets flustered, because someone calls him weak, it's proof that he recognizes he IS weak. Let the outcome determine the weak and the strong.
author: Don Krieg

quote: I want you, Ciel Phantomhive. That's all there is to it.
author: Alois Trancy

quote: If I can't even protect my captain's dream, then whatever ambition I have is nothing but talk...
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Dying is not repaying a debt! That is not what he saved you for! Only weak men would die after someone spared their lives!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I don't remember the name of every weakling I crush.
author: Dracule Mihawk

quote: No matter what happens, don't be sorry you were born. Even though nobody praises us, don't forget to smile in any situation. As long as you're alive there will be better things later...and there will be many.
author: Bellemere

quote: When you decided to go to the sea, it was your own decision. Whatever happens to you on the sea, it depends on what you've done! Don't blame others!!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Hopes for the future..? Yes. However, getting there with you...is not much different than being alone..! What good is the treasure if I'm alone? After sharing so much of our dreams. Instead of sacrificing them and leaving with you I would rather... HAVE NOTHING AT ALL!
author: Nami

quote: I don't care if you're a god. If you lay even one finger on Nami-san, I'll become the Devil of the Blue Sea!
author: Sanji

quote: Fufufu.. I think I like you.
author: Boa Hancock

quote: A man's dream never dies!
author: Marshall D. Teach

quote: I don't want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean... is the Pirate King!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: *talking to Luffy* Can you really do this..? The Grand Line is just going to keep going on...surpassing your wildest imaginations! And the enemies will be strong. Can you really conquer this ultimate ocean?
author: Silvers Rayleigh

quote: Yohohohoho!
author: Brook

quote: Have you ever been kicked at the speed of light?
author: Kizaru

quote: You'll never understand...your swords will never be as heavy as mine!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: You can spill drinks on me, even spit on me. I'll just laugh about it. But If you dare to hurt my friends... I WON'T FORGIVE YOU!
author: Shanks

quote: Would you let me see your panties?
author: Brook

quote: If you do anything that would cause me to abandon my ambitions... You will end your own life on my sword!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Inherited will. Destiny of the age. The dreams of the people. These are things that will not be stopped. As long as people continue to pursue the meaning of freedom. These things will never cease to be.
author: Gol D. Roger

quote: There... Comes a time when a man has to stand and FIGHT!! This is the time when his friends dreams are laughed at. Luffy wont die... I KNOW he'll be the pirate king one day. I WONT LET YOU LAUGH AT THAT!!
author: Usopp

quote: Then stand up right away! And don't act like you're about to die! It's not like you! Even if there are billows of smoke, we can still see the sky. We can still see the ocean! It ain't like it's hell here! So don't act like you're about to die!
author: Usopp

quote: I'll never kick a woman, even if I die!
author: Sanji

quote: A man forgives a woman's lies.
author: Sanji

quote: I have Nakama who're not strong... But I still want them to be with me..!!So I have to be stronger than anybody else... Or I'll lose them all!!!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Existing Isn't A Crime!
author: Franky

quote: *talking about Usopp and Luffy* It's never ending with those idiots. HEY! Lay off the sob stories! You know how dangerous this island is! Let's not give it any help in killing us!
author: Nami

quote: That's no way to treat a lady!
author: Sanji

quote: I'll have mapped out the entire world!
author: Nami

quote: I'll be brave!
author: Usopp

quote: I'll find the All Blue!
author: Sanji

quote: Soon I'll be King of the Pirates!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: *after his "5 ton's hammer" breaks* Of course it was fake! I can't lift five tons! I quit after five pounds!
author: Usopp

quote: *after seeing Ussopp's 5 ton hammer break* You mean it was a fake?!
author: Tony Tony Chopper

quote: *after seeing a skinny woman claiming to be Alvita* Don't you mean you're like half of her?
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: It's time to get a girl.
author: Sanji

quote: Bear conviction under your flag!
author: Gol D. Roger

quote: Protecting what we cherish most as men is the reason why we formed this pirate crew!
author: Usopp

quote: *after saving Luffy and losing one arm* It isn't worth much. It's just one arm. I'm glad you're safe.
author: Shanks

quote: Fine! I'd rather be a pirate than die here!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: I am always serious.
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: I want to eat meat!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I do things my own way! So don't give me any lip about it!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: *to Luffy* Keep this hat safe for me?
author: Shanks

quote: My wealth and treasures? If you want it, I'll let you have it. Look for it, I left all of it at that place!
author: Gol D. Roger

quote: *talking to Shanks* One day, I'll have a ship and a crew better than yours!! And we'll have the biggest hoard of treasure in the world!!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I'm saying it's not safe to point guns.
author: Shanks

quote: I'm going to be the world's greatest swordsman! All I have left is my destiny! My name may be infamous...but it's gonna shake the world!!!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: I've set myself to become the King of Pirates... and if I die trying... then at least I tried!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Well, ya see... I'm gonna be the unbeatable pirate!!!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Being killed by marines, or coming with me. Which one do you pick?
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: Cooking is a gift from the gods. Spices are a gift from the devil. Looks like it was a little too spicy for you.
author: Sanji

quote: With my own hands, JUSTICE will be served.
author: Smoker

quote: *laughs after Risa starts to cry and complain about him stealing her heart again* How many hearts do u have?
author: Atsushi Otani

quote: *cries* You're stealing my heart again...
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Stop it, you're stealing my heart...it's so unfair.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: *Otani gets a rare Umibouzou ticket*Yeah, I'm awesome, praise me more!
author: Atsushi Otani

quote: How's that? Did you die?
author: Atsushi Otani

quote: I like who I like, got a problem with that?!
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Everyday, there are many unremarkable encounters, but...later on, there will be an encounter big enough to change your life. That's why, I want to treasure each of those. I started thinking that...when I first met Otani.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: I was also happy because you tried hard.
author: Atsushi Otani

quote: Thank GOD I didn't give up! Thank GOD I tried hard!
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: It doesn't matter if he's shorter than me...because I like Otani.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Well... I do like kids and all. Elementary kids and such...
author: Atsushi Otani

quote: I'll be happy as long as I have Otani's love.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: *talking to Otani* Hey, Hey! If there's a muscle guy who wants to snatch me, what are you going to do?
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Otani's hand is small, but it still feels like a guy's.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: It's such a small difference...but to me, it's a huge wall. A huge wall that I can't overcome.
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: Let's play this democracy game, shall we?
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I shall gamble on the geass known as people wishes. For the sake of the world's future.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Don't you think wishes are the same as Geass? Things you can't accomplish with your own powers, you ask assistance from others.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: It's not over yet!... Carve into your memories "Jeremiah Gottwald", the memorable name of the man that made you taste defeat!
author: Jeremiah Gottwald

quote: I am Lelouch Vi Britannia, son of the late Empress Marianne. The prince abandoned by his empire. If there are any that think they can go beyond my despair, then let them try.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: If happiness had a form, what would it look like? It might be something like glass, because one doesn't notice it normally. However, it is actually there. As proof, if you look at it from a different angle, the glass will reflect light. It will state it's presence and existence more eloquently than any other thing in this world.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: If you had the strength, you could live. This is our contract. In return for my gift of power, you must grant one of my wishes. If you enter this contract, you will live as a human, but also as one completely different. Different rules, different time, a different life.... The power of the king will make you lonely indeed. If you are prepared for that, then...
author: C.C.

quote: I order you to love me!..
author: Euphemia Li Britannia

quote: BLIMEY.
author: England

quote: Oh I hate terrorists, they're so ugly.
author: England

quote: Dear diary. Today, Italy was attacked by England and France while I was out. *cut to England hitting Italy on the head*
author: Germany

quote: Day into night, sugar into salt, living to dead, and dark blue into gold.
author: Claude Faustus

quote: Hoheo taralna, rondero tarel!
author: Alois Trancy

quote: Awww!! There are just so many people whose asses I have to kick!
author: Edward Elric

quote: If you are crying, fight against it! If you're regretting, walk forward! Only complaining on your misfortune, you're nothing but a common pig!
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: There is nothing shameful about being different from others. This is your character! Ann's red hair is really beautiful, just like the color of red spider lilies in their full bloom. Red really suits you. You should have more confidence in yourself.
author: Vincent Phantomhive

quote: I see... You're taking things awfully fast, but like they say, "to each his own". I suppose that's just how you operate---*Lelouch drops a teacup on the ground*
author: Nunnally Lamperouge

quote: Win through, Lelouch. Ignore your past, and the consequences of your actions.
author: C.C.

quote: *to C.C.* It's a contract, this time coming from me to you.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: You foolish impostor, who tried to take Nunnally's place, I will use you until you dry up, then throw you away like a ragged cloth!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: You know what this badass mother can do so back off!
author: Kallen Stadtfeld

quote: You revealed it much too fast. Such a bad sport, girl.
author: C.C.

quote: Fuhahahahaha, this is how you create panic.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Compete, fight, take, control. Beyond that lies the future! All Hail Britannia!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I don't want to hear that from an eternally young and immortal witch.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: From this moment on, this room shall be the very first territory of the United States of Japan!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Once you have won this war, you will need a wife someday, right? For you to have a life where you cannot reveal your identity to the world, I believe that there will be someone who can calm your soul?
author: Kaguya Sumeragi

quote: The world will change. I will change it.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I would like you to answer a question before you dispose of me. If being powerless is evil, is having power justice? Is revenge Evil? Can friendship coexist with justice..?
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I've made a contract with the devil, so I can't be friends with a god.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: You've had only two choices ever since you joined the Order of the Black Knights. Either live with me, or die with me!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I don't know why snow is white, but I find such white snow beautiful, and I don't dislike it at all.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Lloyd-san, shall I teach you the proper way to communicate with others?
author: Cecile Croomy

quote: What are you doing, C.C.? Now you're all wet. Come on, we'll have to go to the washroom. I'll get you a change of clothes.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Terrorism is nothing more than childish harassment.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: F*CK OFF!! *to Kallen while he's trying to kill Zero*
author: Suzaku Kururugi

quote: ...supposed to be dead? I have returned, your Majesty. In order to change EVERYTHING.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I am the 17th successor, the second in line to the throne. Lelouch Vi Britannia.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Why must I search through other people's underwear? You Owe me Big Time for this.
author: C.C.

quote: *holding a hand to his face as he steps out in front of a car* I...I..I am not ORAAAAAAAAAAANGE. *falls and fails*
author: Jeremiah Gottwald

quote: I was just checking, you horny little punk.
author: C.C.

quote: Tss, useless terrorists!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: You are not alone. We are accomplices. If you are a witch, I will become a warlock.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Within the endless flow of time, I am alone.
author: C.C.

quote: *after a giant pizza is thrown into the air**Gasp* Pizza!
author: C.C.

quote: Everyone who calls themselves Japanese:I have a request. Can you all die?Erm...I hoped that you would all commit suicide, but is that impossible?Then can all the soldiers please annihilate them?
author: Euphemia Li Britannia

quote: That's right, I'm Zero. The leader of the Order of Black Knight. The one who declared war on the Holy Britannia Empire. And, a guy who is about to take over the world!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Perhaps this is what I have always wished for since that day. The loss and destruction of all. That's right, one must destroy before creating. In that case, if my conscience becomes a hindrance to me, then I will simply erase it. I have no other choice but to move forward...therefore!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Since that day, I've always been living a lie. The fact that I'm alive is a lie. My name is a lie, my background is a lie. It's full of lies. Fed up with the world that does not change at all, but I can't even let everything go because of this despair called "lies". But now I have in my hands...this power, therefore!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Or have you realized it? That only those who are prepared to be shot have the right to shoot...! Lelouch Vi Britannia commands you all...to DIE!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: What's wrong? You aren't going to shoot? Your opponent's a student.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Hey, tell me, how should a Britannian who hates Britannia live?
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: That's not necessary. It's a waste of time. Let's get married.
author: Lloyd Asplund

quote: Those with power, fear us! Those without power, seek us!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: *to Lelouch* No matter how great you make yourself sound, you're still just a naive boy who's all talk and who only dreams of victory in his head.
author: C.C.

quote: *Milay describes Lelouch as a subordinate* Subordinate..? Yeah, I guess I am.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: That's easy. If someone wins, the fighting will end.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Ah, I'm sorry. Sorry! *is punched by Cecile*
author: Lloyd Asplund

quote: That contradiction might kill you someday.
author: Lloyd Asplund

quote: O-O-O-range?! DIE !!!
author: Jeremiah Gottwald

quote: Oh it has been a while. you are still in the army? But I don't have the time to deal with you, Orange-kun.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Is Zero here? If you are around, fight with me...fight with me, Jeremiah Gottwald!
author: Jeremiah Gottwald

quote: Those who are allowed to shoot are those who are prepared to be shot.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I was dead until the moment I met you. I was a powerless corpse pretending to be alive. Living without power, without the ability to change my course, was akin to a slow death.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: What a fierce fire.
author: Belphegor

quote: I got ran over a few times on my way here!
author: Hayato Gokudera

quote: I don't need this kind of power. If you want me to inherit such mistakes then I will wipe out the Vongola!!
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: There's no time. Just do what he says for now. If he's lying, then we'll just blow his brains out.
author: Reborn

quote: Don't underestimate the Vongola!
author: Hayato Gokudera

quote: Don't think. Feel.
author: Superbi Squalo

quote: Both hands to the front! Raise left hand!Raise right hand too!Haaaaa~~OPEN!
author: Fran

quote: *Fran asks if he can remove his hat* No way! You'll die wearing it!
author: Belphegor

quote: But the thing is, I can't lift my arms because of this hat. So what I'm saying is, can I remove it?
author: Fran

quote: I'm going to kill you. Or better yet, commit suicide right here.
author: Belphegor

quote: *talking about poses*  Don't all the heroes who transform and magicians who cast spells have those?I'm the type of person for whom doing that is necessary.
author: Fran

quote: *Bel asks about Fran's box weapon* I did my best, but ... I couldn't think of a pose so I couldn't open it.
author: Fran

quote: Don't you ever spare a thought for the environmental crisis?
author: Fran

quote: Bel-senpai, can you pull the knives out of my back first? Your renowned knives have such a weird shape, it's kind of embarrassing to have them sticking out my back like this.
author: Fran

quote: Geh, please stop it, enough with the stabbing.
author: Fran

quote: You know, I've been thinking, senpai, your head isn't really screwed on right. You were probably chased out of your homeland, right?
author: Fran

quote: Ahh, you made me cry. I'm reporting you to our long-haired, idiotic commander and asking for permission to kill you, senpai.
author: Fran

quote: Because I took Mammon's place, I was forced to wear this stupid hat. I didn't agree to wear this hat, you know.
author: Fran

quote: The way you used 'but' there is all wrong, lightning pervert.
author: Fran

quote: In that case, Mr. Levi, why don't you go ahead and take them down yourself, please. I'll stay here and watch.
author: Fran

quote: Anyone older than me is an enemy.
author: Hayato Gokudera

quote: Are you nothing without your wings?
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: One who loses their calm, loses the fight before it even starts.
author: Colonello

quote: Stupid cow.
author: Hayato Gokudera

quote: Shouichi's a remarkable person and what's even more remarkable is that he doesn't look like one.
author: Hayato Gokudera

quote: You should just do as you please, like you always do.
author: Hayato Gokudera

quote: Decimo, go scare the hell out of that Mare youngster.
author: Vongola Primo Giotto

quote: This box is extremely yellow!
author: Ryōhei Sasagawa

quote: In times of crisis, we stand united!
author: XANXUS

quote: Didn't you hear, we don't have time to play with you.
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: Do I look the same as yesterday?
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: It's not that I can't drink, I just choose not to.
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: Regardless of our internal strife, in times of Crisis, when we are attacked by scumbags from the outside... We, the Vongola, are always as one!
author: XANXUS

quote: *training during the battle for the rings* Reborn! REST AS IF I WERE TO DIE!!
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: To increase the flame of the ring is to be pissed off.
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: An illusionists illusion countered by another illusion, has already lost it's own perception.
author: Rokudou Mukuro

quote: What's with the tuna?..
author: Dino Cavallone

quote: A game about mafias? Cool!
author: Takeshi Yamamoto

quote: I only want you for your body.
author: Rokudou Mukuro

quote: Do it with your dying will!
author: Reborn

quote: I'll bite you to death!
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: The reason you lost, was because you had me as your opponent.
author: Rokudou Mukuro

quote: The dolphin has guts. I want him in my club!!!
author: Ryōhei Sasagawa

quote: Wow Tsuna, you got some skills out there, getting yourself hurt in the hospital.
author: Reborn

quote: Illusions... or real illusions. Hidden in an illusion is the real illusion. From one illusion will sprout another illusion. Hidden in truths lie lies, hidden in lies hides the truth.
author: Rokudou Mukuro

quote: Yo, lambo, did u bathe?
author: Takeshi Yamamoto

quote: I swear by the pride of the Quincy...I will KILL you!
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: If it was me, I would probably give up in a beautiful way...
author: Ayasegawa Yumichika

quote: Kurosaki Ichigo, my sword has been broken by your freedom of spirit.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: I'm going to have to ask you to stop now, Abarai-kun. I can only step on an ant so hard without crushing it.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: What are you doing? Why do you run Ichigo? You still have not called me. Face forward, Ichigo. You should be able to hear it now. That which blocks your ears is worthless fear. The enemy is one, you are one. What is there to fear? Cast off your fear. Look forward! Go forward! Never stand still. Retreat and you will age. Hesitate and you will die. Shout... my name is... ZANGETSU!
author: Zangetsu

quote: Your brain must have been constructed wrong.
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: Admiration is a feeling furthest away from understanding.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: How about I give you an advantage. Cut me anywhere you want.
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: Dude, that name is so lame.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: *Rukia talking to Renji* Hit a nerve, did I? Well, don't worry Mr. Officer. Now you have the rank, and the pompous attitude, and weird eyebrows to go with it!
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: This twisted spritual pressure... that white mask... Are you a Hollow?
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: *Ganju offers Yumichika to kiss his ass* An ugly thought... That's truly ugly.
author: Ayasegawa Yumichika

quote: You can kiss my ass!
author: Ganju Shiba

quote: Z-A-N-G-E-T-S-U!!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Why, you...! You punched my ruggedly handsome face! Not once, but twice!
author: Ganju Shiba

quote: Are you kidding me? You really don't know who I am?
author: Ganju Shiba

quote: And you better get this street clean enough to eat off of, or I'll kill you both.
author: Ayasegawa Yumichika

quote: Warriors aren't supposed to beg for their lives.
author: Kira Izuru

quote: A grounded bird is nothing more than dinner.
author: Kira Izuru

quote: A battle without risk is simply a child's quarrel.
author: Kariya Jin

quote: It seems that I was born under a star that forces me to watch young people, with futures ahead of them, die.
author: Kuchiki Kouga

quote: Desiring power is dangerous.
author: Kuchiki Kouga

quote: If you two are gonna goof off, try not to be so obvious about it.
author: Madarame Ikkaku

quote: I've breathed enough sewer air to gag a hippo!
author: Ganju Shiba

quote: Did I just get nick-named Pencil?
author: Uryuu Ishida

quote: Think about it this way: a person picks up a sword when he's trying to protect something. Perhaps it's your life or your social status, maybe a reputation, a loved one, or personal beliefs. The motives may be completely different, but in the end, it's the same desire to protect something.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: Quit it. Stop whining. Unless you're able to activate your powers at will, you will die, like a dog, in the Soul Society.
author: Shihouin Yoruichi

quote: We are taught never to shed tears. For to shed tears means that the body has been defeated by emotion. And, to us, that simple act of crying proves, without question, that the existence of emotion is nothing but a burden.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: Ya gotta wonder about someone who'd be dumb enough to follow a person as crazy as he is. Wait, I think I just insulted myself.
author: Ganju Shiba

quote: If you want revenge, do it on your own! Don't draw innocent people into it!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: When people constantly show their affection for you, you start taking it for granted. If you don't realize how much they care for you until they're gone, you'll only be left with regret and remorse.
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: There were a lot of things I wanted to do. I wanted to become a teacher, and an astronaut, and a baker... I wanted to go to a bunch of different donut shops and ask for one of everything! And I wanted to tell the ice-cream man to give me one of everything, too! I wish I could have five different lives! Then I could have been born in five different towns, and eaten five lifetime's worth of food, and had five different careers, and... fallen in love with the same person, five times.
author: Inoue Orihime

quote: Those who are left behind in a fight or are in the way aren't the ones who lack power. They're the ones who lack resolve.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: Training hard, risking your life... what's the difference?
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: It's been a while! Or something like that...
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: Shut up. Don't talk and keep running!
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: Hey... whoever just called me bald, get over here!
author: Madarame Ikkaku

quote: Revolving... If fate is a wheel, we are the cogs that drive it. We have no choice but to believe that this wheel is flawless and forge on ahead. The power of the individual cogs and their destinations... And the blade that is brought down upon them.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: Revolving. And each time it's touched by the light of the sun and moon... The world is always changing into something new.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Kariya sought the power to change his fate. What I sought was... a turn of fate.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Because he attained so much power, he could only be controlled by it. And in the end, maybe his only option was to destroy himself.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Authority never goes anywhere without a fanfare.
author: Toushirou Hitsugaya

quote: Whatever she is, it doesn't change the fact that she's here now. She still experiences anger, happiness and pain.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: When you're up high, all the stuff that looks confusing and messed up...suddenly becomes crystal clear.
author: Senna

quote: Arrogance destroys the footholds of victory.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: That wasn't very nice. I do believe you've killed my hat.
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: Abandon your fear. Turn and face him. Don't back an inch. Now, Ichigo, advance! Never stop! If you retreat, you will age. Be afraid, and you'll die.
author: Zangetsu

quote: You'll find that Ichigo has an uncanny knack for forgeting people's faces, and the names to go with them.
author: Arisawa Tatsuki

quote: *yelling at her pager, which is laying on the ground* Urahara! Why don't you ever pick up when I call you in emergencies like this? You call yourself a business man! Then why do you show up when you're not wanted, and then when I really need you, you won't answer?!
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: Isn't she awfully happy...for someone visiting a grave?
author: Kurosaki Karin

quote: You nuts?! What kind of sick twisted freak attacks his own son while he's laying in bed, sleeping?!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: We stand in awe before that which can not be seen... And we respect, with every fiber, that which can not be explained.
author: Rukia Kuchiki

quote: I've heard that stalkers don't realize they're stalking. Apparently, they believe that they're "protecting".
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: *Simon to Celty, who's wearing a super revealing bikini*You are more transparent than you think.
author: Simon Brezhnev

quote: I am trying to seduce you. *Celty in a super revealing bikini*
author: Celty Sturluson

quote: All the cards are in my hand.
author: Ryuugamine Mikado

quote: *jumping on a guy* So you brought your boyfriend because I don't hit girls?How admirable of you.I'd like to make you mine, but sorry, you're not my type.So go home!
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: My family was normal.
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: *Seiji talking to Mikado* If you really do love her, don't look away, no matter what happens. No matter what you see, no matter what you learn about her, don't look away. Once you got her in your embrace, don't let go. Once you decide you love someone, that's your responsibility.
author: Seiji Yagiri

quote: No matter how much you try to escape it, you can't get away from what you were part of.
author: Kyohei Kadota

quote: "What is life?", "Why do people live?". Someone asked me that and I beat him within an inch of his life...
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: Listen. Looks can kill. There's at least a 0.00000000000000000000675% chance that a curse or a stare can kill someone. So if you glare at someone, you can't complain if they kill you!
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: The world isn't as cruel as you take it to be.
author: Celty Sturluson

quote: Is she a stalker..?! If she's cute it's okay, right?
author: Ryuugamine Mikado

quote: In my hometown, the sky seemed endless...but there was nothing to see.
author: Ryuugamine Mikado

quote: Vroom! Vroom!
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: If I pull this out will it start bleeding? Hm, maybe I should get a band-aid. Or maybe super glue!
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: It's too addicting, it's too addicting, it's too addicting! Even for an information broker like me there are things completely unknown to me happening and happening and appearing before my eyes and lapsing back into unknown every single day. That is why I can never ever leave the places where humans abound! Humans, LOVE! I LOVE HUMANS! I LOVE YOU ALL! THAT'S WHY YOU ALL SHOULD LOVE ME TOO!
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Sushi love. I like fatty tuna...
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Oh, and just because I like humans, it doesn't mean that I like you personally.
author: Izaya Orihara

quote: Someday, I'll connect the dots, and unveil the picture that invisible to us now...
author: Masaomi Kida

quote: How are you going to drown on land?
author: Masaomi Kida

quote: *Kida asks Simon to give him a discount next time* If I did, I'd meet a watery grave on Russian land.
author: Simon Brezhnev

quote: Even on 50% off days, we don't serve humans in our dishes.
author: Simon Brezhnev

quote: Are you done with puberty? Then it's time for you to eat sushi.
author: Simon Brezhnev

quote: HNGGGGG. You just went for my head, didn't you? You know you could kill someone by hitting a vital spot in their head, right? If you know this, then you were trying to kill me, right?
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: They called me a monster!
author: Celty Sturluson

quote: The unicorn was real! Of course YOU couldn't see it, because you're not PURE. But I saw it and it was cute with a soft fluffy mane...
author: America

quote: These are broken, so Korea didn't make them.
author: South Korea

quote: *drunk* Damnit! You sure talk big, when I'm the one who made you a man!
author: England

quote: I could never think of this kind of (retarded) design. It really is (retardedly) you America.
author: England

quote: Eat bullets macho potato!
author: South Italy

quote: I'll do anything, please don't hit me.
author: North Italy

quote: I think we can solve the problem by building a big hero together and having it sheild the Earth.
author: America

quote: Conceal that garbage.
author: America

quote: In Hell, the Germans are policemen, the English are cooks, the French are engineers, the Italians are bankers, and the Swiss are lovers~
author: Rome

quote: SHUT UP YOU EVIL MUFFINS! DAMMIT!
author: South Italy

quote: What the-- Hun-- HUNGARY!? Why the hell are you here?!
author: Prussia

quote: Become one with me.
author: Russia

quote: Hello, China from the sundown... I'm Japan from the sunrise...
author: Japan

quote: Besides, it's not LEARNED! What's with that LEARNED?! It's LEARNT, you stupid!
author: America

quote: I'm here to make friends with whales!
author: America

quote: *Narrating* One night, I couldn't sleep well and opened my eyes...to find some strange guy staring at me.
author: Germany

quote: *whispering* Ve, ve, ve, ve, ve, ve...
author: North Italy

quote: The other day, I had an extremely disgusting pizza. England made it.
author: North Italy

quote: Hey! Quit hitting Italy when I'm not around! *England runs away* Get back here! Hit him again, and I'll shape ya up like a heart! *Runs after him*
author: Germany

quote: *Repeatedly squeezes the cat's paw* Squish, squish, squish, squish, squish, squish, squish, squish, squish, squish, squish, squish! *the cat licks Italy's face. He screams* Captain! What's happening? This is mutiny! It's mutiny!
author: North Italy

quote: *Pets the cat he is holding* Gentle? Stroke, stroke.
author: North Italy

quote: I'll express how angry I am with this piano.
author: Austria

quote: You moron! Why did you become allied with Italy?
author: Austria

quote: Dango, dango, dango, dango. Big dango family.
author: Furukawa Nagisa

quote: Our journey starts, on this long, long steep slope.
author: Furukawa Nagisa

quote: Fun things...Happy things...They can't all possibly stay unchanged. Even so, can you go on loving this place?
author: Furukawa Nagisa

quote: I'm so glad... Takuto...
author: Meroko Yui

quote: It was just a simple hologram, it's what Me-chan would have wanted...
author: Meroko Yui

quote: Did you really think that we hadn't realized yet? Scaring you silly...was quite lovely.
author: Izumi Rio

quote: I want to hear you sing! Ok?
author: Meroko Yui

quote: Should I not have come? It couldn't be that my presence is an inconvenience, right?
author: Izumi Rio

quote: I-Izumi... Why are you in the human world?
author: Meroko Yui

quote: ...despite all the personal danger he may face...he is always protecting that girl.
author: Meroko Yui

quote: In that case, I'll give her a little push...
author: Izumi Rio

quote: Wait... I remember that the flower of forgetfulness is... *Izumi explains that this flower only blooms on the day of the lunar eclipse, in the spirit world* but... If it's for Takuto, I...
author: Meroko Yui

quote: Now you understand, don't you?.. Things will never work out the way you want them to.
author: Izumi Rio

quote: That's a lie. I know. Takuto...it hurts... what did I do wrong? Someone tell me.
author: Meroko Yui

quote: Get outta the way!!
author: Meroko Yui

quote: Oh please! Even us, shinigami, want to celebrate Christmas and be happy!
author: Meroko Yui

quote: Us, shinigami, don't have anything to do with Christmas.
author: Takuto Kira

quote: I don't know...just how I feel...
author: Takuto Kira

quote: I'll keep on confessing to you... I love you Takuto!
author: Meroko Yui

quote: You don't have to bring up your seniority every time, you know.
author: Takuto Kira

quote: Hey, where is the attitude you should have towards your elders!?
author: Meroko Yui

quote: *Meroko explaining Takuto why he is here* Well, you see...you're here to make new memories.
author: Meroko Yui

quote: We, brawlers, are sustained by willpower even when mocked as reckless and crazy!
author: Kamina

quote: The dreams we left behind will open the door!
author: Yoko Littner

quote: Whether impossible or laughable, we continue to walk the path of men!
author: Kamina

quote: I'll solve equations with my right hand and write names with my left. I'll take a potato chip... and eat it!
author: Light Yagami

quote: Ah! She smirked at me! Misa is going to break her legs!
author: Misa Amane

quote: Light-kun, please get Misa to shut up.
author: L Lawliet

quote: He, who attacks first, always wins.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Well, it was good while it lasted. We killed some boredom, didn't we? We did some various and interesting things.
author: Ryuk

quote: You have lost, Light. Didn't I say in the beginning, when you die, the one who'll write your name down in a notebook will be me? That is the deal between the Shinigami and the first human to get their hands on the note in the human world. Once you enter prison, I don't know when you'll die. It's annoying to wait. Your life is already over. You'll die here.
author: Ryuk

quote: You're such a loser, Naruto.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: Are you alright, crybaby?
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: Naruto... I know you're special but, I AM MORE SPECIAL THAN YOU!
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: The image reflected in a picture is but an illusion. However, even if it is an illusion, wishing to hold onto it is one of the hollow dreams humans have.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Make it hurt. Carve the pain of my life into my soul.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I thought that even if you died, somehow you would protect me.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: The ring seems more like a collar to me. I hope that one day that collar chokes you.
author: Undertaker

quote: Even though I told him to hold each and every soul dear. Because you hold great power you gradually fail to understand the importance of things that cannot be recovered. When it is realized and you lose your support...how many times have I given you and the others the same warning?
author: Undertaker

quote: It's useless. A tiny mouse can run anywhere...but they are always in my sight.
author: Maylene

quote: Become one without filth, one without heart, and one without life.
author: Ash

quote: Unsheathe the pride of my sword, wisdom and point it at your beastly body. Let me be the one to push you towards hell.
author: Ash

quote: *Ciel to Prince Sohma* There are some things you can never get back, no matter how much effort you put in. And there are some feelings of despair, that you can never ever shake off.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I hate dogs... Actually, I detest them.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Yes, my lord.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Once one has rejected faith, it will become impossible for him to enter the gates of Heaven.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Friends... is it?That's the first time anyone has said that to me.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: No, I won't abandon hate. If I did, then nothing would be left of me.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: I knew it... No matter how I do it...there is always a smell. *after sleeping with a demon dog*
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: At this moment, my body and soul, to the last hair, belong to my master.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: It's coming out~~~ *during the corset scene*
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: You aren't wrong. You fought to protect your world. What's wrong with that? In the end, "justice" is just an official line taken by those in power to serve their own ends. No one's looking out for others. If you're careless, you'll be robbed. There are only two kinds of people in this world. Those who steal, and those who are stolen from. And today, I steal your futures. That's all this is.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: If it is your wish, I will follow you anywhere, even if your throne crumbles, and your shiny crown turns to rust. Even if the bodies pile up endlessly above the bottomless pile of corpses. Beside you as you lie down softly, I will be, until I hear the words "Check Mate"!
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: THERE'S NOT ENOUGH MAYONNAISE!
author: Hijikata Toushirou

quote: They have a one-eye bandaged member, so we'll be better and have a two-eye bandaged member!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: End your sentences in "Woof" please.
author: Okita Sougo

quote: It may be tough now, but the worst is surely yet to come. Keep that in mind, and you'll be fine.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Kids these days just want to stuff their faces and make sweet love. At least that's what Gin-chan says.
author: Kagura

quote: *Haruhi is being forced to kiss a girl* This is going too far. *Kyoya offers to cut her debt by a third if she agrees* ...Oh well, it's just on the cheek.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: Mom! Haruhi's using foul language!
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: Tama-chan kick!
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: Just suppose... I'm not really Haruhi's father.
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: Alright! The Low Blood Pressure Evil Lord has given his approval!
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: *points to Tamaki* Hey, look! A pervert!
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: Even though I gave my first kiss to a girl by a weird series of events, the night had a good feel to it.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: Isn't bun bun cute?!
author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka

quote: *Haruhi talking to hitachiin brothers* You two are different even though you look the same.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: Jealous? Really? Really?! Really Haruhi?!! *after that Haruhi shoots him down with a negative answer*
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: Having no money is like having a sinus infection. You just ignore it and it goes away.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Eyebrow Zombies... How about we call them Zombrows?
author: Kotarō Katsura

quote: A life without gambling is like sushi without wasabi!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: When a woman says something's cute, a man just can't trust it.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Listen up! Let's say you drink too much strawberry milk, and have to use the bathroom in the middle of the night. But it's cold outside your bed. You don't want to get up, but the urge to urinate is just too strong! You make up your mind to go! You run to the bathroom, stand in front of the toilet, and let loose! You think that all your life has led to this moment! But then you realize! It isn't the bathroom, you're still in bed! That feeling of lukewarm wetness spreads like wildfire! But you don't stop! You can't stop! That's what I'm talking about! THAT'S THE TRUTH OF THE STRAWBERRY MILK! DO YOU GET IT!?
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: *staring at his hand in the toilet* Do you know why people have two hands? That's because...
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: *Gintoki stopped by a metal detector* Could it be that this can even detect the blade of the soul?
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Every since childhood we've dreamed of being pirates. We're looking for the fabled treasure they call "One Pack", right Zura? (One Piece parody)
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Listen up! What we need is this! Yes, calcium! If we have enough calcium, we can do anything!
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: That's a good attitude. You should hate me more, curse me more, and detest me! Then you should take the power of that hatred and use it to survive in this rotten world. (parody of Naruto, Itachi)
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: It's not Zura. IT'S KATSURA!
author: Kotarō Katsura

quote: Oi, oi. Why do you have red eyes? Have you been playing Tetris all night?
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: Shut up! I killed Sasuke Uchiha! And you're next, you art-hating sack of wrinkles!
author: Deidara

quote: *Before killing the Suna guards* Look at those fools. They have no appreciation for art. You have to feel art. And true art... is an EXPLOSION!
author: Deidara

quote: Art is a BANG!
author: Deidara

quote: *Tamaki is sulking* Come on sempai, would you please stop growing mushrooms in other people's closets?
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: You know, sempai, this could be considered sexual harrassment.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: The end of the world is here, huh?
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: Rich Bastards.
author: Haruhi Fujioka

quote: Kakuzu... Could you get me my body, pleeease?
author: Hidan

quote: Feelings you have for each other will not be known unless you voice them.
author: Kaoru Hitachiin

quote: When in Rome, do as the romans do!
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: I think guys who can't make up their minds..,are scum.
author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka

quote: Beautiful men can't be hurt by water.
author: Suoh Tamaki

quote: Ahh! NO way! Someone just touched my butt!
author: Misa Amane

quote: Light-kun is my only friend.
author: L Lawliet

quote: I'm a...pervert?
author: L Lawliet

quote: If you don't get serious about this...I'll kick you.
author: L Lawliet

quote: When something is gone, it will never return.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: *evil laughter* It IS possible! Britannia can be destroyed!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: To hate or to be hated, someone will hate again. To send or to be sent to Hell, someone will be sent there again. I have witnessed this cycle over and over again. No one can stop it.
author: Ai Enma

quote: As long as there is at least one person who understands me, I'll be okay.
author: Ami Kawashima

quote: The thing you wished for the most, is something you'll never get.
author: Taiga Aisaka

quote: i cant do somthing like that this... this is the one thing that i can do for Takuto
author: Meroko Yui

quote: As long as Takuto's happy, thats good enough for me.
author: Meroko Yui

quote: "If I'm always going to end up feeling this way, I'd much rather never fall in love again." That's what I thought, but before I realized it, Takuto... I fell in love with him.
author: Meroko Yui

quote: When you die an early death or of suicide, you forget everything you did in life and become a shinigami as punishment. However if you remember your life when you were alive, your spirit gets pulled back to this world and and becomes a ghost, because you have no body to return to...
author: Meroko Yui

quote: They worship a demon as a god?
author: Dante

quote: You can hide that body, but that smell... Hoo! There's no covering that up!
author: Dante

quote: You summon and kill... Summon and kill... I fail to see the logic here. Is sanity the price to pay FOR POWER!?
author: Dante

quote: Okay, are you ready? C'mon babes, LETS ROCK!!
author: Dante

quote: We are the sons of Sparda! Within each of us flows his blood, but more importantly, his soul!
author: Dante

quote: Well, if the kid screws up, then I'll just have to kick his ass.
author: Dante

quote: Fire's bad for the complexion. I burn easily, never tan!
author: Nero

quote: From that day forth...my arm changed...and a voice echoed "Power! Give me more power!" ...and if I become a demon, so be it. I'll endure the exile...anything, to protect her!
author: Nero

quote: Don't you think that's a little harsh? Killing me because of the way I t-t-t-talk?
author: Nero

quote: First, I whip it out, then I thrust it, with great force. Every angle - it penetrates. Until, with great strength, I ram it in. In the end, we're all satisfied.
author: Dante

quote: I give you the strawberry if you keep it a secret.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Kid? Well... if that's how you see me, I think you'll blush a pretty pink when I kick your ass!
author: Nero

quote: Ippen shindemiru?
author: Ai Enma

quote: Do you want to experience what dying is like?
author: Ai Enma

quote: The real hell is inside the person.
author: Ai Enma

quote: She's not small... In my heart her existence is not small.
author: Zero Kiriyuu

quote: I came to exterminate the vermin of this world!
author: Light Yagami

quote: Man, I wish I had a Bankai or something..
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: *Ed crawling through an air vent* Che. It's so tight, it makes me glad that I have a small body.
author: Edward Elric

quote: Lelouch vi Britannia commands you... Die!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I Destroy worlds...I Create worlds...
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Fake tears can harm others, while a fake smile only harms oneself.
author: C.C.

quote: If the king doesn't move, then his subjects won't follow.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: What are the Japanese?!
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: A world gained through battle will only bring forth new battles.
author: Kira Yamato

quote: What is a heart? If I rip open your chest, will I find it there? If I crack open your skull, will I find it there?
author: Ulquiorra Schiffer

quote: Ice Cream, Ice Cream who likes ice cream?!?!
author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka

quote: Haru-chan!!!
author: Mitsukuni Haninozuka

quote: Ever since I met you, I feel like... I've lived to meet you.
author: Motoharu Yano

quote: Watashi wa L-desu.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Inu pig!
author: Sakura Haruno

quote: Man... What a drag...
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: What on Earth is this little creature?
author: Risa Koizumi

quote: What are you fighting for? Is it the medals you received, or your father's orders?
author: Lacus Clyne

quote: Even I get in the mood for that stuff now and then. I am a healthy girl, my body has its urges. But I won't let a momentary slip up leave me with a burden.
author: Haruhi Suzumiya

quote: My left hand for the devils, the right for the humans. That's what I had decided!
author: Allen Walker

quote: No matter what happens, I'll keep on moving. Until this life runs out of me, I'll keep on walking.
author: Allen Walker

quote: I'm telling you this because you don't get it. You think you get it, which is not the same as actually getting it. Get it?
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: If you die, I'll kill you!
author: Roronoa Zoro

quote: Is there a need for a reason to kill someone?
author: Mugen

quote: How troublesome...
author: Nara Shikamaru

quote: Stand up and walk... Move on... After all, you have perfect legs to stand on...
author: Edward Elric

quote: If living means that I must bow down to you guys, I will happily stand tall and die!
author: Mugen

quote: I will bite you to death!
author: Hibari Kyoya

quote: I will reign over a new world.
author: Light Yagami

quote: If you can't beat the game, if you can't solve the puzzle, you're nothing but a loser.
author: Near

quote: I'll kill anyone who gets in my way. I'll be the number one.
author: Mello

quote: I'm just one hell of a butler...
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: Drown in your ideals and die!
author: Archer

quote: No, it's good, money is good. I'm not sure why, but everyone says money is good.
author: Graham Specter

quote: Who the hell do you think I am?!
author: Kamina

quote: A true hero always arrives late.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: If you die, don't come crying to me about it.
author: Gintoki Sakata

quote: I'm sure it's just some pretty girl talking about me somewhere.
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: I'm so disappointed, Ichigo, so very disappointed. Sadly, your sword exhibits only fear. When you counter, it's because you fear being killed. When you attack, you fear killing. And when you protect someone, you fear you could let them die. At this point, the only thing your sword speaks is senseless fright, and that's not good. What you don't need in battle is fear. Nothing will come of it. When you counter, you don't let them cut you. When you protect someone, you don't let them die. And when you attack, you kill.
author: Urahara Kisuke

quote: Everyone who searches for power, without exception, searches for battle. Do you fight in order to become more powerful? Or do you want more power so you can fight?
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: If he rips my arms off, I'll kick him to death.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: You know why big brothers are born first? To protect the little ones that come after them.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: I am strong because I have people to protect.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: With a man's soul and a strong back, go beyond the impossible and kick reason to the curb!
author: Kamina

quote: A true man doesn't die even if he's killed!!!
author: Kamina

quote: I want to go back and change the past. If I could - I would, if that would stop you from crying.
author: Motoharu Yano

quote: Foolish brother, if you wish to kill me - hate me, detest me, and survive in an unsightly way. Run... run and cling to life.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: In the ninja world, those who don't follow the rules are trash. But, those who abandon their friends are even worse than trash.
author: Obito Uchiha

quote: And my dream is to be the greatest Hokage! That way, people will stop disrespecting me and start treating me like I'm somebody. Someone important!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Because you're the only shinobi in the world who can surpass the Fourth. Thats what I believe.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Kneel like a worm and beg the demon to do it.
author: Ciel Phantomhive

quote: Sanity... what would I do with a useless thing like that?
author: Zaraki Kenpachi

quote: Will you be eating that cake?...say what you want, but I will be taking the cake.
author: L Lawliet

quote: Since the beginning, no one has ever stood in the heavens. Neither you, nor me, not even God himself. But that unbearable vacancy in the throne of Heaven shall be filled. From this day forth, I will stand in heaven.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Ever since that day my heart simply couldn't accept it. This fake life I was never able to fit into. All the time that was lost. These false memories planted in me giving me a life as one of the herd. And yet, the truth continues to guide me toward itself. That's right. It wasn't me who was wrong. It was the world. The world has to change so I will change it.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: The only ones who should kill, are those who are prepared to be killed.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: Why are you putting so much distance between us? If you want to make sure it hits me, then you should get close and fire. Or is it that you're afraid of letting even a part of me out of your field of vision by getting close? If that's the case, then it's a foolish thought. Distance only has meaning in a fight between equals. With you and I, distance holds no meaning at all. Watch... If I do this, my hand is almost instantly at your heart.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: The betrayal you can see is trivial. What is truly frightening and much more lethal, is the betrayal that you don't see.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Reason exists for those who cannot go on living without clinging to it. Now let's go... to the edge of reason.
author: Aizen Sousuke

quote: Come on! You know what this badass mother can do!
author: Kallen Stadtfeld

quote: As you pass into the next life feel honored that you have perished by my bankai.
author: Kuchiki Byakuya

quote: I am the god of the new world!
author: Light Yagami

quote: I can use my tongue to make a sakura branch into a butterfly knot.
author: Sebastian Michaelis

quote: The world cannot be changed with pretty words alone.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: My butt's on fire!
author: Son Goku

quote: When people are protecting something truly precious to them. They truly can become...as strong as they need to be!
author: Haku

quote: Why do women have butts on their chests?
author: Son Goku

quote: Not enough... blood.
author: Gaara

quote: From this point on, all your opinions are rejected!
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: The world is dyed with the color of blood. It will never be able to go back to the way it was before...
author: Yuki Kuran

quote: BELIEVE IT!!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Panties, Panties, Panties!
author: Chii

quote: No matter how much you hurt inside, the dead can never return.
author: Seijuro Hiko

quote: If you pretend to feel a certain way, the feeling can become genuine all by accident.
author: Hei

quote: Having a light side and a dark side is what makes life interesting.
author: Tyki Mikk

quote: You stupid hairy little stink'n... PANDA! PANDA! PANDA! PANDA!
author: Eimi Ohba

quote: I am not the one at fault, the world is.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: We - the warriors, go now to the field of battle! Believe that our blades will not shatter!
author: Abarai Renji

quote: again..!"
author: alive

quote: I want to be needed, this is what I've learned from meeting and fighting Uzumaki Naruto.
author: Gaara

quote: A dropout will beat a genius through hard work.
author: Rock Lee

quote: To know what is right and choose to ignore it is the act of a coward.
author: Hatake Kakashi

quote: Worrying about a warrior's life on the battlefield is only an insult.
author: Abarai Renji

quote: Let's make our past fade into comparison with the present.
author: Motoharu Yano

quote: I'm not Superman, so I can't say anything big like "I'll protect everyone on Earth!". I'm not a modest guy who will say "It's enough if I can protect as many people as my two hands can handle." either. I want to protect...a mountain-load of people.
author: Kurosaki Ichigo

quote: Is it weapons that are the cause of all this fighting or does the real cause lie within the human heart..?
author: Lacus Clyne

quote: What can you protect, if your only weapon are your emotions.
author: Kira Yamato

quote: Do you know why snow is white..? Because it forgot what colour it was.
author: C.C.

quote: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in ME who believes in you!
author: Kamina

quote: I'm not a nerd, I'm a specialist.
author: Sousuke Sagara

quote: “Imagine smiling after a slap in the face. Then think of doing it twenty-four hours a day.”
author: Markus Zusak,

quote: “If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.”
author: Marcus Aurelius,

quote: “Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.”
author: Marcus Aurelius,

quote: “It is the power of the mind to be unconquerable.”
author: Seneca,
